atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni / atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma, tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma / atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma / upasaṃkramya tāvavocan / kutrāyuṣmantau gamiṣyathaḥ? nirmitakāvavocatām / gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu, tatra dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ / yaṃ hi bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati, tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe / atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan / vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe
# de nas dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa 'di la mi 'jug ste / / ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa sprul te / / de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der dong ste phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so / / tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong / / sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa / / kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas par bya bar dong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa gang yin pa'ang chos bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste / / mi rtogs mi mos shing / / skrag ste kun du dang ngas / / kun du rab tu dang ngas par gyur nas kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o / / de nas dge slong lnga brgya po rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so / / tshe dang ldan pa dag / / kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la mi 'jug ste / / ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste / / kun du dang ngas kun du rab tu dang ngas par gyur te / / de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o /
tena vayamaraṇyāyataneṣu dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāmaḥ / nirmitakāvavocatām / tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ / avivādaparamā hi śramaṇasya dharmāḥ / kasyāyuṣmantaḥ prahāṇāya pratipannāḥ? tānyavocan
# sprul pa dag gis smras pa / / tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o / / rtsod par mi bya'o / / rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos so / / tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang / / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang / / lus 'di las bdag gam / / sems can nam / / srog gam / / skye ba po 'am / / skyes bu'am gang zag gam / / shed las skyes sam / / shed bu'am / / gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur / / gang zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' / / de dag gis smras pa /
rāgadveṣamohānāṃ prahāṇāya vayaṃ pratipannāḥ / nirmitakāvavocatām / kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha? tānyavocan / na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante, nāpi te 'parikalpitā utpadyante / nirmitakāvavocatām / tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata, [mā vikalpayata]
# 'dod chags zad zhe sdang zad gti mug zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o / / sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa / / tshe dang ldan pa dag / / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yod pa yin nam / / ci nam de zad par bya / / de dag gis smras pa / / de dag ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med / / gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs te / / de dag ni yongs su ma brtags pa las kyang mi skye'o / / sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa / / tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta bas na bdag tu ma rtog rnam par ma rtog shig /
yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha, tadā na raṃkṣyatha na viraṃkṣyatha / yaśca na rakto na viraktaḥ, sa śānta ityucyate
# tshe dang ldan pa dag nam mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe chags par mi 'gyur chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro / / chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba yang med pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o /
śīlamāyuṣmanto na saṃsarati na parinirvāti
# tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims ni mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o /
samādhiḥ prajñā vimuktirvimuktijñānadarśanamāyuṣmanto  na saṃsarati na parinirvāti
# tshe dang ldan pa dag ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o /
ebhiścāyuṣmanto dharmairnirvāṇaṃ sūcyate
# tshe dang ldan pa dag / / tshes de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na /
ete ca dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ prakṛtiviviktāḥ / prajahītaitāmāyuṣmantaḥ saṃjñāṃ yaduta parinirvāṇamiti
# chos de dag kyang stong pa dpen pa gzung du med pa'o / / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste / / mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes spongs shig /
mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñā kārṣṭa, mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijñāsiṣṭa / yo hi saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijānāti, saṃjñā bandhanamevāsya tadbhavati
# 'du shes la yang 'du shes su ma byed cing / / 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes par ma byed cig / / gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes pa de'i de ni 'du shes la yongs su bcings pa yin no / / tshe dang ldan pa dag /
saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattimāyuṣmantaḥ samāpadyadhvam
# khyed 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs shig /
saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattisamāpannasya bhikṣornāstyuttarīkaraṇīyamiti vadāvaḥ
# tshe dang ldan pa dag / / dge slong 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes smra'o /
atha teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktānyabhūvan
# chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo /
tāni vimuktacittāni yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāni
# de dag sems rnam par grol nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte nyasīdan / athāyuṣmān subhūtistān
# phyogs gcig tu 'khod do / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong dag la 'di skad ces smras so / / tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong / / gang nas lhags /
bhikṣūnetadavocat / kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te 'vocan / na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha / ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā? āhuḥ / yo notpanno na parinirvāsyati / āha / kathaṃ yuṣmābhirdharmaḥ śrutaḥ? āhuḥ / na bandhanāya na mokṣāya / āha / kena yūyaṃ vinītāḥ? āhuḥ / yasya na kāyo na cittam
# de dag gis smras pa / / btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to / / smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi ston pa gang yin / / smras pa gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o / / smras pa khyed kyis ji ltar chos thos / / smras pa bcings pa'i phyir yang ma yin / / thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no / / smras pa khyed sus btul / / smras pa su la lus med cing sems med pas so / / smras pa khyed ji ltar brtson / / smras pa ma rig pa spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin rig pa skyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin no /
āha / kathaṃ yūyaṃ prayuktāḥ? āhuḥ / nāvidyāprahāṇāya na vidyotpādanāya / āha / kasya yūyaṃ śrāvakāḥ? āhuḥ
# smras pa khyod ji ltar rnam par grol / / smras pa sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin / / spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin no / / smras pa khyed su'i nyan thos /
yena na prāptaṃ nābhisaṃbuddham / āha
# smras pa gang gis thob pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'i'o /
ke yuṣmākaṃ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ? āhuḥ / ye traidhātuke nopavicaranti / āha
# smras pa khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang / / smras pa gang khams gsum na mi rgyu ba rnams so /
kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ
# smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid cig na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' /
yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti / āha
# smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba na'o /
kṛtaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ karaṇīyam? āhuḥ / ahaṃ kāramamakāraparijñānataḥ / āha / kṣīṇā yuṣmākaṃ kleśāḥ? āhuḥ
# smras pa khyod kyis bya ba byas sam / / smras pa ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas so / / smras pa khyed kyi nyon mongs pa zad dam /
atyantakṣayātsarvadharmāṇām / āha / dharṣito yuṣmābhirmāraḥ? āhuḥ / skandhamārānupalambhāt / āha / dharṣito yuṣmābhirmāraḥ? āhuḥ / skandhamārānupalambhāt / āha / paricarito yuṣmābhiḥ śāstā? āhuḥ / na kāyena na vācā na manasā / āha / viśodhitā yuṣmābhirdakṣiṇīyabhūmiḥ? āhuḥ / agrāhato 'pratigrāhataḥ / āha / uttīrṇo yuṣmābhiḥ saṃsāraḥ? āhuḥ / anucchedato 'śāśvatataḥ / āha / pratipannā yuṣmābhirdakṣiṇīyabhūmiḥ? āhuḥ / sarvagrāhavinirmuktitaḥ / āha / kiṃgāmina āyuṣmantaḥ? āhuḥ / yaṃgāminastathāgatanirmitāḥ / iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham / iti / ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti / uktaṃ ca āryavajramaṇḍāyāṃ dhāraṇyām
# smras pa chos thams cad gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro / / smras pa khyed kyis bdud btul lam / / smras pa phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / smras pa khyed kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas sam / / smras pa lus kyis kyang ma byas / / ngag gis kyang ma byas / / sems kyis kyang ma byas so / / smras pa khyod kyis yon gnas kyis sbyangs sam / / smras pa 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so / / smras pa khyed 'khor ba las rgal tam / / smras pa chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro / / smras pa khyed yon gnas kyi sar zhugs sam / / smras pa 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro / / smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro / / smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud par ro / / de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongs su dris te / / dge slong de dag gis lan btab nas 'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo / / srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go zhes gsungs so / / de ltar na dge slong de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa brdzun pa'i rang bzhin can gnyis kyis dge slong lnga brgya'i rnam par byang ba'i rgyu byas pa yin no / / 'phags pa rdo rje snying po las kyang / / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na /
tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate / sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ / evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ
# gtsub shing dang gtsub gtan la brten / / mi'i lag pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas du ba 'byung zhing / / me mngon par 'grub ste / / me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas gtsub gtan la yang mi gnas / / mi'i lag pa'i rtsol ba la yang mi gnas so / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du med pa las skyes bu gang zag rmongs pa la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba 'ang 'byung ste / / yongs su gdung ba de yang nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas / / gnyi ga med par yang mi gnas mod kyi /
sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ / api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti, tatkena kāraṇenocyate moha iti? atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti
# 'jam dpal 'on kyang gti mug ces bya'o / / de ci'i phyir gti mug ces brjod par bya zhe na / / 'jam dpal gti mug ni chos thams cad rab tu grol ba ste / / des na gti mug ces bya'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sgo ste /
tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam / āha / kathaṃ bhagavannidaṃ dhāraṇīpadam? āha / narakā mañjuśrīḥ bālapṛgthajanairasadviparyāsaviṭhapitāḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtāḥ
# 'di ni gzungs kyi tshig go / / gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'di gzungs kyi tshig lags / / bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis yod pa ma yin pa la phyin ci log gis bsgrubs shing / / rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'o /
āha / kutra bhagavannarakāḥ samavasaranti? bhagavānāha
# gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba dag gang du yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
ākāśasamavasaraṇā mañjuśrīḥ narakāḥ / tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ? āha
# 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dag ni nam mkhar yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro / / 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems / / sems can dmyal ba rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam / / 'on te ngo bo nyid las byung /
svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti
# gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa kho nas sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'du shes te /
te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu
# de dag ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa'i slad du tshor ba sdug bsngal myong zhing / / ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur lags so /
yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham
# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni ji ltar sems can dmyal ba ma khums pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ma khums so /
tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte
# bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste skyes bu la la zhig gnyid kyis log ste rmi lam na bdag nyid sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'du shes par 'gyur la /
sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt
# des de ni lcags kyi bum pa skyes bu du ma dang ldan pa khol ba 'bar bar bdag nyid bcug par yang 'du shes par 'gyur ro /
sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tŌṣvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet / sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta
# des de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag cing mi bzad la brnag par dka' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro / / des de na yid kyi gdung ba yongs su myang bar 'gyur / / de de na skrag par 'gyur /
sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ / aho duḥkham, aho duḥkham, iti krandet śocet paridevet / atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ / kena tatte duḥkhamiti / sa tān mitrajñātisālohitānevaṃ vadet / nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhūtam / sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet / ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi / yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti
# dngangs par 'gyur / / kun tu dngangs par 'gyur ro / / de de nas sad par 'gyur zhing rlom pa dang bcas pas kyi ma sdug bsngal lo / / kye ma sdug bsngal lo zhes du zhing cho nges 'debs la smre sngags 'don par 'gyur lags so / / de nas de la grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyis ci zhig gis 'di ltar khyod sdug bsngal bar gyur zhes dris pa dang de grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag la 'di skad du ngas ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo zhes smra bar bgyid / / de bdag gis ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong na / / khyed cag ci zhig gis 'di ltar khyed sdug bsngal bar gyur zhes 'dri par byed dam zhes de dag la cho nges 'debs par bgyid / / spyo bar bgyid do /
atha te mitrajñātisālohitāstaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ / mā bhairmoḥ puruṣa
# de nas skyes bu de la grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag 'di skad du /
supto hi tvam / na tvamito gṛhāt kvacinnirgataḥ / tasya punarapi smṛti rutpadyate / supto 'hamabhūvam
# kye skyes bu mi 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig khyod ni gnyid kyis log pa yin gyi / / khyod khyim 'di nas gar yang song ba med do zhes smra bar bgyid do / / de yang bdag ni gnyid kyis log par gyur te /
vitathametanmayā parikalpitamiti / sa punarapi saumanasyaṃ pratilabhate
# yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di bdag gis kun du brtags so snyam du de la dran pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / / slar yang de yid bde ba 'thob par 'gyur lags so /
tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo 'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt, evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā asadbhāgaparyavanaddhāḥ strīnimittaṃ kalpayanti
# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa de yod pa ma yin pa la sgro btags nas bdag nyid rmi lam du dmyal bar song bas 'du shes par 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo bden pa ma lags pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas bcings pa thams cad bud med la mtshan mar rtog par bgyid do /
te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti
# de dag bud med la mtshan mar brtags nas bdag nyid de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' bar 'du shes so /
tasya bālapṛthajanasyaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ puruṣaḥ, iyaṃ strī, mamaiṣā strī / tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti
# byis pa so so'i skye bo de 'di snyam du bdag ni skyes pa'o / / 'di ni bud med do / / bud med 'di bdag gi'o snyam du 'gyur zhing de 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems des longs spyod tshol bar sems 'jug par 'gyur lags so /
sa tatonidānaṃ kalahavigrahavivādaṃ saṃjanayati
# de gzhi de las 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang gyul 'gyed par bgyid cing /
tasya praduṣṭendriyasya vairaṃ saṃjāyate
# gdug pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa de la khon du 'dzin pa 'byung bar 'gyur lags so /
sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti
# rlom pa dang bcas pa de 'du shes phyin ci log des 'chi ba'i dus bgyis par gyur nas bdag nyid bskal pa stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba dag tu sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'du shes so /
tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti / mā bhaiḥ, mā bhaiḥ, bho puruṣa
# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes bu de la grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyis 'di skad du kye skyes bu ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig khyod ni gnyid kyis log pa yin gyi /
supto hi tvam / na tvamito gṛhyat kutaścinnirgataḥ iti / evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti
# khyod khyim 'di nas gar yang song ba med do zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du / / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang phyin ci log bzhis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos bstan te /
nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ / vitathā ime sarvadharmāḥ / asanta ime sarvadharmāḥ / viṭhapitā ime sarvadharmāḥ / māyopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ / svapnopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ / nirmitopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ / udakacandropamā ime sarvadharmāḥ / iti vistaraḥ / te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti / vigatamohān sarvadharmān paśyanti asvabhāvānanāvaraṇān / te ākāśasthitena cetasā kālaṃ kurvanti
# 'di la bud med kyang med / / skyes pa yang med / / sems can yang med / / sreg kyang med / / gso ba yang med / / gang zag kyang med de / / chos 'di dag thams cad na lag pa / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni yod pa ma yin pa / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni phyin ci log gis bsgrubs pa / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni sbrul pa lta bu / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni chu zla lta bu ste zhes rgyas par 'byung ba dang de bzhin du de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar khums so / / chos thams cad zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral ba dang ngo bo nyid med pa dang sgrib pa med par khums so / / de dag sems nam mkha' la gnas pas 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti / evamahaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi / iti
# 'chi ba'i dus bgyis ma thag tu phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste / / bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sems can dmyal ba khums lags so zhes gsungs so /
uktaṃ ca āryopāliparipṛcchāyām / bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike
# 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang / / sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te / / sems can stong phrag du ma skyo byas kyang /
na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam / na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ / kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ
# gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i / / 'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin / / gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i / / gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te / / rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na / / lus la 'bab mthong de na mtshon cha med /
citramanorama sajjitapuṣpāḥ svarṇavimāna jalanti manojñāḥ
# sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha bye zhing / / gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba /
teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena
# 'di na de la 'ang byed pa 'ga' med do / / de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis gzhag pa yin /
kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ
# rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam brtags te / / 'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye /
so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ / tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam
# 'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang 'byung min te / / yongs su rtog pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin / / zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir de ltar na dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin can phyin ci log gis bzhag pa rnams ni 'khor ba na byis pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gnas so /
yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam
# dngos po brdzun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa de ltar ni rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
atrāha / yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ, tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang rgyu med pa las dngos po rnams skye ba yod pa ma yin na / / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes gsungs / / bshad par bya ste /
saṃvṛtireva na tattvam / kiṃ saṃvṛtervyavasthānaṃ vaktavyam? idaṃpratyayatāmātreṇa saṃvṛteḥ siddhirabhyupagamyate
# 'di ni kun rdzob pa yin gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no / / ci kun rdzob kyi rnam par gzhag pa brjod par bya ba yin nam zhe na / / rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyis kun rdzob grub par khas len gyi / / phyogs bzhi khas blangs pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin te /
na tu pakṣacatuṣṭayābhyupagamena sasvabhāvavādaprasaṅgāt, tasya cāyuktatvāt / idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ
# dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang de yang rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam zhig khas blangs na ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir / / ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa yod pa ma yin pas dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra bar 'gyur ba ma yin no /
ata evoktam / svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam / tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam / ihāpi vakṣyati
# de nyid kyi phyir / / sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang / / gzhan gyis byas dang gnyi gas byas / / rgyu med rtog ge ba yis 'dod / / khyod kyis brtan nas 'byung bar gsungs / / zhes gsungs so / / 'di nyid las kyang /
pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam
# byed po las la brten byas shing / / las kyang byed po de nyid la /
karma pravartate nānyatpaśyāmaḥ siddhikāraṇam
# brten nas 'byung ba ma gtogs pa / / grub pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo /
iti / bhagavatāpyetāvanmātramevoktam / tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate, yaduta avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamityādi / atra kecitparicodayanti / anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ? tatra yadi pramāṇaja iṣyate, tadedaṃ vaktavyam
# zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la chos kyi brda ni 'di yin te / / 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la / / 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste / / gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams / / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di tsam zhig kho na gsungs so / / 'dir 'ga' zhig dag rgol bar byed de / / dngos po rnams skye ba med do snyam pa'i nges pa 'di tshad ma las skyes pa zhig gam / / 'on te tshad ma ma yin pa las skyes pa zhig yin grang / / de la gal te tshad ma las skyes par 'dod na ni / / tshad ma dag ni du zhig / / mtshan nyid ni gang / / yul dag ni ci zhig /
kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi, kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti
# ci bdag las skyes pa zhig gam / / gzhan nam gnyi ga'am rgyu med pa las yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o / / 'on te tshad ma ma yin pa las skyes pa yin na ni /
athāpramāṇajaḥ, sa na yuktaḥ, pramāṇādhīnatvātprameyādhigamasya / anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti / yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati, tata eva mamāpi sarvabhāvāḥ santīti / yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ / anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti, tathaiva mamāpi sarvabhāvotpattirbhaviṣyati
# de ni mi rigs te / / gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma la rag las pa'i phyir te / / rtogs par ma gyur pa'i don ni tshad ma med par rtogs par mi nus so / / tshad ma med pas don rtogs pa yang med na ni khyod kyi yang dag pa'i nges pa 'di ga las 'gyur te / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no / / yang na khyed kyi dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di gang las gyur pa 'di nyid las nga'i dngos po thams cad yod pa yin no zhes bya ba yang yin la / / yang ji ltar khyod kyi dngos po thams cad skye ba med do zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'dir 'gyur ba de kho na ltar nga'i dngos po thams cad skye bar yang 'gyur ro /
atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti, tadā svayamaniścitasya parapratyāyanāsaṃbhavācchāstrārambhavaiyarthyameveti santyapratiṣiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā iti / ucyate / yadi kaścinniścayo nāmāsmākaṃ syāt, sa pramāṇajo vā syādapramāṇajo vā
# ci ste khyod la dngos po thams cad skye ba med do snyam pa'i nges pa 'di med na ni / / de'i tshe rang nyid kyis kyang ma nges pas gzhan khong du chud par byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir bstan bcos rtsom pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur te / / des na dngos po thams cad bkag pa med par yod pa yin no zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te kho bo cag la nges pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur na ni / / de tshad ma las skyes pa'am / / tshad ma ma yin pa las skyes pa zhig tu 'gyur na /
na tvasti / kiṃ kāraṇam? ihāniścayasaṃbhave sati syāttatpratipakṣastadapekṣo niścayaḥ
# yod pa ni ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'dir ma nges pa yod na ni de la ltos shing de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i nges pa yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tvaniścaya eva tāvadasmākaṃ nāsti, tadā kutastadviruddhāviruddho niścayaḥ syāt saṃbandhyantaranirapekṣatvāt, kharaviṣāṇasya hrasvadīrghatāvat / yadā caivaṃ niścayasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kasya prasiddhayarthaṃ pramāṇāni parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ? kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati / svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ / yadyevaṃ niścayo nāsti sarvataḥ, kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām
# gang gi tshe re zhig kho bo cag la ma nges pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni de dang 'gal ba'i nges pa yod par gal 'gyur te / / 'brel ba can gzhan la ma ltos pa'i phyir / / bong bu'i rva'i ring po dang thung ba nyid bzhin no / / gang gi tshe de ltar nges pa med pa de'i tshe ci zhig 'grub par bya ba'i phyir tshad ma dag yongs su rtog par byed / / de dag gi grangs dang mtshan nyid dang yul dang bdag gam gzhan nam gnyi ga'am rgyu med pa las skye zhes bya bar yang ga la 'gyur te / / 'di dag thams cad ni kho bo cag gis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa zhig go / / gal te de ltar khyod la nges pa yod pa ma yin na / / khyed cag gi dngos po rnams ni / / bdag las ma yin gzhan las min /
na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate / niścitamidaṃ vākyaṃ lokasya svaprasiddhayaivopapattyā, nāryāṇām
# gnyis las ma yin rgyu med min / / zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngag 'di ji ltar dmigs zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / nges par gyur pa'i ngag 'di ni rang la grub pa'i 'thad pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten la yod kyi / / 'phags pa rnams la ni ma yin no /
kiṃ khalu āryāṇāmupapattirnāsti? kenaitaduktamasti vā nāsti veti / paramārtho hyāryāṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ / tataḥ kutastatra prapañcasaṃbhavo yadupapattiranupapattirvā syāt? / yadi hyāryā upapattiṃ na varṇayanti, kena khalvidānīṃ paramārthaṃ lokaṃ bodhayiṣyanti? na khalvāryā lokasaṃvyavahāreṇopapattiṃ varṇayanti, kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ, tāṃ parāvabodhārthamabhyupetya tayaiva lokaṃ bodhayanti / yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante, śubhākāraṃ cābhūtamadhyāropya parikliśyante, teṣāṃ vairāgyārthaṃ tathāgatanirmito  devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet / santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā / te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ
# ci 'phags pa rnams la rigs pa mi mnga' 'am zhe na / / yod pa'am med pa 'di sus smras / / 'phags pa rnams kyi don dam pa ni cang mi gsung ba yin te / / de'i phyir gang la 'thad pa dang 'thad pa ma yin pa mi mnga' bar 'gyur ba de dag la spros pa mnga' bar ga la 'gyur / / gal te 'phags pa rnams 'thad pa gsung bar mi mdzad na / / da ni ci zhig gis 'jig rten pas don dam pa khong du chud par mdzad ce na / / 'phags pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'thad pa mi gsung gi / / 'on kyang 'jig rten kho na la rab tu grags pa'i 'thad pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhal gyis bzhes nas de nyid kyis 'jig rten khong du chud par mdzad do / / ji ltar lus la mi gtsang ba nyid yod du zin kyang phyin ci log gi rjes su song ba'i 'dod chags can rnams kyis dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing / / yang dag pa ma yin yang gtsang ba'i rnam par sgro btags nas yongs su nyon mongs par 'gyur ro / / de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'am lhas / / lus 'di la skra zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis bkab pa'i lus kyi skyon rnams nye bar ston par byed do /
evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ / tānidānīmāryāḥ tatprasiddhayaivopapattyā paribodhayanti / yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam, evamutpādātpūrvaṃ vidyamānasya vidyamānatvānnāstyutpāda ityavasīyatām
# de dag kyang gtsang ba'i 'du shes de dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di na so so'i skye bo dag kyang ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin phyin ci log / / 'phags pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du ma dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can dang 'ga' zhig tu khyad par 'ga' zhig lhag par sgro btags nas chos shin tu nyon mongs par 'gyur te / / de dag da ltar 'phags pa rnams kyis bum pa yod pa 'jim pa la sogs pa dag las skye ba ma yin no zhes khas blangs pa de bzhin du skyes pa'i snga rol nas yod pa la yang skye ba yod pa ma yin te / / yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar nges par gyis shig /
yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam, evaṃ vivakṣitebhyo 'pi bījādibhyo nāstītyavasīyatām
# yang ji ltar me dang sol ba la sogs pa gzhan du gyur pa dag las myu gu skye ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar khas blangs pa de bzhin du sa bon la sogs pa brjod par 'dod pa dag las kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par gyis shig /
athāpi syāt / anubhava eṣo 'smākamiti, etadapyuktam / yasmādanubhava eṣa mṛṣā, anubhavatvāt, taimirikadvicandrādyanubhavavaditi
# ci ste yang 'di ni kho bo cag gis nyams su myong ba yin no snyam na 'di yang mi rigs te / / 'di ltar nyams su myong ba ni brdzun pa'i don can yin te / / nyams su myong ba yin pa'i phyir rab rib can gyis zla ba gnyis nyams su myong ba bzhin no /
tataścānubhavasyāpi sādhyasamatvāttena pratyavasthānaṃ na yuktamiti / tasmādanutpannā bhāvā ityevaṃ tāvadviparītasvarūpādhyāropapratipakṣeṇa prathamaprakaraṇārambhaḥ / idānīṃ kvacidyaḥ kaścidviśeṣo 'dhyāropitaḥ, tadviśeṣāpākaraṇārthaṃ śeṣaprakaraṇārambhaḥ, gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham / atha syāt / eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti, tadanuvarṇanasya tarhi phalaṃ vācyam / kutārkikaiḥ sa nāśito viparītalakṣaṇābhidhānena, tasyāsmābhiḥ samyaglakṣaṇamuktamiti cet, etadapyayuktam / yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt, tadarthaṃ prayatnasāphalyaṃ syāt / na caitadevam / iti vyartha evārya prayatna iti / api ca / yadi pramāṇādhīnaḥ prameyādhigamaḥ, tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ / tadaparihārāt samyaglakṣaṇadyotakatvamapi nāsti / kiṃ ca / yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam, kiṃ tallakṣyamasti atha nāsti? yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? atha nāsti lakṣyam, tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? vakṣyati hi / lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate / lakṣyasyānupapattau ca lakṣaṇasyāpyasaṃbhavaḥ / iti / atha syāt / na lakṣyate 'neneti lakṣaṇam, kiṃ tarhi 'kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam'; iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam / evamapi tenaitasya lakṣyamāṇatvāsaṃbhavādyenaitallakṣyate, tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ / atha syāt / jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti, ucyate / iha bhāvānāmanyāsādhāraṇamātmīyaṃ yatsvarūpaṃ tatsvalakṣaṇam, tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ
# de'i phyir nyams su myong ba yang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir des phyir bzlog par rigs pa ma yin no zhes de dag la grags pa nyid kyis khong du chud par mdzad pa yin no / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba med pa yin no / / de ltar re zhig de'i rang bzhin phyin ci log lhag par sgro btags pa'i gnyen por rab tu byed pa dang po brtsams pa yin no / / de nas khyad par 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu sgro btags pa'i khyad par de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu byed pa lhag ma brtsams pa yin te / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'gro ba po dang bgrod par bya ba dang 'gro bar bya ba la sogs pa khyad par ro cog ma lus pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i don du'o / / ci ste tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad 'jig rten pa 'di nyid kho bo cag gi bstan bcos su brjod pa yin no snyam na / / 'o na ni de brjod pa'i dgos pa bsnyad par bya dgos so / / gal te rtog ge pa dag gis mtshan nyid phyin ci log brjod pas / / de brlag par byas pas kho bo cag gis de'i mtshan nyid yang dag par brjod pa yin no zhe na / / 'di yang mi rigs te / / gal te 'jig rten la rtog ge ngan pas mtshan nyid phyin ci log brjod pas byas pa'i mtshon bya phyin ci log yod par 'gyur na ni de'i don du 'bad pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhig na / / de ni de ltar yang ma yin pas 'bad pa 'di don med pa nyid do / / gzhan yang gal te gzhal bya rtogs pa tshad ma la rag las pa yin na tshad ma de dag gang gis yongs su gcod par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa rtsod pa bzlog pa las bshad pa'i skyon de ma spangs pas yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang gal te rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kyi dbang gis mtshan ma gnyis smra na ni / / ci mtshan nyid de gnyis gang la yod pa'i mtshan gzhi de yod dam 'on te med / / gal te yod na ni de'i tshe de dag las gzhal bya yod pas ji ltar tshad ma gnyis yin / / 'on te mtshan gzhi med na ni de'i tshe rten med pas mtshan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin pas ji ltar tshad ma gnyis su 'gyur te / / mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin na / / mtshan gzhi 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / mtshan gzhi 'thad pa ma yin na / / mtshan nyid kyang ni yod ma yin / / zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro / / ci ste yang 'dis mtshon par byed pas ni mtshan nyid ma yin gyi / / 'o na ci zhe na / / byed pa dang lugs ni phal che'o zhes bya bas las la lyu ta byas nas 'di mtshon par bya bas na mtshan nyid yin no snyam na / / de lta na yang de nyid kyis mtshon par bya ba nyid du mi srid pa'i phyir / / gang gis de mtshon par byed pa'i byed pa de dang las tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro / / ci ste shes pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir la / / de yang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi khongs su 'du ba'i phyir nyes pa 'di med do snyam na / / bshad par bya ste / / re zhig 'dir ji ltar des de mtshon par byed pas sa'i sra ba dang tshor ba'i myong ba dang rnam par shes pa'i yul so sor rnam par rig pa ltar bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin na /

# 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la de ltar rnam par dpyod pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten pa'i dngos po rnams ni ma brtags par yod pa'i phyir ro /
yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati, api ca lokasaṃvṛtyā skandhānupādāya asyāstitvam, evaṃ rāhuśilāputrakayorapīti nāsti nidarśanasiddhiḥ
# ji ltar rnam par dpyad na gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par bdag med mdo [*mod] kyi / / 'on kyang phung po la brten nas 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu 'di yod pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du / / sgra gcan dang mchi gu gnyis kyang yin pas dpe grub pa med do /
evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti, lakṣyavyatirekeṇa ca lakṣaṇaṃ nirāśrayam, tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ / avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam / anyathā hi saṃvṛtirupapattyā na viyujyeta, tadeva tattvameva syānna saṃvṛtiḥ / na ca upapattyā vicāryamāṇānāṃ śilāputrakādīmevāsaṃbhavaḥ, kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt / na caitadevamityasadetat / atha syāt / kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? naiva hi vayaṃ sarvapramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ satyamityācakṣmahe, kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti / ucyate / vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ / kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā laukikavyavahāre 'vatārika(ta?)yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ, yāvanna tattvādhigama iti / bhavāṃstu etāṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyavibhāgadurvidagdhabuddhitayā kvacidupapattimavatārya anyāyato nāśayati
# de bzhin du rnam par dpyad na sa la sogs pa dag la yang sra ba la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i mtshan gzhi med la / / mtshan gzhi las tha dad par rten med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang med mod kyi / / de lta na yang 'di ni kun rdzob tu yod de / / de bas na slob dpon rnams kyis phan tshun ltos pa tsam gyis grub pa'i sgo nas grub par rnam par gzhag pa mdzad do / / 'di ni de kho na ltar gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste / / de lta ma yin na kun rdzob 'thad pa dang ldan pa ma yin nam / / des na 'di de kho na nyid du 'gyur gyi kun rdzob tu mi 'gyur ro / / 'thad pas rnam par dpyad pa na mchi gu la sogs pa dag kho na mi srid pa ni ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'thad pas gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams kyang yod pa ma yin pas / / de dag kyang mchi gu la sogs pa bzhin du kun rdzob tu yod pa yin pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur na / / de ltar yang ma yin pas / / 'di ni yod pa ma yin no / / brten nas brtags par rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang dbu ma la 'jug pa las rgyas par bstan pas de nyid las yongs su btsal bar bya'o / / ci ste zhib mor dpyad pa 'dis ci zhig bya ste / / kho bo cag tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad thams cad bden pa yin no zhes ni mi smra'i / / 'on kyang 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa'i tshul 'dis rnam par 'jog par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na / / bshad par bya ste / / dpyad pa zhib mo 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la bcug pa 'dis ci dgos zhes kho bo cag kyang de skad du smra ste / / kun rdzob phyin ci log tsam gyis bdag gi ngo bo yod par rnyed pa / / thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi thar pa 'dren par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sog pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'di ni ji srid de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa de srid du gnas par 'gyur mod / / khyod ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mi mkhas pas la lar 'thad pa bcug nas rigs pa ma yin pa las de 'jig par byed pa yin no / / kho bo ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par 'jog pa la mkhas pa'i phyir /
so 'haṃ saṃvṛtisatyavyavasthāvaicakṣaṇyāllaukika eva pakṣe sthitvā saṃvṛtyekadeśanirākaraṇopakṣiptopapattyantaramupapattyantareṇa vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim
# 'jig rten pa'i phyogs nyid la gnas te kun rdzob kyi phyogs gcig bsal ba'i phyir bkod pa'i 'thad pa gzhan 'thad pa gzhan gyis zlog par byed cing 'jig rten gyi rgan rabs ltar / / 'jig rten gyi chos lugs las nyams pa khyod kho na zlog par byed pa yin gyi kun rdzob ni ma yin no /
tasmād yadi laukiko vyavahāraḥ, tadā avaśyaṃ lakṣaṇavallakṣyeṇāpi bhavitavyam
# de'i phyir gal te 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad du yin na ni / / de'i tshe mtshan nyid bzhin du mtshan gzhir yang gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar bya dgos te /
tataśca sa eva doṣaḥ
# de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha paramārthaḥ, tadā lakṣyābhāvāllakṣaṇadvayamapi nāstīti kutaḥ pramāṇadvayam?
# 'on te don dam par yin na ni de'i tshe mtshan gzhi med pas mtshan nyid gnyis kyang med pas tshad ma gnyis su ga la 'gyur /
atha śabdānāmevaṃ kriyākārakasaṃbandhapūrvikā vyutpattirnāṅgīkriyate, tadidamatikaṣṭam
# ci ste sgra rnams la bya ba dang byed pa po'i 'brel bar sngon du 'gro ba can gyi bye brag tu bshad pa de lta bu khas len par mi byed do zhe na / / 'di ni shin tu dka' ste /
taireva kriyākārakasaṃbandhapravṛttaiḥ śabdairbhavān vyavaharati, śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ / yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam / kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat
# khyod bya ba dang byed pa po'i 'brel bas rab tu zhugs pa'i sgra de dag kho nas tha snyad byed cing / / bya ba dang byed pa po la sogs pa'i sgra'i don yang mi 'dod pas / / ae ma kyi hud khyod ni 'dod pa tsam la rag las te 'jug pa nyid do / / gang gi tshe de ltar gzhal bya gnyis gnas pa med pa de'i tshe lung la sogs pa rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa nyid kyi sgo nas tshad ma gzhan nyid ma yin pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang bum pa mngon sum mo zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad ma bsdus pa'i phyir dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid du 'gyur te /
atha syāt / ghaṭopādānanīlādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ pratyakṣapramāṇaparicchedyatvāt / tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate, evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate / naivaṃviṣaye upacāro yuktaḥ / utpādo hi loke sukhavyatirekeṇopalabdhaḥ, sa ca saṃskṛtalakṣaṇasvabhāvatvādanekaduṣkaraśatahetutvādasukha eva, sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ
# des na 'di ni mi rigs so / / ci ste bum pa'i nye bar len pa sngon po la sogs pa dag ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas yongs su gcad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mngon sum yin te / / de'i phyir ji ltar rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa byas te / / sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde / / zhes bsnyad pa de bzhin du / / sngon po la sogs pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu can gyi bum pa yang 'bras bu la rgyus btags pa byas nas mngon sum zhes bya bar brjod do snyam na / / rnam pa de lta bu'i yul la ni btags pa mi rigs te / / 'byung ba ni 'jig rten na bde ba las tha dad par dmigs la / / de yang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang dka' ba brgya phrag du ma'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir bde ba ma yin pa nyid do / / de la bde ba zhes brjod pa na 'brel pa med pa nyid yin pas rnam pa de lta bu'i yul la nye bar btags pa rigs na /
ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu / na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt / nīlādivyatiriktasya ghaṭasyābhāvādaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvamiti cet, evamapi sutarāmupacāro na yuktaḥ, upacaryamāṇasyāśrayasyābhāvāt / na hi kharaviṣāṇe taikṣṇyamupacaryate
# bum pa mngon sum zhes bya ba 'dir ni gang zhig brtags nas mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ba bum pa zhes bya ba mngon sum ma yin pa logs shig tu dmigs pa yang ma yin no / / gal te sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i bum pa med pa'i phyir btags pa'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / / de lta na yang ches shin tu btags par mi rigs te / / gzhi gdags bya med pa'i phyir ro / / bong bu'i rva la rnon po nye bar 'dogs pa ni rigs pa ma yin no /
api ca / lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate, nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām / yathoktam / rūpādivyatirekeṇa yathā kumbho na vidyate
# gzhan yang gal te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i bum pa sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad par gyur pa med pa'i phyir / / de nye bar btags pa pa'i mngon sum nyid du rtogs na ni de lta na ni sngon po la sogs pa yang sa la sogs pa las tha dad pa med pas sngon po la sogs pa yang btags pa pa'i mngon sum nyid du rtogs shig / / ji skad du / / ji ltar gzugs sogs ma gtogs par / / bum pa yod pa ma yin pa /
vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate
# de bzhin rlung la sogs pa ni / / ma gtogs gzugs kyang yod ma yin /
iti / tasmādevamādikasya lokavyavahārasya lakṣaṇenāsaṃgrahādavyāpitaiva lakṣaṇasyeti
# zhes bshad do / / de'i phyir de lta bu la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ni mtshan nyid kyis ma bsdus pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid do /
tattvavidapekṣayā hi / pratyakṣatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nīlādīnāṃ ca neṣyate
# de kho na nyid gzigs pa la ltos nas ni bum pa la sogs pa dang sngon po la sogs pa rnams mngon sum nyid du mi 'dod do /
lokasaṃvṛtyā tvabhyupagantavyameva pratyakṣatvaṃ ghaṭādīnām
# 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu ni bum pa la sogs pa rnams mngon sum nyid du khas blang bar bya ba kho na'o /
yathoktaṃ śatake
# ji skad du bzhi brgya pa las /
sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate
# gzugs mthong tshe na bum pa ni / / thams cad kho na mthong mi 'gyur /
brūyātkastattvavinnāma ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityapi
# bum pa mngon sum zhes bya 'ang / / de nyid rig pa su zhig smra /
etenaiva vicāreṇa sugandhi madhuraṃ mṛdu
# rnam par dpyad pa 'di nyid kyis / / blo mchog ldan pas dri zhim dang /
pratiṣedhayitavyāni sarvāṇyuttamabuddhinā / iti / api ca / aparokṣārthavācitvātpratyakṣaśabdasya sākṣādabhimukho 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati
# mngar dang 'jam pa thams cad dag / / so sor dgag par bya ba yin / / zhes bshad do / / gzhan yang mngon sum gyi sgra ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i don gyi rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir / / dbang po mngon du phyogs pa'i don ni mngon sum yin no / / 'di la dbang po mngon du phyogs pas zhes bya ba nas bum pa dang sngon po la sogs pa lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams mngon sum nyid du grub par 'gyur la /
tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate
# de yongs su gcod par byed pa'i shes pa ni rtsva dang sog ma'i me bzhin du mngon sum gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum nyid du rjod par byed do /
yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati, tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ
# gang zhig dbang po dang dbang po so so la 'jug pas zhes bya bas mngon sum gyi sgra bye brag tu 'chad par byed pa / / de ltar na ni shes pa ni dbang po'i yul can ma yin pa'i phyir dang yul gyi yul can yin pa'i phyir bye brag tu bshad pa mi rigs par 'gyur te /
prativiṣayaṃ tu syāt pratyarthamiti vā / atha syāt / yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti, evaṃ yadyapi arthamartha prati vartate, tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati / dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti
# yul so so ba 'am don so so ba nyid ces bya bar ni mi 'gyur ro / / ci ste ji ltar rnam par shes pa 'byung ba gnyi ga la rag las pa yin yang rnam par shes pa rnams rten gsal ba dang zhan pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir dang de dag gyur na 'gyur ba'i phyir / / mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes rten nyid kyis ston par 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / don dang don so so la 'jug mod kyi de lta na yang dbang po dang dbang po la brten nas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rten gyis bstan pas mngon sum nyid du 'gyur te / / rnga'i sgra nas kyi myu gu zhes thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyus ston pa ni mthong ba yin no snyam na /
naitatpūrveṇa tulyam / tatra hi viṣayeṇa  vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt, manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ sahaikaviṣayapravṛttatvāt
# 'di ni snga ma dang mi 'dra ba yin te / / der ni gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pas yul gyi rnam par shes pa bstan na / / rnam par shes pa drug gi rnam par dbye ba ma bstan par 'gyur te / / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig yul gcig la 'dug pa'i phyir ro /
tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti
# 'di ltar sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug la rnam par shes pa zhes brjod na ni / / ci rnam par shes pa 'di dbang po gzugs can las skyes pa zhig gam /
āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati
# 'on te yid las byung ba zhig ces shes pa re ba dang bcas pa yid du 'gyur la / / rten gyis bstan na ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul la 'jug pa yin yang phan tshun dbye ba grub par 'gyur ro /
iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate
# 'dir ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid brjod par 'dod pas rtog pa dang bral ba tsam zhig mngon sum nyid du khas blangs pas rnam par rtog pa las 'di khyad par du mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir / / thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyus bstan pa la dgos pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo /
prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā viṣayeṇaiva vyapadeśo nyāyyaḥ / loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate
# tshad ma'i grangs su 'jug pa gzhal bya'i gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir dang gzhal bya'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo yod par rnyed pa'i tshad ma dag gi rang gi ngo bo rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir dbang pos bstan pa cung zad kyang mi ma kho bas rnam pa thams cad du yul kho nas bstan par rigs so / / gal te 'jig rten na brjod par 'dod pa'i don la mngon sum gyi sgra rab tu grags pa'i phyir dang don so so zhes bya ba'i sgra ma grags pa'i phyir rten kho nas bye brag tu bshad pa la rten par byed do zhe na / / bshad par bya ste /
astyayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdo loke prasiddhaḥ
# mngon sum gyi sgra 'di 'jig rten la grags pa ni yod mod kyi /
sa tu yathā loke, tathā asmābhirucyata eva / yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt, tataśca pratyakṣamityevaṃ na syāt / ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt, ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt / kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva ca jñānasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagamāt, tena ca lokasya saṃvyavahārābhāvāt, laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate / cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt, pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat / tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā, sarvameva sākṣādupalabhyamānatvādaparokṣam, ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha / dvicandrādīnāṃ tu ataimirikajñānāpekṣayā apratyakṣatvam, taimirikādyapekṣayā tu pratyakṣatvameva
# de ji ltar 'jig rten na yin pa de ltar ni kho bo cag gis smras pa nyid do / / 'jig rten pa'i don ji ltar gnas pa spangs nas de bye brag tu 'chad par byed na ni / / rab tu grags pa'i sgra yang spong bar 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir mngon sum zhes bya ba de ltar mi 'gyur ro / / zlos pa'i don med pa'i phyir dbang po'i skad cig gcig gi rten can mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig mngon sum nyid du yang mi 'gyur la / / re re la mngon sum nyid med na ni mang po rnams la yang mi 'gyur ro / / rtog pa dang bral ba'i shes pa nyid mngon sum nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dang des kyang 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad byed pa med pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten pa'i tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad bshad par 'dod pa'i phyir na mngon sum tshad mar rtog pa ni don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pas sngon po shes kyi sngon po'o snyam du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i lung yang mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i don can gyi skabs ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa lnga po rnams blun pa nyid du ston par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir / / lung las kyang rtog pa dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na mngon sum nyid ma yin pas 'di ni mi rigs so / / de'i phyir gal te mtshan gzhi 'am rang gi mtshan nyid dam spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste / / 'jig rten na yod na ni thams cad mngon sum du dmigs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na lkog tu ma gyur pa yin te / / de'i phyir de'i yul can gyi rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu mngon sum nyid du rnam par gzhag go / / zla ba gnyis la sogs pa dag ni rab rib can ma yin pa'i shes pa la ltos nas mngon sum nyid ma yin la / / rab rib can la sogs pa la ltos nas ni mngon sum nyid kho na'o /
parokṣaviṣayaṃ tu jñānaṃ sādhyāvyabhicāriliṅgotpannamanumānam
# lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can rtags bsgrub par bya ba la mi 'khrul ba las skyes pa'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o /
sākṣādatīndriyārthavidāmāptānāṃ yadvacanaṃ sa āgamaḥ
# dbang po las 'das pa'i don mngon sum du rig cing yid ches par gyur pa dag gi tshig gang yin pa de ni lung ngo /
sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā
# 'dra pa las nyams su myong ba'i don rtogs pa ni nye bar 'jal ba ste / / dper na ba man ni ba lang dang 'dra'o snyam pa lta bu'o /
tadevaṃ pramāṇacatuṣṭayāllokasyārthādhigamo vyavasthāpyate
# de'i phyir de ltar tshad ma bzhi las 'jig rten gyi don rtogs par rnam par 'jog pa yin no /
tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti
# de dag kyang phan tshun ltos pas 'grub par 'gyur te /
satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ, satsu prameyeṣvartheṣu pramāṇāni / no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti / tasmāllaukikamevāstu yathādṛṣṭamityalaṃ prasaṅgena / prastutameva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā / atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ / yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti, tadyuktam, svata utpattivaiyarthyāt / yaccoktaṃ na dvābhyāmiti, tadapi yuktam, ekāṃśavaikalyāt / ahetupakṣastu  ekāntanikṛṣṭa iti tatpratiṣedho 'pi yuktaḥ / yattu khalvidamucyate nāpi parata iti, tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ / catvāraḥ pratyayā hetuścālambanamanantaram / tathaivādhipateyaṃ ca pratyayo nāsti pañcamaḥ
# tshad ma dag yod na gzhal bya'i don dag tu 'gyur la / / gzhal bya'i don dag yod na tshad ma dag tu 'gyur gyi / / tshad ma dang gzhal bya gnyis ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten pa nyid yin la rag ste / / spros pas chog go / / dkyus ma nyid bshad par bya'o / / 'dir rang gi sde pa dag na re / / gang 'di 'di skad du dngos po rnams bdag las skye ba ma yin te / / zhes smras pa de ni rigs te / / rang las skye ba don med pa'i phyir ro / / gang yang gnyi ga la skye ba ma yin te zhes smras pa de yang rigs te / / yan lag gcig ma tshang ba'i phyir ro / / rgyu med pa'i phyogs ni shin tu tha chad yin pa'i phyir / / de dgag pa yang rigs na / / gang 'di skad du gzhan las skye ba yang ma yin te zhes smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te / / gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du gyur pa dag kho na dngos po rnams kyi skyed par byed par bstan pa'i phyir te / / rkyen rnam bzhi ste rgyu dang ni / / dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag / / bdag po yang ni de bzhin te / / rkyen lnga pa ni yod ma yin /
tatra nirvartako heturiti lakṣaṇāt, yo hi yasya nirvartako bījabhāvenāvasthitaḥ, sa tasya hetu pratyayaḥ
# de la sgrub par byed pa ni rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid las na gang zhig gang gi sgrub byed sa bon gyi ngo bor gnas pa de ni de'i rgyu'i rkyen no /
utpadyamāno dharmo yenālambanenotpadyate, sa tasyālambanapratyayaḥ
# dmigs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos can bskyed pa de ni de'i dmigs pa'i rkyen no /
kāraṇasyānantaro nirodhaḥ kāryasyotpattipratyayaḥ, tadyathā bījasyānantaro nirodho 'ṅkurasyotpādapratyayaḥ
# rgyu 'gags ma thag pa ni 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rkyen yin te / / dper na sa bon 'gags ma thag pa myu gu 'byung ba'i rkyen yin pa bzhin no /
yasmin sati yadbhavati tattasyādhipateyamiti / ta ete catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ / ye cānye purojātasahajātapaścājjātādayaḥ, te eteṣveva antarbhūtāḥ
# gang zhig yod pas gang 'byung ba de ni de'i bdag po'o / / 'di dag ni rkyen bzhi'o / / gzhan gang dag sngar skyes pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang phyis skye ba la sogs pa de dag ni 'di rnams kyi khongs su 'dus pa yin no /
īśvarādayastu pratyayā eva na saṃbhavantīti, ata evāvadhārayati / pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti
# dbang phyug la sogs pa dag ni rkyen ma yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir / / rkyen lnga pa ni yod ma yin / / zhes nges par gzung ba yin no /
tasmādebhyaḥ parabhūtebhyo bhāvānāmutpattirasti parata utpattiriti / atrocyate / naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti / yasmāt / na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate
# de'i phyir gzhan du gyur pa 'di dag las dngos po rnams skye ba'i phyir gzhan las skye ba yod pa yin no zhes 'dzer to / / de la bshad par bya ste / / dngos po rnams ni rkyen gzhan du gyur pa dag las skye ba ma yin pa nyid de / / 'di ltar / / dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni / / rkyen la sogs la yod ma yin /
avidyamāne svabhāve parabhāvo na vidyate / iti / yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt, syāttebhya utpādaḥ / na caivaṃ yadutpādātpūrvaṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt
# bdag gi dngos po yod min na / / gzhan dngos yod pa ma yin no / / gal te 'bras bur gyur ba'i dngos po rnams rgyu la sogs pa'i rkyen gzhan du gyur pa 'dus pa'am so so ba'am 'dus pa dang so so ba dag gam / / rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las gzhan 'ga' zhig la yang rung ste / / skyes pa'i snga rol du yod par gyur na ni / / de dag las skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang zhig skye ba'i snga rol du yod par 'gyur ba de ltar yang ma yin te /
yadi syāt, gṛhyeta ca, utpādavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt
# gal te yod par gyur na ni / / gzung du yod pa'am skye ba don med par 'gyur ro /
tasmānnaṃ cāsti bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu svabhāvaḥ
# de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rkyen la sogs pa dag la yod pa ma yin no /
avidyamāne ca svabhāve nāsti parabhāvaḥ / bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādaḥ, parebhya utpādaḥ parabhāvaḥ, sa na vidyate / tasmādayuktametat parabhūtebhyo bhāvānā mutpattiriti / athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt / tatkimapekṣaṃ paratvaṃ pratyayādīnām? vidyamānayoreva hi maitropagrāhakayoḥ parasparāpekṣaṃ paratvam? na caivaṃ bījāṅkurayoryaugapadyam
# bdag gi dngos po yod pa ma yin pa nyid yin na gzhan gyi dngos po yod pa ma yin no / / 'byung bas na dngos po ste skye ba'o / / gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan dag las skye ba ste de yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams gzhan du gyur pa dag las skye bo zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa ma yin no / / rnam pa gcig tu na rgyu med pa can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'i dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni / / sa bon la sogs pa rkyen rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin can dag yod pa na yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir rkyen la sogs pa rnams ci la ltos nas gzhan nyid du 'gyur te / / byams pa dang nyer sbas dag ni yod pa gnyis kho na phan tshun ltos pa'i gzhan nyid du 'gyur na / / sa bon dang myu gu gnyis ni de ltar cig car ba ma yin no / / de'i phyir 'bras bu rnams kyi bdag gi dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti
# sa bon la sogs pa rnams la gzhan gyi dngos po ste gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir gzhan du bsnyad du med pa kho na'i phyir gzhan las skye ba ma yin pas dngos po rnams gzhan las skye'i zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rung ngo /
tasmādāgamābhiprāyānabhijñataiva parasya / na hi tathāgatā yuktiviruddhaṃ vākyamudāharanti / āgamasya cābhiprāyaḥ prāgevopavarṇitaḥ / tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate
# de'i phyir gzhan gyi lung gi dgongs pa mngon par ma shes pa nyid de / / de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni rigs pa dang 'gal ba'i dag mi gsung la / / lung gi dgongs pa yang gong du nye bar bstan zin to / / de'i phyir de ltar rkyen dag las skye bar smra ba bkag pa yin dang bya ba las skye bar smra ba ni /
na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti
# mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i rkyen dag ni dngos su rnam par shes pa skyed par mi byed kyi /
vijñānajanikriyāniṣpādakatvāttu pratyayā ucyante
# rnam par shes pa skye ba'i bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya la /
sā ca kriyā vijñānaṃ janayati
# bya ba des kyang rnam par shes pa skyed par byed de /
tasmātpratyayavatī vijñānajanikriyā vijñānajanikā, na pratyayāḥ / yathā pacikriyā odanasyeti / ucyate / kriyā na pratyayavatī / yadi kriyā kācit syāt, sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet
# de'i phyir rnam par shes pa skye ba'i bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa ni rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa yin gyi rkyen dag ni ma yin te / / dper na / / 'bras chen gyi 'tshod pa'i bya ba bzhin no snyam du sems so / / bshad pa / / bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa med / / gal te bya ba 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni / / de mig la sogs pa'i rkyen dag gis rkyen dang ldan pas rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa zhig na / / yod pa ni ma yin no /
na  tvasti / kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate, ajāte vā jāyamāne vā? tatra jāte na yuktā
# ji ltar zhe na / / 'dir bya ba 'di 'dod pa na rnam par shes pa skyes zin pa la 'dod dam / / ma skyes pa la 'am skye bzhin pa la yin grang na / / de la skyes zin pa la mi rigs te /
kriyā hi bhāvaniṣpādikā / bhāvaścenniṣpannaḥ, kimasya kriyayā?
# bya ba ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin na / / dngos po grub par gyur na ni de la bya bas ci zhig dgos te /
jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam / ityādinā ca madhyamakāvatāre pratipāditametat / ajāte 'pi na yuktā, / kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā
# 'di ni skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye bar 'gyur ba rigs pa ma yin nyid / / ces bya ba la sogs pa dbu ma la 'jug pa las bstan pa yin no / / ma skyes pa la yang mi rigs te / / skye ba 'di ni byed pa med par rigs pa'i ngo bo 'ang min /
ityādivacanāt / jāyamāne 'pi bhāve kriyā na saṃbhavati, jātājātavyatirekeṇa jāyamānābhāvāt / yathoktam
# zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / dngos po skye bzhin pa la yang bya ba srid pa ma yin te / / skyes pa dang ma skyes pa las ma gtogs pa'i skye bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro / / ji skad du /
jāyamānārthajātatvājjāyamāno na jāyate
# skye bzhin pa ni phyed skyed phyir / / skye bzhin pa ni skye ba min /
atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate / iti / yataścaivaṃ triṣu kāleṣu janikriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, tasmānnāsti sā
# yang na thams cad skye bzhin pa / / nyid ni yin par thal bar 'gyur / / zhes gsungs so / / gang gi phyir / / de ltar dus gsum du skye ba'i bya ba mi srid pa de'i phyir de ni yod pa yang ma yin no /
ata evāha / kriyā na pratyayavatī iti / viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vinā viśeṣam / ityādinā pratipāditametanmadhyamakāvatāre / na hi vandhyāputro gomānityucyate / yadyevam, apratyayavatī tarhi bhaviṣyatīti, etadapyayuktamityāha / nāpratyayavatī kriyā
# de nyid kyi phyir / / bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa med / / ces gsungs te / / mo gsham gyi bu ba lang dang ldan no zhes ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no / / 'di ni khyad par med par khyad par can yod min / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbu ma la 'jug pa las bstan pa nyid do / / gal te de lta na / / 'o na rkyen dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhe na / / 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni / / rkyen dang mi ldan bya ba med /
yadā pratyayavatī nāsti, tadā kathamapratyayavatī nirhetukā syāt? na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate
# gang gi tshe bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa med pa de'i tshe ji ltar rkyen dang mi ldan pa rgyu med pa yod par 'gyur te / / snam bu snal ma'i rang bzhin du mi rigs pas / / 'jag ma'i rang bzhin du khas len pa ni ma yin no /
tasmātkriyā na bhāvajanikā
# de'i phyir bya ba dngos po'i skyed par byed pa ma yin no /
atrāha / yadyevaṃ kriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, pratyayāstarhi janakā bhaviṣyanti bhāvānāmiti
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar bya ba med na / / 'o na ni rkyen dag dngos po rnams kyi skyed par byed par 'gyur ro /
ucyate / pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ / yadā kriyā nāsti, tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ? atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate / kriyāvantaśca santyuta / neti prakṛtenābhisaṃbandhaḥ / utaśabdo 'vadhāraṇe / tatra kriyāyā abhāva uktaḥ, kathaṃ kriyāvattvaṃ pratyayānāmiti? yathā ca vijñānajanikriyoktā, evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam / atrāha / kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa? yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante, tasmāccakṣurādīnāṃ pratyayatvaṃ tebhyaścotpādo vijñānādīnāmiti
# bshad par bya ste / / bya ba mi ldan rkyen ma yin / / gang gi tshe bya ba med pa de'i tshe / / rkyen bya ba dang bral ba dang bya ba dang mi ldan pa rgyu med pa rnams ji ltar skyed par byed pa yin / / ji ste bya ba dang ldan pa dag kho na skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na / / bshad pa / / bya ba ldan yod 'on te na / / ma yin no zhes skabs dang sbyar ro / / 'on te na'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o / / de la bya ba med par bshad na / / rkyen rnams ji ltar bya ba dang ldan pa nyid yin na ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i bya ba la brjod pa de bzhin du 'tshod pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dag la yang brjod par rig par bya'o / / des na bya ba las kyang dngos po rnams skye ba med pas skye ba'i rjod par byed pa don gyis stong par 'gyur ro / / 'dir smras pa / / rkyen bya ba dang ldan no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dpyad pa 'dis kho bo cag la ci dgos / / gang gi phyir mig la sogs pa'i rkyen dag la brten nas dngos po rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur te / / de'i phyir mig la sogs pa rnams rkyen nyid yin zhing / / rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams kyang de dag las skye ba yin no /
etadapyayuktamityāha / utpadyate pratītyemānitīme pratyayāḥ kila
# 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / 'di dag la brten skye bas na / / de phyir 'di dag rkyen ces grag /
yāvannotpadyata ime tāvannāpratyayāḥ katham / yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante, nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ? apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya / atha matam / pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti, etadapyayuktam / yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate, tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati / tatrāpyeṣaiva cintaneti na yuktametat / kiṃ ca / iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran, asato vā? sarvathā ca na yujyate ityāha
# ji srid mi skye de srid du / / 'di dag rkyen min ji ltar min / / gal te mig la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye bas na 'di dag de'i rkyen zhes brjod na ni / / ji srid rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu de mi skye ba de srid du / / mig la sogs pa 'di dag rkyen ma yin pa ji ltar ma yin te / / rkyen ma yin pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o / / bye ma dag las til mar bzhin du rkyen ma yin pa dag las ni skye ba yang ma yin no / / ci ste sngar rkyen ma yin par gyur pa las rkyen gzhan ci zhig cig la ltos nas rkyen nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'dod na / / 'di yang mi rung ste / / gang zhig rkyen ma yin pa 'di'i rkyen nyid du rtog pa / / rkyen gzhan de'i rkyen nyid de yang rkyen yod na yin pas 'di la yang dpyad pa de nyid yin no / / de'i phyir de ni mi rigs so / / gzhan yang mig la sogs pa 'di dag rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du rtog pa na / / 'di yod pa'am med pa zhig la rtog grang na /
naivāsato naiva sataḥ pratyayo 'rthasya yujyate / kasmādityāha / asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim
# rnam pa thams cad du mi rigs so zhes bya bar bshad pa / / med dam yod pa'i don la yang / / rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / bshad pa / / med na gang gi rkyen du 'gyur / / yod na rkyen gyis ci zhig bya / / med pa ste /
asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt? bhaviṣyatā vyapadeśo bhaviṣyatīti cet, naivam
# yod pa ma yin pa'i don la ni rkyen du ji ltar 'gyur / / gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas ston par 'gyur ro zhe na / / de ltar ni ma yin te /
bhaviṣyatā cedvayapadeśa iṣṭaḥ / śaktiṃ vinā nāsti hi bhāvitāsya / ityādinoktadoṣatvāt / sato 'pi vidyamānasya labdhajanmano niṣphalaiva pratyayakalpanā
# gal te 'byung bar 'gyur bas bsnyad 'dod na / / nus pa med par 'di yi 'byung 'gyur ni / / yod min ces bya ba la sogs pas nyes pa brjod pa'i phyir ro / / yod na ste bdog pa skye ba thob zin pa la yang rkyen yongs su brtag pas 'bras bu med pa nyid do /
evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate / atrāha / yadyapyevaṃ pratyayānāmasaṃbhavaḥ, tathāpi astyeva lakṣaṇopadeśātpratyayaprasiddhiḥ
# de ltar rkyen 'dus pa rnams 'bras bu skyed par nus pa med pas rkyen nyid ma yin par bsnyad nas / / de'i 'og tu so so ba rnams rkyen nyid ma yin par bstan par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar rkyen rnams mi srid mod kyi / / de lta na yang mtshan nyid nye bar bstan pa las rkyen grub pa yod pa nyid do /
tatra nirvartako heturiti lakṣaṇamucyate hetupratyayasya / na cāvidyamānasya lakṣaṇopadeśo yukto bandhyāsutasyeveti / ucyate / syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / yasmāt / na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā / kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate / tatra nirvartaka utpādakaḥ
# de la sgrub par byed pa ni rgyu'o zhes rgyu'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid brjod de yod pa ma yin pa mo gsham gyi bu la ni mtshan nyid nye bar ston pa la mi brjod do / / gal te de'i mtshan nyid yod par gyur na ni / / rgyu'i rkyen du 'gyur ba zhig na / / yod pa ni ma yin te / / gang gi phyir / / gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang / / med dang yod med mi 'grub pa / / ji ltar sgrub byed rgyu zhes bya / / de lta yin na mi rigs so / / de la sgrub par byed pa ni skyed par byed pa ste /
yadi nirvartyo dharmo nirvarteta, tamutpādako heturutpādayet
# gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'grub na ni / / skyed par byed pa'i rgyus de bskyed par 'gyur na /
na tu nirvartate, sadasadubhayarūpasya nirvartyasyābhāvāt
# 'grub pa yang ma yin te / / yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga la ngo bo 'grub pa med pa'i phyir ro /
tatra sanna nirvartate vidyamānatvāt
# de la yod pa ni 'grub pa ma yin te yod pa'i phyir ro /
asannapi, avidyamānatvāt / sadasannapi, parasparaviruddhasyaikārthasyābhāvāt, ubhayapakṣābhihitadoṣatvācca
# med pa yang ma yin te yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin te / / phan tshun 'gal ba'i don gcig med pa'i phyir dang phyogs gnyi ga la brjod pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yata evaṃ kāryasyotpattirnāsti, hetupratyayo 'pyato nāsti / tataśca yaduktaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhavādvidyate hetupratyaya iti, tadevaṃ sati na yujyate / idānīmālambanapratyayaniṣedhārthamāha
# gang gi phyir de ltar 'bras bu skye ba med pa de'i phyir rgyu'i rkyen yang yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir rgyu'i rkyen yod pa yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa ste / / de lta yin na mi rigs so / / da ni dmigs pa'i rkyen dgag pa'i phyir / / yod pa'i chos 'di dmigs pa ni /
anālambana evāyaṃ san dharma upadiśyate / athānālambane dharme kuta ālambanaṃ punaḥ
# med pa kho na nye bar bstan / / ci ste chos ni dmigs med na / / dmigs pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / zhes gsungs so / / 'dir dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang dag ce na /
iha sālambanadharmāḥ katame? sarvacittacaittā ityāgamāt
# sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad do / / zhes bya ba'i lung las na /
cittacaittā yenālambanenotpadyante yathāyogaṃ rūpādinā, sa teṣāmālambanapratyayaḥ
# sems dang sems las byung ba rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i dmigs pa gang gis ci rigs par skyed par byed pa de ni de dag gi dmigs pa'i rkyen yin pa na / / yod pa dag la brtag gam /
ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā / tatra vidyamānānāṃ nārthastadālambanapratyayena / dharmasya hi utpattyarthamālambanaṃ parikalpyate, sa cālambanātpūrvaṃ vidyamāna eveti / athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena, ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā, na tvasya ālambanena kaścitsaṃbandho 'sti / athāvidyamānasyālambanaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam, anālambana evāyamityādi / avidyamānasya hi nāsti ālambanena yogaḥ
# med pa dag la yin grang / / de la yod pa dag la ni dmigs pa'i rkyen de don med de / / chos bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa yongs su rtog par byed na / / de ni dmigs pa'i snga rol du yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / ci ste de ltar chos rang gi bdag nyid dmigs pa med par rab tu grub na / / 'di ni dmigs pa dang ldan par brtags pas ci zhig bya / / de'i phyir yod pa bdog pa'i chos sems la sogs pa 'di dmigs pa med pa kho na khyed cag gis rang 'dod kyi dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes nye bar bstan pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi / / 'di la dmigs pa dang 'brel pa cung zhig yod pa ni ma yin no / / ci ste med pa la dmigs pa yongs su rtog par byed na / / de yang rigs pa ma yin te / / chos 'di dmigs pa med par ni / / yin pa kho nar nye bar bstan / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / 'di ltar yod pa ma yin pa la ni dmigs pa dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no /
anālambana evāyaṃ san dharma upadiśyate
# chos 'di dmigs pa med pa ni / / yin pa ste gyur pa kho nar khyod kyis nye bar bstan te /
bhavadbhiḥ sālambana iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / athānālambane dharme kuta ālambanaṃ punaḥ
# dmigs pa dang bcas par zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o / / ci ste chos ni dmigs med na / / dmigs pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / zhes bya ba la /
atha śabdaḥ praśne
# ci ste'i sgra ni dri ba'o /
kuta iti hetau / tenāyamarthaḥ / athaivamanālambane dharme 'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam? ālambanakābhāvādālambanasyāpyabhāva ityabhiprāyaḥ / kathaṃ tarhi sālambanāścittacaittāḥ? sāṃvṛtametallakṣaṇaṃ na pāramārthikamityadoṣaḥ / idānīṃ samanantarapratyayaniṣedhārthamāha
# ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so / / des na don ni / / ci ste de ltar chos yod pa ma yin zhing mi bdog pa ni dmigs pa med na / / yang dmigs pa yod par ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dir 'gyur te / / dmigs par byed pa med pa'i phyir dmigs pa yang med do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o / / ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dmigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur zhe na / / mtshan nyid 'di ni kun rdzob pa yin gyi / / don dam pa ni ma yin pas nyes pa med do / / da ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dgag pa'i phyir /
anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu nirodho nopapadyate
# chos rnams skyes pa ma yin na / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / de phyir de ma thag mi rigs /
nānantaramato yuktaṃ niruddhe pratyayaśca kaḥ / tatra paścime ślokasyārdhe pādavyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ, caśabdaśca bhinnakramo niruddhe ceti
# 'gags na rkyen yang gang zhig yin / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed phyi ma'i rkang pa go bsnor bar blta bar bya'o / / yang gi sgra ni 'gags na yang zhes rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro /
tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ / niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ? nānantaramato yuktam iti / ślokabandhārthaṃ tvevamuktam / tatra kāraṇasyānantaro nirodhaḥ kāryasyotpādapratyayaḥ samanantarapratyayalakṣaṇam
# des na 'di skad du / / 'gags na rkyen yang gang zhig yin / / de'i phyir de ma thag mi rigs / / zhes 'don par 'gyur te / / de skad du gsungs pa ni tshigs su bcad pa sdeb ba'i phyir yin no / / de la rgyu 'gag ma thag pa 'bras bu skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid yin te /
atra vicāryate
# 'di la dpyad par bya'o /
anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ
# myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos rnams skyes pa ma yin na / / rgyu sa bon la sogs pa'i 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / gang gi tshe 'di de lta yin pa de'i tshe rgyu 'gag pa med pa'i phyir /
yadaitadevam, tadā kāraṇasya nirodhābhāvādaṅkurasya kaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ? athānutpanne 'pi kārye bījanirodha iṣyate, evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ? ko vā bījanirodhasya pratyaya iti / ubhayametadahetukamityāha / niruddhe ca kaḥ pratyaya iti
# myu gu'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gang zhig yin par 'gyur / / ci ste 'bras bu ma skyes par yang sa bon 'gag par 'dod na ni / / de lta na sa bon 'gags na ste med par gyur na / / myu gu'i rkyen yang gang zhig yin la / / sa bon 'gag pa'i rkyen yang gang zhig yin te / / 'di gnyi ga rgyu med par 'gyur ro zhes 'chad pa ni / / 'gags na rkyen yang gang zhig yin / / zhes bya ba'o /
caśabdo 'nutpannaśabdāpekṣaḥ
# yang gi sgra ni skye ba med pa la ltos pa ste /
tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe 'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam
# des na myu gu ma skyes par sa bon 'gag par 'dod na yang gnyi ga rgyu med pa can du 'gyur te / / de'i phyir de ma thag mi rigs / / zhes bya'o /
atha vā / na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ, tamabhisaṃdhāyāha / anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu nirodho nopapadyate / nānantaramato yuktam iti / api ca / niruddhe pratyayaśca kaḥ
# yang na / / bdag las ma yin gzhan las min / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas skye ba bkag pa yin la / / skye ba bkag pa de la dgongs nas / / chos rnams skyes pa ma yin na / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / de phyir de ma thag mi rigs zhes gsungs so / / gzhan yang / / 'gags na rkyen yang gang zhig yin te /
ityatra pūrvakameva vyākhyānam / idānīmadhipatipratyayasvarūpaniṣedhārthamāha / bījādīnāṃ
# 'di la bshad pa ni snga ma nyid sbyar bar bya'o / / da ni bdag po'i rkyen bsal bar bzhed nas bshad pa / / sa bon la sogs pa /
bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ / satīdamasmin bhavatītyetannaivopapadyate / iha yasmin sati yadbhavati, tattasya ādhipateyamityadhipatipratyayalakṣaṇam
# dngos po rang bzhin med rnams kyi / / yod pa gang phyir yod min na / / 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung zhes / / bya ba 'di ni 'thad ma yin / / 'dir gang zhig yod pas gang 'byung ba de ni de'i bdag po yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag po'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid yin na / / dngos po rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir /
bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate, kutastad yadidamiti kāryatvena? tasmānnāsti lakṣaṇato 'pi pratyayasiddhiḥ / atrāha / tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti / ucyate paṭādiphalapravṛttireva svarūpato nāsti, kutaḥ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ setsyati? yathā ca paṭādiphalapravṛttirasatī, tathā pratipādayannāha / na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣvasti tatphalam
# rang bzhin med pa na gang zhig 'di zhes rgyu nyid du bsnyad pa de ga la yod cing / / gang yang 'di zhes 'bras bu nyid du ston pa de ga la yod / / de'i phyir mtshan nyid las kyang rkyen grub pa yod pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / snal ma la sogs pa dag las snam bu la sogs pa skye bar dmigs nas / / snal ma sogs pa dag snam bu la sogs pa'i rkyen yin no / / bshad par bya ste / / snam bu la sogs pa 'bras bu 'byung ba nyid yod pa ma yin na / / rkyen rnams kyi rkyen nyid lta 'grub par ga la 'gyur / / ji ltar snam bu la sogs pa 'bras bu 'byung ba med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / rkyen rnams so so 'dus pa las / / 'bras bu de ni med pa nyid /
