pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat / tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti, tatrānupalabhyamānatvāt kāraṇabahutvācca kāryabahutvaprasaṅgāt / samuditeṣvapi tantvādiṣu nāsti paṭaḥ, pratyekamavayaveṣvavidyamānatvāt, ekasya kāryasya khaṇḍaśa utpattiprasaṅgāt
# rkyen rnams la ni gang med pa / / de ni rkyen las ji ltar skye / / zhes gsungs so / / de la snal ma dang tshig pa dang thag zangs dang son shing la sogs pa so so ba dag la snam bu so sor yod pa ma yin te / / de dag la ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang rgyu mang pos 'bras bu mang por thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / snal ma la sogs pa 'dus pa dag la yang snam bu yod pa ma yin te / / yan lag re re ba dag la med pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu gcig dum bu skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
tasmātphalābhāvānna santi pratyayāḥ svabhāvata iti / athāsadapi tattebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate / ityabhiprāyaḥ syāt / apratyayebhyo 'pi kasmātphalaṃ nābhipravartate / apratyayeṣvapi nāsti phalamiti / apratyayebhyo 'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ / atrāha / yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ, tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu phalamasti nāstīti cintā syāt / nāsti tu vyatiriktaṃ phalam, kiṃ tarhi pratyayamayameveti? ucyate / phalaṃ ca pratyayamayaṃ pratyayāścāsvayaṃmayāḥ / phalamasvamayebhyo yattatpratyayamayaṃ katham
# de'i phyir 'bras bu med pas rkyen dag med do / / ci ste de ni med par yang / / rkyen de dag las skye 'gyur na / / zhes bya bar bsams par gyur na ni / / rkyen ma yin pa dag la yang / / 'bras bu yod pa ma yin pas / / rkyen ma yin pa 'jog ma dag las kyang snam bu ci'i phyir na skye bar mi 'gyur / / de'i phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba med do / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te 'bras bu gzhan zhig yin zhing rkyen yang gzhan yin par 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe ci rkyen dag la 'bras bu yod dam med ces bya bar bsams par gyur na / / 'bras bu tha dad pa ni med do / / 'o na ci zhe na / / rkyen gyi rang bzhin kho na yin no / / bshad par bya ste / / 'bras bu rkyen gyi rang bzhin ni / / rkyen rnams bdag gi rang bzhin min / / bdag dngos min las 'bras bu gang / / de ni de ltar rkyen rang bzhin /
yadi pratyayamayaṃ pratyayavikāraḥ phalamiti vyavasthāpyate, tadayuktam
# gal te 'bras bu rkyen gyi rang bzhin rkyen gyi rnam par 'gyur ba yin no zhes rnam par 'jog na ni / / de mi rigs te /
yasmātte 'pi pratyayā asvayaṃmayā apratyayasvabhāvā ityarthaḥ
# gang gi phyir rkyen rnams kyang bdag gi rang bzhin ma yin te / / rkyen ma yin pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to /
tantumayo hi paṭa ityucyate
# snam bu ni snal ma'i rang bzhin can no zhes bya bar brjod na ni /
syāt paṭo yadi tantava eva  svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ
# gal te snal ma dag rang gi ngo bor grub par gyur na / / snam bur 'gyur na /
te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ / tataśca tebhyo 'svayaṃmayebhyo 'svabhāvebhyo yatphalaṃ paṭākhyam, tatkathaṃ tantumayaṃ bhaviṣyati? yathoktam
# de dag ni cha shas kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par 'gyur ba yin gyi / / rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa de dag la snam bu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ltar snal ma'i rang bzhin du 'gyur / / ji skad du /
paṭaḥ kāraṇataḥ siddhaḥ siddhaṃ kāraṇamanyataḥ
# snam bu rgyu las 'grub 'gyur zhing / / rgyu yang gzhan las 'grub 'gyur bas /
siddhiryasya svato nāsto tadanyajjanayetkatham
# gang zhig rang gi 'grub med pa / / des gzhan bskyed par ji ltar 'gyur /
iti / tasmānna pratyayamayaṃ / phalaṃ saṃvidyate / apratyayamayaṃ tarhi astu / nāpratyayamayaṃ phalam
# zhes bshad do / / de phyir rkyen gyi rang bzhin min / / de'i phyir rkyen gyi rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu ni yod pa ma yin no / / 'o na rkyen ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na / / rkyen min rang bzhin 'bras bu ni /
saṃvidyate / iti tantumayo yadā paṭo nāsti, tadā kathaṃ vīraṇamayaḥ syā? / atrāha / mā bhūtphalam, pratyayāpratyayaniyamastu vidyate / tathā ca bhavān bravīti / yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate, apratyayebhyo 'pi kasmānnābhipravartate iti / na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam, ataḥ phalamapyastīti
# yod min te / / gang gi tshe snam bu snal ma'i rang bzhin du yang med pa de'i tshe 'gal ba 'jog ma'i rang bzhin du ji ltar 'gyur / / 'dir smras pa / / 'bras bu med du zad mod / / rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa'i nges pa ni yod pa yin te / / de ltar yang khyod kyis gal te 'bras bu med pa yang rkyen dag las skye na / / rkyen ma yin pa dag las kyang ci'i phyir skye ba ma yin zhes smras la / / snam bu dang re lde zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu med na ni snal ma dang 'jog ma dag rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa nyid du yang mi rigs te / / des na 'bras bu yang yod pa yin no /
ucyate / syātphalaṃ yadi pratyayāpratyayā eva syuḥ / sati hi phale ime 'sya pratyayā ime 'pratyayā iti syāt
# bshad par bya ste / / gal te 'bras bu yod par gyur na ni / / rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa dag tu 'gyur ro / / 'di ltar 'bras bu yod na ni 'di dag ni 'di'i rkyen yin no / / 'di dag ni 'di'i rkyen ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
tacca vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti / phalābhāvātpratyayāpratyayāḥ kutaḥ / pratyayāśca apratyayāśceti samāsaḥ / tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ svabhāvataḥ samutpattiriti / yathoktamāryaratnākarasūtre
# de yang rnam par dpyad pa na med pa nyid de / / de'i phyir 'bras bu med pas na / / rkyen min rkyen du ga la 'gyur te / / rkyen dang rkyen ma yin par zhes tshig bsdu'o / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba yod pa ma yin no / / ji skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyi mdo las /
śūnyavidya na hi vidyate kvaci antarīkṣi śakunasya vā padam
# gang na'ang stong pa rig pa med pa na / / nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs /
yo na vidyati sabhāvataḥ kvaci so na jātu parahetu bheṣyati
# gang na'ang ngo bo nyid 'ga' yod min pa / / de ni nam yang gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur /
yasya naiva hi sabhāvu labhyati so 'svabhāvu parapaccayaḥ katham / asvabhāvu paru kiṃ janīṣyati eṣa hetu sugatena deśitaḥ
# gang gi ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed pa / / rang bzhin med de ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen / / rang bzhin med pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bskyed / / rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o /
sarva dharma acalā dṛḍhaṃ sthitā nirvikāra nirupadravāḥ śivāḥ
# thams cad chos kyang mi gyo brtan par gnas / / mi 'gyur 'tshe ba med cing zhi ba ste /
antarīkṣapathatulya 'jānakā tatra muhyati jagaṃ ajānakam / śailaparvata yathā akampiyā evaṃ dharma avikampiyāḥ sadā
# ji ltar nam mkha' shes pa med pa bzhin / / de la mi shes 'gro ba rmongs par 'gyur / / ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi sgul ba / / de bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus /
no cyavati na pi copapadyayu evaṃ dharmata jinena deśitā / ityādi / tathā / yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ / taṃ jinu deśayatī narasiṃhaḥ tatra niveśayi sattvaśatāni
# 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med pa yi / / chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu bstan / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang de bzhin du / / chos gang skye ba med cing 'byung ba med / / 'chi 'pho med cing rga bar mi 'gyur ba / / mi yi seng ge yis ni der ston zhing / / sems can brgya phrag dag ni de la bkod /
yasya sabhāvu na vidyati kaści no parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ
# gang la ngo bo nyid ni gang yang med / / gzhan yang ma yin sus kyang mi rnyed pa /
nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ
# nang nam yin phyi rol dag na yang / / mi rnyed de dag la ni mgon pos bkod /
śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gati upalabhyati kāci
# bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i 'gro gsungs kyang / / 'gro ba gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te /
tatra ca voharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayamī bahusattvān
# de dag 'gro las grol bar rnam par gsungs / / grol nas sems can mang po grol bar mdzad /
iti vistaraḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pratyayaparīkṣā nāma prathamaṃ prakaraṇam / gatāgataparīkṣā dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / yadyapi utpādapratiṣedhātpratītyasamutpādasya anirodhādiviśeṣaṇasiddhiḥ, tathāpi anāgamanirgamapratītyasamutpādasiddhaye lokaprasiddhagamanāgamanakriyāpratiṣedhārthaṃ kiṃcidupapattyantaramucyatāmiti / ucyate / yadi gamanaṃ nāma syānniyataṃ tadgate vā adhvajāte parikalpyeta agate gamyamāne vā
# ces gsungs pa lta bu'o / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / rkyen brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang skye ba bkag pa las rten cing 'grel par 'byung ba'i khyad par 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa grub mod kyi / / de ltar na yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gro ba med pa dang 'ong ba med pa grub par bya ba'i phyir / / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i bya ba dgag par bya ba'i ched du / / rab tu grags pa'i 'thad pa gzhan cung zad brjod par bya dgos so / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'gro ba zhes bya ba nges pa zhig yod na de song ba'i lam gyi rnam pa'am / / ma song ba'am bgom pa zhig la brtag grang na /
sarvathā ca na yujyate ityāha / gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate
# rnam pa thams cad du rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / re zhig song la mi 'gro ste / / ma song ba la'ang 'gro ba med /
gatāgatavinirmuktaṃ gamyamānaṃ na gamyate
# song dang ma song ma gtogs par / / bgom pa shes par mi 'gyur ro /
tatra uparatagamikriyamadhvajātaṃ gatamityucyate / āviśyamānaṃ gamikriyayā vartamānaṃ gamyata ityucyate
# de la lam gyi rnam par 'gro ba'i bya ba 'gags pa la ni song ba zhes bya'o / / 'gro ba'i bya ba ma skyes pa la ni ma song zhes bya la / / da ltar ba 'gro ba'i bya bas zin pa la ni sgom pa zhes brjod do /
yadgatamuparatagamikriyaṃ tadvartamānagamikriyāyogavācinā gamyate ityanena śabdenocyamānamasaṃbaddhamiti kṛtvā gataṃ tāvad gamyata iti na yujyate / tāvacchabdena ca pratiṣedhakramaṃ darśayati / agatamapi na gamyate
# de la song ba 'gro ba'i bya ba 'gags pa gang yin pa de ni sgom pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'gro ba'i bya ba da ltar ba dang 'brel pa brjod pa 'dis brjod na 'brel pa med pa de'i phyir na re zhig song ba la 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so / / re zhig gi sgras ni dgag pa'i rim pa ston pa'o / / ma song ba la yang 'gro ba ma yin te /
agataṃ hi anupajātagamikriyamanāgatamucyate, gamyata iti ca vartamānam
# ma song ba ni 'gro ba'i bya ba ma skyes pa ma 'ongs pa la brjod la / / 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba yin te /
ato 'nāgatavartamānayoratyantabhedādagatamapi gamyata iti na yujyate
# de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba gnyis shin tu tha dad pas / / ma song ba la yang 'gro ba zhes bya ba mi rigs te /
yadi agataṃ kathaṃ gamyate, atha gamyate na tadagatamiti / gamyamāne 'pi nāsti gamanam, yasmāt
# gal te ma song ba yin na ni ji ltar 'gro ba yin la / / 'on te 'gro na ni de ji ltar ma song ba yin / / bgom pa la yang 'gro ba med de / / gang gi phyir /
gatāgatavinirmuktaṃ gamyamānaṃ na gamyate / iha hi gantā yaṃ deśamatikrāntaḥ sa tasya deśo gataḥ, yaṃ ca nātikrāntaḥ so 'syānāgataḥ
# song dang ma song ma gtogs par / / bgom pa shes par mi 'gyur ro / / 'di na 'gro ba pos yul gang brgal bar gyur pa de ni / / de'i song ba'i yul yin la / / gang brgal bar ma gyur pa de ni de'i ma song ba yin na /
na ca gatāgatavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyamaparamadhvajātaṃ paśyāmo gamyamānaṃ nāma
# song ba dang ma song ba las tha dad par bgom pa zhes bya ba lam gyi rnam pa gzhan gsum pa ni ma mthong ngo /
yataścaivaṃ gamyamānaṃ na gamyate, gamyata iti na prajñāyate, tasmānnāsti gamyamānam / ato na tad gamikriyayā āviśyate na gamyata iti nāsti gamyamāne 'pi gamanam / atha syāt / ganturgacchato yaścaraṇākrānto deśaḥ, sa gamyamānaḥ syāditi
# gang gi phyir de ltar bgom pa shes par mi 'gyur te / / shes par mi 'gyur ba dang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir bgom pa yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir de 'gro ba'i bya bas zin pa ma yin zhing 'gro ba ma yin pas bgom pa la yang 'gro ba med do / / ci ste 'gro bzhin pa'i 'gro ba po'i rkang pas mnan pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni bgom pa'ang yin par 'gyur ro snyam na /
naivam, caraṇayorapi paramāṇusāṃghātatvāt / aṅgulyagrāvasthitasya paramāṇoryaḥ pūrvo deśaḥ, sa tasya gate 'ntargataḥ
# de ltar ma yin te / / rkang pa yang rdul phra rab 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir sor mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rgyab kyi phyogs gang yin pa de ni de'i song ba'i khongs su gtogs pa yin zhing /
pārṣṇyavasthitasya caramaparamāṇorya uttaro deśaḥ, sa tasya agate 'ntargataḥ
# rkang ba'i rdul phra rab rting par gnas pa'i mdun gyi phyogs gang yin pa de ni de'i ma song ba'i khongs su gtogs pa yin zhing /
na ca paramāṇuvyatirekeṇa caraṇamasti
# rdul phra rab las ma gtogs pa'i rkang pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
tasmānnāsti gatāgatavyatirekeṇa gamyamānam / yathā caivaṃ caraṇe vicāraḥ, evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi pūrvāparadigbhāgasaṃbandhena vicāraḥ kārya iti
# de'i phyir song ba dang ma song ba las tha dad par bgom pa yod pa ma yin no / / de ltar rkang pa la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par byas pa de bzhin du / / rdul phra rab rnams la yang shar nub kyi phyogs kyi cha dang 'brel pa'i sgo nas rnam par dpyad par bya'o /
athārdhagataṃ gamyamānam, uktamuttaraṃ jāyamānavicāreṇa
# de'i phyir de ma thag tu skye bzhin pa'i rnam par dpyad pas phyed song bar gyur pa'i bgom pa rigs pa ma yin no /
tasmādgamyamānaṃ na gamyate iti siddham / tatrāha / gamyata eva gamyamānam / iha hi / ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ
# de'i phyir bgom pa la 'gro ba ma yin no zhes bya bar grub po / / 'dir smras pa / / bgom pa la ni 'gro ba yod pa nyid de 'di na / / gang na gyo ba de na 'gro / / de yang gang phyir bgom pa la /
na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ
# g yo ba song min ma song min / / de phyir bgom la 'gro ba yod /
tatra ceṣṭā caraṇotkṣepaparikṣepalakṣaṇā
# de la gyo ba ni rkang pa 'degs pa dang 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid can no /
yato vrajato ganturyatra deśe ceṣṭā gatiḥ tatraiva deśe / sā ca ceṣṭā na gate 'dhvani saṃbhavati nāpyagate, kiṃ tu gamyamāna eva / tataśca gamyamāne gatiḥ / yatra hi gatirupalabhyate tadgamyamānam, tacca gamikriyayā āviśyate / tasmād gamyamānameva gamyate iti / eko 'tra gamirjñānārthaḥ, aparaśca deśāntarasaṃprāptyartha iti
# gang gi phyir 'gro bzhin pa'i 'gro ba po'i gyo ba yul gang na yod pa'i yul de nyid na 'gro ba yod pa yin la / / g yo ba de yang song ba'i lam la yod pa ma yin zhing / / ma song ba la yang ma yin te / / 'on kyang bgom pa kho na la yod pa yin no / / de'i phyir bgom pa kho na la 'gro ba yod pa yin te / / gang zhig tu 'gro ba dmigs pa de ni bgom pa yin la / / de yang bya bas zin pa yin no / / de'i phyir bgom pa kho na la 'gro ba yod do / / 'dir 'gro ba gcig ni shes pa'i don yin la / / gzhan ni yul gzhan du phyin pa'i don yin no zhes bya ba'o /
evamapi parikalpyamāne gamyamānaṃ na gamyata ityāha / gamyamānasya gamanaṃ kathaṃ nāmopapatsyate / gamyamāne dvigamanaṃ yadā naivopapadyate / iha hi gamikriyāyogādeva gamyamānavyapadeśamicchati bhavān, tacca iti gamyata bravīti / ekā cātra gamikriyā, tayā gamyamānavyapadeśo bhavatu kāmamadhvanaḥ
# de ltar brtags kyang bgom pa la 'gro ba med do zhes bya bar bshad pa / / bgom la 'gro ba yin par ni / / ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur / / gang tshe 'gro ba med pa yi / / bgom pa 'thad pa med phyir ro / / 'dir khyed 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa nyid las bgom par brjod par 'dod cing / / de la yang 'gro ba zhes smra na / / 'dir 'gro ba'i bya ba ni gcig yin pas / / des lam bgom pa brjod par 'gyur mod /
gamyata iti bhūyaḥ kriyāsaṃbandho gamyamānasya na yujyata iti / gamyamānasya gamanaṃ kathaṃ nāmopapatsyate / kāraṇamāha / gamyamāne dvigamanaṃ yadā naivopapadyate / iti / gamyamānamiti gamyata ityarthaḥ / dvigataṃ gamanaṃ dvigamanam / ekasyā gamikriyāyā gamyamānamityatropayuktatvād dvitīyāyā abhāvācca, gamyata ityayaṃ vyapadeśo vinā gamanena yadā naivopapadyate, tadā gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti paripūrṇo vākyārtho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ / gamyamānamityetāvanmātrameva saṃbhavati dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, na tu gamyata iti
# 'gro'o zhes yang bgom par bya ba dang 'brel par ni mi rigs te de'i phyir / / bgom la 'gro ba yin par ni / / ji lta bur ni 'thad par 'gyur / / zhes bya'o / / gtan tshigs bshad pa / / gang tshe 'gro ba med pa yi / / bgom pa 'thad pa med phyir ro / / 'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba dang bral ba'o / / bgom pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / dgos pa ni gang gi tshe 'gro ba'i bya ba gcig ni bgom pa zhes bya ba der nye bar mkho ba'i phyir dang gnyis pa med pa'i phyir la 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i brjod pa 'di yang 'gro ba med par mi 'thad pa de'i tshe bgom pa la 'gro'o zhes bya ba la ngag gi don yongs su rdzogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ste / / bya ba gnyis pa med pa'i phyir bgom pa zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig srid kyi / / 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni ma yin no /
atha gamyate ityatraiva gamikriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate, evaṃ sati gamyamānavyapadeśe nāsti kriyāsaṃbandha iti na paripūrṇatā vākyārthasyetyāha / gamyamānasya gamanaṃ yasya tasya prasajyate
# ci ste 'gro'o zhes bya ba de nyid dang 'gro ba'i bya ba 'brel par 'dod na / / de lta yin na bgom pa'i brjod pa la bya ba dang 'brel pa med pas / / ngag gi don yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / gang gi bgom pa la 'gro ba / / de yi bgom la 'gro med par /
ṛte gatergamyamānaṃ gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate / yasya vādino gamyamānasya gamanamiti pakṣaḥ, gamyamāne saṃjñābhūte gamikriyāśūnye yo gamikriyāmādheyabhūtāmicchati, tasya pakṣe ṛte gatergamyamānamiti prasajyate, gatirahitaṃ gamanaṃ syāt, yasmādasya gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate / hi śabdo yasmādarthe
# thal bar 'gyur te / / gang gi phyir bgom la 'gro ba yin phyir ro / / rgol ba gang gi bgom pa la 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i phyogs yin zhing / / gang zhig bgom pa'i ming can du gyur pa 'gro ba'i bya bas stong pa la 'gro ba'i bya ba brten par gyur bar 'dod pa de'i phyogs la bgom pa la 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur te / / de'i bgom pa 'gro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro / / 'di ltar 'di'i bgom pa la 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi phyir gyi sgra ni 'di ltar gyi don no /
yasmād gatirahitameva gamyamānaṃ sat tasya vādino gamyate, gamyata ityatra kriyopayogāt, tasmād gatirahitaṃ gamanaṃ prasajyate
# 'di ltar rgol ba de'i ltar na ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba der bya ba nye bar mkho ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang bral ba'i bgom pa kho na la 'gro ba yin te / / de'i phyir bgom pa la 'gro ba dang bral bar thal bar 'gyur ro /
atha ubhayatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate gamyamāne gamyate ityatra ca, evamapi / gamyamānasya gamane prasaktaṃ gamanadvayam / yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ / yena gamanena yogādgamyamānavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate 'dhvā, tadekaṃ gamanam / tatra gamyamāne 'dhikaraṇabhute dvitīyaṃ gamanaṃ yena so 'dhvā gamyate
# ci ste bgom pa dang 'gro'o zhes bya ba gnyi ga yang bya ba dang 'brel par 'dod na ni / / de lta na yang / / bgom la 'gro ba yod na ni / / 'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur te / / gang gis de bgom gyur pa dang / / de la 'gro ba gang yin pa'o / / 'gro ba gang dang ldan pas lam gyis bgom pa zhes bya ba'i brjod pa rnyed par 'gyur pa de ni 'gro ba gcig yin no / / gang gis lam de bgrod pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i bgom pa de la 'gro ba ni gnyis pa ste /
etadgamanadvayaṃ gamyamānasya gamane sati prasaktam
# bgom pa la 'gro ba yod na 'gro ba 'di gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ro /
bhavatu gamanadvayam, ko doṣa iti cet, ayaṃ doṣaḥ / yasmāt
# 'gro ba gnyis yod mod skyon ci yod ce na / / skyon 'di yod de gang gi phyir /
dvau gantārau prasajyete prasakte gamanadvaye
# 'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur na / / 'gro ba po yang gnyis su 'gyur /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ gantṛdvayaprasaṅge ityāha
# yang ci'i phyir 'gro ba po gnyis su thal bar 'gyur zhe na / / bshad pa /
gantāraṃ hi tiraskṛtya gamanaṃ nopapadyate / yasmādavaśyaṃ kriyā svasādhanamapekṣate karma kartāraṃ vā
# gang phyir 'gro ba med par ni / / 'gro po 'thad par mi 'gyur phyir / / gang phyir bya ba ni / / gdon mi za bar las sam byed pa po yang rung ste /
gamikriyā caivaṃ kartaryavasthitā, ato gantāramapekṣate
# rang gi sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa yin la / / 'gro ba'i bya ba 'di yang byed pa po la gnas pa yin te /
nāsti ca ekasminneva gacchati devadatte dvitīyaḥ karteti
# de'i phyir 'gro ba po la ltos pa yin no / / lha sbyin gcig 'gro ba na byed pa po gnyis pa yod pa ma yin te /
ataḥ kartṛdvayābhāvānnāsti gamanadvayam
# de'i phyir byed pa po gnyis pa med pa'i phyir bya ba gnyis med do /
tataśca gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti nopapadyate / atha syāt / yadāyaṃ devadattaḥ sthitaḥ, sa na bhāṣate? paśyati na? tadaiko 'nekakriyo dṛṣṭaḥ, evamekasmin gantari kriyādvayaṃ bhaviṣyati iti / naivam
# de'i phyir bgom pa la 'gro ba yod do zhes bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no / / ci ste gang gi tshe lha sbyin 'di 'dug bzhin du smra bar yang byed cing lta bar yang byed pa de'i tshe byed pa po gcig bya ba du ma dang ldan par mthong ba de bzhin du / / 'gro ba po gcig la bya ba gnyis yod par 'gyur ro snyam nam yin te /
śaktirhi kārako na dravyam
# gang gi phyir nus pa byed pa po yin gyi rdzas ni ma yin la /
kriyābhedācca tatsādhanasyāpi śakteḥ siddha eva bhedaḥ
# bya ba tha dad pas de'i sgrub byed nus pa yang tha dad par grub pa yin te /
na hi sthitikriyayā vaktā syāt
# 'dug pa'i bya bas smra ba por 'gyur ba ni ma yin no /
dravyamekamiti cet, bhavatu evam, na tu dravyaṃ kārakaḥ, kiṃ tarhi śaktiḥ, sā ca bhidyata eva / api ca
# gal te rdzas gcig yin no zhe na / / de lta yin du chug mod rdzas ni byed pa po ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / nus pa yin na de yang tha dad pa kho na yin no /
sadṛśakriyādvaya kārakatvaṃ naikadeśikasya dṛṣṭam, ato naikasya ganturgamanadvayam
# gzhan yang gcig dus gcig tu bya ba 'dra ba gnyis kyi byed pa po gnyis yin par yang ma mthong ste / / de'i phyir 'gro ba po gcig la 'gro ba gnyis med do /
atrāha / yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi gantari devadatte gamanamupalabhyate devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśāt
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang de ltar yin mod kyi / / 'on kyang lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes brjod pa las na 'gro ba po lha sbyin la 'gro ba dmigs pa yin no /
tataśca vidyata eva gamanaṃ gamanāśrayagantṛsadbhāvāt / ucyate / syādevaṃ yadi gamanāśrayo gantā syāt, na tvasti
# de'i phyir 'gro ba ni yod pa nyid de / / 'gro ba'i rten 'gro ba po yod pa'i phyir ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'gro ba'i rten 'gro ba po yod na de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni med do / / ci ltar zhe na /
kathamityāha / gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya gamanaṃ nopapadyate / gamane 'sati gantātha kuta eva bhaviṣyati / gantāramantareṇa nirāśrayaṃ gamanamasadityuktam, tataśca gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya pratyākhyāya gamanaṃ nāsti, asati gamane kuto nirhetuko gantā? ato nāsti gamanam
# bshad pa / / gal te 'gro bo med 'gyur na / / 'gro ba 'thad par mi 'gyur te / / 'gro ba med na 'gro ba po / / yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur / / 'gro ba po med par rten med pa'i 'gro ba med do zhes bshad zin to / / de'i phyir gal te 'gro ba po med 'gyur na ste bsal na 'gro ba yod pa ma yin la / / 'gro ba med na rgyu med pa'i / / 'gro ba yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir 'gro ba med do /
atrāha / vidyata eva gamanam, tadvatastena vyapadeśāt / iha gantā gamanena yuktaḥ, tadyogācca gacchati / yadi gamanaṃ na syāt, gamanavato devadattasya gacchatīti vyapadeśo na syāt, daṇḍābhāve daṇḍivyapadeśābhāvavat
# 'dir smras pa / / 'gro ba ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i sgo nas de dang ldan pa brjod pa'i phyir ro / / 'di na 'gro ba po ni 'gro ba dang ldan pa yin la / / de dang ldan pa las kyang 'gro ba yin no / / gal te 'gro ba med par gyur na ni / / 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa'i lha sbyin la 'gro'o zhes brjod par mi 'gyur te / / khar ba med na khar ba can du brjod pa med pa bzhin no /
ucyate / syādgamanam, yadi gacchatītyevaṃ vyapadeśaḥ syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i brjod pa 'di nyid yod na / / 'gro ba yod par 'gyur na de ni med de /
yasmāt / gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati
# gang gi phyir / / re zhig 'gro bo mi 'gro ste / / 'gro ba po min 'gro ba min /
anyo ganturagantuśca kastṛtīyo hi gacchati / iha gacchatīti gantā, sa tāvanna gacchati, yathā ca na gacchati tathottareṇa ślokatrayeṇa pratipādayiṣyati / agantāpi na gacchati
# 'gro po 'gro po min las gzhan / / gsum pa gang zhig 'gro bar 'gyur / / 'dir 'gro bar byed pas na 'gro ba po yin na / / de ni re zhig mi 'gro'o / / ji ltar mi 'gro ba de ltar ni tshigs su bcad pa 'og ma gsum gyis ston par 'gyur ro / / 'gro ba po ma yin pa yang mi 'gro ste /
agantā hi nāma yo gamikriyārahitaḥ
# 'gro ba po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'gro ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yin la /
gacchatīti ca gamikriyāyogapravṛttaḥ śabdaḥ
# 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa la 'jug pa yin te /
yadyasāvagantā, kathaṃ gacchati? atha gacchati, nāsau agantā iti
# de'i phyir 'di gal te 'gro ba po ma yin na ni ji ltar 'gro la / / 'on te 'gro na ni 'di 'gro ba po ma yin zhes bya /
tadubhayavyatirikto gacchatīti cennaivam
# gal te de gnyis las tha dad pa zhig 'gro'o zhe na / / de ltar ma yin te /
ko hi ganturaganturvinirmuktastṛtīyo 'sti yo gacchatīti kalpyeta? tasmānnāsti gamanam
# gang zhig la 'gro'o zhes bya bar rtog pa 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba po ma yin pa las ma gtogs pa'i gsum pa zhes bya ba yang gang zhig yod / / de'i phyir 'gro ba med do /
atrāha / nāgantā gacchati nāpyubhayarahitaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva gacchatīti
# 'dir smras pa / / 'gro ba po ma yin pa mi 'gro la / / gnyi ga ma gtogs pa yang mi 'gro ste / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'gro ba po kho na 'gro ba yin no /
etadapyasat kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt
# 'di yang yod pa ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar /
gantā tāvadgacchatīti kathamevopapatsyate / gamanena vinā gantā yadā naivopapadyate
# gang tshe 'gro ba med par ni / / 'gro po 'thad par mi 'gyur na / / re zhig 'gro bo 'gro'o zhes / / ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur /
gantā gacchatītyatra vākye ekaiva gamikriyā, tayā ca gacchatīti vyapadiśyate
# 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i ngag 'dir 'gro ba'i bya ba ni gcig nyid yin la / / des kyang 'gro'o zhes bya bar brjod par 'gyur zhing /
ganteti tu vyapadeśe nāsti dvitīyā gamikriyā iti / gamanena vinā gantā, agacchan ganteti yadā na saṃbhavati, tadā gantā gacchatīti na yujyate / kāmaṃ gacchatītyastu, ganteti tu na saṃbhavatīti tadayuktam / atha gatiyogātsagatika eva gantā, tathāpi dvitīyagamikriyābhāvadgacchatīti vyapadeśo na syādityāha
# 'gro ba po zhes bya ba'i brjod pa la ni 'gro ba'i bya ba gnyis pa yod pa ma yin pas gang gi tshe 'gro ba med par 'gro ba po ste / / mi 'gro bar 'gro ba po zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya ba mi rigs so / / 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni yin du chug na / / 'gro ba po zhes bya ba 'di mi srid pas / / rigs pa ma yin no / / ci ste 'gro ba dang ldan pa las 'gro ba po 'gro ba dang bcas pa yin no zhe na / / de ltar na yang 'gro ba'i bya ba gnyis pa med pa'i phyir 'gro'o zhes brjod pa yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa /
pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate / gamanena vinā gantā ganturgamanamicchataḥ / yasya vādino gamikriyāyogādeva ganteti pakṣaḥ, tasya ganturgamanamicchataḥ sagamanagantṛvyapadeśādgamanena vinā gantā gacchatīti syāt, dvitīyagamikriyābhāvāt
# gang gi phyogs la 'gro ba po / / 'gro ba de la 'gro med pa'i / / 'gro po yin par thal 'gyur te / / 'gro po 'gro bar 'dod phyir ro / / rgol ba gang gi 'gro ba dang ldan pa nyid las 'gro ba po yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs yin zhing / / 'gro ba po 'gro bar 'dod pa de la / / 'gro ba po'i brjod pa 'gro ba dang bcas pas / / 'gro ba med par 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya bar 'gyur te / / 'gro ba'i bya ba gnyis pa med pa'i phyir ro /
ato gantā gacchatīti na yujyate / gacchatītyetasyārthe ganteti śabdo gamanena vinā gantetyatra vākye
# de'i phyir 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya ba mi rigs so / / 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro po yin par zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di'i 'gro ba po zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'gro ba'i bya ba 'di'i don la 'jug go /
atha ubhayatrāpi gatiyoga iṣyate gantā gacchatīti, evamapi / gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati / ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati / yena gamanena yogād gantetyucyate vyapadiśyate tadekaṃ gamanam / gantā bhavan yacca gacchati, yāṃ ca gatikriyāṃ karoti, tadetadgamanadvayaṃ prasaktam / ato gantṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavad dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam / tasmānnāsti gacchatīti vyapadeśaḥ
# ci ste 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes gnyi ga yang / / 'gro ba dang ldan par 'dod do zhe na / / de lta na yang / / gal te 'gro po 'gro 'gyur na / / 'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur te / / gang gis 'gro por mngon pa dang / / 'gro por gyur nas gang 'gro ba'o / / 'gro ba gang dang ldan pas 'gro ba po zhes bya bar mngon zhing brjod pa 'gro ba gcig po de dang 'gro ba por gyur nas gang 'gro ba ste / / 'gro ba'i bya ba gang zhig byed pa ste / / 'gro ba gnyis po 'di dag tu thal bar 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir 'gro ba po gnyis su yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes gong ma bzhin du skyon brjod par bya'o / / de'i phyir 'gro'o zhes bya bar brjod pa don med par 'gyur ro /
atrāha / yadyapyevam, tathāpi devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśasadbhāvādgamanastīti
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang de ltar yin mod kyi / / de lta na yang lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i brjod pa yod pa'i phyir 'gro ba yod do /
naivam / yasmāddevadattāśrayaivaiṣā cintā kimasau gantā san gacchati, uta agantā gacchati, tadvayatirikto veti / sarvathā ca nopapadyata iti yatkiṃcidetat / atrāha / vidyata eva gamanam, tadārambhasadbhāvāt
# de ltar ni ma yin te / / gang gi phyir ci 'di 'gro ba por gyur pa zhig gam / / 'on te 'gro ba po ma yin pa zhig gam / / de gnyis las tha dad pa zhig 'gro grang / / zhes dpyad pa 'di ni lha sbyin gyi rten can yin la / / rnam pa thams cad du 'thad pa yang ma yin pas 'di ni gyi na'o / / 'dir smras pa / / 'gro ba ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha devadattaḥ sthityupamardena gamanamārabhate
# 'di na lha sbyin sdod pa btang nas 'gro bar rtsom la /
na ca avidyamānakūrmaromaprāvārādikamārabhate
# rus sbal gyi spu yod pa ma yin pa'i gos ni rtsom pa yang ma yin no /
ucyate / syādgamanaṃ yadi tadāramme eva syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te de'i rtsom pa nyid yod na / / 'gro ba yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yasmāt / gate nārabhyate gantuṃ gataṃ nārabhyate 'gate
# de ni med do / / song la 'gro ba rtsom med de / / ma song ba la'ang 'gro rtsom med /
nārabhyate gamyamāne gantumārabhyate kuha
# bgom la rtsom pa yod min na / / gang du 'gro ba rtsom par byed /
yadi gamanārambho bhavet, tad gate vādhvanyāramyeta, agate vā gamyamāne vā
# gal te 'gro ba'i rtsom pa de yod na / / de'i tshe song ba'i lam la'am / / ma song ba'am bgom pa zhig la rtsom par 'gyur ba zhig na /
tatra gate gamanaṃ nārabhyate, taddhi nāma uparatagamikriyam
# de la song ba la ni 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med de / / song ba ni 'gro ba'i bya ba 'gags pa yin na /
yadi tatra gamanamārabhyeta, tad gatamityevaṃ na syād atītavartamānayorvirodhāt
# gal te der 'gro ba rtsom na ni de song ba nyid du mi 'gyur te / / 'das pa dang da ltar ba dag ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
agate 'pi gamanaṃ nārabhyate, anāgatavartamānayorvirodhāt
# ma song ba la yang 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med de / / ma 'ongs pa dang de lta ba dag ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro / / bgom pa la yang yod pa ma yin te /
nāpi gamyamāne, tadabhāvāt kriyādvayaprasaṅgāt kartṛdvayaprasaṅgācca
# de med pa'i phyir dang bya ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / / byed pa po gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
tadevaṃ sarvatra gamanārambhamapaśyannāha
# de'i phyir de ltar thams cad du 'gro ba'i rtsom pa ma gzigs nas /
gantumārabhyate kuheti
# gang du 'gro ba rtsom par byed / / ces gsungs so /
yathā ca gamanaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha
# ji ltar 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa /
na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam
# 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol na / / gang du 'gro ba rtsom 'gyur ba /
yatrārabhyeta gamanamagate gamanaṃ kutaḥ
# bgom pa med cing song ba med / / ma song 'gro ba ga la yod /
iha devadatto yadāvasthita āste, sa tadā gamanaṃ nārabhate
# 'di ltar gang gi tshe lha sbyin 'dug par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gro ba rtsom pa yod pa ma yin te /
tasya gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gamyamānamadhvajātamasti, na ca gataṃ yatra gamanamārabhyeta
# de la 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol du ni gang du 'gro ba rtsom par 'gyur ba bgom pa'i lam gyi rnam pa yod pa ma yin la / / song ba yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasmād gatagamyamānābhāvādenayorna gamanārambhaḥ / atha syāt
# de'i phyir song ba dang bgom pa med pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med do /
yadyapi gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gataṃ na gamyamānaṃ tathāpyagatamasti, tatra gamanārambhaḥ syāditi / ucyate
# ci ste gal te yang 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol du song ba med cing bgom pa med mod kyi / / de lta na yang gang du 'gro ba rtsom par 'gyur ba ma song ba ni yod pa yin te / / der 'gro ba rtsom par 'gyur ro snyam na brjod par bya ste /
agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ / anupajātagamikriyamanārabdhagamikriyamagatam / tatra gamanārambha ityasaṃbaddhametadityāha
# ma song 'gro ba ga la yod / / ma song ba ni 'gro ba'i bya ba ma skyes shing 'gro ba'i bya ba ma brtsams pa yin na / / der 'gro ba rtsom mo zhes bya ba 'di ni ma 'brel pa yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
agate gamanaṃ kutaḥ iti
# ma song 'gro ba ga la yod / / ces bya ba'o /
yadyapi gatāgatagamyamāneṣu gamanārambho nāsti, gatāgatagamyamānāni tu santi
# gal te yang song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa dag la 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med mod kyi / / song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa dag ni yod pa yin la /
na cāsati gamane etāni yujyanta iti
# 'gro ba med na ni 'di dag mi rung ngo zhe na /
ucyate / syād gamanaṃ yadyetānyeva syuḥ / sati hi gamikriyāprārambhe yatroparatā gamikriyā tad gatamiti parikalpyeta, yatra vartamānā tad gamyamānam, yatrājātā tadagatamiti
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'di dag nyid yod na 'gro ba yod par 'gyur ba zhig go / / 'gro ba'i rtsom pa yod na ni / / gang du 'gro ba'i bya ba 'gags pa de ni song ba zhes brtag par bya la / / gang du da lta bar gyur pa de ni bgom pa yin zhing / / gang du ma skyes pa de ni ma song ba yin no zhes brtag na / / gang gi tshe 'gro ba'i bya ba rtsom pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
yadā tu gamikriyāprārambha eva nāsti, tadā
# 'gro rtsom rnam pa thams cad du / / snang ba med pa nyid yin no /
gataṃ kiṃ gamyamanaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate
# song ba ci zhig bgom pa ci / / ma song ci zhig rnam par brtag /
adṛśyamāna ārambhe gamanasyaiva sarvathā / prārambhe 'nupalabhyamāne kiṃ mithyādhvatrayaṃ parikalpyate, kuto vā tadvayapadeśakāraṇaṃ gamanamityayuktametat / atrāha / vidyata eva gamanaṃ tatpratipakṣasadbhāvāt
# thams cad du 'gro ba'i rtsam pa nyid dmigs pa med na / / phyin ci log tu dus gsum du rtog par ci ste byed / / de'i brjod pa'i rgyu 'gro ba yang lta ga la yod / / de'i phyir 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa 'gro ba ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i gnyen po yod pa'i phyir ro /
yasya ca pratipakṣo 'sti, tadasti, ālokāndhakāravat pārāvāravat saṃśayaniścayavacca
# gang la gnyen po yod pa de ni yod pa yin te / / snang ba dang mun pa bzhin dang pha rol dang tshu rol dang the tshom dang gtan la phebs pa bzhin no /
asti ca gamanasya pratipakṣaḥ sthānamiti / ucyate / syād gamanaṃ yadi tatpratipakṣaḥ sthānaṃ syāt
# 'gro ba la yang gnyen po gnas pa yod pa yin no / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te de'i gnyen po gnas pa yod na ni 'gro ba yod par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni med do / / ji ltar zhe na / / 'dir gnas pa 'di 'gro ba po'am / / 'gro ba po ma yin pa'am /
kathamihedaṃ sthānaṃ ganturagantustadanyasya vā parikalpyeta? sarvathā ca na yujyata ityāha / gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati / anyo ganturagantuśca kastṛtīyo 'tha tiṣṭhati / yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tathottareṇa ślokenākhyāsyati
# de gnyis las gzhan pa zhig la brtags grang na / / rnam pa thams cad du mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa / / re zhig 'gro po mi sdod de / / 'gro ba po min sdod pa min / / 'gro po 'gro po min las gzhan / / gsum pa gang zhig sdod par 'gyur / / 'gro ba po ji ltar mi sdod pa de ltar ni tshigs su bcad pa phyi mas ston par 'gyur ro / / 'gro ba po ma yin pa yang mi sdod de / / de ni sdod pa nyid yin na / / de la gnas pa gzhan gyis dgos pa ci zhig yod /
agantāpi na tiṣṭhati, sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam? agantāpi na tiṣṭhati? sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya  kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam? ekayā sthityā agantā aparayā tiṣṭhatīti sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt sthātṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavaddoṣaḥ / gantragantṛrahitaścānyo nāsti / atrāha / nāgantā tiṣṭhati, nāpi ganturagantuścānyaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva tiṣṭhatīti naivam / yasmāt / gantā tāvattiṣṭhatīti kathamevopapatsyate / gamanena vinā gantā yadā naivopapadyate / yadāyaṃ tiṣṭhatītyucyate, tadā sthitivirodhi gamanamasya nāsti, vinā ca gamanaṃ gantṛvyapadeśo nāsti
# gnas pa gcig gis ni 'gro ba po ma yin par 'gyur la / / gzhan gyis ni sdod par 'gyur ro zhes gnas pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas pa po yang gnyis su thal bar 'gyur bas nyes pa snga ma bzhin du 'gyur ro / / 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba po ma yin pa las ma gtogs pa'i don yang med do / / 'dir smras pa / / 'gro ba po ma yin pa mi sdod la / / 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba po ma yin pa las gzhan pa yang mi sdod de / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'gro ba po nyid sdod do / / de ltar ni ma yin te gang gi phyir / / gang tshe 'gro ba med par ni / / 'gro po 'thad par mi 'gyur na / / re zhig 'gro po sdod do zhes / / ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur / / gang gi tshe 'di sdod do zhes brjod pa de'i tshe de la gnas pa dang 'gal ba'i 'gro ba yod pa ma yin la / / 'gro ba med par yang 'gro ba por brjod pa yod pa ma yin te /
ato gantā tiṣṭhatīti nopapadyate
# de'i phyir 'gro ba po sdod do zhes bya ba ni mi 'thad do /
atrāha / vidyata eva gamanam, tannivṛttisadbhāvāt
# 'dir smras pa / / 'gro ba ni yongs su yod pa nyid de ldog par yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha gaternivartamānaḥ sthitimārabhate gamanābhāve tu na tato nivarteta
# 'di na 'gro ba las ldog pa na gnas pa rtsom par byed na / / 'gro ba med na ni de las ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
ucyate / syād gamanaṃ yadi tannivṛttireva syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te de las ldog pa nyid yod na / / 'gro ba yod par 'gyur na don med de /
[na tvasti] yasmāt / na tiṣṭhati gamyamānānna gatānnāgatādapi / tatra gantā gatādadhvano na nivartate gatyabhāvāt
# 'di ltar / / bgom las ldog par mi 'gyur te / / song dang ma song las kyang min / / de gnyis 'gro ba po song ba'i lam las ni mi ldog ste / / 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro /
agatādapi, gatyabhāvādeva / gamyamānādapi na nivartate tadanupalabdheḥ gamikriyābhāvācca
# ma song ba las kyang ma yin te / / 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / bgom pa las kyang mi ldog ste / / de ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang 'gro ba'i bya ba med pa'i phyir ro /
tasmānna gatinivṛttiḥ
# de'i phyir 'gro ba las ldog pa med do /
atrāha / yadi gamanapratidvandvisthityabhāvādgatirasatī, evaṃ tarhi gamanaprasiddhaye sthiti sādhayāmaḥ, tatsiddhau gamanasiddhiḥ
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te 'gro ba'i 'gran zla gnas pa med pas 'gro ba med pa yin na / / de lta na 'o na 'gro ba grub par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa grub par bya ste / / de grub pas 'gro ba grub pa yin no /
tasmādvidyata eva sthānaṃ pratidvandvisadbhāvāt, sthiterhi pratidvandvi gamanam, tadasti, tataśca sthitirapi, pratidvandvisadbhāvāt / etadapyayuktam / yasmāt / gamanaṃ saṃpravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca gateḥ samā
# de'i phyir gnas pa ni yod pa nyid de 'gran zla yod pa'i phyir ro / / gnas pa'i 'gran zla ni 'gro ba yin la / / de ni yod pa yin no / / de'i phyir gnas pa yang yod pa yin te / / 'gran zla yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na / / 'di yang mi rung ste / / 'di ltar / / 'gro ba dang ni 'jug pa dang / / ldog pa yang ni 'gro dang mtshungs /
atra hi yadgamanaṃ sthitisiddhaye varṇitaṃ tadgatyā samaṃ gatidūṣaṇena tulyamityarthaḥ
# 'dir gnas pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bkod pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba dang mtshungs te / / 'gro ba sun 'byin pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i don to / / ji ltar / / re zhig 'gro po mi sdod de /
yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadityādinā gatiprasiddhaye sthiterhetutvenopāttāyā dūṣaṇamuktam, evamihāpi sthitiprasiddhaye gamanasya hetutvenopāttasya sthātā na gacchati tāvadityādinā ślokadvayapāṭhaparivartena dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nāsti gamanam, tadabhāvātpratidvandvinī sthitirapīti / evaṃ tāvad gamanaṃ gatyā tulyaṃ pratyākhyeyam / atha syāt / vidyata eva sthānaṃ tadārambhasadbhāvāt / iha gatyupamardena sthānamārabhyate, kathaṃ tanna syāt? ucyate / saṃpravṛttiśca gateḥ samā vācyā / tatra yathā pūrvaṃ gate nārabhyate gantumityādinā gamanārambho niṣiddhaḥ, evamihāpi / sthite nārabhyate sthātuṃ sthātuṃ nārabhyate 'sthite / nārabhyate sthīyamāne sthātumārabhyate kuha / ityādinā ślokatrayaparivartena sthānasaṃpravṛttirapi gateḥ samā / sthānanivṛttirapi gatinivṛttyā samā pratyākhyeyā
# zhes bya ba la sogs pas / / 'gro ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i gnas pa la sun 'byin pa brjod pa de bzhin du 'dir yang gnas pa bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bkod pa'i 'gro ba la yang / / re zhig gnas po mi 'gro ste / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis 'don pa go bsnor te sun 'byin pa brjod par bya'o / / des na 'gro ba med la de med pas 'gran zla gnas pa yang med do / / de ltar re zhig 'gro ba ni 'gro ba dang 'dra bar gsal bar bya'o / / ci ste gnas pa ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir 'gro ba btang nas gnas pa rtsom par 'gyur la / / rtsom pa gang yin pa de yang yod par ji ltar mi 'gyur snyam na / / brjod par bya ste / / 'jug pa yang 'gro ba dang mtshungs par brjod par bya'o / / de la ji ltar sngar / / song la 'gro ba'i rtsom med de / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gro ba'i rtsom pa bkag pa de bzhin du / / 'dir yang / / gnas la gnas pa'i rtsom med de / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pa gsum go bsnor te gnas pa'i 'jug pa la yang 'gro ba dang mtshungs par bsal bar bya'o / / ci ste gnas pa ni yod pa nyid de de las ldog pa yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir lha sbyin gnas par gyur nas gnas pa las ldog pa na 'gro ba rtsom par 'gyur te / / gal te gnas pa yod par ma gyur na ni de las ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro snyam na / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te de'i ldog pa yod par gyur na ni gnas pa yod par 'gyur na / / de ni med de / / gang gi phyir ldog par yang ni 'gro dang mtshungs te / / gnas pa las ldog pa yang 'gro ba las ldog pa dang mtshungs par bsal bar bya ba yin no /
yathā gatiniṣedhe
# ji ltar 'gro ba 'gog pa na /
na tiṣṭhati gamyamānānna gatānnāgatādapi / iti gaterdūṣaṇamuktam, evaṃ sthitiniṣedhe 'pi
# bgom las ldog par mi 'gyur te / / song dang ma song las kyang min / / zhes 'gro ba la sun 'byin pa brjod pa de bzhin du gnas pa dgag pa la yang /
na gacchati sthīyamānānna sthitānnāsthitādapi / iti gatyā tulyaṃ dūṣaṇamiti nāsti sthitiḥ / tadabhāvātkuto gatipratipakṣasthitisadbhāvavādināṃ gateḥ siddhiriti / api ca
# gnas bzhin pa las mi ldog ste / / gnas dang mi gnas las kyang min / / zhes 'gro ba dang sun 'byin pa 'dra ba yin te / / de'i phyir gnas pa med do / / de med pas 'gro ba'i gnyen po gnas pa yod par smra ba rnams kyis 'gro ba grub par ga la 'gyur te /
yadi gamanaṃ syāt, gantṛvyatirekeṇa vā syādavyatirekeṇa vā? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavatītyāha / yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate / anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate / kathaṃ punarna yujyata ityāha / yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi / ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca / yeyaṃ gamikriyā, sā yadi ganturavyatiriktā nānyā syāt, tadā kartuḥ kriyāyāścaikatvaṃ syāt
# de'i phyir 'gro ba rnam pa thams cad du med pa nyid do / / gzhan yang gal te 'gro ba yod par gyur na / / de 'gro ba po las tha dad par ram tha mi dad par yod par 'gyur ba zhig na / / rnam par dpyad pa na rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / 'gro ba de dang 'gro ba po / / de nyid ces kyang byar mi rung / / 'gro ba dang ni 'gro ba po / / gzhan nyid ces kyang byar mi rung / / yang ji ltar mi rung zhe na / / bshad pa / / gal te 'gro ba gang yin pa / / de nyid 'gro po yin 'gyur na / / byed pa po dang las nyid kyang / / gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur / / 'gro ba'i bya ba gang yin pa de gal te 'gro ba po las tha mi dad par 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe byed pa po dang bya ba yang gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
tataśca iyaṃ kriyā, ayaṃ kartā, iti viśeṣo na syāt
# de'i phyir 'di ni bya ba'o 'di ni byed pa po'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur na /
na ca chidikriyāyāḥ chettuśca ekatvam
# gcod pa'i bya ba dang gcod pa po ni gcig pa yang ma yin te /
ato yadeva gamanaṃ sa eva ganteti na yujyate / anyatramapi gantṛgamanayoryathā nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha / anya eva punargantā gateryadi vikalpyate
# de'i phyir 'gro ba gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba po yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo / / 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid du yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / / gal te 'gro dang 'gro ba po / / gzhan pa nyid du rnam brtag na /
gamanaṃ syādṛte ganturgantā syādgamanādṛte / yadi hi gantṛgamanayoranyatvaṃ syāt, tadā gamananirapekṣo gantā syāt, gantṛnirapekṣaṃ ca gamanaṃ gṛhyeta pṛthak siddhaṃ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ / na ca gantuḥ pṛthaksiddhaṃ gamanaṃ gṛhyata iti
# 'gro po med pa'i 'gro ba dang / / 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro por 'gyur / / gal te 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba dag gzhan nyid du gyur na ni / / de'i tshe 'gro ba la ma ltos pa'i 'gro ba por 'gyur zhing / / bum pa las snam bu ltar 'gro ba po la ltos pa med pa gzhan du grub pa'i 'gro ba gzung bar bya bar 'gyur na / / byed pa po las logs su grub pa'i 'gro ba ni 'dzin pa yang ma yin pas /
anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate iti prasādhitametat
# 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no /
tadevam / ekībhāvena vā siddhirnānābhāvena vā yayoḥ / na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate
# de'i phyir de ltar / / gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang / / dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni / / grub par gyur pa yod min na / / de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod /
yayorgantṛgamanayoryathoditanyāyena ekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ, tayoridānīṃ kenānyena prakāreṇa siddhirastu? ata āha
# 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gang dag la ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis gcig gi ngo bo dang gzhan gyi ngo bo grub par 'gyur ba ji ltar yang yod pa ma yin na / / de gnyis rnam pa gzhan gang du grub par 'gyur /
tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyata iti
# de nyid kyi phyir / / de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod /
nāsti gantṛgamanayoḥ siddhirityabhiprāyaḥ
# ces gsungs te / / 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gnyis grub pa med de snyam du dgongs pa'o /
atrāha / iha devadatto gantā gacchatīti lokaprasiddham
# 'dir smras pa / / 'di ni 'gro ba po lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya bar ni 'jig rten du grags pa yin no / / de la smra ba po tshig smra'o /
tatra yathā vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate, kartā kriyāṃ karoti, iti prasiddham, evaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate tāṃ gacchatīti na yathoktadoṣaḥ
# byed pa po bya ba byed do zhes ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon pa de 'gro'o zhes bya ba yang yin pas / / ji skad du brjod pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro /
tadapyasat / yasmāt / gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati / yayā gatyā devadatto gantetyabhivyajate, sa gantā san tāṃ tāvanna gacchati, na prāpnoti yadi vā na karotītyarthaḥ / yasmānna gatipūrvo 'sti
# 'di yang yod pa ma yin te gang gi phyir / / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon / / 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min / / 'gro ba gang gis lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya bar mngon par gsal ba de ni 'gro ba por gyur pa de 'gro ba ma yin te / / yin par mi 'gyur ba'am / / byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to / / 'di ltar / / gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med /
gateḥ pūrvo gatipūrvaḥ
# de'i 'gro ba'i snga rol ni de 'gro ba'i sngon rol lo /
yadi gantā gateḥ pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa tāṃ gacchet
# gal te 'gro ba'i snga rol du 'gro ba po grub par 'gyur na ni / / de der 'gro bar 'gyur ba zhig go /
katham yasmāt / kaścitkiṃciddhi gacchati / kaściddevadattaḥ kiṃcidarthāntarabhūtaṃ grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā gacchatīti dṛṣṭam
# ji ltar zhe na / / gang gi phyir gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur / / lha sbyin gang zhig don gzhan du gyur pa'i grong ngam / / grong khyer gang zhig tu 'gro bar mthong ba yin na /
na caivaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyucyate, tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ siddharūpo gatinirapekṣo gantā nāma asti yastāṃ gacchet / atha manyase
# de bzhin du 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes brjod pa de'i snga rol du gang zhig de 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'gro ba la mi ltos pa'i 'gro ba po zhes bya ba ni yod pa yang ma yin no /
yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate, tāmeva asau na gacchati, kiṃ tahi tato 'nyāmiti
# ci ste 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes mngon pa de nyid ni 'dir 'gro ba ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / de las gzhan 'gro'o snyam du sems na /
etadapyasat / yasmāt / gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati
# 'di yang yod pa ma yin te / / gang gi phyir / / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon / / de las gzhan pa de 'gro min /
gatī dve nopapadyete yasmādeke pragacchati
# gang phyir 'gro po gcig po la / / 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do /
yayā gatyā gantā abhivyajyate, tato 'nyāmapi sa gantā san na gacchati, gatidvayaprasaṅgāt
# 'gro ba por gyur pa de ni 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon pa de las gzhan yang 'gro ba ma yin te / / 'gro ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yayā gatyā gantā abhivyajyate, gantā san yāṃ cāparāṃ gacchatītyetad gatidvayaṃ prasaktam
# 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba por mngon par gsal ba dang 'gro ba por gyur nas gzhan gang zhig 'gro'o zhes bya ba ste / / 'gro ba 'di gnyis su thal bar 'gyur na /
na ca ekasmin gantari gatidvayam
# 'gro ba po gcig la 'gro ba gnyis kyang med pas 'di ni mi rigs so /
ityuktametat / etena vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate kartā kriyāṃ karoti, iti pratyuktam
# 'dis ni smra ba po tshig smra'o zhes pa dang byed pa po bya ba byed do zhes bya ba yang bsal ba yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar /
tadevam / sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati
# 'gro bo yin par gyur ba ni / / 'gro rnams gsum du 'gro mi byed / / ma yin par ni gyur de yang /
nāsadbhūto 'pi gamanaṃ triprakāraṃ sa gacchati
# 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed / / yin dang ma yin gyur pa yang /
gamanaṃ sadasadbhūtastriprakāraṃ na gacchati / tatra gamyata iti gamanamihocyate
# 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed / / de la 'dir 'gro bar bya ba nas 'gro ba zhes bya'o / / de la 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni /
tatra sadbhūto gantā yo gamikriyāyuktaḥ / asadbhūto gantā yo gamikriyārahitaḥ
# gang zhig 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'o / / 'gro ba po ma yin par gyur pa ni 'gro ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'o /
sadasadbhūto ya ubhayapakṣīyarūpaḥ / evaṃ gamanamapi triprakāraṃ gamikriyāsaṃbandhena veditavyam
# yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo gang yin pa'o / / de bzhin du 'gro ba yang 'gro ba'i bya ba dang 'brel ba'i sgo nas rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o /
tatra sadbhūto gantā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati / etacca karmakārakaparīkṣāyāmākhyāsyate
# de la 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni yin par gyur pa dang ma yin par gyur pa dang yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de / / 'di yang las dang byed pa brtag pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro /
evamasadbhūto 'pi gantā triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati
# de bzhin du 'gro ba po ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed la /
sadasadbhūto 'pīti tatraiva pratipādayiṣyati / yataścaivaṃ gantṛgantavyagamanāni vicāryamāṇāni na santi, / tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate
# yin pa dang ma yin par gyur par yang mi byed do zhes de nyid las ston par 'gyur ro / / gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par dpyad na / / 'gro ba po dang bgrod pa dang 'gro ba rnams yod pa ma yin pa / / de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang / / bgrod par bya ba yod ma yin / / zhes bya'o /
yathoktamāryākṣayamatinirdeśasūtre
# ji skad du / / 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
agatiriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃkarṣaṇapadametat / gatiriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra niṣkarṣaṇapadametat
# btsun pa shvar dva ti'i bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba de ni bsdu ba'i tshig go / / btsun pa shvar dva ti'i bu 'gro ba zhes bya ba de ni bsal ba'i tshig go /
yatra na saṃkarṣaṇapadaṃ na niṣkarṣaṇapadaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ padam / apadayogena anāgatiragatiścāryāṇāṃ gatiriti / yadi bījamevāṅkure saṃkramati, bījameva tatsyānna yadaṅkuraḥ śāśvatadoṣaprasaṅgaśca / athāṅkuro 'nyata āgacchati, ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ syāt
# gang la bsdu ba'i tshig med pa dang bsal ba'i tshig med pa de la 'ong ba yang med / / 'gro ba yang med do / / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa ni / / 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / gal te sa bon nyid myu gur 'pho ba yin na ni de sa bon nyid yin gyi myu gu ma yin pa dang rtag pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro / / 'on te myu gu gzhan nas 'ong na ni rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur na /
na cāhetukasyotpattiḥ kharaviṣāṇasyeva
# rgyu med pa ni skye ba yang ma yin te / / bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
ata evāha bhagavān / bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro / na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā / iti / mudrātpratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate
# de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te / / sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min / / de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te / / de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do / / zhes bya ba dang rgya las rgya'i 'bur ni snang mod kyi / / rgya de 'phos par dmigs pa'ang yod ma yin /
na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ / iti ca / tathā / ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ alaṃkṛtam
# de la de med gzhan la ma yin te / / de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med / / ces bya ba dang me long ngos dang 'bru mar snod rnams la / / bud med kha bzhin brgyan pas bltas pa na; /
so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo
# byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas / / 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang shin tu rgyug /
mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate / mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān
# bzhin ni der yang 'pho ba ma yin te / / gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang bzhin mi rnyed / / rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags bskyed pa ltar / / chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis / / zhes gsungs so /
tathā [āryasamādhirājasūtre 'pi]
# ji skad du / / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /
tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram / supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate / na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ
# de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi / / rgyal ba de ni ting nge 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad / / srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste / / 'di la su yang mi skye 'chi ba med / / sems can mi dang srog kyang mi rnyed de / / chos 'di rnams ni dbu ba chu shing 'dra /
māyopamā gaganavidyusamā dakacandrasaṃnibha marīcisamāḥ
# sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste / / chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin /
na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā
# mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni / / 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang /
na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato
# las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za / / 'khor ba na yang dkar nag 'bras bu smin /
na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ
# rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te / / las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med /
na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate / na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ / na ca dṛṣṭa sthānagatiśuddhiriho na ca satvacāra supaśāntagati
# de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min / / gzhan gyis byas pa tshol bar gyur pa'ang med / / 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med / / thams cad yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min / / 'di ni lha gnas 'jug pa dag pa min / / sems can spyod pa rab zhi 'jug pa med /
supinopamaṃ hi tribhavaṃ vaśikaṃ laghu bhagnamanityena māyasamam
# srid gsum rmi lam dang 'dra snying po med / / myur du 'jig cing mi rtag sgyu ma bzhin /
na ca āgataṃ na ca ihopagataṃ śūnyānimitta sada saṃtatiyo
# 'ong ba med cing 'di nas 'gro ba'ang med / / rgyun rnams rtag tu stong zhing mtshan ma med /
anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā
# bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni / / skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas /
bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāna iyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā
# stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs / / 'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog gyur ba'i mchog /
varaśukladharmaguṇasaṃnicayo guṇajñānadhāraṇibalaṃ paramam
# dkar po'i chos mchog yon tan bsags pa ste / / yon tan ye shes gzungs dang stobs mchog dang / / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i mchog /
ṛddhīvikurvaṇavidhiḥ paramo varapañcabhijñapratilābhanayaḥ
# mngon shes mchog lnga thob pa dam pa'i tshul / / zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
iti vistaraḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau gatāgataparīkṣā nāma dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam / cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam
# de bzhin du / / tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong / / gang nas lhags / / de dag gis smras pa / / btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba brtag pa zhes bya ba ste / / rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha / yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate, tathāpi pravacanasiddhayapekṣayā draṣṭṭadraṣṭavyadarśanādīnāmastitvamāstheyam / tathā cābhidharme ucyate / darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po dang bgrod pa yod pa ma yin mod kyi / / de lta na yang gsung rab las rab tu grub pa la ltos nas lta ba po dang blta bar bya ba dang lta ba la sogs pa rnams yod par khas blang dgos so / / de skad du yang / / chos mngon pa las / / lta dang nyan dang snom pa dang / / myong bar byed dang reg byed yid /
indriyāṇi ṣaḍeteṣāṃ draṣṭavyādīni gocaraḥ / tasmātsanti darśanādīni svabhāvata iti
# dbang po drug ste de dag gi / / spyod yul blta bar bya la sogs / / zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa yin no /
ucyate / na santi / iha hi paśyatīti darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, tasya ca rūpaṃ viṣayatvenopadiśyate
# yod pa ma yin te / / 'dir mig ni lta bas na lta bar byed pa yin la / / gzugs ni de'i yul nyid yin par nye bar bstan to /
yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha / svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati
# ji ltar lta ba gzugs la mi lta ba de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / / lta de rang gi bdag nyid ni / / de la lta ba ma yin nyid /
na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān / tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt
# gang zhig bdag la mi lta ba / / de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta / / de la lta ba de rang gi bdag nyid la lta ba ma yin pa nyid de / / rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
tataśca svātmādarśanācchrotrādivannīlādikaṃ na paśyati
# de'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid la mi lta ba'i phyir rna ba la sogs pa bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa la'ang mi lta bar 'gyur ro /
tasmānnāsti darśanam / yadyapi svātmānaṃ darśanaṃ na paśyati, tathāṣyagnivat parān drakṣyati
# de'i phyir lta ba yod pa ma yin no / / gal te yang lta ba rang gi bdag nyid la mi lta mod kyi / / de lta na yang gzhan la lta ba yin te me bzhin no /
tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam, evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti
# 'di ltar me ni gzhan gyi bdag nyid kho na sreg par byed kyi / / rang gi bdag nyid ni ma yin no / / de bzhin du lta ba yang gzhan kho na la lta'i /
etadatyayuktam / yasmāt / na paryāpto 'gnidṛṣṭānto darśanasya prasiddhaye / yo 'yamagnidṛṣṭānto darśanasya prasiddhaye bhavatopanyastaḥ, sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ
# rang gi bdag nyid ni ma yin no zhe na / / 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te gang gi phyir / / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir / / me yi dpes ni nus ma yin / / lta ba rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis me'i dpe nye bar bkod pa gang yin pa des ni nus pa ma yin te / / mi chog pa dang mthu med pa dang mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to /
yasmāt / sadarśanaḥ sa pratyukto gamyamānagatāgataiḥ / saha darśanena vartata iti sadarśanaḥ / yo 'yamagnidṛṣṭānto darśanaprasiddhaye bhavatopanyastaḥ, so 'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ / kena punarityāha
# gang gi phyir / / song dang ma song bgom pa yis / / de ni ltar bcas lan btab po / / lta ba dang lhan cig gnas pas ni ltar bcas so / / khyod kyis lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir me'i dpe bstan pa gang yin pa de yang dngos kyi don lta ba dang lhan cig lan btab po ste sun phyung ba yin no / / gang gis she na / / song dang ma song bgom pa yis / / zhes gsungs te / / gang gi phyir ji ltar song ba la mi 'gro zhing /
gamyamānagatāgataiḥ / yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam, evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam / yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate, evam / na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate / dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavinirmuktaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ na dṛśyate / ityādi vācyam / yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam, evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam / evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam, ato 'gnivad  darśanasiddhiriti na yujyate
# ma song ba la yang ma yin la / / bgom pa la ma yin pa de bzhin du / / mes kyang bsregs pa la mi sreg la / / ma bsregs pa la yang mi sreg go zhes bya ba la sogs pas mtshungs pa brjod par bya'o / / yang ji ltar song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa la mi 'gro ba de bzhin du / / re zhig bltas la mi lta ste / / ma bltas pa la'ang lta ba min / / bltas dang ma bltas ma gtogs par / / lta bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o / / ji ltar / / re zhig 'gro po mi 'gro ste / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de bzhin du / / re zhig sreg po mi sreg ste / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya zhing / / re zhig lta po mi lta ste / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas me'i dpe dang lhan cig tu song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa dag dang sun dbyung ba mtshungs pa de'i phyir me bzhin du lta ba grub po zhes bya ba mi rigs so /
tataśca siddhametat / svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti / yadaivaṃ tadā / nāpaśyamānaṃ bhavati yadā kiṃcana darśanam
# de'i phyir lta ba rang gi bdag nyid bzhin du gzhan dag la yang lta ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di grub pa ma yin no / / gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe / / gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba / / lta bar byed pa ma yin no /
darśanaṃ paśyatītyevaṃ kathametattu yujyate / yadā caivamapaśyanna kiṃciddarśanaṃ bhavati, tadānīmapaśyato darśanātvāyogāt stambhādivat, paśyatīti darśanamiti vyapadeśo na yujyate / yadyapi darśanaśabdādanantaraṃ ślokabandhānurodhena darśana paśyatīti pāṭhaḥ, tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam / kiṃ cānyat / iha paśyatīti darśanamityucyamāne darśanakriyayā darśanasvabhāvasya vā cakṣuṣaḥ saṃbandhaḥ parikalpyeta, adarśanasvabhāvasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha / paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam / darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca
# lta bas lta bar byed ces byar / / de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur / / gang gi tshe di ltar cung zad kyang mi lta bas lta bar byed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe mi lta ba lta bar byed pa nyid mi rigs pa'i phyir lta bas na / / lta bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa mi rigs te / / ka ba la sogs pa bzhin no / / gal te yang tshigs su bcad pa sdeb pa'i ngor lta bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i mjug thogs su / / lta byed lta bas yin zhes byar / / zhes bya bar 'don mod kyi de lta na yang 'chad pa'i dus su / / lta bas lta bar byed ces byar / / de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur / / zhes gdon par bya'o / / gzhan yang 'dir lta bas na lta bas na lta bar byed pa'o zhes brjod pa ni lta ba'i bya ba dang mi lta ba'i rang bzhin can zhig gam / / lta ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa zhig 'brel bar rtog grang / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa / / lta ba lta nyid ma yin te / / lta ba min pa mi lta nyid / / re zhig lta ba'i rang bzhin can lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa ni yang lta bas na zhes bya ba dang 'brel bar mi 'thad de / / lta ba'i bya ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang lta bar byed pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro /
adarśanamapi na paśyati darśanakriyārahitatvādaṅgūlyagravadityābhiprāyaḥ / yadā / paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam / tadā / darśanaṃ paśyatītyevaṃ kathametattu yujyate / ityanenaiva saṃbandhaḥ / ye tu manyante / nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti, naiva kiṃcit, kaścidviṣayaṃ paśyati kriyāyā abhāvāt, tasmāddarśanaṃ na paśyatīti siddhametatprasādhyata iti / atrocyate / yadi kriyā vyavahārāṅgabhūtā na syāt, tadā dharmamātramapi na syāt, kriyāvirahitatvāt, khapuṣpavaditi kutaḥ kriyārahitaṃ dharmamātraṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmādyadi vyavahārasatyaṃ dharmamātravat kriyāpyabhyupagamyatām
# lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa yang mi lta ste / / lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir sor mo'i rtse mo bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o / / gang gi tshe de ltar / / lta ba lta nyid ma yin te / / lta ba yin pa min lta nyid / / yin pa de'i tshe / / lta bas lta bar byed ces byar / / de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba 'di nyid dang sbyar bar bya'o / / kha cig skye bzhin par 'gyur ba chos tsam po 'di ni bya ba med par skye bas 'gag kyang yul cung zad kyang mi lta ste / / bya ba med pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir lta ba mi lta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no snyam du sems so / / 'di la brjod par bya ste / / gal te tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i bya ba med na ni / / de'i tshe chos tsam po yang med par 'gyur te / / bya ba dang bral pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no / / des na bya ba dang bral ba'i chos tsam du go ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir gal te tha snyad kyi bden pa yin na ni chos tsam po bzhin du bya ba yang khas long la /
atha tattvacintā, tadā kriyāvad dharmamātramapi nāstīti bhavatābhyupagamyatām
# 'on te de kho na nyid sems na ni bya ba bzhin du chos tsam po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes khas blang bar bya'o /
yathoktaṃ śatake
# ji skad du brgya pa las /
kriyāvān śāśvato nāsti nāsti sarvagate kriyā / niṣkriyo nāstinā tulyo nairātmyaṃ kiṃ na te priyam
# bya ba dang ldan rtag pa nyid / / kun tu 'gro la bya ba med / / bya ba med pa med dang mtshungs / / bdag med la khyod cis mi dga' /
iti / tasmānnāyaṃ vidhirbādhakaḥ parasya, nāpyasmākaṃ siddhasādhanadoṣaḥ
# zhes bshad do / / de'i phyir gzhan gyi tshul 'di gnod par byed pa ma yin la / / kho bo cag la grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon du yang mi 'gyur ro /
atrāha / naiva hi paśyatīti darśanamiti kartṛsādhanamabhyupagamyate, kiṃ tarhi paśyatyanenetī darśanamiti karaṇasādhanam, tataśca uktadoṣāprasaṅgaḥ / yaścānena darśanena karaṇabhūtena paśyati, sa draṣṭā, eṣa ca vidyate vijñānamātmā vā, kartṛsadbhāvācca darśanamapi siddhamiti / ucyate / vyākhyāto darśanenaiva draṣṭā cāpyupagamyatām
# 'dir smras pa / / lta bas na lta bar byed pa'o zhes byed pa po sgrub pa ni khas mi len gyi / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'dir lta bar byed pas na lta ba'o zhes byed pa sgrub pa yin te / / des na ji skad smras pa'i skyon du thal bar mi 'gyur ro / / gang zhig byed par gyur ba'i lta ba 'dis lta bar byed pa de ni lta ba po yin la / / 'di yang rnam par shes pa'am bdag yin yang rung ste yod pa nyid do / / byed pa po yod pa las kyang lta ba grub pa yin no / / brjod par bya ste / / lta ba nyid kyis lta ba po'ang / / rnam par bshad par shes par bya / / de la ji ltar /
yathā svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hītyādinā dūṣaṇamuktam, evaṃ draṣṭurapi darśanavaddūṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
# lta de rang gi bdag nyid ni / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas lta ba la sun 'byin par brjod pa de bzhin du lta ba po yang sun 'byin pa lta ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
tadyathā / svamātmānaṃ naiva draṣṭā darśanena vipaśyati / na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān / ityādi vācyam / tasmāddarśanavad draṣṭāpi nāstīti siddham
# 'di lta ste / / lta po rang gi bdag nyid ni / / lta bas lta ba ma yin nyid / / gang zhig bdag la mi lta ba / / de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod par bya ste / / de'i phyir lta ba bzhin du lta ba po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
atrāha / vidyata eva draṣṭā tatkarmakaraṇasadbhāvāt
# 'dir smras pa / / lta ba po ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i las dang byed pa yod pa'i phyir /
iha yannāsti iti, na tasya karmakaraṇe vidyete tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ / asti ca draṣṭuḥ karaṇaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ca karma
# 'dir gang med pa de la ni las dang byed pa med de / / dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no / / byed pa po la ni byed pa lta ba dang blta bar bya ba las kyang yod pa yin te /
tasmācchettṛvadvidyamānakarmakaraṇo vidyata eva draṣṭeti / ucyate / naiva hi draṣṭavyadarśane vidyete, tatkuto draṣṭā syāt? draṣṭusāpekṣe hi draṣṭavyadarśane / sa ca nirūttyamāṇaḥ / tiraskṛtya draṣṭā nāstyatiraskṛtya ca darśanam
# de'i phyir gcod pa po bzhin du las dang byed pa po yod pa'i phyir lta ba po yod pa nyid do / / brjod par bya ste / / blta bar bya ba dang lta ba ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid de / / de'i phyir lta ba po yod par ga la 'gyur / / blta bar bya ba dang lta ba ni lta ba po la ltos pa yin la / / de yang nges par dpyad pa na / / ma spangs lta po yod min te / / lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo /
iha draṣṭā nāma yadi kaścitsyāt, sa darśanasāpekṣo vā syānnirapekṣo vā
# 'dir lta ba po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni de lta ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa'am / / ltos pa med pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
tatra yadi darśanasāpekṣo 'tiraskṛtya darśanamiṣyate, tadā siddhasya vā darśanāpekṣā syādasiddhasya vā
# de la gal te lta ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa ma spangs pa'i lta ba po 'dod na ni / / de'i tshe grub pa zhig gam ma grub pa zhig lta ba la ltos par 'gyur ba zhig na /
tatra siddho draṣṭā na hi darśanamapekṣate
# de la grub pa'i lta ba po ni lta ba la ltos pa ma yin te /
kiṃ siddhasya sato draṣṭuḥ punardarśanāpek ṣā kuryāt? na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyata iti
# grub par gyur nas lta ba po yang lta ba la ltos pas ci zhig byed / / grub pa ni slar yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no /
athāsiddho 'pekṣeta, asiddhatvādvandhyāsutavaddarśanaṃ nāpekṣate
# ci ste ma grub pa'i lta ba po lta ba la ltos so zhe na / / ma grub pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du lta ba la ltos pa med do /
evaṃ tāvadatiraskṛtya darśanamapekṣya draṣṭā nāsti
# de ltar re zhig ma spangs pa ste lta ba la ltos nas lta ba por gyur pa med pa yin no /
tiraskṛtyāpi, darśananirapekṣatvāt ityuktaṃ prāk / tadevaṃ tiraskṛtyātiraskṛtya vā darśanaṃ yadā draṣṭā nāsti, tadā
# lta ba po lta ba spangs par gyur pa yang mi 'grub ste / / lta ba la ltos pa med pa'i phyir te sngar bshad pa yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar gang gi tshe lta ba spangs pa dang ma spangs pa'i lta ba po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ / draṣṭaryasati nirhetuke draṣṭavyadarśane na saṃbhavataḥ iti kutastatsadbhāvād draṣṭā prasetsyati?
# lta bo med na blta bya dang / / lta ba de dag ga la yod / / lta ba po med na rgyu med pa'i blta bya dang lta bdag ni srid pas de dag yod pa las lta ba po grub par ga la 'gyur /
atrāha / vidyete eva draṣṭavyadarśane, tatkāryasadbhāvāt / tatra / pratītya mātāpitarau yathoktaḥ putrasaṃbhavaḥ
# 'dir smras pa / / blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dag ni yod pa nyid de / / de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro / / de la ji ltar pha dang ma dag la / / brten nas bu ni 'byung bshad pa /
cakṣūrūpe pratītyaivamukto vijñānasaṃbhavaḥ
# de bzhin mig dang gzugs brten nas / / rnam par shes pa 'byung bar bshad /
iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate / trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātātsāsravasparśaḥ, sparśasahajā vedanā, tatpratyayā tṛṣṇeti
# ces bya ba la / / blta bar bya ba dang lta ba la brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung la / / gsum 'dus par gyur pa las reg pa zag pa dang bcas pa 'byung zhes / / reg pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni tshor ba yin la / / de'i rkyen gyis srid pa yin no /
evaṃ catvāryapi bhavāṅgāni draṣṭavyadarśanahetukāni vidyante
# de ltar na srid pa'i yan lag bzhi po blta bar bya ba dang lta ba'i rgyu can dag ni yod pa yin te /
tasmātkāryasadbhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane vidyete iti / ucyate / syātāmete, yadi vijñānādicatuṣṭayameva syāt / yasmāt
# de'i phyir / / de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis yod do / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po nyid yod na / / de gnyis yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin te /
draṣṭavyadarśanābhāvādvijñānādicatuṣṭayam
# 'di ltar blta bya lta ba med pa'i phyir / / rnam par shes la sogs pa bzhi /
nāstīti / iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam
# yod min / / 'dir lta ba po med pas blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis kyang med do zhes bshad zin to /
ataḥ kuto vijñānādicatuṣṭayaṃ vijñānasparśavedanātṛṣṇākhyam? tasmānna santi vijñānādīni
# de'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams med do /
atrāha / santyevatāni tatkāryasadbhāvāt / iha tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamityādinā upādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇādikaṃ vijñānādicatuṣṭayādutpadyate, tasmātsanti vijñānādīni tatkāryasadbhāvāt
# 'dir smras pa / / de dag ni yod pa nyid de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi las skye ste / / de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag yod de de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro /
ucyate / syurupādānādīni yadi vijñānādicatuṣṭayameva syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod na ni len pa la sogs pa dag yod par 'gyur na /
yadā tu draṣṭavyadarśanābhāvādvijñānādicatuṣṭayaṃ naivāsti, tadā
# gang gi tshe blta bar bya ba dang lta ba med pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
upādānādīni bhaviṣyanti punaḥ katham / na santyupādānādīnītyarthaḥ
# nye bar len la sogs / / ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur / / nye bar len pa la sogs pa rnams yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
idānīṃ darśanavaccheṣāyatanavyākhyānātideśārthamāha / vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ
# da ni dbang po lhag ma rnams kyi rnam par bshad pa lta ba dang 'dra bar bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir / / lta bas nyan dang snom pa dang / / myong bar byed dang reg byed yid /
darśanenaiva jānīyācchrotṛśrotavyakādi ca / iti / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā / na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca
# nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs / / rnam par bshad par shes par bya / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing / / yid kyis chos rnams mi shes te /
etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate
# gang du 'jig rten mi 'jug pa / / 'di ni bden pa'i mchog yin no /
sāmagryā darśanaṃ yatra prakāśayati nāyakaḥ
# gang du rkyen tshogs pas mthong ba / / 'dren pa rab tu ston mdzad pa'i /
prāhopacārabhūmiṃ tāṃ paramārthasya buddhimān / iti / tathā / cakṣuśca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣuvijñānamihopajāyate
# sa de don dam 'dzin pa ni / / nye bar brtags par chub par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni / / mig gi rnam shes 'dir skye yang /
no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi
# gzugs ni mig la brten ma yin / / gzugs ni mig las 'pho ba'ang min /
nairātmya 'śubhāśca dharmime teṣvātmeti śubhāśca kalpitāḥ / viparītamasadvikalpitaṃ cakṣuvijñāna tato 'pi jāyate
# bdag med mi sdug chos 'di dag / / slar yang bdag dang sdug ces brtags / / med la log par brtags pa ste / / de las mig gi rnam shes 'byung /
vijñānanirodhasaṃbhavaṃ vijñānaupādavayaṃ vipaśyati
# rnam shes 'gag dang 'byung ba las / / rnam shes zad dang 'phel bar 'thong [*'thod?] /
na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati
# 'gar yang 'gro 'ong med stong dang / / sgyu 'drar rnal 'byor pa yis mthong / / zhes gsungs so /
tathācāryopālipṛcchāyām / sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam
# de bzhin du 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang / / mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong 'gyur te / / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang /
naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ
# mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur / / de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin /
ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣū rūpa manoramacitraviśiṣṭam
# mig ni snang la brten te yid 'ong dang / / yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas /
yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci / yo 'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so 'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ / saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ
# de ltar snang la brten te mthong bas na / / de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med / / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grag gang yin pa / / de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med / / der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te / / rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams 'byung ba yin /
iti / tathā / gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnopamā hi ratayo 'budhamohanāśca
# zhes gsungs so / / de bzhin du / / glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgra yang gzung bya min / / rmi lam lta bu mi mkhas rmongs dang chags pa'i rgyu /
saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā 'tra nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi
# mi mkhas kun du rtog la zhen rnams brlag 'gyur zhing / / skye bo byis pa nyon mongs bran bzhin bdag gyur tam /
iti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam / skandhaparīkṣā caturtha prakaraṇam / atrāha / yadyevaṃ cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi na santi, na skandhāḥ, apratiṣedhāt tadantargatāni cendriyāṇi, atastānyapi bhaviṣyantīti / ucyate / syureva, yadi skandhāḥ syuḥ tatra rūpaskandhamadhikṛtyāha / rūpakāraṇanirmuktaṃ na rūpamupalabhyate
# zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / dbang po brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar dbang po rnams med na / / phung po lnga ma bkag pa'i phyir dang dbang po rnams kyang de'i khongs su 'dus pa de'i phyir de rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te phung po rnams yod na de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na de rnams ni med do / / de la gzugs kyi phung po'i dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa / / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par / / gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
rūpeṇāpi na nirmuktaṃ dṛśyate rūpakāraṇam
# gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par / / gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo /
tatra rūpaṃ bhautikam
# de la gzugs ni 'byung ba las gyur pa'o /
tasya kāraṇaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni
# de'i rgyu ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o /
tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ / rūpeṇāpi na nirmuktaṃ rūpātpṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpakāraṇamupalabhyate / tadetatpratijñādvayaṃ prasādhayitukāma āha / rūpakāraṇanirmukte rūpe rūpaṃ prasajyate
# de dag las tha dad cing gzhan du gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs ni bum pa las snam bu ltar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro / / gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par te / / gzugs las gzhan du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro / / dam bca' ba 'di gnyis sgrub par bzhed nas bshad pa / / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par / / gzugs na gzugs ni rgyu med par /
āhetukaṃ, na cāstyarthaḥ kaścidāhetukaḥ kvacit
# thal bar 'gyur te don gang yang / / rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med /
yathā ghaṭādarthāntarabhūtaḥ paṭo na ghaṭahetukaḥ, evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt
# ji ltar bum pa las don gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu bum pa'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du / / gzugs kyi rgyu 'byung ba chen po las tha dad par gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs 'dod na yang 'byung ba'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur te / / rgyu med pa can du 'gyur na /
na cāstyarthaḥ kaścidāhetukaḥ kvacit
# don gang zhig rgyu med pa ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasmādahetukatvadoṣaprasaṅgānna rūpakāraṇanirmuktaṃ rūpamabhyupetavyamiti
# de'i phyir rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na gzugs kyi rgyu las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no /
idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha
# de ni gzugs las ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
rūpeṇa tu vinirmuktaṃ yadi syādrūpakāraṇam / yadi kāryarūpavinirmuktaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ syāt, tadā, yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati, evaṃ kāryātpṛthagbhūtaṃ kāraṇamiṣyamāṇam / akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt / nirhetukaṃ syāt / kāraṇasya hi kāraṇatve kāryapravṛttirhetuḥ, kāryanirapekṣācca kāraṇāt pṛthaksiddhā nāsti kāryapravṛttiḥ / yaccākāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tannirhetukatvānnaroragaturagaviṣāṇavannāstyevetyāha / nāstyakāryaṃ ca kāraṇam / iti / atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate 'sati vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata ityāha
