# skye ba yang med pa de'i phyir na dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas blangs pa na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir khyod kho nas rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du khas blangs pa na / / rnam pa thams cad du dngos po rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo / / sus chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i lung las na chos dang sangs rgyas mthong ba la yang gnod par byas par 'gyur ro /
mayā tu yatpratītya bījākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhavatyaṅkurākhyaṃ kāryam, tacca ubhayamapi śāntaṃ svabhāvavirahitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ pratipādayatā sarvathā bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pratītyasamutpattimātā dyotitā bhavati
# kho bos ni sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu gang zhig la brten nas myu gu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung la / / de gnyi ga yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhi ba rang bzhin dang bral par ston pa na / / rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro /
yata evam / tasmādutpadyamānaṃ ca śāntamutpattireva ca
# gang gi phyir de lta yin pa / / de'i phyir skye bzhin nyid dang ni / / skye ba yang ni zhi ba nyid /
iti sphuṭamavasīyatām / atrāha / yaduktam / utpadyamānamutpattāvidaṃ na kramate yadā
# ces bya bar gsal bar nges par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gang tshe skye ba yod pa na / / skye bzhin 'di 'byung med pa'i tshe /
kathamutpadyamānaṃ tu pratītyotpattimucyate
# ji ltar skye la brten nas ni / / skye bzhin zhes ni brjod par bya /
iti, tadayuktam / yasmādidamutpadyamānamityeva saṃbhavati
# zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin te / / gang gi phyir skye bzhin pa 'di zhes bya ba de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
tathā hi ghaṭotpattiṃ pratītya ghaṭa utpadyamāno bhavati, taṃ ca utpadyamānamutpāda utpādayatītyucyate / etadapyayuktam
# bum pa'i skye ba la brten nas bum pa skye bzhin par 'gyur la / / skye bzhin pa de yang skye bas skyed par byed do zhe na / / brjod pa 'di yang mi rigs te /
yasmāt / yadi kaścidanutpanno bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit / utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati / yadi kaścidanutpannaḥ utpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāma kvacitsaṃvidyeta, sa utpattikriyāṃ pratītyotpadyeta na caivaṃ kaścidutpādātpūrvaṃ kvacidasti
# gang gi phyir / / gal te dngos po ma skyes pa / / 'ga' zhig gang na yod gyur na / / de ni skye 'gyur dngos po de / / med na ci zhig skye bar 'gyur / / gal te skye ba'i sngon rol na bum pa zhes bya ba ma skyes pa 'ga' zhig gang zhig yod na ni / / de skye ba'i bya ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na / / de lta bu ni cung zad kyang skye ba'i sngon rol na gang na yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasminnasati ghaṭe kimutpadyate?
# bum pa de med na yang ci zhig skye bar 'gyur /
atha syāt / yadyutpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāsti, tathāpi utpannaḥ san ghaṭasaṃjñāṃ pratilapsyate, tadbhāvinyā saṃjñayā na doṣa iti
# ci ste skye ba'i snga rol na bum pa med mod kyi / / de lta na yang skyes par gyur nas bum pa'i ming rnyed par 'gyur te / / de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ming gis nyes pa med do snyam na /
etadapyayuktam / yadi hi utpattikriyā pravarteta, tadā vartamānībhūto bhāvo ghaṭākhyāṃ pratilabheta
# 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te / / gal te skye ba'i bya ba 'jug na ni de'i tshe da ltar bar gyur pa'i dngos pos bum pa'i brjod pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu anāgatabhāvāsaṃbandhena kriyāyā apravṛttiḥ, tadā kuto vartamānatā? atha aghaṭāśrayeṇa kriyā prārabhyeta, tadvaktavyam
# gang gi tshe dngos po ma 'ongs pa dang ma 'brel bas bya ba mi 'jug pa de'i tshe da ltar ba nyid yod par ga la 'gyur / / ci ste bum pa ma yin pa la brten nas bya ba rtsom mo zhe na /
yo 'sau aghaṭaḥ, sa kiṃ bhaviturmahati paṭaḥ, uta naiva kiṃcit? yadi paṭa utpadyamānaḥ sa kathamutpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhaviṣyatīti atha naivaṃ kiṃcit, kathaṃ tadāśrayā kriyā kriyā pravartate? kathaṃ vā sa utpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhavet? iti sarvathā bhāvitatvakalpanāpyayuktā / tasmādutpadyamānamapyutpādo notpādayatiti siddham / api ca / evaṃ na yujyamānāyāmapyutpadyamānasyotpattau bhavato matamabhyupetyocyate / utpadyamānamutpādo yadi cotpādayatyayam / utpādayettamutpādamutpādaḥ katamaḥ punaḥ
# bum pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ci zhig yin par 'os pa de brjod par bya dgos te / / yod ni snam bu'am ci yang ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur grang / / gal te skye bzhin pa'i snam bu yin na ni / / de skyes nas bum par ji ltar 'gyur / / 'on te ci yang ma yin pa zhig yin na ni / / de'i tshe ji ltar de'i rten gyi bya ba 'jug pa 'am / / de skyes nas bum par 'gyur te / / de'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtog pa yang rnam pa thams cad du mi rigs so / / de'i phyir skye bas skye bzhin pa yang skyed par mi byed do zhes bya bar grub bo / / gzhan yang de ltar skye bzhin pa skye bar mi rigs su zin kyang / / khyod kyi lugs khas blangs nas brjod par bya ste / / gal te skye ba de yis ni / / skye bzhin pa ni skyed byed na / / skye ba de ni skye ba lta /
yadyapi utpadyamānaṃ padārthamutpāda utpādayedbhavanmatena, idaṃ tu vaktavyam / tamidānīmutpādaḥ katamo 'paraḥ utpādamutpādayiṣyatīti / atha syāt / utpādasyāpara utpādaḥ utpādakaḥ parikalpyeta, tadā anavasthādoṣaprasaṅga ityāha
# gang zhig gis ni skyed par byed / / gal te yang khyod kyi lugs kyi skye bas dngos po skye bzhin pa skyed par byed pa yin na / / da ni skye ba de skye ba rang ngam gzhan gang gis bskyed par 'gyur ba 'di ni brjod par bya dgos so / / ci ste skye ba 'di'i skyed par byed pa / / skye ba gzhan rtog par 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe thug pa med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
anya utpādatyenaṃ yadyutpādo 'navasthitiḥ / etaccoktam / atha nāsyāpara utpāda iṣyate, nanvevaṃ sati vinā utpādena utpāda utpadyate ityevaṃ prāpnoti
# gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis / / de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba ste / / 'di ni bshad zin to / / 'on te 'di la skye ba gzhan ma 'dod na ni de ltar yin na skye ba med par yang skye ba skye ba yin no zhes bya ba de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
tataśca utpādotpādyānāmapi padārthānāṃ vinaivotpādena utpattirastu bhāvatvādutpādavaditi pratipādayannāha / athānutpāda utpannaḥ sarvamutpadyate tathā
# de'i phyir skye bas bskyed par bya ba'i dngos po rnams kyang / / skye ba med par skye bar 'gyur te dngos po yin pa'i phyir skye bzhin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / ci ste skye ba med skye na / / thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur /
iti / api ca / utpāda ātmānaṃ parāṃścotpādayatītyatra pakṣe dūṣaṇameva na vaktavyamadhunāsmābhiḥ
# zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no / / gzhan yang skye bas rang dang gzhan skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di la da ltar bdag cag gis skyon brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
yasmādatra pakṣe dūṣaṇam / sataśca tāvadutpattirasataśca na yujyate
# gang gi phyir phyogs 'di la sun dbyung ba / / re zhig yod dang med pa yang / / skye bar rigs pa ma yin zhing /
na sataścāsataśceti pūrvamevopapāditam / naivāsato naiva sataḥ pratyayo 'rthasya yujyate
# yod med nyid kyang ma yin zhes / / gong du bstan pa nyid yin no / / yod dam med pa'i don la yang / / rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te /
iti / na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā / ityādinā utpādo niṣiddha eva pūrvam / tataścaivamutpāde niṣiddhe utpadyamānamutpāda utpādayati, svaparātmānau vā utpādayatītyasyāḥ kalpanāyā nāstyevāvatāra iti kuta etatprasetsyati / utpāda utpadyate, utpadyamānamutpadyate, svaparātmānau cotpādayatīti / kiṃ cānyat / ihāyamutpādaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nirudhyamānasya anityatānugatasya vartamānasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyate, anirudhyamānasya vā atītānāgatasyānityatāvirahitasya? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha / nirudhyamānasyotpattirna bhāvasyopapadyate / yaścānirudhyamānastu sa bhāvo nopapadyate / tatra nirudhyamānasya vartamānasya vidyamānatvādutpādo nopapadyate / anirudhyamānasyāpi vināśarahitasya atītānāgatasya bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasya khapuṣpasyeva nāstyutpāda iti
# zhes bya ba dang gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang / / med dang yod med mi 'grub pa / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar skye ba bkag pa yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar skye ba bkag pa yin dang skye bas skye bzhin pa bskyed pa dang rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skyed do zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'di 'jug pa med pa nyid do / / de'i phyir skye ba'i skye ba dang skye bzhin pa skye ba dang rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ga las 'grub par 'gyur / / gzhan yang 'dir skye ba 'di brtags pa na / / dngos po da ltar ba mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa 'gag bzhin pa'am / / 'das pa pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi rtag pa nyid dang bral ba 'gag pa zhig pa ma yin pa zhig la rtog grang na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa / / dngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni / / skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa / / de ni dngos por mi 'thad do / / de la da ltar ba 'gag bzhin pa la ni skye ba 'thad pa ma yin te yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa 'jig pa dang bral ba / / dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa 'gag bzhin ma yin pa la yang nam mkha'i me tog ltar skye ba yod pa ma yin no /
evaṃ bhāvānāmutpādābhāvaṃ pratipādya ataḥ paraṃ sthitirvicāryate
# de ltar re zhig dngos po rnams la skye ba med par bstan nas / / de'i 'og tu gnas pa dpyad par bya'o /
atrāha / vidyata eva bhāvānāmutpādaḥ, tadbhāvabhāvidharmasadbhāvāt / nānutpannasya sthiti saṃbhavatītyutpādabhāvena sthiterbhāvāt / sthitirutpādabhāvabhāvinī bhavati
# 'dir smras pa / / dngos po rnams kyi skye ba ni yod pa nyid de / / de yod na yod pa'i phyir ro / / skye ba med pa la ni gnas pa yod pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir skye ba yod pas gnas pa yod pa'i phyir gnas pa ni skye ba yod pa can du 'gyur ro /
tasmādutpādo 'pyasti, tadbhāvabhāvidharmasadbhāvāt / iha yannāsti, na tadbhāvabhāvidharmasadbhāvaḥ, tadyathā gaganakusumasaurabhyasyeti ucyate
# de'i phyir skye ba yang yod de / / de yod na yod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir gang med par de yod na yod pa'i chos yod pa ni ma yin te / / dper na nam mkha'i me tog gi dri zhim po bzhin no /
syādutpādaḥ, yadi tadbhāvabhāvinī sthitireva syāt / na tvasti / tadevam / na sthitabhāvastiṣṭhatyasthitabhāvo na tiṣṭhati / na tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhamānaḥ ko 'nutpannaśca tiṣṭhati / tatra sthitaṃ na tiṣṭhati tatra sthitikriyānirodhāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te de yod na yod pa'i gnas pa nyid yod na ni / / skye ba yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa ni ma yin te / / 'di ltar / / dngos po gnas pa mi gnas te / / dngos po mi gnas gnas pa yin / / gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te / / ma skyes gang zhig gnas par 'gyur / / de la gnas pa ni mi gnas pa ste / / de la gnas pa bya ba 'gags zin pa'i phyir ro /
asthitabhāvo 'pi na tiṣṭhati sthitirahitatvāt / tiṣṭhamānamapi na tiṣṭhati sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt, sthitāsthitavyatiriktasaṃtiṣṭhamānābhāvācca api ca / ko 'nutpannaśca tiṣṭhati / ihotpādapratiṣedhātko 'sāvanutpannaḥ padārtho yastiṣṭhediti sarvathā nāsti sthitiḥ / api ca / iyaṃ sthitirnirudhyamānasya bhāvasya syādanirudhyamānasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha
# dngos po mi gnas pa yang gnas pa ma yin te gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro / / gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te / / gnas pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang gnas pa dang mi gnas pa las tha dad pa'i gnas bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan yang ma skyes gang zhig gnas par 'gyur te / / 'dir skye ba bkag pa'i phyir gang zhig gnas par 'gyur ba ma skyes pa'i dngos po de gang zhig yod / / de'i phyir gnas pa rnam pa thams cad du med do gzhan yang gnas pa 'di 'gag bzhin pa'am 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa zhig la 'gyur grang / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
sthitirnirudhyamānasya na bhāvasyopapadyate
# dngos po 'gag bzhin pa la ni / / gnas pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
yaścānirudhyamānastu sa bhāvo nopapadyate / nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati
# gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa / / de ni dngos por mi 'thad do / / re zhig dngos po 'gag bzhin pa 'gag pa la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'gal ba gnas pa yod pa ma yin no /
yaścāpyanirudhyamānaḥ sa bhāva eva na bhavati, kutastasya sthitirbhaviṣyati
# gang yang 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa de ni dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur na / / de la gnas pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
api ca / jarasā maraṇena ca sarva eva bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamapi na tyajyante / yadā caitadevam tadā jarāmaraṇavirodhinyāḥ sthiterbhāveṣu pravṛttyavakāśa eva nāstīti pratipādayannāha
# gzhan yang dngos po thams cad ni rga ba dang 'chi bas skad cig tsam yang mi gtong ba yin la / / gang gi tshe 'di de lta bu yin pa de'i tshe dngos po rnams la rga ba dang 'chi ba dag dang 'gal ba'i gnas pa 'jug pa'i sgo nas go skabs nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
jarāmaraṇadharmeṣu sarvabhāveṣu sarvadā
# dngos po thams cad dus kun du / / rga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na /
tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā
# gang dag rga dang 'chi med par / / gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin /
ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt? tasmānnāstyeva sthitirityabhiprāyaḥ
# gang dag la gnas pa yod par 'gyur ba rga ba dang 'chi ba dang bral ba'i dngos po gang zhig yod / / de'i phyir gnas pa med pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
yadi ca, asyāḥ sthiteranyā vā sthitiḥ sthityarthaṃ parikalpyeta, svayaṃ vā svātmānaṃ sthāpayet
# gzhan yang gnas pa 'di la gnas pa'i ched du gnas pa gzhan zhig rtog gam / / rang gis rang gi bdag nyid gnas par byed grang na /
ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha / sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate / utpādasya yathotpādo nātmanā na parātmanā
# gnyi ga ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / gnas pa gnas pa gzhan dang ni / / de nyid kyis kyang gnas mi rigs / / ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni / / gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin bzhin /
'anutpanno 'yamutpādaḥ svātmānaṃ janayetkatham
# skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas / / rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed /
'; ityādinā yathā utpāda ātmānaṃ na janayati ityuktam, evaṃ sthitirapi nātmānaṃ sthāpayatīti vaktavyam
# ces bya ba la sogs pas ji ltar skye bas bdag nyid mi bskyed par bshad pa de ltar / / gnas pas kyang bdag nyid gnas par mi byed par brjod par bya ste /
asthitā sthitireṣā cetsvātmānaṃ sthāpayetkatham
# gnas pa 'di ni mi gnas pas / / rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar gnas /
sthitā cetsthāpayatyeṣā sthitāyāṃ sthāpyate 'tha kim
# gal te gnas pas gnas byed na / / gnas na ci zhig gnas su yod /
iti yojyam / yathā ca / anya utpādayatyenaṃ yadyutpādo 'navasthitiḥ
# ces sbyar bar bya'o / / yang / / gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis / / de bskyed thug pa med par 'gyur / / zhes /
ityutpāde vyākhyātam, evaṃ sthitāvapi vyākhyeyam / athānyā sthāpayatyenāṃ sthitiryadyanavasthitiḥ / iti / evaṃ sthitirapi na yuktā / ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā / asthitā hi ime dharmāḥ sthitiścaiṣāṃ na vidyate / asthitiḥ sthitiśabdena svabhāvena na vidyate / na sthitirnāpi co jātirlokanāthena deśitā
# ji skad du / / skye ba la rnam par bshad pa de bzhin du / / gal te gnas pa gzhan zhig gis / / de gnas thug pa med par 'gyur / / zhes gnas pa la yang brjod par bya'o / / de ltar gnas pa yang mi rigs so / / de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis / / chos 'di dag ni mi gnas te / / 'di dag la ni gnas yod min / / gnas med gnas pa'i smras brjod kyang / / rang gi ngo bos rnyed ma yin / / 'jig rten mgon pos gnas pa dang / / skye ba bstan pa ma yin te /
lokanāthaṃ viditvaivaṃ samādhiṃ tena jānathā
# des na de lta'i 'jig rten mgon / / rigs nas ting 'dzin shes par gyis /
iti / uktaṃ ca āryasacaryagāthāsu
# zhes gsungs so / / de bzhin du 'phags pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las kyang /
ākāśaniśrita samāruta āpakhandho tanniśritā iya mahī pṛthivī jagacca
# mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten / / de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba brten /
sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānamevaṃ ākāśathānu kṛta cittama etamartham / yāvat / sthānammayānu ayu thānu jinena ukto / iti vistaraḥ / atrāha / vidyete eva sthityutpādau tatsahacāridharmasadbhāvāt / iha utpādasthitilakṣaṇasahacāriṇī saṃskṛtānāmanityatāsti
# zhes bya ba nas / / gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs / / zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs so / / 'dir smras pa / / skye ba dang gnas pa dag ni yod pa nyid do / / de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir 'dus byas rnams la skye ba dang gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang lhan cig spyod pa mi rtag pa nyid yod pa yin te /
tasmātsthityutpādāvapi staḥ iti / ucyate / syāta sthityutpādau, yadi anityataiva syāt / na tvasti / kathamiti? yasmāt / nirudhyate nāniruddhaṃ na niruddhaṃ nirudhyate / tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ kimajātaṃ nirudhyate
# de'i phyir skye ba dang gnas pa nyid kyang yod pa yin no / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te mi rtag pa nyid yod na ni / / skye ba dang gnas pa dag kyang yod par 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin no / / ci ltar zhe na / / 'di ltar / / 'gag pa 'gag par mi 'gyur te / / ma 'gags pa yang 'gag mi 'gyur / / 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min / / ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur /
yadi anityateti kācitsyāt, sā niruddhasya bhāvasya aniruddhasya vā nirudhyamānasya vā syāt
# gal te mi rtag pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de dngos po 'gags pa 'am ma 'gags pa 'am / / 'gag bzhin pa zhig la 'gyur ba zhig na /
tatra niruddhaṃ nirudhyate iti na yuktam, atītavartamānayorvirodhāt
# de la 'gags pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni mi rung ste / / 'das pa dang da ltar ba gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
aniruddhamapi na yuktam, nirodhavirahitatvāt, yadaniruddhameva tatkathaṃ nirudhyata iti parasparavirodhācca
# ma 'gags pa la yang mi rigs te / / 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang gang zhig ma 'gags pa ni ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur zhes phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ na nirudhyate ityanena saṃbandhaḥ
# 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min te / / 'gag mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro /
nirudhyamānamapi na nirudhyate nirudhyamānābhāvāt,  nirodhadvayaprasaṅgācca / yataścaivaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu nirodhāsaṃbhavaḥ, tasmānnāstyeva nirodha iti kutastatsahacāristhityutpādasaṃbhavaḥ syāt? api ca
# 'gag bzhin pa yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te / / 'gag bzhin pa med pa'i phyir dang 'gag pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / gang gi phyir de ltar dus gsum kar yang 'gag pa mi srid pa de'i phyir 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pas / / de dang lhan cig rgyu ba'i skye ba dang gnas pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
prāgutpādapratiṣedhādasaṃbhava eva nirodhasyetyāha / kimajātaṃ nirudhyate / iti / api ca / ayaṃ nirodhaḥ sthitasya vā bhāvasya syādasthitasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha
# gzhan yang sngar skye ba bkag pa'i phyir bkag pa yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni / / ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba'o / / gzhan yang / / 'gag pa 'di dngos po gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa zhig la 'gyur grang na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa /
sthitasya tāvadbhāvasya nirodho nopapadyate
# re zhig dngos po gnas pa la / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
sthitasya nirodhaviruddhasya nāsti nirodhaḥ / nāsthitasyāpi bhāvasya nirodha upapadyate
# 'gag pa dang 'gal ba gnas pa la ni 'gag pa yod pa yin no / / dngos po ni gnas pa la yang / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
asthitasya abhāvasya avidyamānasya nirodho nāsti, iti sarvathā nāsti nirodhaḥ / kiṃ cānyat / yadi iha nirodhaḥ syāt, sa tayaivāvasthayā tasyā evāvasthāyāḥ syādanyayā vā anyasyā avasthāyāḥ syāt
# dngos po mi gnas pa yod pa ma yin pa la yang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir 'gag pa rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad do / / gzhan yang / / gal te 'dir 'gag pa zhig tu 'gyur na / / de gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas skabs de nyid la 'am / / gzhan gyis gzhan la 'gyur ba zhig na /
sarvathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha / tayaivāvasthayāvasthā na hi saiva nirudhyate / anyayāvasthayāvasthā na cānyaiva nirudhyate
# rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad de zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / / gnas skabs de yis gnas skabs ni / / de nyid 'gag pa nyid mi 'gyur / / gnas skabs gzhan gyis gnas skabs ni / / gzhan yang 'gag pa nyid mi 'gyur /
tayaiva tāvatkṣīrāvasthayā saiva kṣīrāvasthā na nirudhyate, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt
# re zhig 'o ma'i gnas skabs de nyid kyis 'o ma'i gnas skabs de nyid 'gag par ni mi 'gyur te / / rang gi bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
nāpyanyayā dadhyavasthayā kṣīrāvasthā nirudhyate
# gzhan zho'i gnas skabs kyis kyang 'o ma'i gnas skabs 'gag par mi 'gyur te /
yadi hi kṣīradadhyavasthayoryaugapadyaṃ syāt, syāttayorvināśyavināśakabhāvaḥ
# yong ni 'o ma dang zho'i gnas skabs gnyis dus gcig tu 'gyur na ni / / de gnyis gzhig par bya ba dang 'jig par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tu dadhyavasthāyāṃ kṣīrāvasthā asti / yadā ca nāsti, tadā kāmasatī vināśayet? yadi vināśayet, kharaviṣāṇatīkṣṇatāmapi vināśayet
# zho'i gnas skabs na ni 'o ma'i gnas skabs yod pa ma yin no / / gang gi tshe med pa de'i tshe ni med par 'gyur pa gang zhig 'jig par byed de / / gal te 'jig par byed na ni / / bong bu'i rva'i rno ba nyid kyang rnam par 'jig par byed par 'gyur ba zhig go /
tasmādanyayāpyavasthayā naivānyāvasthā nirudhyate / atrāha / yadyapi tayaivāvasthayā saivāvasthyā, anyayā vā avasthayā anyāvasthā na nirudhyate, tathāpi kṣīrāvasthāyāstāvannirodho 'sti, tataśca utpādo 'pi syāditi
# de'i phyir gnas skabs gzhan gyis kyang gnas skabs gzhan 'gag par 'gyur ba ma yin pa nyid do / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas skabs de nyid dam / / gnas skabs gzhan gyis gnas skabs gzhan 'gag par mi 'gyur mod kyi / / de lta na yang 'o ma'i gnas skabs la ni re zhig 'gag pa yod pa yin no / / de'i phyir skye ba yang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate / aho bata atijaḍatāmātmano bhavān prakaṭayati
# brjod par bya ste / / kye ma ma la khyod ni bdag nyid shin tu blun pa nyid du mngon par byed pa yin te /
nanu ca pūrvoktena nyāyena / yadaivaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmutpādo nopapadyate
# sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis / / gang tshe chos rnams thams cad kyi / / skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ba /
ityuktam, / tadaivaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirodho nopapadyate
# bshad pa / / de tshe chos rnams thams cad kyi / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
iti sphuṭatarameva pratipāditaṃ bhavati / api ca / nirodho nāma yadi kaścit syāt, sa sato vā bhāvasya syādasato vā / tatra
# zhes ches gsal ba nyid du bstan par 'gyur ba ma yin nam / / gzhan yang / / gal te 'gag pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de dngos po yod pa 'am med pa zhig la 'gyur grang / / de la /
sataśca tāvadbhāvasya nirodho nopapadyate
# re zhig dngos po yod pa la / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
svabhāvādapracyutasya bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ / yasmāt / ekatve na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate / nirodho hi nāma abhāvaḥ / sa yasya bhavati, sa naiva bhavati / tataśca sato bhāvasya nirodha iti bruvatā bhāvābhāvayorekādhikaraṇatā abhyupagatā bhavati
# dngos po yod pa rang bzhin las ma nyams pa la ni 'gag pa mi rigs te / / gang gi phyir / / gcig nyid na ni dngos po dang / / dngos po med par 'thad pa med / / dngos po gang zhig la 'gag pa zhes bya ba dngos po med pa de / / yod pa de ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir dngos po yod pa la 'gag pa yod par smra ba na / / dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis gzhi gcig pa nyid du khas blangs bar 'gyur la /
ekatve sati ubhayaṃ na yujyate / yadi tadānīṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā nirodhenābhāvenāveśādbhāvavyapadeśo 'yuktaḥ / atha abhāvaḥ, so 'pyasya na yujyate, abhāvavirodhinā bhāvarūpeṇāviyogāt / tasmādekatve sati bhāvābhāvayoḥ sa padārtho naiva bhāvo nāpyabhāva iti yujyate
# gcig nyid yin na ni gnyi ga mi rigs te / / da lta gal te dngos po yin na ni de'i tshe 'gag pa dngos po med pas zin pa'i phyir / / dngos por bsnyad pa mi rigs so / / 'on te dngos po med pa yin na / / de yang 'di la mi rigs te / / dngos po med pa dang 'gal ba dngos po nyid dang bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gcig nyid yin na dngos po de dngos po ma yin zhing / / dngos po med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rung ngo /
athavā, parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekatve sati na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate / evaṃ tāvatsato bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ / idānīm
# rnam pa gcig tu na gcig nyid yin na phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar / / dngos po yang yin la dngos po med pa yang yin pa mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'o / / de'i phyir de ltar re zhig dngos po yod pa la 'gag pa mi rigs pa yin no / / da ni /
asato 'pi na bhāvasya nirodha upapadyate
# dngos po med par gyur pa la'ang / / 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
avidyamānasyābhāvasya na vināśo 'sti vandhyātanayasyeva, avidyamānatvāt / ata evāha / na dvitīyasya śirasacchedanaṃ vidyate yathā
# dngos po yod pa ma yin par gyur pa la'ang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te / / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no / / mgo gnyis pa la ji ltar ni / / gcad du med pa de bzhin no /
prasiddhāsattvasyaiva narāṇāṃ dvitīyasya śiraso dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānānnirdeśāpūrṇatvānnāstīti nopāttam
# mgo bo gnyis pa med par rab tu grags pa nyid dper nye bar bkod pa'i phyir bshad pa ma tshang ba nyid du 'gyur bas med pa zhes nye bar ma bkod do / / de'i phyir /
tadevamasato bhāvasya nirodho na saṃbhavati, sato 'pi na / yaścobhayathāpi na saṃbhavati, sa kenātmanā sthitaḥ? nāstyeva nirodha iti pratīyatām
# de ltar dngos po yod pa dang dngos po med pa la 'gag pa med do / / gang zhig gnyi ga ltar yang med pa de dag nyid gzhan gang gis yod par 'gyur te / / 'gag pa med pa nyid do zhes rtogs par bya'o /
kiṃ cānyat / yadi nirodho nāma bhāvānāṃ nirodhaka iti kalpyate, tasyedānīṃ kimanyo nirodha iṣyate, uta na? yadi iṣyate tanna yujyate
# gzhan yang / / gal te 'gag pa zhes bya ba dngos po rnams kyis 'gag par byed pa yin no zhes rtog na / / da ni ci yang 'gag pa gzhan 'dod dam 'on te ma yin / / gal te 'dod na ni de mi rigs te / / gang gi phyir /
na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā
# 'gag pa rang gi bdag nyid kyis / / yod min 'gag pa gzhan gyis min /
kathaṃ punarnāstīti pratipādayannāha / utpādasya yathotpādo nātmanā na parātmanā / tatra yathā
# ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni / / gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin bzhin / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / de la ji ltar /
anutpanno 'yamutpādaḥ svātmānaṃ janayetkatham
# skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas / / rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed /
ityādinā utpādaḥ svātmānaṃ notpādayati, evaṃ nirodho 'pi svātmānaṃ na nirodhayati / kathamiti? ucyate
# ces bya ba la sogs pas / / skye bas rang gi bdag nyid mi bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gag pas kyang rang gi bdag nyid 'gag par mi byed do / / ji ltar zhe na / / brjod par bya ste /
aniruddho nirodho 'yaṃ svātmānaṃ nāśayetkatham
# 'gag pa 'di ni ma 'gags pas / / rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar 'gog /
atha naṣṭo nāśayati naṣṭe kiṃ nāśyate punaḥ / iti samamutpādena vaktavyam
# ci ste 'gags pas 'gog byed na / / 'gags na ci zhig dgag tu yod / / ces skye ba dang mtshungs par brjod par bya'o /
evaṃ ca svātmanā na nirodho 'sti / nirodha idānīṃ parātmanāpi nāsti
# de ltar na / / 'gag pa la rang gi bdag nyid kyis 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis kyang yod pa ma yin no /
katham? tatra yathā utpāde gaditam / 'anya utpādayatyenam'; ityādi, evaṃ nirodhe 'pi vaktavyam / anyo vināśayatyenaṃ nāśo yadyanavasthitiḥ
# ji ltar zhe na / / gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa skye ba la bshad pa de bzhin du / / gal te 'jig pa gzhan zhig gis / / de 'jig thug pa med par 'gyur /
athāvināśo naṣṭo 'yaṃ sarvaṃ naśyatu te tathā / iti / tadevaṃ parātmanāpi nirodho na saṃbhavatīti nāsti nirodhasya nirodhaḥ / atha manyase
# ci ste 'jig med de 'jig na / / thams cad de bzhin 'jig par 'gyur / / zhes 'gag pa la yang brjod par bya'o / / de'i phyir de ltar gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis kyang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pas 'gag pa'i 'gag pa med do /
nāstyeva nirodhasya nirodha iti, tadayuktam / yadi hi nirodhasya nirodho na syāta, tadā nirodharahitatvātsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇamavahīyate
# ci ste 'gag pa la ni 'gag pa med pa nyid do snyam du sems na / / de ni mi rigs te / / gal te 'gag pa la 'gag pa med na de'i tshe 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir / / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyams par 'gyur ro /
tadevaṃ yadi vināśasya vināśaḥ parikalpyate tathāpi na yukto vināśaḥ
# de'i phyir de ltar gal te 'jig pa la 'jig pa brtags pa de lta na yang 'jig pa mi rigs la /
atha na parikalpyate, tathāpi na yukta iti / kathaṃ tvidānīṃ vināśo yokṣyate parasya? atha syāt / tathāpi evameva vicāre sati vināśo bhavato 'pi na yujyate, tataḥ ya ubhayordoṣaḥ, na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti / ucyate / naivedaṃ codyaṃ mamāpatati / kiṃ kāraṇam? ye svātmanā niḥsvabhāvā bhāvāḥ, te ca niḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāmidaṃsatyābhiniveśināṃ vyavahārapathamupayānti avicāraprasiddhenaiva nyāyeneti teṣu nāsti yathoditavicārāvatāro 'smākam māyāsvapnagandharvanagarādivattu laukikāḥ padārthā nirupapattikā eva santaḥ sarvalokasyāvidyātimiropahatamatinayanasya prasiddhimupagatā iti parasparāpekṣayaiva kevalaṃ prasiddhimupagatā bālairabhyupagamyante / yathoktaṃ śatake
# 'on te ma brtags pa de lta na yang mi rigs pas / / da ni ji ltar gzhan gyis 'jig par 'gyur / / ci ste de ltar rnam par dpyad pa yin na khyod la yang 'jig pa mi rigs te / / de'i phyir gang zhig gnyi ga'i skyon yin pa des gcig la brgal bar bya ba ma yin no snyam na / / brjod par bya ste / / bdag la ni brgal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ba nyid de / / 'di ltar dngos po rnams ni rang nyid rang bzhin med pa yin la / / de dag kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid du gyur pa na / / ma brtags par grub pa'i tshul gyis byis pa 'di bden par mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi tha snyad kyi lam du nye bar 'gro ba yin te / / kho bo cag gi ltar na de dag la ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa yod pa ma yin no / / 'jig rten pa'i dngos po rnams ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa ltar 'thad pa dang bral bar gyur cing / / ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten la grub par gyur pas phan tshun ltos pa nyid kyis 'grub par gyur pa 'ba' zhig byis pa rnams kyis khas len pa yin no / / ji skad du brgya pa las /
alātacakranirmāṇasvapnamāyāmbucandrakaiḥ
# mgal me'i 'khor lo sprul pa dang / / rmi lam sgyu ma chu zla dang /
dhūmikāntaḥpratiśrutkāmarīcyabhraiḥ samo bhavaḥ
# khug rna dang ni brag ca dang / / smig rgyu sprin dang srid pa mtshungs / / zhes bshad do /
tasmātsati utpāde utpādyam, sati utpādye utpādaḥ / sati nirodhe nirodhyam, sati nirodhye nirodhaḥ, ityevaṃ laukikasya vyavahārasyābhyupagamātkuto 'smatpakṣe samaprasaṅgitā bhavitumarhati
# de'i phyir / / bskyed bya yod na skyed byed dang skyed byed yod na bskyed bya yod cing / / 'gag pa yod na dgag bya dang dgag bya yod na 'gag pa yod pa yin no / / de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur bar ga la 'os /
yastu vināśasya ahetukatvamabhyupetya kṣaṇikatāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāha, tasya nirhetukatvāt / khapuṣpavadvināśābhāvāt kutaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ setsyati, kuto vināśarahitānāṃ saṃskṛtatvamapīti sarvameva asamañjasaṃ tasya jāyate
# gang zhig 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid du khas blangs nas 'dus byas rnams skad cig ma nyid du smra ba de'i ltar na nam mkha'i me tog ltar rgyu med pas 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po rnams skad cig ma nyid dang 'jig pa dang bral ba rnams 'dus byas nyid du 'ang 'grub par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir de'i thams cad mi 'grig pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhāntarbhāva varṇayatā bhagavatā nanu sahetukatvaṃ spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ vināśasya
# skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyang 'du byed kyi phung po'i nang du 'du bar gsungs pa ni / / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa nyid du gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
jātimātrāpekṣatvāccāsya kṣaṇabhaṅgo 'pi sukhasādhya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ jāyate
# skye ba tsam la ltos pa'i phyir 'di'i skad cig mar 'jig pa yang bsgrub par sla ste / / de'i phyir thams cad legs par gnas par 'gyur ro /
atha syāt / vināśo hi nāma abhāvaḥ, yaśca abhāvaḥ, kiṃ tasya hetunā kartavyam
# ci ste 'jig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dngos po med pa yin na / / gang zhig dngos po med pa de la rgyus ci zhig byed /
ato nirhetuko vināśa iti
# de'i phyir 'jig pa rgyu med pa yin no snyam na /
nanu ca bhāve 'pi hetvabhāvaprasaṅgo bhavati / bhāvo hi nāma vidyamānaḥ, yaśca vidyamānaḥ tasya ca kiṃ hetunā prayojanam? na hi jātaṃ punarapi janyate / tasmātsarvatraiva hetvabhāvaprasaṅgādayuktametat / api ca / yathā utpādaḥ sahetukaḥ pūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt, evaṃ vināśo 'pīṣyatām
# dngos po la yang rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam / / 'di ltar dngos po ni yod par gyur pa yin la / / yod pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod de / / skyes zin pa la ni yang bskyed du med do / / de'i phyir thams cad du rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur bas 'di ni mi rigs so / / gzhan yang ji ltar sngar med pa'i phyir dang phyis yod pa'i phyir skye ba rgyu dang bcas pa yin pa de bzhin du / / 'jig pa yang yin par 'dod par bya'o /
vināśo hi na sarvadā bhavati, utpādātpūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt / yaccocyate / yaścābhāvaḥ tasya  kiṃ hetunā kartavyamiti, tadayuktam
# 'jig pa yang thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ba ni ma yin te / / skye ba'i sngar med pa'i phyir dang phyis ni yod pa'i phyir ro / / gang yang gang zhig dngos po med pa de la rgyus ci zhig byed ces smras pa de yang mi rigs te / / gang gi phyir / / kho bo cag ni 'jig pa la rgyus cung zad cig byed par ni mi 'dod kyi / / 'o na ci zhe na /
yasmānna vayaṃ vināśasya hetunā kiṃcitkriyamāṇamicchāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi vināśa eva kriyate iti varṇayāmaḥ
# 'on kyang 'jig pa nyid byed pa yin no zhes smras so / / gal te de lta na byed bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa yang dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
nanvevaṃ sati kriyamāṇatvādvināśo 'pi bhāvaḥ prāpnotīti cet, iṣyata evaitat / vināśo hi svarūpāpekṣayā bhāvaḥ, rūpādidharmanivṛttisvabhāvatvāttu na bhāvaḥ / api ca
# 'di ni 'dod pa nyid yin te / / 'jig pa ni rang gi ngo bo la ltos nas dngos po yin la / / gzugs la sogs pa'i chos log pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na ni dngos po med pa yin no / / gzhan yang 'chi ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
maraṇamapi dvividhakāryapratyupasthāpanaṃ saṃskāravidhvaṃsanaṃ ca karoti / aparijñānānupacchedaṃ (?) cetyāgamāt kathaṃ na sahetuko vināśaḥ? api ca
# 'du byed 'jig par yang byed pa dang yongs su mi shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin pa'o zhes bya ba'i lung las ni ji ltar 'jig pa rgyu dang bcas pa ma yin par 'gyur / / gzhan yang /
kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇāyāśca śūnyatāyāḥ pareṇa bhāvarūpatāmabhyupagacchatā kathamabhāvasya bhāvatvaṃ nābhyupagataṃ bhavati? bhāvatvācca kathamasaṃskṛtatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ syāt? ataḥ sarvamabhyupetaṃ vihīyate bhavatā / ata eva vakṣyati
# gzhan gyis brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid dngos po'i ngo bor khas blangs pa na ji ltar dngos po med pa dngos po nyid du khas ma blangs par 'gyur / / dngos po yin pa'i phyir na yang ji ltar stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas yin te / / de'i phyir khas blangs pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro / / de nyid kyi phyir /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ katham
# ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa ni / / dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin te /
na saṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau
# mya ngan 'das la 'dus ma byas / / dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas yin / / zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
ityalaṃ prasaṅgena / prakṛtameva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / atrāha / yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgāḥ saṃskṛtasya niṣiddhāḥ, tathāpi saṃskṛtamasti viśeṣalakṣaṇayuktam
# spros pas tshig go / / dkyus ma nyid bshad par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te 'dus byas kyi skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag bkag mod kyi / / de lta na yang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas ni yod pa yin te /
tathāhi kāṭhinyādikaṃ sāsnādikaṃ ca tasya viśeṣalakṣaṇamupadiśyate / tasmātsaṃskṛtasya sadbhāvāttallakṣaṇamapyastīti
# 'di ltar sra ba la sogs pa dang lkog shal la sogs pa ni de'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid du nye bar bstan pa yin no / / de'i phyir 'dus byas yod pas de'i mtshan nyid kyang yod do /
ucyate / syādevaṃ yadi saṃskṛtameva vastu syāt / kutaḥ? yasmāt / utpādasthitibhaṅgānāmasiddhernāsti saṃskṛtam
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'dus byas nyid yod na / / de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa ni ma yin te / / 'di ltar / / skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dag / / ma grub phyir na 'dus byas med /
yadā yathoktena nyāyena utpādasthitibhaṅgā eva niṣiddhāḥ, tadā kutaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu tadviśeṣalakṣaṇamapyastīti
# gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag kho na bkag pa de'i tshe 'dus byas ga la yod / / de'i phyir de'i khyad par ga la yod /
atrāha / vidyata eva saṃskṛtam, tatpratipakṣāsaṃskṛtasadbhāvāt
# 'dir smras pa / / 'dus byas ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i gnyen po 'dus ma byas yod pa'i phyir ro /
ucyate / syādetadevam, yadi asaṃskṛtameva syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'dus ma byas nyid yod na / / 'di de ltar 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin te /
yasmāt / saṃskṛtasyāprasiddhau ca kathaṃ setsyatyasaṃskṛtam
# gang gi phyir / / 'dus byas rab tu ma grub pas / / 'dus ma byas ni ji ltar 'grub /
atraike ākāśāpratisaṃkhyānirodhanirvāṇānyasaṃskṛtānīti kalpayanti
# 'dir kha cig ni nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnams ni 'dus ma byas yin no zhes rtog par byed la /
apare śūnyatāṃ tathatālakṣaṇāmasaṃskṛtāṃ parikalpayanti / tadetatsarvaṃ saṃskṛtasyāprasiddhau satyāṃ nāstyeveti spaṣṭamādarśitam
# gzhan dag ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas su rtog par byed pa de thams cad 'dus byas rab tu ma grub par gyur pas yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsal bar bstan to /
atrāha / yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgā na santītyavadhāritam, yattarhi idamanāvaraṇajñāninā muninā
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par gzung na / / 'o na thub pa ye shes sgrib pa med pa mnga' bas /
"saṃskṛtasya bhikṣavaḥ utpādo 'pi prajñāyate, vyayo 'pi, sthityanyathātvamapi" / ityudāhṛtam, tatkathaṃ veditavyamiti? ucyate
# dge slong dag 'dus byas ni skye bar yang mngon / / 'jig pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur bar yang mngon no zhes gang gsungs pa de ji ltar rig par bya zhe na / / brjod par bya ste /
yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā
# rmi lam ji bzhin sgyu ma bzhin / / dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du /
tathotpādastathā sthānaṃ tathā bhaṅga udāhṛtam
# de bzhin skye dang de bzhin gnas / / de bzhin du ni 'jig pa gsungs /
yathā māyādayaḥ svabhāvenānutpannā avidyamānā māyādiśabdavācyā māyādivijñānagamyāśca lokasya, evamete 'pi lokaprasiddhimātreṇa utpādādayaḥ svabhāvena avidyamānā api bhagavatā tathāvidhavineyajanānugrahacikīrṣuṇā nirdiṣṭā iti
# ji ltar sgyu ma la sogs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin yang / / 'jig rten na sgyu ma la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod bya dang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rtogs par bya bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin yang 'jig rten la grags pa tsam gyi sgo nas / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yin no /
ata evoktam / tvaksnāyumāṃsāsthisamucchraye ca utpādya saṃjñāṃ mama patnireṣā
# de skad du yang / / lpags rgyus sha rus 'dus la 'di dag gi / / chung ma yin snyam 'du shes bskyed nas ni /
mūḍhā hi balā janayanti rāgaṃ striyo na jānanti yathaiva māyām
# byis pa rmongs rnams 'dod chags skyed byed cing / / sgyu ma ji bzhin bud med mi shes so /
yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati
# ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na / / bu pho byung zhing shi ba des mthong nas /
jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasthitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān
# byung nas dga' zhing shi nas mi dga' ltar / / chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis /
yathaiva gandharvapuraṃ marīcikā yathaiva māyā supinaṃ yathaiva
# ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer smig rgyu dang / / sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ci 'dra bar /
svabhāvaśūnyā tu nimittabhāvanā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān / saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtadharmaviviktā nāsti vikalpana teṣamṛṣīṇām
# chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes bya ste / / mtshan ma sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kun dben pa ste / / drang srong de dag la ni rnam rtog med /
sarvagatīṣu asaṃskṛtaprāptā dṛṣṭigatehi sadaiva viviktā
# 'gro ba kun du 'dus ma byas 'thob pas / / lta ba dag las khor mor rnam par dben /
nityamarakta aduṣṭa amūḍhāḥ tasya sabhāvasamāhitacittā / eṣa samādhibalī balavanto yo imu jānati śūnyakadharmān / iti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskṛtaparīkṣā nāma saptamaṃ prakaraṇam / karmakārakaparīkṣā aṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvato vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ, taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāt / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā / avidyānugato 'yaṃ bhikṣavaḥ puruṣapudgalaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti, apuṇyānapi, āniñjayānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti / ityādinā karmaṇāṃ kārako vyapadiṣṭaḥ, tatkarmaphalaṃ ca vijñānādikamupadiṣṭam / yasya ca kārako 'sti, tadasti, tadyathā ghaṭaḥ
# gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos rnams shes pa ni / / rtag tu ma chags mi gtum mi rmongs te / / de yi sems ni rang bzhin mnyam par gzhag / / de ni ting 'dzin stobs can stobs dang ldan / / zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / 'dus byas brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi chos 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i rgyu las dang byed pa po yod pa'i phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / ma rig pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i skyes bu gang zag 'di ni / / bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do / / bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi gyo ba mngon par 'du bya yang mngon par 'du byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pas las kyi byed pa po dang las de dang 'bras bu rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyang nye bar bstan pa yin no / / gang la byed pa po yod pa de ni yod pa yin te / / dper na bum pa bzhin no /
yannāsti, na tasya kārakaḥ, tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvārasyeti
# gang zhig byed pa med pa de la ni byed pa po med de / / dper na rus sbal gyi sbu'i gos bzhin no /
ucyate / syādvijñānādikaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yadi tasya niṣpādakakarmakārakau syātām
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te de'i skyed par byed pa las dang byed pa po gnyis yod na ni / / rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tu staḥ / yasmāt / sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam / kārako nāpyasadbhūtaḥ karmāsadbhūtamīhate / tatra karotīti kārakaḥ kartā / kurvāṇasyaiva kiṃcit kārakavyapadeśo nākurvāṇasya
# de dag ni med do / / 'di ltar / / byed po yod par gyur pa de / / las su gyur pa mi byed do / / byed po ma yin gyur pa yang / / las su mi 'gyur mi byed do / / de la byed pas na byed pa po'o / / cung zad byed pa kho na la byed pa por bsnyad kyi / / mi byed pa ni ma yin la / / byed pa de yang byed pa po yin par gyur pa 'am / / ma yin par gyur pa'am /
tacca karaṇaṃ sadbhūtasya vā kartuḥ parikalpyeta, asadbhūtasya vā, sadasadbhūtasya vā? kriyate iti karma karturīpsitatamam / tadapi trividham, sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ ca
# yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa zhig la rtog pa zhig go / / bya bas na las de byed pa po'i 'dod par gyur pa dam pa'o / / de yang rnam pa gsum ste / / yin par gyur pa dang ma yin par gyur pa dang yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa'o /
tatra sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ kriyāyuktaḥ sadbhūtaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ karma na karotītyekā pratijñā
# de la byed pa po yin par gyur pa bya ba dang ldan pa ni las su gyur pa ste / / bya ba dang ldan pa mi byed do zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba gcig go /
idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kriyākārakarahito 'sadbhutaṃ kriyārahitaṃ karma na karotītyaparā pratijñā
# de nas byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa bya ba dang bral ba yang las su ma gyur pa ste / / bya ba dang bral ba mi byed do zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba gzhan yin no /
tatrādyāṃ prasādhayitumāha / sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam
# de la dang po rab tu sgrub par bzhed nas / / bshad pa / / yin par gyur la bya ba med / / byed po med pa'i las su'ang 'gyur / / byed pa por brjod pa ni /
kriyānibandhanatvātkārakavyapadeśasya, karoti kriyāyukta eva kaścitsadbhūtaḥ kārakavyapadeśaṃ labhate, tataśca tasyaivaṃvidhasya kriyāhetukalabdhakārakavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kuryāt / kriyābhāvācca yadā kārakaḥ karma na karoti, tadā kārakanirapekṣamakartṛkaṃ karma syāt
# bya ba ni rgyu can yin pa'i phyir byed do zhes bya ba'i bya ba dang bral ba dang ldan pa yin par gyur pa 'ga' zhig kho nas / / byed pa po'i brjod pa 'thob par 'gyur te / / de'i phyir bya ba'i rgyu can gyi byed pa po'i brjod pa thob pa rnam pa de lta bu de la ni / / gang gis las de byed par 'gyur ba bya ba gzhan med do / / gang gi tshe / / bya ba med pas byed pa po las mi byed pa de'i tshe byed pa po la ltos pa med cing byed pa po med pa'i las su 'gyur na /
na cākartṛkaṃ karma saṃbhavati bandhyāsūnoriva ghaṭakaraṇamiti / evaṃ tāvat
# byed pa po med pa'i las ni srid pa yang ma yin te / / mo gsham gyi bus bum pa byed pa bzhin no /
sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam / iti doṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti
# de ltar na re zhig yin par gyur pa la bya ba med pa dang byed pa po med pa'i las su yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir / / byed pa po yin par gyur pa las mi byed do /
idānīṃ sadbhūtamapi karma kārako na karotīti pratipādayannāha / sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ / sadbhūtaṃ nāma karma kriyāyuktam / tasyedānīṃ kriyānibandhanalabdhakarmavyapadeśasya aparā kriyā nāsti yayā karma kriyeteti
# da ni las yin par gyur pa yang byed pa pos byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / yin par gyur pa bya ba med / / las med byed pa por yang 'gyur / / zhes gsungs so / / las yin par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang ldan pa yin la / / bya ba'i rgyu can gyi las kyi brjod pa thob zin pa de la ni / / gzod yang gang gis las de byed par 'gyur ba'i bya ba gzhan yod pa yang ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtasya karmaṇaḥ kriyā nāsti / yadā nāsti parā kriyā, tadā kārakastatsadbhūtaṃ karma naiva karoti / yadā ca na karoti karmaṇo dvitīyakriyābhāvāt, tadā  akarmaka eva avidyamānakarmaka eva tasya karmaṇaḥ kārakaḥ syāt
# de lta na ni / / re zhig las yin par gyur pa la bya ba med pa yin no / / gang gi tshe / / bya ba gzhan med pa de'i tshe ni las yin par gyur pa de byed pa po mi byed pa nyid do / / gang gi tshe las la bya ba gnyis pa med pas mi byed pa de'i tshe ni las de'i byed pa po ni las med pa ste / / las mi bdog cing las de mi byed pa kho nar byed pa por 'gyur na /
na caitadyaktam / na hi akṛtānantaryakarmaṇaḥ ānantaryakarmakārakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti / evaṃ sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti iti saṃsādhya idānīṃ yathā asadbhūtamapi karma asadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha / karoti yadyasadbhūto 'sadbhūtaṃ karma kārakaḥ / ahetukaṃ bhavetkarma kartā cāhetuko bhavet
# 'di ni rigs pa yang ma yin te / / mtshams med pa'i las ma yin pa la ni / / mtshams med pa'i las kyi byed pa po nyid ma mthong ngo / / de ltar byed pa po yin par gyur pas las yin par gyur pa mi byed do zhes yang dag par bsgrubs nas / / da ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa yang las ma yin par gyur ba ji ltar mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / / gal te byed por ma gyur na / / las su ma gyur byed pa ni / / las la rgyu ni med par 'gyur / / byed pa po yang rgyu med 'gyur /
asadbhūtaḥ kārako yaḥ kriyārahitaḥ / kriyā ca kārakavyapadeśe heturiti kriyārahita kārako 'pi nirhetukaḥ syāt
# las ma yin par gyur pa ni rgyu med par 'gyur ro / / byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa ni gang bya ba dang bral ba yin la / / bya ba yang byed pa por bsnyad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir na /
karmāpyasadbhūtaṃ nirhetukaṃ syāt / sati ca ahetukavādābhyupagame kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca sarvamapoditaṃ syādityāha / hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate / satyeva hi hetorabhyupagame hetunā yanniṣpādyate tat kāryam, tasya ca yo niṣpādakaḥ tatkāraṇamiti yujyate
# bya ba dang bral ba'i byed pa po yang rgyu med par 'gyur ro / / rgyu med par smra ba khas len pa yin na yang rgyu dang 'bras bu ril bsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa / / rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang / / rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / rgyu khas blangs par gyur na ni gang zhig rgyus bskyed pa de ni 'bras bu yin la / / de'i skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu yin no zhes bya bar rigs te /
tadyathā ghaṭasya mṛd hetuḥ, ghaṭaḥ kāryam, tasya ca cakrādayaḥ sahakārikāraṇam
# dper na bum pa'i rgyu ni 'jim pa yin la / / bum pa 'bras bu yin zhing 'khor lo la sogs pa de'i byed rgyu yin pa bzhin no /
ahetukavādābhyupagame tu hetvanapekṣatvānmaṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇimayaghaṭavanna syādayaṃ ghaṭaḥ
# rgyu med par smra ba khas blangs na ni rgyu la mi ltos pa'i phyir / / nam mkha'i me tog ltar bum pa med la / / bum pa med na de'i byed rgyu yod par ga la 'gyur /
asati ghaṭe kutastatkāraṇamiti / evam / hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate / tataśca / tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate / tadabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve, kiṃ kurvāṇasya kriyā saṃbhavet, kasyāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ kumbhakārasya svātantryātkartṛtvaṃ syāt? na cāpi mṛdāṃ tādātmyapravṛttyā sādhakatamatvena karaṇatvaṃ yujyata iti evaṃ tāvat / tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate / tataśca / dharmādharmau na vidyete kriyādīnāmasaṃbhave
# de ltar na rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang / / rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir / / de med na ni bya ba dang / / byed pa po dang bya mi rigs / / de med na ste / / 'bras bu dang rgyu med na ci zhig byed pa la bya ba yod par 'gyur zhing / / bya ba gang zhig la rdza mkhan rang dbang du gyur pas byed pa po nyid du 'gyur / / 'jim pa dag kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis nye bar gyur pa las sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid yin pa'i sgo nas byed par rigs pa ma yin no / / de ltar na re zhig / / de med na ni bya ba dang / / byed pa po dang byed mi rigs / / zhes bya'o / / de'i phyir / / bya ba la sogs mi rigs na / / chos dang chos min yod ma yin /
iha yadā devadattaḥ prāṇātipātaviratikriyāsvātantryātkartā san svatantrakāryeṇa karaṇabhūtena prāṇātipātaviratikriyāṃ karoti, tadāsya dharma upajāyate / evaṃ daśasvapi kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu kuśalakriyāniṣpādyeṣu ratnatrayamātāpitṛtadanyapūjyapūjādilakṣaṇeṣu ca kuśaladharmaprārambheṣu yojyam / evamadharme 'pi prāṇātipātādilakṣaṇe kuśalaviparyayeṇa kriyākartṛkaraṇānāmabhāve sati karmaṇāmabhāvaprasaṅga udbhāvanīyaḥ
# 'di ltar lha sbyin srog gcod pa spong ba'i bya ba la rang dbang du gyur pa las byed pa por gyur nas / / las byed par gyur pa'i sgo nas srog gcod pa spong ba'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe / / de la chos nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro / / de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi lam dge ba'i bya bas bsgrub par bya ba bcu char dang dge ba'i chos kyi rtsom pa dkon mchog gsum dang pha dang ma dang de las gzhan mchod par 'os pa mchod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o / / de bzhin du / / bya ba dang byed pa po dang byed pa rnams med na chos ma yin pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can la yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba las bzlog ste brjod par bya'o / / gang gi tshe /
yadā caivaṃ dharmādharmau na saṃbhavataḥ, tadā tatphalamapi nāstyeveti pratipādayannāha
# de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa med pa de'i tshe / / de'i 'bras bu yang med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate
# chos dang chos min med na ni / / de las byung ba'i 'bras bu med /
dharmādharmajanitamiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ sugatidurgatyordharmādharmayorabhāve sati na syāt / tataśca / phale 'sati na mokṣāya na svargāyopapadyate / mārgaḥ / yadi hi phalamiṣṭāniṣṭaṃ syāta, syāllaukikasya mārgasya dhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattilakṣaṇaṃ svargaḥ, tadānīṃ tadarthaṃ laukikamārgabhāvanā jyāyasī syāt, kugatigamanakarmapathaviratisāphalyaṃ ca syāt / yadi ca mokṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ phalaṃ syāt, tadartha lokottarāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāsāphalyaṃ syāt / yadā tu phalaṃ nāsti, tadā
# chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis med na ni / / chos dang chos ma yin pas bskyed pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa yang med par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir / / 'bras bu med na thar pa dang / / mtho ris 'gyur ba'i lam mi 'thad / / gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can bde 'gro yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe de'i don du 'jig rten pa'i lam bsgom pa mdzes par 'gyur la / / gal te de yang 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa thar pa'i mtshan nyid can yod na yang de'i don du / / 'jig rten las 'das pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi tshe 'bras bu yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
phale 'sati na mokṣāya na svargāyopapadyate
# 'bras bu med na thar pa dang / / mtho ris 'gyur ba'i lam mi 'thad /
mārgaḥ / kiṃ ca / evaṃ phalābhāve sati
# gzhan yang / / de ltar 'bras bu med na ni /
sarvakriyāṇāṃ ca nairarthakyaṃ prasajyate
# bya ba dag ni thams cad kyang / / don med nyid du thal bar 'gyur /
yā api hyetāḥ kṛṣivāṇijyabala (bhṛti?) gatādikāḥ kriyāḥ phalārtha prārabhyante, tā api sarvāḥ phalābhāve sati nopapadyanta iti
# zhing las dang tshong spogs dang gla bkol gyi bya ba la sogs pa gang dag 'bras bu'i don du rtsom pa de dag thams cad kyang 'bras bu med na mi 'thad do / / de'i phyir de ltar /
evaṃ sarvakriyāṇāṃ nairarthakyaṃ prasajyate bhavatām / na cāsāṃ nairarthakyam / tasmānniravaśeṣadoṣaviṣavṛkṣākarabhūto 'yaṃ svargāpavargāpavādī narakādimahāpāyaprapātavartanahetuḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭahetupadārthavirodhīti kṛtvā, saddhiḥ asadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ karma karotīti pakṣo nikṛṣṭa eveti tyājyaḥ / tadevaṃ pratijñādvayaṃ saṃsādhya idānīmubhayarūpaḥ kārakaḥ, ubhayarūpamapi karma na karotītyāha
# bya ba dag ni thams cad kyang / / don med nyid du thal bar 'gyur / / 'di dag ni don med pa yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir nyes pa ma lus pa'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa mtho ris dang byang grol la skur pa 'debs pa / / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i gyang sa chen po'i rgyu mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i rgyu'i dngos po dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir / / byed pa po yin par ma gyur pa las su ma gyur pa byed do zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di ni tha chad kho na yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar dam bca' ba gnyis yang dag par bsgrubs nas / / de ni byed pa po gnyi ga'i ngo bo las gnyi ga'i ngo bo yang mi byed do zhes bshad pa /
kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaḥ sadasatkurute na tat / tatra yadetadasadbhūtaṃ karma kriyāyuktamakriyāyuktaṃ ca, tat sadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karotīti / yasmāt / parasparaviruddhaṃ hi saccāsaccaikataḥ kutaḥ / ekaḥ padārthaḥ ekasmin kāle kriyāyuktaścākriyāyuktaśceti na yujyata evaitat
# byed pa por gyur ma gyur pa / / gyur ma gyur de mi byed de / / las yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa bya ba dang ldan pa dang bya ba dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de ni byed pa po yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pas mi byed do / / gang gi phyir / / yin dang ma yin gyur cig la / / phan tshun 'gal bas ga la yod / / dngos po gcig la dus gcig tu bya ba dang ldan pa yang yin la bya ba dang mi ldan pa yang yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs pa nyid do / / de'i phyir /
tataśca sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaṃ karma na karoti, avidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ
# byed pa po yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa yang las yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa mi byed do / / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o /
evaṃ same pakṣe dūṣaṇamudbhāvya viṣamapakṣasyāpi nirācikīrṣayā āha / satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat / kartrā / satā sadbhūtena tāvatkartrā kriyāyuktena asadbhūtamasadakriyāyuktaṃ karma na kriyate
# de ltar phyogs mthun pa la skyon brjod nas / / phyogs mi mthun pa la yang bsal bar bzhed nas bshad pa / / byed pa por ni gyur pa yis / / ma gyur las ni mi byed de / / ma gyur pas kyang gyur mi byed / / re zhig byed pa po yin par gyur pa bya ba dang ldan pas ni las su ma gyur ba bya ba dang mi ldan pa mi byed de /
yasmāt / sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi / sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam
# gang gi phyir / / 'dir yang skyon der thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / yin par gyur la bya ba med / / byed po med pa'i las su'ang 'gyur /
ityevaṃ tāvat sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma na karoti, nāpyasadbhūtaṃ karma kriyate / asadbhūtaṃ hi karma ahetukaṃ bhavet / tataśca / hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate / ityādinā sarvaṃ dūṣaṇamāpadyate / tasmātpūrvoktaireva hetubhirdūṣitatvādasya viṣamapakṣasya na punarhetorupādānamanuṣṭhīyate / yathā caitat satā kartrā asatkarma na kriyate iti pratipāditam, evamasatā kartrā akriyāyuktena satkarma na kriyate iti vyākhyeyamuktapathānusāreṇa / evaṃ tāvadviṣamapakṣe ekaikapadaparāmarśena dūṣaṇamabhidhāya idānīmekaikasya padasya padadvaya parāmarśena dūṣaṇābhidhānamāha / nāsadbhūtaṃ na sadbhūtaḥ sadasadbhūtameva vā / karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktaireva hetubhiḥ
# zhes bya bas de ltar byed pa po yin par gyur pas las mi byed do / / las yin par ma gyur pa'ang byed pa ma yin te / / las yin par ma gyur pa ni rgyu med par 'gyur la / / de'i phyir rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad du 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir phyogs mi mthun pa ni sngar bshad zin pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis sun phyung ba'i phyir yang gtan tshigs dgod par mi bya'o / / byed pa po yin par gyur pas las yin par ma gyur pa mi byed do zhes bya ba ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bshad zin pa'i 'don pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa bya ba dang mi ldan pas las yin par gyur pa mi byed do zhes bya ba yang rnam par bshad par bya'o / / de ltar re zhig / / phyogs mi mthun pa la tshig re re dpyad pa'i sgo nas skyon brjod nas / / da ni tshig re re la tshig gnyis gnyis dpyad nas / / skyon brjod par bzhed nas bshad pa / / byed pa por ni gyur pa dang / / bcas pa las ni ma gyur dang / / gyur ma gyur pa mi byed de / / gtan tshigs gong du bstan phyir ro /
sa kārakaḥ sadbhūtaḥ asadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtameva vā na karotīti / kathamityāha / pūrvoktaireva hetubhiriti / tatra 'sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti'; ityādinā sadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti / asadbhūtamapi karma na kriyate 'ahetukaṃ bhavetkarma'; 'hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca'; ityādinā vihitadoṣāt / sadasadbhūtamapi karma na kriyate / parasparaviruddhaṃ hi saccāsaccaikataḥ kutaḥ / iti vacanāt / evaṃ tāvatsadbhūtaḥ kārako 'sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhutaṃ ca karma na karoti / idānīmasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ sadbhūtaṃ karma sadasadbhūtaṃ ca karma na karotītyāha / nāsadbhūto 'pi sadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtameva vā / karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktaireva hetubhiḥ / asadbhūtaḥ kārako nirhetuko bhavet / 'hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca'; ityādinā uktadoṣādasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti
# byed pa por gyur pa dang bcas pa de ni las yin par ma gyur pa dang yin par gyur pa dang yin par ma gyur pa mi byed do / / ji ltar zhe na / / gtan tshigs gong du bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gsungs so / / de la / / yin par gyur la bya ba med / / ces bya ba la sogs pas byed pa por gyur pa dang bcas pas ni mi byed do / / las su ma gyur pa yang mi byed de / / las la rgyu ni med par 'gyur / / rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas skyon bstan zin pa'i phyir ro / / las su gyur pa dang ma gyur pa yang mi byed de / / yin dang ma yin gyur cig la / / phan tshun 'gal bas ga la yod / / ces bshad pa'i phyir ro / / de ltar re zhig byed pa po yin par gyur pas las yin par ma gyur pa dang yin par gyur pa byed pa ma yin no / / da ni byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa yang / / las su gyur pa dang bcas pa dang gyur pa dang ma gyur pa byed pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / byed pa por ni ma gyur pas / / las ni gyur dang bcas pa dang / / ma gyur gyur pa mi byed de / / gtan tshigs gong du bstan phyir ro / / byed pa po yin par ma gyur pa ni rgyu med par 'gyur la / / rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyes pa bshad zin pa'i phyir / / byed pa por ma gyur pa ni mi byed pa yin no /
sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ / iti prasaṅgāt sadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate / sadasadbhūtamapi karma na kriyate, / parasparaviruddhaṃ hi saccāsaccaikataḥ kutaḥ / iti vacanāt / idānīṃ sadasadbhūto 'pi kārakaḥ ekaika evobhayarūpaḥ san yathā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ ca bhinnasaṃketaṃ karma na karoti tathā pratipādayannāha / karoti sadasadbhūto na sannāsacca kārakaḥ / karma tattu vijānīyātpūrvoktaireva hetubhiḥ / parasparaviruddhaṃ hi saccāsaccaikataḥ kutaḥ / iti vacanātsadasadbhūtaḥ kārako na karoti / sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ / iti prasaṅgātsadbhūtaṃ karma na kriyate / asadbhūtamapi karma ahetukaṃ 'hetāvasati kārya ca'; ityādinoktadoṣānna kriyate / yataścaivaṃ samapakṣeṣu viṣamapakṣeṣu ca kartuḥ karmaṇaśca sarvathā siddhirayuktā, tasmādyaduktaṃ vidyanta eva vijñānādayaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ taddhetukakarmakārakasadbhāvāditi, tadayuktam / atrāha / kimavadhāritametadbhavatā na santi bhāvā iti? na hi / bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ svabhāvasya bhāvānāṃ vaidhuryātsarvabhāvāpavādaḥ saṃbhāvyate
# las su gyur pa dang bcas pa yang mi byed de / / yin par gyur la bya ba med / / las med byed pa por yang 'gyur / / zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / las yin par gyur pa dang yin par ma gyur pa yang mi byed de / / yin dang ma yin gyur cig la / / phan tshun 'gal bas ga la yod / / ces bshad pa'i phyir ro / / da ni byed pa po yin par gyur pa dang yin par ma gyur pa nyid kyang gnyi ga'i ngo bo yin pa na / / las yin par gyur pa dang ma yin par gyur pa gang yang rung ba ji ltar mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / / byed pa por gyur ma gyur ni / / las su gyur dang ma gyur pa / / mi byed 'di yang gtan tshigs ni / / gong du bstan pas shes par bya / / byed pa po yin par gyur pa dang ma yin par gyur ba ni mi byed de / / yin dang ma yin gyur cig la / / phan tshun 'gal bas ga la yod / / ces bshad pa'i phyir ro / / las su gyur pa yang mi byed de / / yin par gyur la bya ba med / / las med byed pa por yang 'gyur / / zhes bya bar thal ba'i phyir ro / / las su ma gyur pa rgyu med pa yang mi byed de / / rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas skyon bshad zin pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir / / de ltar phyogs mthun pa dang phyogs mi mthun pa dag la byed pa po dang las su grub pa rnam pa thams cad du rigs pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin can dag ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i rgyu las dang byed pa po yod pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs pa yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / dngos po rnams med do zhes bya ba 'di ci khyod kyis nges par bzung ba yin nam zhe na / / ma yin te / / dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba khyod la ni dngos po dang bral ba las thams cad la skur pa 'debs pa srid kyi /
vayaṃ tu pratītyotpannatvātsarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvamevanopalabhāmahe, tatkasyāpavādaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ? yathoktamāryaratnāvalyām
# kho bo cag gis ni brten nas skyes pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid nye bar mi dmigs te / / des na gang zhig la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur / / ji skad du rin po che'i phreng ba las /
marīci toyamityetaditi matvāgato 'tra san
# smig rgyu la ni 'di chu zhes / / bsams te der ni song ba las /
yadi nāstīti tattoyaṃ gṛhṇīyānmūḍha eva saḥ
# gal te chu de med do zhes / / 'dzin pa de ni blun pa nyid /
marīcipratimaṃ lokamevamastīti gṛhṇataḥ
# de bzhin smig rgyu chu lta bu'i / / 'jig rten yod ce'am med pa zhes /
nāstīti cāpi moho 'yaṃ sati mohe na mucyate / ajñānakalpitaṃ pūrvaṃ paścāttatvārthanirṇaye
# 'dzin pa de ni rmongs pa ste / / rmongs pa yod na mi 'grol lo / / mi shes pa las sngar brtags shing / / phyi nas de nyid don nges na /
yadā na labhate bhāvamevābhāvastadā kuha / iti / tadevaṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ kuto yathoktaprakārasiddhiḥ? tasmāllaukikaṃ viparyāsamabhyupetya sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ marīcikājalakalpānāmidaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagamenaiva prasiddhirnānyenetyāha / pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam
# gang tshe dngos po mi dmigs pa / / de tshe dngos med ga la 'gyur / / zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir de ltar dngos po rang bzhin med pa rnams la ji skad smras pa'i rnam pa 'grub pa ga la yod / / de'i phyir / / dngos po kun rdzob pa smig rgyu'i chu dang mtshungs pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i phyin ci log khas blangs nas rkyen de nyid 'di pa tsam du khas blangs pa kho nas grub pa yin gyi / / gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / byed po las la brten byas shing / / las kyang byed po de nyid la /
karma pravartate, nānyatpaśyāmaḥ siddhikāraṇam
# brten nas 'byung ba ma gtogs pa / / grub pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo /
iha akurvāṇasya karmanirapekṣasya kārakatvābhāvāt karmāpekṣya kārakasya kārakatvaṃ bhavati / kārakeṇa cākriyamāṇasya kasyacitkarmatvābhāvāt kriyamāṇasyaiva karmavyapadeśāt, taṃ kārakaṃ pratītya karma pravartate ityevaṃ karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ muktvā nānyatsiddhikāraṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ / yathā ca karmakārakayoḥ parasparāpekṣikī siddhiḥ, evamanyeṣāmapi bhāvānāmityatidiśannāha
# 'dir ni byed cing las la ltos pa med pa ni byed pa po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir / / byed pa po'i byed pa po nyid ni las la ltos nas yin zhing / / byed pa pos byed bzhin pa ma yin pa ni 'ga' yang las nyid du mi 'gyur bas byed bzhin pa nyid las su brjod pa'i phyir las kyang byed pa po de nyid la brten nas byung ba yin no / / de ltar las dang byed pa po dag phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa las ma gtogs par grub pa'i rgyu gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / / ji ltar las dang byed pa po gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin pa de bzhin du dngos po gzhan rnams kyang yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir bshad pa /
evaṃ vidyādupādānaṃ vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ / kartuśca / evamityanena anantarāṃ karmakārakaprajñaptiṃ darśayati
# de bzhin nyer len shes par bya / / las dang byed po bsal phyir ro / / de bzhin zhes bya ba 'dis ni las dang byed pa po'i tha snyed thal ma thag pa ston pa'o /
upāttirupādānam / anena copāttikriyāmāha / sā ca svasādhanaṃ kartāramupādātāraṃ karma copādānaṃ saṃnidhāpayati
# nye bar len pas na nye bar len pa ste / / de ltar na 'dis ni nye bar len pa'i bya ba bstan la / / des kyang rang gi sgrub byed byed pa po dang nye bar len pa po de nye bar blang bar bya ba las 'dzin par byed cing /
tayośca upādeyopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣayoḥ karmakārakavadeva siddhirna svābhāvikī
# nye bar blangs pa dang nye bar len pa po de gnyis kyang las dang byed pa po ltar phan tshun ltos pas grub pa yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no /
kasmātpunaḥ svābhāvikī na bhavati ityāha / vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ, kartuśceti / itiśabdo hetuparāmarśī / vyutsargo vyudāsaḥ / tataśca ayamartha upapadyate / yaireva hetubhiḥ karmaṇaśca vyutsargo 'smābhiruktaḥ, taireva hetubhiḥ upādātā upādeyaṃ ca pratiṣiddhaṃ veditavyam / na ca kevalamanayoranyonyāpekṣikī siddhiḥ katurśca karmaṇaśca pratiṣedhenāvaseyā, api ca
# yang ci'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin zhe na / / las dang byed po bsal phyir ro / / zhes gsungs te / / bsal ba ni bzlog pa'o / / phyir ro'i sgras ni gtan tshigs 'dzin pa'o / / de'i phyir don ni bdag cag gis gtan tshigs gang dag gis las dang byed pa po bsal bar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs de dag kho nas nye bar blang ba dang nye bar len pa po'ang bkag par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'thad par 'gyur ro / / las dang byed pa po bkag pas 'di gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin par nges par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / gzhan yang /
karmakartṛbhyāṃ śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayet
# byed pa po dang las dag gis / / dngos po lhag ma shes par bya ste /
prājña iti vākyaśeṣaḥ
# shes rab can gyis zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o /
karmakārakopādeyopādātṛvyatiriktā ye 'nye bhāvā janyajanakagantṛgamanadraṣṭavyadarśanalakṣyalakṣaṇotpādyotpādakāḥ, tathā avayavāvayaviguṇaguṇipramāṇaprameyādayo niravaśeṣā bhāvāḥ, teṣāṃ kartṛkarmavicāreṇa svabhāvato 'stitvaṃ pratiṣidhya parasparāpekṣikīmeva siddhi prājño nirmumukṣurjātijarāmaraṇādibandhanebhyo mokṣāya vibhāvayet / eṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vicāro madhyamakāvatārādibhyo 'vaseyaḥ
# shes rab can gyis las dang byed pa po dang nye bar blang ba dang nye bar len pa po las tha dad pa'i dngos po gzhan gang dag bskyed bya skyed byed dang 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po dang blta bya dang lta byed dang mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dang 'byung bar bya ba dang 'byung bar byed pa dang de bzhin du / / yan lag dang yan lag can dang yon tan dang yon tan can dang tshad ma dang gzhal bya la sogs pa'i dngos po ma lus pa de dag las dang byed pa po'i rnam par dpyad pas ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa bkag ste / / phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o / / de dag rnam par dpyad pa yang dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o / / gal te /
nanu ca śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayedityanenaiva upādānopādānnoradhigatatvādupādānopādānaṃ punarayuktam
# dngos po lhag ma shes par bya / / zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi nye bar blang ba dang nye bar len pa po'i don rtogs zin pa'i phyir yang bkod pa mi rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
satyametat / tathāpi tattvavicāre prādhānyajñāpanārthamupādānopādātrobhedenopādānam, tathā hi uttareṣu prakaraṇeṣu bhūyasā anayoreva vicāro bhaviṣyatīti / ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā āryopāliparipṛcchāyām / bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike
# 'di ni bden mod kyi / / 'on kyang rnam par dpyad par bya ba la gtso bor gyur par shes par bya ba'i phyir / / nye bar blang ba dang nye bar len pa po logs shig tu bkod de / / 'di ltar rab tu byed pa phyi ma dag tu yang 'di gnyis kho na'i brtag pa phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / de nyid kyi phyir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan bya ste / / sems can stong phrag du ma skyo byas kyang /
na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam / na ca kāraku kāraṇaṃ santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ / kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ
# gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i / / 'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin / / gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i / / gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te / / rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na / / lus la 'bab mthong de na mtshon cha med /
citramanorama sajjitapuṣpāḥ svarṇavimāna jalanti manojñāḥ
# sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha phye zhing / / gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba /
teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena
# 'di na de la 'ang byed po 'ga' med de / / de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa yin /
kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ
# rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam brtags te / / 'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye /
so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ / iti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmakārakaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭamaṃ prakaraṇam / pūrvaparīkṣā navamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / yaduktam / 'evaṃ vidyādupādānaṃ vyutsargāditi karmaṇaḥ / kartuśca'; iti, tadayuktam / yasmāt / darśanaśravaṇādīni vedanādīni cāpyatha / bhavanti yasya prāgebhyaḥ so 'stītyeke vadantyuta / yasya upādātuḥ darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasanādīni vedanāsparśamanaskārādīni ca bhavanti, sa upādātā pūrvamebhya upādānebhyo 'stīti sāṃmitīyā vadanti
# 'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang 'byung ba min / / yongs su rtog pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin / / zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba tshig gsal ba las / / las dang byed pa po brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir / / de bzhin nyer len shes par bya / / las dang byed po bsal phyir ro / / zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te / / 'di ltar / / lta dang nyen la sogs pa dang tshor sogs dang yang dbang byas pa / / gang gi yin pa de dag gi / / snga rol de yod kha cig smra / / lta ba dang nyan pa dang snom pa dang myang ba la sogs pa rnams dang tshor ba dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa rnams nye bar len pa po gang gis nye bar len pa yin pa'i nye bar len pa po de ni nye bar len pa de dag gi snga rol na yod do zhes mang pos bkur ba pa smra'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt / kathaṃ hyavidyamānasya darśanādi bhaviṣyati
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / dngos po yod pa ma yin na / / lta ba la sogs ji ltar 'gyur /
bhāvasya tasmātprāgebhyaḥ so 'sti bhāvo vyavasthitaḥ / iha vidyamāna eva devadatto dhanopādānaṃ kurute nāvidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ
# de phyir de dag snga rol na / / dngos po gnas pa de yod do / / 'di na lha sbyin yod par gyur pas nor sogs par byed kyi / / yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bus ni ma yin no /
evaṃ yadi tāvatpudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyavasthito na syāt, nāsau darśanādikasyopādānamakariṣyat
# de bzhin du gal te re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na gang zag gnas par ma gyur na ni / / des lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len par byed par yang mi 'gyur ba nyid do / / de phyir nor gyi snga rol na lha sbyin gnas pa ltar /
tasmādasti asau dhanātprāgeva sthitadevadattavat darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo yo 'sya upādānaṃ kariṣyatīti / ucyate / darśanaśravaṇādibhyo vedanādibhya eva ca
# lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na / / gang zhig 'di'i nye bar len par byed par 'gyur ba'i gang zag de yod pa yin no zhes 'dzer to / / brjod par bya'o / / lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang / / tshor ba la sogs nyid kyi ni /
yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ
# snga rol dngos po gang gnas pa / / de ni gang gis gdags par bya /
yau 'sau pudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvamastīti vyavasthāpyate, sa kena prajñapyatām? pudgalaprajñapterhi darśanādikaṃ kāraṇam
# gang zag ces bya ba lta ba la sogs pa'i sngon rol na yod do zhes rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de gang yang gdags par bya / / 'di ltar gang zag tu tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu ni lta ba la sogs pa yin na /
sa yadi tebhyaḥ prāgvyavasthito 'stīti kalpyate, tadā darśananirapekṣaḥ syād ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ
# de gal te de dag las sngar rnam par gnas par yod par rtog na ni / / de'i tshe bum pa dang snam bu ltar / / lta ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med par 'gyur la /
yaśca svakāraṇanirapekṣaḥ sa nirhetuko dhanādinirapekṣaḥ dhanikavannāstītyabhiprāyaḥ / kiṃ cānyat
# gang zhig rang gi rgyu la ltos pa med pa de ni rgyu med pa yin te / / nod la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i nor can ltar med pa yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o /
vināpi darśanādīni yadi cāsau vyavasthitaḥ
# gzhan yang lta ba la sogs med pa yang / / gal te de ni gnas gyur na /
amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ / yadi manyase / darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo nāmāsti, sa darśanādikamupādānamupādatte iti
# de med par yang de dag ni / / yod par 'gyur bar the tshom med / / gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngon rol na gang zag ces bya ba zhig yod pa des lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len par byed do snyam du sems na /
nanvevaṃ sati nirastasaṃśayamamūnyapi darśanādīni vinā pudgalena bhaviṣyanti
# de lta na ni the tshom med par lta ba la sogs pa 'di dag kyang gang zag med par yod par 'gyur ro /
tathāhi devadatto dhanasaṃbandhātpūrvaṃ dhanavyatirikto vyavasthitaḥ san arthāntarabhūtameva pṛthaksiddhaṃ dhanamupādatte
# 'di ltar nor dang 'brel ba'i sngon rol na lha sbyin nor las tha dad par rnam par gnas par gyur nas nor so sor grub cing don gzhan du gyur pa sogs par byed pa de bzhin du /
evamupādāturapi svātmavyatirekeṇārthāntarabhūtaṃ darśanādikamupādānaṃ syāt / na tu saṃbhavatītyāha / ajyate kenacitkaścit kiṃcitkenacidajyate / kutaḥ kiṃcidvinā kaścit kiṃcitkaṃcidvinā kutaḥ / iha bījākhyena kāraṇena kiṃcitkāryamabhivyajyate 'ṅkurākhyam, tena ca kāryeṇa kiṃcit kāraṇamabhivyajyate bījākhyam / asyedaṃ kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti / evaṃ yadi kenaciddarśanādikenopādānena kaścidātmasvabhāvo 'bhivyajyate asyāyamupādāteti, kenaciccātmanā kiṃcidupādānaṃ darśanādikamabhivyajyate idamasyopādānamiti, tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate, tadā tannirāśrayamasadeva tasmānnāstyubhayorapi siddhiḥ, iti na yuktametat / darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti
# nye bar len pa po la yang nye bar len pa lta ba la sogs pa rang las tha dad par don gzhan du gyur pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig go / / srid pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni / / ci yis gang zhig gsal bar byed / / gang gis ci zhig gsal bar byed / / ci med gang zhig ga la yod / / gang med ci zhig ga la yod / / ces bya ba ste / / 'di na 'di ni 'di'i rgyu yin la / / 'di ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyus myu gu zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig mngon par gsal bar byed cing / / 'bras bu des kyang sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du gal te 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa po'o zhes bya bar lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig gi bdag gang zhig mngon par gsal bar byed cing / / 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba bdag gang gis lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phan tshun ltos nas nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po dag grub par 'gyur na / / gang gi tshe nye bar len pa po med par logs shig tu lta ba la sogs pa khas len pa de'i tshe ni rten med pas de med pa nyid yin no / / de'i phyir gnyi ga yang grub pa med pas / / lta ba la sogs pa las tha dad par nye bar len pa po gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so /
atrāha / yaduktaṃ darśanaśravaṇādibhya ityādi, atrocyate
# 'dir smras pa / / lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la brjod par bya ste /
yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt, syādeṣa doṣaḥ
# gal te lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na gnas so zhes bya bar khas blangs par gyur na ni / / nyes pa 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu / sarvebhyo darśanādibhyaḥ kaścitpūrvo na vidyate
# gang gi tshe / / lta ba la sogs thams cad kyi / / snga rol gang zhig yod pa min /
kiṃ tarhi ekaikasmātpūrvo vidyate / yadā caivam, tadā / ajyate darśanādīnāmanyena punaranyadā
# 'o na ci zhe na / / re re'i snga rol na yod pa yin no gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe / / lta sogs nang nas gzhan zhig gis / / gzhan gyi tshe na gsal bar byed / / gang gi tshe lta ba po zhes bya bar lta bas gsal bar byed pa de'i tshe ni /
yadā darśanena draṣṭetyabhivyajyate, na tadā śravaṇādīnyupādāya prajñapyate, tataśca pūrvoktadoṣānavasara iti
# nyan pa la sogs pa dag la brten nas nye bar gdags par bya ba ma yin no / / de'i phyir sngar smras pa'i nyes pa'i go skabs med do zhe na / / brjod pa 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
ucyate / etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyāstitvāsaṃbhavāt
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / lta ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni nye bar len pa med pa / / rgyu med pa gsal byed dang bral ba ni yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate
# lta la sogs pa thams cad kyi / / snga rol gal te yod min na ste /
iti parikalpyate, evamapi / ekaikasmātkathaṃ pūrvo darśanādeḥ sa vidyate
# de ltar rtog na / / de lta na yang / / lta la sogs pa re re yi / / snga rol de ni ji ltar yod /
yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati, sa ekaikasmādapi na bhavati / tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti, tadā ekaikasmādapi nāsti
# gang zhig thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa ma yin pa de ni re re'i snga rol na yang ma yin te / / dper na shing thams cad kyi snga rol na nags med pa de'i tshe re re'i snga rol na yang med la /
sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti / api ca
# bye ma thams cad la til mar 'byin pa med la / / bye ma re re la yang til mar med pa bzhin no / / gzhan yang /
yo hyekaikasmātpūrvo bhavati, nanu sa sarvebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati
# gang zhig re re'i snga rol du yod par 'gyur ba de ni thams cad kyi snga rol na yang yod par khas blangs par 'gyur te /
ekaikavyatirekeṇa sarvasyābhāvāt
# re re ma gtogs par thams cad med pa'i phyir ro /
tasmānna yuktamekaikasmātpūrvo vidyata iti
# de'i phyir re re'i snga rol na yod do zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so /
itaśca na yuktam / yasmāt / draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ / tadā / ekaikasmādbhavetpūrvaṃ
# 'di'i phyir yang mi rigs te / / gang gi phyir / / lta po de nyid nyan po de / / gal te tshor po'ang de nyid na / / de'i tshe / / re re'i snga rol yod gyur na /
na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti
# lta ba po gang yin pa de nyid nyan pa po yin no zhes bya bar brjod par ni rigs pa yang ma yin no / / gal te yin na /
yadi syāt, tadā darśanakriyārahitasyāpi śroturdraṣṭṭatvaṃ syāt, śravaṇakriyārahitasyāpi draṣṭuḥ śrotṛtvaṃ syāt
# de'i tshe lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i nyan pa po yang lta ba po nyid du 'gyur la / / nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba'i lta ba po yang nyan pa por 'gyur na /
na caivaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yaddarśanakriyārahito 'pi draṣṭā syāt, śravaṇakriyārahitaśca śroteti
# lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yang lta ba por 'gyur zhing / / nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba yang nyan pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de lta bu ni mthong ba yang ma yin no /
ata evāha / evaṃ caitanna yujyate / iti / pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha / evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti / ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe
# de nyid kyi phyir / / de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes bshad do / / bya ba so so la byed pa po tha dad pa'i phyir 'di ni de ltar yod par gal 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs ni / / bdag gcig yin na ni /
ekatve hi ātmanaḥ indriyāntaragamanaprasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya syāt, vātāyanāntaropagamanavaditi
# dbang po gzhan la 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur te / / skyes bu skar khung gzhan du nye bar 'gro ba bzhin no zhes rnam par 'chad do /
asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha / sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti
# slob dpon legs ldan byed ni / / thams cad na yod pa'i bdag la dbang po gzhan la 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon mi rigs so zhes de la sun 'byin par smra'o /
tadetadayuktaṃ svayūthyaparikalpitapudgalavādanirāsasya prastutatvāt, tasya ca sarvagatatvāpratijñānāt
