# 'di ni mi rigs te / / rang gi sde pas brtags pa'i gang zag tu smra ba dgag pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir dang de yang thams cad na yod pa nyid du khas ma 'ches pa'i phyir ro /
tasmād yukta eva prasaṅgadoṣa / athāpi yathoktadoṣaparijihīrṣayā
# de'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon rigs pa nyid do / / 'on te yang ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon spang bar 'dod pas /

# gal te lta po gzhan nyid la / / nyan pa po gzhan tshor gzhan na ste / / rtog par byed na de yang mi rigs te / / de ltar 'dod par gyur na / / lta po yod tshe nyan por 'gyur / / bdag kyang mang po nyid du 'gyur / / ji ltar ba glang las gzhan du gyur pa'i rta ni ba glang yod pa'i tshe cig car du yod par mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa de bzhin du / / gal te nyan pa po lta ba po las gzhan du gyur na ni / / de lta ba po yod pa'i tsha na yang cig car du yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na caivamiṣyate iti nāstyanyatvam / api ca / evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt
# de ltar ni mi 'dod pas gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang de lta yin na ni bdag mang por 'gyur te / / lta ba po dang nyan pa po dang tshor ba po la sogs pa rnams so so so sor grub par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /

# 'dir smras pa / / bdag ni lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa nyid do / / ci ste gal te de yod na / / de ni gang gis gdags par bya /
atha matam / yadyasti, kena prajñapyate sa iti yaducyate, iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante / tasmāddarśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ caturmahābhūtopādānamevāstīti
# snyam du sems na / / de la brjod par bya ste / / 'di ltar lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs na / / gang las rim gyis ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug go zhes lta ba dang nyan pa la sogs pa dag 'byung par 'gyur ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi yod de / / de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na / / bdag 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i nye bar len pa can yod do /
evamapi / darśanaśravaṇādīni vedanādīni cāpyatha
# de lta na yang / / lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang / / tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang /
bhavanti yebhyasteṣveṣa bhūteṣvapi na vidyate / yebhyo mahābhūtebhyo darśanādikamutpadyate, teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako 'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ / tatra yathā pūrvamuktam
# gang las 'gyur ba'i 'byung de la'ang / / de ni yod pa ma yin no / / 'byung ba chen po gang dag las lta ba la sogs pa skye ba de dag la'ang / / nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu can 'di yod pa mi rigs te / / sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so zhes bya bar dgongs so / / de la ji skad sngar /
kutaḥ kiṃcidvinā kaścitkiṃcitkaṃcidvinā kutaḥ / iti, ihāpi tathaiva vaktavyam / mahābhūtopādānādyaścātmā pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa mahābhūtānyupādāya syāt
# ci med gang zhig ga la yod / / gang med ci zhig ga la yod / / ces bshad pa de kho na ltar 'dir yang brjod par bya'o / / gal te nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i snga rol du bdag grub par gyur na ni / / des 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur na /
na caivam, nirhetukatvāt / yaśca nāsti, sa kathaṃ mahābhūtānyupādāsyati? iti darśanopādānavadbhūtopādāne 'pi dūṣaṇamuktameveti na punarucyate
# de ltar yang ma yin te rgyu med pa'i phyir ro / / gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa de ni ji ltar 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur / / de'i phyir / / lta ba'i nye bar len pa can ltar 'byung ba chen po'i nye bar len pa can la yang skyon brjod pa nyid yin pas slar yang ma brjod do / / gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'byung ba dag la yang yod pa ma yin no /
atrāha / yadyapyevamātmā pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpi darśanādikamasti, apratiṣedhāt
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang de ltar bdag bkag mod kyi / / 'on kyang lta ba la sogs pa ni yod pa nyid de / / bkag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro /
na ca anātmasvabhāvānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ darśanādisaṃbandho 'sti

# yod pa ni ma yin te / / lta ba la sogs pa bdag gang gi nye bar len pa yin pa de med do zhes bstan pa de'i tshe / / nye bar len pa po bdag med na lta ba la sogs pa / / nye bar len par gyur pa rnams / / yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur / / zhes gsungs pa ni /
darśanaśravaṇādīni vedanādīni cāpyatha
# lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang / / tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang /
na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi / yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam, nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati
# gang gi yin pa gal te med / / de dag kyang ni yod ma yin / / zhes bya ba ste / / lta ba la sogs pa dag gang gi yin par rtog pa de gang gi tshe med do zhes bshad pa de'i tshe kho nar lta ba la sogs pa de yang med do zhes gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
tataśca darśanādyabhāvānnāstyevātmeti
# de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bdag med do /
atrāha / kiṃ khalu bhavato niścitametannāstyevātmeti? kena etaduktam? nanu ca anantaramevoktaṃ darśanādyabhāvādātmāpi nāstīti
# 'dir smras pa / / ci bdag med do snyam du de ltar khyod kyis nges sam / / de skad sus smras / / lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir / / bdag kyang med do zhes thal ma thag tu smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
uktametadesmābhiḥ / na tu asyārtho bhavatā samyagniścitaḥ / yato bhāvarūpa ātmeti parikalpitaḥ, sa svabhāvato na vidyate, tasya ca mayā svabhāvābhiniveśanivartakameva vacanamuktamasadviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa, na tu asya abhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ / dvayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ yaśca bhāveṣvabhiniveśaḥ, yaśca abhāveṣu abhiniveśa iti / yathoktamāryadevena / yastavātmā mamānātmā tenātmāniyamānna saḥ
# de skad du kho bo cag gis smras mod kyi / / 'di'i don ni khyod kyis yang dag par gtan la ma phab pa yin no / / gang gi phyir bdag dngos po'i rang bzhin can yod do zhes brtags pa yin la / / de yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin zhing / / bdag gis kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gi gnyen por de la rang bzhin du mngon par zhen pa zlog par byed pa'i tshig smras pa yin gyi / / 'di'i dngos po med par brtags pa ni ma yin te / / 'di ltar 'di gnyis ni spang bar bya ba yin te / / gang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang gang yang dngos ngo med pa la mgon par zhen pa'o / / ji skad du slob dpon 'phags pa'i ltas / / khyod kyi bdag kyang nga'i min / / des bdag nges med de phyir med /
nanvanityeṣu bhāveṣu kalpanā nāma jāyate / iti / etadeva pratipādayannāha / prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca / na vidyate 'sti nāstīti nivṛttāstatra kalpanāḥ / prāk tāvaddarśanādibhya ātmā nāsti, tatra hi tasyāstitvābhāvāt / darśanādisahabhūto 'pi nāsti, pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayoḥ sahabhāvādarśanāt śaśaśṛṅgayoriva
# dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la / / rtog pa zhes kyang nye bar skye / / zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / / gang zhig lta la sogs pa yi / / snga rol da lta phyin med / / de la yod do med do zhes / / rtog pa dag ni ldog par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ni bdag med de / / de dang bral ba la yod pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro / / lta ba la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa yang med do / / so so so sor ma grub pa dag la /
ātmopādānayośca parasparanirapekṣayo pṛthakpṛthagasiddhatvāt sāṃpratamapi nāsti / urdhvamapi / yadi hi pūrvaṃ darśanādīni syuḥ, uttarakālamātmā syāt, tadānīmūrdhvaṃ saṃbhavet
# lhan cig pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir dang ri bong gi rva gnyis ltar phan tshun ltos pa med pa'i bdag dang nye bar blangs pa dag kyang so so so sor ma grub pa'i phyir da ltar yang med do / / phyis kyang med de / / 'di ltar gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gong du yod par 'gyur zhing / / bdag 'og rol gyi dus su yod par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phyis 'byung bar 'gyur na /
na caivam, akartṛkasya karmaṇo 'siddhatvāt / yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti, tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ parikalpayetprājñaḥ? tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam / ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā āryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake
# de ni de lta ma yin te / / byed pa po med pa'i las ma grub pa'i phyir ro / / bdag gang zhig de ltar yongs su brtags pa na lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngar ram phyis sam lhan cig yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin de la yod pa'am / / med pa nyid du shes rab can su zhig rtog par byed / / de'i phyir nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis las dang byed pa po bzhin du phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa nyid yin gyi / / ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so / / de nyid kyi phyir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las /
tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram / supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate / na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ / māyopamā gaganavidyusamā dakacandrasaṃnibha marīcisamāḥ
# de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi / / rgyal ba de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad / / srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste / / 'di la su yang mi skyo 'chi ba med / / sems can ming dang srog kyang mi rnyed de / / chos 'di rnams ni dbu ba chu shing 'dra / / sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste / / chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin /
na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā
# mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni / / 'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang /
na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato
# las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za / / 'khor ba na yang dkar nag 'bras bu smin /
na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ
# rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te / / las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med /
na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate / na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ / na ca dṛṣṭisthānagatiśuddhiriha na ca sattvacārasupaśāntagati / anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā
# de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min / / gzhan gyis byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba'ang med / / 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med / / thams cad yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min / / 'di na lta gnas 'jug pa dag pa min / / sems can spyod par bzhi 'jug pa med / / bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni / / skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas /
bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣamitā paramā
# stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs / / 'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog dam pa'i mchog /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvaparīkṣā nāma navamaṃ prakaraṇam / agnīndhanaparīkṣā daśamaṃ prakaraṇam
# ces rgya cher gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / snga rol na gnas pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha / yadidamuktaṃ tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātrorapi na svābhāvikī siddhiriti, tadayuktam, sāpekṣāṇāmapi padārthānāṃ sasvābhāvyadarśanāt / tathā hi agnirindhanamapekṣya bhavati
# 'dir smras pa / / nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te / / dngos po ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams la yang ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro / / 'di ltar bud shing la ltos nas me 'byung mod kyi /
na ca niḥsvabhāvo 'gniḥ, tasya auṣṇyadāhakatvādisvabhāvakāryopalambhāt / evamagnimapekṣya indhanaṃ bhavati
# me rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te / / tsha ba dang sreg par byed pa nyid rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du me la ltos nas bud shing yin mod kyi /
na ca tanniḥsvabhāvam, bāhyamahābhūtacatuṣṭayasvabhāvatvāt / evamupādānasāpekṣo 'pyupādātā svabhāvato bhaviṣyati, upādātṛsāpekṣaṃ copādānamityagnīndhanavadetau bhaviṣyata upādānopādātārāviti / ucyate / syādetadevam, yadi agnīndhane eva syātām, na tu staḥ / katham? iha yadi agnīndhane syātām, niyataṃ te ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā? ubhayathā tu na yujyata ityāha
# de rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te / / bsreg par bya ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du / / nye bar len pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa po dang nye bar len pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa yang ngo bo nyid yod par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir med dang bud shing bzhin du nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po de gnyis kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te me dang bud shing dag nyid yod na de ltar 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin no / / 'dir gal te me dang bud shing dag yod par gyur na / / de dag nges par gcig nyid dam tha dad pa nyid du yod par 'gyur grang /
yadindhanaṃ sa cedagnirekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ / anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādapyṛte bhavet / tatra idhyate yat tadindhanam, dāhyaṃ kāṣṭhādikasaṃbhūtam / tasya dagdhā kartā agniḥ / tatra yadi tāvad yadindhanaṃ sa evāgniriti parikalpyate, tadā kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaṃ syāt
# gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa / / bud shing gang de me yin na / / byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur / / gal te shing las me gzhan na / / shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur bud shing bsreg par bya ba shing la sogs pa las su gyur pa gang yin pa de'i sreg par byed pa po ni mi yin no / / de la gal te bud shing de nyid me yin no zhes bya bar rtog na ni de'i tshe byed pa po dang / / las dag gcig nyid du 'gyur na / / de ltar ni ma mthong ste /
na caivaṃ dṛṣṭam, ghaṭakumbhakārayośchettṛcchettavyayoścaikatvaprasaṅgāt, tasya cānabhyupagamāt
# rdza mkhan dang bum pa dag gam / / gcad bya dang gcod pa po yang gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir la / / de yang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro / / ci ste gzhan nyid yin na ni / / de lta na yang /
atha anyatvam, evamapi yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣasyāgnerupalabdhiḥ syāt / na hi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭastannirapekṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ
# gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na / / de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par mi dmigs par 'gyur ro / / bum pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu ni de la ltos pa med par mthong ba ma yin pa ma yin no /
na caivamindhananirapekṣo 'gniriti na yuktametat
# bud shing la ltos pa med pa'i me ni de ltar yang ma yin pas /
api ca / yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadānīm
# 'di ni mi rigs so / / gzhan yang gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni de'i tshe /
nityapradīpta eva syādapradīpanahetukaḥ
# rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur / / 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing /
punarārambhavaiyarthyamevaṃ cākarmakaḥ sati
# rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur / / de lta yin na las kyang med /
indhanātpṛthagbhūto 'gniriṣyamāṇo nityapradīpta eva syāt, apradīpanahetukaśca syāt punarārambhavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt, evaṃ ca sati akarmaka eva syāt
# me bud shing las tha dad par gyur par 'dod pa na rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur zhing / / 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur la / / yang rtsom pa don med par 'gyur zhing / / de lta yin dang las kyang med par 'gyur ro /
amumevārthaṃ pratipādayitukāma āha
# don 'di nyid bstan par bzhed nas / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir /
paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ / punarārambhavaiyarthyaṃ nityadīptaḥ prasajyate / iti / tatra pradīpyate taditi pradīpanamindhanam
# 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing / / rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni / / rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur / / zhes bya bar gsungs so / / de la des 'bar bar byed pas na 'bar bar byed de bud shing ngo / / 'di la 'bar bar byed pa rgyur yod pas na 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las 'byung ba'o /
pradīpanaṃ heturasyeti pradīpanahetuka, na pradīpanahetukaḥ apradīpanahetukaḥ
# 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ni / / 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung ba'o /
yadi pradīpanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣaḥ syāt
# gal te 'bar bar byed pa las me gzhan yin par gyur na ni de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par 'gyur ro /
yo hi yasmādanyaḥ, sa tannirapekṣo dṛṣṭaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ / tataśca paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ syāt, pradīpanasāpekṣasya hi agneḥ tadabhāve syānnirvāṇam
# gang zhig gang las gzhan yin pa de ni ltos pa med de / / bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no / / de'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir rtag tu 'bar bar byed do / / 'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i me de ni med na 'chi bar 'gyur na /
yadā tu pradīpananirapekṣa, tadā nirvāṇapratyayavaikalyānnityapradīpta eva bhavet
# gang gi tshe / / 'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa med pa de'i tshe ni 'chi ba'i rkyen ma tshang bas rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
nityapradīpte cāgnau sati agneraparinirvāṇārthaṃ  cāsya upādānasaṃdhukṣaṇādikaṃ vyarthameva syāt
# rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni / / mi 'chi bar bya ba'i phyir de nye bar len pa dang spar ba la sogs pa'i rtsom pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
evaṃ ca sati akarmako 'gniḥ kartā syāt
# de lta yin na me las med cing mi bdog pa yin bzhin du byed pa por yang 'gyur ro /
na ca avidyamānakarmakasya kartṛtvaṃ vandhyāsutasyeva
# las yod pa ma yin pa ni byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te / / mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no /
tasmādindhanādagneranyatvamiti na yujyate / atrāha / yadetaduktam / anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādapyṛte bhavet
# de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan pa nyid kyang mi rigs so / / 'dir smras pa / / gang 'di skad du / / gal te shing las me gzhan na / / shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur /
iti, tadayuktam / ihānyatve 'pi sati agnīndhanayorna vinaiva indhanena agnerastitvam / yasmājjvālāparigato 'rtho dāhyatvalakṣaṇaḥ indhanam / tadāśrayeṇa ca agnirupalabhyate na pṛthak
# zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te / / 'dir me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin yang / / bud shing med par me yod pa nyid ma yin te / / gang gi phyir / / 'bar bar gyur pa'i don mes bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la / / me yang de la brten nas dmigs kyi / / so sor ni ma yin no / / gang gi tshe / / de ltar me dang 'brel pa las bud shing du brjod par 'gyur zhing /
yadā caitadevam, agnisaṃbandhādevendhanavyapadeśo bhavati, indhanāśrayeṇa cāgnirupalabhyate na pṛthak, tadā anyaścedindhanādagnirityādidoṣaprasaṅgasya nāstyevāvasara iti / asya pakṣasyāṣyayuktatāmudbhāvayannāha / tatraitasmādidhyamānamindhanaṃ bhavatīti cet / kenedhyatāmindhanaṃ tattāvanmātramidaṃ yadā / yadi manyase jvālāparigato 'rtho dāhyalakṣaṇaḥ indhanam, tadāśrayaścāgniriti, evamapi parikalpyamāne indhanamagnirdahatīti nopapadyate / yasmāt / kenedhyatāmindhanaṃ tattāvanmātramidaṃ yadā / ihendhanamagnirdahatīti parikalpyamāne jvālāparigataṃ dāhyamindhanamiti, na caitadvayatirekeṇāparamagniṃ paśyāmo yenendhanaṃ dahyeta / yasmādetāvanmātramidamupalabhyate yaduta jvālāparigataṃ dāhyamātram / yadā caitadvayatirikto nāstyagniḥ, tadā kena tadindhanaṃ dāhyatām? tāvanmātramidaṃ yadā, idhyamānamātramidaṃ yadetyarthaḥ / tasmānnāgnirindhanaṃ dahati tadvayatiriktāgnyabhāvāt
# me yang bud shing la brten nas dmigs kyi so sor ma yin pa de'i tshe / / gal te shing las me gzhan na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes par thal ba'i go skabs med do zhe na phyogs 'di yang mi rigs pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro / / de la gal te 'di snyam du / / bsreg bzhin bud shing yin sems na / / gang tshe de tsam de yin na / / gang gis bud shing de sreg byed / / ces bya ba gsungs te; gal te 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i don bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la / / me ni de'i rten can yin no snyam du sems na / / de ltar brtags kyang / / mes bud shing bsreg go zhes bya ba mi 'thad de / / gang gi phyir / / gang tshe de tsam de yin na / / gang gis bud shing de sreg byed / / ces bya ba 'byung ngo / / gang tshe de tsam de yin na / / zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bsreg bzhin pa tsam zhig de yin pa na zhes bya ba'i don to / / 'dir mes bud shing bsreg go zhes rtog pa na / / bud shing ni 'bar bar gyur pa bsreg par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / 'di las ma gtogs par gang gis bud shing sreg par byed pa'i me gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / / de'i phyir 'di tsam zhig tu gyur pa 'di nye bar dmigs te / / 'di lta ste / / 'bar bar gyur pa'i bsreg par bya ba tsam mo / / gang gi tshe de las tha dad pa'i me yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe bud shing de gang gis sreg par byed / / de'i phyir mes bud shing mi bsreg ste / / de las ma gtogs pa'i me med pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe 'bar bar gyur pa 'ga' zhig kyang ga la yod de /
yadā caivam, tadā kutaḥ kasyacijjvālāparigatiriti sa eva doṣo na vepate
# de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid bzlog tu med do / / gzhan yang me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du khas len na /
api ca / anyatvābhyupagame 'gnīndhanayoridhyamānavyapadeśābhāvātkuta idhyamānamindhanam, kuto vā indhanamagnirdhakṣyatīti pratipādayannāha / anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ / na nirvāsyatyanirvāṇaḥ sthāsyate vā svaliṅgavān / yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, so 'nyatvādandhakāramivendhanaṃ na prāpnuyāt
# bsreg bzhin pa'i brjod pa med pas / / bsreg bzhin pa bud shing dug la 'gyur zhing / / mes bud shing bsreg par yang ga la 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na / / sreg par mi 'gyur mi sreg na / / 'chi bar mi 'gyur mi 'chi na / / rang rtags dang yang ldan par gnas / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni / / de gzhan yin pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar bud shing dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro /
na ca dhakṣyati aprāptatvādviprakṛṣṭadeśāvasthitamivetyabhiprāyaḥ
# phrad pa med pa'i phyir bsreg par yang mi 'gyur te / / bskal pa'i yul na gnas pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs so /
evaṃ ca idhyamānamindhanaṃ bhavatīti nopapannameva / tataśca agnernirvāṇaṃ na syāt
# de ltar na bsreg bzhin pa bud shing yin no zhes bya ba mi 'thad pa nyid do / / de'i phyir me 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
anirvāṇaśca svaliṅgavāneva sthāsyati, pradīpta ityarthaḥ
# mi 'chi na yang rang gi rtags dang ldan pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te / / rab tu 'bar zhing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
vāśabdo 'vadhāraṇe draṣṭavyo vikalpārtho vā / svaliṅgavāneva agniḥ sthāsyati, yadi vā nāstyanyatvamagnerindhanāditi / samuccaye vā / anyo na prāpsyati na dhakṣyati na ca nirvāsyati svaliṅgavāṃśca sthāsyati / tasmādayuktamindhanādanyatvamagneḥ
# yang gi sgra ni rang gi rtags dang ldan pa kho nar gnas par 'gyur ba'am / / yang na bud shing las me gzhan du gyur pa nyid med do zhes nges par bzung ba 'am rnam par rtog pa'i don du blta bar bya'o / / yang na gzhan yin pa'i phyir mi phrad pa dang phrad pa med na bsreg par mi 'gyur ba dang mi bsreg na 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang mi 'chi na rang gi rtags dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan nyid du yang mi rigs so /
atrāha / ayuktamagnīndhanayoranyatvam, yasmānna prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punarityādi, tadayuktam / dṛṣṭā hi anyatve strīpuruṣayoḥ prāptiḥ, evamagnīndhanayorapi bhaviṣyatīti
# 'dir smras pa / / me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin na gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na / / bsreg par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te / / 'di ltar skyes pa dang bud med dag gzhan nyid yin yang phrad par mthong ba yin la / / me dang bud shing dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro /
ucyate / anya evendhanādagnirindhanaṃ prāpnuyādyadi / strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā / syādetadevam, yadi strīpuruṣavatparasparānapekṣā agnīndhanayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / ji ltar bud med skyes pa dang / / skyes pa'ang bud med phrad pa bzhin / / gal te shing las me gzhan na / / shing dang phrad par rung bar 'gyur / / gal te me dang bud shing dag skyes pa dang bud med ltar / / phan tshun ltos pa med par grub par gyur na ni /
na tvastītyāha / anya evendhanādagnirindhanaṃ kāmamāpnuyāt / agnīndhane yadi syātāmanyonyena tiraskṛte / na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati yadindhananirapekṣo 'gniḥ syāt, agninirapekṣaṃ cendhanamiti
# de de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na / / gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni / / gal te me dang shing dag ni / / gcig gis gcig ni bsal gyur na / / shing las me gzhan nyid yin yang / / shing dang phrad par 'dod la rag / / ces bya ba ste bud shing la ltos pa med par me yod par 'gyur zhing / / me la mi ltos par bud shing yod par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni mi srid do /
tasmād dṛṣṭāntavaiyarthyam
# de'i phyir dpe 'di ni don med pa yin te /
anyonyāpekṣādhīnajanmanāṃ satyanyatve yeṣāṃ prāptiḥ siddhā, teṣāmeva dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānaṃ nyāyyaṃ syāt
# gzhan nyid yin yang phan tshun ltos pa la rag las te / / skyes par gyur pa gang dag phrad par grub pa de dag nyid dpe nye bar dgod par rigs par 'gyur na /
te ca na saṃbhavantīti na yuktametadanyatve sati prāptirastīti / atrāha / yadyapi agnīndhanayoḥ strīpuruṣavatparasparanirapekṣā siddhirnāsti, tathāpi parasparāpekṣā tāvadasti
# de dag kyang yod pa ma yin pas / / gzhan nyid yin bzhin du phrad pa yod do zhes bya ba mi rigs so / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang me dang bud shing dag la skyes pa dang bud med ltar phan tshun ltos pa med par grub pa med mod kyi / / de lta na yang phan tshun ltos pa ni re zhig yod pa yin no /
tataśca astyevāgnīndhanayoḥ svarūpasiddhiḥ parasparasāpekṣatvāt / na hi avidyamānayorvandhyāputraduhitroḥ parasparāpekṣatā dṛṣṭeti
# phan tshun ltos pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag gi rang gi ngo bo grub pa ni yod pa yin te / / yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu dang bu mo dag ni phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du ma mthong ngo /
ucyate / evamapi / yadīndhanamapekṣyāgnirapekṣyāgniṃ yadīndhanam / kataratpūrvaniṣpannaṃ yadapekṣyāgnirindhanam / asyendhanasya ayamagnirdāhakaḥ kartā, ityevaṃ yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirvyavasthāpyate, asyāgneridamindhanaṃ karmetyevamagnimapekṣya yadīndhanam, tat kataradanayoḥ pūrvaniṣpannam? kimindhanaṃ yadapekṣyāgni syāt, uta agniryamapekṣyendhanaṃ syāt? tatra yadi indhanaṃ pūrvaniṣpannamiti kalpyate, tadayuktam, agninirapekṣasya anidhyamānasyendhanatvābhāvāt, tṛṇādeḥ sarvasya caiva indhanatvaprasaṅgāt / atha pūrvamagniḥ paścādindhanamiti, tadapyayuktam, indhanātpūrvasiddhasyāgnerasaṃbhavāt, nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt / paścāccāpekṣayā niṣprayojanatvāt / tasmānnāsti atra kiṃcitpūrvasiddhaṃ yadapekṣya itarasya siddhi syāt / athāpi manyase / pūrvamindhanaṃ paścādagniriti, evamapi / yadīndhanamapekṣyāgniragneḥ siddhasya sādhanam / bhaviṣyati
# brjod par bya ste / / de lta na yang / / gal te shing ltos me yin la / / gal te me ltos shing yin na / / gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba / / dang por grub pa gang zhig yin / / gal te me 'di ni bud shing 'di'i sreg par byed pa'i byed pa po yin no zhes de ltar bud shing la ltos nas mer rnam par 'jog cing / / gal te bud shing 'di ni me 'di'i las yin no zhes de ltar me la ltos te / / bud shing rnam par 'jog pa de'i tshe de gnyis las sngar grub pa gang zhig yin / / ci bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ram / / 'on te me la ltos te bud shing du 'gyur / / de la gal te bud shing dang por grub po zhes rtog na ni / / de ni mi rigs te me la ltos pa med cing bsreg bzhin pa ma yin pa ni bud shing nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang rtsva la sogs pa thams cad kyang bud shing nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / ci ste dang por me yin la phyis bud shing yin no zhe na / / de yang rigs pa ma yin te / / bud shing las sngar grub pa'i me med pa'i phyir dang rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phyis ltos pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir 'dir gang la ltos nas cig shos 'grub par 'gyur ba dang por grub pa gang yang med do / / ci ste yang sngar bud shing yin la phyis me yin no snyam du sems na / / de lta na yang / / gal te shing ltos me yin na / / me grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur /
yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirbhaviṣyatīti parikalpyate, evaṃ tarhi siddhasya sato 'gneḥ punarapi sādhanaṃ syāt / vidyamānasyaiva padārthasya siddharūpasyāpekṣā yujyate / na hi avidyamāno devadatto gṛhe kaṃcidapekṣate / evaṃ yadi agnirvidyamāno na syāt, nāsāvindhanamapekṣate
# gal te bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na / / de ltar na 'o na me grub zin pa la yang bsgrub par 'gyur te / / dngos po yod cing grub pa'i ngo bo can kho na ltos par rigs kyi / / yod pa ma yin pa'i lha sbyin ni khyim 'ga' la yang ltos pa ma yin no / / gal te de ltar me yod par ma gyur na ni / / de bud shing la ltos par mi 'gyur ro /
tasmādastitvamagne rambhupeyam / tadā ca kimasya indhanasyāpekṣayā punaḥ kartavyam? na hi siddho 'gniḥ punarindhanena  kartavyo yadarthamindhanāpekṣāsāphalyaṃ syāt
# de'i phyir me yod par khas blang bar bya dgos la; de'i tshe na yang 'di bud shing la ltos pas ci zhig bya / / gang gi don du bud shing la ltos pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba grub zin pa'i me ni yang bud shing gis byar med do /
tasmādindhanamapekṣyāgnirbhavatīti na yuktam
# de'i phyir bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so /
api ca / yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirbhavatīti parikalpyate
# gang yang gal te bud shing la brten nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na / / de lta yin na /
evaṃ satīndhanaṃ cāpi bhaviṣyati niragnikam / yadi indhanamasiddhaṃ syāt, naiva tadagninā apekṣyeta, asiddhasyāpekṣāyogāt / tasmānniragnikasyendhanasya siddhirabhyupeyā, na caivametaditi na yuktametaditi
# bud par bya ba'i shing la yang / / me med par ni 'gyur ba yin / / gal te bud shing grub par ma gyur na ni de la me mi ltos pa nyid de / / ma grub pa la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir bud shing me med par grub par khas blang bar bya bar 'gyur na de ni de lta bu yang ma yin no /
atha matam / yaugapadyenaiva indhanasiddhayā agnisiddhiḥ, agnisiddhayā ca indhanasiddiḥ
# de'i phyir 'di ni yod pa ma yin no / / ci ste dus gcig kho nar bud shing 'grub pas me 'grub cing / / me 'grub pas kyang bud shing 'grub par 'gyur te /
tataśca ekasyāpi pūrvasiddhayanabhyupagamāt, tatra yaduktam / kataratpūrvaniṣpannaṃ yadapekṣyāgnirindhanam
# de'i phyir / / gcig kyang sngar grub par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir / / gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba / / dang por grub pa gang zhig yin /
iti, tadayuktamiti / ucyate / evamapīṣyamāṇe ubhayasyāpi nāsti siddhiḥ / yasmāt / yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvastamevāpekṣya sidhyati
# zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rigs so zhes 'dod na / / brjod par bya ste / / de ltar 'dod na ni yang gnyi ga grub pa yod pa ma yin te / / 'di ltar / / gal te dngos po gang ltos 'grub / / de nyid la yang ltos nas ni /
yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ
# ltos bya gang yin de 'grub na / / gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub /
tatra yadi yaḥ agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ yamindhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, indhanākhyaśca bhāvaḥ yo 'gninā ātmasiddhayarthamapekṣitavyaḥ, sa yadi tameva agnyākhyaṃ padārthamapekṣya sidhyati, kathyatāmidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti / yadā ca agnyabhāve sati indhanasya siddhireva nāsti, tadā akāraṇasyendhanasyābhāvāt kutastaddhetuko 'gniḥ prasetsyati? evaṃ ya indhanākhyo bhāvaḥ yamagnyākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, agnyākhyaśca bhāvo yaḥ indhanākhyena ātmasiddhayarthamapekṣitavyaḥ, sa yadi tamevendhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, kathyatāṃ kimidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti
# de la gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la / / bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po bdag nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de / / gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub na / / da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba smros shig / / gal te me med pa na bud shing 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / rgyu med pas bud shing med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi me 'grub par ga la 'gyur / / de bzhin du gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig / / me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la / / me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing gi bdag nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir / / ltos par bya bar grub pa gang yin pa de yang gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po de nyid ltos nas 'grub na / / da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba brjod par bya dgos so /
yadā hi indhanābhāve sati agneḥ siddhirnāsti, tadā niṣkāraṇasyāgnerabhāvāt kutastaddhetukamindhanam?
# gal te bud shing med pa na me 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyu med pas me med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi bud shing yod par ga la 'gyur /
itaśca agnīndhanayoḥ parasparāpekṣayāpi siddhirasatī, siddhāsiddhayorapekṣābhāvāditi pratipādayannāha
# 'di'i phyir yang me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos nas grub pa med de / / grub pa dang ma grub pa dag ltos pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvaḥ so 'siddho 'pekṣate katham
# dngos po ltos grub gang yin pa / / de ma grub na ji ltar ltos /
athāpyapekṣate siddhastvapekṣāsya na yujyate
# ci ste grub pa ltos shen / / de ni ltos par mi rigs so /
yo hi agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ indhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, saḥ asiddho vā indhanamapekṣate siddho vā? yadi asiddhaḥ, tadā asiddhatvāt kharaviṣāṇavannendhanamapekṣeta
# me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po la ltos nas grub pa gang yin pa de ma grub pa'am grub pa zhig bud shing la ltos grang / / gal te ma grub pa zhig yin na ni / / de'i tshe ma grub pa'i phyir / / bud shing la mi ltos te bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
atha siddhaḥ, siddhatvāt kimasyendhanāpekṣayā? na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyate vaiyarthyāt / evamindhane 'pi vācyam
# ci ste grub pa yin na ni grub pa'i phyir de ltos ci dgos te / / don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir grub zin pa yin yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no / / de bzhin du bud shing la yang brjod par bya'o /
tasmānnāgnīndhanayoḥ parasparāpekṣayā yaugapadyena vā siddhiriti
# de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos par ram / / dus gcig tu grub pa med do /
yataścaivam, tasmāt / apekṣyendhanamagnirna / atha syāt / anapekṣyāgnistarhi bhaviṣyatīti
# gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir / / shing la ma ltos pa'i me med de zhes bya ba'o / / ci ste 'o na ma ltos par mer 'gyur ro snyam na /
etadapi na yuktamityāha / nānapekṣyāgnirindhanam / anyatvapratiṣedhādahetukatvaprasaṅgācca / yathā ca agnirapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā indhanaṃ saṃbhavati, evamindhanamapītyāha
# 'di yang mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni / / shing la ma ltos me yang med / / ces bya ba ste / / gzhan nyid bkag zin pa'i phyir dang rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / ji ltar bud shing la ltos pa'am / / ma ltos pa'i me med pa de bzhin du bud shing yang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
apekṣyendhanamagniṃ na nānapekṣyāgnimindhanam
# me la ltos pa'i shing med de / / me la ma ltos shing yang med /
etacca anantarameva gatārthatvānna punarucyate / atrāha / kimanayā asmākamatisūkṣmekṣikayā prayojanam, ye vayaṃ brūmaḥ
# ces bya ba ste / / 'di'i don ni thal ma thag tu go bar zad pa nyid kyis na yang mi brjod do / / 'dir smras pa dpyad pa shin tu phra mo 'dis kho bo cag la ci dgos te /
yasmādagninā idhyamānamindhanaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate, tasmātte eva agnīndhane iti
# gang gi phyir kho bo cag ni mngon sum gyi bud shing mes bsreg bzhin pa dmigs pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag yod do zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig smra'o zhe na /
ucyate / syādetadevam, yadi agnirindhanaṃ dahet
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te mes bud shing bsregs na de de ltar 'gyur na /
yadi indhane 'gniḥ saṃbhavet, sa indhanaṃ dahet
# sreg pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar gal te / / shing la me yod na ni des bud shing sreg par 'gyur na /
na tu saṃbhavatītyāha / āgacchatyanyato nāgnirindhane 'gnirna vidyate
# yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa / / me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste / / shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin /
indhanavyatiriktāttāvatkutaścidanyato 'gnerāgamanaṃ nāsti, tasya adṛṣṭatvāt

kiṃ punarmūlodakādīnāmabhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kriyata iti / tatra svarūpaṃ tāvanna kriyate vidyamānatvāt abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet, keyamabhivyaktirnāma? prakāśateti cet, evaṃ tarhi saiva kriyate pūrvamavidyamānatvādasyāḥ / satkāryavādatyāgaścaivaṃ jāyate abhivyakteḥ pūrvamavidyamānatvātpaścācca bhāvāt / svarūpasya cotpattipratyayanirapekṣatvātkhapuṣpavadabhivyaktipratyayasāpekṣatāpi na syāt / api ca iyamabhivyaktirabhivyaktasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeta anabhivyaktasya vā? tatra tāvad yadabhivyaktaṃ tannābhivyajyate, tasyābhivyaktivaiyarthyāt aniṣṭadoṣaprasaṅgācca / anabhivyaktamapi nābhivyajyate khapuṣpavadanabhivyaktatvāt / ityevamabhivyaktirna saṃbhavati / athāpi syāt / vidyamānasyaiva pratyayaiḥ sthaulyaṃ kriyate iti, evamapi yadeva sthaulyaṃ pūrvaṃ nāstīti tadeva kriyata iti kutaḥ sthaulyāpādanamabhivyaktiḥ? saukṣmyasya ca nirhetukasyāsaṃbhavāt kasya sthūlatāpādanādabhivyaktiḥ syāditi / tadevaṃ sarvathā indhane agnerna saṃbhava iti indhane 'gnirna vidyate / na cāvidyamānāgninā indhanasya dahanamupajāyate ityasatyamevaitadupalabhate bhavān / api ca / yathā pūrvaṃ gatāgatagamyamānānāṃ dūṣaṇamuktam / atrendhane śeṣamuktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ / agninā indhanaṃ dahyamānamupalabhyate ityatra indhanaprastāve śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ gamyamānagatāgatadūṣaṇena veditavyam, uktapāṭhaviparyayeṇa / dagdhaṃ na dahyate tāvadadagdhaṃ naiva dahyate

jvalata ayu praśāmyatāmaśeṣa pṛthivi vinaśyipi naivasyānyathātvam / tathā / araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāmu trayebhi saṃgatiḥ
# ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab pa / / sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med / / ces gsungs pa lta bu'o / / de bzhin du / / ji ltar gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang / / lag pa'i rtsol ba 'di gsum 'dus pa yi /
iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtu kārya laghū nirudhyate
# rkyen 'di dag las me ni 'byung 'gyur zhing / / byung ste bya ba byas nas myur du 'gag /
atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta ayamāgatu kutra yāti vā / vidiśo diśa sarvi mārgato nāgatirnāsya gatiśca labhyati
# de nas 'di ni gang nas 'ongs sam gar / / song zhes mkhas pa gang zhig tshol bar byed / / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu btsal ba dang / / 'di yi 'gro dang 'ong ba rnyed min bzhin /
skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya ādhyātmika śūnya bāhirāḥ
# phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni / / nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste /
sarvātmaviviktanālayā dharma ākāśasabhāvalakṣaṇāḥ
# thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la / / chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid /
imu īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkaradarśane tvayā
# chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni / / mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs /
anubuddha yatha tvayātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣān
# ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar / / de bzhin lha mir bcas pas rtogs par gyis /
viparītaabhūtakalpitai rāgadoṣaiḥ paridahyate jagat
# log pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi / / 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs /
kṛpameghaśamāmbuśītalāṃ muñca dhārāmamṛtasya nāyaka
# thugs rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu / / 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob /
iti vistaraḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau agnīndhanaparīkṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇam / pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā ekādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva ātmā, saṃsārasadbhāvāt / yadi hi ātmā na syāt, kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt? uktaṃ hi bhagavatā / anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti / avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti
# ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / me dang bud shing brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / bdag ni yod pa nyid de / / 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro / / gal te bdag yod par ma gyur na ni / / 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i ngo bor skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas gang zhig 'khor bar 'gyur / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do / / sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa / / sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba can / / sred pa'i lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa / / 'khor zhing rgyug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no zhes gsungs so /
yadā ca bhagavadupadeśātsaṃsāro 'sti, tadā saṃsartāpyasti / sa ca ātmā ucyata iti
# gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pas 'khor ba yod pa de'i tshe 'khor ba po yang yod la / / de la yang bdag ces bya'o /
ucyate / syādātmā, yadā saṃsāra eva syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na / / bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no /
katham? yasmādasya / pūrvā prajñāyate koṭirnetyuvāca mahāmuniḥ
# 'di ltar / / sngon mtha' sngon nam zhes zhus tshe / / thub pa chen pos min zhes gsungs /
saṃsāro 'navarāgro hi nāsyādirnāpi paścimam / koṭirbhāgo deśa iti paryāyāḥ / pūrvā koṭiḥ pūrvo deśa ityarthaḥ
# 'khor ba thog ma mtha' med de / / de la sngon med phyi ma med / / mtha' dang cha dang cha shas zhes bya ba rnams ni rnam grangs so / / sngon gyi mtha' ni sngon gyi cha zhes bya ba'i don to /
yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt, niyataṃ tasya pūrvamapi syāt, paścimamapi, ghaṭādīnāmiva
# gal te 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / bum pa la sogs pa dag bzhin du de la nges par sngon dang phyi ma yang yod par gyur na /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā / anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti
# yod pa ni ma yin te / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do zhes gsungs so /
yadeva avarāgre na staḥ, saṃsārasya anavarāgravacanāt, saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān
# gang gi phyir de ltar 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med par gsungs pa de'i phyir 'khor ba nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs pa ma yin nam /
tasmānnāsti saṃsāraḥ, pūrvāparakoṭayanupalambhāt, alātacakravat, iti sthitam / atredaṃ vicāryate
# de'i phyir sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs pa'i phyir / / 'khor ba med de mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no zhes bya bar gnas so / / 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā, kathaṃ punaridamāha / tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate
# gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba'i sngon dang phyi ma bkag na / / ji ltar dge slong dag de lta bas na / / 'khor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir nan tan du bya'o snyam du de ltar khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gsungs she na / / brjod par bya ste /
avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāmityādiviśeṣaṇopādānātteṣāmevāyamanavarāgraḥ saṃsāra iti pratīyate, na punastattvajñānānilabalāt samunmūlitāvidyānīvaraṇatarūṇām
# sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par nye bar bkod pas de dag kho na'i 'khor ba de thog ma dang tha ma med par rtogs kyi / / de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rlung gi shugs kyis ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i ljon shing drungs phyung ba rnams kyis ni ma yin te /
teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam
# 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi mas / / nyon mongs pa'i ljon shing ma lus par bsregs pa de dag la ni mtha' yod pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o /
kathaṃ punarādirahitānāmantopadeśa iti yāvat
# yang ji ltar na thog ma dang bral ba rnams la tha ma yod par bstan zhe na /
dṛṣṭametad bāhyeṣu vrīhyādiṣu ādyabhāve 'pi dahanādisaṃparkādantasadbhāvaḥ
# phyi rol gyi 'bru la sogs pa dag la thog ma med kyang / / me la sogs pa dang phrad pa las tha ma yod pa ni mthong ba nyid do /
yathoktamāryadevapādaiḥ
# ji skad du / / 'phags pa'i lhas /
yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo 'nto na cādistasya vidyate
# ji ltar sa bon mtha' mthong zhing / / de la thog ma yod min ltar /
tathā kāraṇavaikalyājjanmano 'pi na saṃbhavaḥ
# de bzhin rgyu ni ma tshang phyir / / skye ba 'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
iti / sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā
# zhes bshad do / / tha ma bstan pa de yang sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa rnams spro bar bya ba'i phyir / / 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la gzhug te / / 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas mdzad pa yin te /
vastukacintāyāṃ tu saṃsāra eva nāsti, tatkuto 'sya parikṣayaḥ? pradīpāvasthāyāṃ rajjūragaparikṣayavat / atrāha / yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate
# dngos po sems pa yin na ni / / 'khor ba nyid med na de'i phyir de zad pa lta ga la yod / / 'dir smras pa / / 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos te tha ma ltar thog ma yang ci ste ma gsungs she na / / brjod pa / / rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam
# 'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma med de / / de'i phyir gnyi ga ltar yang thog ma med pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o /
atrāha / yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya, tathāpi madhyamasti, apratiṣedhāt
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma gnyis yod pa ma yin mod kyi de lta na yang ma 'gags pa'i phyir / / dbus yod pa yin no /
tataśca asti saṃsāro madhyasadbhāvāt
# de'i phyir 'khor ba yod de / / dbus yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha yannāsti, na tasya madhyamasti tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvaraṇasyeti
# 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni dbus med de / / dper na rus sbal gyi spu'i gos bzhin no /
hāsyaḥ khalvasi / nanu ca bhoḥ, / naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet / agramiti ādiḥ, pūrvam, prathamam ucyate / avaramiti avasānam, antaḥ, vyavaccheda ucyate
# khyod ni bzhad gang bya bar 'os pa zhig ste / / gang la thog ma tha med pa / / de la dbus ni ga la yod / / ma yin nam / / thog ma zhes bya ba ni / / je dang sngon dang dang po la zhes bya'o / / tha ma zhes bya ba ni mtha' dang mjug dang rgyun chad pa la bya'o /
yasya saṃsārasya ādirantaśca pratiṣiddhaḥ, tasya kuto madhyaṃ bhaviṣyati? tataśca saṃjñāmātrakameva viparyāsaparavaśamānasānāṃ saṃsāraḥ ādimadhyāvasānavirahitatvādākāśavadalātacakrādivaditi bhāvaḥ
# 'khor ba gang la thog ma dang tha ma bkag pa de la dbus yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir 'khor ba ni nam mkha' ltar thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang bral ba'i phyir ming tsam zhig tu zad de / / mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
saṃsārābhāvācca nāsti ātmeti / yata evaṃ saṃsārasyādimadhyāvasānāni na santi, ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha
# 'khor ba med pa'i phyir / / bdag kyang yod pa ma yin no / / gang gi phyir / / de ltar 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dag med pa de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba med pas / / skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa rnams la snga ba dang phyi ba rnams dang lhan cig pa'i rim pa yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsungs pa /
tasmānnātropapadyante pūrvāparasahakramāḥ / yathā ca nopapadyante tathā pratipādayannāha / pūrvaṃ jātiryadi bhavejjarāmaraṇamuttaram
# de phyir de la snga phyi dang / / lhan cig rim pa mi 'thad do / / ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te skye ba sngar 'gyur la / / rga shi phyi ma yin na ni /
nirjarāmaraṇā jātirbhavejjāyeta cāmṛtaḥ
# skye ba rga shi med pa dang / / ma shi bar yang skye bar 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
yadi pūrvaṃ jātirbhavet, tadā maraṇasahitā syāt
# gal te skye ba snga mar gyur na ni / / de'i tshe rga shi dang bral bar 'gyur na /
na ca jarādirahitā jātiryujyate, asaṃskṛtatvaprasaṅgāt
# rga ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni mi rung ste / / 'dus ma byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt / tataśca ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādahetukadoṣaśca
# rga shi dang bral ba'i dngos po la skye ba yod par rtog pa na / / lha sbyin gzhan du ma shi bar 'dir dang por skye bar rtogs par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma yod par 'gyur zhing / / rgyu med pa'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro /
abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityevaṃ pūrvāntakalpanā ca na syāt / abhūtvā ca pūrvaṃ paścādihotpādaḥ syāt
# bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur to zhes de ltar sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs par yang mi 'gyur zhing / / sngon byung bar ma gyur pa las phyis 'dir skye bar yang 'gyur ro /
atha syāt / āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva utpādo dṛṣṭaḥ, evamātmāno 'pīti
# ci ste ji ltar aa mra la sogs pa rnams sngar rga shi dang 'brel pa med par yang dang po kho nar skye bar mthong ste / / de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no snyam na /
naivam / sādhyasamatvāt / āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa
# de ltar ma yin te / / bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro / / aa mra la sogs pa rnams kyang ni rang gi sa bon 'gags par gyur pa na / / skye ba'i phyir gzhan du ma zhig pa skye ba ma yin pas 'di ni gong ma dang mtshungs so /
atha syāt / anyadeva vṛkṣādbījam, ato 'nyatrāvināśapūrvaka eva vṛkṣasyotpāda iti naivam
# ci ste sa bon ni shing las gzhan nyid yin te / / de'i phyir shing gi skye ba ni gzhan du ma zhig pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do snyam na / / de ltar ni ma yin te /
kāryakāraṇayoranyatvasyāsiddhatvāt / tathā ca vakṣyati / pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat / na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam
# rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gzhan nyid yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro / / de skad du yang / / gang la brten te gang 'byung ba / / de ni re zhig de nyid min / / de ni gzhan yang ma yin te / / de phyir chad min rtag ma yin / / zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro / / de phyir sa bon las shing gzhan nyid ma yin te /
na ca bījādvṛkṣasyānyatvam / ataḥ sādhyasamametat / yataśca anyatrāmṛtasya ihotpādo nāsti, na pūrvaṃ jātirabhyupeyā
# des na 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no / / gang gi phyir / / gzhan du ma shi ba la 'dir skye ba yod pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir skye ba snga ma yin par khas blang bar mi bya'o /
atha pūrvaṃ jarāmaraṇam, paścājjātiḥ, evamapi
# ci ste rga shi snga la skye ba 'phyi ba yin na ni / / de lta na yang /
paścājjātiryadi bhavejjarāmaraṇamāditaḥ
# gal te skye ba 'phyi 'gyur la / / rga shi snga ba yin na ni /
ahetukamajātasya syājjarāmaraṇaṃ katham
# skye ba med pa'i rga shi ni / / rgyu med par ni ji ltar 'gyur /
jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanājjātihetukaṃ jarāmaraṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā
# skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba 'byung bas na / / bcom ldan 'das kyis rga shi skye ba'i rgyu rkyen nyid du gsungs na /
yadi etatpūrvaṃ syāttadā nirhetukaṃ syāt
# gal te 'di snga ba yin na ni / / de'i tshe rgyu med par 'gyur ro /
tasmānna yuktametat / yato 'pyuktam / yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ / ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā / iti
# de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so / / gang las / / bong ba bteg par gyur pa ni / / bteg pa la ni rgyu yod kyi / / bteg pa lta zhig rgyu las ni / / gzhan pa ltung ba med pa nyid /
yathāṣyatrotkṣepaḥ patanakāraṇaṃ nānyat, evamihāpi jātimevakāraṇatvena vināśasya varṇayāmo nānyat, iti nāstyahetukatā vināśasya / jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā bhavati / evime saṃkhatā dhammā saṃbhavanti sakāraṇā / sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā / iti / idānīṃ sahabhāvenāpi jātijarāmaraṇānāmasadbhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha / na jarāmaraṇenaiva jātiśca saha yujyate / mriyeta jāyamānaśca syāccāhetukatobhayoḥ
# ces bshad pa de yang ji ltar bteg pa kho nar ltung ba'i rgyu yin gyi / / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du / / 'dir yang skye ba kho na 'jig pa'i rgyu nyid yin par smra'i gzhan ni ma yin no / / de'i phyir 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid yod pa ma yin no / / 'di skye ba'i rgyu rkyen nyid yin pas 'byung ba kho na 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir na / / de ltar 'dus byas chos de dag / / rgyu dang bcas par 'byung ba ste / / skyes nas 'jig pa gang yin pa / / 'di ni chos rnams rang bzhin no / / zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang legs par drangs par 'gyur ro / / da ni skye ba dang rga shi dag lhan cig nyid du yang mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir / / skye ba dang ni rga shi dag / / lhan cig rung ba ma yin te / / skye bzhin pa na 'chi 'gyur zhing / / gnyi ga rgyu med can du 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
yadi sahabhāvo jātijarāmaraṇānāṃ syāt, tadā jāyamānasya maraṇaṃ syāt
# gal te skye ba dang rga shi dag lhan cig pa nyid du 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe skye bzhin pa 'chi bar 'gyur na /
na caitadyuktam / na ca parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekakālatā yuktā / na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti / api ca
# 'di ni rigs pa yang ma yin te / / mun pa dang snang ba ltar phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir dus gcig pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin zhing / / skye bzhin pa nyid 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten du yang ma mthong ngo /
ahetukatvaṃ jātyādīnāṃ sahabhāvakalpanāyāṃ syāt
# gzhan yang skye ba la sogs pa dag lhan cig 'byung bar rtog na ni rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat
# ba glang gi rva gyas gyon lhan cig tu gyur pa dag ni phan tshun gyi rgyu can nyid du mthong ba yang ma yin pas / / 'di ni mi rigs so /
tadevam / yatra na prabhavantyete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ / prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim
# de'i phyir de ltar / / gang la snga phyi lhan cig gi / / rim pa de dag mi srid pa'i / / skye ba de dang rga shi de / / ci yi phyir na spro bar byed /
yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi, tāṃ jātimanupalabhamānā āryāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti? kiṃśabdo 'saṃbhave
# skye ba gang dang rga shi gang la snga ba dang 'phyi ba dang lhan cig gi rim pa de dag med pa'i skye ba de ma dmigs pa na / / 'phags pa rnams ci'i phyir spro bar byed / / ci'i phyir gyi sgra ni mi srid pa la bya ste /
naiva prapañcayantītyarthaḥ / athavā / evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ yanna saṃvidyate? tasmādavastuka eva bālānāṃ prapañca ityabhiprāyaḥ / yathā ca saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭirnāsti, evamanyeṣāmapi bhāvānāmityāha / kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca / vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana
# spro bar mi mdzad pa nyid do zhes pa'i don to / / rga shi de yang ma dmigs na ci'i phyir spro bar byed / / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gzigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro snyam du dgongs so / / yang na de ltar skye ba la sogs pa dag yod pa ma yin na / / byis pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa'i skye ba de dang gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa'i rga shi de ci'i phyir spro bar byed / / de'i phyir byis pa rnams kyis spros pa ni dngos po yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o / / ji ltar 'khor ba la sngon gyi mtha' yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po gzhan rnams la yang yin no zhes gsungs pa / / 'khor ba 'ba' zhig sngon gyi mtha' / / yod ma yin par ma zad kyi / / rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dang ni / / mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan gzhi nyid / / tshor dang tshor po nyid dang ni / / don yod gang dag ci yang rung /
pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam / sarveṣāmapi bhāvānāṃ pūrvā koṭirna vidyate / tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt, akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukaṃ syāt / atha pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ paścātkāraṇam, evamapi kāraṇātpūrvaṃ kāryaṃ nirhetukameva syāt / atha yugapatkāryakāraṇe syātām, evamubhayamapyahetukaṃ syāt / evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇe vedanāvedakau ca yojyau
# dngos rnams thams cad nyid la yang / / sngon gyi mtha' ni yod ma yin / / de la gal te rgyu snga la 'bras bu 'phyi bar gyur na ni / / 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu rgyu med par 'gyur ro / / 'on te 'bras bu snga la rgyu 'phyi na ni / / de lta na yang rgyu bas snga ba'i 'bras bu rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / ci ste rgyu dang 'bras bu cig car du gyur na ni / / de lta na yang gnyi ga rgyu med par 'gyur ro / / de bzhin du mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dag dang tshor ba dang tshor ba po dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam, api ca ye 'pyante padārthā jñānajñeyapramāṇaprameyasādhanasādhyāvayavāvayaviguṇaguṇyādayaḥ, teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam / ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre āryasarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇā mahābodhisattvena bhagavān stutaḥ / ādiśāntā hyanutpannāḥ prakṛtyaiva ca nirvṛtāḥ
# 'khor ba'i rgyu bshad pa rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa bshad par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / gzhan yang dngos po gzhan gang dag shes pa dang shes bya dang tshad ma dang gzhal bya dang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang / / yan lag dang yan lag can dang yon tan dang yon tan can la sogs pa de dag la yang sngon gyi mtha' mi rigs so zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o / / de nyid kyi phyir / / 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las / / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / / gzod nas zhi zhing mi skyes pa /
dharmāste vivṛtā nātha dharmacakrapravartane / iti / tathā / ādita śūnya anāgata dharmā no gata asthita sthānaviviktāḥ / nityamasāraka māyasabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarvi / yaṃ ca pabhāṣati dharma jinasya taṃ ca na paśyati so 'kṣayatāya
# rang gzhan mya ngan 'das pa yi / / chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan / / zhes 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa yin no / / de bzhin du / / gzod ma nas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos / / song ba med cing gnas med gnas kyis dben / / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtag tu snying po med / / thams cad dag cing rnam dag nam mkha' bzhin / / rgyal ba'i chos ni gang dag rab ston pa / / der yang mi zad pas ni mi mthong ste /
ādinirātma nisattvimi dharmāstāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti / kalpita buccati kalpitamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe
# chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med / / de dag rab tu ston kyang mi zad 'gyur / / btags pa tsam du brtags nas bstan pa yin / / 'khor ba la ni tha ma mi rnyed de /
koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdeti anāgati pratyayatāye
# gang dag sngon byung mtha' ni mtshan nyid med; / / ma 'ongs dus kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir /
karma kriyā ca pravartati evaṃ hīnautkṛṣṭatayā samudenti
# las dang bya ba de ltar zhugs 'gyur te / / rab dang tha ma dag tu 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur /
jaḍḍaka dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān
# chos rnams rab tu blun zhing rang bzhin stong / / thams cad bdag med par yang shes par gyis /
ityādi / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā nāmaikādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam
# zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / bdag ni yod pa nyid do /
duḥkhaparīkṣā dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva ātmā, tatsaṃbandhiduḥkhasadbhāvāt / iha hi pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamityucyate, tacca asti, tena ca duḥkhena kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti, ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti / ucyate / syādātmā yadi duḥkhameva syāt / taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā / sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha / svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam / duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate / tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ
# de dang 'brel pa can gyi sdug bsngal yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sdug bsngal zhes brjod do / / de yang yod la / / sdug bsngal de yang 'ga' zhig la 'gyur bar bya dgos te / / rten med par ni ma yin no / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal la rten yod pa nyid yin la / / de yang bdag yin no / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te sdug bsngal nyid yod na / / bdag yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no / / 'di ltar de ni yod na / / bdag gis byas pa'am / / gzhan gyis byas pa'am / / gnyi gas byas pa'am / / rgyu dang bral ba zhig tu 'gyur ba zhig na / / 'dod pa na yang rnam pa thams cad du de byas pa nyid yod pa ma yin no; ;zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / kha cig sdug bsngal bdag gis byas / / gzhan gyis byas dang gnyi gas byas / / rgyu med pa las 'byung bar 'dod / / de ni bya bar mi rung ngo / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / de la rgol ba kha cig gis ni / / sdug bsngal bdag gis byas so zhes bya ba rtogs so / / gzhan po dag gis ni gzhan gyos byas pa yin la / / gzhan dag gis ni gnyi gas byas pa yin zhing 'ga' zhig dag gis ni sdug bsngal rgyu med par 'byung ba nyid do zhes bya bar rtogs so / / 'dod par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal de ni rnam pa thams cad du bya bar te bskyed par bya bar mi rung ngo / / 'di ni dam bca' ba tsam yin pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir / / gal te bdag gis byas gyur na / / de phyir brten nas 'byung mi 'gyur / / gang phyir phung po 'di dag la / / brten nas phung po 'di dag 'byung / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / de la bdag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag rang gis zhes bya ba'i don to /
apare punaḥ parakṛtam, anye ca ubhayakṛtam / kecidahetusamutpannameva duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ / sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate, tadetatpratijñāmātrakamiti / tatpratipādayannāha / svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet / skandhānimānamī skandhāḥ saṃbhavanti pratītya hi / yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate / idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha / yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi / bhavetparakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ parairebhiramī kṛtāḥ / yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ, ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare syuḥ, syāttadānīṃ parakṛtaṃ duḥkham / na caiṣāmanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetuphalasaṃbandhāvasthānāt / vakṣyati hi
# gal te bdag gis sdug bsngal byas par gyur na ni / / sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo de nyid byas par 'gyur ro / / de ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro / / rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te; rang gi ngo bo yod pa'i phyir ro / / yod pa ma yin pas ni rang gi ngo bo byed pa ma yin no / / 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang yin te / / 'di ltar / / gang phyir phung po 'di dag la / / brten nas phung po de dag 'byung ba'i phyir te / / gang gi phyir / / 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po 'di dag la brten nas / / skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po de dag 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal bdag gis byas so zhes bya ba mi rigs so / / da ni gzhan gyis byas pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa / / gal te 'di las de gzhan zhing / / gal te de las 'di gzhan na / / sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas 'gyur zhing / / gzhan de dag gis de byas 'gyur / / gal te 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po 'di dag las skye ba'i cha'i phung po de dag gzhan du 'gyur zhing / / skye ba'i char gtogs pa de dag las 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po 'di dag gzhan yin na ni / / de'i tshe sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas par 'gyur na / / de dag la ni gzhan nyid ma mthong ste / / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel par gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat
# gang la brten te gang 'byung ba / / de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam / iti / ataḥ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati / yadi hi anyatvaṃ syāt, tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ syāt / na caitadevam / iti parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati / atha syāt / na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam, ataḥ svayaṃ kṛtamiti / kiṃ tarhi svapudgalena yasmātsvayameva kṛtam, nāpareṇa kṛtvā dattam, ityataḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti brūmaḥ / ucyate / svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ punarvinā / svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam / yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate, kalpyatāmasau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam / yadi tāvadyena duḥkhena svapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, tadeva duḥkhaṃ tena kṛtamiti, sa bhedena kathyatāmidaṃ tadduḥkhamayamasya karteti
# de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir / / de phyir tshad min rtag ma yin / / zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas par yang yod pa ma yin no / / gal te gzhan nyid yin na ni / / de yi tshe gzhan nyid yin dang / / gzhan du gyur pa'i phung po de dag gis gzhan du gyur pa de dag byas so zhes bya ba brjod par nus par 'gyur na / / de ni de ltar yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas pa yang yod pa ma yin no / / ci ste gang gi phyir sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal byas pa de'i phyir bdag gis byas so zhes ni mi smra'o / / 'o na ci zhe na / / gang zag bdag gis gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa yin gyi / / gzhan gyis byas nas 'di la byin pa ni ma yin te / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal bdag gis byas so zhes smra'o snyam na / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te gang zag bdag gis ni / / sdug bsngal byas pa'i gang zag ste / / sdug bsngal ma gtogs gang zhig yin / / gal te mi'i sdug bsngal nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can 'di gang zag bdag nyid kyis byas so zhes bya bar rtag na / / gang bdag gis sdug bsngal de byas pa'i gang zag te rtog mod / / gal te re zhig sdug bsngal gang gis gang zag bdag nyid der 'dogs par byed pa'i sdug bsngal de nyid des byas pa yin na ni / / sdug bsngal de ni 'di yin la /
athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt, na tarhi svapudgalakṛtaṃ tat, parapudgalakṛtameva syāt
# 'di'i byed pa po ni 'di yin no zhes phye ste brjod dgos so / / ci ste yang mi'i sdug bsngal gyi nye bar len pa can gyi gang zag gis / / lha'i sdug bsngal byas par gyur na ni / / 'o na de gang zag bdag gis byas pa ma yin gyi /
athopādānabhede 'pi pudgalābheda iṣyate, etacca nāsti, upādānavyatiriktasya bhinnasya pudgalasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt
# gang zag gzhan gyis byas pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / ci ste nye bar len pa tha dad kyang gang zag tha mi dad par 'dod na / / 'di yang yod pa ma yin te / / nye bar len pa las tha dad cing / / gzhan du gyur pa'i gang zag bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati
# de ltar na re zhig sdug bsngal gang zag bdag gis byas pa ma yin no /
atrāha / ka evamāha svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti? kiṃ tarhi parapudgalajaṃ duḥkham / anya eva devaduḥkhānmanuṣyapudgalaḥ, manuṣyapudgalaśca devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā yasmāddevapudgalāya dadāti, tena ca devaduḥkhena devapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, tasmāttasya pudgalasya tadduḥkhaṃ parapudgalajameva bhavati
# 'dir smras pa / / gang zag bdag gis sdug bsngal byas so zhes de skad du su smra; 'o na ci zhe na / / sdug bsngal ni gang zag gzhan las 'byung ba yin no / / 'di ltar mi'i gang zag ni lha'i sdug bsngal las gzhan nyid yin la / / gang gi phyir mi'i gang zag gis kyang / / lha'i sdug bsngal byas nas lha'i gang zag la ster bar byed cing / / lha'i sdug bsngal des kyang lha'i gang zag go zhes 'dogs par byed pa de'i phyir / / gang zag de'i sdug bsngal de ni gang zag gzhan las 'byung ba yin no /
ucyate / parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi yasmai pradīyate / pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ / yadi devaduḥkhaṃ manuṣyapudgalakṛtam, tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te gang zag gzhan las ni / / sdug bsngal 'byung na gzhan zhig gis / / sdug bsngal de byas gang sbyin de / / sdug bsngal ma gtogs ci ltar rung / / gal te lha'i sdug bsngal mi'i gang zag gis byas la / / mi'i gang zag des kyang sdug bsngal de byas nas / / gzhan lha'i gang zag la ster bar byed do zhes bya ba yin na ni / / gang la sbyin par bya ba'i lha'i gang zag de / / lha'i sdug bsngal las ma gtogs par ji ltar rung bar 'gyur / / de ltar na / / re zhig gang zag gzhan las 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal la len pa po nyid yod pa ma yin no / / da ni gang zhig sbyin par byed pa de yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti / idānīṃ yaśca dadāti, asāvapi nāstītyāha / parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi kaḥ parapudgalaḥ
# gal te gang zag gzhan sdug bsngal / / 'byung na gang gis de byas nas / / gzhan la ster ba'i gang zag gzhan / / sdug bsngal ma gtogs gang zhig yin / / gang gis lha'i sdug bsngal byas nas lha'i gang zag la ster bar byed cing /
vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat / yenopādānena sa manuṣyapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati? tasmātparapudgalajamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati / tataśca / svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddherduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ kṛtaḥ / paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam / yadi devapudgaladuḥkhaṃ manuṣyapudgalena kṛtatvātparakṛtaṃ bhavati, nanu, manuṣyapudgalasya svayaṃkṛtameva tadbhavati / etacca nāstītyuktam / tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam, tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / ato 'pi parakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati
# nye bar len pa gang gis mi'i gang zag der gdags pa de ni / / mi'i nye bar len pa las tha dad pa gang zhig yin par 'gyur / / de'i phyir gang zag gzhan las byung ba'i sdug bsngal yang yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir / / bdag gis byas par ma grub pas / / sdug bsngal gzhan gyis ga la byas / / gzhan gyis sdug bsngal gang byed pa / / de ni de yi bdag byas 'gyur / / gal te lha'i gang zag gis sdug bsngal mi'i gang zag gis byas pa'i phyir / / gzhan gyis byas pa yin na ni / / de ni mi'i gang zag gi rang gis byas pa nyid du 'gyur na / / de yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to / / de'i phyir / / gang gi tshe bdag gis byas par ma grub pa'i phyir sdug bsngal de mi'i gang zag gi bdag gis ma byas pa de'i tshe / / lha zhes bya ba'i gang zag gzhan gyi sdug bsngal de gzhan gyis byas par ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di las kyang sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas pa yod pa ma yin no /
idānīṃ prakaraṇāntareṇāpi pakṣadvayāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādayannāha / na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam / paro nātmakṛtaścetsyādduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ katham
# da ni phyogs gnyis char rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir / / re zhig sdug bsngal bdag byas min / / de nyid kyis ni de ma byas / / gal te gzhan bdag ma byas na / / sdug bsngal gzhan byas ga la 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs so /
itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate, yasmānna tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkham / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānna tenaiva hi tat kṛtam, svātmani vṛttivirodhāt, ataḥ svakṛtaṃ nāsti / na parakṛtamapi, yasmādyo 'sau paraḥ karotīti parikalpyate, sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt / yaśca svātmanā na niṣpannaḥ, sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat / idānīmubhayakṛtamapi duḥkhamasadityāha
# 'di las kyang sdug bsngal bdag dang gzhan dag gis byas par mi rigs so / / gang gi phyir re zhig sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa ni ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir de nyid kyis de byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te / / bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir / / bdag gis byas pa yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan gyis byas pa yang yod pa ma yin te / / gang gi phyir / / byed po zhes bya bar brtags pa'i gzhan gang yin pa de nyid re zhig bdag gis ma byas shing bdag nyid kyis ma grub ste / / de yang rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro / / gang zhig rang gi bdag nyid kyis grub pa ma yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas gzhan byed par ji ltar 'gyur te / / 'di ni mi rigs so / / da ni sdug bsngal gnyis kas byas pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi
# gal te re res byas gyur na / / sdug bsngal gnyi gas byas par 'gyur /
yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham
# gal te re res sdug bsngal byed par 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe sdug bsngal gnyi gas byas pa yin na /
na caikaikakṛtaṃ tat, uktadoṣāt / na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ
# de ni re res byas pa yang ma yin te / / bshad zin pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / re res srog gcod pa ma byas par ni gnyi gas byas so zhes brjod pa ma mthong ngo /
idānīṃ nirhetukamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā nāsti, tathā pratipadayannāha
# da ni sdug bsngal rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
parākārāsvayaṃkāraṃ duḥkhamahetukaṃ kutaḥ / pareṇa akāro akaraṇaṃ yasyeti parākāram / na svayaṃkāro 'syetyasvayaṃkāram / yadi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃkṛtaṃ nāsti, parakṛtamapi nāsti yathoktena nyāyena, tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat? duḥkhābhāvātkutastasyāśrayabhūta ātmā / yathā ca caturdhā vicāryamāṇaṃ duḥkhamasat, evaṃ bāhyā api bījāṅkuraghaṭapaṭādayo bhāvā veditavyāḥ, iti pratipādayannāha
# bdag gis ma byas gzhan ma byas / / sdug bsngal rgyu med ga la 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / gzhan gyis ma byas pa / / gzhan gyis ma bskyed pa 'di la yod pas na / / gzhan gyis ma byas pa'o / / 'di la bdag gis ma byas pa yod pas na bdag gis ma byas pa'o / / gal te ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa med cing / / gzhan gyis byas pa yang med pa de'i tshe rgyu med pa yod par ga la 'gyur te / / nam mkha'i me tog gi dri zhim po bzhin no / / sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir na de'i rten du gyur pa'i bdag kyang lta ga la yod / / ji ltar rnam pa bzhir dpyad na sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / / phyi rol gyi dngos po sa bon dang myu gu dang bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa dag kyang rig par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate
# sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig rnam pa bzhi / / yod ma yin pa ma yin gyi /
sarveṣāṃ / bāhyānāmapi bhāvānāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate
# dngos po thams cad dag la yang / / rnam pa bzhi po yod ma yin / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
pūrvavatsarva samaṃ yojyam / yadi khalveṣāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ cāturvidhyāsaṃbhavaḥ, tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti
# thams cad snga ma bzhin sbyar bar bya'o / / gal te sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'di dag la rnam pa bzhi po med na / / 'o na da ni 'di dag rnam pa gang gis 'grub ce na /
ucyate / svabhāvato yadi etāni duḥkhādīni syuḥ, niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'di dag rang bzhin gyis yod par gyur na ni / / nges par rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tvasti / tasmātsvabhāvato na santi duḥkhādīnītyavasīyate / atha viparyāsamātralabdhātmasattākāyā duḥkhādisaṃvṛteḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavasthā  mṛgyate, tadā karmakārakaparīkṣāprakaraṇavihitavidhinā yathoditapakṣacatuṣṭayatiraskāreṇa idaṃpratyayatāmātrārthapratītyasamutpādasiddhayā siddhirabhyupeyā / yathoktam / svayaṃkṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam
# yod pa ni ma yin no / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal la sogs pa dag rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin par nges so / / 'on te phyin ci log tsam gyi bdag nyid yod par rnyed pa / / sdug bsngal la sogs pa kun rdzob la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par gzhag pa tshol na ni / / de'i tshe las dang byed pa po brtags pa'i rab tu byed par bshad pa'i rnam pas ji skad smras pa'i phyogs bzhi bsal nas rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyi don gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba grub par khas blang bar bya'o / / ji skad du / / sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas dang gnyi gas byas /
tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam
# rgyu med rtog ge ba yis 'dod / / khyod kyis brten nas 'byung bar gsungs /
iti / uktaṃ ca bhagavatā āryopālipṛcchāyām / tathā / saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinena saṃskṛta 'saṃskṛta paśyatha eva
# zhes bshad do / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas chos bshad de / / 'dus byas 'dus ma byas yin de ltar ltos /
nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā ettaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya / kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam
# yang dag nyid du bdag dang bdag med de / / 'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra'o / / dge dang nag po'i las rnams mi 'jig ste / / bdag gis byas pa bdag ni myong bar 'gyur /
no 'pi tu saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti
# las kyi 'bras bu 'pho bar mi 'gyur te / / rgyu med par yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro /
sarvi bhavā alikā vasikāśca riktaka tucchaka phenasamāśca / māyamarīcisamā sada śūnyā deśituḥ saṃvṛtu te ca viviktāḥ / śailaguhāgiridurganadīṣu yadva pratiśruka jāyi pratītya
# srid pa thams cad sgyu ma dbang med pa; / / gsog dang gsob tu gyur pa dbu ba bzhin / / sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur rtag tu stong / / sgra yis bshad kyang de dag dben pa yin / / brag phug ri dang gcong rong klung rnams su / / rkyen gyis ji ltar brag ca 'byung ba ltar /
evimu saṃskṛta sarvi vijāna māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam
# de bzhin 'dus byas 'di kun rig par gyis / / 'gro ba thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin /
ityādi / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau duḥkhaparīkṣā nāma dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam
# zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / bdag gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
saṃskāraparīkṣā trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat, anyaścotpādako vidhirasan, utpannarūpatvena caite bhāvā avidyātimiropahatamatinayanānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ khyānti, tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām / ata eva sarvadharmasvābhāvāvyāparokṣadhīnayanaḥ samunmūlitāśeṣāvidyāvāsanaḥ caturviparyāsaviparyastātrāṇasattvaparitrāṇāya aviparītanaiḥ svābhāvyopadeśatatparo buddho jagadvibodhako mahākāruṇikaḥ / tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadbhagavānityabhāṣata
# gang gi phyir de ltar rab tu byed pa thal ma thag pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dpyad pa na / / dngos po rnams la bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi gas byas pa dang rgyu med pa las byung ba nyid med cing skyed bar byed pa'i rnam pa gzhan yang med la / / ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par byas pa rnams la dngos po 'di dag skye ba'i ngo bor yang snang ba de'i phyir / / rang bzhin med pa nyid du gyur pa na sgyu ma'i rta dang glang po che la sogs pas / / de mi shes pa rnams ltar byis pa rnams slu bar byed pa yin no / / de nyid kyi phyir / / blo'i sbyin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin lkog tu ma gyur pa mnga' ba / / ma rig pa'i bag chags ma lus par drungs phyung ba / / sems can phyin ci log bzhis phyin ci log tu gyur zhing skyabs med pa yongs su bskyab par mdzad pa'i slad du rang bzhin med pa phyin ci ma log par nye bar ston pa lhur mdzad pa / / thugs rje chen po'i mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang zhig / / slu ba de ni brdzun zhes gsungs /
sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā / sūtre uktam / tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam
# 'du byed thams cad slu ba'i chos / / des na de dag brdzun pa yin / / mdo las dge slong dag 'dus byas slu ba'i chos can gang yin pa de ni brdzun pa yin la /
etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam / sarvasaṃskārāśca mṛṣā moṣadharmāṇaḥ iti / tathā / nāstyatra tathatā avitathatā vā / moṣadharmakamapyetat / pralopadharmakamapyetat iti / tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān, sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāḥ, tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat, lakṣaṇopetayantramayavāraṇavañcitodayanavatsarājavat / tatra visaṃvādakaṃ moṣadharmakaṃ vitathakhyātyālātacakravat / ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat / yattu satyaṃ na tanmoṣadharmakam, tadyathā nirvāṇamekam
# mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni bden pa dam pa'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du 'di ni slu bar byed pa'i chos can no / / 'di ni 'jig pa'i chos can no zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir tshul 'dis gang su zhing 'jig pa'i chos can de ni brdzun pa yin no zhes de skad du / / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dang 'du byed thams cad kyang slu ba'i chos can yin pas de'i phyir / / 'du byed de dag slu ba'i chos can yin pas brdzun par 'gyur ro / / de la slu ba'i chos can ni 'drid par byed cing phyin ci log tu snang ba ste / / mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no / / de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis na 'du byed thams cad brdzun pa ste / / slu ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir / / smig rgyu'i chu bzhin no / / gang zhig bden pa de ni slu ba'i chos can ma yin te / / dper na mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin no / / de'i phyir /
tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam / śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā / ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt / atrāha / yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā, nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt
# bstan pa'i rigs pa dang lung 'di las / / dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par grub ste / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las chos thams cad ni stong pa ste / / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar slu ba'i chos can nyid kyis / / 'du byed thams cad brdzun pa nyid du bstan na / / de lta na ni dngos po thams cad med pas dngos po thams cad la skur pa 'debs pa'i log par lta ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
ucyate / satyaṃ moṣadharmakāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ye 'dyāpi bhavantaṃ muṣṇanti / nanu ca bhoḥ, / tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate / yadā asmābhiḥ tanmṛṣā moṣadharmakam ityuktam, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate? kiṃ tatrābhāvo bhavati? kaścidyadi padārtho 'bhaviṣyat, syāttasyāpavādādabhāvadarśanānmithyādṛṣṭiḥ / yadā tu padārthameva kaṃcinna paśyāmaḥ, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate? naiva kiṃcidabhāvo bhavatītyayukto 'yamupālambho bhavataḥ / atrāha / yadi abhāvadarśanamapi na pratipādyate, kiṃ punaranenāgamena pratipādyata iti? ucyate / etattūktaṃ bhagavatā śūnyatāparidīpakam / yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā, tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ / yathoktamanavataptahradāpasaṃkramaṇasūtre / yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto no tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti / yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ
