# brjod par bya ste / / gang dag da dung du yang khyod slu bar byed pa slu ba'i chos can dag yod pa 'di ni bden no / / gal te slu chos gang yin pa / / de brdzun de la ci zhig slu / / ma yin nam / / gang gi tshe kho bo cag gi slu ba can gang yin pa de ni brdzun pa'o zhes bshad pa de'i tshe de la ci zhig slu ste / / de la ci zhig dngos po med par 'gyur / / gal te dngos po 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni / / de la skur pa btab pas med par lta ba'i log par lta bar 'gyur na / / gang gi tshe dngos po cung zad kyang ma mthong ba de'i tshe / / der ci zhig slu bar 'gyur te / / 'ga' yang dngos po med par mi 'gyur bas / / khyod kyis glan ka 'di ni mi rigs so / / 'dir gal te dngos po med pa'i lta ba yang mi ston na / / lung 'dis ci zhig ston / / brjod par bya ste / / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs pa / / stong nyid yongs su bstan pa yin / / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bstan pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med par ston pa ma yin gyi / / 'o na ci zhe na / / stong pa nyid yongs su ston pa yin te / / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i yongs su gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to / / ji skad du mdo las / / gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes / / de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin / / rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad / / gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod min /
iti / atrāha / nāyamāgamo bhāvasvabhāvānutpādaṃ paridīpayati, kiṃ tarhi niḥsvabhāvatvam, svabhāvasyānavasthāyitvam, vināśitvam, iti / kuta etaditi cet, / bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvamanyathābhāvadarśanāt / vicāryamāṇānāmanyathātvaṃ vipariṇāmadarśanāt ityarthaḥ
# zhes gsungs so / / 'dir lung gis dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin te / / 'on te ci zhe na / / rang bzhin med pa ste rang bzhin mi gnas pa nyid dang 'jig pa nyid ston par byed pa yin no / / 'di gang las she na / / dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de / / gzhan du 'gyur bar snang phyir ro / / gzhan du 'gyur ba ste / / yongs su 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
etaduktaṃ bhavati / yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, tadānīṃ naivaiṣāmanyathātvamupalabhyeta / upalabhyate ca pariṇāmaḥ / tasmātsvabhāvānava sthāyitvameva sūtrārtha iti vijñeyam
# 'di skad du gal te / / dngos po rnams la rang bzhin med na / / de'i tshe 'di dag gzhan du 'gyur ba dmigs par mi 'gyur na / / yongs su 'gyur ba ni dmigs pa yang yin te / / de'i phyir rang bzhin mi gnas pa nyid mdo'i don yin par shes par bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro /
itaścaitadevam / yasmāt / asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ / yo hyasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ, sa nāsti / bhāvānāṃ ca śūnyatā dharma iṣyate
# 'di'i phyir yang de ni de ltar yin te / / gang gi phyir / / dngos po ngo bo nyid med de / / gang phyir dngos rnams stong pa nyid / / 'di ltar dngos po gang zhig ngo bo nyid med pa de ni yod pa ma yin te / / dngos po rnams kyi chos stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'dod pa yin no /
na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate / na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti / tasmādastyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti
# yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu la / / de'i sngo bsangs nyid mi 'thad pas chos can med pas / / de la brten pa'i chos kyang mi 'thad pa de'i phyir dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod pa yin no /
api ca / kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvaścenna vidyate / yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, yo 'yaṃ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇaḥ anyathābhāvaḥ, sa kasya syāditi? atrocyate / evamapi parikalpyamāne
# gzhan yang / / gal te ngo bo nyid med na / / gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin / / gal te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin med na / / yongs su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de gang gi yin par 'gyur zhes 'dzer to / / 'di la brjod par bya ste / / de ltar yongs su btags kyang /
kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate / iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati, sa tasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate, aparapratibaddhatvāt / agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate
# gal te ngo bo nyid yod na / / ji lta bur na gzhan du 'gyur / / 'dir chos gang zhig dngos po gang la mi 'khrul pa de na de'i rang bzhin zhes bsnyad de / / gzhan gyis gegs byar med pa'i phyir ro / / de la mi 'khrul pa'i me'i tsha ba la ni 'jig rten na rang bzhin zhes brjod la /
tadeva auṣṇyamapsūpalabhyamānaṃ parapratyayasaṃbhūtatvātkṛtrimatvānna svabhāva iti
# tsha ba de nyid chu dag la dmigs pa na rkyen gzhan las byung bas bcos ma yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin ma yin no / / gang gi tshe /
yadā caivamavyabhicāriṇā svabhāvena bhavitavyam, tadā asya avyabhicāritvādanyathābhāvaḥ syādabhāvaḥ / na hi agniḥ śaityaṃ pratipadyate
# de ltar rang bzhin ni 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba yin par bya dgos pa de'i tshe 'khrul pa med pas gzhan du 'gyur ba med de / / me ni grang bar 'gyur ba ma yin no /
evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame 'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet / upalabhyate caiṣāmanyathātvam
# de bzhin du dngos po rnams la yang rang bzhin khas lan na gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med par 'gyur na / / de dag ni gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du dmigs pa yang yin te /
ato nāsti svabhāvaḥ / api ca / ayamanyathābhāvo bhāvānāṃ naiva saṃbhavati, yaddarśanātsasvabhāvatā syāt / yathā ca na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha / tasyaiva nānyathābhāvo nāpyanyasyaiva yujyate / yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate / tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate / tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam / athāpi avasthāntaraprāptasyaiva anyathātvaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nopapadyate
# de'i phyir rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang gang zhig snang ba las rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du gyur pa 'di ni dngos po rnams la mi srid pa nyid do / / ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / de nyid la ni gzhan 'gyur med / / gzhan nyid la yang yod ma yin / / gang phyir gzhon nu mi rga ste / / gang phyir rgas pa'ang mi rga'o / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / re zhig dngos po sngar gyi gnas skabs na gnas pa de nyid ni gzhan du 'gyur bar mi 'thad do / / 'di ltar lang tsho'i gnas skabs nyid la gnas pa'i gzhon nu la ni gzhan du 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no / / ci ste gnas skabs gzhan thob pa nyid la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid rtog na / / de yang mi 'thad de /
anyathātvaṃ nāma jarāyāḥ paryāyaḥ
# gzhan du gyur ba zhes bya ba ni rgas pa'i rnam grangs yin te /
tadyadi yūno neṣyate, anyasyaiva jīrṇasya bhavatīti, tadapi na yujyate
# de gal te gzhon nu la mi 'dod kyi gzhan rgas pa kho na la 'gyur na ni / / de yang mi rigs te /
yasmānna hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ, niṣprayojanatvāt
# gang gi phyir rgas pa la ni yang rga ba dang 'grel ba dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt? tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvājjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate
# rgas pa la yang rga ba dang 'brel pas ci zhig bya ste / / de med par yang rgas pa nyid yod pas rgas pa rga'o zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so / / ci ste gzhon nu nyid gzhan du 'gyur ro zhe na /
atha yūna evānyathābhāvaḥ, tadayuktam, aprāptajarāvasthasya yuveti vyapadeśāt, avasthādvayasya ca parasparaviruddhatvāt
# de ni mi rigs te / / rgas pa'i gnas skabs ma thob pa la gzhon nu zhes brjod pa'i phyir dang gnas skabs gnyis kyang phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
api ca / tasya cedanyathābhāvaḥ kṣīrameva bhaveddadhi
# gzhan yang / / gal te de nyid gzhan 'gyur na / / 'o ma nyid ni zhor 'gyur ro /
atha syāt / kṣīrāvasthāparityāgena dadhyavasthā bhavati, ataḥ na kṣīrameva dadhi bhavatīti
# ci ste 'o ma'i gnas skabs btang nas / / zho'i gnas skabs su gyur pa de'i phyir 'o ma nyid zhor 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate / yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te phan tshun 'gal bas 'o ma nyid zhor 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi 'dod na ni /
kṣīrādanyasya kasyātha dadhibhāvo bhaviṣyati
# 'o ma las gzhan gang zhig ni / / zho yi dngos po yin par 'gyur /
kimudakasya dadhibhāvo bhavatu? tasmādasaṃbaddhameva tadanyasya dadhibhāvo bhaviṣyatīti
# ci chu zho'i dngos por 'gyur ram / / de'i phyir gzhan zho'i dngos por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ma 'brel pa yin no / / de'i phyir /
tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat / yathoktamāryaratnākaramahāyānasūtre
# de ltar gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir de snang ba las dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas par 'grub par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so / / ji skad du / / 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ / taṃ jinu darśayatī narasiṃha tatra nideśayi sattva maharṣī
# chos gang skye ba med cing 'byung ba med / / 'chi 'pho med cing rga bar mi 'gyur ba / / mi yi seng ge yis ni der bstan zhing / / sems can brgya phrag dag ni de la bkod /
yasya svabhāva na vidyati kaści no 'parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ
# gang la'ang ngo bo nyid ni gang yang med / / gzhan yang ma yin sus kyang mi rnyed pa /
nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ
# nang na ma yin phyi rol dag na yang / / mi rnyed de dag la ni mgon pos bkod /
śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gatī upapadyati kāci / tatra ca vyoharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayasī bahusattvān
# bde bar gshegs pas zhi pa'i 'gro gsungs kyang / / 'gro ba gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te / / de dag 'gro las grol bar rnam par gsungs /
sarvi vadesi nirātmaka dharmān sattvatu grāhatu mocasi lokam / mukta svayaṃ gatito gatimukto tenasi pāragato na ca tīrṇaḥ
# grol nas sems can mang po grol bar mdzad / / bdag med par ni chos kun ston mdzad cing / / sems can 'dzin las 'jig rten rnam par grol / / bdag nyid 'gro las grol zhing 'gro grol bas /
pāragato 'si bhavārṇavatīrṇaḥ pāragato na ca labhyati kaści / pāru na vidyati nāpi apāru pāragato 'smi vadesi ca vākyam / vāca na vidyati yāṃ ca vadesi yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi / yasya vadesi na vidyati so 'pi yo 'pi vijānati so 'pi asanto / tatra praṇaṣṭu jagaṃ imu sarvaṃ vitathavikalpaniveśavaśena / śānta vijānati yo naru dharmāṃ stehi tathāgatu dṛṣṭa svayaṃbhūḥ
# de bzhin pha rol gshegs kyang rgal ba'ang med; ;drang srong chen po srid pa'i pha rol phyin / / pha rol gshegs pa gang yang mi rnyed 'gyur / / pha rol yod ma yin zhing tshu rol med / / pha rol song ngo zhes kyang tshig tu gsung / / gang gis tshig tu smra ba de yang med / / gang smras de yi tshig kyang yod ma yin / / gang la smra ba de yang rnyed mi 'gyur / / gang gis shes pa de yang yod ma yin / / log par rtog la chags pa'i dbang gis su / / 'dir ni 'gro ba 'di kun rab tu 'khyams / / skyes bu gang zhig zhi ba'i chos rig pa / / des ni rang 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /
śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān
# chos mchog zhi ba rnams kyang rab tu shes / / dga' ba rnyed nas sems can tshim par byed /
so bhavatī jinu jitvena kleśān ātma ............
# nyon mongs rgyal nas de nyid rgyal bar 'gyur /
tena vijānita bodhi jinānāṃ buddhiya bodhayate sa jagaṃ pi
# bdag nyid rgyal bar gyur zhing gnas pa med / / de phyir rgyal ba'i byang chub rab tu mkhyen /
ityādi / yaccoktam / asvabhāvo bhāvo naivāsti, śūnyatā ca bhāvānāmiṣyate, tasmādasti śūnyatāaśrayo bhāvasvabhāva iti, etadapi na yujyate ityāha / yadyaśūnyaṃ bhavetkiṃcitsyācchūnyamiti kiṃcana
# sangs rgyas nas ni 'gro ba shes par byed / / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o / / dngos po ngo bo nyid med pa ni yod pa ma yin te / / dngos po rnams stong pa nyid du ni 'dod pa yin no / / de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rten du gyur pa dngos po'i rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa / / gal te stong min cung zad yod / / stong pa'ang cung zad yod par 'gyur /
na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati
# mi stong cung zad yod min na / / stong pa'ang yod par ga la 'gyur /
yadi śūnyatā nāma kācit syāt, tadā tadāśrayo bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt
# gal te stong pa nyid ces bya ba zhig 'ga' zhig tu yod na ni / / de'i tshe de'i rten dngos po'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur na /
na tvevam / iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti
# de ltar ni ma yin no / / 'dir stong pa nyid dang bdag med pa nyid dag ni chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes khas blangs pas stong pa ma yin pa'i chos med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no /
yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi, aśūnyatā ca nāsti, tadā pratipakṣanirapekṣatvācchūnyatāpi  khapuṣpamālāvannāstītyavasīyatām
# gang gi tshe stong pa ma yin pa'i dngos po med cing stong pa nyid ma yin pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / gnyen po la ltos pa dang bral bas nam mkha'i me tog gi phreng ba ltar stong pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o /
yadā ca śūnyatā nāsti, tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam / atrāha / trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante / yeṣāmupadeśārthameva buddhā bhagavanto 'śeṣatīrthyavādamahāmohāndhakārānugatajagati jagadekapradīpā nairātmyopadeśāvicchinnaśikhā utpadyante / sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān, ityalaṃ bhavatā svargāpavargamārgasamucchedakeneti
# gang gi tshe stong pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de'i rten dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / gang bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das / / 'gro ba mu stegs pa'i smra ba ma rig pa'i smag chen po'i rjes su son pa la / / 'gro ba'i sgron me gcig pur gyur pa / / bdag med pa nye bar ston pa'i me lce rgyun mi chad pa mnga' ba rnams 'byung ba / / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhes bya ba / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya rnams la rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa dag ni / / bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab kho na la dmigs na / / khyod kyis ni da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab rnam par 'chad pa'i rgyu thabs kyis stong pa nyid de spong bar brtsams pa yin pas / / mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam rgyun gcod par byed pa khyod dang brtsad pas chog go /
ucyate / aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā, kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate
# brjod par bya ste / / ae ma kyi hud gnam du phyogs pa ltar shin tu phyin ci log tu gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam zhi ba drang po bor nas / / dngos po la mngon par zhan pa'i sbrul gyis dkris pa / / 'khor ba'i dgon pa'i lam las thar pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba nyid du rten pa khyod ni dam pa dag gis smad par bya ba yin bzhin du mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhen pas gzung ba'i dbang nyid kyis de dag nyid la smod par byed pa zhig ste /
nanu bhoḥ, niravaśeṣakleśavyādhicikitsakairmahāvaidyarājaiḥ
# kva'i nyon mongs pa'i nad ma lus par gso bar mdzad pa / / sman pa'i rgyal po chen po ni /
śūnyatā sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ proktā niḥsaraṇaṃ jinaiḥ
# rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid / / lta kun nges par 'byung bar gsungs /
yeṣāṃ tu śūnyatā dṛṣṭistānasādhyān babhāṣire
# gang dag stong pa nyid lta ba / / de dag sgrub tu med par gsungs /
iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā / na ca dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ nivṛttimātraṃ bhāvaḥ / ye tu tasyāmapi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśinaḥ, tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati? yaḥ nakiṃcidapi te paṇyaṃ dāsyāmītyuktaḥ, sa cet 'dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma paṇyam,'; iti brūyāt, sa kenopāyena śakyaḥ paṇyābhāvaṃ grāhayitum? evaṃ yeṣāṃ śūnyatāyāmapi bhāvābhiniveśaḥ, kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti? ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryaratnakūṭasūtre / yanna śūnyatayā dharmān śūnyān karoti, api tu dharmā eva śūnyāḥ / yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti, api tu dharmā evānimittāḥ / yannāpraṇihitena dharmānapraṇihitān karoti, api tu dharmā evāpraṇihitāḥ / yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā, iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamā pratipaddharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā / ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti, tānahaṃ naṣṭapraṇaṣṭāniti vadāmi / iti pravacanāt
# ma yin nam / / 'dir stong pa nyid ni 'di lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad nges par 'byung ba ste log pa gang yin pa de yin la / / lta bar gyur pa rnams log pa tsam ni dngos po yang ma yin no / / gang dag stong pa nyid de la yang dngos por mngon par zhen pa de dag la ni kho bo cag mi smra ste / / de'i phyir kho bo cag gis nye bar bstan pa las rtog pa mtha' dag logs na thar par 'gyur ba ga la yod / / 'di ltar gang zhig la khyod la zong ci yang mi ster ro zhes smras pa dang kye bdag la ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i thong de nyid byin cig ces smra na / / de zong med par 'dzin du gzhug par thabs gang gis nus / / de bzhin du gang dag stong pa nyid la yang mngon par zhen pa de dag gi de la dngos por mngon par zhen pa de gang gis 'gog par 'gyur / / de'i phyir sman pa chen po la yang nyes pa'i 'du shes yod pa'i phyir gso bar mdzad pa'i mchog sman pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag bor ba nyid yin no / / ji skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo las / / gang stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong par mi byed de / / chos rnams nyid stong pa dang gang mtshan ma med pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed de / / chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med pa dang gang smon pa med pas chos rnams smon pa med par mi byed de chos rnams nyid smon pa med par gang dag de ltar so sor rtog pa de ni 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o / / 'od srungs gang dag stong pa nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rtog pa de dag ni ngas gsung rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams zhes bshad do /
tathā / varaṃ khalu kāśyapa sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirāśritā, na tveva abhāvābhiniveśikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ
# 'od srungs gang zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam la gnas pa ni bla'i / / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin no /
tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ hi kāśyapa śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam / yasya khalu punaḥ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭiḥ, tamahamacikitsyamiti vadāmi
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'od srungs lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na / / 'od srungs gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do /
tadyathā kāśyapa glānaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt / tasmai  vaidyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dadyāt / tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret
# 'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na min pa zhig yod la / / sman pas de la sman btang nas sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyod de sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na / / 'od srungs 'di'i snyam du sems /
tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet? no hīdaṃ bhagavan / gāḍhataraṃ tasya puruṣasya glānyaṃ bhavet, yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret / bhagavānāha
# mi de nad de las thar bar 'gyur ram gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te / / gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas sman ltor mchis pa de nyid ma byung na / / mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshabs che par 'gyur lags so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
evameva kāśyapa sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam
# 'od srungs de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid kho nar yin na /
yasya khalu punaḥ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭiḥ, tamahamacikitsyamiti vadāmi / iti
# 'od srungs gang dag stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskāraparīkṣā nāma trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / saṃsargaparīkṣā caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / astyeva bhāvasvabhāvaḥ, tatsaṃsargopadeśāt / iha yannāsti, na tasya saṃsargaḥ, tadyathā vandhyāsutaduhitroḥ / asti ca saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ / cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam, trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśasahajā vedaneti vistaraḥ / tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ / tadevaṃ saṃsargopadeśādvidyata eva bhāvasvabhāva iti
# slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / 'du byed brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / dngos po'i rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de / / de dag gi phrad pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir gang med pa de la ni phrad pa med do / / dper na mo gsham gyi bu dang bu mo gnyis bzhin no / / mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang gsum 'dus pa las reg pa'o / / reg pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni tshor ba'o zhes rgya cher 'byung ba dang de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes zhes bya ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni phrad pa yin gyi / / ma phrad pa ni ma yin no zhes 'du byed rnams la ni phrad par bstan pa yang yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar phrad pa bstan pa las ni dngos po'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid do /
ucyate / syādetadevam, yadi saṃsarga eva bhavato bhavet, na tvasti, yasmāt / draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ / sarvaśaśca na saṃsargamanyonyena brajantyuta / tatra draṣṭavyaṃ rūpam,darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, draṣṭā vijñānam / eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti / cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca, cakṣuṣo vijñānasya ca, vijñānasya rūpasya ca saṃsargo nāsti / ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te phrad pa nyid yod par 'gyur na / / 'di de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa ni ma yin no / / gang gi phyir / / blta bya lta ba lta ba po / / gsum po de dag gnyis gnyis dang / / thams cad kyang ni phan tshun du / / phrad par 'gyur ba yod ma yin / / de la blta bya ni gzugs so / / lta ba ni mig go / / lta ba po ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o / / gsum po 'di dag las rnam pa gnyis gnyis phrad pa ni yod pa ma yin te / / mig dang gzugs sam / / mig dang rnam par shes pa'am / / rnam par shes pa dang gzugs la phrad pa yod pa ma yin no / / de ltar rnam pa gnyis gnyis dang phrad pa yod pa ma yin no /
sarvaśo 'pi trayāṇāmapyeṣāṃ yugapacca saṃsargo nāsti
# thams cad kyang ni ste gsum po de dag cig car phrad pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ,
# ji ltar blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dang lta ba po rnams gnyis gnyis sam thams cad du yang phrad pa med pa /
evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām
# de bzhin 'dod chags chags pa dang chags par bya ba lta ba ste / / 'dod chags dang chags pa'am /
rāgasya raktasya ca saṃsargo nāsti, rāgasya rañjanīyasya ca, trayāṇāmapi yugapatsaṃsargo nāsti
# 'dod chags dang chags par bya ba la phrad pa yod pa ma yin la / / gsum po dag cig car yang phrad pa yod pa ma yin no /
yathā caiṣām, evam / traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśāśca śeṣāṇyāyatanāni ca
# 'di dag ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du / / nyon mongs pa / / lhag ma rnams dang skye mched kyi /
anyonyena saṃsargaṃ na vrajanti / trayaḥ prakārāstridhā, tridhābhāvastraidham / tena traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśā dveṣamohādayaḥ, te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca / kasmātpunareteṣāṃ saṃsargo nāstītyāha / anyenānyasya saṃsargastaccānyatvaṃna vidyate / draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ yanna saṃsargaṃ vrajantyataḥ / yadityayaṃ yasmādarthe / yadi draṣṭavyādīnāṃ parasparamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt
# lhag ma'ang rnam gsum nyid kyis so / / ste phan tshun du phrad par 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no / / rnam pa gsum ni rnam gsum mo / / rnam pa gsum gyi dngos po ni rnam gsum nyid de / / rnam gsum nyid nges so / / nyon mongs pa lhag ma ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa dag go / / de dag ni zhe sdang dang zhe sdang ba po dang spang bya la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis yin la / / nyan pa dang nyan pa po dang mnyan par bya ba la sogs pa gsum gyis kyang ngo / / yang ci'i phyir 'di dag la phrad par yod pa ma yin zhe na / / gzhan dang gzhan du phrad 'gyur na / / gang phyir blta bya la sogs pa / / gzhan de yod pa ma yin pa / / de phyir phrad par mi 'gyur ro / / zhes gsungs te / / gang phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o / / gal te blta bar bya ba la sogs pa dag la phan tshun du gzhan nyid yod na ni / / de'i tshe chu dang 'o ma gnyis bzhin du phan tshun phrad pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
taccānyatvaṃ yasmādeṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ na saṃbhavati, ato naite saṃsarga brajanti
# gang gi phyir blta bar bya ba la sogs pa dag la gzhan de yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir / / de dag phrad par mi 'gyur ro /
api ca / na ca kevalamanyatvaṃ draṣṭavyāderna vidyate / kasyacitkenacitsārdhaṃ nānyatvamupapadyate
# gzhan yang / / blta bya la sogs 'ba' zhig la / / gzhan nyid med par ma zad kyi / / gang yang gang dang lhan cig tu / / gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad do /
na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati, ghaṭapaṭādīnāmapi padārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ naiva saṃbhavatītyavasīyatām
# blta bar bya ba la sogs pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por gnas pa rnams 'ba' zhig la gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin par ma zad kyi / / bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad la yang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o /
yathā caiṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ parasparato 'nyatvamasat, tathā pratipādayannāha / anyadanyatpratītyānyannānyadanyadṛte 'nyataḥ
# blta bar bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag la phan tshun gzhan nyid ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / gzhan ni gzhan la brten te gzhan / / gzhan med par gzhan gzhan mi 'gyur /
yatpratītya ca yattasmāttadanyannopapadyate
# gang la brten te gang yin pa / / de ni de las gzhan mi 'thad /
iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate, tadetadanyadanyatpratītya anyadbhavati
# ces gsungs te / / 'dir bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po snam bu las gzhan no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'i gzhan de ni gzhan la brten nas gzhan du 'gyur la /
anyavastunaḥ ṛte, ṛte 'nyataḥ, vinā anyat, anyadanyanna bhavati / yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati, tasmātpaṭākhyādvastunaḥ tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu nānyadbhavatītyavasīyatām
# dngos po gzhan med par te gzhan mi bdog par ni gzhan gzhan du mi 'gyur ro / / bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig snam bu zhes bya ba'i dngos po gzhan la brten nas gzhan yin par 'gyur ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de ni snam bu'i dngos po de las gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar nges par bya'o /
yasmāt, yatpratītya yadbhavati, tasmāttadanyanna bhavati, sāpekṣatvād bījāṅkuravat hrasvadīrghavacceti
# gang gi phyir gang la brten nas gang zhig tu 'gyur ba de ni de las gzhan du mi 'gyur te / / ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sa bon dang myu gu 'am /
tathā ca vakṣyati / pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat / na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatat / iti / atrāha / yadi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt, taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt, tadā ko doṣa iti
# ring po dang thung ngu bzhin no / / de skad du yang / / gang la brten te gang 'byung ba / / de ni re zhig de nyid min / / de ni gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir / / de phyir rtag min chad ma yin / / zhes 'tshang par 'gyur ro / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te snam bu ni bum pa las gzhan yin la / / tha dad par gyur pa'i snam bu de la ltos nas bum pa gzhan du 'gyur na de'i tshe nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
ucyate / yadyanyadanyadanyasmādanyasmādapyṛte bhavet / tadanyadanyadanyasmādṛte nāsti ca nāstyataḥ / eko 'tra anyaśabda upadarśane, aparaśca arthāntaraparāmarśī, anyaśca prasiddhoccāraṇam, iti anyaśabdatrayopādānam / yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt, tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet, tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet / yaddhi yasmādanyat, tattena vināpi siddhayati / tadyathā / sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te gzhan ni gzhan las gzhan / / de tshe gzhan med par gzhan 'gyur / / gzhan med par ni gzhan 'gyur ba / / yod min de yi phyir na med / / ces bya ba ste / / 'dir gzhan gyi sgra gcig ni nye bar bstan par bya ba yin la / / gzhan ni don gzhan 'dzin pa yin zhing / / yang gzhan ni rab tu grags par gyur pa brjod pa yin pas gzhan gyi sgra gsum nye bar bkod do / / gal te bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de gzhan snam bu las gzhan yin par 'gyur na ni / / bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de gzhan snam bu med par yang gzhan du 'gyur te / / de'i tshe snam bu la ma ltos pa'i bum pa gcig pu gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro / / 'di ltar gang zhig gang las gzhan yin pa de ni de med par yang 'grub ste / / dper na bum pa de nyid rang gi ngo bor grub pa las gzhan snam bu la mi ltos pa bzhin no /
evamanyatvamapi yadi ghaṭasya anyasmātpaṭādṛte bhavet, tadānīṃ paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasya paratvaṃ syāt
# de bzhin du gal te bum pa'i gzhan nyid gzhan snam bu las yin na ni / / de'i tshe snam bu la ma ltos pa'i bum pa la yang gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur na /
na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam
# snam bu la ma ltos pa'i bum pa gcig pu la ni gzhan nyid ma mthong ngo / / de'i phyir /
tasmādanyadbhavatīti bruvatā yadapekṣya yadanyat, tatastadanyanna bhavatīti sphuṭamabhyupetaṃ bhavati
# gzhan la brten nas gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes smra ba na / / gang la ltos nas gang zhig gzhan yin pa de ni de las gzhan ma yin no zhes gsal bar khas blangs par 'gyur ro /
atrāha / yadi khalu anyatvamevaṃ kutaścitkasyacinnāsti, nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum / yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti, tasmādeva tadanyadanyanna bhavatīti / ucyate / yata eva hi parasparāpekṣikī bhāvānāmanyatvasiddhiḥ, ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar 'ga' zhig las gzhan nyid 'ga' zhig la yod pa ma yin na / / de'i tshe gang gi phyir gzhan ni gzhan la brten nas gzhan yin pa de'i phyir / / de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyang brjod par mi srid pa ma yin nam / / brjod par bya ste / / gang gi phyir / / dngos po rnams kyi gzhan nyid grub pa phan tshun ltos pa ma yin pa de nyid kyi phyir / / 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la gnas te gzhan zhes brjod kyi /
vastutastu parīkṣyamāṇamanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti brūmaḥ / yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate, atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate / naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate, ghaṭapaṭayoriva janyajanakatvābhāvaprasaṅgāt, yaugapadyabhāvaprasaṅgāt / api ca / yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke / ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti, tasmālloke 'pi kāryakāraṇabhūtānāṃ nāstyeva paratvamiti vyavasthāpyate
# dngos su na gzhan nyid brtags pa na yod pa ma yin no zhes smra'o / / gal te gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin yang / / 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob tu bum pa snam bu las gzhan yin no zhes brjod na / / 'o na ni sa bon dang myu gu gnyis kyang gzhan nyid du ci'i phyir mi smra zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / 'jig rten pas ni sa bon dang myu gu gnyis bum pa dang snam bu ltar gzhan nyid du mi rtogs pa nyid de / / bum pa dang snam bu ltar bskyed bya skyed byed nyid med par thal ba'i phyir dang cig car yod par thal bar 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro / / gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa ni shing 'di ngas btsugs so zhes sa bon tsam zhig btsugs nas sa bon gyi 'bras bu shing ston par byed pa yin te / / de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa rnams kyi gzhan nyid ni 'jig rten na yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog pa yin no /
atrāha / yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt, syādeṣa doṣaḥ / tasmāttadanyanna bhavatīti
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te dngos po gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan gyi blo 'byung na ni / / de'i phyir de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes pa 'dir 'gyur na /
na tvevaṃ brūmaḥ / kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti, tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate, tasmāduktadoṣānavasaro 'smatpakṣe iti / ucyate syādetadevam, yadi anyatvameva syāt, na tvasti / ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata iti pratipādayannāha
# de skad du ni mi smra ste / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'di na gzhan nyid ces bya ba spyi yang yin la khyad par yang yin pa zhig yod pa yin la / / de gang la 'du ba'i dngos po de ni dngos po gzhan la ltos pa med kyang gzhan zhes rjod par byed de / / de'i phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la smras pa'i nyes pa'i go skabs med do / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te gzhan nyid yod na ni 'di de ltar 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no / / 'dir gzhan nyid 'di rtog pa na / / gzhan nam gzhan ma yin pa zhig la rtog grangs gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gzhan nyid gzhan / / la yod ma yin / / gzhan ma yin la'ang yod ma yin /
nānyasmin vidyate 'nyatvamananyasminna vidyate / tatra anyasminnanyatvamastīti kalpyate, kiṃ tadānīmanyatvaparikalpanayā? anyavyapadeśasiddhayarthaṃ hi bhavatā anyatvaṃ parikalpyate / sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva, yasmāllabdhānyavyapadeśa eva padārthe 'nyasmin anyatvaṃ kalpyate, ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, yasmādananya ucyate ekaḥ, tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati / yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati, tatraivāsti / yadā caivamanyatvameva nāsti, tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham
# zhes gsungs so / / de la gal te gzhan la gzhan nyid yod do zhes rtog na ni / / gzhan nyid brtags pas ci zhig bya / / gzhan nyid du rtogs pa ni gzhan du brjod pa grub par bya ba'i phyir yin na / / gzhan du brjod pa de ni gzhan nyid med par yang grub pa nyid de / / gang gi phyir gzhan du brjod pa rnyed pa'i dngos po gzhan la gzhan nyid rtog pa'i phyir ro / / de ltar na re zhig gzhan la gzhan nyid mi srid do / / da ni gzhan ma yin pa la yang gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin te / / gang gi phyir gzhan ma yin pa ni gcig nyid la bya la / / de la ni gzhan nyid dang 'gal ba gcig nyid yod pa de'i phyir 'gal bas / / gzhan ma yin pa la yang gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no / / gang zhig de ltar gzhan dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa la yod pa ma yin zhing / / de dag las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po med pas de dag las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po la yang yod pa ma yin pa de ni med pa nyid do / / gang gi phyir de ltar gzhan nyid med pa de'i tshe gzhan nyid dang 'du ba'i rgyu can blo dang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu dngos po gzhan yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
atrāha / yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi anyastāvadasti / na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati, ato 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate / avidyamāne cānyatve nāstyanyadvā tadeva vā / yadā anyatvameva nāstīti prāk pratipāditam, tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati? tadeveti ananyatvamityarthaḥ / tasmānnāsti anyadvā tadeva vā / atrāha / vidyanta eva darśanādayaḥ, saṃsargasadbhāvāt
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te gzhan nyid med pa de lta na yang gzhan ni re zhig yod pa yin la / / gzhan nyid med par ni gzhan yod par 'os pa yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir gzhan nyid kyang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin na / / gzhan nam de nyid yod ma yin / / gang gi tshe sngar gzhan nyid ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin pa de'i tshe gzhan nyid med par gzhan nam de nyid yod par ga la 'gyur / / de nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go / / de'i phyir gzhan nam de nyid yod pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / lta ba la sogs pa dag ni yod pa nyid de / / phrad pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam, tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo 'sti
# 'dir gal te yang lta ba la sogs pa dag la gzhan nyid med do zhes bstan zin mod kyi / / de lta na yang reg pa ni gsum 'dus shing tshogs pa'o zhes bya bas phrad pa yang yod pa yin te /
tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti / ucyate / syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt
# de'i phyir phrad pa yod pas lta ba la sogs pa dag yod pa nyid do / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te de dag phrad pa nyid yod na ni de ltar 'gyur na /
na tvasti / yathā ca nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha / na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate / iha yadi darśanādīnāṃ saṃsargaḥ syāt, sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā? tatra ekatve nāsti saṃsargaḥ / na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate
# yod pa ni ma yin no / / ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / de ni de dang phrad pa med / / gzhan dang gzhan yang phrad mi 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / 'dir gal te lta ba la sogs pa dang phrad pa yin na / / de dag gcig nyid dam gzhan nyid du brtag grang / / de la gcig nyid yin na ni phrad pa med de / / chu la ltos pa med pa'i 'o ma gcig pu la ni chu dang phrad pa zhes mi brjod do /
pṛthaktve 'pi saṃsargo nāsti / na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate / evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate, so 'nupapannaḥ
# tha dad pa yin na yang phrad pa med de / / chu las tha dad du gnas pa'i 'o ma la ni chu dang phrad pa zhes mi smra'o / / de ltar gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gcig nyid yin pa na / / phrad par rtog na de ni mi 'thad de /
ekakasyāpi cakṣuṣaḥ saṃsṛṣṭiprasaṅgāt
# mig gcig pu la yang phrad pa yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
atha pṛthaktvam, evamapyanupapannaḥ / ekakasyāpi cakṣuṣo rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtasya saṃsṛṣṭiprasaṅgāt
# 'on te tha dad pa nyid yin na / / de lta na yang mi 'thad pa nyid de / / gzugs la sogs pa las so sor gyur pa'i mig gcig pu la yang phrad pa yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
asati saṃsarge nāsti darśanādikamiti siddham
# phrad pa med na ni lta ba la sogs pa yang med do zhes bya bar grub bo /
atrāha / yadyapi saṃsargo nāsti, tathāpi saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā cāsti, tadapratiṣedhāt / na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati / tasmātsaṃsargo 'pi bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate / etadapi na yuktam / yasmādyadā saṃsarga eva nāstīti pratipāditam, asati ca  saṃsarge tadā kutaḥ saṃsṛjyamānādikam? tatra vartamānasaṃsargakriyāsādhanakarmabhūtaṃ saṃsṛjyamānam, saṃsṛṣṭaṃ niṣpannasaṃsargakriyam, saṃsraṣṭā kartā kriyāniṣpattau svātantryeṇāvasthitaḥ / tadatra saṃsargābhāvādeva saṃsṛjyamānādikamapaśyaṃstatpratiṣedhaṃ nigamayannāha / saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃsaṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate / iti / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā [upāliparipṛcchāyām] / sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang phrad pa yod pa ma yin mod kyi / / de lta na yang phrad bzhin pa dang phrad pa dang phrad pa po ni yod pa ma yin te / / de dag bkag pa med pa'i phyir ro / / phrad bzhin pa dang phrad pa dang phrad pa po ni phrad pa med par yod pa yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir phrad pa yang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / 'di yang mi rigs te / / gang gi phyir gang gi tshe phrad pa nyid med do zhes bstan pa de'i tshe phrad pa med par phrad bzhin pa la sogs pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / de la phrad bzhin pa ni da ltar ba phrad pa'i bya ba'i sgrub byed las su gyur pa'o / / phrad pa ni phrad pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa can no / / phrad pa po ni byed pa po bya ba rdzogs par bya ba la rang dbang du gnas pa'o / / de'i phyir 'dir phrad pa med pas / / phrad bzhin pa la sogs pa ma gzigs shing / / de dgag pa mjug bsdu ba'i phyir / / phrad bzhin pa dang phrad pa dang / / phrad pa po yang yod ma yin / / zhes gsungs so / / de nyid kyi phyir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / mig ni ldan na thams cad mthong 'gyur te / / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang /
[naiva ca] cakṣu papaśyati [rūpaṃ] tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ
# mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur / / de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin /
ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram
# mig ni snang la brten te yid 'ong dang / / yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas /
yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci / te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ
# de ltar ldan pa brten te mthong bas na / / de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med / / gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa; ;dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'da' /
kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti / no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ / ............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham / saṅgu na vidyati atra kadāci .............. / ............. tasya na vidyati vedana loke / tathā / bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi
# 'dod pa'i yon tan spyod cing chags med cing / / chags pa rnams spangs sems can 'dul bar byed / / 'di na sems can 'ga' med srog med kyang / / mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mdzad / / sems can yod pa min yang don mdzad pa / / de dag rnams kyi don ni dka' ba che / / zhes bya ba nas / / de la nam yang chags pa yod ma yin / / gang dag chos nyid 'di la mos gyur pa / / de dag yid ni srid la chags mi 'gyur / / zhes bya ba'i bar dang de bzhin du / / gang gis lam bsgoms chos kun stong pa dang / / bdag med ye shes rab tu bskyed byas nas /
yena vibhāvita bhontimi dharmāstasya bhavetpratibhānamanantam
# chos 'di dag ni rnam par bsgom 'gyur ba / / de yi spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / svabhāvaparīkṣā pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, tanniṣpādakahetupratyayopādānāt / iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya
# zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / phrad pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de / / de dag skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen nye bar len pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir gang yang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen nye bar len pa yod pa ma yin te / / dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ, ityato vidyata eva bhāvasvabhāva iti
# myu gu dang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen sa bon dang ma rig pa la sogs pa dag nye bar len pa yang yin te / / de'i phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid yin no /
ucyate / yadi bhāvānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ svabhāvo 'sti, kimidānīṃ vidyamānānāṃ hetupratyayaiḥ prayojanam
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te dngos po 'du byed dang myu gu la sogs pa rnams la rang bzhin yod na ni / / de'i tshe yod par gyur pa rnams la rgyu dang rkyen dag gis dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt, tatsvabhāvasya vidyamānatvāditi pratipādayannāha
# ji ltar 'du byed dang myu gu la sogs pa da lta bar gyur pa rnams la yang bskyed par bya ba'i ched du ma rig pa dang sa bon la sogs pa dag nye bar len par mi byed pa de bzhin du gzhan la yang de bskyed par bya ba'i phyir blang bar mi bya bar 'gyur te / / de'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na saṃbhavaḥ svabhāvasya yuktaḥ pratyayahetubhiḥ / atha syāt / naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti / evamapīḥyamāṇe / hetupratyayasaṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṛtako bhavet / atha syāt
# rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen las ni / / 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs so / / ci ste gang las de yod pa nyid kyis skye ba don med par 'gyur ba skye ba'i snga rol du ni dngos po 'ga' la yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / skye ba'i snga rol du yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin kho na rgyu dang rkyen la brten te phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam na / / de ltar 'dod na yang / / rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi / / rang bzhin byas pa can du 'gyur ro /
iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam, tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti, etadapi na yuktamityāha / svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham
# ci ste rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas rang bzhin byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba na 'dod pa kho na ste / / de'i phyir rang bzhin byas pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir / / byas pa thal bar brtsad pa ni kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no snyam na / / 'di yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa / / rang bzhin byas pa can zhes byar / / ji lta bur na rung bar 'gyur /
kṛtakaśceti svabhāvaśceti parasparaviruddhatvādasaṃgatārthametat
# byas pa yang yin la / / rang bzhin yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir 'brel pa med pa'i don yin no /
iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ, yaḥ kṛtakaḥ padārthaḥ, sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate, tadyathā apāmauṣpyaṃ dhātupiśācapratyayaniṣpāditaḥ karkeṭanādīnāṃ padmarāgādibhāvaśca / yastu akṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ, tadyathā agnerauṣṇyaṃ jātānāṃ padmarāgādīnāṃ padmarāgādisvabhāvaśca
# 'di ltar 'dir rang gi ngo bo ni rang bzhin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu bshad pa las na dngos po byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten na rang bzhin zhes mi brjod de / / dper na chu'i tsha ba dang ke ke ru la sogs pa dag nor sgyur mkhan gyis 'bad pas padma r'a ga la sogs pa'i dngos por byas pa lta bu'o / / gang zhig rang bzhin yin pa de ni ma byas pa yin te / / dper na me'i tsha ba nyid dam / / padma r'a ga la sogs pa rig ma rnams kyi padma r'a ga la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo bzhin te /
sa hi teṣāṃ padārthāntarasaṃparkājanitatvātsvabhāva ityucyate / tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ / yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt, iha maṇīndhanādityasamāgamādaraṇinirdharṣaṇādeśca agnerhetupratyayasāpekṣataiva upalabhyate / na ca agnivyatiriktamauṣṇyaṃ saṃbhavati / tasmādauṣṇyamapi hetupratyayajanitam, tataśca kṛtakam, kṛtakatvāccāpāmauṣṇyavat svabhāvo naiva bhavatīti sphuṭamavasīyate / nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti / kiṃ khalu asmābhiruktaṃ na prasiddhamiti? etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ / nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt / avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ
# de ni dngos po gzhan dang phrad pas ma bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o / / de'i phyir de ltar rang bzhin ni ma byas pa yin no zhes 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnam par gnas pa yin dang da ni kho bo cag tsha ba nyid gang yin pa de yang byas pa'i phyir mi'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes gzung bar bya'o zhes smra'o / / 'dir nor bu dang me spru dang nyi ma phrad pa dang gtsub shing dang gtsubs pa las byung ba'i me ni rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du dmigs la / / me las gzhan pa'i tsha ba nyid kyang med pa de'i phyir tsha ba nyid kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yin te / / de'i phyir byas pa yin zhing / / byas pa yin pa'i phyir na / / chu'i tsha ba bzhin du rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya bar ches gsal bar nges pa yin no / / gal te me'i rang bzhin ni tsha ba nyid do zhes skye bo ba glang rdzi dang bud med yan chad la grags pa ma yin nam zhe na / / ci kho bo cag gis ma grags so zhes smras sam / / 'di ni rang bzhin yin par mi 'os te / / rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag smra'o / / ma rig pa'i phyin ci log gi rjes su song ba'i phyir 'jig rten pas ni dngos po'i rnam pa rang bzhin med pa nyid la rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no /
yathā hi  taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ, evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam / tato 'nyatrānupalambhādasādhāraṇatvena svameva lakṣaṇamiti kṛtvā / bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam
# ji ltar rab rib can rnams kyis skra shad la sogs pa rang bzhin med pa nyid la rab rib kyi rkyen gyis rang bzhin nyid du mngon par zhen pa de bzhin du byis pa rnams ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis dngos po'i rnam pa rang bzhin med pa la rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du mngon par zhen par gyur nas gzhan du ma dmigs pa las thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis me'i rang bzhin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba'o zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan nyid smra ste / / bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i phyir ro / / de rnams la grags pa nyid kyi sgo nas / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos mngon par de dag gi rang gi ngo bo kun rdzob pa de rnam par gzhag pa mdzad la /
sādhāraṇaṃ tvanityatvādikaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamiti coktam
# mi rtag pa la sogs pa thun mong pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad do /
yadā tu vigatāvidyātimirāvadātaprajñācakṣuṣāṃ darśanamapekṣyate, tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ, nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāmiti / yathoktamāryalaṅkāvatārasūtre
# gang gi tshe ma rig pa'i rab rib dang bral ba dri ma med pa'i shes rab kyi spyan mnga' ba rnams kyis gzigs pa la ltos nas ni / / de'i tshe rab rib dang bral ba dag gis rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad ma mthong ba ltar 'phags pa byis pa'i skye bo'i blos brtags pa'i rang bzhin ma gzigs pa rnams kyis 'di ni dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ma yin no zhes gsal bar gsungs par mdzad pa yin te / / ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
keśoṇḍukaṃ yathā mithyā gṛhyate taimirikairjanaiḥ
# ji ltar rab rib can dag gis / / skra shad log par 'dzin pa ltar /
tathā bhāvavikalpo 'yaṃ mithyā bālairvikalpyate
# de bzhin dngos por rtog pa 'di / / byis pas log par rnam par brtags /
na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ / bālairvikalpitā hyete śavabhūtaiḥ kutārkikaiḥ / iti / tathā / svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ
# rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med / / kun gzhi med cing dngos med na / / byis pa ngan pa rtog ge ba / / ro dang 'dra bas 'di dag brtags / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du blo gros chen po rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la dgongs nas ngas chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o zhes gsungs so zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
iti vistaraḥ / atrāha / yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate, kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam / ucyate / akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca / iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te me la sogs pa'i tsha ba nyid la sogs pa 'di rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas byas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin ma yin no zhes smra na / / da ni de dag gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid gang yin zhing / / rang bzhin de yang gang zhig yin pa brjod dgos so / / brjod par bya ste / / rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin / / 'di ni rang gi dngos po ni rang bzhin no zhes bya bas gang zhig dngos po gang gi bdag gi ba'i ngo bo yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin yin no zhes brjod do / / gang zhig gang gi bdag gi ba yin zhe na /
kiṃ ca kasyātmīyaṃ yadyasyākṛtrimam, yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam / yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ, svāni dhanāni / yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram / yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam, ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate / yataścaitadevam, ato yadevāgneḥ kālatraye 'pyavyabhicāri nijaṃ rūpamakṛtrimam, pūrvamabhūtvā paścādyanna bhavati, yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā, tat svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate / kiṃ khalu agneḥ taditthaṃ svarūpamasti? na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ / yadyapi evam, tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā / śrūyate deśyate cāpi samāropādanakṣaraḥ
# gang gis gang ma bcos pa'o / / gang zhig bcos ma yin pa de ni de'i bdag gi ba ma yin te / / dper na / / chu'i tsha ba nyid bzhin no / / gang zhig gang la rag ma las pa de yang de'i bdag gi ba yin te / / dper na / / rang gi khol po dang rang gi nor dag bzhin no / / gang zhig gi gzhan la rag las pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag gi ba ma yin te / / dper na / / re zhig pa'i brnyan por rang dbang med pa lta bu'o / / gang gi phyir de ltar bcos ma dang rang la ltos pa rang bzhin nyid du mi 'dod pa de nyid kyi phyir tsha ba nyid me'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te / / rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir dang sngar ma byung ba las phyir 'byung bas byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir / / dus gsum du yang me la mi 'khrul pa gnyug ma'i ngo bo ma bcos pa / / gang zhig sngar ma byung ba las phyis 'byung ba ma yin pa / / gang zhig chu'i tsha ba 'am / / tshu rol dang pha rol lam / / ring po dang thung ngu ltar rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa dang bcas par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin yin par brjod do / / ci me'i rang gi ngo bo de lta bur gyur pa de yod dam zhe na / / de ni rang gi ngo bos yod pa yang ma yin la med pa yang ma yin no / / de lta yin mod kyi / / 'on kyang nyan pa po rnams kyi skrag pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir / / sgro btags nas kun rdzob tu de yod do zhes bya bar de smra'o / / ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis / / yi ge med pa'i chos la ni / / nyan pa gang yin ston pa gang / / sgro btags pa las yi ge med / / de ni nyan zhing ston pa 'ang yin /
iti / ihāpi ca vakṣyati / śūnyamiti na vaktavyamaśūnyamiti vā bhavet / ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate / yadi khalu tadadhyāropādbhavadbhirastītyucyate, kīdṛśaṃ tat? yā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā nāma, saiva tatsvarūpam / atha keyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā? dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ / ko 'yaṃ svabhāvaḥ? prakṛtiḥ / kā ceyaṃ prakṛtiḥ? yeyaṃ śūnyatā
# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / 'di nyid las kyang / / stong ngo zhes kyang mi brjod de / / mi stong zhes kyang mi bya zhing / / gnyis dang gnyis min mi bya ste / / gdags pa'i don du brjod par bya / / zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro / / gal te sgro btags pa las de yod do zhes brjod na / / de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na / / de'i rang gi ngo bo ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa de nyid yin no / / de nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yang gang zhig yin zhe na / / chos rnams kyi ngo bo'o / / ngo bo 'di yang gang zhe na / / rang bzhin no / / rang bzhin 'di yang gang yin / / stong pa nyid do /
keyaṃ śūnyatā? naiḥsvābhāvyam
# stong pa nyid 'di yang gang yin zhe na / / rang bzhin med pa'o /
kimidaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam? tathatā / keyaṃ tathatā? tathābhāvo 'vikāritvaṃ sadaiva sthāyitā
# rang bzhin med pa 'di yang gang zhig yin / / de bzhin nyid do / / de bzhin nyid 'di yang gang zhig ce na / / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa nyid dang rtag tu gnas pa nyid de /
sarvathānutpāda eva hyagnyādīnāṃ paranirapekṣatvādakṛtrimatvātsvabhāva ityucyate
# rnam pa thams cad du skye ba med pa nyid ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir me la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yin no zhes brjod do /
etaduktaṃ bhavati / avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti, tadeva svarūpameṣāṃ svabhāva iti vyavasthāpyate / tasya cedaṃ lakṣaṇam / akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca / iti vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryā iti vijñeyam / sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate / yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim / iti / atrāha / yadyapi svabhāvo nāsti bhāvānām, tathāpi parabhāvastāvadasti, tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati
# 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te / / dngos po'i rnam pa ma rig pa'i rab rib kyi mthus dmigs pa ni ma gzigs pa'i tshul gyis / / bdag nyid gang gis 'phags pa ma rig pa'i rab rib dang bral ba rnams kyi yul du 'gyur te / / ngo bo de nyid de dag gi rang bzhin du rnam par gzhag go / / rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin / / zhes bya ba 'di ni slob dpon dag gis de'i mtshan nyid du rnam par gzhag go zhes bya bar shes par bya'o / / dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa skye ba med pa de yang ci yang ma yin pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa tsam yin pas ngo bo med pa'i phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis / / gang gi dngos rnams dngos med shes pa ste / / nang yang dngos po kun la chags mi 'gyur / / gang zhig nam yang dngos kun chags med pa / / de ni ting 'dzin mtshan ma med la reg / / ces gsungs pa lta bu'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang dngos po rnams la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang re zhig gzhan gyi dngos po ni yod de / / de ma bkag pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan gyi dngos po yod na ni rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur te /
svabhāvamantareṇa parabhāvāprasiddheriti / ucyate / kutaḥ svabhāvasyābhāve parabhāvo bhaviṣyati
# rang bzhin med par gzhan gyi dngos po mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro / / brjod pa / / rang bzhin med pa ma yin na / / gzhan gyi dngos po ga la yod /
svabhāvaḥ parabhāvasya parabhāvo hi kathyate
# gzhan gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni / / gzhan gyi dngos po yin zhes brjod /
iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate
# 'dir 'jig rten na ni rang bzhin 'ga' zhig kho na rang bzhin gzhan la ltos nas gzhan gyi dngos po zhes brjod do /
yadi hi agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, dravasvabhāvasalilasāpekṣayā parabhāva iti vyapadiśyeta
# gal te tsha ba nyid me'i rang bzhin yin na ni / / gsher ba'i rang bzhin can gyi tshu la ltos nas gzhan gyi dngos po zhes brjod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ paratvaṃ syāt? parabhāvācca svabhāvo 'pi nāsti iti siddham
# gang gi tshe rnam par dpyad pa na gang la yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni gzhan nyid yod par ga la 'gyur / / gzhan nyid med pas ni rang bzhin yang yod pa ma yin par grub po /
atrāha / yadyapi svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tathāpi bhāvastāvadasti, apratiṣedhāt
# 'dir smras pa; gal te yang rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang dngos po ni re zhig yod pa yin te / / ma bkag pa'i phyir ro /
sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā / tasmātsvabhāvaparabhāvāvapi bhaviṣyata iti / ucyate / svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāmṛte bhāvaḥ kutaḥ punaḥ
# dngos po de yod na yang rang bzhin nam gzhan gyi dngos po zhig tu 'gyur dgos te / / de'i phyir / / rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod pa / / rang bzhin dang ni gzhan dngos dag / / ma gtogs dngos po ga la yod /
svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati / bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā
# rang bzhin dang ni gzhan dngos dag / / yod na dngos po 'grub par 'gyur / / 'di ltar dngos po brtags pa na / / rang bzhin nam gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yin grang /
tau ca pūrvoktavidhinā na staḥ, iti tayorabhāvādbhāvo 'pi nāstītyavadhāryatām / atrāha / yadyapi bhavatā bhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpyabhāvo 'sti, pratiṣedhābhāvāt
# de gnyis kyang sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yod pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir de gnyis med pas dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang khyod kyis dngos po bkag mod kyi / / de lta na yang dngos po med pa ni yod pa nyid de / / ma bkag pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca bhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati pratidvandvisadbhāvāt, abhāvavaditi / ucyate / syādbhāvaḥ, yadi abhāva eva syāt / na tvastītyāha / bhāvasya cedaprasiddhirabhāvo naiva sidhyati / bhāvasya hyanyathābhāvamabhāvaṃ vruvate janāḥ
# de'i phyir 'gal zla yod pas / / dngos po yang yod par 'gyur te / / dngos po med pa bzhin no / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te dngos po med pa nyid yod na / / dngos po yang yod par 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa / / gal te dngos po ma grub na / / dngos med 'grub par mi 'gyur ro / / dngos po gzhan du gyur pa ni; ;dngos med yin par skye bo smra /
iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat, syāttasyānyathābhāvādabhāvaḥ / ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke
# 'di na gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni / / de gzhan du gyur pa las dngos po med par 'gyur ba zhig ste / / 'di ltar bum pa la sogs pa da ltar gyi gnas skabs las nyams shing / / gzhan du gyur pa thob pa dag ni 'jig rten na dngos po med pa'i sgra'i brjod byar 'gyur ba yin no /
yadā tvamī ghaṭādayo bhāvarūpatvenaivāsiddhāḥ, tadā kuto 'vidyamānasvabhāvānāmanyathātvamiti
# gang gi tshe / / bum pa la sogs pa 'di dag dngos po'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pa de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la gzhan du 'gyur pa nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
ataḥ abhāvo 'pi nāsti / tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam
# de'i phyir dngos po med pa yang yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa thams cad du rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dang dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag yod pa ma yin pa la / / ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis phyin ci log tu /
svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca / ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane / ye hi tathāgatapravacanāviparītavyākhyānābhimānitayā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ svabhāvaḥ, vedanāyā viṣayānubhavaḥ, vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ svabhāvaḥ, ityevaṃ svabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ varṇayanti, anyadvijñānam, anyadrūpam, anyaiva ca vedanā, ityevaṃ parabhāvaṃ varṇayanti, vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti, vijñānādikameva ca atītatāmāpannamabhāva iti, na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti / yasmādyathoditopapattiviruddhaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvādīnāmastitvam, na copapattiviruddhaṃ padārthasvabhāvamanuvarṇayanti tathāgatāḥ
# gang dag rang bzhin gzhan dngos dang / / dngos dang dngos med nyid lta ba / / de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa la / / de nyid mthong ba ma yin no / / gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab phyin ci ma log bar rnam par 'chad par rlom pa nyid kyis / / sa'i rang bzhin ni sra ba'o / / tshor ba'i ni yul myong ba'o / / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni yul so sor rnam par rig pa'o zhes de ltar dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin smra ba dang gzugs gzhan la rnam par shes pa yang gzhan yin zhing / / tshor ba yang gzhan nyid do zhes de ltar gzhan gyi dngos po smra ba dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa da ltar ba'i gnas skabs su gyur pa dngos por ram / / rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'das par gyur pa dngos po med par smra ba de dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa'i de kho na nyid smra ba ma yin no / / gang gi phyir / / rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po la sogs pa rnams yod pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa'i 'thad pa dang 'gal ba yin la / / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dngos po'i rang bzhin 'thad pa dang 'gal ba gsung ba yang ma yin te /
svayamaviparītāśeṣapadārthatattvasaṃbodhāt
# rang nyid kyi dngos po ma lus pa'i de nyid phyin ci ma log par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir /
ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ, sopapattikatvenāvisaṃvādakatvāt / ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt, āgamayatīti samantāt tattvaṃ gamayatīti vā, āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate / tadanyamatānāṃ tu upapattiviyuktatvānna prāmāṇyam, āgamābhāsatvaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate / yasmācca etāni svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāvadarśanāni yuktividhuratvānna tattvāni, ata eva mumukṣūṇāṃ vineyajanānām
# mkhas pa dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na'i gsung tshad mar rjod par byed de / / 'thad pa dang bcas pas mi slu ba'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir nyes pa ma lus pa spangs pa yid ches ba dag las 'ongs pa'i phyir ram / / kun du go bar byed pa ste / / de kho na nyid kun nas go bar byed pa'i phyir ram / / mngon du phyogs nas 'gro ba ste / / de la brten nas 'jig rten pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid lung du rnam par gzhag la / / de las gzhan gyi gzhung lugs rnams ni 'thad pa dang bral bas tshad ma ma yin pa nyid dang lung ma yin pa nyid du rnam par gzhag go / / gang gi phyir / / rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dang dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba 'di dag rigs pa dang bral bas de kho na nyid ma yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
kātyāyanāvavāde cāstīti nāstīti cobhayam / pratiṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā āryakātyāyanāvavādasūtre / yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca / tena na parimucyate
# gdul bya'i skye bo thar pa 'dod pa rnams la / / bcom ldan dngos dang dngos med pa / / mkhyen pas k'a ta yan yi / / gdams ngag las ni yod pa dang / / med pa gnyi ga 'ang dgag par mdzad pa yin no / / bcom ldan 'das kyis k'a ta yan la gdams pa'i mdo las / / k'a ta yan gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di ni phal cher yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid la mngon par zhen te /
jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyo na parimucyate / pāñcagatikātsaṃsāracārakāgārabandhanānna parimucyate
# des na skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa dag las yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur /
mātṛmaraṇasaṃtāpaduḥkhānna parimucyate / pitṛmaraṇasaṃtāpaduḥkhāditi vistaraḥ
# 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur / / 'chi ba'i gdung ba'i sdug bsngal las grol bar mi 'gyur zhes rgya cher gsungs pa yin la /
idaṃ ca sūtraṃ sarvanikāyeṣu paṭhayate
# mdo sde 'di yang sde ba thams cad kyis 'don pa yin no /
tadasmādāgamāt yathopavarṇitāyāścopapatternārhati prājñasvabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ tathāgatavacanādatyantaviruddhamāsthātum
# de'i phyir lung 'di dang ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pa las na shes rab can gyi rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dang dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang shin tu 'gal ba khas blang bar 'os pa ma yin te /
bhagavatā pratiṣiddhatvāt / kiṃviśiṣṭena bhagavatā? bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā / bhāvābhāvau vibhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti bhāvābhāvavibhāvī / yathāvasthitabhāvābhāvāviparītasvabhāvaparijñānād bhāvābhāvavibhāvīti bhagavānevocyate
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pa'i phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par du 'phags pa zhig gis she na / / dngos dang dngos med mkhyen pas te / / 'di la dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag mkhyen pa'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na / / dngos po dang dngos po med pa mkhyen pa'o / / dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyin ci ma log par yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir / / bcom ldan 'das nyid dngos po dang dngos po med pa mkhyen pa zhes bya'o /
tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham, tasmānna yuktaṃ bhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ tattvamityāsthātum
# gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das dngos po dang dngos po med pa mkhyen pa des yod pa dang med pa nyid gnyi ga yang dgag pa mdzad pa de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba de kho na nyid yin no zhes khas blangs par rigs pa ma yin no /
tathā / astīti kāśyapa ayameko 'ntaḥ / nāstīti kāśyapa ayameko 'ntaḥ / yadenayorantayormadhyam, tadarūpyamanidarśanamapratiṣṭhamanābhāsamaniketamavijñaptikam / iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti / tathā / astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā
# de bzhin du / / 'od srungs yod ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig go / / med ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gnyis so / / de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa / / bstan du med pa / / rten ma yin pa / / snang ba med pa / / rnam par rig pa med pa / / gnas pa med pa ste / / 'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha' / / gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te /
tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ
# de phyir gnyi ga'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas / / mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par yod mi byed /
astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ
# yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste / / gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin /
vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate
# rtsod par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur / / rtsod pa med par gyur pas sdug bsngal 'gag /
iti / atrāha / yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktadoṣaḥ
# ces gsungs so / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang de ltar me la sogs pa rang bzhin kho nas yod pa nyid du gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur / / rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi /
hetupratyayasaṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṛtako bhavet / ityādinā
# rang bzhin byas pa can du 'gyur / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyes pa bshad zin to /
api ca / yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha / yadyastitvaṃ prakṛtyā syānna bhavedasya nāstitā
# gzhan yang / / gal te me la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin 'di nyid yod pa yin na ni / / yod par gyur pa de yang gzhan du gyur pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te rang bzhin gyis yod na / / de ni med nyid mi 'gyur ro / / zhes gsungs te /
yadi agnyāderbhāvasya prakṛtyā svabhāvato 'stitvam, tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt
# gal te 'di nyid me la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bo yin par gyur na ni / / de'i tshe rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i rang bzhin de la slar yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
yasmāt / prakṛteranyathābhāvo na hi jātūpapadyate
# gang gi phyir / / rang bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba ni / / nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
yadi eṣāmagnyādīnāmiyameva prakṛtiḥ syāt, svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā prakṛteravikāriṇītvānna kadācitpunaranyathābhāva upapadyeta / na hi ākāśasyānāvaraṇatvaṃ kadācidapyanyathātvaṃ pratipadyate / evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt / upalabhate ca bhavāneṣāmanyathātvaprabandhoparamalakṣaṇaṃ vināśam
# gal te 'di nyid me la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin yin par gyur na ni / / de'i tshe rang bzhin ni mi 'gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir nam yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'thad pa ma yin no / / nam mkha'i mi sgrib pa nyid nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de bzhin du me la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis yod pa dag kyang slar gzhan du mi 'gyur ba zhig na / / de dag gzhan du 'gyur ba rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'jig pa ni khyod kyis dmigs pa yang yin no /
tasmādvipariṇāmadharmitvādapāmauṣṇyavat nāyameṣāṃ svabhāva iti pratīyatām / atrāha / yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate, nanu ca evamapi
# de'i phyir rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir chu'i tsha ba nyid ltar 'di 'di dag gi rang bzhin ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te rang bzhin gyis yod pa la gzhan du 'gyur pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang dmigs pa'i phyir dngos po 'di dag la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod na / / de lta na yang /
prakṛtau kasya cāsatyāmanyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati / kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmādavidyamānaprakṛtikasya anyathātvānupalambhāt, anyathātvasya ca darśanāt, astyeva svabhāva iti
# rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na / / gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin / / da ni nam mkha'i me tog ltar rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bos yod pa ma yin pas gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin par 'gyur / / de'i phyir rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir la / / gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin yod do /
ucyate / yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi / prakṛtau kasya ca satyāmanyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati / kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te khyod kyi lugs kyis rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bos yod pa ma yin pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir la / / gzhan du 'gyur ba yang mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin yod do zhes smra ba yin na ni / / de lta na yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na yang gzhan du 'gyur ba ji ltar rung / / da ni da ltar byung ba ltar rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bos yod pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin par 'gyur / / de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis yod pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad du mi srid pa nyid do /
tataśca nāsti prakṛtirbhāvānāmioti vijñeyam / yaccāpyuktam / anyathātvasya darśanānnāsti prakṛtiriti, tadapi paraprasiddhayā anyathātvadarśanamadhikṛtyoktam, na tvasmābhiḥ kadācidapi kasyacidanyathātvamabhyupetam
# de'i phyir dngos po rnams la rang bzhin med do zhes shes par bya'o / / gang yang gzhan du 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa de yang gzhan la grags pa'i gzhan du 'gyur ba mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas brjod pa yin gyi / / kho bo cag gis nam yang gang la yang gzhan du 'gyur ba yod par khas ma blangs so /
tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati, tasya evaṃ parikalpayato niyatameva / astīti śāśvatagrāho nāstītyucchedadarśanam / prasajyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / taccaitat śāśvatocchedadarśanaṃ svargāpavargamārgāntarāyakaratvād yasmānmahānarthakaram,
# de'i phyir de ltar rang bzhin gtan yod pa ma yin dang chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba yang yod pa ma yin bzhin du / / da lta gang zhig dngos po rnams yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid du rtog par byed de / / de ltar rtog pa de la ni nges pa kho nar / / yod ces bya ba rtag par 'dzin / / med ces bya ba chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ro / / gang gi phyir rtag ba dang chad par lta ba 'di yang mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam gyi bar du gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don ma yin pa chen po byed pa /
tasmādastitvanāstitve nāśrīyeta vicakṣaṇaḥ / kasmātpunarbhāvābhāvadarśane sati śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgo bhavatīti? yasmāt
# de phyir yod dang med pa la / / mkhas pas gnas pas mi bya'o / / yang ci'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba yod na rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur zhe na / / 'di ltar /
asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam / nāstīdānīmabhūtpūrvamityucchedaḥ prasajyate
# gang zhig rang bzhin gyis yod pa / / de ni med pa yin pas rtag / / sngon byung da ltar med ces pa / / des na chad par thal bar 'gyur /
yat svabhāvena astītyucyate, svabhāvasyānapāyitvānna tat kadācidapi nāstīti, evaṃ bhāvasyāstitvābhyupagame sati śāśvatadarśanamāpadyate
# gang zhig rang bzhin gyis yod par brjod pa de ni rang bzhin la ldog pa med pas nam yang med pa ma yin te / / de ltar na rang bzhin yod pa nyid du khas blangs pas rtag par lta bar 'gyur la /
pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate
# sngon gnas pa'i gnas skabs su / / dngos po'i rang bzhin khas blangs nas da ltar phyis de zhig pas med do zhes khas blangs pas chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ro /
yasya tu bhāvasvabhāva eva nopapadyate, na tasya śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ, bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt
# gang gi ltar na dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid mi 'thad pa de la ni rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal bar mi 'gyur te / / dngos po'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam, ucchedadarśanaṃ tu niyataṃ prasajyate iti
# gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes khas len pa la dngos por lta ba med pas rtag par lta ba med mod / / chad par lta bar thal bar ni nges par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
naivamabhāvadarśanaṃ bhavati / yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate, tasya pūrvopalabdhasvabhāvāpavādāt syādabhāvadarśanam
# de ltar med par lta bar ni mi 'gyur ro / / 'di ltar gang zhig sngar dngos po'i rang bzhin khas blangs nas / / phyis de ldog pa la rten par byed pa de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin sngar dmigs pa la skur ba btab pas med par lta bar 'gyur gyi /
yastu taimirikopalabdhakeśeṣviva vitaimiriko na kiṃcidupalabhate, sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt / viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ / na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti
# gang zhig rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad dag la rab rib med pa ltar gyur cing ci yang ma dmigs pa des med do zhes smras pa na / / ci zhig med par smras par 'gyur te / / dgag bya med pa'i phyir ro / / phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams log par mngon par zhen pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir rab rib med pa rnams ltar dngos po thams cad yod pa ma ma yin no zhes kho bo cag smra mod kyi /
na caivaṃ bruvatāmasmākaṃ parahitavyāpāraparāyaṇānāmucchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ / yathoktaṃ sūtre / yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti, sa bhagavan vai nāstiko bhavati / iti vistaraḥ / yastu paratantracittacaittavastumātramabhyupetya tasya parikalpitasvabhāvābhāvādastitvadarśanaṃ pariharati, saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanasya ca paratantravastumātrasadbhāvānnāstitvadarśanaṃ pariharati, tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ? hetupratyayajanitasya ca sasvabhāvenāyuktatvapratipādanādayuktamevāsya vyākhyānam / tadevaṃ madhyamakadarśane eva astitvanāstitvadvayadarśanasyāprasaṅgaḥ, na vijñānavādidarśanādiṣviti
# de skad smras pa na / / kho bo cag chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no / / ji skad du mdo las / / bcom ldan 'das gang gis sngar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag dngos por gyar gyis blangs nas / / phyis 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag dngos po yod pa ni ma yin no zhes smra ba de ni med pa par yang 'gyur lags so zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o / / gang zhig gzhan dbang sems dang sems las byung ba dngos po tsam khas blangs nas / / de la kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med pas yod par lta ba nyid spong zhing gzhan gyi dbang gi dngos po kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rgyur gyur pa tsam zhig yod pas ni med par lta ba nyid spong bar byed pa de'i ltar na / / kun tu brtags pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan gyi dbang yod pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa nyid du lta ba gnyi gar yang 'gyur ba'i phyir mtha' gnyis spangs par ga la 'gyur / / rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa ni rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du yod par mi rigs par bstan zin pa'i phyir bshad pa mi rigs pa nyid do / / de'i phyir de ltar dbu ma pa'i lta ba kho na la yod pa dang med pa nyid du lta bar thal ba med pa yin gyi / / rnam par shes par smra ba'i lta ba la sogs pa dag la ni ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
vijñeyam / ata evoktamāryaratnāvalyām
# de nyid kyi phyir / / rin po che'i phreng ba las /
sasāṃkhyaullūkyanirgranthapudgalaskandhavādinam
# gang zag phung por smra ba yi / / 'jig rten grangs can 'ug phrug dang /
pṛccha lokaṃ yadi vadatyastināstivyatikramam
# gos med bcas la gal te zhig / / yod med 'das pa smra na dris /
dharmayautakamityasmādastināstivyatikramam / viddhi gambhīramityukta buddhānāṃ śāsanāmṛtam
# de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni / / bstan pa 'chi med yod med las / / 'das pa zab mo zhes bshad pa / / chos kyi khud pa yin zhes kyis /
iti / tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ sāṃmitīyapudgalavādavat, na nītārthaḥ iti vijñeyam / yathoktamāryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake
# zhes gsungs so / / don dam pa mthong pa'i thabs su gyur pa nyid kyi phyir / / gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa de lta bu rtog pa'i ngor / / bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis mang po bkur pa'i gang zag tu smra ba ltar / / rnam par shes par smra ba drang ba'i don nyid du bstan gyi / / nges pa'i don du ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / ji skad du / / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las /
nītārthasūtrāntaviśeṣa jānati yathopadiṣṭā sugatena śūnyatā
# stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar / / nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes /
yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān
# gang las sems can gang zag skyes bu bstan / / chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes / / zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
etacca āryākṣayamatinirdeśādiṣu vistareṇa boddhavyamiti
# 'di ni blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa dag las rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o /
bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi
