# de'i phyir dam pa thar pa 'dod pa dag gis ji srid du dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba gnyis kyi glags yod pa de srid du 'khor ba yin no zhes rtogs par byas nas / / lta ba 'di gnyis bsal te /
etaccoktaṃ bhagavatā / bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvi acintiya sarvi abhūtaṃ / ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāḥ te dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu / bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānatī sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate / yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim / iti / tathā / smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatīta adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ / utpannu lokārthakaro maharṣī nāmena so 'bhāvasamudgato 'bhūt / sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarvāṇa dharmāṇabhāva deśayi / tadānurūpaṃ kṛta nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñayī / devāpi sarve pramumocu śabdaṃ abhāvanāmeti jino bhaviṣyati / yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakraman abhāva dharmāṇa samaṃ prakāśayī / buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ / tṛṇagulmavṛkṣauṣadhiśailaparvate abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati
# dbu ma'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / thams cad bsam yas thams cad 'byung min pas / / dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par bshig / / byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba / / de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas na / / mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te / / drang srong chen po gzings kyi don mdzad pa / / ming ni dngos po med las byung zhes bya / / skyes ma thag tu mkha' la rab tu gnas / / chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan / / de tshe de dang mthun par mtshan btags te / / sgras ni 'jig rten kun tu grags par byas / / lha rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa / / dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar gyur / / skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor te / / rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad / / thub pa ches rnams thams cad ston pa yi / / sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por nam gyur tshe / / rtsva shing gel pa sman ri brag rnams las / / chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang 'byung /
yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ
# 'jig rten de na ji snyed sgra yod pa / / thams cad dngos med ci yang med pa zhes /
tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya ravu niścarī lokavināyakasya
# de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dren pa yi / / sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur /
iti / bhavatīti bhāvaḥ sattā / na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogeneti prajñāpāramitāpāṭhāt bhāvasvabhāvasyānupapatteḥ / abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati / ityādinā sūtrārtho 'vagantavyaḥ / yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau / sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ / ityādi / bhūtvā abhāvapratiṣedhavivakṣitatvād bhāvābhāvārtha eva svabhāvābhāvārthaḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau svabhāvaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / bandhamokṣaparīkṣā ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, saṃsārasadbhāvāt / iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate / yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, kasya gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāraḥ syāt? na hi avidyamānānāṃ vandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam / tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti / ucyate / syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi saṃsāra eva bhavet / na tvasti / iha yadi saṃsāraḥ syāt, sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? ubhayathā ca doṣa ityāha / saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te
# zhes gsungs so / / dngos po'i rang bzhin mi 'thad pa yi phyir / / chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang 'byung / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo'i don khong du chud par bya ste / / 'jig rten de na ji sred sgra yod pa / / thams cad dngos med ci yang med pa ste / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas na / / med par dgag pa brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i don ni rang bzhin med pa'i don yin no / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / rang bzhin brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bco lnga ba'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de / / 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'di na 'khor bas na 'khor ba ste / / 'gro bas na 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro ba la 'khor ba zhes bya'o / / gal te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na / / de'i tshe su zhig 'gro ba nas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro zhing 'khor bar 'gyur / / mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed yod pa ma yin pa dag ni 'khor bar ma mthong ngo / / de'i phyir 'khor ba yod pas dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod pa nyid yin no / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na / / yod pa ni ma yin no / / 'dir gal te 'khor ba yod na ni nges par 'du byed dag gam sems can zhig der 'gyur grang / / gnyi ga ltar yang nyes pa yod do zhes gsungs pa / / gal te 'du byed 'khor zhe na / / de dag rtag na mi 'khor te / / mi rtag na yang 'khor mi 'gyur / / sems can la yang rim 'di mtshungs / / de la gal te 'du byed dag 'khor bar rtog na ni / / ci rtag pa'am mi rtag pa dag cig 'khor grang /
saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ / tatra yadi saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti parikalpyate, kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ? tatra na nityāḥ saṃsaranti niṣkriyatvāt, anityānāṃ ca ghaṭādīnāṃ sakriyatvopalambhāt / atha anityāḥ, ye hi akriyāḥ, te utpādasamanantarameva vinaṣṭāḥ / ye ca vinaṣṭāḥ, kutasteṣāmavidyamānatvādvandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāmiva kvacid gamanam? ityevamanityānāmapi nāsti saṃsāraḥ / athāpi syāt / anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti / etadapi nopapadyate / kutaḥ? yat tāvadutpadyate kāryam, tasya saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt / yacca kāraṇaṃ naṣṭam, tasyāpi saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt / saṃskāramātravyatirekeṇa atītānāgatayorasiddhatvāt, naṣṭājātatvena avidyamānatvāt / uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet, yadi pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorekatvaṃ syāt, syādetadevam / na tu ekatvamasti kāryakāraṇabhāvāt, cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānānāṃ nāsti ca
# de la rtag pa dag ni mi 'khor te / / bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir te / / bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa rnams kho na bya ba dang bcas par dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / 'on te mi rtag pa dag yin na ni / / gang mi rtag pa de dag ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa yin la; gang dag zhig ba de dag ni yod pa ma yin pas mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed dag bzhin du / / 'gar yang 'phyan par ga la 'gyur / / de ltar na mi rtag pa rnams kyang 'khor ba ma yin no / / ci ste 'du byed rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rim pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rgyun chags su 'jug pa mi rtag par gyur pa dag kho na 'khor ro snyam na / / 'di yang mi 'thad de / / re zhig 'bras bu skye ba gar yin pa de la ni 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te / / gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba'i phyir dang gar yang mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro / / rgyu zhig par gyur ba gang yin pa de la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te / / gang nas kyang mi 'ong pa'i phyir dang gar yang mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro / / 'du byed tsam las ma gtogs par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag ma grub pa'i phyir dang zhig pa dang ma skyes pa nyid kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i yang phyir ro / / gal te skad cig ma phyi ma skyes pa na snga ma 'khor ba yin no zhe na / / gal te skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis gcig nyid du 'gyur na ni / / de de ltar 'gyur na / / gcig nyid du ni yod pa ma yin te / / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir / / mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa dag bzhin no /
kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt
# gzhan yang gcig nyid yin na ni skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi mar brjod par bya ba nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro /
na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate / evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt
# dus gcig gi tshe lha mi rnams gcig snga ma dang phyi mar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni med de / / de bzhin du / / 'dir yang gcig yin pa'i phyir skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi mar bsnyad pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro /
api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt / uttarakṣaṇa utpanna iti na syāt, pūrvakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt
# gzhan yang skad cig ma snga ma zhig go zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te / / tha mi dad pa'i phyir skad cig ma phyi ma bzhin no / / skad cig ma phyi ma skyes so zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur te / / tha mi dad pa'i phyir skad cig ma snga ma bzhin no /
atha anyatve sati saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, evaṃ sati arhatāmapi saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt / anyasya pṛthagjanasya saṃsārotpattisadbhāvāt
# ci ste gzhan nyid yin pa na 'khor ro zhe na / / de lta na ni gzhan so so'i skye bo 'khor bar skye ba yod pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa rnams kyang 'khor bar 'gyur la /
nirvṛtaśca pradīpaḥ pradīpāntare jvalatīti syāt / kiṃ cānyat
# mar me gzhan 'bar ba na shi ba'i mar me yang 'bar ro zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro /
naṣṭādvā pūrvakṣaṇāduttarasya kṣaṇasyodayaḥ syādanaṣṭānnaśyamānādvā? tatra yadi naṣṭādiṣyate, vahnidagdhādapi bījādaṅkurodayaḥ syāt, tataśca nirhetukaḥ syāt / atha anaṣṭāt, evamapi avikṛte 'pi bīje 'ṅkurodayaḥ syāt, kāryakāraṇayośca yaugapadyaṃ syāt, nirhetukaścotpādaḥ syāt
# gzhan yang skad cig ma phyi ma skad cig ma snga ma zhig pa'am ma zhig pa'am 'jig bzhin pa zhig las skye grang / / de las gal te zhig pa las yin par 'dod na ni / / sa bon tshig pa las kyang myu gu skye bar 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir rgyu med par 'gyur ro / / ci ste ma zhig pa las so zhe na / / de lta na yang sa bon rnam par 'gyur ba med par yang myu gu skye bar 'gyur zhing / / rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis kyang dus gcig par 'gyur la / / skye ba rgyu med par yang 'gyur ro / / gal te 'gag bzhin pa las skye'o zhe na /
naśyamānāditi cet / naṣṭānaṣṭavyatirekeṇa naśyamānābhāvāt, naṣṭānaṣṭayośca  vihitadoṣatvānnaśyamānādapi nāstyutpattiriti, kutaḥ kāryakāraṇavyavasthā pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā vā bhaviṣyati? yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti, tadā saṃtāno 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti / atraike varṇayanti / satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt, kiṃ tarhi sattvaḥ saṃsaratīti / ucyate / sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ / sattvaḥ saṃsaratītyucyamāne kimasau nityaḥ saṃsarati, uta anityaḥ, iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ, sa samatvātsattve 'pi samo nipatati / tasmātsattvo 'pi na saṃsarati / atrāha / naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati, yasmādiha saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānityabhūtānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ nāstītyuktam
# 'jig bzhin pa las kyang skye ba med de / / zhig pa dang ma zhig pa las ma gtogs pa'i 'jig bzhin pa med pa'i phyir dang zhig pa dang ma zhig pa dag la yang nyes pa brjod zin pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa dang skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam par gzhag pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / gang gi tshe skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyun yang yod pa ma yin la / / de med pas 'khor ba yang med do / / de'i phyir 'du byed mi rtag pa rnams la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no / / 'dir kha cig 'thad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir na 'du byed dag mi 'khor ba ni bden te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / bdag 'khor ro zhes smra bar byed do / / brjod par bya ste / / sems can la yang rim 'di mtshungs / / gang gi phyir sems can 'khor ro zhes smra ba / / ci 'di rtag pa'am mi rtag pa zhig 'khor zhes rnam par dpyad pa na / / 'du byed dag 'khor bar mi 'thad pa'i rim pa gang yin pa de sems can la yang mtshungs par 'gyur ba de'i phyir sems can yang 'khor ba ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / 'du byed dag 'khor bar mi 'thad pa'i tshul ni sems can la yang mtshungs par 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin te / / gang gi phyir 'du byed rtag pa dang mi rtag par gyur pa dag kho na la 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bya bar smras na /
na caivamātmā nityānityabhūtaḥ
# bdag ni de ltar rtag pa dang mi rtag par 'gyur ba ma yin no /
tasya hi skandhebhyastattvānyatvāvaktavyatāvat nityatvenānityatvenāpyavaktavyatā vyavasthāpyate / tasmādātmaiva saṃsaratīti na coktadoṣaprasaṅga iti
# 'di ltar phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa ltar rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod du med par rnam par gzhag ste / / de'i phyir bdag kho na 'khor zhing sngar bstan pa'i nyes par yang thal bar mi 'gyur ro /
ucyate / pudgalaḥ saṃsarati cetskandhāyatanadhātuṣu
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te gang zag 'khor zhe na / / phung po skye mched khams rnams la /
pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo 'sau nāsti kaḥ saṃsariṣyati
# de ni rnam pa lngas btsal na / / med na gang zhig 'khor bar 'gyur /
yadi pudgalo nāma kaścit syāt, sa saṃsaret
# gal te gang zag ces bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni de 'khor bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tvasti / yasmāt skandhāyatanadhātuṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo nāsti
# yod pa ni ma yin te / / gang gi phyir phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams la rnam pa lngas btsal ba na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? / indhanaṃ punaragnirna nāgniranyatra cendhanāt
# ji ltar zhe na / / shing nyid me ni ma yin te / / shing las gzhan la me yang med /
nāgnirindhanavānnāgnāvindhanāni na teṣu saḥ / agnīndhanābhyāṃ vyākhyāta ātmopādānayoḥ kramaḥ
# me ni shing dang ldan ma yin / / me la shing med der de med / / me dang shing gis bdag dang ni / / nye bar len pa'i rim pa kun /
ityevaṃ skandhāyatanadhātusvabhāva ātmā na bhavati
# zhes bya ba de bzhin du bdag phung po dang skye mched dang khams kyi rang bzhin can ma yin zhing /
nāpi tebhyo vyatiriktaḥ / na skandhāyatanadhātumān / na skandhāyatanadhātuṣvātmā
# de dag las tha dad pa yang ma yin la / / phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / / bdag la phung po dang skye mched dang khams med cing /
nātmani skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ / ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena
# phung po dang skye mched dang khams la yang bdag med do zhes do zhes de ltar sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa lngas btsal ba na bdag yod pa ma yin no /
yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati, sa kathamavidyamānaḥ san saṃsariṣyatīti? evamātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ, vandhyāsutasyeva avidyamānatvāt / api ca / ayamātmā / upādānādupādānaṃ saṃsaran vibhavo bhavet / vibhavaścānupādānaḥ kaḥ sa kiṃ saṃsariṣyati / bhavatu kāmamātmanaḥ saṃsāraḥ, yadi anupādānasya sato 'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt / kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha / upādānādupādānaṃ saṃsaran vibhavo bhavet iti / iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā? yadi tāvatparityajya gacchatītyucyate, tadā pūrvopādānasya parityāgāduttarasya cānupādānāttadantarāle vibhavaḥ syāt / vigato bhavo vibhavaḥ / bhavaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ, tadrahitaḥ syāt / yaśca vibhavo 'nupādānaḥ, sa skandharahitatvāt prajñaptyupādānakāraṇarahitatvānnirhetukaḥ syāt / yaśca anupādāno nirañjano 'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ? na kaścit saḥ / nāstyeva sa ityarthaḥ / tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati? nāstyeva tat, yatsaṃsariṣyatītyarthaḥ / athavā, kimityetat saṃsaraṇakriyāviśeṣaṇam / tataśca avidyamānatvāt naiva saṃsaraṇakriyāṃ kariṣyati / evaṃ tāvatpūrvopādānaparityāgena saṃsaraṇamayuktam / atha aparityāgena, tathāpi nopapadyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt / na caitadiṣyata iti / tasmādaparityāgenāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ nāsti / atha pūrvottarayorbhavayormadhye āntarābhavikaskandhasaṃbhavāt, taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato 'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti / tadapi na yuktam, pūrvabhavaparityāgāparityāgābhyāmāntarāmavikaskandhasaṃsāre 'pi tulyaprasaṅgatvāt / yugapattyāgopādānādadoṣa iti cet, ucyate / kimekadeśena pūrvopādānaṃ tyajate ekadeśenāntarābhavopādānaṃ saṃcarati, atha sarvātmanā? tatra yadi avayaveneti parikalpyate, tadā dvayātmakatāprasaṅgādityuktadoṣaḥ / atha sarvātmanā, evamapi sa eva vibhavatāprasaṅga āpadyate / etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt / na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe / na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ / atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete, nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt / aṃśena pūrvatrāvasthānādaṃśena cottaratrāvasthānādanekāvayavatā prasajyeta / tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam / tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ / yadā ca saṃskārāṇāmātmanaśca saṃsāro nāsti, tadā nāstyeva saṃsāra iti sthitam / atrāha / vidyata eva saṃsāraḥ, pratidvandvisadbhāvāt / iha yo nāsti, na tasya pratidvandvī vidyate, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoriti / asti ca saṃsārasya pratidvandvi nirvāṇam / tasmādasti saṃsāra iti / ucyate / syātsaṃsāraḥ, yadi tatpratidvandvi nirvāṇaṃ syāt / na tvastītyāha / saṃskārāṇāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃcidupapadyate / sattvasyāpi na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃcidupapadyate / yadi nirvāṇaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā? tatra nityānāmavikāriṇāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāt? anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ pūrveṇa tulyam / na kathaṃciditi na kenāpi prakāreṇetyarthaḥ / atha sattvasya nirvāṇaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate / atha nityānityatvenāvācyasya parikalpyate, nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pyātmāstītyabhyupeta bhavati saṃsāra iva / api ca / sopādānasyaivātmanaḥ avācyatā yujyate / na ca nirvāṇe upādānamastīti kuto 'sya avācyatā? bhavatu vā tattvānyatvāvācyatā ātmanaḥ, api tu kimasau nirvāṇe 'sti uta nāsti? yadi asti, tadā mokṣe 'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt / atha nāsti, tadā anitya ātmā syāt / tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt / atha nirvāṇe 'pi ātmanaḥ astitvanāstitvenāvācyataiva iṣyate, evamapi kimasau vijñeyaḥ, atha na? yadi vijñeyaḥ, na tarhi nirupādāno 'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra iva / atha na vijñāyate, tatrāsau avijñeyasvarūpatvāt khapuṣpavannāstyeveti kuto 'sya avācyatā? tadevaṃ nirvāṇamapi nāsti / tadabhāvānnāsti saṃsāra iti / ata evoktaṃ bhagavatyāmaṣṭasāhasrikāyām / nirvāṇamapyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamam / buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi / saceta kulaputra nirvāṇādapyadhikataro 'nyo dharmo 'bhaviṣyat, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi / tathā āryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake / paramārthasatya supinena samaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svapnasamotaratī / mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam / tathā / nirodhasatyaṃ supinaṃ yathaiva svapnasvabhāvāmatha nirvṛtiṃ ca / yeneha vācottari bodhisattvo ayaṃ khu so vuccati vācasaṃvaraḥ / atrāha / yadyapi tvayā saṃsāranirvāṇe pratiṣiddhe, tathāpi bandhamokṣau vidyete / na cāvidyamānasya bhāvasvabhāvasya bandhamokṣau saṃbhavataḥ / tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti / ucyate / syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi bandhamokṣāveva syātām / na tu staḥ ityāha / na badhyante na mucyante udayavyayadharmiṇaḥ / saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate / iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti vyapadiśyate, yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate, tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati / rāgādibandhanavicchedalakṣaṇo 'pi mokṣaḥ anityānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmavidyamānatvānnaiva saṃbhavati / pūrvavat pūrvoktavidhinetyarthaḥ / yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ, evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate, ityevaṃ bandhamokṣāvapi na staḥ / atrāha / yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti, tathāpi rāgādikamupādānākhyaṃ bandhanabhūtamasti, tatsadbhāvādbandho 'pi bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate / syādupādānam, bandhanaṃ yadi kaṃcitpadārthaṃ badhnīyāt, na tu badhnāti / yathā ca na badhnāti, tathā pratipādayannāha / bandhanaṃ cedupādānaṃ sopādāno na badhyate / badhyate nānupādānaḥ kimavastho 'tha badhyate / tatra vidyamānopādānaḥ sopādānaḥ, sa tāvadbhāvo na badhyate / yo hi sopādānaḥ, sa baddha eva / tasya punarapi bandhanayogaḥ kiṃ kuryāt? yaścāpi anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ, asāvapi bandhanarahitatvāt tathāgatavanna badhyate / anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ badhyata iti parasparaviruddhatvāccāyuktametat / yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate, sa idānīṃ kimavastho badhyatām? nāstyevāsau kācidaparā asyāvasthā, yasyāṃ badhyetetyabhiprāyaḥ / yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti, tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti / tasmād bandhanamapi nāsti / api ca / badhnīyādbandhanaṃ kāmaṃ bandhyātpūrvaṃ bhavedyadi / na cāsti tat / iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam / evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt, tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā / taccaitanna saṃbhavati nirāśrayasya rāgādikasya asiddhatvāt / pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt / bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ / tasmānnaiva bandhanaṃ kaṃcidapi badhnāti / na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam / bandhanābhāvācca bandhyo 'pi nāstīti siddham / yatpunaratra śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ tat / śeṣamuktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ / iti veditavyam / ślokapāṭhaparivartanena / baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate / baddhābaddhavinirmukto badhyamāno na badhyate / ityādinā yojyam / atrāha / yadyapi bhavatā bandhanaṃ pratiṣiddham, tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ, sa tāvanmokṣo 'sti / na ca abaddhasya puṃso mokṣaḥ / tasmād bandho 'pyastīti / ucyate / syādbandhayadi mokṣa eva syāt / ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā? kicātaḥ? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha / baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate / syātāṃ baddhe mucyamāne yugapadbandhamokṣaṇe / tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt / atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt, na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam, kiṃ tarhi mokṣyata iti / vartamānasāmīpyādeva mucyata iti cet, yadi kadācidapi mokṣaḥ saṃbhavet, tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā? evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam / idānīmabaddho 'pi na mucyate / sa hi mukta eva / tasya punarapi mokṣaḥ kiṃ kuryāt / muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt, tataścārhato 'pi bandhaḥ syāt / atha syāt / abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti, evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām / na ca parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle bandhamokṣaṇe upapadyete / yataścaivaṃ baddhābaddhayormokṣāsaṃbhava, tasmānmokṣo 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvācca bandhanamapi nāstīti siddham / atrāha / yadi bhavataiva saṃsāranirvāṇe niṣiddhe, bandhamokṣau ca pratiṣiddhau, ya eṣa saṃsāravinirmumukṣūṇāmavidyāsāndrāndhakāravividhakudarśanakaṭhinātidīrghalatāsaṃchāditasatpathaṃ jātyādivividhā paryantavyasanāniṣṭataravipulavipākaphaladānuśayaviṣavṛkṣasaṃkulaṃ viṃśatiśikharasamunnatatarātipṛthusatkāyadṛṣṭimahāśailapariveṣṭitasarvadiṅmukhaṃ  viṣayasukhāśātipicchilavipulamahātaṭavivaravāhitṛṣṇānadīmahāparikhaṃ saṃsāramahāṭavīkāntāraṃ nistitīrṣūṇāṃ paramāśvāsakaraḥ kuśalo mahādharmacchandaḥ, kadā nu khalvahamanupādāno nirvāsyāmi, kadā nu me nirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, nanu sa vyarthaka eva saṃjāyate, yaścāpyevamutpāditakuśalāmalavipuladharmacchandānāṃ kalyāṇamitrasaṃsevādānaśīlaśrutacintābhāvanādikramo nirvāṇaprāptaye, nanu tamyāpi vaiyarthyaṃ syāditi ucyate / yo hyevaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu sarvabhāveṣu pratibimbamarīcikājalālātacakrasvapnamāyendrajālasadṛśeṣu ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate / nirvāsyāmyanupādāno nirvāṇaṃ me bhaviṣyati / iti yeṣāṃ grahasteṣāmupādānamahāgrahaḥ / ahamanupādānaḥ sarvopādānarahito nirvāsyāmi, mama caivaṃ pratipannasya nirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, evaṃ yeṣāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ grāho bhavati, nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati, na caivaṃvidhamahāgrahābhiniviṣṭānāṃ śāntiḥ saṃbhāvyate / niravaśeṣagrahaprahāṇenaiva mokṣāvāptaye yāvadahaṃmameti grāhābhiniveśaḥ, yāvacca nirvāṇaṃ nāma astīti grāhābhiniveśaḥ, yāvacca upādānatyāgābhiniveśaḥ, tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti / tasmānmumukṣuṇā sarvametat parityājyam / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryadhyāyitamuṣṭisūtre / atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat / caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ satvāḥ evamimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti / evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat / deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti / bhagavānāha / ātmātmīyopalambhānmañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti / tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti / bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate / upalabhya abhiniviśate / abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate / sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā / saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati / ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ dviṣṭaḥ, ahaṃ mūḍhaḥ iti / tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ śīlavān, ahaṃ brahmacārīti / ahaṃ saṃsāraṃ samatikramiṣyāmi / ahaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmi / ahaṃ duḥkhebhyo mokṣyāmi / sa vikalpayati / ime kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime 'kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ / sa vikalpayati / anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ādīptāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, yannvahaṃ sarvasaṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam / tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / eṣā sā duḥkhaparijñā / yeyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / yannvahaṃ samudayaṃ prajaheyam / sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / iyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyā / idaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ yadidamebhyo dharmebhyo 'rtīyanā vijugupsanā / tasyaiva bhavati / nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ / samudayaṃ kalpayitvā nirodhe saṃjānāti / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / eṣā sā nirodhasākṣātkriyā / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / yannūnamahaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayeyam / sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate / tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate / tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate, tebhyaścārtīyate jehrīyate, anabhinandanācittamutpadyate / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / mukto 'smi sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ / na mama bhūya uttariṃ kiṃcitkaraṇīyam / arhannasmi / ityātmānaṃ saṃjānāti / samaraṇakālasamaye utpattimātmanaḥ samanupaśyati / tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau / sa vicikitsāpatitaḥ kālagato mahānirayeṣu prapatati / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati / atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat / kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni? bhagavānāha / yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvasaṃskārā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam / yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ / yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ / yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ / yena mañjuśrīrevaṃ catvāri āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati / ime kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime 'kuśalā dharmāḥ / ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ / duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam / samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavya iti / tatkasya heto? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati yaṃ parikalpayet / bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca / sa na kaṃciddharmamāvyūhati nirvyūhati / tasya evamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhataḥ traidhātuke citta na sajjati, ajāta sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati / iti vistaraḥ / ata eva asmādāgamāt paramārthasatya ucyate / na nirvāṇasamāropo na saṃsārāpakarṣaṇam / yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate / yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati, anupalabhyamānatvāt, nāpi saṃsārāpakarṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraparikṣayo na saṃbhavati, kastatra saṃsāraḥ yo vikalpyate kṣayārtham, kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā / yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt, tatra kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ vikalpyate? naiva hi kiṃcidvikalpayituṃ  yuktam / avikalpayataśca niyataṃ yathoditasaṃsārāṭavīkāntārātikramo nirvāṇapuraprāptiśca bhaviṣyatīti / ata evoktamāryamāradamanasūtre / atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma, yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma / gāḍhabandhanabaddho 'smi / mañjuśrīrāha / asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase? tatpunaḥ katamat? yadidamasmimānaviparyāsabandhanaṃ tṛṣṇādṛṣṭibandhanam, idaṃ pāpīyan bandhanam / ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate / tena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase / peyālam / āha / kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ / āha / āttamanā bhaveyam, paramāttamanā bhaveyam / atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat / utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam / gacchatu svabhavanam / atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat / kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi? āha / na jāne mañjuśrīḥ / kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti / āha
# gang zhig de ltar phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams la rnam pa lngas btsal ba na de ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ni de med pas ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur / / de ltar na bdag la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te / / mo gsham gyi bu ltar med pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan yang bdag 'di / / nye bar len nas nyer len par / / 'khor na srid pa med par 'gyur / / srid med nye bar len med na / / de gang ci zhig 'khor bar 'gyur / / gal te yod ni nye bar len pa med par yang 'di 'khor bar rung bar 'gyur na ni / / bdag 'khor bar 'gyur la rag pa zhig go / / ji ltar de la nye bar len pa med pa nyid du thal bar bstan pa'i phyir / / nye bar len nas nyer len par / / 'khor na srid pa med par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / 'dir mi'i nye bar len pa nas lha'i nye bar len par 'gro ba na / / mi'i nye bar len pa btang nas lha'i nye bar len par 'gro ba'am / / ma btang bar yin grang / / re zhig gal te yongs su btang nas 'gro'o zhes brjod na ni / / de'i tshe nye bar len pa sngar ma btang ba'i phyir dang phyi ma ma blangs ba'i phyir / / de dag gi bar du srid pa med par 'gyur ro / / 'di la srid pa dang bral ba yod pas na srid pa med pa'o / / srid pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ste / / de dag dang bral bar 'gyur ro / / srid pa med cing nye bar len pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phung po lnga dang bral bas gdags pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir rgyu med par 'gyur la / / gang zhig nye bar len pa med cing gsal byed dang bral ba mi gsal ba rgyu med pa de ni gang ste / / de ni ci yang ma yin zhing / / de ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to / / de med pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba lha'i nye bar len pa po med pa yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ci zhig tu 'khor bar 'gyur te / / gang du 'khor bar 'gyur ba de yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do / / yang na ci zhig ces bya ba 'di ni bya ba 'khor ba'i khyad par yin te / / de'i phyir yod pa ma yin pas 'khor ba'i bya ba byed par mi 'gyur ro / / de ltar na re zhig nye bar len pa snga ma btang nas 'khor bar mi rigs pa yin no / / ci ste ma btang bar yin no zhe na / / de ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir snga ma ma btang ba'i phyir dang phyi ma ma bzung ba'i phyir bdag gcig gnyis nyid du 'gyur na / / 'di ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir ma btang bar 'khor ba yang yod pa ma yin no / / ci ste srid pa snga phyi gnyis kyi bar na srid pa bar mdo'i phung po yod pas de dag gis de nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i phyir nye bar len pa nas nye bar len par 'khor yang srid pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na / / de yang mi rung ste / / srid pa bar mdo'i phung por 'khor ba la yang srid pa snga ma gtong ba dang mi gtong ba dag gi sgo nas thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro / / cig car gtong ba dang len par byed pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / ci phyogs gcig gis nye bar len pa snga ma gtong zhing phyogs gcig gis srid pa bar mdo'i nye bar len par rgyu 'am / / 'on te bdag nyid thams cad kyis yin grang / / de la gal te cha shas kyis so zhes bya bar rtog na ni / / de'i tshe bdag gnyis nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes nyes pa bshad zin to / / ci ste bdag nyid thams cad kyis yin no zhe na / / de lta na yang khyed cag la thal ba de nyid du 'gyur ro / / khyad par ni 'di tsam zhig yod de / / srid pa bar ma dor rgyu ba na shin tu nye bas dus thung du zhig tu nye bar len pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o / / bdag nyid thams cad kyis gtong ba dang len pa dngos po tha dad pa'i yul can dag ni dngos po gcig la cig car mthong ba yang ma yin te / / lha sbyin gcig pu khyim nas khyim du rgyu ba la dus gcig tu bdag nyid thams cad kyis gtong ba dang len pa'i bya ba gnyis yod pa ni ma yin no / / ci ste rkang pa gcig gis gcig btang ba'i phyir dang gzhan len pa'i phyir cig car gtong ba dang len par rtog go zhe na / / de lta yin na rkang ba gnyis bzhin du bdag kyang gnyis nyid du 'gyur te / / cha shas kyis snga ma la gnas pa'i phyir dang cha shas kyis phyi ma la gnas pa'i phyir cha shas du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir cig car yang gtong ba dang len pa yod pa ma yin pas 'di ni lan ma yin pa nyid do / / de'i phyir srid pa bar ma do len pa la yang nyes pa de nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas rnam pa thams cad du bdag la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no / / gang gi tshe 'du byed dag dang bdag 'khor ba yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe 'khor ba med pa nyid do zhes bya bar gnas so / / 'dir smras pa / / 'khor ba ni yod pa nyid de / / 'gal zla yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni 'gal zla yod pa ma yin te / / dper na / / mo gsham gyi bu'i dgra bo bzhin no / / 'khor ba'i 'gal zla mya ngan las 'das pa ni yod na 'khor ba yod par 'gyur / / de'i phyir 'khor ba yang yod do / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te de'i 'gal zla mya ngan las 'das pa yod na / / 'khor ba yod par 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa / / 'du byed mya ngan 'da' bar ni / / ji lta bur yang mi 'thad do / / sems can mya ngan 'da' bar yang / / ji lta bur yang 'thad mi 'gyur / / gal te mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba cung zad cig yod na ni / / de rtog pa na 'du byed rtag pa'am mi rtag pa dag cig la rtog grang / / de la rtag pa 'gyur ba med pa dag la ni mya ngan las 'da' bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur / / mi rtag pa yod pa ma yin pa rnams la yang mya ngan las 'das pas ci zhig byed de / / thams cad snga ma dang mtshungs so / / ji lta bur yang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis kyang zhes bya ba'i don to / / ci ste sems can la mya ngan las 'da' ba rtog go zhe na / / de yang snga ma ltar rtag pa'am mi rtag pa las 'thad pa ma yin no / / ci ste rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du brjod du med pa zhig la rtog go zhe na de lta na ni brjod du med pa'i phyir 'khor ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa na yang bdag yod do zhes khas blangs par gyur pa ma yin nam / / gzhan yang brjod du med pa ni bdag nye bar len pa dang bcas pa kho na la rigs na / / mya ngan las 'das pa na ni nye bar len pa yod pa ma yin pas 'di la brjod du med pa nyid ga la yod / / yang na bdag de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med par 'gyur mod / / 'on kyang 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod dam 'on te med pa zhig yin / / gal te yod na ni de'i tshe thar bar gyur pa na yang de yod pas rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / 'on te med na ni de'i tshe bdag mi rtag par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir bdag de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa ltar rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod du med do zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro / / ci ste mya ngan las 'das pa na bdag yod pa dang med pa nyid du yang brjod du med par 'dod do zhe na / / de lta na yang ci 'di de'i tshe shes par bya ba zhig yin nam / / 'on te ma yin / / gal te shes par bya ba yin no zhe na / / 'on te 'khor ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa na yang shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bdag 'di nye bar len pa med pa ma yin no / / 'on te mi shes na ni de'i tshe 'di shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir / / nam mkha'i me tog ltar med pas 'di brjod du med pa nyid du ga la yod / / de'i phyir de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod pa ma yin la / / de med pas 'khor ba yang med do / / de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma las / / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o / / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / / rigs kyi bu gal te mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod na yang / / de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes nga smra'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang / / don dam bden pa rmi lam 'dra ba dang mya ngan 'das pa rmi lam mtshungs par 'jug / / gang gis mkhas pa de ltar 'jug pa yang / / de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod / / ces bya ba dang de bzhin du / / 'gog pa'i bden pa rmi lam ji bzhin te / / mya ngan 'das pa'ang rmi lam ji bzhin du / / gang la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jug pa / / de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya / / zhes gsungs so / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang khyod kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis bkag mod kyi / / de lta na yang bcings pa dang thar pa dag ni yod pa yin no / / yod pa ma yin pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni bcings pa dang thar pa yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir bcings pa dang thar pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa nyid do / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te bcings pa dang thar pa gnyis nyid yod na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no / / zhes gsungs pa / / skye 'jig chos can 'du byed rnams / / mi 'ching grol bar mi 'gyur te / / snga ma bzhin du sems can yang / / mi 'ching grol bar mi 'gyur ro / / 'di na 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gang dag bcing bar bya ba rnams rang dbang med par byed pas 'ching pa'o zhes bya bar bsnyad cing / / gang dag gis bcings pas so so'i skye bo rnams khams gsum las mi 'da'o zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na / / 'dod chags la sogs pa 'ching ba nyid du brtags pa'i bcings pa de ni re zhig skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can 'du byed skad cig ma rnams la mi srid de / / skyes ma thag tu 'jig cing brlag pa rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'ching ba rnam par chad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi thar pa yang mi srid de / / 'du byed mi rtag pa rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to / / ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i rnam pas 'du byed rnams la bcings pa dang thar pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de ltar / / snga ma bzhin du sems can yang mi 'ching zhing grol bar yang mi 'gyur ro / / de ltar na bcings pa dang thar pa yang med do / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang 'du byed dag dang sems can la bcings pa yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nye bar len pa zhes bya ba 'ching bar gyur pa ni yod pa yin la / / de yod pas bcings ba yang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod pa / / gal te dngos po 'ga' zhig 'ching na ni / / nye bar len pa 'ching bar yang 'gyur na / / 'ching ba yang ma yin no / / ji ltar mi 'ching ba de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / / gal te nye bar len 'ching na / / nye bar len bcas 'ching mi 'gyur / / nye bar len med mi 'ching ste / / gnas skabs gang zhig 'ching bar 'gyur / / de la nye bar len bcas ni nye bar len pa yod pa ste / / re zhig dngos po de ni 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro / / gang zhig nye bar len pa dang bcas pa de ni bcings par gyur pa nyid yin na / / de la yang 'ching ba dang 'brel bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur / / gang zhig nye bar len pa med pa nye bar len pa dang bral ba de yang mi 'ching ste / / 'ching pa dang bral ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin no / / nye bar len pa med pa 'ching ba dang bral ba 'ching ngo zhes bya ba ni phan tshun 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir yang 'di mi rigs so / / gang zhig de ltar nges par brtags pa na nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'am nye bar len pa dang bral ba yin yang rung ste / / mi 'ching ba de ni da gnas skabs gang zhig tu gyur pa zhig 'ching bar 'gyur te / / gang zhig 'ching bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas skabs gzhan de ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o / / gang gi tshe de ltar gzhigs pa na 'ching bas ci zhig ltar yang 'ching bar mi byed pa de'i tshe 'ga' yang 'ching bar mi byed pa nye bar len pa 'dod chags la sogs pa 'ching ba nyid du ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir bcings pa yang med do / / gzhan yang / / gal te bcing bya'i snga rol na / / 'ching ba yod na 'ching la rag / / de yang med de / / 'di na 'ching ba lcags la sogs pa bcing bar bya ba las tha dad par lngar grub par gyur pas bcing bar bya ba lha sbyin 'ching ngo zhes bya bar mthong ba de bzhin du bcing bar bya ba 'du byed rnams sam gang zag gi snga rol du 'ching ba 'dod chags la sogs pa grub par gyur na ni sngar grub pa des 'du byed rnams sa ma gang zag 'ching bar 'gyur la rag na / / de ni yod pa yang ma yin te / / rten med pas 'dod chags la sogs pa ma grub pa'i phyir dang sngar 'ching ba grub pa la phyis bcing bya dang lhan cig 'brel pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang 'ching ba las tha dad par grub pa'i bcings pa la yang 'ching ba dgos pa med pa'i phyir bcing bar bya ba'i snga rol du 'ching pa grub pa med do / / de'i phyir 'ching bas ni 'ga' yang mi 'ching la / / 'ga' yang mi 'ching ba ni 'ching ba nyid du mi rigs pas 'ching ba yod pa ma yin zhing / / 'ching pa med pas bcings pa yang med do zhes bya bar grub po / / gang zhig 'dir sun 'byin pa 'phrog gyur pa / / lhag ma ni tshigs su bcad pa'i 'don pa go bsnor te / / song dang ma song bgom pas bstan par rig par bya ste / / re zhig bcings pa mi 'ching ste / / ma bcings pa yang 'ching mi 'gyur / / bcings dang ma bcings ma gtogs par / / 'ching bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyar bar bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te khyod kyis 'ching ba bkag mod kyi / / de lta na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba rnams kyis sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa skyob pa med pa rnams la tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can phung po gsum nye bar bstan pa gang gi don du gsungs pa / / thar pa de ni re zhig yod pa yin la / / ma bcings pa la ni thar pa med de / / de'i phyir bcings pa yang yod do / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te thar pa nyid yod na bcing ba yod par gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin te / / 'dir thar pa 'di rtog pa na / / bcings pa'am ma bcings pa zhig la rtog pa zhig go / / de las cir 'gyur zhe na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes bshad pa / / re zhig bcings pa mi grol te / / ma bcings pa yang grol mi 'gyur / / bcings pa grol bzhin yin 'gyur na / / bcings dang grol ba dus gcig 'gyur / / de la bcings pa la ni thar pa yod pa ma yin te bcings pa'i phyir ro / / ci ste bcings par gyur pa phyis thabs kyis thar par 'gyur ba'i phyir bcings pa nyid grol bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / 'o na ni bcings pa grol lo zhes bya bar brjod par mi bya ste / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'gro ba grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro / / gal te da ltar ba dang nye bas de skad du brjod do zhe na / / gal te res 'ga' zhig na thar pa yod na ni de'i tshe de dang nye bar yod par 'gyur na / / gang gi tshe gnas skabs gang rung du yang thar 'dod pa na bcings pa la thar pa mi srid pas thar pa med par ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe da ltar ba dang nye ba nyid ga la yod / / de ltar na re zhig bcings pa mi grol lo zhes bya bar gnas so / / da ni ma bcings pa yang grol bar mi 'gyur te / / de ni grol ba nyid yin na de la yang thar pas ci zhig byed par 'gyur / / yang thar pa la ltos pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa grol bar gyur pa rnams la yang 'ching pa nyid yod par 'gyur te / / de'i phyir dgra bcom pa yang bcings par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir ma bcings pa yang mi grol lo / / ci ste ma bcings pa la thar pa mi srid pa'i phyir bcings pa nyid grol bar 'gyur ro snyam na / / de lta yin na bcings pa la grol bzhin par rtog pa na / / bcings pa yin pa'i phyir dang grol bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir bcings pa dang grol ba dag dus gcig tu 'gyur na / / dus gcig tu bcings pa dang grol ba dag 'thad pa yang ma yin te / / phan tshun 'gal pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa bzhin no / / de'i phyir de ltar bcings pa dang ma bcings pa dag la thar pa yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir thar pa yang med la / / de med pa'i phyir bcings pa yang med do zhes bya bar grub bo / / 'dir gal te de ltar khyod kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag bkag cing / / bcings pa dang thar pa dag kyang bkag pas / / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po ma rig pa'i mun pa mthug po can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i 'khri shing shin tu sra bas lam dam par bkag pa / / phra rgyas kyi dug gi ljon shing rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal / / mtha' yas pa sna tshogs pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba rgya cher ster bas dkrigs pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri chen po rtse mo nyi shus ches mtho ba / / te bor brling bas phyogs kyi ngos kun nas bskor ba / / sred pa'i chu klung gi 'obs chen po / / yul gyi bde ba la re ba'i dogs shin tu 'dred cing yangs pa dang ldan pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pas bskor ba las brgal bar 'dod pa / / thar pa 'dod pa rnams mchog tu dbugs 'byin par byed pa dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa chen po bdag na ma len pa med par mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur / / mya ngan las 'das pa bdag gir nam zhig na 'gyur snyam pa gang yin pa de don med pa kho nar 'gyur zhing de ltar dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa bskyed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rim pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa'i dgos pa can gang yin pa de yang don med par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to / / brjod par bya ste / / gang zhig de ltar dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med de / / gzugs brnyan dang smig rgyu'i chu dang mgal me'i 'khor lo dang rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang mig 'phrul dang mtshungs shing / / bdag dang bdag gi ba dang bral bzhin du / / phyin ci log gi rjes su song ba'i phyir nga dang nga'i zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa kun du spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pas / / 'jig tshogs la lta ba de nyid bskyod nas / / bdag ni len med mya ngan 'da' / / myang 'das bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes / / rlom par byed de / / de ltar gang dag 'dzin de yi / / nyer len 'dzin pa chen po yin / / bdag ni nye bar len pa med cing len pa dang bral bar mya ngan las 'da'o / / mya ngan las 'das pa ni de ltar zhugs par gyur pa bdag gi yin par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar thar pa 'dod pa gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag la ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar len pa de nyid 'dzin pa chen po yin la / / rnam pa de lta bu'i 'dzin pa chen po mngon par zhen pa rnams la ni zhi ba yod pa ma yin te / / 'dzin pa ma lus pa spangs pa kho nas thar pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro / / ji srid du bdag dang bdag gi'o snyam du 'dzin par mthong bar zhen pa dang ji srid mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba yod do zhes mngon par zhen pa dang ji srid nye bar len pa btang ba la sogs par mngon par zhen pa de srid du ni thabs ma yin pas mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyi rtsom pa thams cad nges par don med par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir thar pa 'dod pas 'di dag thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o / / gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad du don dam pa / / gang la mya ngan 'das bskyed med / / 'khor ba bsal ba'ang yod min pa / / zhes bya ba / / de la 'khor ba ci zhig yin / / mya ngan 'das pa 'ang ci zhig brtag / / don dam pa'i bden pa gang la ma dmigs pas mya ngan las 'das pa bskyed pa ste / / mya ngan las 'das par sgro btags pa med cing / / 'khor ba bsal ba ste / / 'khor ba yongs su zad pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de la gang zhig zad par bya ba'i phyir brtags pa 'khor ba ci zhig yin la / / gang thob par bya ba'i phyir brtags pa mya ngan las 'das pa de yang gang zhig yin / / yang na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi ga yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir sems can 'ga' yang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du 'khor ba nas bsal ba ste bkri ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa bskyed par 'bad pa dang ldan pas kyang bya bar mi nus pa de la mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ci zhig brtag ste / / cung zad kyang brtag pa mi rigs so / / mi rtog pa ni nges par ji skad smras pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las 'da' zhing / / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du yang phyin par 'gyur ro / / de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa bdud btul ba'i mdo las / / de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar bdud sdig can sgo mo'i them pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa ltar sa steng du 'gyel nas / / nga ni 'ching pa dam pos bcings so / / nga ni 'ching ba dam pos bcings so zhes du zhing cho nges 'debs par gyur pa de lta bu'i gzugs su bsams so / / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa / / sdig can gang gis khyod rtag tu bcings shing gzod bcings pa ma yin pa 'ching ba ches dam pa / / 'ching ba 'di las gzhan pa zhig yod de / / de yang gang zhe na / / 'di lta ste / / nga rgyal phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang srid pa dang lta ba'i 'ching ba ste / / sdig can 'di ni 'ching ba yin gyi / / 'ching ba 'di las gzhan ba 'ching ba ches dam por gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no / / khyod ni des rtag tu bcings pa yin gyis gzod bcings pa ni ma yin no / / gzhan yang sdig can mi khyod gal te slar bkrol na dga' bar 'gyur ram / / smras pa dga' bar 'gyur ro / / de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral pa zhig gis / / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so / / 'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig rang gi gnas su dong la rag go / / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces smras so / / sdig can gang zhig btang ba khyod sus bcings / / smras pa / / 'jam dpal bdag sus bcings pa mi shes so / / smras pa /
yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī, evameva sarvabālapṛthagjanā anitye nityasaṃjñinaḥ, duḥkhe 'duḥkha saṃjñinaḥ, aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ, anātmani ātmasaṃjñinaḥ, arūpe rūpasaṃjñinaḥ, avedanāyāṃ vedanāsaṃjñinaḥ, asaṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñinaḥ, asaṃskāre saṃskārasaṃjñinaḥ, avijñāne vijñānasaṃjñinaḥ / api tu khalu punaḥ pāpīyan, yastvaṃ mokṣyase, kuto mokṣyase? āha / nāhaṃ jāne kutaścinmokṣye
# sdig can ji ltar khyod ma bcings pa las bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa / / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa / / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa / / mi gtsang pa la gcang bar 'du shes pa / / gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa / / tshor ba dag med pa dang 'du shes dag med pa dang 'du byed dag med pa dang rnam par shes pa med pa la / / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes par 'du shes pa yin no / / gzhan yang sdig can gang khyod grol bar 'gyur na gang las grol bar 'gyur / / smras pa / / bdag ni gang las kyang grol bar mi 'gyur ro /
āha / evameva pāpīyan ye 'pi mokṣyante, nate kutaścidvimokṣyante, anyatra yā asau asadbhūtasaṃjñā
# smras pa / / sdig can de bzhin du gang dag grol bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa de yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par gang las kyang grol bar 'gyur ba med de /
tāṃ parijānanti, tāṃ parijñāya vimuktā ityucyante / iti / ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti
# de yongs su shes nas grol ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / lung 'di las na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu rtog pa tsam gyis 'ching ba'i 'khri shing rnam par chad pa la thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste / / rmi lam du dmigs pa'i me 'bar ba chu dag gis bsad pa bzhin no /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / karmaphalaparīkṣā saptadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva saṃsāraḥ, karmaphalasaṃbandhāśrayatvāt / yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ / yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt
# slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / bcings pa dang thar pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / 'khor ba ni yod pa nyid de / / las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ltar gal te rgyun rnam par chad pa med pa'i rim pas skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nyid kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'jug pas 'du byed rnams sam bdag 'khor bar gyur na ni / / de'i tshe las dang 'bras bu 'brel bar 'gyur na / / ji skad smras pa'i 'khor ba med na ni / / sems ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir dang las 'phen pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati
# 'khor ba yod na ni 'dir byas pa'i las tshe rabs gzhan du yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i phyir las rnams 'bras bu dang 'brel ba mi 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
tasmādvidyata eva saṃsāraḥ karmaphalasaṃbandhāśrayatvāditi
# de'i phyir las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba yod pa nyid do / / las de dag kyang gang yin zhing /
kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate
# de'i 'bras bu yang gang zhig yin zhe na / / de dag gi rab tu dbye ba brjod par 'dod pas 'di skad du brjod do /
ātmasaṃyamakaṃ cetaḥ parānugrāhakaṃ ca yat
# bdag nyid legs par sdom pa dang / / gzhan la phan 'dogs byams sems gang /
maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca
# de chos de ni 'di gzhan du / / 'bras bu dag gi sa bon yin /
tatra āhitaḥ utpāditaḥ ahaṃmāno 'sminnityātmā / skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalaātmetyucyate
# de la bdag tu nga rgyal ba 'di la gzhag cing bskyed pas bdag nyid do / / phung po la brten nas gdags pa'i gang zag la bdag ces bya'o / / bdag nyid yang dag par sdom zhing /
cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ / cittaṃ manaḥ vijñānamiti tasyaiva paryāyāḥ / ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam / tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate / dharmaśabdo 'yaṃ pravacane tridhā vyavasthāpitaḥ
# yul dag la rang dbang med par byed cing 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa zlog par byed pas na bdag nyid legs par sdom pa'o / / sog cing nye bar sogs la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam par smin pa 'byin par nus pa la nges par byed pas na sems te / / sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rnam grangs dag go / / de'i phyir bdag nyid legs par sdom pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa las bzlog pa dge ba'i sems de ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba las 'dzin par byed pas na chos zhes bya'o / / chos kyi sgra 'di ni gsung rab las gsum du rnam par gzhag ste /
svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthena pāñcagatikasaṃsāravidhāraṇārthena
# rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i don dang / / 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don dang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don gyis so /
tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante / kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthena daśakuśalādayo dharmā ityucyante
# de la zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i don gyis na chos zhes bya'o / / dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i chos rnams ni / / 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du / / chos spyod pa ni bde bar nyal /
dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca / pāñcagatikasaṃsāragamanavidhāraṇārthena nirvāṇe dharma ityucyate, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatītyatra
# zhes bya ba der 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don gyis na chos zhes bsnyad do / / chos la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya ba der ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don gyis na mya ngan las 'das pa la chos zhes brjod do /
iha tu kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthenaiva dharmaśabdo 'bhipretaḥ
# 'dir ni 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don nyid kyis chos kyi sgrar bzhed do /
kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha / kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ / maitramityatra caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭo veditavyaḥ
# yang ci bdag nyid legs par sdom pa'i sems gcig pu zhig chos yin nam zhe na / / smras pa / / ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang byams pa'i sems gang yin pa de yang chos yin no / / gzhan la phan 'dogs byams sems zhes bya ba 'dir rang gi sgra zhig mi mngon par byas shing bstan par rig par bya'o /
tatra paramanugṛhṇātīti parānugrāhakaṃ cetaḥ, catuḥsaṃgrahavastupravṛttaṃ bhayaparitrāṇapravṛttaṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ
# de la gzhan rjes su 'dzin par byed pas na gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i sems te / / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la zhugs pa dang 'jigs pa las skyob pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa'i sems gang yin pa de yang chos yin no /
mitre bhavamaviruddhaṃ sattveṣu yaccetaḥ, tanmaitraṃ cetaḥ
# 'dza' bshes las 'byung zhing sems can rnams dang 'gal ba med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni byams pa'i sems so /
maitraṃ yaccetaḥ, tanmaitracetaḥ, maitramevaṃ vā / yaccaitat trividhaṃ ceto nirdiṣṭam, sa dharma ityucyate
# yang na byams pa ni gnyen bshes nyid yin te / / bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i sems gang yin pa de nyid byams pa'i sems yin no / / gang zhig sems rnam pa gsum bstan pa de ni chos zhes bya ste /
viparyayādadharmo yojyaḥ / yaccaitannirdiṣṭaprabhedaṃ cetaḥ, tadbījaṃ phalasya
# bzlog pa ni chos ma yin par sbyar bar bya'o / / de ltar rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu dag gi sa bon yin no /
asādhāraṇaṃ phalābhinirvṛttau yatkāraṇam, tadeva bījamityucyate
# rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu 'grub pa la thun mong ma yin pa de la ni sa bon zhes bya ste /
tadyathā śālyaṅkurasya śālibījam
# dper na s'a lu'i sa bon ni s'a lu'i myu gu'i rgyu yin pa lta bu'o /
yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat / yathaitadevam, ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam
# sa la sogs pa thun mong pa gang yin pa de ni sa bon ma yin gyi / / de ni rgyu nyid yin par zad do / / de ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa la sems rnam pa gsum sa bon yin te /
puruṣakārādayastu kāraṇameva / kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha
# skyes bu'i byed pa la sogs pa rnams ni rgyu tsam du zad do / / yang dus gang gi tshe sa bon 'bras bu'i sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na / / 'di gzhan du 'bras bu dag gi zhes bya ba gsungs te /
pretya ceha ca / pretyeti adṛṣṭe janmani, iheti dṛṣṭe janmanītyarthaḥ / etacca āgamādvistareṇa boddhavyam
# 'di zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i skye ba la yin la / / gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba'i skye ba la'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / 'di yang lung las rgyus par khong du chud par bya'o /
evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ bhagavatā
# de ltar re zhig sems kyi bdag nyid can gyi chos gcig nyid rnam par gzhag nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das /
cetanā cetayitvā ca karmoktaṃ paramarṣiṇā
# drang srong mchog gi las rnams ni / / sems pa dang ni bsams par nye rnam pa gnyis su gsungs so /
paramārthadarśanādṛṣiḥ / paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo 'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān / tena paramarṣiṇā cetanā karma, cetayitvā ca karmetyuktaṃ sūtre
# don dam pa thugs su chud pas na drang srong ngo / / drang srong yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na drang srong mchog go / / don dam pa rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud pa'i phyir la / / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag las kyang mchog tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir na drang srong mchog ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so / / drang srong mchog des mdo las / / sems pa'i las dang bsams pa'i las so zhes gsungs so /
yaccaitad dvividhaṃ karmoktam / tasyānekavidho bhedaḥ karmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
# gang zhig las rnam gnyis gsungs pa'i / / las de dag gi bye brag ni / / rnam pa du mar yongs su bsgrags /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? / tatra yaccetanetyuktaṃ karma tanmānasaṃ smṛtam
# ji ltar zhe na / / de la las gang sems pa zhes / / gsungs pa de ni yid kyir 'dod /
cetayitvā ca yattūktaṃ tattu kāyikavācikam
# bsams pa zhes ni gang gsungs pa / / de ni lus dang ngag gir 'dod /
manasi bhavaṃ mānasam / manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñānasaṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate
# yid la yod pa ni yid kyi ste / / yid kyi sgo nas de mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir dang lus dang ngag 'jug pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa kho na la yid kyi las zhes brjod do /
tatraśabdo nirdhāraṇe / yattu dvitīyaṃ cetayitvā ca karmetyuktam, tatpunaḥ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ ca veditavyam
# de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dmigs kyis bkar ba'o / / las gnyis pa bsams pa zhes gang gsungs pa de ni lus dang ngag gi yin par rig par bya ste /
evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate, taccetayitvā karmetyucyate
# lus dang ngag dag gis de lta de ltar 'jug par bya'o zhes de ltar sems kyis bsams nas gang zhig byed pa de ni bsams pa'i las zhes bya'o /
tatpunardvividham, kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ ca / kāyavācorbhavatvāt taddvāreṇa ca niṣṭhāgamanāt
# yang de ni rnam pa gnyis te / / lus dang ngag la yod pa'i phyir dang de dag gi sgo nas mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir na lus kyi dang ngag gi'o /
evaṃ ca trividham / kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca
# de ltar na lus kyi dang ngag gi dang yid kyi ste / / rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro /
etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate, ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo 'nuvarṇitaḥ
# las rnam pa gsum po 'di dag kyang slar phye na rnam pa bdun du 'gyur ro / / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis las de'i bye brag rnam pa mang por gsungs so /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? / vāgviṣpando 'viratayo yāścāvijñaptisaṃjñitāḥ / avijñaptaya evānyāḥ smṛtā viratayastathā
# ci ltar zhe na / / ngag dang bskyod dang mi spong ba'i / / rnam rig byed min zhes bya gang / / spong pa'i rnam rig byed min pa / / gzhan dag kyang ni de bzhin 'dod /
paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyamapuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidham
# longs spyod las byung bsod nams dang / / bsod nams ma yin tshul de bzhin /
cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ
# sems pa dang ni chos de bdun / / las su mngon par 'dod pa yin /
tatra vyaktavarṇoccāraṇaṃ vāk
# de la ngag ni yi ge gsal por brjod pa'o /
viṣpandaḥ śarīraṃceṣṭā / tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate
# bskyod pa ni lus kyi gyo ba'o / / de la ngag ces bya bas ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dag rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i spong ba dang mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can kun nas slong bar byed pa thams cad spyir bzung ste /
evaṃ kuśalo 'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate
# de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bskyod pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa spong ba dang mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can kun nas slong bar byed pa yang spyir bzung ngo /
yathā caitadvijñapterdvidhā bhedaḥ,  evamavijñapterapi / aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ viratilakṣaṇāśceti kṛtvā / tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo 'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ satatasamitamavijñaptayaḥ samupajāyante / kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante, tā etā aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptaya ityucyante / yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ
# ji ltar rnam par rig byed 'di'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i yang yin te / / mi spong pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag dang spong pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag ces bya bar byas pa'i phyir ro / / de la mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag ni 'di lta ste / / deng nas bzung nas bdag gis sems can bsad cing chom rkun byas la 'tsho bar bya'o zhes sdig pa'i las khas blangs pa'i dus nas bzung ste / / de mi byed pa dag la yang rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par mi dge ba'i las khas blangs pa'i rgyu can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag nye bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang rgya'i las byed pa nas bzung ste nya pa la sogs pa rnams de mi byed pa la yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag nye bar skye ba gang yin pa ste / / 'di dag ni mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya'o / / 'di dag ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dge ba'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag kyang yin no /
tadyathā / adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīti kāyavāgvijñaptiparisamāptikālakṣaṇātprabhṛti taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante, tā etā viratilakṣaṇā avijñaptaya ityucyante
# 'di lta ste / / deng nas bzung ste srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag spong ngo zhes lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus nas bzung ste / / dus phyis myos pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang dge ba bsags pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag nye bar skye ba gang yin pa 'di dag ni spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya'o /
etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ
# gzugs dang bya ba'i rang bzhin yin du zin kyang / / rnam par rig byed bzhin du gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag go /
tathā paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyam, kuśalamityarthaḥ
# de bzhin du longs spyod las byung ba sod nams te / / dge ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
paribhogena anvayaḥ asyeti paribhogānvayam
# longs spyod las byung ba 'di la yod pas na longs spyod las byung ba'o /
paribhogaḥ parityaktasya vastunaḥ saṃghādibhirupabhogaḥ
# longs spyod ni yongs su btang ba'i dngos po dge 'dun la sogs pa rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod ba'o /
anvayaḥ anugamaḥ / dāyakasaṃtānajaḥ kuśalopacaya ityarthaḥ
# byung ba ni rjes su byung ba ste / / sbyin pa po'i rgyud la skyes pa'i dge ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
apuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidham, paribhogānvayamityarthaḥ
# bsod nams ma yin tshul de bzhin te / / longs spyod las byung zhes bya ba'i don to /
tadyathā devakulādipratiṣṭhāpanam, yatra sattvā hanyante / yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante, tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate, ityevamapuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ bhavati / cittābhisaṃskāramanaskarmalakṣaṇā cetanā ceti
# ji ltar gang du srog chags dag gsod pa'i lha khang la sogs pa brtsigs pa lta bu ste / / ji lta ji ltar lha khang der srog chags dag gsod pa de lta de ltar lha khang la sogs pa der longs spyad pa las byed pa po rnams kyi rgyud la longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur ro / / de ltar na bsod nams ma yin pa yang tshul de bzhin du 'gyur ro / / yid kyi las kyi mtshan nyid can sems mngon par 'du byed pa sems pa zhes bya ba dang ste /
saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati
# mdor bsdu na las rnam pa bdun po 'di dag tu 'gyur ro /
kuśalākuśalā vāk, kuśalākuśalo viṣpandaḥ, kuśalamavijñaptilakṣaṇam, akuśalamavijñaptilakṣaṇam, paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyam, paribhogānvayamapuṇyam, cetanā ceti / ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ / atraike paricodayanti
# dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngag dang bskyod pa gnyis dang dge ba rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mi dge ba rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mtshan nyid can dang longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams dang longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams ma yin pa dang sems pa zhes bya ba ste / / chos de bdun las su mngon par te las nyid du gsal zhing las kyi mtshan nyid can du 'dod pa yin no / / 'di la kha cig rgol bar byed de /
yadetat karma bahuvidhamuktam, tat kimā vipākakālādavatiṣṭhate, atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat
# las rnam pa mang po zhig bshad pa gang yin pa de ci rnam par smin pa'i dus kyi bar du gnas pa zhig gam / / 'on te skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir / / mi gnas pa zhig yin grang / / re zhig /
tiṣṭhatyā pākakālāccetkarma tannityatāmiyāt
# gal te smin pa'i dus bar du / / gnas na las de rtag par 'gyur /
niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ satkiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati
# gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa / / ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate, tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt
# gal te las 'di skyes nas rnam par smin pa'i dus kyi bar du rang gi ngo bos gnas so zhes bya bar rtog na ni / / de'i phyir de ltar na de dus 'di tsam gyi bar du rtag pa nyid du 'gyur te / / 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro / / phyis 'jig par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no zhe na / / de ni de ltar ma yin te /
paścādvināśasadbhāvānna nityatvamiti cet, naitadevam, pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt / vināśarahitasya ca asaṃskṛtatvaprasaṅgāt, asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca vipākādarśanāt, avipākatvena sadaivāvasthānāt nityatābhyupagama eva karmaṇāmupapadyate / ityevaṃ tāvannityatve doṣaḥ
# sngar 'jig pa dang bral ba ni nam mkha' la sogs pa ltar phyis kyang 'jig pa dang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir dang 'jig pa dang bral ba yang 'dus ma byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang 'dus ma byas rnams la ni rnam par smin pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang rnam par smin pa med pa nyid kyis rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir / / las rnams rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa kho nar 'gyur ro / / de ltar na re zhig rtag pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro /
atha utpādānantaravināśitvameva karmaṇāmabhyupetam, nanu evaṃ sati / niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati
# ci ste las rnams skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa nyid du khas len no zhe na / / de lta yin na ni / / gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa / / ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ
# las med par gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu skyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o /
tatraike nikāyāntarīyāḥ parihāraṃ varṇayanti / utpattyanantaravināśitvātsaṃskārāṇām, anityatvadoṣastāvadasmākaṃ nopapadyate
# 'di la sde pa gzhan dag kha cig lan 'debs par byed pa ni / / re zhig kho bo cag la 'du byed rnams rtag pa nyid kyi nyes bar ni mi 'gyur te / / skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir ro /
yaccāpyuktam / niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati
# gang yang / / gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa / / ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
iti, atrāpi parihāraṃ brūmaḥ / yo 'ṅkuraprabhṛtirbījātsaṃtāno 'bhipravartate
# zhes smras pa de yang lan brjod par bya ste / / myu gu la sogs rgyun gang ni / / sa bon las ni mngon par 'byung /
tataḥ phalamṛte bījātsa ca nābhipravartate
# de las 'bras bu sa bon ni / / med na de yang 'byung mi 'gyur /
iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate
# 'dir sa bon ni skad cig ma nyid yin du zin kyang / / rgyun myu gu dang sdong bu dang sbubs 'chas pa dang lo ma la sogs pa'i ming can 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par rang dang rigs mthun pa bskyed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa kho na'i rgyu'i dngos por gyur nas 'gags pa yin la /
yaścāyamaṅkuraprabhṛtirbījātsaṃtānaḥ pravartate, tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate
# gang yang myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun sa bon las byung ba de las ni rgyu chung du yin du zin kyang rim gyis lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba med pas 'bras bu'i tshogs rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro / / sa bon ni med na ste /
ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate
# sa bon mi bdog par 'gyur na ni myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati
# de'i phyir de ltar de yod na yod pa nyid dang de med na med pa nyid kyis na myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi 'bras bu ni sa bon gyi rgyu can nyid yin par bstan par 'gyur ro /
tadevam / bījācca yasmātsaṃtānaḥ saṃtānācca phalodbhavaḥ
# de'i phyir de ltar / / gang phyir sa bon las rgyun dang / / rgyun las 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur zhig /
bījapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam
# sa bon 'bras bu'i sngon 'gro ba / / de phyir chad mi rtag ma yin /
yadi iha bījamaprasūya aṅkurādisaṃtānaṃ jvālāṅgārādivirodhipratyayasāṃnidhyānnirudhyeta, tadā tatra kāryasaṃtānapravṛttyadarśanāt syāducchedadarśanam
# gal te sa bon myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi rkyen du ma gyur par me lce dang me mdag la sogs pa 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bas 'gags par gyur na ni / / de'i tshe de'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni 'byung bar ma mthong bas chad par ltar par 'gyur la /
yadi ca bījaṃ na nirudhyeta, aṅkurādisaṃtānaśca pravarteta, tadā bījasyānirodhābhyupagamācchāśvatadarśanaṃ syāt, na caitadevam, ityato nāsti bījasya śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ / yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo 'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam / yastasmāccittasaṃtānaścetaso 'bhipravartate / tataḥ phalamṛte cittātsa ca nābhipravartate
# yang gal te sa bon mi 'gag cing myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe sa bon mi 'gag par khas blangs pas rtag par lta bar 'gyur na / / 'di ni de ltar yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir sa bon chad pa dang rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no / / ji ltar sa bon la tshul 'di smras pa de bzhin du / / sems kyi rgyun ni gang yin pa / / sems las mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur / / de las 'bras bu sems lta zhig / / med na de yang 'byung mi 'gyur /
tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāviśeṣasaṃprayuktāccittād yaḥ cittasaṃtānastaddhetukaḥ pravartate, tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu / ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate / tadevam / cittācca yasmātsaṃtānaḥ saṃtānācca phalodbhavaḥ
# sems sems pa dge ba'i khyad par dang mtshungs par ldan pa de las ni de'i rgyu can sems kyi rgyun gang yin pa 'byung la / / sems pa dge bas yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyun de las ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nye ba ma tshang ba med pa na 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba skye bar 'gyur ro / / sems lta zhig med na ste / / sems mi bdog na rgyun de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir de ltar na / / gang phyir sems las rgyun dang ni / / rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur zhing /
karmapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam
# las ni 'bras bu'i sngon 'gro ba / / de'i phyir chad min rtag ma yin /
yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta, tadā ucchinnaṃ tatkarma syāt / athāpi anāgatasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamupagamya svarūpādapracyutaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karma śāśvatam / na caitadevamiti / tasmāt kṣaṇikakarmābhyupagame 'pi nāsti ucchedaśāśvatadarśanadvayaprasaṅga iti
# gal te sems dge ba de dgra bcom pa'i sems tha ma ltar / / sems kyi rgyun rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rim pa rgyun ma chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i dngos por ma gyur pa 'gags na ni / / de'i phyir las de rgyun chad par 'gyur la / / ci ste yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyun gyi rgyu'i dngos por gyur nas rang gi ngo bo las mi nyams par gyur na ni / / de'i tshe las rtag par 'gyur ba zhig na / / de ni de ltar yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir las skad cig mar khas blangs su zin kyang chad pa dang rtag par lta bar thal ba yod pa ma yin no /
tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ / te ca
# de'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par bshad pa 'dir dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang bshad pa yin la / / dkar po las kyi lam bcu po'o /
dharmasya sādhanopāyāḥ śuklāḥ karmapathā daśa / phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca / ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ
# de dag kyang / / chos sgrub pa'i thabs yin te / / chos kyi 'bras bu 'di gzhan du 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga'o / / dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po de dag ni chos sgrub pa'i thabs yin te 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
kaḥ punarasau kuśalakarmapathavyatirikto dharmo nāma, yasyaite sādhanopāyatvena vyavasthāpyante? ucyate / cittaviśeṣa eva kaścit dharmaśabdenoktaḥ
# 'di dag gang gis sgrub pa'i thabs nyid du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i chos zhes bya ba dge ba'i las kyi lam las tha dad pa 'di gang zhig yin zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / chos kyi sgra ni sems kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig kho na brjod pa yin te /
ātmasaṃyamakaṃ cetaḥ parānugrāhakaṃ ca yat
# bdag nyid legs par sdom pa dang / / gzhan la phan 'dogs byams sems gang /
maitraṃ sa dharmaḥ / ityanena / athavā / pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti, kriyamāṇarūpāstu kuśalakarmapathavācyā bhavanti
# de chos zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro / / rnam pa gcig tu na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag yongs su mthar gtugs pa'i ngo bo ni chos kyi sgra'i brjod bya yin la / / byed bzhin pa'i ngo bo ni dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi sgra'i brjod byar 'gyur ro /
tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante / kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti? ucyate
# dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can de 'grub par bya ba la rgyu nyid du rnam par gzhag go / / yang las kyi rnam par dbye ba'i skabs thal zin pa der dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / / brjod par bya ste /
vāgviṣpando 'viratayo yāścāvijñaptisaṃjñitāḥ / ityādinā kāyikāsrayaḥ karmapathāḥ vācikāścatvāro vyākhyātāḥ / cetanā cetyanena abhidhyāvyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayākhyāsrayo mānasā vyākhyātāḥ
# lus kyi gsum dang ngag gi bzhi ni / / ngag dang bskyod dang mi spong pa'i / / rnam rig byed min zhes bya gang / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa yin la / / yid kyi gsum po brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag par lta ba zhes bya ba ni / / sems pa dang ni zhes bya ba des rnam par bshad pa yin no /
ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ
# de ltar na der dge ba'i las kyi lam de dag bcu car yang rnam par bshad pa yin la /
te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti
# de dag kyang ji skad bshad pa'i chos 'grub pa'i rgyu 'gyur ro /
asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ
# chos de'i 'bras bu ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid can 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar longs spyod pa'o /
pretya ca adṛṣṭe paraloke ityarthaḥ, iha ceti ihaloke ityarthaḥ, phalamupabhujyate iti / evaṃ tāvadaikanikāyikairākṣepaparihāre varṇite sati, tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ
# 'di zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba'i don to / / gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma mthong bar te 'jig rten pha rol du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / de ltar re zhig kha cig gis brtsad pa'i lan btab pa yin dang gzhan dag gis de la skyon brjod nas / / brtsad pa'i lan gzhan gdab pa'i phyir smra pa /
bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣāḥ syurapi kalpanā
# gal te brtag pa der 'gyur na / / nyes pa chen po mang por 'gyur /
yadyeṣā tena naivaiṣā kalpanātropapadyate / yadi bījāṅkurasādharmyeṇa cittasaṃtāne śāśvatocchedadarśanadvayadoṣaprasaṅgaparihāraḥ syāt, tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate, na vijātīyaḥ, śālyaṅkurādisaṃtānācca śāliphalameva upajāyate, na bilvaphalam, bhinnajātīyatvāt, evamihāpi kuśalacittāt kuśalacittasaṃtāna eva syāt, samānajātīyatvāt, na akuśalāvyākṛtacittasaṃtānaḥ, vijātīyatvāt / evamakuśalāvyākṛtacittādakuśalāvyākṛtacittasaṃtāna eva syānnānyaḥ, bhinnajātīyatvāt / kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravacittebhyaḥ sadṛśānāmeva cittānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāmutpādaḥ  syāt, na bhinnajātīyānām
