par 'gyur ro / / 'di ni de ltar ma yin pa'am / / yang na phyogs snga ma 'di ni gzhan yin te / / spros pa ni / / stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur / / zhes gang smras na / / ji ltar spros pa stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur zhe na / / brjod pa / / gang gi phyir / / brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste / / sems kyi spyod yul ldog pas so / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o / / rnam pa gcig tu na 'di skad du / / sngar nang dang phyi'i dngos po ma dmigs pas nang dang phyi rol la ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir de kho na nyid yin no zhes gang bshad na / / de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhing / / ci de brjod pa'am shes par bya bar nus sam zhe na / / 'di ltar / / brjod par bya ba ldog pa ste / / sems kyi spyod yul ldog pas so / / de kho na nyid de la zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o / / yang rgyu ci'i phyir de kho na nyid de brjod par bya ba ldog cing sems kyi spyod yul ldog par 'gyur zhe na / / ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa / / chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs / / zhes gsungs te / / bshad pa ni snga ma kho na sbyar bar bya'o / / de nyid kyi phyir mdo las / / zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so; ;gsung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / / 'khrul 'khor las byas sil snyan ni / / ji ltar rlung bskul sgra 'byung ba / / de la dkrol byed med mod kyi / / 'on kyang sgra dag 'byung 'gyur ba / / de bzhin legs par sngar sbyangs shing / / sems can bsam pas bskul gyur pa / / sangs rgyas gsung ni 'byung 'gyur yang / / 'di la rtog pa yod mi mnga' / / ji ltar brag ca'i sgra nang dang / / phyi rol gnas pa ma yin pa / / de bzhin mi yi dbang po'i gsung / / nang dang phyi rol gnas pa yin / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo / / 'dir kha cig dbu ma pa ni med pa pa dang khyad par med pa yin te / / gang gi phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las dang byed pa po dang 'bras bu dang 'jig rten thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par smra ba yin la / / med pa pa dag kyang de dag med do zhes smra bar byed pa yin pa de'i phyir / / dbu ma pa ni med pa pa dang khyad par med do zhes rgol par byed do / / de ltar ni ma yin te / / dbu ma pa dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smra ba yin la / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin med par smra bar byed do / / med pa pa dag gis ni de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi sgo nas 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa dngos po med par rtog pa ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'jig rten 'di'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang bzhin gyis dmigs nas de 'jig rten pha rol nas 'dir 'ong ba dang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro bar ma mthong nas 'jig rten 'dir dmigs pa'i dngos po dang 'dra ba'i dngos po gzhan la skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin no / / gal te de lta na yang de dag gis dngos po'i rang gi ngo bor yod pa ma yin pa nyid la med pa nyid du rtog pa'i phyir re zhig lta ba 'di'i sgo nas mtshungs pa yod do zhe na / / med de / / dbu ma pa dag gis ni kun rdzob tu yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir la / / de dag gis khas ma blangs pa'i phyir mi mtshungs pa nyid do / / gal te dngos po ma grub par mtshungs so zhe na / / gal te yang dngos po ma grub pa mtshungs pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang rtogs pa po tha dad pas mi mtshungs pa nyid do / / 'di ltar dper na rku byas pa'i mi zhig la / / gcig gis ni yang dag par mi shes bzhin du de dang mi mdza' bas sbud nas 'dis brkus so zhes de la log par smra bar byed la / / gzhan ni dngos su mthong nas sun 'byin par byed do / / de la dngos po tha dad pa med mod kyang de lta na yang / / rtogs pa po tha dad pas gcig la ni der brdzun du smra'o zhes brjod la / / gzhan la ni bden par smra'o zhes bya'o / / gcig la ni yang dag par brtags pa na grags pa ma yin pa dang kha na ma tho bar 'gyur la / / gzhan la ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo tha mi dad kyang dbu ma pa dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rig pa rnams khong du chud pa dang smra ba na / / med pa pa dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rig pa ma yin pa dag dang lhan cig shes pa dang brjod pa dag mtshungs par yod pa ma yin no / / sngon gyi slob dpon dag ni ji ltar so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa gnyis kyi so sor ma brtags pa dang so sor brtags pa'i btang snyoms dag btang snyoms su mtshungs pa dang ji ltar dmus long dang mig dang ldan pa gnyis kyis yul phyogs nges par mtshungs kyang khyad par chen po yod pa de bzhin du med pa pa dag dang dbu ma pa rnams la yang khyad par yod par 'gyur ro zhe'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar / / ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa / / chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs pa yin la / / de la ngag dang sems dag 'jug pa yod pa ma yin mod kyi / / de lta na yang / / de ma bstan na gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis shes par mi nus pas / / gdul bya'i skye bo rnams de la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ltos nas ji zhig ltar de bstan pa'i rim pa zhig yod dgos pas de brjod par bya'o / / brjod pa / / 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi la 'jug pa'i bstan pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin par shes par bya ste / / gang 'di / / thams cad yang dag yang dag min / / yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid / / yang dag min min yang dag min / / de ni sangs rgyas rjes bstan pa'o / / zhes bya'o / / de la / / gang zhig gang gang la dga' ba / / de yi de de sngar bshad bya / / nyams par gyur pa dam chos kyi / / snod ni cis kyang ma yin no / / zhes bya ba dang ji ltar kla klo skad gzhan gyis / / gzung bar mi nus de bzhin du / / 'jig rten pa yis ma gtogs pa / / 'jig rten gzung bar nus ma yin / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / 'jig rten nga dang lhan cig rtsod kyi / / nga ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod de / / gang 'jig rten na yod par 'dod pa de ni nga yang yod par bzhed do / / gang 'jig rten na med par 'dod pa de ni nga yang med par bzhed do zhes bya ba'i lung las na thog ma kho nar re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis na de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten dang sems can gyi 'jig rten thog mar rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa / / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa'i skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa phyin ci ma log pa rab tu dbye ba sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa / / rgyu dang bcas pa / / 'bras bu dang bcas pa / / ro myang ba dang bcas pa / / nyes dmigs dang bcas pa / / nye bar bstan pa / / bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad gzigs pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi byung tshul ma lus pa mkhyen pa yin no snyam du bdag nyid la 'jig rten gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir de'i lta ba la ltos nas / / gdul bya'i skye bo rang la grags pa'i dngos po rab tu dbye ba dang rang gi ngo bo'i rnam par phye ba thos nas mos pa mngon par 'dod pa skyes pa la / / phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa ma rig pa'i rab rib can dag gis bden par brtags pa gang yin pa de nyid bden no zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir de ltar gdul bya'i skye bo bcom ldan 'das la thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam du blo skyes pa la dus phyis / / de dag thams cad yang dag min / / zhes bstan to / / de la yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni gang la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med pa la bya na / / skad cig re re la 'jig pa'i phyir 'dus byas rnams la ni gzhan du 'gyur ba yod pa yin te / / de'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba yod pas yang dag pa ma yin no / / 'ang gi sgra ni dang gi don te / / thams cad yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bstan pa sdud par blta bar bya'o / / kha cig la ni 'di dag thams cad / / yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid / / ces bstan to / / de la byis pa'i skye bo la ltos nas ni 'di dag thams cad yang dag pa yin la / / 'phags pa'i ye shes la ltos nas ni 'di dag thams cad brdzun pa ste / / 'di dag gis de ltar ma gzigs pa'i phyir ro / / de kho na nyid lta ba la yun ring po nas goms pa sgrib pa cung zad tsam ma bkrol ba kha cig la ni / / de dag yang dag min min yang dag min zhes bstan te / / sgrib pa cung zad tsam po de yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo ba sangs dang dkar sham bkag pa ltar de gnyi ga yang bkag pa yin no / / 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa ste / / lam gol pa nas bzlog nas lam bzang po la 'god pa ni bstan pa'o / / de ltar mthar gyis ston pa ni rjes su ston pa'o / / yang na gdul bya'i skye bo dang 'tsham par ston pa ni rjes su ston pa'o / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa de dag thams cad ni de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi la 'jug pa'i thabs nyid du rnam par gnas so / / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gsung de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi la 'jug pa'i thabs su ma gyur pa mi gsung ste / / nad dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman nye bar sogs pa ltar 'dul ba'i skye bo rjes su gzung bar bzhed pas ji ltar 'tsham pa ltar ston par mdzad pa yin no / / ji skad du brgya pa las / / yod dang med dang yod med dang / / gnyi ga min zhes kyang bstan te / / nad kyi dbang gis thams cad ni / / sman zhes bya bar 'gyur min nam / / zhes bshad do / / gang la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa 'di dag ston pa'i de kho na nyid de mtshan nyid ci dang ldan pa zhig ce na / / brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste / / sems kyi spyod yul bzlog pas so / / zhes 'di ni kho bo cag gis bshad zin to / / gang gi tshe 'di de lta bu yin pa de'i tshe gzhan yang ci zhig drir yod / / de lta yin mod kyi / / 'on kyang 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa ltar tha snyad kyi bden pa'i ngor sgro btags nas de'i mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya dgos so zhe na / / de brjod par bya ste / / gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang / / spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa / / rnam rtog med don tha dad min / / de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do / / de la 'di la gzhan las shes pa yod pa ma yin pas na gzhan las shes min te / / gzhan gyis bstan pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin gyi / / rang nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to; ;ji ltar rab rib can dag gis skra shad la sogs pa'i ngo bo phyin ci log mthong ba na / / rab rib med pas bstan du zin kyang / / rab rib med pa ltar skra shad la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba'i tshul gyis rtogs par bya ba ji ltar gnas pa bzhin rtogs par mi nus kyi / / 'o na ci zhe na / / rab rib med pas bstan pa las 'di ni phyin ci log yin no zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig tu ni rtogs par 'gyur la / / gang gi tshe rab rib sel ba'i mig sman bskus pas rab rib med par gyur pa de'i tshe ni skra shad la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo de ma rtogs pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / 'phags pa rnams sgro btags pa'i sgo nas de kho na nyid ston mod kyi de lta na yang de tsam gyis 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs par mi 'gyur la / / gang gi tshe stong pa nyid phyin ci ma log par lta ba ma rig pa'i rab rib sel bar byed pa'i mig sman gyis blo'i mig dag la bskus par gyur pa na / / de kho na nyid kyi ye shes skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe de kho na nyid de ma rtogs pa'i tshul gyis rang nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur te / / de ltar na dngos po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo gzhan las shes pa ma yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do / / de ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin te / / rab rib med pas skra shad ma mthong ba ltar rang bzhin dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to / / de nyid kyi phyir de ni spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa'o / / spros pa ni ngag ste don rnams spro bar byed pa'i phyir ro / / spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa ni ngag dag gis ma brjod pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yang yin te / / rnam par rtog pa ni sems kyi rgyu ba yin na / / de dang bral ba'i phyir de kho na nyid de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no / / ji skad du mdo las / / don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na / / gang la sems kyi rgyu ba yang med na / / yi ge rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs so / / de ltar na rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no / / 'di la don tha dad pa yod pas na / / don tha dad pas te don so so ba'o / / don tha dad pa med pa ni don tha dad pa min pa ste / / don so so ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to / / ji skad du 'phags pa bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa'i mdo las / / lha'i bus smras pa / / 'jam dpal don dam pa'i sbyor ba ni gang yin / / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa / / lha'i bu dag don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang gtan ma skyes pa gang du mtshungs pa der don dam par mtshams med pa rnams kyang mtshungs so / / mtshams med pa rnams don dam par gang du mtshungs pa der ni lta bar gyur pa rnams kyang mtshungs so / / lta bar gyur pa rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni so so skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mtshungs so / / so so skye bo'i chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni slob pa'i chos rnams kyang mtshungs so / / slob pa'i chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni mi slob pa'i chos rnams kyang mtshungs so / / mi slob pa'i chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mtshungs so / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang mtshungs so / / mya ngan las 'das pa gang du mtshungs pa der ni 'khor ba yang mtshungs so / / don dam par 'khor ba gang du mtshungs pa der ni don dam par kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mtshungs so / / don dam par kun nas nyon mongs pa gang du mtshungs pa der ni don dam par rnam par byang ba yang mtshungs so / / don dam par rnam par byang ba gang du mtshungs pa der ni chos thams cad kyang mtshungs so / / lha'i bu chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dge slong ni don dam par yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ste / / ji skad brjod pa bzhin du ma yin no /
devaputra āha
# lha'i bus smras pa /
katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti? mañjuśrīrāha
# mnyam pa nyid gang du don dam par na rnam par byang ba'i bar du mnyam pa gang yin pa der don dam par chos thams cad kyang mnyam pa zhes bya zhe na / / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ
# don dam par ni chos thams cad ma skyes par mnyam pa dang don dam par na chos thams cad ma byung bar mnyam pa dang don dam par na chos thams cad gtan du ma skyes par mnyam pa dang don dam par na chos thams cad dngos po med par mnyam pas / / lha'i bu don dam par chos thams cad mtshungs so /
tat kasmāddhetoḥ? paramārthato nirvāṇānānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya / tadyathāpi nāma devaputra yacca mṛddhājanasyāmyantaramākāśam, yacca ratnabhājanasyākāśam, ākāśadhātureva eṣaḥ
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / lha'i bu don dam par ni gtan ma skyes pa nye bar bzung nas chos thams cad la tha dad du bya ba med do / / lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na / / kham pa'i snod kyi nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa dang rin po che'i snod kyi nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa 'di gnyis nam mkha'i khams nyid yin te /
tat paramārthato na kiṃcinnānākaraṇam / evameva devaputra yaḥ saṃkleśaḥ, sa paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā
# de la don dam par tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do / / lha'i bu de bzhin du don dam par gang kun nas nyon mongs pa de gtan mi skye ba nyid do /
yadapi vyavadānaṃ tadapi paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā / saṃsāro 'pi paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā / yāvannirvāṇamapi  paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā
# gang rnam par byang ba de yang don dam par gtan mi skye ba nyid do / / don dam par na 'khor ba yang gtan mi skye ba nyid do / / don dam par na mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang gtan mi skye ba nyid de /
nātra kiṃcitparamārthato nānākaraṇam
# de la don dam par na tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do /
tat kasmāddhetoḥ? paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatvātsarvadharmāṇāmiti
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / don dam par na chos thams cad gtan mi skye ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so /
tadevamanānārthatā tattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam, śūnyataikarasatvāt
# de'i phyir de ltar na don tha dad pa ma yin pa ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste / / stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir ro /
uttarottaravyākhyānaṃ cātra veditavyam / evaṃ tāvadāryāṇāṃ jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraparikṣayāya kṛtakāryāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇam / laukikaṃ tu tattvalakṣaṇamadhikṛtyocyate
# 'dir phyi ma phyi mas bshad par yang rig par bya'o / / de ltar na re zhig 'phags pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no / / 'jig rten pa'i de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas brjod par bya ste /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat
# gang la brten te gang 'byung ba / / de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam / yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate, tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate, na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum / naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ, janyajanakayorekatvaprasaṅgāt / tataśca pitāputrayorapi ekatvaṃ syāt / ananyatvācca aṅkurāvasthāyāmaṅkuravadbījagrahaṇamapi syāt, bījavacca aṅkurasyāpi grahaṇaṃ syāt
# de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir / / de phyir chad min rtag ma yin / / ji ltar s'a lu'i sa bon la brten nas s'a lu'i myu gu 'byung ba ltar rgyu gang la brten te 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung ba / / de ni re zhig de nyid do zhes brjod par ni mi nus so / / sa bon gang yin pa de ni myu gu ma yin te / / bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir pha dang bu gnyis kyang gcig nyid du 'gyur ro / / gcig yin pa'i phyir myu gu ltar myu gu'i gnas skabs su sa bon 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro / / yang na sa bon ltar myu gu yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro /
nityatvaṃ caivaṃ bījasya syāt, avināśābhyupagamāt
# de ltar na sa bon rtag pa nyid du yang 'gyur te / / mi 'jig par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca śāśvatavādaprasaṅgānmahādoṣarāśiḥ syāt karmaphalādyabhāvaprasaṅgāt
# de'i phyir rtag par smra bar thal bar 'gyur bas nyes pa chen por 'gyur te / / las dang 'bras bu la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate / na ca anyadapi tattasmāt / nāpi bījādaṅkurasyānyatvam, bījamantareṇāpi aṅkurodayaprasaṅgāt
# de ltar na re zhig sa bon gang yin pa de nyid myu gu yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs so / / de las gzhan pa yang ma yin no / / sa bon las myu gu gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin te / / sa bon med par yang myu gu skye bar yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
yadyanyadanyadanyasmādanyasmādapyṛte bhavet / iti vacanādaṅkurāvasthāne'pi bījānucchedaprasaṅgāt
# gal te gzhan ni gzhan las gzhan / / de tshe gzhan med par gzhan 'gyur / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung pa'i phyir ro / / myu gu'i gnas skabs na yang sa bon rgyun chad pa med par thal bar 'gyur la /
tataśca satkāryavādadoṣaḥ syāt / yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate, naiva tat kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati, na ca tasmātkāraṇāttat kāryamanyat / tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum / yathoktamāryadevapādaiḥ / yasmātpravartate bhāvastenocchedo na jāyate
# de'i phyir 'chol pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro / / gang gi phyir de ltar rgyu gang zhig la brten nas 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la / / rgyu de 'bras bu yang ma yin zhing / / rgyu de las 'bras bu de gzhan pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir rgyu ni chad pa yang ma yin zhing rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar gzhag par yang nus pa yin no / / ji skad du 'phags pa'i lhas / / gang phyir dngos po 'jug 'gyur ba / / des na chad par mi 'gyur zhing /
yasmānnivartate bhāvastena nityo na jāyate
# gang phyir dngos po ldog 'gyur ba / / des na rtag par mi 'gyur ro; ;zhes bshad do /
iti / uktaṃ ca āryalalitavistarasūtre / bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro / na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā / iti / tadevaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena / anekārthamanānārthamanucchedamaśāśvatam / etattallokanāthānāṃ buddhānāṃ śāsanāmṛtam / mahākaruṇopāyamahāmeghapaṭalanirantarāvacchāditākāśadhātuparyantadiṅmaṇḍalānāṃ rāgādikleśagaṇasamudācārātitīkṣṇatarādityamaṇḍalopatāpitajagajjātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhadahanasaṃtāpopaśamatatparāṇāṃ satatāviratayathānurūpacaritapratipakṣasaddharmadeśanāmṛtadhārāpātaiḥ yathānurūpavineyajanakuśalamūlaśasyauṣadhiphalaphullalatotpannātivṛddhayanujidhṛkṣūṇāṃ saddharmāmṛtamahāvarṣavarṣiṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamahānāgānāmatrāṇālaukikatrāṇānāmanāthanāthānāṃ sakalalokanāthānāmetat tatsaddharmāmṛtaṃ sakalatraidhātukabhavaduḥkhakṣayasvabhāvaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam / etaddharmatattvāmṛtapratipannānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ śrutacintābhāvanākramāt pravartamānānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakaskandhatrayāmṛtarasasya upayogānniyatameva jarāmaraṇakṣayasvabhāvanirvāṇādhigamo bhavati
# mdo las kyang / / sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te / / sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min / / de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te / / de phyir rtag min chad min chos nyid do / / zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis / / sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon rnams kyi / / bstan pa bdud rtsir gyur pa de / / don gcig ma yin tha dad min / / chad pa ma yin rtag ma yin / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu chen po thugs rje chen po'i sprin chen po'i tshogs kyis phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa bar mtshams med par khebs par mdzad pa / / 'gro ba 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mngon du rgyu'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu ches tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ba lhur mdzad pa / / rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par ji ltar 'tsham par spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa / / dam pa'i chos ston pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun dag 'bebs pas ji ltar 'os par gdul ba'i skye bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog gi myu gu skyes pa spel bas rjes su bzung bar bzhed pa / / rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa / / 'jig rten pa skyob pa med pa'i skyob pa / / mgon med pa'i mgon / / 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi rga ba dang 'chi ba gtan gcod pa de ni / / ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis gcig dang tha dad pa nyid dang bral ba dang chad pa dang rtag par smra ba dang bral bar shes par bya'o / / nyan thos kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid bdud rtsi 'di la zhugs pa / / thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i rim gyis rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni / / tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po gsum gyi bdud rtsi nye bar spyad pa'i phyir nges pa kho nar rga shi zad pa'i ngo bo mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro /
athāpi kathaṃcidiha aparipakvakuśalamūlatayā śrutvāpyetat saddharmāmṛtam, dṛṣṭa eva dharme na mokṣamāsādayanti, tathāpi janmāntare 'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate / yathoktaṃ śatake
# ci ste yang ji zhig ltar 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi 'di thos su zin kyang thar pa ma thob na ni / / de lta na 'ang de dag skye ba gzhan du'ang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs nyid las grub pa nges par gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro / / ji skad du brgya pa las /
iha yadyapi tattvajño nirvāṇaṃ nādhigacchati / prāpnotyayatnato 'vaśyaṃ punarjanmani karmavat / iti / athāpi kathaṃcit / saṃbuddhānāmanutpāde śrāvakāṇāṃ punaḥ kṣaye
# de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir / / mya ngan 'das pa ma thob kyang / / skye ba phyi mar 'bad med par / / nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no / / zhes bshad do / / ci ste yang ji zhig ltar / / rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing / / nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na ste /
sati, āryamārgopadeśakakalyāṇamitrapratyayavaikalyāt na syād dharmatattvāmṛtādhigamaḥ, tathāpi pūrvajanmāntaradharmatattvaśravaṇahetubalādeva aihalaukikopadeśanirapekṣāṇāmapi pravivekasevāmātropanatapratyayānāṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ / jñānaṃ pratyekabuddhānāmasaṃsargātpravartate / kāyacetasoḥ praviveko 'saṃsargaḥ, kalyāṇamitrāparyeṣaṇaṃ vā
# gyur pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i lam ston par byed pa'i rkyen ma tshang bas de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi ma thob par gyur pa / / de lta na yang sngon tshe rabs gzhan du de kho na nyid thos pa'i rgyu'i stobs kho na las 'jig rten 'di'i nye bar bstan pa la ltos pa dang bral yang rkyen rnam par dben pa rten pa tsam thob pa / / rang 'byung rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni / / rten pa med las rab tu skye ba yin no / / rten pa med pa ni lus dang sems dag dben pa'am / / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi tshol ba ste / / rten med pa'i rgyu de las so /
tasmādasaṃsargāddhetoḥ pratyekabuddhānāmasaṃbuddhake 'pi kāle yasmādbhavatyeva dharmatattvādhigamaḥ, tasmādabandhyā siddhirasya saṃbuddhamahāvaidyarājapraṇītasya saddharmatattvāmṛtabhaiṣajyasyeti vijñeyam
# gang gi phyir sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i dus su rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i phyir / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa dam pa'i chos de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi ji skad du bshad pa de 'bras bu yod par grub par shes par bya'o /
yataśca etadevam, ato 'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti
# gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir / / shes rab can rnams kyis srog dag kyang btang ste de kho na nyid btsal bar 'os pa yin te /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyām / kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā? evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat / sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā / tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt / gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi / tatra prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi / tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi, na styānamiddhamanasikāramutpādayasi, na bhojanamanasikāramutpādayasi, yāvat mā kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā / mā ca kulaputra vāmenāvalokayan  gāḥ, mā dakṣiṇena, [mā pūrveṇa], mā paścimena, mā uttareṇa, mā urdhvaṃ mā adhaḥ, mā ca anuvidiśamavalokayan gāḥ / tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi / yo hi ataścalati sa vitiṣṭhate / [kuto vitiṣṭhate?] buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate / yo buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate, sa saṃsāre carati / yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na carati, na ca tāmanuprāpnotīti / yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake 'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt / yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ, mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet / kimahamātmabhāvena kariṣyāmi avaśyaṃ bhedanadharmiṇā? varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet, na tvevaṃ niḥsāmarthyakriyayā / bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ, na punarevaṃbhūteṣu sthāneṣu ..... / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata / tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorekāgramanasikārasya bhikṣoḥ / tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā, sarvadharmaviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatā, sarvadharmācalatayā prajñāpāramitācalatā, sarvadharmāmananatayā prajñāpāramitāmananatā, sarvadharmāstambhitatayā prajñāpāramitāstambhitatā, sarvadharmaikarasatayā prajñāpāramitaikarasatā, sarvadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā, sarvadharmānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitānutpādatā, sarvadharmānirodhatayā prajñāpāramitānirodhatā, gaganāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā, yāvat sarvadharmāsaṃbhedanatayā prajñāpāramitāsaṃbhedanatā, sarvadharmānupalabdhitayā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhitā, sarvadharmābhibhāvanāsamatayā prajñāpāramitābhibhāvanāsamatā, sarvadharmaniśceṣṭatayā prajñāpāramitāniśceṣṭatā, sarvadharmācintyatayā prajñāpāramitācintyatā veditavyeti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau ātmaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam / kālaparīkṣā ekonaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, kālatrayavijñaptihetutvāt
# byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus bcom ldan 'das ma ji ltar btsal ba bzhin no / / ji skad du / / bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las / / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar yongs su btsal ba lags / / de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to / / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus / / sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na / / lus la ched cher mi byed / / srog la mi lta / / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal to / / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te / / rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyi ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang zhes bya ba nas nang ngam phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig / / rigs kyi bu gyon du ma lta bar song shig / / g yas su ma yin / / shar du ma yin / / nub tu ma yin / / byang du ma yin / / steng du ma yin / / 'og tu ma yin / / phyogs mtshams su yang ma lta bar song shig / / rigs kyi bu ji ltar bdag las ma yin 'jig tshogs las kyang ma gyos pa dang ji ltar gzugs las kyang ma gyos pa dang ji ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang ji ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma gyos pa de ltar song shig / / gang 'di las gyos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro / / ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na / / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro / / gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par gyur pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do / / gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de / / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob po zhes bya ba'i bar nas / / chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di snyam du sems te / / bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste / / sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na / / bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya / / bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la 'jig pa ni bla'i / / nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir dang 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor bdag na 'khor ba na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te / / bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de khor khor yug tu chag chag btab po zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste; dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa de bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob po / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste / / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do / / chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do / / chos thams cad gyo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gyo ba med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do / / chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do / / nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar dang chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do / / chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do / / chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do / / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / bdag brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa; dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de / / de dus gsum du gdags pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
iha atītānāgatapratyutpannāsrayaḥ kālā bhagavatā upadiṣṭāḥ
# 'dir dus gsum po 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan la /
te ca bhāvāśrayāḥ
# de dag kyang dngos po'i rten can yin te /
yasmādutpanno niruddho hi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ atīta iti vyapadiśyate, utpanno 'niruddho hi vartamānaḥ, alabdhātmabhāvo 'nāgata iti
# gang gi phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin skyes nas 'gags pa la ni 'das pa zhes bsnyad la / / skyes la ma 'gags pa ni da ltar ba yin zhing / / bdag gi dngos po ma rnyed pa ni ma 'ongs pa yin no /
evaṃ bhāvasvabhāvanibandhanāsrayaḥ kālā upadiṣṭāḥ
# de ltar na dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu can dus gsum ltar na /
te ca santi / tasmāt tannibandhano 'pi bhāvasvabhāvo 'stīti
# de dag kyang yod pa yin te / / de'i phyir de'i rgyu dngos po'i rang bzhin yang yod do /
ucyate / syāt kālatrayaprajñaptiheturbhāvasvabhāvaḥ, yadi kālatrayameva bhavadabhimataṃ bhavet / na tvasti / yathā ca nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha / pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca yadyatītamapekṣya hi / pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca kāle 'tīte bhaviṣyataḥ / iha tāvat yadi vartamānānāgatau syātām, tāvapekṣya atītaṃ kālaṃ bhavetām, anapekṣya vā? tatra yadi atītamapekṣya sidhyete, tathā niyatamatīte kāle bhaviṣyataḥ / yasmāt, yasya hi yatra asattvam, tat tena nāpekṣyate / tadyathā vandhyā srī svatanayena, gaganamālatīlatā svakusumena, sikatā svatailena / avidyamānamapyandhakāraṃ pradīpena, pradīpo 'pi andhakāreṇa pratidvandvitvena apekṣyate iti cet, naitadevam / asyāpi sādhyasamatvāt / tadatra yadi atīte kāle vartamānānāgatau kālau iṣyete, apekṣāsiddhayarthamevaṃ sati atīte kāle vidyamānatvāt atītakālātmavat tayorapyatītatvaṃ syāt / tataśca atīto 'pi na syāt / yasmāt vartamānāvasthātikrānto hi atītaḥ asaṃprāptaḥ anāgata iti syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te dus gsum nyid yod na / / dus gsum du gdags pa'i rgyu dngos po'i rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin no / / ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa / / gal te 'das la ltos gyur na / / da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa / / 'das pa'i dus na yod par 'gyur zhes gsungs te / / 'dir gal te re zhig da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag yod na / / de dag 'das pa'i dus la ltos pa'am ma ltos pa yod par 'gyur grang / / de la gal te 'das pa la ltos nas grub na ni / / de'i tshe nges par dag 'das pa'i dus na yod par 'gyur te / / gang gi phyir gang zhig gang na yod pa ma yin pa de ni de la ltos pa ma yin te / / dper na rang gi bu mo mo gsham dang rang gi me tog nam mkha' dang rang gi ti la mar bye ma dag la mi ltos pa bzhin no / / gal te sgron ma'i rang gi ngo bo la mun pa med kyang 'gal zla nyid du ltos pa yin no zhe na / / de ni de lta ma yin te / / de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir 'dir gal te ltos pa grub par bya ba'i phyir da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag 'das pa'i dus na yod par 'dod na ni / / de ltar na / / 'das pa'i dus na yod pa'i phyir 'das pa'i dus kyi rang gi bdag nyid ltar / / de dag kyang 'das pa'i dus nyid du 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir 'das par yang mi 'gyur te / / gang gi phyir da ltar las 'das pa ni 'das pa yin la / / ma thob pa ni ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba yin na /
yadā tu vartamānānāgatayorasaṃbhava eva, tadā kutaḥ kasyacidatītatvaṃ syāt? ityataḥ atīto 'pi na syāt
# gang gi tshe da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa dag yod pa ma yin pa nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe gang zhig 'das pa nyid du 'gyur ba ga la yod / / de'i phyir 'das par yang mi 'gyur ro /
atha yathoktadoṣaparijihīrṣayā
# ci ste ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon spang bar 'dod na /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca na stastatra punaryadi / pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca syātāṃ kaśramapekṣya tam / tatra atīte kāle yadi vartamānānāgatau kālau na staḥ iti parikalpyate, evamapi tatra avidyamānatvāt gaganendīvaravannāstyapekṣā / athāpi syāt
# da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa / / gal te de na med gyur na / / da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa / / ji ltar de la ltos par 'gyur / / gal te da ltar ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus de dag 'das pa'i dus de na med par rtog na / / de lta na yang de na yod pa ma yin pas / / nam mkha'i autpala ltar ltos pa yod pa ma yin no /
kālavādināṃ vidyate eva kālaḥ, tatra kimapekṣayā prayojanamiti? ucyate
# ci ste yang dus smra ba rnams kyi ltar na dus yod pa nyid yin na / / de la ltos pas dgos pa ci yod snyam na /
evamapi / anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirnātītaṃ vidyate tayoḥ
# brjod pa de lta na yang / / 'das pa la ni ma ltos par / / de gnyis grub pa yod ma yin /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate
# de phyir da ltar byung ba dang / / ma 'ongs dus kyang yod ma yin /
pratyutpannānāgatayorasattvam, atītānapekṣatvāt, kharaviṣāṇavat
# da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dag yod pa ma yin te / / 'das pa la mi ltas pa'i phyir bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
yataścaivam pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate iti vijñeyam / yadā caivam atītamapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā pratyutpannānāgatayornāsti siddhiḥ, evaṃ pratyutpannāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā atītānāgatayoḥ anāgatāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā pratyutpannātītayoḥ asiddhau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tenaiva pratyutpannāgatayoḥ atītāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā asiddhikrameṇa dūṣaṇasāmyamatidiśannāha
# gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus yod pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / de ltar na ji ltar 'das pa la ltos pa'am ma ltos pa yang rung ste / / da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dag grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / / da ltar byung ba la ltos sam ma ltos kyang rung ste / / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag gam / / ma 'ongs pa la ltos sam ma ltos kyang rung ste / / 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dag ma grub par shes pa na / / da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dag 'das pa la ltos sam ma ltos kyang rung ste ma grub pa'i rim pa'i tshul 'di nyid dang sun dbyung ba mtshungs par bsgre ba'i phyir /
etenaivāvaśiṣṭau dvau krameṇa parivartakau
# rim pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyi / / lhag ma gnyis po bsnor ba dang /
uttamādhamamadhyādīnekatvādīṃśca lakṣayet
# mchog dang tha ma 'bring la sogs / / gcig la sogs pa'ang shes par bya / / zhes gsungs so /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? / yadyatīto 'nāgataśca pratyutpannamapekṣya hi / kālo 'tīto 'nāgataśca pratyutpanne bhaviṣyataḥ / kālo 'tīto 'nāgataśca na stastatra punaryadi / kālo 'tīto 'nāgataśca syātāṃ kathamapekṣya tam
# ji ltar zhe na / / 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa / / gal te da ltar byung ltos na / / 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa / / da ltar byung dus yod par 'gyur / / 'dis pa dang ni ma 'ongs dus / / gal te de ni med gyur na / / 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dus / / ji ltar de la ltos par gyur /
anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirna jātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ
# da ltar la ni ma ltos par / / de gnyis grub pa yod ma yin /
tenātīto 'nāgataśca kālo nāma na vidyate / eṣa tāvadekaḥ kālaparivartaḥ / atīto vartamānaśca yadyajātamapekṣya hi / atīto vartamānaśca kāle 'jāte bhaviṣyataḥ
# de yi phyir na 'das pa dang / / ma 'ongs dus kyang yod ma yin / / zhes bya ste / / re zhig 'di ni dus bsnor ba gcig yin no; ;'das dang da ltar byung ba ni / / gal te ma 'ongs ltos gyur na / / 'das pa dang ni da ltar byung / / ma 'ongs dus na yod par 'gyur /
atīto vartamānaśca na stastatra punaryadi / atīto vartamānaśca syātāṃ kathamapekṣya tam
# 'das dang da ltar byung ba ni / / gal te de na med gyur na / / 'das pa dang ni da ltar byung / / ji ltar de la ltos par 'gyur /
anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirnājātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ
# ma 'ongs pa la ma ltos par / / de gnyis grub pa yod ma yin /
atīto vartamānaśca tasmātkālo na vidyate
# de yi phyir na 'das pa dang / / da ltar dus kyang yod ma yin /
eṣa dvitīyaḥ kālaparivarta iti vyākhyānakārikā iti
# zhes bya ba 'di ni dus bsnor ba gnyis pa ste / / de ltar dus bsnor ba gnyis khong du chud par bya'o /
evaṃdvau kālaparivartau boddhavyau / yataśca evaṃ vicāraṇe kālatrayaṃ nāsti, tasmāt kālo na vidyate, kālābhāvācca bhāvasadbhāvo 'pi nāsti iti siddham / yathā caitatkālatrayaṃ vicāritam, evam
# gang gi phyir rnam par dpyad pa na / / dus gsum med pa de'i phyir dus yod pa ma yin la / / dus med pas dngos po'i rang bzhin yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / / ji ltar dus gsum po 'di rnam par dpyad pa de bzhin du / / mchog dang tha ma 'bring la sogs /
uttamādhamamadhyādīnekatvādīṃśca lakṣayet
# gcig la sogs pa'ang shes par bya ste / / mchog dang tha ma 'bring la sogs /
uttamādhamamadhyamān iti ādiśabdena kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāni, utpādasthitibhaṅgāḥ, pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntāḥ, kāmarūpārūpyadhātavaḥ, śaikṣāśaikṣanaivaśaikṣanaivāśaikṣādayo yāvantaḥ padārthāḥ tripadārthasaṃbandhavyavasthitāḥ, te sarve gṛhyante / ekatvādīṃśca ityanena ādiśabdena dvitvabahutvayo grahaṇāt te eva uttamādayaḥ ekatvādayaśca kālatrayavyākhyānena vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ / atrāha / vidyata eva kālaḥ parimāṇavattvāt
# zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni / / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang skye ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa rnams dang sngon gyi mtha' dang dbus kyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnams dang 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dang slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa la sogs pa dngos po gsum dang 'brel par gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bsdu'o / / gcig la sogs pa'ang zhes bya ba'i sogs pa'i sgra 'dis ni gnyis pa dang mang po dag sdud do / / mchog la sogs pa dag dang / / gcig la sogs pa de rnams ni / / dus gsum rnam par bshad pas bshad par rig par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / dus ni yod pa nyid de / / tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
iha yannāsti, na tasya parimāṇavattvaṃ vidyate tadyathā kharaviṣāṇasya / asti ca kālasya parimāṇavattvaṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrtadivasarātryahorātrapakṣamāsasaṃvatsarādibhedena / tasmāt, parimāṇavattvād vidyata eva kālaḥ iti
# 'dir gang med pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa nyid yod pa ma yin te / / dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no / / dus la ni skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam dang nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang nyin mtshan dang zla ba phyed pa dang zla ba dang nyi ma nur ba dang lo la sogs pa'i dbye bas tshad dang ldan pa nyid yod pa yang yin te / / de'i phyir tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dus yod pa nyid do /
ucyate / yadi kālo nāma kaścit syāt, syāttasya parimāṇavattvam
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te dus zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de tshad dang ldan pa nyid du yang 'gyur na /
na tvasti / yasmāt / nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate
# yod pa ni ma yin te / / gang gi phyir / / mi gnas dus ni 'dzin mi byed / / gang zhig gzung bar bya ba'i dus /
yo gṛhyetāgṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate katham
# gnas pa yod pa ma yin pas / / ma bzung dus ni ji ltar gdags /
iha yadi kālo nāma kaścidavasthitaḥ kṣaṇādivyatiriktaḥ syāt, sa kṣaṇādibhiḥ parimāṇavattvād gṛhyeta
# gal te 'di na dus zhes bya ba skad cig ma la sogs pa la tha dad pa gnas pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni de skad cig la sogs pa dag gi sgo nas tshad dang ldan par 'dzin pa zhig na /
na tu avasthitaḥ kūṭasthaḥ kaścit kālo nāma asti, yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirgṛhyeta
# dus zhes bya ba gang zhig skad cig ma la sogs pa dag gi sgo nas 'dzin pa ther zug par gnas pa ni yod pa yang ma yin no /
tadevaṃ nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ, asthitatvānna gṛhyate ityarthaḥ
# de'i phyir de ltar na mi gnas dus ni 'dzin mi byed de / / mi gnas pa'i phyir 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
athāpi syāt / nitya eva avasthitasvabhāvaḥ kālo nāma asti, kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyate
# ci ste yang dus rtag par gnas pa'i rang bzhin can kho na yod pa yin la / / de skad cig la sogs pa dag gis mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin te /
tathāhi / kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ
# de skad du yang / / dus kyis 'byung ba smin par byed / / dus kyis skye dgu sdud par byed /
kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ
# dus kyis gnyid log sad par byed / / dus las 'da' bar shin tu dka' /
iti / yaścaivaṃlakṣaṇaḥ so 'vasthitasvabhāvo 'stīti
# zhes 'byung ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can gnas pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni yod pa yin no snyam na /
ucyate / evamapi sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyamāno gṛhyeta
# brjod par bya ste / / de ltar na yang gang zhig skad cig la sogs pa dag gis mngon par gsal zhing gzung ba dus gnas pa yod pa ma yin no /
kasmāt punaḥ sthitaḥ kālo nāstīti cet, kṣaṇādivyatirekeṇāgṛhyamāṇatvāt / api ca
# yang ci'i phyir dus gnas pa yod pa ma yin no zhe na / / skad cig la sogs pa las tha dad par ma bzung ba'i phyir ro /
ayaṃ kālaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaḥ san astīti, asaṃskṛtasvabhāvo vā? ubhayaṃ ca saṃskṛtaparīkṣāyāṃ pratiṣiddham
# gzhan yang dus 'di 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zhig gam / / 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zhig yod par rtog grang na / / gnyi ga yang /
utpādasthitibhaṅgānāmasiddhau nāsti saṃskṛtam
# skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dag / / ma grub phyir na 'dus byas med /
saṃskṛtasyāpyasiddhau ca kathaṃ setsyatyasaṃskṛtam
# 'dus byas rab tu ma grub pas / / 'dus ma byas ni ji ltar 'grub /
ityanena / tadevaṃ nāsti vyavasthitaḥ kālaḥ, yo gṛhyeta / yaśca idānīṃ kālo na gṛhyate asthitatvādavidyamānasvarūpatvāt, so 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ san kathaṃ kṣaṇādibhiḥ prajñapayituṃ bhāvataḥ pāryata ityāha
# ces bya ba des 'dus byas brtag par bkag zin to / / de'i phyir de ltar na gang zhig gzung bar bya ba dus gnas pa yod pa ma yin no / / dus gang zhig de ltar mi gnas shing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gzung ba ma yin pa de ni ma bzung ba yin dang ji ltar skad cig la sogs pa dag gis gdags par nus zhes gsungs pa ni /
agṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate kathamiti
# ma bzung dus ni ji ltar gdags / / zhes bya ba'o /
tasmānnāstyeva kālaḥ
# de'i phyir dus med pa nyid do /
atrāha / satyaṃ nāsti nityaḥ kālo nāma kaścid rūpādivyatiriktaḥ svabhāvasiddhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi rūpādīneva sa saṃskārānupādāya prajñaptaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇādivācyo bhavati, tasmādadoṣa iti / ucyate / evamapi / bhāvaṃ pratītya kālaścetkālo bhāvādṛte kutaḥ
# 'dir smras pa / / dus zhes bya ba gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa rtag pa 'ga' zhig med pa ni bden te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'du byed gzugs la sogs pa dag la brten na brtags pa'i dus ni skad cig la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya bar 'gyur te; de'i phyir nyes pa med do / / brjod par bya ste / / de lta na yang / / gal te dus ni dngos brten te / / dngos med dus ni ga la yod /
yadyevaṃ bhāvaṃ pratītya kālo bhavatīti bhavatā vyavasthāpyate, yadā khalu bhāvo nāsti, tadā niyataṃ taddhetuko 'pi kālo nāstīti pratipādayannāha
# gal te de ltar dngos po la brten nas dus su 'gyur ro zhes rnam par 'jog na'o / / gang gi tshe dngos po nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe nges par de'i rgyu can gyi dus kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na ca kaścana bhāvo 'sti / iti pūrvaṃ vistareṇa pratipāditatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca
# dngos po 'ga' yang yod min na / / zhes gsungs te / / gong du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir dang dgag pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro /
yadā caivaṃ na kaścidbhāvo 'sti bhāvataḥ, tadā / kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati / kālābhāvācca na santi kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādayaḥ kālabhedāḥ tatpariṇāmabhūtāḥ, ityataḥ kutaḥ pariṇāmavattvena kālasiddhirbhaviṣyati? tasmānnāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ iti / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā āryahastikakṣyasūtre / yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvako
# gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / dus lta yod par ga la 'gyur / / dus med pas de'i tshad du gyur pa dus kyi bye brag skad cig la sogs pa yang med do / / de'i phyir tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyis dus grub par ga la 'gyur te / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa nyid do / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'phags pa glang po'i rtsal gyi mdo las / / gal te chos rnams rang bzhin 'ga' yod na / / rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pas de mkhyen 'gyur /
kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ / iti / tathā / buddhasahasraśatā ya atītā dharmasahasraśatāni bhaṇitvā
# ther zug chos rnams mya ngan 'das mi 'gyur / / mkhas rnams nam yang spyod pa med mi 'gyur / / zhes gsungs la / / de bzhin du / / chos ni stong phrag brgya dag bstan gyur nas / / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gang dag 'das gyur kyang /
naiva ca dharma na cākṣara kṣīṇā nāsti samudbhavu tena akṣīṇā / iti / tathā
# chos dang yi ge dag la zad med de / / skye ba yod min des na zad pa med / / ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
utpādakāle hi tathāgatasya maitreyanāmā tviha yo bhaviṣyati
# de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe / / byams pa zhes bya'i rgyal ba 'byung 'gyur zhing /
bhaviṣyatīyaṃ kanakāvṛtā mahī tasyā idānīṃ kuta āgamo 'sau
# sa 'di gser gyis bdal ba 'byung 'gyur ba / / de tshe de yi 'byung de ga la yod /
ullāpanāḥ kāmaguṇā hi pañca vibhrāmaṇā mohana moṣadharmiṇaḥ / madhyāhnakāle hi yathaiva grīṣme jalaṃ marīcyāṃ hi tathaiva kāmāḥ / ekena kalpena bhaveddhi loko ākāśabhūto gaganasvabhāvo / dāhaṃ vināśaṃ ca payānti bhe[bhī?]ravaḥ kuta āgamaḥ kutra gatiśca teṣām / iti / tadyathā / pañcemāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ yaduta atīto 'dhvā anāgato 'dhvā ākāśaṃ nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaśceti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau kālaparīkṣā nāma ekonaviṃśaṃ prakaraṇam / sāmagrīparīkṣā viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyate kālaḥ, phalapravṛttau sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt / yo nāsti, nāsau sahakārikāraṇabhāvena pratipadyate, vandhyātanayavat / tasmādasti kālaḥ, sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt / iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām, ṛtuviśeṣāsaṃnidhānānnopajāyate / yathā ca bāhyeṣu, evamādhyātmikeṣvapi / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatairapi / sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām / iti / yasmācca evamasti kālāpekṣā, tasmādastyasau kālo nāma, yaḥ aṅkurādipravṛttau sahakārikāraṇaṃ bhavatīti / ucyate / syāt sahakārikāraṇatā kālasya, yadi aṅkurādiphalasya pravṛttireva syāt / na tvasti / kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha bījādihetupratyayasāmagrīto 'ṅkurādiphalodaye parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? yadi tāvad vyavasthitasya parikalpyate, tanna yujyate iti pratipādayannāha / hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi / phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham / yadi hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ tvanmatena phalamasti, nanu evaṃ sati yasmāt sāmagryāmasti, kathaṃ tayā tajjanyate? na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate / api ca / yadvidyate tanniṣpannatvāt niṣpannapurovasthitaghaṭavat na punarjanmāpekṣate / abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet, tasyāpi pakṣasya pūrvameva / āgacchatyanyato nāgnirindhane 'gnirna vidyate / ityatroktamuttaram / atha nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti parikalpyate, etadapi nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha / hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi / phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham / yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam, kathaṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate? tatra avidyamānatvāt sikatābhiriva tailam / ata eva asaṃbhāvayannāha / phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham / na tatphalaṃ sāmagrīto jāyate ityabhiprāyaḥ / kiṃ cānyat / hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāmasti cetphalam / gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate / yad yatra asti, tat tatra gṛhyate, tadyathā kuṇḍe dadhi / yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam, maṇḍūkajaṭāyāṃ śiromaṇiḥ / atha syāt / vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt, atisaṃnikarṣāt, ativiprakarṣāt, indriyopaghātāt, mūrtivaddravyavyavadhānāt, mūrtyantardhānāt, manonavasthānāt, paramāṇuvat akṣasthāñjanaśalākāvat ādityagativat taimirikaikaikakeśavat andhabadhirādirūpaśabdādivat kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet, kiṃ khalu eṣāmagṛhyamāṇānāmastitve liṅgam, yena eṣāmastitve sati anupalabdhiriti syāt? anumānopamānāgamairgrahaṇādeṣāmastitvamiti cet, na tarhi teṣāmanupalabdhiriti vaktavyam, anumānādibhirupalabhyamānatvāt / yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate, iti cet, ucyate / kimasmābhirevamuktam / rūpīndriyairvidyamānaṃ sad gṛhyeteti? kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ / gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti / athāpi manyase / yad yatra nāsti, na tat tasmādutpadyate sikatābhyastailavat
# ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / dus brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / dus ni yod pa nyid de / / 'bras bu 'byung ba la lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang med pa de ni lhan cig byed pa'i ngo bo ma yin te mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no / / de'i phyir dus ni yod pa nyid de / / lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di na myu gu gang zhig sa bon dang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang dus zhes bya ba rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la brten nas skye ba ni / / sa bon la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa yod kyang dus kyi khyad par nye bas mi skye ba yin no / / phyi rol dag la ji lta ba de bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid la yang yin te / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / lus can rnams kyi las rnams ni / / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za / / tshogs shing dus la bab pa na / / 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur / / zhes ji skad du gsungs pa lta bu'o / / gang gi phyir de ltar dus de la ltos pa yod pa de'i phyir gang zhig myu gu la sogs pa byung ba la lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba dus zhes bya ba de yod pa yin no / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu 'byung ba nyid yod na ni / / dus lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ba zhig na / / yod pa ni ma yin no / / ji ltar zhe na / / 'dir sa bon la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu skye bar rtog pa na / / 'bras bu tshogs pa la rnam par gnas pa zhig gam / / mi gnas pa zhig de las skye bar rtog grang / / de las cir 'gyur zhe na / / gal te rnam par gnas pa zhig la rtog na ni / / de ni mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi / / tshogs pa nyid las skye 'gyur zhing / / tshogs la 'bras bu yod na ni / / ji ltar tshogs pa nyid las skye / / zhes gsungs te; gal te rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las 'bras bu yod na ni / / de lta na gang zhig tshogs pa la yod pa de ji ltar des bskyed par 'gyur te / / khar gzhong na yod pa'i zho ni khar gzhong gis bskyed pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang gang yod pa de ni grub zin pa'i phyir / / grub zin pa'i bum pa mdun na gnas pa ltar yang skye ba la ltos pa med pa yin no / / gal te mngon par gsal ba'am rags par byed pa yin no zhe na / / ma yin te / / phyogs 'di la gong du lan btab zin pa'i phyir ro / / me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste / / shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin / / de bzhin zhes bya ba der lan brjod zin to / / ci ste tshogs pa la 'bras bu med do zhes rtog na / / de yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi / / tshogs pa nyid las skye 'gyur zhing / / tshogs la 'bras bu med na ni / / ji ltar tshogs pa nyid las skye; / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi tshogs pa la 'bras bu de med na ni / / 'o na ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pas 'bras bu bskyed de / / de na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bye ma dag gi til mar bzhin no / / de nyid kyi phyir mi srid pas / / tshogs la 'bras bu med na ni / / ji ltar tshogs pa nyid las skye / / zhes gsungs te / / 'bras bu de tshogs pa nyid las mi skye ba nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / gzhan yang / / gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi / / tshogs la 'bras bu yod na ni / / tshogs la gzung du yod rigs na / / tshogs pa nyid la gzung du med / / gang zhig gang na yod pa de ni der gzung du yod de / / dper na khar gzhong gi zho bzhin la / / gang zhig gang na yod pa ma yin pa de ni der gzung du yod pa ma yin te / / dper na bye ma dag la 'bru mar lta bu'o / / ci ste dngos po rnams yod kyang / / shin tu phra ba dang shin tu nye ba dang shin tu ring ba dang dbang po la rnyog pa chags pa dang dbang po la gnod pa byas ba dang lus can gyi rdzas kyis chod pa dang lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang yid la ma bzung ba'i phyir phra rab dang mig la gnas pa'i mig sman gyi thur ma dang nyi ma'i 'gros dang rab rib can gyi skra re re dang long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang rtsig pa la sogs pas bar du bcad pa'i bum pa dang grub pa dang lha dang sha za la sogs pa'i lus dang yul gzhan yid la byed pa dang bcas pa'i yul gzhan ltar gzung du med pa yin no zhe na / / 'on gang gis na 'di dag yod bzhin du mi dmigs par 'gyur ba / / ma bzung ba 'di dag yod pa nyid la rtag cing yod / / rjes su dpag pa dang nye bar 'jal ba dang lung rnams kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir de dag yod pa nyid do zhe na / / 'o na de dag ma dmigs so / / zhes brjod par mi bya ste / / rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa dag gis dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / gal te dbang po gzugs can gyis gzung bar bya ba de gang yin pa de yod kyang byed pa dag gis ma bzung ba yin no zhe na / / brjod pa / / ci kho bo cag gis yod bzhin par gyur pa dbang po gzugs can dag gis gzung du med do zhes de skad du smras sam / / 'o na ci zhe na / / kho bo cag ni / / tshogs la gzung du yod rigs na / / zhes spyir smra'o / / ci ste yang gang zhig gang na med pa de ni de las skye ba ma yin te / / bye ma dag las 'bru mar bzhin no /
utpadyate ca sāmagrītaḥ phalam, tasmādanumānataḥ sāmagryāṃ phalasyāstitvamiti
# 'bras bu ni tshogs pa las skye ba yang yin te / / de'i phyir tshogs pa la 'bras bu yod pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pa las yin no snyam du sems na /
ucyate / yad yatra asti, na tat tasmādutpadyate, tadyathā kuṇḍād dadhi iti / asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate?
# brjod pa / / gang zhig gang na yod pa de ni de las skye ba ma yin te / / dper na khar gzhong las zho mi skye ba bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa 'di las de yod par mi rigs pa'i phyir tshogs pa 'bras bu med pa nyid do zhes ci ste mi gzung /
athāpi syāt / ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam, evaṃ nāstitvamapīti
# ci ste yang phyogs gnyi ga yang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir na ji ltar yod pa nyid mi rigs pa de bzhin du med pa nyid kyang mi rigs so snyam na / / brjod par bya ste / / kho bo cag ni 'di med par sgrub pa ma yin gyi /
ucyate / na vayamasyāsattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitaṃ sattvamasya nirākurmaḥ / evaṃ na vayamasya sattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitamasattvamasya apākurmaḥ / antadvayaparihāreṇa madhyamāyāḥ pratipadaḥ pratipādayitumiṣṭatvāditi / uktaṃ ca āryadevapādīye śatake / stambhādīnāmalaṃkāro gṛhasyārthe nirarthakaḥ / satkāryameva yasyeṣṭaṃ yasyāsatkāryameva ca / iti / tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt, iti vyavasthitam / atha manyase / nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi
# 'o na ci zhe na / / 'di gzhan gyis yod pa nyid du yongs su brtags pa 'gog pa yin no / / de bzhin du kho bo cag ni 'di yod pa nyid du sgrub pa ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'di gzhan gyis med pa nyid du brtags pa sel ba yin te / / mtha' gnyis bsal nas dbu ma'i lam sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro / / brgya ba las kyang / / 'bras bu yod nyid gang 'dod dang / / 'bras bu med nyid gang 'dod la / / khyim gyi don du ka ba la / / sogs pa'i rgyan ni don med 'gyur / / zhes bshad do / / de'i phyir de ltar na tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye ba ma yin te / / yod pa ni gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag pa yin no / / ci ste tshogs pa la 'bras bu med pa nyid do snyam du sems na de lta na yang /
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam
# gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi / / tshogs la 'bras bu med na ni /
hetavaḥ pratyayāśca syurahetupratyayaiḥ samāḥ / yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na bhavanti, eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā / na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ / atrāha / naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā syāt / kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti
# rgyu rnams dang ni rkyen dag kyang / / rgyu rkyen ma yin mtshungs par 'gyur / / ji ltar me dang sol ba la sogs pa dag la myu gu med pa'i phyir na / / de dag de'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du; sa bon la sogs pa brjod par 'dod pa rnams kyang rgyu dang rkyen nyid du mi 'gyur te / / de dag la myu gu med pa'i phyir ro / / rgyu dang rkyen ma yin pa dag las ni 'bras bu 'byung bar rigs pa yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba med do / / 'dir smras pa / / gang las ci tshogs pa las 'bras bu yod dam 'on te med ces bya ba'i bsam pa 'dir 'gyur ba / / tshogs pa la ni 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa med do /
kiṃ tarhi hetoḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyam
# 'o na ci zhe na / / rgyu la 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa yod la /
sāmagrī tu hetoranugrahamātraṃ karoti
# tshogs pas ni rgyu la phan 'dogs pa tsam zhig byed pa yin no /
sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate, tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti
# rgyu de ni 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyu byin nas 'gag par 'gyur la / / rgyu des phan btags pa'i 'bras bu yang skye ba yin no /
ucyate / naiva hi ajātasya phalasya hetoranugrahaṇamasti
# brjod par bya ste / / 'bras bu ma skyes pa'i rgyu la ni phan 'dogs pa yod pa ma yin la /
na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā
# ma skyes pa la ni mo gsham gyi bu ltar sus kyang cung zad tsam yang byed par mi nus pas rtog pa 'di ni mi rigs so /
api ca / hetukaṃ phalasya datvā yadi heturnirudhyate
# gzhan yang / / gal te rgyus ni 'bras bu la / / rgyu byin nas ni 'gag 'gyur na /
yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca hetorātmadvayaṃ bhavet
# gang byin pa dang gang 'gag pa'i / / rgyu yi bdag nyid gnyis su 'gyur /
yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate, evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt
# gal te rgyu des 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir rgyu de byed rgyu byin nas 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes rtog na ni / / de lta na rgyu'i bdag nyid gang byin pa dang gang 'gag pa de gnyis su 'gyur na / / de ni rigs pa yang ma yin te /
na caitad yuktam, ardhaśāśvataprasaṅgāt nityānityayośca parasparaviruddhayorekatvābhāvāt
# phyed rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phyed mi rtag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa phan tshun 'gal ba dag kyang gcig la med pa'i phyir ro /
atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi
# ci ste rgyu'i bdag nyid gnyis su thal ba spang bar bya ba'i don du 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i phyir cung zad kyang ma byin par bdag nyid thams cad kyi rgyu'i 'gag par 'dod na ni / / de lta na yang /
hetuṃ phalasyādatvā ca yadi heturnirudhyate
# gal te rgyus ni 'bras bu la / / rgyu ma byin par 'gag 'gyur na /
hetau niruddhe jātaṃ tatphalamāhetukaṃ bhavet
# rgyu 'gags nas ni skyes pa yi / / 'bras bu de ni rgyu med 'gyur /
yadi phalasya kiṃcidapyadatvā sarvātmanā heturnirudhyate, nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt
# gal te 'bras bu la cung zad kyang ma byin par bdag nyid thams cad kyis rgyu 'gags na ni / / de ltar rgyu de 'gags nas skyes pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de rgyu med pa kho nar 'gyur na /
na ca āhetukamasti / ityayuktaiṣā kalpanā / atrāha / yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ, evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu, tadyathā pradīpaprabhāyā iti
# rgyu med pa ni yod pa ma yin pas rtog pa 'di ni mi rigs so / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te 'bras bu rgyu las skye bas nyes pa 'dir 'gyur na ni / / de ltar na tshogs pa dang lhan cig skyes pa kho na 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin par 'gyur te /
eṣāpi kalpanā nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha / phalaṃ sahaiva sāmagryā yadi prādurbhavetpunaḥ / ekakālau prasajyete janako yaśca janyate / na caikakālayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayorjanyajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam, vāmadakṣiṇakarayoścaraṇayorvā, ityayuktaiṣā kalpanā ityayuktametat / atrāhureke / naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt / tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā / tasya hetupratyaya sāmagryā vartamānāvasthā janyate, dravyaṃ tu vyavasthitameveti
# dper na sgron ma 'od kyis skyed par byed pa yin pa bzhin no / / rtog pa 'di yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir; gal te tshogs dang lhan cig tu / / 'bras bu yang ni skye 'gyur na / / skyed par byed dang bskyed bya gang / / dus gcig par ni thal bar 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / ba glang gi rva gyas gyon dus gcig pa dag ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid du yang ma mthong bas / / 'di ni mi rigs so / / 'dir kha cig na re / / dngos po rnams ma byung ba las skye ba ni med de / / glo bur bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir 'bras bu de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis tshogs pa'i snga rol ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs na gnas pa yin la / / rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pas ni de da ltar ba'i gnas skabs su bskyed pa yin gyi / / rdzas ni gnas pa nyid do zhes zer ro /
tān pratyucyate / pūrvameva ca sāmagryāḥ phalaṃ prādurbhavedyadi
# de dag la brjod pa ni / / gal te tshogs pa'i snga rol du / / 'bras bu skyes par gyur na ni / / rgyu dang rkyen rnams med pa yi /
hetupratyayanirmuktaṃ phalamāhetukaṃ bhavet
# 'bras bu rgyu med 'byung bar 'gyur / / zhes bya ba ste /
yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi, tad hetupratyayanirapekṣaṃ syāt, tataśca āhetukaṃ syāt
# gal te tshogs pa'i snga rol na 'bras bu rang gi ngo bos yod par gyur na ni / / de rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa med par 'gyur la / / de'i phyir rgyu med par 'byung bar 'gyur na /
na ca āhetukānāṃ padārthānāmastitvaṃ yuktam, kharaturagoragaviṣāṇādīnāmapyastitvaprasaṅgāt, pūrvasiddhasya ca punaḥ hetupratyayāpekṣayā niṣprayojanatvādityayuktametat / anye punarvarṇayanti / hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī / na ca uktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ / yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam / yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt / api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti / ucyate / evamapi / niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet / pūrvajātasya hetośca punarjanma prasajyate / yadi niruddhe hetau bhavanmatena phalamutpadyate, tacca phalaṃ hetvātmakameva bhavatīti parikalpyate, evaṃ sati hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet, naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt, na tu apūrvasya phalasyotpādaḥ / tataśca hetornityataiva syāt
# dngos po rgyu med par 'byung ba dag ni yod pa nyid kyang ma yin te bong bu'i rva la sogs pa rnams kyang yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / sngar grub zin pa la yang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir yang 'di rigs pa ma yin no / / yang gzhan dag ni / / 'bras bu ni rgyu kho nas skyed par byed kyi / / tshogs pas ni ma yin la / / bshad zin pa'i nyes par thal ba yang ma yin te / / 'di ltar gang las ci rgyus 'bras bu la rgyu byin nas 'gag par 'gyur ram / / 'on te ma byin par yin zhes rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba / / rgyu yang gzhan la 'bras bu yang gzhan pa ni ma yin gyi / / 'on kyang rgyu nyid 'gags nas 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no zhes 'dzer to / / de lta na yang / / la te rgyu 'gags 'bras bu na / / rgyu ni kun du 'pho bar 'gyur / / sngon skyes pa yi rgyu yang ni / / yang skye bar ni thal bar 'gyur / / gal te rgyu 'gags pa na 'bras bu skye la 'bras bu de yang rgyu'i bdag nyid can kho na yin no zhes rtog na / / de lta yin na ni / / rgyu ni kun du 'pho bar 'gyur te / / zlos gar mkhan cha byad gzhan btang nas cha byad gzhan len pa ltar rgyu 'pho ba tsam zhig tu 'gyur gyi / / 'bras bu snga na med pa skye ba ni ma yin no / / de'i phyir rgyu rtag pa nyid du 'gyur na /
na ca nityānāmastitvaṃ kvacidasti / yathoktaṃ śatake
# rtag pa dag ni yod pa nyid kyang ma yin no / / ji skad du brgya pa las /

# gang zhig gang na nam gyi tshe 'ang / / ma bsten par ni yod nyid med / / des na nam yang gang zhig tu / / rtag pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin / / zhes bshad do / / gzhan yang rtog pa 'di la ni / / sngon skyes pa'i rgyu yang skye bar 'gyur na /
na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt, anavasthāprasaṅgācca / atha manyase / yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate, yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti
# skyes pa ni slar yang skye bar mi rigs te / / dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang thug pha med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / ci ste bdag nyid gang gis yod pa'i bdag nyid de skye ba ni ma yin gyi / / bdag nyid gang gis yod pa ma yin pa de kho na skye ba yin no snyam na /
etadapi na yuktam / aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt / phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat / kiṃ cānyat / yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, niruddho vā janayedaniruddho vā? phalamapi utpannaṃ vā janayedanutpannaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha
# 'di yang mi rung ste / / rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo rgyu'i rang bzhin ma spangs pa la 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar ming tsam zhig tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang gnas skabs tha dad na yang rdzas tha mi dad par sgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs na rgyu'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs pa ni 'bras bu'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na rgyu 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du gnas so zhes bya ba 'di ni gyi na'o / / gzhan yang / / gal te rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed na / / de 'gags pa'am ma 'gags pa zhig gis skyed par byed / / 'bras bu yang skyes pa'am ma skyes pa zhig bskyed grang na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
janayetphalamutpannaṃ niruddho 'staṃgataḥ katham

# 'bras bu dang ni 'brel pa'i rgyu / / gnas pas kyang ni ji ltar skyed / / ces gsungs te / / gal te re zhig 'gags pa nub cing zhig par gyur pa'i rgyus 'bras bu skyes pa ste yod cing bdog pa bskyed do zhes bya bar rtog na ni de ni mi 'thad do / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
kasmāditi cet, kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet? yadi janayati, vandhyāputro 'pi putraṃ janayiṣyati

phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati? atha manyase

iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam / yastu na vikriyate, sa hetulakṣaṇayukta eva na bhavatīti / phalena ca saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? phalasya vidyamānatvāt

atha manyase / vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti, etadapyayuktamityāha
# 'on te 'bras bu yod pa yang bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang ma 'brel zhing / / yang dag par 'brel pa med pa'i rgyu kho nas 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
athāvṛtaḥ phalenāsau katamajjanayetphalam / yadi hetuḥ phalena asaṃbaddha eveṣyate, tadā katamadidānīṃ phalaṃ janayet? sarvameva vā phalaṃ janayedasaṃbaddhatvāt, na vā kiṃcijjanayedasaṃbaddhatvādevetyabhiprāyaḥ / kiṃ cānyat / yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ janayedadṛṣṭvā vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha
# 'di yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa ni / / ci ste rgyu 'bras ma 'brel na / / 'bras bu gang zhig skyed par byed / / ces bya ste / / gal te rgyu 'bras bu dang ma 'brel par 'dod na / / da ni 'bras bu gang zhig skyed par byed de / / ma 'brel pa'i phyir 'bras bu'o cog skyed par byed pa'am yang na cung zad kyang skyed par byed par mi 'gyur te / / 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o / / gzhan yang / / 'dir gal te rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed na / / des 'bras bu de mthong nas sam ma mthong bar skyed par byed grang na / / gnyi ga ltar na yang mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni /
na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam / tatra yadi heturdṛṣṭvā janayatīti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate
# rgyus ni mthong dang ma mthong bar / / 'bras bu skyed par mi byed do / / zhes bya ba'o / / de la gal te mthong nas skyed par byed do zhes rtog na / / de ni mi rigs te /
yasmādvidyamānameva draṣṭuṃ pāryate nāvidyamānam / vidyamānaṃ cet, tanna janyate vidyamānatvāditi / evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati, adṛṣṭvāpi na janayati, sarvasya phalasya hetorjanakatvaprasaṅgāt / atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate

tasmādayuktā eṣā kalpanā / atha adṛṣṭvā kalpayet, evamapi yatkiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhavati tatsarvamutpādayet, na cotpādayati, tasmāt na adṛṣṭvāpi janayati / aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva / buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti / tasmānnāsti doṣaḥ / kiṃ cānyat / yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ tayorjanyajanakabhāvaḥ / yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti
# ci ste ma mthong bar zhes rtog par byed na / / de lta na yang gang ma mthong ba gang cung zad cig yod pa de thams cad skyed par byed par 'gyur na / / bskyed pa yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir ma mthong bar yang skyed par byed pa ma yin no / / kho bo cag ni mi 'dod pa bsgrubs pas gzhan gyis brtags pa 'gog par byed pa yin te / / skyes bu la sogs pa rgyur smra ba 'gro ba blo sngon du gtong ba'i byed pa po can du khas len pa rnams dang gcer bu pa sa bon la sogs pa dbang po gcig par rtogs pa rnams la ni thal bar 'gyur ba ldog pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir nyes pa med do / / gzhan yang gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu la phan tshun tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phrad pa yod na ni de'i tshe de gnyis bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos por 'gyur te / / gang gi phyir phan tshun phrad pa med par snang ba dang mun pa dag gam / / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la ni bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po ma mthong ngo /
ataḥ avaśyaṃ hetuphalabhāvayorjanyajanakabhāvamicchatā pareṇa saṃgatirabhyupeyā
# de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos por 'dod pa na / / gzhan gyis phrad pa gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos na /
sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati / ato hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati / yathā ca saṃgatirnāsti tathā pratipādayannāha / nātītasya hyatītena phalasya saha hetunā / nājātena na jātena saṃgatirjātu vidyate / atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti, atītatvenobhayorapyavidyamānatvāt / nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate, naṣṭājātatvena ubhayorapyavidyamānatvāt, bhinnakālatvācca / nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati, bhinnakālatvāt, naṣṭasya ca phalasya avidyamānatvādvandhyāputreṇeva devadattasyetyabhiprāyaḥ / yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti, evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha
# de yang rnam par dpyad pa na dus gsum char du yang yod pa ma yin te / / 'di'i phyir yang rgyus 'bras bu bskyed pa ma yin no / / ji ltar phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / 'bras bu 'das pa rgyu 'das dang / / ma skyes pa dang skyes pa dang / / lhan cig phrad par 'gyur ba ni / / nam yang yod pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs so / / re zhig 'bras bu 'das pa ni rgyu 'das pa dang lhan cig phrad pa nam yang ste gzhar yang yod pa ma yin te / / dus gnyi ga yang 'das pa nyid kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'bras bu 'das pa ni rgyu ma skyes pa dang yang phrad pa nam yang yod pa ma yin te / / zhig pa dang ma skyes pa nyid kyis gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / 'bras bu 'das pa yang rgyu skyes pa da ltar ba dang yang phrad pa yod pa ma yin te dus tha dad pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu zhig pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu dang lha sbyin bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa'o / / ji ltar 'bras bu 'di rgyu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ba dang lhan cig phrad pa nam yang yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / / 'bras bu da ltar ba rgyu dus gsum pa dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā / nātītena na jātena saṃgatirjātu vidyate / jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti / nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti, hetuphalayoryaugapadyābhāvāt, tayośca saṃgatirvaiyarthyāt / kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ
# 'bras bu skyes pa rgyu ma skyes / / 'das pa dang ni skyes pa dang / / lhan cig phrad par 'gyur ba ni / / nam yang yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bya ba gsungs pa la / / 'bras bu skyes pa ni rgyu ma skyes pa 'das pa dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te / / dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / 'bras bu da ltar ba ni rgyu da ltar ba dang yang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te / / rgyu dang 'bras bu dag cig car med pa'i phyir dang yod zin pa la phrad pa don med pa'i phyir ro / / yod pa phan tshun ltos pa med pa dag la ni yang phrad pas dgos pa ci zhig yod de / / de'i phyir phrad pa med do /
idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha
# da ni ji ltar 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa yang rgyu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / 'bras bu ma skyes rgyu skyes dang /
nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā / nājātena na naṣṭena saṃgatirjātu vidyate / ajātaṃ hi phalamasaṃvidyamānam
# ma skyes pa dang 'das pa dang / / lhan cig phrad par 'gyur ba ni / / nam yang yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / 'bras bu ma skyes pa ni med pa yin la /
tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt / anāgatenāpi hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanam, ubhayoravidyamānatvāt / yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā / asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam
# de ni rgyu dus tha dad pa dang da ltar ba dang 'das pa dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te / / dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / rgyu ma 'ongs pa dang yang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te / / gnyi ga yang med pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe de ltar rnam pa thams cad du rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / phrad pa yod pa ma yin na / / rgyus ni 'bras bu ji ltar bskyed /
naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ
# phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu mi bskyed pa nyid de / / mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa'o / / ci ste yang phrad pa yod pa nyid yin dang rgyus 'bras bu bskyed do snyam na /
athāpi syāt / satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti, tadapi na yuktam, kālatraye 'pi saṃgatyanupalabdheḥ / athāpi kathaṃcid hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatiḥ parikalpyate, evamapi / satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam / saṃnihitasya phalasya punarjanmavaiyarthyāt, asaṃhitānāṃ ca saṃgaterayuktatvāt ityabhiprāyaḥ
# de yang mi rigs te / / dus gsum char du yang phrad pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / ci ste yang rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ci zhig ltar phrad par rtog na / / de lta na yang / / phrad pa yod pa yin na yang / / rgyus ni 'bras bu ji ltar bskyed de / / 'bras bu lhan cig pa yang skye ba don med pa'i phyir dang lhan cig ma yin pa rnams kyang phrad par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
kiṃ cānyat / hetuḥ phalena śūnyaścetkathaṃ janayate phalam
