# gal te 'bras bus mi stong rgyus / / ji ltar 'bras bu skyed par byed /
yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate, sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā? tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati, ahetuvat phalaśūnyatvāt
# rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu skyed par byed par 'dod pa de des stong pa zhig gam mi stong pa zhig gis 'bras bu skyed par byed grang / / de la 'bras bus stong zhing bral ba'i rgyus ni 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de / / rgyu ma yin pa ltar 'bras bus stong pa'i phyir ro /
phalena aśūnyo 'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati, vidyamānatvāt phalasya, vidyamānaputraṃ devadatta iva
# 'bras bus mi stong pa'i rgyus kyang 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de / / yod pa'i phyir bu yod pa'i lha sbyin bzhin no /
evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati
# de ltar na / / re zhig 'bras bus stong pa'am mi stong pa'i rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ma yin no /
yaccāpi phalamutpadyate, taccāpyaśūnyaṃ vā samutpadyate, śūnyaṃ vā? tatra tāvat / phalaṃ notpatsyate 'śūnyamaśūnyaṃ na nirotsyate
# 'bras bu gang zhig skye ba de yang mi stong pa'am stong pa zhig bskyed grang / / de la / / 'bras bu mi stong skye mi 'gyur / / mi stong 'gag par mi 'gyur ro /
aniruddhamanutpannamaśūnyaṃ tadbhaviṣyati
# mi stong de ni ma 'gags dang / / ma skyes par yang 'gyur ba yin /
aśūnyaṃ hi phalamapratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvavyavasthitam, tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate
# 'bras bu mi stong pa ni rten cing 'brel par ma byung zhing rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas pa yin la / / 'bras bu rnam par gnas pa de lta bu de ni skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / / rang bzhin la ldog pa med pas 'gag par mi 'gyur ro /
tataśca aśūnyaṃ tadiṣyamāṇamaniruddhamanutpannaṃ ca syāt / na caitadiṣṭam, ityataḥ aśūnyaṃ tatphalaṃ na bhavati, utpādanirodhābhyupagamāt
# de'i phyir de mi stong par 'dod pa na mi skye ba dang mi 'gag par gyur na / / de ltar ni 'dod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir 'bras bu de mi stong pa ma yin te / / skye ba dang 'gag par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
idānīṃ śūnyamapi tatphalaṃ na saṃbhavati, anudayāvyayavattvaprasaṅgāt iti pratipādayannāha
# da ni 'bras bu stong pa de yang yod pa ma yin te / / skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
kathamutpatsyate śūnyaṃ kathaṃ śūnyaṃ nirotsyate
# stong pa ji ltar skye 'gyur zhing / / stong pa ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur /
śūnyamapyaniruddhaṃ tadanutpannaṃ prasajyate
# stong pa de yang ma 'gags dang / / ma skyes par yang thal bar 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs te /
tatra śūnyamucyate yatsvabhāvena nāsti
# de la stong pa ni gang rang bzhin gyis med pa la brjod la /
yacca vastu svabhāvena nāsti, tat kathamutpatsyate, kathaṃ vā nirotsyate? na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau
# gang rang bzhin gyis med pa de ni ji ltar skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur te; nam mkha' la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis med pa la ni skye ba'am 'jig pa ma mthong ngo /
tasmācchūnyamapi tatphalamiṣyamāṇamaniruddhamanutpannaṃ ca prasajyate
# de'i phyir 'bras bu de stong par 'dod pa na yang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags par thal bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ cānyat / yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa phalādavyatirikto vā janayet, vyatirikto vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha
# gzhan yang / / gal te rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu skyed par byed pa na / / de 'bras bu las tha dad pa'am / / tha mi dad pa zhig gis bskyed grang na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do /
hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate / hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate
# zhes gsungs pa ni / / rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nyid du / / nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / rgyu dang 'bras bu gzhan nyid du / / nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
tadetat pratijñāmātrakamiti pratipādayannāha
# zhes bya ba'o / / 'di ni dam bca' ba tsam zhig yin te / / ji ltar grub ce na / / bstan pa'i phyir /
ekatve phalahetvoḥ syādaikyaṃ janakajanyayoḥ
# rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nyid na / / bskyed bya skyed byed gcig tu 'gyur /
pṛthaktve phalahetvoḥ syāttulyo heturahetunā / yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, tadā janyajanakayorekatvamabhyupetaṃ syāt
# rgyu dang 'bras bu gzhan nyid na / / rgyu dang rgyu min mtshungs par 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nyid yin na ni / / de'i tshe bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa gnyis gcig pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur na /
na cānayorekatvam, pitāputrayoścakṣuścakṣurvijñānayorbījāṅkurayoścaikyaprasaṅgāt
# de gnyis ni gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin te pha dang bu dang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pa dag kyang gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti / idānīmanyatvamapi nāsti
# de lta na re zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu la gcig nyid yod pa ma yin no / / da ni gzhan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin te / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt / na caitadevam, ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati / yayośca evaṃ vicāryamāṇayostattvānyatve na staḥ, tayorna kadācijjanyajanakabhāvaḥ iṣyate / ato naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati / kiṃ cānyat / yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet, asadbhūtaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha / phalaṃ svabhāvasadbhūtaṃ kiṃ heturjanayiṣyati
# gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gzhan nyid yin na ni / / de'i tshe gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu la ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gyur na; de ni de ltar yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu la gzhan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no / / gang dag la de ltar rnam par dpyad pa na / / de nyid dang gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin pa de dag ni nam yang bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po ma yin te / / de'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu bskyed pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang gal te rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed na / / des 'bras bu de ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa'am / / med pa zhig bskyed / / de las cir 'gyur zhe na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa ni 'bras bu ngo bo nyid yod na rgyus ni ci zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
phalaṃ svabhāvāsadbhūtaṃ kiṃ heturjanayiṣyati
# 'bras bu ngo bo nyid med na / / rgyus ni ci zhig bskyed par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba'o /
tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam, tanna punarjanyate vidyamānatvāt, vidyamānaghaṭavat
# de la 'bras bu gang zhig ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa rang bzhin gyis bdog pa de ni yang mi skye ste / / yod pa'i phyir bum pa yod pa bzhin no /
yadapi svabhāvena asadbhūtaṃ phalam, tadapi heturna janayati, svabhāvena asadbhūtatvāt, kharaviṣāṇavat
# 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis med pa gang yin pa de yang rgyus bskyed pa ma yin te / / ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
pratibimbenānaikāntikateti cet, bhavatu anaikāntikatā, naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tu siddhaṃ bhāvānām / tataśca sasvabhāvavādatyāgaḥ syāt, asmadvādānuvarṇanameva syāt
# gal te gzugs brnyan gyis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na / / ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur mod / / dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par ni grub bo / / de'i phyir rang bzhin du smra ba btang bar 'gyur zhing / / kho bo cag smra ba'i rjes su smra ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā? na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam, dharmiṇamantareṇa taddharmayorapyabhāvāt / na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti / tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham
# dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa 'ga' yang med pas 'gal zla med pa'i phyir dngos po rang bzhin med pa yang med de / / de'i phyir ma nges pa nyid du ga la 'gyur / / 'di ltar kho bo cag gi ltar na ni gzugs brnyan rang bzhin dang bcas pa ma yin zhing / / rang bzhin med pa yang ma yin te / / chos can med na de'i chos dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro / / 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba cung zad cig rang bzhin dang rang bzhin med par gzigs pa ma yin no / / de la sngar ni / / 'bras bu mi stong skye mi 'gyur / / zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis dngos su 'bras bu skye ba'i byed pa po nyid yin pa bkag pa yin la /
idānīṃ hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāprayojakatvaṃ pratiṣiddhamiti / ayamasya pūrvakādviśeṣa iti vijñeyam
# de lta ni rgyus 'bras bu skye ba'i bya ba'i rab tu sbyor bar byed pa po nyid yin pa bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gong ma las 'di'i khyad par yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
atrāha / yadyapi hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāprayojakatvaṃ niṣiddham, tathāpi hetustāvat svabhāvato 'sti, na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati, tasmāt phalamapi bhaviṣyatīti
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang rgyu 'bras bu skye ba'i bya ba'i rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid yin pa bkag mod kyi / / de lta na yang re zhig rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa yin la / / 'bras bu med na ni rgyu'i rgyu nyid kyang mi 'grub ste / / de'i phyir 'bras bu yang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate / syāddhetuḥ, yadi ajanayato 'sya hetutvaṃ syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'di skyed par byed pa ma yin bzhin du rgyu nyid yin par 'gyur na ni rgyur gyur pa zhig na /
na cājanayamānasya hetutvamupapadyate / atha syāt / yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi phalaṃ tāvadasti
# skyed par byed pa ma yin na / / rgyu nyid 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / ci ste de ltar rgyu'i rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin mod kyi / / de lta na yang 'bras bu ni re zhig yod pa yin la /
na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti
# rgyu med par ni 'bras bu rigs pa yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir 'bras bu yod pas rgyu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate / yadā ajanayamānasya hetorhetutvaṃ nāstītyuktam, tadā / hetutvānupapattau ca phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati / iti
# brjod par bya ste / / gang gi tshe skyed par mi byed pa la rgyu'i rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin par bshad pa / / de'i tshe / / rgyu nyid 'thad pa yod min na / / 'bras bu gang gi yin par 'gyur /
tasmāt phalamapi nāstīti / atrāha / naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam, kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti
# de'i phyir 'bras bu yang med do / / 'dir smras pa / / rgyu 'ba' zhig 'bras bu skye ba'i bya ba'i rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid ma yin gyi / / 'o na ci zhe na / / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pas 'bras bu skyed do zhe na /
ucyate / uktadoṣatvāt na yuktametat / api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate, kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na? yadi janayatīti kalpyate, tanna yujyate
# de ni mi rigs te / / nyes pa brjod zin pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan yang rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa 'di gal te 'bras bu skyed par byed par rtog na / / ci ste bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid skyed par byed pa zhig gam / / 'on te ma yin pa zhig yin grang / / gal te skyed par byed pa zhig yin no zhes rtog na ni de mi rung ste /
na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam
# bdag gi dngos po ma rnyed pa ni rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid du ma mthong ba de'i phyir gdon mi za bar tshogs pas bdag gi dngos po rnyed par 'gyur dgos na /
na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam, ityataḥ na sāmagrī svātmānamutpādayati
# bdag gi dngos po rnyed pa ni yang bdag nyid bskyed pa la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid du mi rigs te / / de'i phyir tshogs pas rang gi bdag nyid mi skyed la /
yā ca ātmānaṃ notpādayati, sā kathaṃ phalamutpādayituṃ śaknotīti pratipādayannāha
# gang zhig bdag nyid mi skyed pa des ni ji ltar 'bras bu skyed par nus zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / rgyu rnams dang ni rkyen dag gis /
na ca pratyayahetūnāmiyamātmānamātmanā
# tshogs pa gang yin de yi ni / / bdag gis bdag nyid mi skyed na /
yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam
# 'bras bu ji ltar skyed par byed / / de phyir tshogs pas byas pa med / / ces gsungs te /
pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati, svātmani vṛttivirodhāt, satyāḥ punarutpādavaiyarthyācca
# rgyu rnams dang rkyen dag gi tshogs pa gang yin pa de re zhig bdag gis bdag nyid mi skyed de / / bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir dang bdag nyid skye ba don med pa'i phyir ro /
yā ca evamātmānameva tāvanna janayati, sā kathaṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati? na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate
# gang zhig re zhig bdag nyid mi skyed pa des 'bras bu ji ltar skyed par byed de / / mo gsham gyi bu bdag nyid skyed par mi nus pas bu skyed par byed do zhes bya bar mi rigs so /
evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate
# de ltar tshogs pa yang rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'bras bu bskyed pa mi rigs te /
tasmāt / na sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ
# de'i phyir tshogs pas byas pa'i 'bras bu med do /
athāpi syāt / yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate
# ci ste yang gal te tshogs pas byas pa'i 'bras bu med na / / de lta na 'o na tshogs pa ma yin pas byas pa yod do snyam na /
nāsāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalam / yadā sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kathamatyantaviruddhamasāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati? asāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati / atha syāt
# brjod pa / / tshogs min byas pa'i 'bras bu med / / gang gi tshe tshogs pas byas pa'i 'bras bu yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar tshogs pa ma yin pas byas pa shin tu 'gal ba yod par ga la 'gyur te / / tshogs pa ma yin pas byas pa'i 'bras bu yang yod pa ma yin no /
yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ, tathāpi hetupratyayasāmagrī tāvadasti / na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti
# ci ste yang 'bras bu med mod kyi / / de lta na yang re zhig rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa ni yod pa yin la / / 'bras bu med par ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa srid pa yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir 'bras bu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate / syāddhetupratyayasāmagrī, yadi phalameva bhavet / yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā / asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'bras bu nyid yod na / / rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa yang yod par 'gyur na / / gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pas 'bras bu nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / 'bras bu yod pa ma yin na / / rkyen gyi tshogs pa ga la yod /
phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ
# 'bras bu med pa nyid yin na rgyu mtshan med pas rkyen gyi tshogs pa dag kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
uktaṃ hi āryalalitavistarasūtre
# 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /
kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ
# mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni / / lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang /
na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate
# lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las min / / re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med /
sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī
# tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni / / yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi /
mana vāca adṛśyarūpiṇī bāhyato 'bhyantari nopalabhyate
# yid dang ngag ni mi snang gzugs med de / / nang dang phyi rol dag na'ang dmigs su med /
utpādavyayaṃ vipaśyato vācarutaghoṣasvarasya paṇḍitaḥ
# mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi / / skye dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na /
kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā
# de tshe ngag kun brag ca lta bu dang / / skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong /
tathā āryopāliparipṛcchāyāmuktaṃ bhagavatā / iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā
# zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni /
phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena / pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ
# khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyis [*gis?] la / / 'bras bu yod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur gyis zhes / / thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad / / khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur nas /
puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ
# 'bras bu thams cad thob par gyur yang ni / / chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas na /
alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām
# 'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med / / 'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob 'gyur ba /
aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena / iti
# kye ma mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yis / / rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces /
tathā āryaprajñāpāramitāyāmaṣṭasāhasrikāyām / tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam / na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam / iti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam
# de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur / / zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang / / koo shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des / / gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o / / tshor ba la ma yin / / 'du shes la ma yin / / 'du byed rnams la ma yin / / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o / / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma yin / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin / / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la ma yin / / rang sangs rgyas nyid la ma yin / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ kālaḥ, saṃbhavavibhavanimittatvāt
# tshogs pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyid shu pa'i 'grel ba'o / / 'dir smras pa / / dus ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid de / / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati, kaṃcitkālaviśeṣamapekṣya vibhavo vināśo bhavati, na sarvadā, vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām
# 'di na myu gu la sogs pa dag dus 'ga' zhig la ltos nas ni 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur la; dus kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la ltos nas ni 'jig cing rnam par 'jig par 'gyur gyi / / rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa yod kyang thams cad kyi tshe ni ma yin no /
ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ, saṃbhavavibhava nimittattvāt
# de'i phyir dus yod pa nyid de / / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
ucyate / syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag nyid yod na ni / / dus 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur na /
na tu staḥ / yathā ca na staḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha / vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai / vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai / iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau anyonyaṃ sahabhāvena vā syātām, vinābhāvena vā
# yod pa ni ma yin no / / ji ltar med la de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / 'jig pa 'byung ba med par ram / / lhan cig yod pa nyid ma yin / / 'byung ba 'jig pa med par ram / / lhan cig yod pa nyid ma yin / / zhes gsungs te / / 'dir gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod par gyur na / / phan tshun med par yod pa'am /
ubhayathā ca vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ / kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha / bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā / vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā
# lhan cig yod par 'gyur ba zhig na / / rnam par dpyad pa na gnyi ga ltar yang yod pa ma yin no / / ji ltar zhe na / / de la 'jig pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar 'byung ba ste skye ba med par yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / 'jig pa 'byung ba med par ni / / ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur / / skye ba med par 'chi bar 'gyur / / 'jig pa 'byung ba med par med / / ces gsungs te /
saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati? kathaṃ nāmetyanena prasiddhamatyantāsaṃbhavaṃ darśayati
# 'jig pa rnam par 'jig pa ni 'byung ba med par ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur / / ji lta bur na zhes bya ba 'dis ni gtan mi srid par grags pa ston par byed pa'o /
kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati, naiva etatsaṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ
# ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur te / / de ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no /
yadi punarvinaiva saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? ucyate / vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ syāt, ajātasya maraṇaṃ syāt
# yang gal te 'byung ba med par 'jig pa yod par 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na / / brjod pa / / skye ba med par 'chi bar 'gyur te / / ma skyes pa 'chi bar 'gyur na /
na ca ajātasya maraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti
# ma skyes par ni 'chi bar yang ma mthong ngo /
tasmādvibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā bhavitumarhati / ādyenātra ślokasyārdhena pratijñā, madhyena pādena prasaṅgāpādanam, antyena nigamanamiti vijñeyam
# de'i phyir 'jig pa 'byung ba med par yod par mi 'os so / / 'dir tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed gong mas ni dam bcas pa yin la / / rkang pa bar mas ni thal ba bsgrubs pa yin zhing / / thams ni mjug bsdus pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha
# de ltar re zhig 'byung ba med par 'jig par mi rigs so zhes bstan nas / / de ni 'jig pa 'byung ba dang lhan cig tu yang ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
saṃbhavenaiva vibhavaḥ kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati
# 'jig pa 'byung dang lhan cig tu / / ji ltar yod pa nyid du 'gyur /
na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate / yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, evaṃ sati janmamaraṇe yugapat syātām
# 'chi ba skye dang dus gcig tu / / yod pa nyid ni ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te 'jig pa 'byung ba dang lhan cig tu ste dus gcig tu cig car yod par 'gyur na ni / / de ltar na 'chi ba dang skye ba dus gcig par 'gyur na /
na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti
# phan tshun 'gal ba de gnyis ni snang ba dang mun pa ltar dus gcig gi tshe yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam
# de'i phyir 'jig pa ni 'byung ba dang lhan cig tu yang grub pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so /
yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha / bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā / anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate / naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate / yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate, kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate
# gang gi tshe de ltar 'jig pa 'byung ba med par ram / / lhan cig tu yang grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'byung ba yang 'jig pa med par ram / / lhan cig tu grub pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / 'byung ba 'jig pa med par ni / / ji ltar yod pa nyid du 'gyur / / dngos po rnams la mi rtag nyid / / nam yang med pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs so / / 'byung ba ni 'jig pa med par mi rigs pa nyid de / / gang gi phyir dngos po 'byung ba'i chos can skye ba'i chos can rnams la mi rtag pa nyid nam yang med pa ma yin gyi /
uktaṃ hi / jarāmaraṇadharmeṣu sarvabhāveṣu sarvadā / tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā
# 'o na ci zhe na / / thams cad kyi tshe yod pa yin te / / dngos po thams cad dus kun du / / rga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na / / gang dag rga dang 'chi med par / / gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin /
iti / yadā caivaṃ nityamanityatānugatāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ, tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi? ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti
# zhes bshad do / / gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po thams cad rtag tu mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa de'i tshe gang 'jig pa dang bral bar gyur ba'i / / gnas skabs de 'ga' yang yod par ga la 'gyur /
evaṃ tāvadvinā vibhavena nāsti saṃbhavaḥ / śeṣamatra saṃskṛtaparīkṣāyāṃ vicāritattvānna vicāryate / yastu sahetuko vināśaḥ, saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt, utpādavat, iti sādhanamutkṣipya antyacittacaittakṣaṇairanaikāntikatāmāha, sa na yuktamāha, tadvināśasyāpi jātipratyayatvena sahetukatvāt sādhyasamatvācca anaikāntikatābhāvāt / yadapi nirdiṣṭam / bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate, tasmād dravyasadutpādasiddhervyavahārato dṛṣṭāntabhāva iti, tadapi na yuktam, adravyasatāṃ pratibimbādīnāṃ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt / yathoktamācāryapādaiḥ / hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye / kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ
# de'i phyir 'jig pa med par 'byung ba srid pa yod pa ma yin no / / de ltar na re zhig 'byung ba 'jig pa med par yod pa ma yin no; ;'di dag gi dpyad pa lhag ma ni 'dus byas brtag par dpyad zin pa'i phyir yang rnam par mi dpyad do / / gang zhig 'jig pa ni rgyu dang bcas pa yin te / / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir skye ba bzhin no zhes sgrub byed bkod pa rjes su brjod nas / / tha ma'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dag gis ma nges par smra ba des ni mi rigs pa smras pa yin te / / de'i 'jig pa yang skye ba'i rkyen can yin pa nyid kyis rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyir dang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir na / / ma nges pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro / / gang yang dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni ma byung ba las byung ba skye ba zhes bya ste / / de'i phyir rdzas su yod pa rnams ni skye bar grub pa'i phyir tha snyad du yang dpe med pa yin no zhes bstan pa de yang mi rigs te / / gzugs brnyan la sogs pa rdzas su med pa rnams rgyu dang bcas pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro / / slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas ji skad du / / gang dag rgyu las 'byung 'gyur zhing / / gang dag de med pas med pa / / de dag gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par / / gsal ba ji lta bur me bzhed /
iti / asmādā[gamāt] kuto vyavahārato dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ? yadi ca bhāvāt, yat tattvānyatvena na śakyate vaktum, tat saṃvṛtyāpi nāstītyucyate
# ces gsungs so / / de'i phyir tha snyad du dpe ma grub pa ga la yod / / gal te yang gang dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par mi nus pa de ni kun rdzob tu yang yod pa ma yin no zhes smra na ni /
nīlādikamapi nāstītyucyate
# sngon po la sogs pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
yathoktaṃ ratnāvalyām / rūpasyābhāvamātratvādākāśaṃ nāmamātrakam
# ji skad du / / gzugs kyi dngos po ming tsam phyir / / nam mkha' yang ni ming tsam mo /
bhūtairvinā kuto rūpaṃ nāmamātrakamapyataḥ
# 'byung med gzugs lta ga la yod / / de'i phyir ming tsam nyid kyang yin /
iti / api ca / kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt? ataḥ ayuktameva dṛṣṭāntāsiddhatodbhāvanam / yaccoktam / na sahetuko vināśaḥ, avināśavattvāt, yathā asaṃskṛtamiti, tasyaivaṃ bruvato mahāntaṃ virodhamayaṃ heturābhavati
# zhes gsungs so / / gzhan yang gang gi gnas skabs kyi khyad par skye bar 'gyur ba / / dbu ma pa rnams la ni dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir dpe ma grub par brjod pa ni mi rigs pa nyid do / / gang yang 'jig pa ni rgyu dang bcas pa ma yin te / / 'jig pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dper na 'dus ma byas bzhin no zhes smra ste / / de skad smra ba de la ni gtan tshigs 'dis 'gal ba chen po 'dren pa yin no /
yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati, evaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvābhāvamapi sādhayati
# ji ltar gtan tshigs 'dis 'jig pa la rgyu med par sgrub par byed pa de ltar 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa yang sgrub par byed do /
tathā saṃskāraskandhasaṃgrahapratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃgrahādikamapi sarvaṃ virodhayatīti na yuktametanmatam

tathā / na vijñānaṃ viṣayasvarūpacchedakam, avijñānavattvāt, asaṃskṛtavat, ityādinā sarvaniṣedhānmahatī aniṣṭāpattirupapadyate 'sya, iti nāstheyametat
# de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni yul gyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod par byed pa ma yin te / / rnam par shes pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas thams cad bkag pa'i phyir 'di la mi 'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur bas 'di gzung bar mi bya'o /
idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha / saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati

na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate / yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt, tadā janmamaraṇayostulyakālatā syāt / na ca [sā] saṃbhavati
# skye ba 'chi dang dus gcig tu / / yod pa nyid ni ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te 'byung ba 'jig pa dang lhan cig yod par gyur na ni / / de'i tshe skye ba dang 'chi bdag dus gcig pa nyid du 'gyur na srid pa yang ma yin no /
tasmāt sahabhāvenāpi saṃbhavavibhavayornāsti siddhiḥ
# de'i phyir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag lhan cig pa nyid du grub pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
atha syāt / yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ, tathāpi vidyete eva saṃbhavavibhavau, vācyatvāt, vijñānavat, iti
# ci ste skye ba dang 'chi ba dag lhan cig gi ngo bo 'am tha dad pa'i ngo bor grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod de / / brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bzhin no snyam na /
ucyate / yadi vācyatvena anayoḥ siddhiriṣyate, vandhyāputrasyāpi iṣyatām
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te brjod par bya ba nyid kyis de dag grub par 'dod na ni / / mo gsham gyi bu yang 'dod par bya'o /
api ca / sahānyonyena vā siddhirvinānyonyena vā yayoḥ / na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate
# gzhan yang / / gang dag phan tshun lhan cig gam / / phan tshun lhan cig ma yin par / / grub pa yod pa ma yin pa / / de dag grub pa ji ltar yod /
sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt / avācyatayā siddhirbhaviṣyatīti cet, keyamavācyatā nāma? yadi miśrībhāvaḥ, so 'nupapannaḥ, pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayo miśrībhāvābhāvāt / anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti / yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tadā taddheturapi kālo nāstīti siddham / kiṃ cānyat / ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha / kṣayasya saṃbhavo nāsti nākṣayasyāpi saṃbhavaḥ
# gang las 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag 'grub par 'gyur ba lhan cig pa nyid dang lhan cig pa nyid ma yin pa las ma gtogs pa phyogs gzhan ni med do / / brjod du med pa nyid du grub par 'gyur ro snyam na / / brjod du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig gal te 'dres par gyur pa yin na de ni mi 'thad de / / so sor ma grub pa dag la 'dres par gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro / / brjod du med pa ni nges par gzung du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhe na / / de lta na ni nges par gzung du med pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo ba sangs dang dkar sham nyid la sogs pa ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro / / gang gi tshe de ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de dag gi rgyu dus kyang med do zhes bya bar grub po; ;gzhan yang 'di na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de dag rtog pa na dngos po zad pa'i chos can nam / / ma zad pa'i chos can zhig la rtog grang na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bya bar bstan pa'i phyir / / zad la 'byung ba yod ma yin /
kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca / tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ
# ma zad pa la'ang 'byung ba med / / zad la 'jig pa yod ma yin / / ma zad pa la'ang 'jig pa med / / ces bya ba gsungs so / / de la zad pa ste dngos po zad pa'i chos can la ni 'gal ba'i chos yod pas 'byung ba rigs pa ma yin no /
akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ / evaṃ kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti / kṣayadharmo hi avidyamānaḥ, tasya nirāśrayo vibhavo na yuktaḥ / tathā vibhavo nākṣayasya ca
# dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ma zad pa la yang 'byung ba rigs pa ma yin te / / bod bu'i rva bzhin no / / de bzhin du / / zad pa la 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te zad pa'i chos can ni med pa yin te / / de la rten med pa'i phyir 'jig pa mi rigs so / / de bzhin du ma zad pa la'ang 'jig pa med de /
akṣayadharmo hi bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇaḥ / tasya avidyamānasya kuto vibhavo bhaviṣyati? yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ, tau na saṃbhavataḥ / iti na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau / atrāha / vidyete eva bhāvānāṃ saṃbhavavibhavau, tadāśrayidharmisadbhāvāt
# ma zad pa'i chos can gyi dngos po ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa yin na / / yod pa ma yin pa de la 'jig pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa gang dag dngos po zad pa dang ma zad pa'i chos can la mi srid pa de dag ni / / yod pa ma yin pa nyid de / / de'i phyir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag med do / / 'dir smras pa / / dngos po rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa ni yod pa nyid de / / de dag gi rten chos can yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha bhāvāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavau, sa ca tāvad bhāvo 'sti, tatsadbhāvāt tadāśritāvapi dharmau bhaviṣyataḥ iti
# 'dir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag ni dngos po la brten pa yin la / / dngos po de yang re zhig yod pa yin no / / de yod pas de la brten pa'i chos dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate / syātāṃ bhāvāśritāvetau dharmau, yadi bhāvaḥ syāt
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te dngos po yod na ni / / dngos po la brten pa'i chos de gnyis yod par 'gyur na /
yadā tu bhāvo nāsti, tadā / saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate
# gang gi tshe dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / dngos po yod pa ma yin par / / 'byung dang 'jig pa yod ma yin /
kasmātpunarbhāvo nāstīti cet, yasmāt / saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate / bhāvasya hi lakṣaṇabhūtau saṃbhavavibhavau, tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau / yadā ca tau bhāvataḥ pratiṣiddhau, tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati? bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau / apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate / staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavau, bhāvadharmatvāt / iha yannāsti, na tasyāsti bhāvadharmatvam, tadyathā maṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇeḥ / bhāvadharmau ca saṃbhavavibhavau,  tasmāt staḥ eva tau iti
# yang ci'i phyir dngos po yod pa ma yin zhe na / / 'di ltar / / 'byung dang 'jig pa med par ni / / dngos po yod pa ma yin no / / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba yin na / / de dag ni bkag pa yin no; ;gang gi tshe bkag pa de'i tshe dngos po'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med par dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / dngos po med na ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag kyang yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan dag ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa yin te / / dngos po'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni dngos po'i chos med de / / dper na sbal pa'i ral pa bzhin no / / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa gnyis ni dngos po'i chos kyang yin no / / de'i phyir de dag yod do zhe na / / 'di la brjod par bya ste /
yadi kasyacit paramārthataḥ saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, sa bhāva iti yuktaṃ syādabhidhātum
# gal te 'ga' zhig la don dam par 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod na ni / / de dngos po zhes bya bar brjod par rigs par 'gyur na /
tau ca na staḥ, iti / saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate / bhāvasya saṃbhavavibhavasattve vidyamānatvāt, iti bhāvaḥ / tadasattve ca hetorasiddhārthatā / tathā / saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate / āśrayasyābhāvādāśritasya asiddhiḥ ityabhisaṃdhiriti / kiṃ cānyat / ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmaśūnyasya vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha
# de dag ni med de / / de'i phyir / / 'byung dang 'jig pa med na ni / / dngos po yod pa ma yin no ste / / dngos po ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod na yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o / / de med na ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i don nyid yin no / / de bzhin du / / dngos po yod pa ma yin par / / 'byung dang 'jig pa yod ma yin te / / rten med pas brten pa ma grub po zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no zhes phyed gang ma phyed 'og mar byas nas rnam par 'chad do / / gzhan yang 'dir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de dag rtog pa na dngos po stong pa'am / / mi stong pa la rtog grang na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do / / zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na śūnyasyopapadyate
# stong la 'byung dang 'jig pa dag / / 'thad pa nyid ni ma yin no /
avidyamānāśrayatvādākāśacitravadityabhiprāyaḥ
# zhes bya ba gsungs te / / rten med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i ri mo bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
tathā / saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva nāśūnyasyopapadyate / aśūnyasya asattvāt nirāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavau nopapadyataḥ / kiṃ cānyat / iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha / saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva naika ityupapadyate / parasparaviruddhayorālokāndhakārayorivaikatvānupapatteḥ
# de bzhin du / / mi stong la yang 'byung 'jig dag / / 'thad pa nyid ni ma yin no / / mi stong pa la yod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir / / rten med pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa 'brad pa yin no / / gzhan yang / / gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod na / / de dag gcig nyid dam gzhan nyid du yod pa zhig na / / gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes gsungs pa ni / / 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / gcig pa nyid ni mi 'thad do; ;snang ba dang mun pa ltar phan tshun 'gal ba dag ni gcig nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na nānetyupapadyate
# 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / gzhan nyid du yang mi 'thad do /
ubhayoḥ parasparamavyabhicāritvāt
# gnyi ga phan tshun mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro /
na hi saṃbhavarahitasya vināśaḥ, na vibhavarahitasya saṃbhavo dṛṣṭa iti
# 'byung ba dang bral ba la ni 'jig pa mi rigs la / / 'jig pa dang bral ba la ni 'byung ba ma mthong ste /
evamubhayoḥ parasparamavyabhicāritvāt
# de ltar na gnyi ga phan tshun mi 'khrul ba'i phyir ro /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na nānetyupapadyate
# 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / gzhan nyid du yang mi 'thad do /
atha syāt / kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati, tasmāt staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau
# ci ste zhib mor brtags pa 'dis ci zhig bya / / gang gi phyir skye bo ba glang rdzi dang bud med yan chad kyis 'byung ba dang 'jig pa mthong ba de'i phyir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa yin te /
na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti
# yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu ni blta bar mi nus so snyam na /
evamapi / dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva vibhavaścaiva te bhavet / ucyate / anaikāntikametat / na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam / tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamānamapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt, evamimāvapi saṃbhavavibhavau asantau mohādeva paśyatītyāha
# gal te de ltar / / 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / mthong ngo snyam du khyod sems na / / 'di ni ma nges pa yin te / / gang dang gang 'jig rten pas mthong ba de dang de yod pa nyid ni ma yin no / / 'di ltar skye bo ba glang rdzi dang bud med yan chad kyis yod pa ma yin yang / / dri za'i grong khyer dang sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang mgal me'i 'khor lo dang smig rgyu'i chu la sogs pa mthong zhing / / dbang po la gnod par gyur pa las rab rib can gyi skra shad dang sbrang ma dang sbrang bu mchu ring sa dag mthong ba yin te / / de bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag kyang med bzhin du mi shes pa'i gti mug gi rab rib can gyi blo'i mig ldongs par byas pas mthong ba yin no zhes bshad pa /
dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohādvibhava eva ca / atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate / avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti / yuktyā hyetadevaṃ niścīyate / kā punaratra yuktiḥ? iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet, niyataṃ sa bhāvādvā jāyeta abhāvādvā
# 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / gti mug nyid kyis mthong ba yin / / zhes bya ba'o / / ci ste 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo can 'di dag gti mug kho nas mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di de ltar cis nges she na / / 'di ni de ltar rigs pas nges pa yin no / / 'dir rigs pa gang yin zhe na / / 'dir gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de nges par dngos po'am dngos po med pa las skye ba zhig yin /
tathā yadi abhāvo nāma kaścit, so 'pi bhāvādvā jāyeta abhāvādvā
# de bzhin du gal te dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de yang dngos po'am dngos po med pa las skye ba zhig yin grang na /
ubhayathā ca ubhayorapyasaṃbhavaḥ ityāha / na bhāvājjāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvānna jāyate
# gnyis char gnyi ga ltar yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa / / dngos po dngos las mi skye ste / / dngos po dngos med las mi skye /
nābhāvājjāyate 'bhāvo 'bhāvo bhāvānna jāyate / bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate, kāryakāraṇayoryaugapadyābhāvāt, utpādasya ca labdhajanmanaḥ punarutpādavaiyarthyāt / abhāvādapi bhāvo na jāyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? abhāvo hi nāma vibhavo vināśaḥ
# dngos med dngos med mi skye ste / / dngos med dngos las mi skye'o / / re zhig dngos po ste yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po ste yang dag par 'byung ba las skye ba yod pa ma yin te / / rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis dus gcig pa med pa'i phyir dang skye ba rnyed zin pa'i skye ba la yang skye ba don med pa'i phyir ro / / dngos po ni dngos po med pa las kyang mi skye'o / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig cing rnam par 'jig pa yin la /
sa ca bhāvaviruddhaḥ
# de yang dngos po dang 'gal ba yin te /
tasmādbhāvaviruddhāt kathaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt? yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt / na caitadevamiti
# dngos po dang 'gal ba de'i phyir de las dngos po ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur / / gal te 'gyur na ni mo gsham gyi bu mo las kyang bu skye bar 'gyur ro /
tasmādabhāvādapi bhāvo na bhavati / idānīmabhāvo 'pyabhāvānna bhavati / bhāvanivṛttirūpo hi abhāvaḥ, tata kuto 'sya kāryakaraṇasāmarthyam? yadi syāt, nirvāṇasyāpi kāryakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ syāt / yadi ca abhāvādabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt / na caitadevamiti / tasmādabhāvādapyabhāvo na bhavati / idānīṃ bhāvādapyabhāvo na bhavati / bhāvaviruddho hyabhāvaḥ / sa kathaṃ bhāvādbhavet
# de'i phyir dngos po ni dngos po med pa las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no / / da ni dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa las mi 'byung ste / / dngos po med pa ni dngos po log pa'i rang bzhin can yin te / / de'i phyir de la 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa ga la yod / / gal te yod na ni mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'bras bu skyed pa'i mthu yod par 'gyur ro / / gal te dngos po med pa las dngos po med pa 'byung bar 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe mo gsham gyi bu mo las kyang bu skye bar 'gyur na / / de ni de ltar yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir dngos po med pa ni / / dngos po med pa las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no / / da ni dngos po med pa dngos po las kyang mi 'byung ste / / dngos po med pa ni dngos po dang 'gal ba yin na / / de ji ltar dngos po las 'byung bar 'gyur /
yadi bhavet, pradīpādandhakāraḥ syāt
# gal te 'gyur na ni sgron ma las kyang mun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
yataścaivaṃ vicāryamāṇau saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tasmānmohādeva lokena dṛśyete iti vijñeyam
# gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par dpyad na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir gti mug nyid kyis mthong pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
athavā / ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ / iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau bhāvāśrayau vā syātāmabhāvāśrayau vā
# rnam pa gcig tu na phyogs snga ma 'di gzhan yin no / / 'di ltar 'dir gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod na ni / / de dag dngos po la brten pa'am / / dngos po med pa la brten par 'gyur ba zhig na /
tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ / tataśca kuto nirāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavāviti? ataḥ / dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohādvibhava eva ca / iti vijñeyam / yathā ca bhāvābhāvau na saṃbhavataḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha / na bhāvājjāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvānna jāyate
# dngos po dang dngos po med pa de gnyis ni rnam par dpyad pa na / / thams cad du yod pa ma yin te de'i phyir rten med pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dgag la yod / / de'i phyir / / 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / gti mug nyid kyis mthong ma yin / / zhes bya bar shes par bya'o / / dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / dngos po dngos las mi skye ste / / dngos po dngos med las mi skye /
nābhāvājjāyate 'bhāvo 'bhāvo bhāvānna jāyate / asyārthaḥ pūrvavat / api ca / yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt, tasya udayavyayavattvāt saṃbhavavibhavau syātām / na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato 'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt
# dngos med dngos med mi skye ste / / dngos med dngos las mi skye'o / / zhes gsungs te / / 'di'i don ni gong ma bzhin no / / gzhan yang gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de skye zhing zang pa dang ldan pas 'byung ba dang 'jig par 'gyur na / / dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te / / bong bu'i rva ltar rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ro /
anutpannatvamasiddhamiti cet, tat siddham, yasmāt / na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate / na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ / etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate / yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate? naiva kutaścijjāyate ityabhiprāyaḥ / avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam / sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti / bhāvasadbhāvatābhyupagame ca bhavataḥ śāśvatocchedadarśanamāpadyate bauddhamatānugasyetyāha / bhāvamabhyupapannasya śāśvatocchedadarśanam / prasajyate / yasmāt, / sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet / yo hi yathoditapadārthavyavasthāmatikramya bhāvasadbhāvadarśanamabhyupaiti, tasya avaśyaṃ pravacanātyantaviruddhaṃ śāśvatocchedadarśanadvayamāpadyate
# ma skyes pa nyid ma grub po zhe na / / ma grub pa ma yin te / / 'di ltar / / dngos po bdag las mi skye ste / / gzhan las skye ba nyid ma yin / / bdag dang gzhan las skye ba na / / yod min ji ltar skye bar 'gyur / / 'di ni rab tu byed pa dang por rnam par bshad zin pa'i phyir yang mi bshad do / / gang gi phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa dag gis skye ba yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de ji ltar skye bar 'gyur te / / ji ltar yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / dngos po skye ba rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o / / de lta ma yin na ni / / dngos po yod par khas blangs na / / rtag dang chad par lta bar ni / / thal bar 'gyur te / / gang gi phyir / / dngos po de ni / / rtag dang mi rtag 'gyur phyir ro / / gang zhig dngos po'i rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bshad pa las 'das nas dngos por lta ba khas len pa de ni gdon mi za bar gsung rab dang shin tu 'gal ba rtag pa dang chad par lta bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir dngos po de brtags pa na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
yadi nityaḥ, tadā niyataṃ śāśvatavādaḥ / atha anityaḥ, tadā niyatamuccheda iti
# gal te rtag pa yin na ni de'i tshe nges par rtag par smra bar 'gyur la / / 'on te mi rtag pa yin na ni de'i tshe nges bar chad par smra bar 'gyur ro /
atrāha / bhāvamabhyupapannasya naivocchedo na śāśvatam
# 'dir smras pa / / dngos po yod par khas blangs kyang / / chad par mi 'gyur rtag mi 'gyur /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt / udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa hi
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / 'bras bu rgyu yi 'byung 'jig gi / / rgyun de srid pa yin phyir ro /
yo hi hetuphalayorudayavyayānuprabandhaḥ, sa hi asmākaṃ bhavaḥ saṃsāraḥ
# rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyun gang yin pa de ni kho bo cag gi srid pa ste 'khor ba yin no /
tatra yadi heturnirudhyeta, taddhetukaṃ phalaṃ notpadyeta, tadā syāducchedavādadoṣaḥ
# de la gal te rgyu 'gags shing de'i rgyu can gyi 'bras bu mi skye na ni / / de'i tshe chad par 'gyur la /
yadi ca heturna nirudhyeta, svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhet, tadā syācchāśvatavādadarśanadoṣaḥ / na caitadevamiti / tasmād bhāvābhyupagame 'pi nāsti śāśvatocchedadarśanadoṣadvayaprasaṅgaḥ / sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo 'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti / ato nāsti asmākamayaṃ doṣa iti
# gal te rgyu mi 'gag cing rang gi ngo bos gnas na ni / / de'i tshe rtag par thal bar yang 'gyur na de ni de ltar yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir dngos po khas blangs su zin kyang rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba yod pa ma yin no / / 'du byed rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyun rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par ma chad par rim par 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid 'khor ba yin te / / de'i phyir kho bo cag la nyes pa 'di yod pa ma yin no /
ucyate / udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa cet / nanu evamapi / vyayasyāpunarutpatterhetūcchedaḥ prasajyate / yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate, nanu tasya vyayavato hetukṣaṇasya punaranutpādāducchedadarśanamāpadyate
# brjod par bya ste / / gal te 'bras rgyu'i 'byung 'jig gi / / rgyun de srid pa yin gyur na / / de lta na yang / / 'jig la yang skye med pa'i phyir / / rgyu ni chad par thal bar 'gyur / / ma yin nam / / gang rgyu'i skad cig ma 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la rgyur gyur nas 'gag pa / / rgyu'i skad cig ma 'jig pa dang ldan pa de yang mi skye ba'i phyir chad par lta bar 'gyur ro /
tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet, bhāvamabhyupapannasya ayaṃ doṣaḥ / na ca mayā bhāvo 'bhyupagataḥ, svabhāvānutpannatvāt sarvadharmāṇām
# khyod la skyon 'dir ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na / / dngos po khas len pa la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur gyi / / ngas ni dngos po khas ma blangs te / / chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir ro /
yatrāpi mayā / pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat / na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchedo nāpi śāśvatam / ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam / anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt? tasmānnāyaṃ prasaṅgo 'smākaṃ bādhaka iti
# gang du / / gang la brten te gang 'byung ba / / de ni re zhig de nyid min / / de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir / / de phyir chad min rtag ma yin / / zhes bshad pa der yang kho bos tshul 'dis dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par bstan pa yin te / / de lta ma yin te / / dngos po rang gi ngo bo yod na ni sa bon dang myu gu dag gzhan nyid du ji ltar mi 'gyur / / de'i phyir thal ba 'di kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha
# de ltar re zhig dngos po yod par khas len na rgyu yang skye ba med pa'i phyir chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ba brjod nas / / da ni rtag pa'i nyes par thal bar brjod pa'i phyir /
sadbhāvasya svabhāvena nāsadbhāvaśca yujyate / yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt, tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt / tataśca śāśvatadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ tadavastha eva
# dngos po ngo bo nyid yod na / / dngos med 'gyur bar mi rigs so / / zhes bya ba smos te / / gal te rgyu rang bzhin gyis yod par gyur na ni / / de phyis yod pa ma yin par mi 'gyur te / / rang bzhin la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir rtag par lta bar thal ba son 'dug go /
kiṃ cānyat / nirvāṇakāle cocchedaḥ praśamādbhavasaṃtateḥ
# gzhan yang / / mya ngan 'das pa'i dus na chad / / srid rgyun rab tu zhi phyir ro /
yadyapi hetuphalayorudayavyayasaṃtānapravṛttyā śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ parihriyate, tathāpi yatrāsya saṃtānasya punarapyapravṛttiḥ, tatra nirvāṇe niyatamucchedadarśanamāpadyate
# gal te yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyun 'jug pas rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba spong bar byed mod kyi / / de lta na yang gang du rgyun de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba mya ngan las 'das pa der ni nges par chad par lta bar 'gyur na /
ucchedadarśanaṃ ca prahātavyamityuktaṃ bhagavatā / evaṃvidhamucchedadarśanaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti cet, anyadapi kimarthaṃ bhavatā bhaviṣyatīti bhāvavicchedālambanatvāt, nirvāṇakāle bhāvavicchedālambanavadityabhiprāyaḥ / yaccoktam / udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa hi / iti, tadapi nopapadyate / kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi caramo bhavo nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ, prathamo gatipratisaṃdhilakṣaṇaḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chad par lta ba spang bar bya ba gsungs so / / rnam pa de lta bu ni chad par lta ba yin par mi 'gyur ro zhe na / / khyod la gzhan yang ci'i phyir yin par 'gyur te / / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su dngos po rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa ltar / / dngos po rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o / / gang yang / / 'bras bu rgyu yi 'byung 'jig gi / / rgyun de srid pa yin phyir ro / / zhes smras pa de yang mi 'thad de / / ji ltar zhe na / / 'dir srid pa tha ma ni ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la / / dang po ni 'gro ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can no /
tatra caramo bhavo nirudhyamāno hetutvenāvatiṣṭhate
# de la srid pa tha ma 'gag bzhin pa ni rgyu nyid du gnas pa yin la /
upapattilakṣaṇastu prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavatiṣṭhate
# skye ba'i mtshan nyid can srid pa dang po ni 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas pa yin te /
anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā
# srid pa de gnyis la 'khor ba zhes ming du btags pa yin no /
atra ca idaṃ vicāryate
# 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ba ste /
ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate, sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate, athāniruddhe, uta nirudhyamāne, yato hetuphalānuprabandhāt saṃsāraḥ syāt? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha / carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ
# gang las rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ba / / srid pa dang po 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par gnas pa gang yin pa de ci srid pa tha ma 'gags pa'am / / 'on te ma 'gags pa'am de ste 'gag bzhin pa na skye grang / / rnam par dpyad na rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / tha ma 'gags par gyur pa na / / srid pa dang po rigs mi 'gyur /
carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ
# tha ma 'gags par ma gyur tshe / / srid pa dang po rigs mi 'gyur / / zhes gsungs so /
tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate, tadā nirhetuka syāt
# de la gal te srid pa tha ma 'gags pa ni srid pa dang po skye'o zhes rtog na ni / / de'i tshe rgyu med par 'gyur zhing /
dahanadagdhabījādapi aṅkurodayaḥ syāt
# sa bon tshig pa las kyang myu gu skye bar 'gyur na /
na caitadiṣṭam / tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate
# de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir tha ma 'gags pa na srid pa dang po mi rigs so /
idānīmaniruddhe 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate
# da ni srid pa tha ma ma 'gags pa na yang srid pa dang po rigs par mi 'gyur te /
yadi syāt, nirhetukaḥ syāt, dvirūpatā ca ekasya sattvasya syāt, apūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaśca, pūrvasya ca nityatā syāt, avinaṣṭe ca bīje aṅkurodayaḥ syāt
# gal te 'gyur na ni rgyu med pa dang sems can gcig la ngo bo gnyis yod pa dang sngon med pa'i sems can 'byung ba dang snga ma rtag pa nyid dang sa bon ma zhig pa la myu gu skye bar 'gyur na /
na caitadevamiṣṭamiti / ataḥ / carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ
# de dag ni de ltar yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir / / tha ma 'gags par ma gyur tshe / / srid pa dang po rigs mi 'gyur ro /
iti sthitam / idānīṃ nirudhyamāne 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha / nirudhyamāne carame prathamo yadi jāyate
# da ni srid pa tha ma 'gag bzhin pa na yang ji ltar srid pa dang po mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te tha ma 'gag bzhin na / / dang po skye bar 'gyur na ni /
nirudhyamāna ekaḥ syājjāyamāno 'paro bhavet / tatra nirudhyamāno vartamāno vartamānapratyayāntavācyatvāt, jāyate ityapi vartamāna evocyate vartamānaśabdavācyatvāt / athavā nirudhyamāno nirodhakriyākārakaḥ
# 'gag bzhin pa ni gcig 'gyur zhing / / skye bzhin pa yang gzhan du 'gyur / / zhes gsungs so / / de la 'gag bzhin pa ni da ltar ba ste / / da ltar ba'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyis brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / skye bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bas kyang da ltar ba nyid brjod de / / da ltar ba'i sgra'i brjod bya yin pa'i phyir ro / / yang na 'gag bzhin pa ni 'gag pa'i bya ba byed pa po yin la /
yaścāpi jāyate, asāvapi janikriyākārakaḥ, tau ca ekakālāviṣyamāṇau yaugapadyenaiva staḥ
# skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yang skye ba'i bya ba byed pa po yin te / / de dag dus gcig par 'dod pa na cig car du yod par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir 'gag bzhin pa ni srid pa gcig tu 'gyur zhing /
tataśca nirudhyamānaḥ eko bhavaḥ syāt, jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ / na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat / tadevaṃ yathoktena vicārakameṇa / na cennirudhyamānaśca jāyamānaśca yujyate / sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate / caśabdaḥ samuccayārthaḥ / pṛthakpṛthak ceti etatsaṃnidhāpayati / yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, aniruddhe 'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt / yeṣu skandheṣu sthito mriyate, teṣveva jāyate iti atyantaviruddhametat / na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam / tat / evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā / bhavadabhimatā / bhavasaṃtatiḥ / carame bhave niruddhe 'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, tasmāt triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavasaṃtirnāsti / triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ / yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti, kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ / tataśca yaduktam / udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa hi / iti, tanna yuktam / tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām, ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham / yathoktamāryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake / tathā / bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro / na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā / mudrātpratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate / na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra anucchedaśāśvatāḥ / ata evoktamāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ / svādhyāyadīpamudrādarpaṇaghoṣārkakāntabījāmraiḥ / skandhapratisaṃdhirasaṃkramaśca vidvadbhiravadhāryau / iti / tathā bhagavān / jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ / yasya vijānata eṣa samādhirnāsya durlabhaḥ / iti / tathā / sūsukhitā sada te nara loke yehi acintiya jñātibhi dharmāḥ / na ca dharma adharma vikalpo cittapapañca vibhāvita sarvi / bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvamacintayi sarvamabhūtam / ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāste dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu
# skye bzhin pa yang gzhan du 'gyur bas / / srid pa gnyis dus gcig pa nyid du 'gyur na / / gcig la cig car gnyis yod pa yang ma yin pas 'di ni mi rigs so / / de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul gyis / / gal te 'gag bzhin skye bzhin dag / / lhan cig tu yang rigs min na / / phung po gang la 'chi 'gyur pa / / de la skye ba'ang 'byung 'gyur ram / / 'ang gi sgra ni bsdu ba'i don du ste / / de dag so so so sor 'jog par byed pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis tha ma 'gags pa na srid pa dang po 'byung ba ma yin zhing / / tha ma ma 'gags par srid pa dang po 'byung ba ma yin la / / srid pa tha ma dang lhan cig ste dus gcig tu yang srid pa dang po 'byung ba ma yin na / / da ni / / phung po gang la 'chi 'gyur ba / / de la skye ba'ang 'byung 'gyur ram / / phung po gang dag la gnas pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag nyid la skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu 'gal ba yin no / / 'di ltar 'chi bzhin pa ni skye bar ma mthong ngo / / de'i phyir / / de ltar dus gsum dag tu yang / / srid pa'i rgyun ni mi rigs na / / gang gi phyir srid pa tha ma 'gags pa dang ma 'gags pa dang 'gag bzhin pa ni srid pa dang po yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir / / dus gsum char du yang srid pa'i rgyun yod pa ma yin no / / dus gsum dag tu gang med pa / / de ni ji ltar srid pa'i rgyun / / gang zhig dus gsum dag tu yod pa ma yin pa de bdag nyid gzhan gyis yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du srid pa'i rgyun yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir / / 'bras bu rgyu yi 'byung 'jig gi / / rgyu de srid pa yin phyir ro / / zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs pa smras pa yin no / / de'i phyir dngos po yod par khas len na rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba de nyid bzlog par dka' ba yin no / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes bya bar grub po / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / srid gsum rmi lam dang 'dra snying po med / / myur du 'jig cing mi rtag sgyu ma bzhin / / 'ong ba med cing 'di nas 'gro ba'ang med / / rgyun rnams rtag tu stong zhing mtshan ma med / / ces bya ba dang de bzhin du / / skye ba dang ni 'chi 'gyur yang / / skye ba med cing 'chi med par / / gang gis shes par gyur ba yin / / ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka' / / zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du / / gang dag bsam yas chos rnams 'di shes pa / / mi rnams de dag rtag tu bde ba yin / / chos dang chos min rnam rtog med pa ste / / thams cad sems kyi spros pas phye ba yin / / thams cad bsam yas thams cad 'byung min pas / / dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par bshig / / byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba / / de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal /
yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ / akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāste ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ
# zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa /
śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ / cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān / iti
# srid pa'i rgyun ni yod pa nyid de / / de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'di na bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs med pa gsum mam bdun du bar chad med pa'i tshul gyis brtson pa /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā nāma ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / tathāgataparīkṣā dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva bhavasaṃtatiḥ, tathāgatasadbhāvāt / iha hi bhagavatā mahākaruṇopāyaprajñādvayadhāriṇā sakalatraidhātukāśeṣasattvajātyādiduḥkhavyupaśamaikamanasā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ saptabhirvā nairantaryakrameṇodyacchatā taistairniratiśayairativicitraiḥ puṇyakriyāprārambhaiḥ sakalajagaddhitodayaikakriyālakṣaṇaiḥ priyaikaputrādapyadhikataraniravaśeṣajagadanugrahatatpareṇa mahākaruṇāparavaśena tatratatropapattyāyatane kṣitisalilajvalanapavanasādhāraṇabhaiṣajyamahāmahīruhavajjanānāṃ svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam / sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate / yadi bhavasaṃtatirna syāt, tadā tathāgato 'pi na syāt / na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum / tasmādvidyata eva bhavasaṃtatiḥ, tathāgatasadbhāvāditi / ucyate / bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca gamayati, yasya nāma bhavataḥ atimahadajñānadhanāndhakārameva vicitrairupapattiśaraccandrajñānālokairvidhvasyamānamapi aticiratarakālābhyāsavāsanāvistarābhivṛddhamadyāpi na vidhvasyate na nivartate / yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ, tadā tasya mahatā kālenābhiniṣpatterbhavasaṃtatiḥ syāt / na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate / kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate / yathā ca tathāgato nāsti svabhāvataḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha / skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ / tathāgataḥ skandhavānna katamo 'tra tathāgataḥ / yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho 'malo niṣprapañcaḥ syāt, sa skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavet, rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākhyaskandhapañcakasvabhāvo vā bhavet / yadi vā śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanākhyapañcaskandhasvabhāvaḥ, tadvayatirikto vā bhavet / pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare, avyāpakatvādeṣāṃ pūrvakairantarbhāvita tvāditi / yadi vā pañcaskandhavyatirikto bhavet, tatra tathāgate vā skandhāḥ syuḥ, skandheṣu vā sa bhavet, tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati
# bsod nams bya ba rtsom pa phul du dbyung du med pa / / 'gro ba la phan pa 'byung ba'i bya ba gcig pu'i mtshan nyid can rnam pa sna tshogs pa de dang de dag gis 'gro ba / / bu gcig pa phangs pa bas kyang ches lhag pa ma lus pa rjes su 'dzin pa lhur mdzad pa / / thugs rje chen po'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa / / 'khrungs pa'i gnas de dang der sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang sman gyi ljon shing thun mong ba ltar bdag nyid kyang 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi 'dod pas longs spyad par bya bar gyur par mdzad pas dus ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa yin la / / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid ji ltar gnas pa de ltar ma lus par mkhyen zhing thugs su chud pa nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do / / de'i phyir gal te srid pa'i rgyun med na ni / / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod par mi 'gyur te / / skye ba gcig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid brnyes par mi dpyod do / / de'i phyir srid pa'i rgyun yod pa nyid de / / de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra'o / / brjod par bya ste / / gang gi mi shes pa shin tu chen po 'thas pa'i snang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de lta bu dag gis bzlog tu zin kyang shin tu yun ring por goms pas da rung yang mi zlog cing mi 'jig pa / / khyod kyis mi shes pa shin tu chen po 'di nyid srid pa'i rgyun rnam par chad pa med par 'jug pa dang ches ring bar go bar byed pa yin no / / gal te 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig rang bzhin gyis yod na ni / / de'i tshe dus ring pos mngon par grub pa'i phyir srid pa'i rgyun yod par 'gyur na / / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig dngos po'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa yang ma yin te / / khyod kyi ma rig pa'i rab rib chen pos blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis zla ba gnyis la sogs pa ltar log par de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do / / gang gi tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de'i srid pa'i rgyun yod par ga la 'gyur / / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / phung min phung po las gzhan min / / de la phung med der de med / / de bzhin gshegs pa phung ldan min / / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig yin / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dngos po 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de phung po'i rang bzhin te / / gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba phung po lnga'i rang bzhin nam / / tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba'i phung po lnga'i rang bzhin nam / / de gnyis las tha dad par 'gyur ba zhig na; snga ma'i phung po lnga po nyid / / sems can du gdags pa'i rgyu yin pas rnam par dpyad pa 'dir bzung gi / / phyi ma dag ni ma yin te / / 'di dag khyab par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang snga ma'i khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir ro / / gal te phung po lnga las tha dad pa yin na ni / / de bzhin gshegs pa de la phung po yod pa'am / / phung po de dag la de yod pa'am / / lha sbyin nor dang ldan pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phung po dang ldan par 'gyur grang na / / rnam pa thams cad du dpyad pa na yod pa ma yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam? uktaṃ hi
# ji ltar zhe na / / de la re zhig phung po nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
yadindhanaṃ sa cedagnirekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ
# bud shing gang de me yin na / / byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur /
bhavediti, tadihāpi yojyam, / sa buddho yo hyupādānamekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ / bhavediti / tathā / ātmā skandhā yadi bhavedudayavyayabhāgbhavet
# zhes bshad pa dang nyer len gang de sangs rgyas na / / byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur / / zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya la / / de bzhin du / / gal te phung po bdag yin na / / skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur /
ityuktam, tadihāpi yojyam, / buddhaḥ skandhā yadi bhavedudayavyayabhāgbhavet / iti
# zhes bshad pa dang gal te phung po sangs rgyas na / / skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur / / zhes 'dir yang sbyar bar bya'o /
evaṃ tāvat skandhā na tathāgataḥ
# de ltar na re zhig phung po de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no /
idānīṃ nānyaḥ skandhebhyastathāgata iti / kiṃ kāraṇam? uktaṃ hi / anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādaṣyṛte bhavet / tathā / paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ
# da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phung po dag las gzhan pa yang ma yin te / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gal te shing las me gzhan na / / shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir / / 'bar bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung /
punarārambhavaiyarthyamevaṃ cākarmakaḥ sati
# rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur / / de lta yin na las kyang med /
iti, / tathā ihāpi yojyam, / buddho 'nyaścedupādānādupādānaṃ vinā bhavet
# ces bshad pa de bzhin du / / 'dir yang / / gal te nyer len sangs rgyas gzhan / / nyer len med par 'byung bar 'gyur /
tathā / paratra nirapekṣatvādanupādānahetukaḥ / punarārambhavaiyarthyamevaṃ cākarmakaḥ sati
# zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir / / nye bar len rgyu las mi 'byung / / rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur / / de lta yin na las kyang med / / ces bya bar sbyar bar bya'o /
tathā / skandhebhyo 'nyo yadi bhavedbhavedaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ / iti / anyatvābhāvācca skandhādīnāṃ tathāgatasya ca, tathāgate skandhā nopapadyante
# de bzhin du / / gal te phung po rnams las gzhan / / phung po'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur / / zhes bya bar yang sbyar bar bya'o / / phung po la sogs pa dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa la gzhan nyid med pa'i phyir na / / de bzhin gshegs pa la phung po dag yod pa mi 'thad cing /
nāpi skandheṣu tathāgata iti upapadyate
# phung po dag la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa zhes bya ba yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
uktaṃ caitanmadhyamakāvatāre pakṣadvayavyākhyānam / skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt / satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā / skandhavānapi tathāgato yathā na bhavati, tathā tatraivoktam / iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmādātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ / bhede gomān rūpavānaṣyabhede tattvānyatve 'rūpato nātmanaḥ staḥ
# phyogs gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa 'di ni / / 'dir bdag phung po la med phung 'di dag / / bdag la yod pa ma yin gang gi phyir / / gzhan nyid yod na rtog pa 'dir 'gyur na / / gzhan nyid de med de phyir 'di rtog go / / zhes dbu ma la 'jug pa las bshad pa yin no / / de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dang ldan pa yang ji ltar ma yin pa de ltar ni / / bdag 'dod gzugs ldan ma yin gang gi phyir / / bdag med de phyir ldan don dang 'brel min / / tha dad phyugs ldan tha mi dad gzugs ldan / / de nyid gzhan du bdag med dngos med phyir /
tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ
# zhes de nyid du bshad zin to / / dngos sun phyogs lnga po de dag de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs nyid kyi nang du 'dus mod kyi /
satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam
# 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'jug pa la ltos nas phyogs lnga po slob dpon gyis gsungs so zhes shes par bya'o /
yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ, sa kenānyena ātmanā bhaviṣyatīti, sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ
# de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig de ltar phung po dag la rnam pa lngas dpyad pa na yod pa ma yin pa de bdag nyid gang gis yod par 'gyur te / / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin par gzigs shing /
katamo 'tra tathāgata iti / nāstyeva sa kaścit sakalatrailokyavastuvipaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityabhiprāyaḥ / tathāgatābhāvācca bhavasaṃtatirapi dravyasaṃtatirnāstīti siddham / atraike vadanti / naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ, yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgāt / nāpi skandhavyatiriktaḥ
# slob dpon gyis / / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig yin / / zhes gsungs te / / de ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya bar dgongs so / / de bzhin gshegs pa med pa'i phyir na srid pa'i rgyun yang med do zhes bya bar grub po / / 'dir kha cig na re / / ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur bas de phung po de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes kyang mi smra la / / phung po las tha dad par yang ma yin zhing /
nāpi tathāgate anāsravān skandhān varṇayāmaḥ, himavati parvate iva tarukhaṇḍam
# ri gangs can la shing gi tshogs ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la phung po dag yod par yang mi smra la / / nags khrod na seng ge ltar phung po dag la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yang ma yin zhing /
nāpi skandheṣu, tarukhaṇḍe eva siṃham / nāpi skandhavantaṃ varṇayāmaḥ, lakṣaṇavantamiva cakravartinam, ekatvānyatvānabhyupagamādeva
# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa ltar / / de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dang ldan par yang mi smra ste / / gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid khas blangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ
# 'o na ci zhe na / / phung po la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa zhig rnam par 'jog pa yin te /
tasmānnāyaṃ vidhirasmākaṃ bādhaka iti
# de'i phyir tshul 'di ni kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes smra'i /
atrocyate / buddhaḥ skandhānupādāya yadi nāsti svabhāvataḥ
# 'di la brjod par bya ste / / gal te sangs rgyas phung po la / / brten nas rang bzhin las yod min /
svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ
# rang bzhin las ni gang med pa / / de gzhan dngos las ga la yod /
yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ prajñapyate, na tarhi svabhāvataḥ so 'stīti vyaktamāpadyate, pratibimbavadupādāya prajñapyamānatvāt
# gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod pa med pa zhig phung po la brten nas 'dogs na / / 'o na ni phung po la brten nas brtags pa'i gzugs brnyan ltar rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro /
yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa, sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate
# gang zhig de ltar rang bzhin las te rang gi ngo bos med cing / / rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin pa de ji ltar phung po la brten nas gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par 'gyur / / yod pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo can gyi mo gsham gyi bu ni /
atha syāt / yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānamapi parabhāvaṃ mukhādarśādikamapekṣya bhavati, evaṃ ca tathāgato 'pi svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ anāsravān pañca skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti, evamapi / pratītya parabhāvaṃ yaḥ so 'nātmetyupapadyate / yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ
# gzhan gyi dngos po la ltos nas yod par mi rigs so / / ci ste ji ltar gzugs brnyan rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin yang / / bzhin dang me long la sogs pa gzhan gyi dngos po la ltos nas yod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin yang phung po la brten nas gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par 'gyur ro snyam na / / de lta na yang / / gang zhig gzhan gyi dngos brten nas / / de bdag nyid du mi 'thad do / / gang zhig bdag nyid med pa de / / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur /
yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate, evaṃ sati pratibimbavadeva sa tathāgato 'nātmetyupapadyate
# gal te gzugs brnyan ltar gzhan gyi dngos po la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'dod na ni / / de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa de gzugs brnyan ltar bdag nyid ces bya bar mi 'thad cing /
na tu svabhāvata iti yujyate / ātmaśabdo 'yaṃ svabhāvaśabdaparyāyaḥ
# rang bzhin zhes bya bar mi rigs te / / bdag nyid kyi sgra 'di ni rang bzhin gyi rnam grangs yin no /
yaśca anātmā niḥsvabhāvaḥ pratibimbavadeva, sa kathaṃ tathāgataḥ svabhāvarūpato bhaviṣyati? aviparītamārgagato na bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ
# gang zhig gzugs brnyan ltar bdag nyid med cing rang bzhin med pa de ji ltar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te / / phyin ci ma log pa'i lam nas gshegs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
kiṃ cānyat / iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt, taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ syāt / yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha / yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet / yadā caivaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tadā / svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāmṛte kaḥ sa tathāgataḥ / padārtho hi bhavan svabhāvo bhavet, parabhāvo vā / tābhyāṃ tu vinā ko 'sau aparaḥ padārtho 'sti, yastathāgata iti vyavasthāpyate? tasmānnāsti svabhāvatastathāgata iti / kiṃ cānyat / skandhān yadyanupādāya bhavetkaścittathāgataḥ / sa idānīṃmupādadyādupādāya tato bhavet / yadi manyase / skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti, tat kadā yujyate? yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet, sa skandhānupādadyāt / vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute, tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt, sa idānīṃ skandhānupādadyāt, tataśca tān skandhānupādāya tato bhavet / vicāryamāṇastu sarvathā / skandhāṃścāpyanupādāya nāsti kaścittathāgataḥ / nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt / yaśca nāstyanupādāya sa upādāsyate katham / avidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ / yadā caivaṃ na kiṃcidapyupādatte, tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate / yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte, tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha / na bhavatyanupādattamupādānaṃ ca kiṃcana / yadā caivamupādānaṃ kenacidapyanupādīyamānatvādupādānaṃ na bhavatīti, tadā upādānābhāvādupādātāpi kaścinnāstīti pratipādayannāha / na cāsti nirupādānaḥ kathaṃcana tathāgataḥ / iti / tadevaṃ yathopapāditanyāyena / tattvānyatvena yo nāsti mṛgyamāṇaśca pañcadhā / upādānena sa kathaṃ prajñapyeta tathāgataḥ / yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti, anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti, evaṃ tattvānyatvāsatvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣapañcaprakārairmṛgyamāṇo  yo nāsti, sa kathamatyanto 'saṃvidyamānastathāgataḥ upādānena śakyaḥ prajñapayitum? ityato 'pi nāsti tathāgato nāma svabhāvataḥ / na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti, / yadapīdamupādānaṃ tatsvabhāvatvānna vidyate / yadapi idamupādānaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākhyaṃ skandhapañcakam, tadapi svabhāvena na vidyate, pratītyasamutpannatvāt, skandhaparīkṣāyāṃ ca vistareṇa pratiṣiddhatvāt / athāpi syāt / yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti, tathāpi hetupratyayātmakāt parabhāvā dbhaviṣyatīti, tadāpi nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha / svabhāvataśca yannāsti kutastatparabhāvataḥ / na hi bandhyāsūnuḥ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ śakyaḥ parabhāvena prajñapayitumiti / ataḥ upādānamapi nāsti / athavā / yadapīdamupādānaṃ tatsvabhāvānna vidyate / upādātṛsāpekṣatvādupādātṛnirapekṣasya ca upādānatvābhāvānnāsti svabhāvasiddhamupādānam / atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati, evaṃ tadupādātrapekṣameva bhavatviti / ucyate / evamapi / svabhāvataśca yannāsti kutastatparabhāvataḥ / svabhāvato yadupādānaṃ na siddham, tadavidyamānasvabhāvaṃ kathamupādātuḥ parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti / tasmādupādānamapi nāstīti / idānīṃ yathāprasādhitamevārthamupadarśayannāha / evaṃ śūnyamupādānamupādātā ca sarvaśaḥ / sarveṇa prakāreṇa vicāryamāṇaṃ śūnyamupādānaṃ niḥsvabhāvam, upādātā ca śūnyaḥ svabhāvarahitaḥ / tenedānīmupādānena / prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyastathāgataḥ / naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi / tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate / atrāhuḥ / aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam, ye hi nāma vayaṃ svavikalpavikalpitātikaṭhinakudarśanamālutālatājālāvabaddheṣu nirvāṇapuragāmyaviparītamārgagamanaparibhraṣṭeṣu anatikrāntasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgeṣu kaṇabhakṣākṣapādadigambarajaimininaiyāyikaprabhṛtiṣu tīrthakareṣu aviparītasvargāpavargamārgopadeśābhimāniṣu spṛhāṃ parityajya niravaśeṣānyatīrthyamatāndhakāropaghātakaṃ svargāpavargānugāmyaviparītamārgasaṃprakāśakaṃ saddharmadeśanātipaṭutarakiraṇavyāptāśeṣāśāmukhaṃ vividhavineyajanamatikamalakuṅmalavibodhanatatparaṃ  yathāvadavasthitapadārthatattvārthabhājanānāmamalaikacakṣurbhūtaṃ sakalajagaccharaṇyabhūtamadvitīyaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmāmalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāyānamahānayasārathivaraṃ saptabodhyaṅgottuṅgaturaṃgapadātiyojitaṃ sakalatribhuvanajanajātijarāmaraṇasaṃsārakāntārasariducchoṣaṇatatparaṃ caturasamamārārātisamaraśarasaṃpātavijayinaṃ sakalajagadasadgrāharāhugrahavigrahodgrahanirāsinaṃ tathāgatasavitāramajñānadhanagahanāndhakāranirākaraṇāya mokṣārthino 'tuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyarthinaḥ śaraṇaṃ pratipannāḥ, tasya ca tvayā / evaṃ śūnyamupādānamupādātā ca sarvaśaḥ / prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyastathāgataḥ / ityādinā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamābhilāṣaḥ iti / tadalaṃ bhavatā tathāgatamahādityapracchādakena ākālikadhanadhanāvalīvisaraṇena jagadandhakāropameneti / ucyate / asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ pratipadya paramagambhīramanuttaraṃ sarvatīrthyavādāsādhāraṇaṃ nairātmyasiṃhanādamasahamānāḥ kuraṅgamā iva svādhimuktidaridratayā vividhakudṛṣṭivyālamālākulaṃ
