viparyastajanānuyātaṃ tameva mahāghorasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāracārakānugamārgamavagāhante / na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti / yathoktaṃ bhagavatyām / buddho 'pyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ / buddhadharmā apyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ / iti / tathā / dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā / yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya / iti / na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ, yadasmākaṃ tadapavādakṛto doṣaḥ syāt / api ca / niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā / śūnyamiti na vaktavyamaśūnyamiti vā bhavet / ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti / sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ / kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena  śūnyamityapi brūmaḥ, aśūnyamityapi, śūnyāśūnyamityapi, naiva śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamityapi brūmaḥ / ata evāha / prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate / iti / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena / nirnimittāḥ sarvadharmā nirnimittatāmupādāya / apraṇihitāḥ sarvadharmā apraṇidhānayogena / prakṛtiprabhāsvarāḥ sarvadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhayā / iti / anyatra aśūnyamuktam / atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tītaṃ rūpamabhyanandiṣyat / yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ asti atītaṃ rūpam, tasmādāryaśrāvakaḥ śrutavānatītaṃ rūpamabhinandatīti / anāgataṃ cedbhikṣavaḥ / ityādi / evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat / ityādi pūrvavat / tathā sautrāntikamate atītānāgataṃ śūnyam, anyadaśūnyam / viprayuktā vijñaptiḥ śūnyā / vijñānavāde 'pi kalpitasvabhāvasya śūnyatvam, apratītyasamutpannatvāt, taimirikadvicandrādi darśanavat / na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate / [tathā] sattvādasattvācca madhyamā pratipacca sā / iti / yena tvabhiprāyeṇa śūnyatvādikamupadiśyate, sa ātmaparīkṣāto boddhavyaḥ / yathoktaṃ sūtre / māyopamaṃ jagadidaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ vihitam / nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ / śūnyaṃ ca śāntamanupādamayaṃ avijānadeva jagadudbhramatī / teṣāmupāyanayayuktiśatairavatārayasyapi kṛpālutayā / rāgādibhiśca bahurogaśataiḥ saṃtrāsitaṃ sakalamīkṣi jagat / vaidyopamo vicarase 'pratimo parimocayaṃ sugata sattvaśatān / rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ / mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram / iti / sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti / na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, api ca / śāśvatāśāśvatādyā kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam / antānantādi cāpyatra kuntaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam / iha caturdaśa avyākṛtavastūni bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni / tadyathā / śāśvato lokaḥ, aśāśvato lokaḥ, śāśvataśca aśāśvataśca lokaḥ, naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataśca lokaḥ, iti catuṣṭayam / antavān lokaḥ, anantavān lokaḥ, antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, naiva antavān na anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, iti dvitīyam / bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, iti tṛtīyam / sa jīvastaccharīram, anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīram, iti / tānyetāni caturdaśa vastūni avyākṛtatvādavyākṛtavastūni ityucyante / tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śāśvatāśāśvatādikamapi catuṣṭayamatra na saṃbhavati
# gzhan yang / / gal te 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de'i tshe de'i rang bzhin la ltos nas phung po'i rang bzhin gzhan gyi dngos por 'gyur la / / gzhan gyi dngos po de la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe phung po rnams gzhan nyid du ga la 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / / gal te rang bzhin yod min na / / gzhan dngos yod par ji ltar 'gyur / / gang gi tshe de ltar rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag med pa de'i tshe / / rang bzhin dang ni gzhan dngos dag / / ma gtogs de bzhin gshegs de gang / / dngos po yin na rang bzhin gzhan gyi dngos por 'gyur gyi / / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag pa de gnyis las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po gzhan de gang zhig yod / / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med do / / gzhan yang / / gal te phung po ma brten par / / de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga' yod na / / de ni da gdod brten 'gyur zhing / / brten nas de las 'gyur la rag / / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa zhig phung po dag la brten nas 'dogs so snyam du sems na ni / / de la gal te phung po rnams la ma brten par te ma bzung bar sngar de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod cing phung po la brten nas gyur pa de'i tshe rigs te / / 'di ltar sngar nor las tha dad par grub pa'i lha sbyin ni nor len par byed pa yin no / / de bzhin du gal te phung po la ma brten par de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de da gzod phung po dag la brten par 'gyur zhing / / phung po de dag la brten nas 'gyur la rag na / / rnam pa thams cad du dpyad pa na / / phung po rnams la ma brten par / / de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga' yang med de rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / gang zhig ma brten yod min na / / de ni ji ltar nyer len 'gyur / / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / gang gi tshe de ltar phung po cung zad kyang mi len pa de'i tshe / / phung po la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi 'thad do / / gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de nye bar len pa'i snga rol du med pas cung zad kyang mi len pa de'i tshe sus kyang nye bar ma blangs pas de'i nye bar len pa yang nye bar len pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / nye bar blangs pa ma yin par / / nye bar len par cis mi 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / gang gi tshe de ltar sus kyang ma blangs ba'i phyir nye bar len pa nye bar len par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe nye bar len pa med pas nye bar len pa po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / nye bar len pa med pa yi / / de bzhin gshegs pa ci yang med / / ces bya ba gsungs so / / de'i phyir de ltar / / ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis / / rnam pa lngas ni btsal byas nas / / gang zhig de nyid gzhan nyid du / / med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de / / nye bar len par ji ltar gdags / / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig dpyad cing btsal bar byas pa na / / gang zhig phung po dag las de nyid de gcig tu med cing / / phung po dag las gzhan nyid du ste tha dad pa nyid du med la / / gang zhig de nyid dang gzhan nyid du med pas rten dang brten pa dang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs rnam pa lngas btsal ba na med cing gtan yod pa ma yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de nye bar len pas ji ltar gdags par nus / / de'i phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med do / / rnam par dpyad pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa kho na med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / 'on kyang / / gang zhig nye bar blangs pa de / / de ni rang bzhin las yod min / / gang zhig nye bar blangs pa gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba phung po lnga po de yang rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin te / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang phung po brtag par rgyas par bgag pa'i phyir ro / / ci ste yang nye bar blang ba'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang / / rgyu dang rkyen gyi bdag nyid can gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par 'gyur ro snyam na / / de yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / bdag gi dngos las gang med pa / / de gzhan dngos las yod re skan / / zhes gsungs te / / mo gsham gyi bu bdag gi dngos po las yod pa ma yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos pos gdags par nus pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir nye bar blangs pa yang med do / / rnam pa gcig tu na / / gang zhig nye bar blangs pa de / / de ni rang bzhin las yod min te / / nye bar len pa po la ltos pa'i phyir dang nye bar len pa po la ma ltos pa la nye bar blang ba nyid med pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bos grub pa'i nye bar blang ba yod pa ma yin no / / ci ste gal te nye bar blang ba nye bar len pa po la ma ltos pa'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa yod pa ma yin na / / 'o na ni de lta na nye bar len pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / / de lta na yang / / bdag gi dngos las gang med pa / / de gzhan dngos las yod re skan / / nye bar blang ba gang zhig bdag gi dngos po las ma grub cing yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin de nye bar len pa po gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par ji ltar 'gyur / / de'i phyir nye bar blang ba yang med do zhes bya ba'o / / da ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa'i don nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir / / de ltar nyer blangs nyer len po / / rnam pa kun gyis stong pa yin / / zhes gsungs te / / rnam pa thams cad kyis dpyad pa na / / nye bar blangs pa stong pa ste rang bzhin med cing nye bar len pa po stong zhing rang bzhin dang bral ba yin no / / da ni nye bar blangs pa de / / stong pas de bzhin gshegs stong pa / / ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur / / yod pa ma yin pa'i nye bar blangs pas yod pa ma yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'dogs so zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir phung po dag la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / ae ma ma la kho bo cag gi re thag bcad do / / 'di ltar gang kho bo cag ni gzegs zan dang rkang mig dang phyogs kyi gos can dang rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa rang gi rnam par rtog pas brtags pa'i lta ba ngan pa'i lcug ma shin tu srin te'i dra bas gtums pa / / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam phyin ci ma log pa las nyams pa / / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa'i lam shin tu bgrod par dka' bas ma brgal pa / / mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam phyin ci ma log par bstan par mngon par rlom pa dag la dga' ba spangs nas / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma gzhan mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi mun pa ma lus par sel bar mdzad pa / / mtho ris dang byang grol dang mthun pa'i lam phyin ci ma log par ston par mdzad pa / / dam pa'i chos ston pa'i 'od zer shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi ngos ma lus par khyab par mdzad pa / / gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i blo'i padma'i tshogs kha 'byed pa lhur mdzad pa / / dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyi don ji ltar gnas pa bzhin bstan pa'i snod du gyur pa rnams kyi dri ma med pa'i mig gcig pur gyur pa / / 'gro ba mtha' dag gi zla med pa'i skyabs su gyur pa / / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mnga' ba la skyabs su song zhing thar pa don du gnyer ba yin na / / da lta ni / / de ltar nyer blang nyer len po / / rnam pa kun gyis stong pa yin / / stong pas de bzhin gshegs stong pa / / ji lta bur na 'dogs par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med par smras pas kho bo cag gi thar pa'i re thag bcad pa yin no / / de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsi sman chen po'i ljon shing rtsad nas 'don pa khyod dang brtsad pas chog go / / brjod par bya ste / / 'dir khyod lta bu'i skye bo la kho bo cag gi re thag chad pa yin no / / 'di ltar gang khyod ni thar pa 'dod pas gzhan mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs dag dor nas phyin ci ma log par ston pa po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su song yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mchog tu zab pa mu stegs can gyi smra ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa mi bzod pa na / / rang gi lhag par mos pas bkren pa nyid kyis lam lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i sbrul gyis dkrugs pa / / skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pas rjes su bgrod pa / / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa mi zad pa dang rjes su mthun pa de nyid nas song ba yin no / / de bzhin gshegs pa ni nam yang bdag dang phung po rnams yod pa nyid du mi gsung ngo / / ji skad du / / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o / / tshe dang ldan pa 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so / / kho bo cag ni gang las kho bo cag la de skad du skur pa btab pas byas pa'i nye sa par 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med pa dag nyid du mi smra'o / / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin med par ston zhing phyin ci ma log pa'i don brjod par 'dod pas ni; stong ngo zhes kyang mi brjod de / / mi stong zhes kyang mi bya zhing / / gnyis dang gnyis min mi bya ste / / 'di dag thams cad brjod par bya ba ma yin mod kyi / / 'on kyang ma brjod na rtogs pa po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par mi nus te / / de'i phyir kho bo cag tha snyad kyi bden pa la gnas nas tha snyad kyi don du gdul bya'i skye bo'i ngor ltag par sgro btags nas stong pa zhes kyang smra la mi stong pa zhes bya ba dang stong pa yang yin la mi stong pa yang yin zhes bya ba dang stong pa yang ma yin la mi stong pa yang ma yin pa zhes kyang smra'o / / de nyid kyi phyir / / gdags pa'i don du brjod par bya / / zhes gsungs te / / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gis stong pa nyid la sogs pa bstan pa de ni bdag brtags pa las khong du chud par bya'o / / ji skad du mdo las / / khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / / zlos gar lta dang rmi lam lta bu dang / / bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med / / chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla lta bur mkhyen / / stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul / / mi shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur ba / / de dag thugs rje mnga' bas thabs tshul dang / / rigs pa brgya dag gis ni 'dzud par mdzad / / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / rtogs pa 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med ba la mnga' ba yin no / / de bzhin gshegs pa la stong pa nyid la sogs pa bzhi po mi mnga' ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / gzhan yang / / rtag dang mi rtag la sogs bzhi / / zhi ba 'di la ga la yod / / mtha' dang mtha' med la sogs bzhi / / zhi ba 'di la ga la yod / / 'dir / / bcom ldan 'das kyis lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi bstan pa yin no / / 'di lta ste / / 'jig rten rtag go / / 'jig rten mi rtag go / / 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go / / 'jig rten rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni bzhi tshan dang po'o / / 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten mtha' dang mi ldan pa dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang yin / / 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o / / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod do / / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad med do / / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod pa yang yin la med pa yang yin no / / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o / / lus de srog yin / / srog de lus yin / / srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan yin zhes bya ba ste / / dngos po bcu bzhi po 'di dag ni brda sprod par bya ba ma yin pas lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po zhes bya'o / / de la ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid la sogs pa bzhi po de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la ji ltar mi mnga' ba de bzhin du / / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhi yang de la mi mnga'o /
asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya / yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, evamantānantādikamapi śānte tathāgate na saṃbhavati
# mi mnga' ba nyid kyi phyir mo gsham bu'i sngo bsangs dang dkar sham nyid ltar 'jig rten la bzhi po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung du ma bstan pa yin no; ;bzhi po 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar mi mnga' ba de bzhin du mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga'o /
idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava mudbhāvayannāha
# da ni de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa bzhi po yang 'jug pa yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
yena grāho gṛhītastu ghano 'stīti tathāgataḥ
# gang gis de bzhin gshegs yod ces / / 'dzin pa stug pos gzung gyur pa /
nāstīti sa vikalpayannirvṛtasyāpi kalpayet / yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ, parikalpa utpāditaḥ, saḥ niyataṃ parinirvṛte tathāgate, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, maraṇāduttarakālaṃ na bhavati, ucchinnastathāgataḥ, na saṃvidyate, iti parikalpayet
# de ni mya ngan 'das pa la / / med ces rnam rtog rtog par byed / / ces gsungs te / / gang gis mngon par zhen pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yod do zhes bya bar 'dzin pa chen pos stug pos bzung zhing yongs su rtog pa bskyed pa de ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la / / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad de grongs nas dus phyis med cing de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun chad la de bzhin gshegs pa mi bdog pa yin no zhes rtog par byed do /
tasya evaṃ vikalpayataḥ syād dṛṣṭikṛtam
# de ltar rtog pa de la ni lta bar byas par 'gyur ro /
yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya astitvanāstitvam, tasya pakṣe
# gang gi ltar na rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir gnas skabs 'ga' yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyogs la ni; rang bzhin gyis ni stong de la / / sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das nas ni /
svabhāvataśca śūnye 'smiṃścintā naivopapadyate / paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā / ākāśe citrarūpakalpanāvadeṣā kalpanā nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ
# yod do zhe 'am med do zhes / / bsam pa 'thad pa nyid mi 'gyur / / nam mkha' la ri mo'i gzugs rtog pa ltar rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o / / de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing /
tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatādikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā kalpanayā
# rang bzhin med pa spros pa thams cad las 'das pa las blo zhan pa nyid kyis rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa ste / / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang yod pa dang med pa dang stong pa dang mi stong pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dang thams cad mi mkhyen pa la sogs par rtog pa dang gang dag sangs rgyas spros 'das shing /
prapañcayanti ye buddhaṃ prapañcātītamavyayam / te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam
# zad pa med la spros byed pa / / spros pas nyams pa de kun gyis / / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur / / spros pa mi dngos po'i rgyu can yin na /
vastunibandhanā hi prapañcāḥ syuḥ, avastukaśca tathāgataḥ / kutaḥ prapañcānāṃ pravṛttisaṃbhava iti? ataḥ prapañcātītastathāgataḥ / anutpādasvabhāvāvācca svabhāvāntarāgamanādavyayaḥ / tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti, te svakaireva prapañcairhatāḥ santaḥ tathāgataguṇasamṛddheratyantaparokṣavartino bhavanti / tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam
# de bzhin gshegs pa dngos po med pa la spros pa rnams 'jug pa ga la yod de / / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa las 'das pa yin no / / skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rang bzhin gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i phyir zad pa med pa'o / / gang dag rnam par rtog pa log pa de rang gis brtags pa'i dri mas sems dri ma can du byas pas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de lta bu da spros par byed pa de dag la ni rang gi spros pa dag gis nyams par gyur pas / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa lkog tu gyur par gnas par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir ro dang 'dra ba de dag gis gsung rab 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te / / dmus long gis nyi ma bzhin no /
ata evāha bhagavān / ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ
# de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis / / gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong / / gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa /
mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ
# log par spong bar zhugs pa ste / / skye bo de dag nga mi mthong /
dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ / dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum / iti / tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ
# sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta / / 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku / / chos nyid shes bya ma yin te / / de ni shes par nus ma yin / / zhes gsungs so; ;de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa brtag pa 'dir sems can gyi 'jig rten brtag pa byas pa yin no /
yathā cāyaṃ sattvaloko niḥsvabhāvaḥ, tathā bhājanalokasyāpi vāyumaṇḍalāderakaniṣṭhavitānabhavanaparyantasya naiḥsvābhāvyamudbhāvayannāha / tathāgato yatsvabhāvastatsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat / idaṃ jagaditi ayaṃ bhājanaloka ityarthaḥ / kiṃsvabhāvastathāgataḥ punarityāha / tathāgato niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat / iti / yathā ca jagato naiḥsvābhāvyam, tathā pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ pratipāditam / ata evoktaṃ sūtre / anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ / nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke / tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya / naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke / iti / uktaṃ ca bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām / atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan / kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat
# sems can gyi 'jig rten 'di ji ltar rang bzhin med pa de ltar / / snod kyi 'jig rten yang rang bzhin med pa yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gang / / de ni 'gro 'di'i rang bzhin yin / / de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin med / / 'gro ba 'di yis rang bzhin med / / ces bya ba gsungs te / / 'gro ba ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yin pa de ltar ni rkyen brtags pa la sogs pa dag gis bstan to / / de nyid kyi phyir mdo las / / rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs / / chos rnams kun kyang bde bar gshegs dang 'dra / / byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams / / 'jig rten na ni med pa'i chos la spyod / / de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa med pa yi / / dge ba'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yin / / 'di ni de bzhin dang de gshegs pa med / / 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni gzugs brnyan mthong / / zhes gsungs so / / bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang / / de nas lha'i bu de dag gis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so / / 'phags pa rab 'byor ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin gyi sgyu ma ma yin nam / / de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so /
māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ, svapnopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ
# lta'i bu dag sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o / / lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram
# lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang sems can de dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do /
iti hi svapnaśca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram
# de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can de dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do /
sarvadharmā api devaputrā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ
# lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
strotaāpanno 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ
# rgyun du zhugs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
strotaāpattiphalamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamam
# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyapi sakṛdāgāmiphalamapi / anāgāmyapi anāgāmiphalamapi / arhannapi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ / arhattvaphalamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamam
# de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o / / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
pratyekabuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ
# rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
pratyekabuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamam
# rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ iti
# yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
samyaksaṃbuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi
# yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan
# de nas lha'i bu de dag gis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so /
samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti, samyaksaṃbuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti āryasubhūte vadasi? subhūtirāha
# 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'am / / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra 'am /
nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam? devaputrā āhuḥ / nirvāṇamapyāryasubhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? subhūtirāha
# rab 'byor gyis smras pa / / lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur smra na / / chos gzhan lta ci smos / / lha'i bu dag gis smras pa; 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu zhes smra 'am /
yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadeyam / iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / viparyāsaparīkṣā trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / vidyata eva bhavasaṃtatiḥ, tatkāraṇasadbhāvāt / iha hi kleśebhyaḥ karma pravartate / karmakleśahetukā janmamaraṇaparaṃparā upajāyate
# rab 'byor gyis smras pa / / lha'i bu dag kho bo ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig yod na yang / / de yang bdag sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o / / de ltar na rmi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / de bzhin gshegs pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir smras pa / / srid pa'i rgyun ni yod pa nyid de / / de'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'di na nyon mongs pa rnams las ni las 'byung zhing / / las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu can skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang nye bar zhi nga skye bar 'byung la /
sā ca bhavasaṃtatirvyapadiśyate
# de yang srid pa'i rgyu nyid du rtog go /
tasyāśca pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kleśāḥ, prahīṇakleśānāṃ bhavasaṃtaterabhāvāt / te ca rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ santi / tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate / syād bhavasaṃtatiḥ, yadi taddhetubhūtāḥ kleśāḥ syuḥ
# rgyun du bsnyad do / / de'i gtso bo'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin te / / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dag la de med pa'i phyir ro / / nyon mongs pa 'dod chags la sogs pa de rnams ni yod pa yin te / / de'i phyir 'bras bur 'gyur ba srid pa'i rgyun yang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te de'i rgyur gyur pa nyon mongs pa dag yod na ni / / srid pa'i rgyun yang yod par 'gyur na / / yod pa ni ma yin no /
na tu santi / kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha bhagavadbhirbuddhaiḥ sakalatribhuvanajanasaṃkleśaśatruvidhvaṃsibhiścaturmārārātisamaraparājayaiḥ / saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate / śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya hi / saṃkalpo vitarkaḥ / saṃkalpāt prabhavatīti saṃkalpaprabhavaḥ / kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase / na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi / iti gāthābhidhānāt / saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate / etanmūlakatvādanyeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ mukhyatvādeṣāmevopādānaṃ trayāṇām / ete ca trayaḥ kleśāḥ / śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya hi / tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate, aśubhaṃ pratītya dveṣaḥ, viparyāsān pratītya moha utpadyate / saṃkalpastu eṣāṃ trayāṇāmapi sādhāraṇakāraṇamutpattau / kathaṃ punarmohaḥ saṃkalpaprabhavaḥ? ucyate
# ji ltar zhe na / / 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis / / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams / / kun tu rtog las 'byung bar gsungs / / sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log / / brten pa nyid las kun du 'byung / / kun tu rtog pa ni rtog pa'o / / kun tu rtog pa las 'byung bas na kun tu rtog pa las 'byung ba'o / / 'dod pa khyod kyi rtsa ba ni / / shes te kun tu rtog las skye / / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir / / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams / / kun tu rtog las 'byung bar gsungs so / / 'di dag kho na nye bar bzung bas ni / / nyon mongs pa gzhan rnams 'di dag gi rgyu can yin pas gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro / / nyon mongs pa gsum po de dag ni / / sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log / / brten pa nyid las kun tu 'byung ste / / de la yul sdug pa'i rnam pa la brten nas ni 'dod chags 'byung la / / mi sdug pa la brten nas zhe sdang 'byung ngo / / phyin ci log la brten nas ni gti mug 'byung ngo / / kun tu rtog pa ni de dag gsum char yang bskyed par bya ba la rgyu thun mong pa yin no / / yang ji ltar gti mug kun tu rtog pa las 'byung zhe na /
uktaṃ hi pratītyasamutpāde bhagavatā / avidyāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidānā
# brjod par bya ste bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las dge slong dag ma rig pa ni rgyu dang bcas pa gzhi dang bcas pa rkyen dang bcas pa'o /
kaśca bhikṣavaḥ avidyāyā hetuḥ? ayoniśo bhikṣavo manaskāro 'vidyāyā hetuḥ / āvilo mohajo manaskāro bhikṣavo 'vidyāyā hetuḥ
# dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu gang zhe na / / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du yid la byed pa rnyog pa can ni gti mug las skye ba yin no zhes gsungs so /
ityataḥ avidyā saṃkalpaprabhavā bhavati
# de'i phyir ma rig pa dang kun tu rtog pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
tataśca / śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya ye
# de'i phyir / / gang dag sdug dang mi sdug dang / / phyin ci log la brten 'byung ba /
te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ / iti
# de dag rang bzhin las med de / / de phyir nyon mongs yang dag med /
yadi rāgādayaḥ svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ, naiva te śubhāśubhaviparyāsān pratītya saṃbhaveyuḥ, svabhāvasya akṛtrimatvāt paranirapekṣatvācca
# gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin na ni / / rang bzhin ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir / / de rnams sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log la brten nas mi 'byung ba zhig na /
bhavanti ca śubhāśubhaviparyāsān pratītya, tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva te
# sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log la brten nas 'byung ba yang yin te / / de'i phyir de dag rang bzhin med pa nyid yin gyi /
tattvato na vidyante, paramārthataḥ svabhāvato na vidyante ityarthaḥ
# yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin te / / don dam par rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
api ca / ātmano 'stitvanāstitvena kathaṃcicca sidhyataḥ
# gzhan yang / / bdag gi yod nyid med nyid ni / / ji lta bur yang 'grub pa med /
taṃ vināstitvanāstitve kleśānāṃ sidhyataḥ katham
# de med nyon mongs rnams kyi ni / / yod nyid med nyid ji ltar 'grub /
ātmano yathā astitvanāstitve na staḥ, tathā uktaṃ vistareṇa / tataśca
# bdag gi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid dag ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni rgyas par bshad zin to /
tadāśritasya dharmasya kuto 'stitvanāstitve bhaviṣyataḥ?
# de'i phyir de la brten pa'i chos kyi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
atha syāt / yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ, tadā kimatra kleśānāmāyātam, yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti? ucyate / kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati
# ci ste gal te bdag gi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid med pa de'i tshe gang las de rnams kyi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid dag med par 'gyur ba / / 'dir nyon mongs pa rnams las ci zhig 'byung snyam na / / brjod pa / / nyon mongs 'di dag gang gi yin / / de yang 'grub pa yod pa yin /
kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit
# 'ga' med pa ni gang gi yang / / nyon mongs pa dag yod ma yin /
iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakvatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante
# 'dir nyon mongs pa 'di dag rtsig ngos kyi ri mo dang 'bras bu smin pa nyid bzhin du bskyed bar bya ba brten pa la ltos pa yin no /
tataśca kasyacidete bhavanti, na vinā kaṃcidāśrayam / sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet
# de'i phyir 'di dag gang zhig gi yin par 'gyur gyi rten 'ga' zhig med par ni ma yin no / / rten de yang brtags pa na bdag gam sems shig yin pa zhig na /
sa caiṣāmāśrayaḥ pūrvameva pratiṣiddhatvānnāsti
# de dag gi rten de ni sngar bkag zin pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no /
taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā bhavantu? naiva kasyacidbhavanti, tasyāvidyamānatvāt, āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit / atrāha / naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho 'bhyupagamyate / na ca ātmā nāma kaścidasti, yaḥ āśrayatvena vyavasthāpyeta, nirhetukatvād vyomacūtataruvat
# rten de 'ga' yang med par ni gang gi nyon mongs pa yin par 'gyur / / de med pa nyid kyi phyir gang gi phyir yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa / / 'ga' med par ni gang gi yang / / nyon mongs pa dag yod ma yin / / 'dir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rten sngar grub pa ni 'ga' yang khas mi len la; gang zhig rten nyid du rnam par gzhag pa bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te / / rgyu med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i aa mra'i shing bzhin no / / 'o na ci zhe na /
kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante, tacca cittaṃ sahaiva kleśairupajāyata iti
# nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la brten nas nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur la / / sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig skye'o zhes zer ro /
etadapi na yuktamityāha / svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā
# 'di yang mi rigs so zhes bshad pa / / rang lus lta zhing nyon mongs rnams / / nyon mongs can la rnam lngar med /
svakāyadṛṣṭivat kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi na pañcadhā
# rang lus lta zhig nyon mongs can / / nyon mongs pa la rnam lngar med /
svakāyo hi nāma rūpādilakṣaṇasaṃhatiḥ
# rang lus zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshogs so /
svakāyadṛṣṭiḥ svakāye ātmadṛṣṭiḥ ātmīyākāragrahaṇapravṛttā
# rang gi lus la lta ba ni rang lus lta ste / / bdag dang bdag gi ba'i rnam par 'dzin par zhugs so /
yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati, / skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ / tathāgataḥ skandhavānna katamo 'tra tathāgataḥ / ityanena / evaṃ kliṣṭe 'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti
# ji ltar 'di / / phung min phung po las gzhan min / / de la phung med der de med / / de bzhin gshegs pa phung ldan min / / zhes bya ba 'dis rnam pa lngar dpyad pa na / / rang gi lus la yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam pa lngar dpyad pa na nyon mongs pa can la yod pa ma yin no /
tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam / tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatvaprasaṅgāt / anyat kliṣṭam, anye kleśā iti na yujyate / paratra nirapekṣatvāt, akliṣṭahetuka kleśaprasaṅgāt / ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam, na kliṣṭe kleśāḥ, nāpi kleśavat kliṣṭam / ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti
# de la nyon mongs par byed pas ni nyon mongs pa rnams so / / nyon mongs par bya bas na nyon mongs pa can no / / de la nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa de nyid nyon mongs pa rnams yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te / / sreg pa po dang bsreg par bya ba dag kyang gcig nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro / / nyon mongs pa can yang gzhan la nyon mongs rnams kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya bar yang mi rigs te / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyu las ma byung bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / de nyid dang gzhan nyid med pa de nyid kyi phyir / / rten dang brten pa dang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs rnams med pas nyon mongs pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can med la / / nyon mongs pa can la nyon mongs pa rnams med cing / / nyon mongs pa can nyon mongs pa rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin no / / de ltar na rnam pa lngas dpyad pa na /
yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti, evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati / na hi kleśā eva kliṣṭam, kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaprasaṅgāt, nānye kleśā anyat kliṣṭam, nirapekṣatvaprasaṅgāt, na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam, na kliṣṭavantaḥ  kleśāḥ / ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti / yataścaivam, ataḥ parasparāpekṣayāpi kleśākliṣṭayornāsti siddhiḥ / atrāha / yadyapi tvayā kleśāḥ pratiṣiddhāḥ, tathāpi kleśahetavaḥ śubhāśubhaviparyāsāstāvat santi, tatsadbhāvācca kleśāḥ santīti / ucyate / syuḥ kleśāḥ, yadi śubhāśubhaviparyāsā eva syuḥ, yāvatā ete 'pi pratītya sasutpannatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca / yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā / svabhāvato na vidyante śubhāśubhaviparyayāḥ / pratītyasamutpannatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca / yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā / pratītya katamān kleśāḥ śubhāśubhaviparyayān / naiva santi kleśāḥ, taddhetuśubhāśubhaviparyayābhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ
# nyon mongs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can la yod pa ma yin no; ;ji ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyu can nyon mongs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu can gyi nyon mongs pa can yang rnam pa lngas dpyad pa na nyon mongs pa rnams la yod pa ma yin no / / 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams nyid nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin te / / byed pa po dang las dag gcig pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro / / nyon mongs pa rnams kyang gzhan la / / nyon mongs pa can gzhan pa yang ma yin te / / ltos pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / nyon mongs pa can la nyon mongs pa rnams med la / / nyon mongs pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can med cing / / nyon mongs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can dang ldan pa yang ma yin no / / de ltar na rang gi lus la lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa can yang nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam pa lngar yod pa ma yin no / / gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa can dag phan tshun ltos nas grub pa yang yod pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang khyod kyis nyon mongs pa rnams bkag mod kyi / / de lta na yang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log dag ni re zhig yod pa yin no / / de yod pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log dag nyid yod na / / nyon mongs pa rnams yod par 'gyur na / / gang gi phyir / / sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log / / de dag kyang rang bzhin las ni yod min na ste / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang dgag pa chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe de ltar rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log / / brten nas nyon mongs gang dag yin / / de'i rgyu sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log rnams med pas nyon mongs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o /
atrāha / vidyanta eva kleśāḥ, tadālambanasadbhāvāt
# 'dir smras pa / / nyon mongs pa rnams ni yod pa nyid de / / de dag gi dmigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha hi yannāsti, na tasyālambana masti, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ / asti ca rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmākhyaṃ ṣaḍvidhamālambanam
# 'dir yang gang med pa de la ni dmigs pa yod pa ma yin te / / dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no / / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos zhes bya ba dmigs pa rnam pa drug ni yod pa yin te /
tasmādālambanasadbhāvādvidyanta eva kleśā iti / ucyate
# de'i phyir dmigs pa yod pas nyon mongs pa rnams yod pa nyid du brjod par bya ste khyed cag gis /
astyetat, yad bhavadbhiḥ / rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāśca ṣaḍvidham / vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate
# gzugs sgra ro dang reg pa dang / / dri dang chos dag rnam drug ni / / bzhi ste 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / / gti mug gis ni yin par brtags pa gang yin pa de ni yod do /
tatra vastu ālambanam, vasatīti vā asmin rāgādikam, tadutpatteḥ iti kṛtvā / tacca tadālambanaṃ ṣoḍhā bhavati, indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ paricchedakarāṇāmanyonyabhedāt / rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti / tatra idamihāmutreti nirūpaṇāt, rūpaṇācca rūpam / tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ / gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato 'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ / rasyate āsvādyate iti rasaḥ / spṛśyate iti sparśaḥ / svalakṣaṇāsādhāraṇānnirvāṇāgradharmādhāraṇāddharmāḥ
# de la de las skye ba'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa 'dir gnas pas bzhi ste dmigs pa'o / / dmigs pa de yang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos zhes bya ba dang drug tu 'gyur te / / yongs su gcod par byed pa dbang po drug phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / de la 'di ni 'di na'o / / pha gi ni pha gi na'o zhes nges par brtag tu rung ba'i phyir dang / / gzugs su rung bas na gzugs so / / 'dis don sgrogs shing ston par byed pas na sgra'o / / brngub cing bsnam par bya bas ni dri dag ste / / gang du phyin pa de las gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro / / bro zhing ro myang bar bya bas na ro'o / / reg par bya bas na reg pa'o / / rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ram / / chos kyi mchog mya ngan las 'das pa 'dzin pas na chos so /
tadetat ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu bhavati / kasya? rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya / tatra rañjanaṃ rāgo raktiradhyavasānam
# rnam pa drug po de dag gzhi yin no / / gang gi zhe na / / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi'o / / de la 'gal bas na 'dod chags te / / chags pa dang lhag par zhen pa'o /
rajyate vā anena cittamiti rāgaḥ / dūṣaṇaṃ doṣaḥ, āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo 'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ
# yang na 'dis sems dga' bar byed pas na 'dod chags so / / sun 'byin pas na zhe sdang ste / / kun nas mnar sems pa'o / / yang na 'dis sems sun 'byin par byed pas na zhe sdang ngo /
mohanaṃ mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ padārthasvarūpāparijñānam / muhyate vā anena cittamiti mohaḥ
# gti mug pas na gti mug ste / / kun nas gti mug pa'o / / yang na 'dis sems gti mug tu byed pas ni gti mug go /
tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati
# de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa drug ni nyon mongs pa 'di dag gi gzhi ste / / dmigs pa yin no /
tatra śubhākārādhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate, aśubhākārādhyāropeṇa dveṣaḥ, nityātmādyadhyāropeṇa mohaḥ saṃbhavatīti / satyaṃ vikalpyate etadbālajanaiḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu
# de la gzugs la sogs pa dag la sdug pa'i rnam par sgro btags pas ni 'dod chags skye'o / / mi sdug pa'i rnam par sgro btags pas ni zhe sdang ngo / / rtag pa dang bdag la log par sgro btags pas ni gti mug skye bar 'gyur ro / / rnam pa drug po 'di dag gzhir btags pa bden mod kyi /
kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha
# 'on kyang rab rib can dag gis yod pa ma yin pa'i skra shad la sogs pa ltar / / de dag yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur ba zhig khyod kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi dmigs par yongs su btags pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāśca kevalāḥ
# gzugs sgra ro dang reg pa dang / / dri dang chos dag 'ba' zhig ste /
kevalā iti parikalpitamātrā niḥsvabhāvā ityarthaḥ
# zhes gsungs so / / 'ba' zhig ste zhes bya ba ni btags pa tsam zhig tu zad de /
yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi upalabhyante iti? ucyate / gandharvanagarākārā marīcisvapnasaṃnibhāḥ / iti ete upalabhyante / yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā / aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati
# rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / gal te rang bzhin med na / / 'o na ji ltar dmigs pa yin zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / dmigs pa de dag ni / / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / / smig rgyu rmi lam 'dra ba yin / / gang gi tshe de dag dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa ltar phyin ci log las dmigs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pa de'i tshe /
māyāpuruṣakalpeṣu pratibimbasameṣu ca
# sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu dang / / gzugs brnyan 'dra ba de dag la / / sdug pa dang ni mi sdug pa /
tadanena mithyāśrayasamutpannatvācchubhāśubhayorapi nimittayormṛṣātvameva bhavati / yathoktam
# 'byung bar yang ni ga la 'gyur / / 'dis ni rten log pa las byung ba dang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma dag kyang brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / ji skad du /
ahaṃkārodbhavāḥ skandhāḥ so 'haṃkāro 'nṛto 'rthataḥ / bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ / skandhānasatyān dṛṣṭvaivamahaṃkāraḥ prahīyate / ahaṃkāraprahāṇācca na punaḥ skandhasaṃbhavaḥ / iti / na ca kevalamāśrayamithyātve śubhāśubhayornimittayormithyātvam, api ca anayāpyupapattyā anayormithyātvamiti pratipādayannāha / anapekṣya śubhaṃ nāstyaśubhaṃ prajñapayemahi / yatpratītya śubhaṃ tasmācchubhaṃ naivopapadyate / iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, niyataṃ tadaśubhamapekṣya bhavet, pārāvāravat, bījāṅkuravat, hrasvadīrghavadvā, śubhasya saṃbandhyantarapadārthasāpekṣatvāt / taccāpyapekṣaṇīyamaśubhaṃ śubhena vinā nāsti / [anapekṣya śubhaṃ nāstyaśubhaṃ] śubhaṃ nirapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ / yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi / yacchabdena anantarasyāśubhasya parāmarśaḥ / prajñapayemahītyanena uttarasya śubhasya saṃbandhaḥ / yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyamaśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti, tasmācchubhaṃ naivopapadyate hrasvāsaṃbhavādiva dīrgham, pārāsaṃbhavādiva avāramityabhiprāyaḥ
# ngar 'dzin las byung phung po rnams / / ngar 'dzin de ni don du brdzun / / gang gi sa bon brdzun pa de'i / / skye ba bden pa ga la zhig / / ces gsungs so / / rten log pa nyid yin pas sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma dag brdzun pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'on kyang 'thad pa 'dis kyang 'di gnyis brdzun pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gang la brten nas sdug pa zhes / / gdags par bya ba mi sdug pa / / sdug la ma ltos yod min pas / / de phyir sdug pa 'thad ma yin / / zhes gsungs te / / 'di na gal te sdug pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / sdug pa dang 'brel pa can gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir nges par ring thung ngam pha rol dang tshu rol ltar mi sdug pa la ltos par 'gyur na / / mi sdug pa gang la brten zhing mi sdug pa gang la ltos nas sdug pa zhes gdags par bya zhing rnam par gzhag par bya ba ltos par bya ba mi sdug pa de yang / / sdug pa med par yod pa ma yin zhing / / sdug pa la ma ltos par mi sdug pa yod pa ma yin te / / sdug pa la ltos pa med par mi sdug pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to / / gang la'i sgras ni mjug thogs kyi mi sdug pa gzung ngo; ;gdags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni gong gi sdug pa dang sbyar ro / / gang gi phyir de ltar na sdug par gdags pa la / / mi sdug pa zhes bya bar ltos par bya ba dngos po 'brel ba can gzhan yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir sdug pa 'thad ma yin / / thung ngu med pas ring po 'am / / pha rol med pas tshu rol mi 'thad pa bzhin no zhes dgongs pa yin no /
idānīmaśubhamapi yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha / anapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāsti śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi
# da ni mi sdug pa ni ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / gang la brten nas mi sdug par / / gdags par bya ba sdug pa ni /
yatpratītyāśubhaṃ tasmādaśubhaṃ naiva vidyate
# mi sdug ma ltos yod min pas / / de phyir mi sdug 'thad ma yin / / zhes gsungs te /
yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, niyatameva tacchubhamapekṣya bhavet, pārāvāravat, hrasvadīrghavadvā, aśubhasya saṃbandhyantarapadārthasāpekṣatvāt
# gal te mi sdug pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / mi sdug pa dngos po 'brel pa can gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir de nges par ring thung ngam pha rol dang tshu rol ltar sdug pa la ltos par 'gyur na / / sdug pa gang la brten zhing sdug pa gang la ltos nas mi sdug pa zhes gdags par bya zhing /
taccāpyapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhamaśubhena vinā nāsti, anapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāsti śubham / aśubhaṃ nirapekṣya śubhaṃ na saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ / yacchubhaṃ pratītya yacchubhamapekṣya aśubhaṃ prajñapayemahi, aśubhaṃ vyavasthāpayemahi / atrāpi yacchabdena anantarasya  śubhasya parāmarśaḥ / prajñapayemahītyanena ca uttarasyāśubhasya saṃbandhaḥ / yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti, tasmādaśubhaṃ naiva vidyate / yataścaivaṃ śubhāśubhayorasaṃbhavaḥ, ataḥ
# rnam par gzhag par bya ba ltos par bya ba sdug pa de yang mi sdug pa med par yod pa ma yin zhing / / mi sdug pa la ma ltos par sdug par yod pa ma yin te / / mi sdug pa la ltos pa med par / / sdug pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to / / 'di yang gang la'i sgras ni mjug thogs kyi sdug pa gzung ngo / / gdags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni gong gi mi sdug pa dang sbyar ro / / gang gi phyir de ltar na mi sdug par gdags pa la sdug pa zhes bya ba ltos par bya ba dngos po 'brel pa can gzhan yod pa ma yin pa / / de'i phyir mi sdug 'thad ma yin / / zhes bya'o / / gang gi phyir de ltar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati
# sdug pa yod pa ma yin na / / 'dod chags yod par ga la 'gyur /
aśubhe 'vidyamāne ca kuto dveṣo bhaviṣyati
# mi sdug yod pa ma yin na / / zhe sdang 'byung bar ga la 'gyur /
śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ / tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha
# sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma med na rgyu med pa'i phyir sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma'i rgyu can gyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o / / de'i phyir de ltar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma med pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gnyis med par bstan nas / / da ni phyin ci log med par bstan pa'i sgo nas gti mug kyang med par bstan pa'i phyir /
anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ / nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ
# gal te mi rtag rtag pa zhes / / de ltar 'dzin pa log yin na / / stong la mi rtag yod min pas / / 'dzin pa ji ltar log ma yin /
iha catvāro viparyāsā ucyante / tadyathā / anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ
# zhes gsungs te / / 'dir phyin ci log ni bzhir brjod do / / 'di lta ste phung po lnga po skad cig re re la 'jig cing mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni phyin ci log yin no /
tathā / anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham
# de bzhin du / / mi rtag pa la nges par gnod / / gang la gnod yod de bde min /
tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate / ityamunā nyāyena yadanityaṃ tadduḥkham, sarvasaṃskārāśca anityāḥ, tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ, so 'paro viparyāsaḥ / tathā / śukraśoṇitasaṃparkabījaṃ viṇmūtravardhitam / amedhyarūpamājānan rajyase 'tra kayecchayā / amedhyapuñjapracchanne tatkledārdreṇa carmaṇā / yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare / ityādi / evamidaṃ śarīraṃ sarvātmanā satatamaśucisvabhāvam / tatra yo mohācchucitvena grāho 'bhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ / tathā pañcaskandhakamātmalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇamasthiratvādudayavyayadharmitvācca nirātmakamātmasvabhāvaśūnyam, tasmin ya ātmagrāho 'bhiniveśaḥ anātmani ātmābhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ / ityete catvāro viparyāsāḥ saṃmohasya hetubhūtāḥ / atredānīṃ vicāryate / yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate, nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti / nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ / anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate / na ca anityatvaṃ vidyate śūnye
# de phyir gang zhig mi rtag pa / / de ni thams cad sdug bsngal 'gyur / / zhes bya ba'i tshul 'dis mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin la / / 'du byed thams cad kyang mi rtag pa yin te / / de'i phyir phung po lnga po sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can la / / bde ba'o snyam du log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni phyin ci log gzhan yin no / / de bzhin du / / khu khrag phrad pa'i sa bon can / / bshad dang gci bas bskyed gyur zhing / / mi gtsang rang bzhin shes bzhin du / / 'dod pa gang gis de la chags / / zhes bya ba de ltar rtag tu lus 'di bdag nyid thams cad du mi gtsang ba yin bzhin du rmongs pas de la gtsang ba nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni phyin ci log yin no / / de bzhin du phung po lnga po bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa mi rtag pa'i phyir dang / / skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir / / bdag med cing bdag gi rang bzhin gyis stong bzhin du / / de la rtag tu 'dzin pa de ni bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i phyin ci log yin no / / de ltar na phyin ci log bzhi po de dag ni gti mug gi rgyur gyur pa yin no; ;da ni 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste / / gal te phung po rtag pa nyid kyis stong pa dag la rtag par 'dzin pa log pa ste / / phyin ci log yin no zhes de ltar rnam par 'jog na / / phung po rang bzhin gyis stong pa la mi rtag pa yang med pa ma yin nam / / de'i phyir / / stong la mi rtag yod min pas /
yadā anityatvasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ / tasmānnāsti viparyāsaḥ / yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne, evaṃ duḥkhatvamapi na saṃbhavati, aśucitvamapi nāsti / anātmakatvamapi nāsti / yadā ca svabhāvaśūnyatvādduḥkhatvādikaṃ nāsti, tadā kutastadvipakṣabhūtā nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyāsā bhaviṣyanti? tasmāt santi viparyāsāḥ svarūpataḥ
# 'dzin pa ji ltar log pa yin / / 'di ltar phyin ci ma log pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la ltos nas rtag pa phyin ci log yin no zhes bya bar gzhag pa yin na / / gang gi tshe stong pa la mi rtag pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe mi rtag pa nyid med pas de dang 'gal ba'i rtag pa nyid phyin ci log tu ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir phyin ci log med do / / ji ltar rang bzhin dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i stong pa la mi rtag pa nyid med pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal pa yang med cing mi gtsang ba yang med la bdag med pa yang yod pa ma yin no / / gang gi tshe rang bzhin gyis stong pas sdug bsngal la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag kyang phyin ci log tu lta ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir phyin ci log rang bzhin gyis med do /
tadabhāve kuto bhaviṣyatyavidyā? hetvabhāvāt / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / avidyayā naiva kadāci vidyate avidyata pratyayasaṃbhavaśca / avidyamāneyamavidya loke tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā
# de med pa'i phyir na ma rig pa yod par ga la 'gyur te / / rgyu med pa'i phyir ro / / ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis / / ma rig pa dang ma rig rkyen byung gang / / nam yod yod par 'gyur ba ma yin te / / ma rig pa de 'jig rten yod min pa / / de yi phyir na ngas 'di ma rig gsungs /
tathā / kathaṃ bhagavan moho dhāraṇīpadam? bhagavānāha
# zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gti mug gzungs kyi tshig lags /
atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ mohaḥ, tenocyate mohaḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / 'jam dpal gti mug ni rab tu grol ba ste /
ityādinā viparyaya iti vyavasthāpyate / nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha / anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ
# des na gti mug ces bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so / / gzhan yang gal te yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir / / mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya ba de ltar 'dzin pa phyin ci log yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na / / de lta na dngos po rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa la mi rtag pa'o snyam du 'dzin pa yang yod pa ma yin pas 'di yang ci'i phyir phyin ci log ma yin par rnam par gzhag ces bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te mi rtag rtag go zhes / / de ltar 'dzin pa log yin na /
anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ
# stong la mi rtag pa'o zhes / / 'dzin pa'ang ji ltar log ma yin / / zhes gsungs te /
yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca, tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt / yadā ca aviparyāso nāsti, tadā kimapekṣo viparyāsaḥ syāditi
# gang gi tshe rtag pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid gnyi ga yang phyin ci log yin pa de'i tshe / / gang gi tshe phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ba / / de dag las tha dad pa gsum las gzhan yod pa ma yin la / / gang gi tshe phyin ci ma log pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ci la ltos nas phyin ci log tu 'gyur /
tasmādamunāpi nyāyena nāsti viparyayaḥ
# de'i phyir rigs pa 'dis kyang phyin ci log yod pa ma yin no /
tasyābhāvācca nāstyavidyā svarūpataḥ / yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śeṣaviparyāsāsaṃbhave 'pi yojyam
# de med pa'i phyir ma rig pa med do / / ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag pa'o zhes bya bar 'dzin pa 'di phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du phyin ci log lhag ma yod pa ma yin pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā āryadṛḍhāśayaparipṛcchāyām
# de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas zhus pa las /
bhagavānāha / kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate? na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam, evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya tathāgatena doṣamohaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / rigs kyi bu gang lam gyi nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba de ni de bzhin te / / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni chags par 'gyur pa'i chos rnams spangs pas 'dod chags spangs par ma gsungs so / / de bzhin du zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba dang gti mug par 'gyur pa'i chos rnams spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pas zhe sdang dang gti mug spang bar ma gsungs so / / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
tat kasmāddhetoḥ? na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai na nirvāṇagamanatāyai notkṣepāya na prabhedāya / na hi kulaputra dvayaprabhāvitā tathāgatadharmatā
# rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang dor bar bya ba'am thob par bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston to / / yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su spang bar bya ba dang bsgom par bya ba dang mngon sum du bya ba dang mngon par rtogs par bya ba dang 'khor ba las bskyod par bya ba dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba dang bsal bar bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba dang dbye bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston to / / rigs kyi bu gnyis su dbye ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin no /
tatra ye dvaye caranti, na te samyakprayuktāḥ
# gnyis la spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa ma yin no /
mithyāprayuktāste vaktavyāḥ / katamacca kulaputra dvayam? ahaṃ rāgaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat
# rigs kyi bu gnyis gang zhe na / / bdag gis 'dod chags spang bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so / / bdag gis zhe sdang spang par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so /
ahaṃ dveṣaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat
# bdag gis gti mug spang bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so /
ahaṃ mohaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat / ye evaṃprayuktāḥ, na te samyakprayuktā / mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet / sa rāgaparītacittaḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakramet / so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasi kuryāt / bhagavānāha / evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ, ye 'nutpannān dharmānajātānaśubhato manasi kurvanti, anityato duḥkhato 'nātmato manasi kurvanti / nāhaṃ teṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi / mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ
# de ltar sbyor ba gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa ma yin te / / de dag ni log par zhugs pa rig par bya'o / / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste / / dper na mi la la zhig gis sgyu ma mkhan gyi rol mo byung ba'i tshe / / sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i bud med mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed de / / de 'dod chags kyis sems dkris nas 'khor gyis 'jigs nas bag tsha ste / / stan las langs nas song ste de song nas bud med de nyid la mi sdug par yid la byed cing / / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la byed na / / rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems / / mi de yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam / / 'on te log par zhugs pa yin / / gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das gang bud med ma mchis pa la mi sdug par yid la bgyid cing / / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la bgyid pa'i mi de'i mngon par brtson pa de ni log pa lags so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma kha cig ma skyes shing ma byung ba'i chos rnams la mi sdug par yid la byed cing mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o / / nga ni mi blun po de dag lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste / / de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet / sa tayā sārdhaṃ śayyāṃ kalpayet
# rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste / / dper na mi la la zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du bdag gi khyim du rgyal po'i btsun mo 'ong ba mthong nas de dang lhan cig nyal bar byed de /
smṛtisaṃmoṣāccaivaṃ kalpayet
# dran pa nyams pa'i phyir bdag nyid ni sad do snyam du de ltar sems nas /
viruddho 'smīti / sa bhītasrastaḥ palāyet, mā māṃ rājā vidhyet, sa mā māṃ jīvitād vyavaropayet / tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta? āha / no bhagavan / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā, abhūtaṃ ca parikalpitam
# rgyal pos ma tshor grang / / des bdag bsad du 'ong ngo snyam nas 'jigs shing skrag ste bros na / / 'di ji snyam du sems / / ci mi de 'jigs shing skrag ste bros pas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'jigs pa de las thar bar 'gyur ram / / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar ma lags so / / de ci'i slad du zhe na / / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi des bud med ma mchis par bud med kyi 'du shes bskyed de yang dag pa ma lags par kun brtags pa'i slad du'o /
bhagavānāha / evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ, ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante / evamadoṣe doṣasaṃjñāmutpādya doṣabhayabhītā doṣaniḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante / amohe mohasaṃjñāmutpādya mohabhayabhītā mohaniḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante / nāhaṃ teṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma kha cig 'dod chags med pa la 'dod chags kyi 'du shes bskyed nas / / 'dod chags kyi 'jigs pas skrag ste 'dod chags las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba dang de bzhin du zhe sdang med par zhe sdang gi 'du shes bskyed gti mug med par gti mug gi 'du shes bskyed nas gti mug gi 'jigs pas skrag ste / / gti mug las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o / / da ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste /
mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa
# de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o / / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi des med bzhin du sgro btags pas 'jigs pa med pa la 'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa de bzhin du /
evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante
# rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'dod chags kyi mtha' ma shes nas 'dod chags kyi yod pa'i mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag ste / / 'dod chags kyi mtha' las nges par 'byung ba tshol lo /
doṣakoṭimakiṃcanakoṭimaprajānanto doṣakoṭibhayabhītā akiṃcanakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante
# zhe sdang gi mtha' ci yang med pa'i mtha' ma shes nas zhe sdang gi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag cing ci yang med pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar yongs su tshol lo /
mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante
# gti mug gi mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha' ma shes nas gti mug gi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag ste / / stong pa nyid kyi mtha' las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol bar byed do /
nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi / mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ / iti vistaraḥ
# da ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste / / de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so /
atrāha / yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati, tathāpi eṣa tāvat grāho 'sti
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te yang rtag pa'o zhes bya ba de ltar 'dzin pa'i phyin ci log yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na yang re zhig 'dzin pa de ni yod pa ma yin no / / 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa ste /
grāhaśca nāma saṃgrahaṇaṃ bhāvarūpaḥ / tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā / kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā / karmaṇā ca karturīpsitatamena viṣayeṇa rūpādinā / satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti
# dngos po bya ba'i rang bzhin can yin no / / de la yang gdon mi za bar sgrub byed rtag pa nyid la sogs pa byed pa yod par 'gyur dgos la / / bdag gam sems can kyang rung ste byed pa po yang yod dgos shing / / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul las kyang yod dgos so / / dngos po bya ba dang byed pa dang byed pa po dang las rnams grub pa yin na ni thams cad grub pas kho bo cag gi 'dod pa grub bo /
ucyate / alīkeyaṃ pratyāśā / nanu ca yathopavarṇitena nyāyena / yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate
# brjod par bya ste / / khyod kyi reg pa 'di ni brdzun pa yin te / / ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis / / gang gis 'dzin dang 'dzin gang dang 'dzin pa po dang gang gzung ba /
upaśāntāni sarvāṇi tasmādgrāho na vidyate
# thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste / / de phyir 'dzin pa yod ma yin /
iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti, tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam
# 'dir 'dzin pa po 'ga' zhig rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par byed par 'gyur ba gang zhig gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i dngos po las su gyur pa cung zad cig 'dzin par byed pa de ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni sngar bstan zin to /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? / anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ
# ji ltar zhe na / / ji ltar rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i byed pa po yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni / / gal te mi rtag rtag pa zhes /
ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipāditam / grahītāpi yathā nāsti, tathā / ātmano 'stitvanāstitve na kathaṃcicca sidhyataḥ / ityanena pratipāditam / yacca gṛhyate tadapi nāsti tathā / rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāśca kevalāḥ
# de ltar 'dzin pa log yin na / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan la / / ji ltar 'dzin pa po med pa de ltar ni / / bdag gi yod nyid med nyid ni / / ji lta bur yang grub pa med / / ces bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin zhing / / gang gzung bar bya ba de yang ji ltar med pa de ltar ni / / gzugs sgra ro dang reg pa dang / / dri dang chos dag 'ba' zhig ste /
ityanena pratipāditam / yadā caivaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmāṇi na siddhāni, tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca
# zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no / / gang gi tshe de ltar byed pa po dang byed pa dang las dag ma grub pa de'i tshe go rgyu med pa'i 'dzin pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir /
yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate
# gang gis 'dzin dang 'dzin gang dang / / 'dzin pa po dang gang gzung ba /
upaśāntāni sarvāṇi / svabhāvena anutpannatvānirvṛtāni sarvāṇītyarthaḥ
# thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste / / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
yataśca evamevam / tasmād grāho na vidyate / athavā
# gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa / / de phyir 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin no /
pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ, tasmāt sarvāṇyetāni bhāvasvarūpavirahādupaśāntāni
# rnam pa gcig tu na gang gi phyir rkyen brtag pa la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa rnams kyi byed pa dang dngos po dang byed pa po dang las thams cad rnam pa thams cad du ma skyes par bstan pa de'i phyir / / 'di dag thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin te /
ataśca grāho na vidyate
# de'i phyir 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o /
atrāha / vidyanta eva viparyayāḥ, viparītasadbhāvāt / iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate
# 'dir smras pa / / phyin ci log dag ni yod pa nyid de / / phyin ci log dang ldan pa yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'di na phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i lha sbyin yod pa ma yin la /
na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati / tasmāt santi viparyāsāḥ viparyastasadbhāvāditi / ucyate
# phyin ci log dag med par ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa srid pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir phyin ci log yod pa ma yin no / / brjod par bya ste /
iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam
# 'dir byed pa dang byed pa po dang las rnams ni med pas 'dzin pa nyid rnam par thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes ni kho bo cag gis bshad zin to /
tataśca / avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā
# de'i phyir / / log pa'am yang dag nyid du ni / / 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin na /
bhavedviparyayaḥ kasya bhavetkasyāviparyayaḥ / samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti
# gang la phyin ci log yod cing; ;gang la phyin ci ma log yod / / 'ga' zhig cung zad kyang log pa'am yang dag par mi 'dzin pa la phyin ci log nyid dang phyin ci ma log pa nyid ces bya ba ga la yod /
tasmānna santi viparyayāḥ / api ca / ime viparyayāḥ kasyacidiṣyamāṇāḥ viparītasya parikalpyeran, aviparītasya vā, viparyasyamānasya vā? sarvathā ca nopapadyante iti pratipādayannāha
# de'i phyir phyin ci log dag med do / / gzhan yang phyin ci log 'di dag 'ga' zhig la 'dod na ni / / phyin ci log tu gyur pa zhig la brtag gam / / phyin ci log tu ma gyur ba zhig gam / / phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa zhig la brtag grang na / / rnam pa thams cad du 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na cāpi viparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ / na cāpyaviparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ / na viparyasyamānasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ / vimṛśasva svayaṃ kasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ / tatra tāvadviparītasya viparyayā na saṃbhavanti
# phyin ci log tu 'gyur pa la / / phyin ci log dag mi srid de / / phyin ci log tu ma gyur la / / phyin ci log dag mi srid do / / phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin la'ang / / phyin ci log dag mi srid do / / gang la phyin ci log srid pa / / bdag nyid kyis ni rnam par dpyod / / ces bya ba gsungs so / / de la / / re zhig phyin ci log tu gyur pa la / / phyin ci log dag mi srid do / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi viparīta, sa viparīta eva / kiṃ tasya punarapi viparyayasaṃbandhaḥ kuryāt? niṣprayojanatvāt
# 'di ltar / / gang zhig phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ni phyin ci log tu gyur zin pa nyid yin na / / de la yang phyin ci log dang 'brel pas ci zhig bya ste / / dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
aviparītasyāpi viparyayā na yujyante, vibuddhabuddhinayanānāmapi ajñānanidrātimiropaśamād buddhānāṃ viparyayaprasaṅgāt
# phyin ci log tu gyur pa la yang phyin ci log dag mi rigs te / / mi shes pa'i gnyid dang bral bas blo gros kyi spyan rgyas pa sangs rgyas rnams la yang phyin ci log yod par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro /
tathā viparyasyamānasyāpi na santi viparyayāḥ, viparyasyamānasya bhāvasya abhāvāt / ko hi nāma asāvaparaḥ padārthaḥ, yo viparītāviparītavinirmukto viparyasyamāno nāma bhaviṣyati? ardhaviparīto viparyasyamāna iti cet, ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam / tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati, viparyastatvāt / yadapyasya aviparītam, tadapi viparyāso na viparyāsayati, aviparyastatvāt / tasmādviparyasyamānasyāpi kasyacidviparyāsā na saṃbhavanti
# de bzhin du phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa la yang phyin ci log dag yod pa ma yin te / / phyin ci log par 'gyur bzhin pa med pa'i phyir te / / gang zhig phyin ci log tu gyur ba dang phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa las ma gtogs pa phyin ci log bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po gzhan po de gang zhig yod par 'gyur / / phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa ni phyed phyin ci log pa yin no zhe na / / phyed phyin ci log pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig cung zad cig phyin ci log tu gyur cing / / cung zad cig phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa yin na / / de la 'di'i cung zad cig phyin ci log tu gyur pa gang yin pa de la ni phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu byed pa ma yin te / / phyin ci log tu gyur zin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di'i cung zad cig phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de yang phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu byed pa ma yin te / / phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir phyin ci log tu gyur bzhin pa 'ga' zhig la yang phyin ci log dag srid pa ma yin no /
yadā caivaṃ viparītāviparītaviparyasyamānā na saṃbhavanti, bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti / tadevamāśrayasyābhāvānna santi viparyayāḥ / kiṃ cānyat / anutpannāḥ kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyanti viparyayāḥ / viparyayeṣvajāteṣu viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ / tatra
# phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa dang phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa gang dag la de lta mi srid la mi srid pas da gang dag la phyin ci log dag srid ces bdag nyid gzu por gyur pas shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cig / / de'i phyir de ltar na rten med pas kyang phyin ci log dag yod pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang / / phyin ci log rnams ma skyes na / / ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur / / phyin ci log rnams skye med na / / phyin ci log can ga la yod / / de la /
na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate / na svataḥ parataśceti viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ / kuto viparīta ityarthaḥ / tataśca yaduktam / santi viparyayāḥ viparyayagatasadbhāvāditi, tanna yuktam / yasyāpi kathaṃcidviparyāsacatuṣṭayamastyevetyabhyupagamyate, tathāpi tasya viparītatvamaśakyamāsthātum / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt / ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate
# dngos po bdag las mi skye ste / / gzhan las skyes pa nyid ma yin / / bdag dang gzhan las kyang min na / / phyin ci log can ga la yod / / phyin ci log dang ldan pa ga la yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go / / de'i phyir phyin ci log dag ni yod pa nyid de / / phyin ci log dang ldan pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de mi rigs so / / ci ste yang phyin ci log bzhi po cung zad cig yod pa nyid du khas len na / / de lta na yang / / phyin ci log nyid du gzhag par mi nus so / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar / / gal te bdag dang gtsang ba dang / / rtag dang bde ba yod na ni /
ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ
# bdag dang gtsang dang rtag pa dang / / bde ba phyin ci log ma yin /
yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante, kimetāni santi, atha na santi? yadi vidyante, na tarhi viparyāsāḥ, vidyamānatvādanātmādivat
# gal te bdag dang gtsang ba dang rtag pa dang bde ba de dag phyin ci log yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na ni / / ci de dag yod dam 'on te med / / gal te yod na ni 'o na phyin ci log ma yin te / / yod pa'i phyir bdag med pa la sogs pa bzhin no /
atha na vidyante, tadā eṣāmavidyamānatvānna kevalaṃ nāsti viparyāsatvam, viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha / nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate / anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate
# ci ste med na ni de'i tshe de dag med pa'i phyir phyin ci log nyid yod pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / 'gal zla phyin ci log med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la sogs pa phyin ci log pa rnams kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te bdag dang gtsang ba dang / / rtag dang bde ba med na ni / / bdag med mi gtsang mi rtag dang / / sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te /
yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase, viparyāsāsaṃbhavāt, evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam, tadapi tarhi tyajyatām, pratiṣedhyābhāve pratiṣedhasyābhāvāt / yadā caivamanātmādikaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā tadapi svarūpato 'vidyamānatvāt ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt? tasmāt jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāracārakāgārabandhanānmumukṣubhiraṣṭāvapyete viparyāsāstyājyāḥ
# gal te yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log nyid du mi srid pas bdag dang gtsang ba dang rtag pa dang bde ba med do snyam du sems na / / de lta yin na 'o na bdag la sogs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gang bdag med pa la sogs pa phyin ci ma log pa nyid du gzung ba de yang dor bar bya ste / / dgag bya med na bkag pa med pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe de ltar bdag med pa la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de yang rang gi ngo bos grub pa med pa'i phyir bdag la sogs pa ltar ji ltar phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur / / de'i phyir thar pa 'dod pa rnams phyin ci log de dag brgyad char yang spang bar bya'o /
asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha
# phyin ci log rnam par dpyod pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa 'di ni ma rig pa la sogs pa spang ba'i rgyu nyid yin pas don chen po can nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
evaṃ nirudhyate 'vidyā viparyayanirodhanāt
# de ltar phyin ci log 'gags pas / / ma rig pa ni 'gag par 'gyur /
avidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ saṃskārādyaṃ nirudhyate
# ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni / / 'du byed la sogs 'gag par 'gyur /
yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate, tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate / tannirodhācca saṃskārādayaḥ avidyāhetukā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaparyantā dharmā nirudhyante / avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā
# zhes gsungs te / / gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa des ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pas phyin ci log ma dmigs pa de'i tshe / / de ltar phyin ci log ma dmigs pas de'i rgyu can gyi ma rig pa 'gag par 'gyur ro / / de 'gags pas ma rig pa'i rgyu can 'du byed la sogs pa rga shi'i mthar thug pa'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur te / / ma rig pa ni nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag dang skye ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne nirudhyante, evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha
# ji ltar lus kyi dbang po'i rgyu can dbang po gzugs can thams cad ni lus kyi dbang po 'gags pa na 'gag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / 'du byed la sogs pa ma rig pa'i rgyu can srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba rnams ni nges par ma rig pa 'gags pa na 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
avidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ saṃskārādyaṃ nirudhyate
# ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni / / 'du byed la sogs 'gag par 'gyur /
iti / atrāha / yadi viparyāsanirodhādavidyā nirudhyate, asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsanirodhānnirodho bhavati
# zhes gsungs pa yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te phyin ci log 'gags pas ma rig pa 'gag na / / 'o na ni gang zhig de ltar phyin ci log 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba /
na tarhi avidyamānāyā gaganacūtalatāyāḥ prahāṇopāyānveṣamasti
# ma rig pa yod pa yin te / / nam mkha'i aa mra'i lcug ma yod pa ma yin pa spang ba'i thabs tshol ba ni yod pa ma yin no /
tasmādvidyate eva avidyā, tannirodhopāyānveṣaṇasadbhāvāt
# de'i phyir ma rig pa yod pa yin te / / de 'gag pa'i thabs tshol ba yod pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca santi taddhetukā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ
# de'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa de'i rgyu can rnams yod pa yin la /
kleśāsadbhāvācca astyeva saṃsāre bhavasaṃtatiḥ
# nyon mongs pa yod pa'i phyir srid pa'i rgyun yang yod pa nyid do /
ucyate / atra hi nāma atimahadanarthapāṇḍityaṃ parasya, yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase saṃsāre nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe parārthodayasaṃbaddhakakṣaiḥ sādhubhiḥ prajñopāyamahānilabalairniḥśeṣaṃ tadunmūlyamānairna kevalaṃ na sāhāyyenāvatiṣṭhante, api khalu tadunmūlakānāmatimahānilabalānāmiva bhāvasadbhāvavādamahāśailāyamāna ivātivirodhitayā avasthito bhavān āhopuruṣikayā tasyaiva kleśaviṣavṛkṣasya jātijarāmaraṇaśokāyāsavisaraduḥkhaikaphalasya sutarāṃ bhāvābhiniveśatoyāsravairāropaṇamādriyate / api ca / yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet, syāt tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇam / na ca teṣāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavati / yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt, avidyamānānāṃ vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate, tannopapadyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt / yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit / kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati / svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum / na hi kṣityādīnāṃ kaṭhinatvādisvabhāvo nivartate / evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ / kecidityavidyādayaḥ / kasyaciditi pudgalasya / kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran? naiva te kasyacit kathaṃcinnāma prahīyeran / kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha / kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti / svabhāvasya vinivartayitumaśakyatvāt / ākāśānāvaraṇavinivartanāsaṃbhavavadityabhiprāyaḥ / atha svabhāvena asadbhūtā iti vikalpyate, evamapi prahāṇāsaṃbhava evetyāha / yadyabhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit / kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran ko 'sadbhāvaṃ prahāsyati / abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum / na hi agneḥ śaityamasaṃvidyamānaṃ śakyamapākartum / evamime 'pi kleśāḥ kecid yadi kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante, kastān prahāsyati? naiva kaścit prahāsyati / tadevamubhayapakṣe 'pi prahāṇāsaṃbhavānnāsti prahāṇaṃ kleśānām / prahāṇābhāvācca kutaḥ kleśaprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇamiti / ato yaduktam / vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ, tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇāditi, tadayuktamiti / yathoktamāryasamādhirāje / yo rajyeta, yatra vā rajyeta, yena vā rajyeta / yo duṣyeta, yatra vā duṣyeta, yena vā duṣyeta / yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta, yena
