vā muhyeta / sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati, taṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate / sa taṃ dharmamasamanupaśyan anupalabhamāno 'rakto 'duṣṭo 'mūḍho 'viparyastacittaḥ samāhita ityucyate / tīrṇaḥ pāraga ityucyate / kṣemaprāpta ityucyate / iti vistaraḥ / tathā / ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam / so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo / mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate / mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān / ityādi / tathā / rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam / viṣabhāgena śabdena uttaro dharmu deśitaḥ / śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ / samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate / yathā nirvāṇu gambhīraṃ śabdena saṃprakāśitam / labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate / śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate / evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nirvāṇaṃ saṃprakāśitam / nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate / apravṛttirhi dharmāṇāṃ yathā paścāttathā purā / sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena nirvāṇasamasādṛśāḥ / jñātā naiṣkramyasārehi ye yuktā buddhabodhaye / tathā / jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi / vyāhāramātreṇa hi vyāharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi / tathā / parinirvṛta loki te śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ / kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅgu vivarjiya sattva vinenti / iti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau viparyāsaparīkṣā nāma trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / āryasatyaparīkṣā caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ / caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaste prasajyate / yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam, nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ syāt, tadā yacchūnyaṃ tannāsti, yacca nāsti, tadavidyamānatvād vandhyāputravannaivotpadyate na cāpi nirudhyate, iti na kasyacitpadārthasya udayo vyayaśca / tadabhāvācca caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ te śūnyavādinaḥ prasajyate / kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate / etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate, na anāryāḥ, viparyāsānugatatvāt, yathādarśanaṃ ca padārthasvabhāvavyavasthānāt / yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā, mādhuryam, tenātmanā tasya vastuno 'nupalabhyamānatvāt, evamihāpi yadyapi pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhasvabhāvā bhavanti, tathāpi ye etān duḥkhātmakān paśyanti, teṣāmeva duḥkhaṃ vyavasthāpyate, na viparyāsānugamādanyathopalabhamānānāmiti / ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate / nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti, evaṃ tatkathaṃ duḥkhamāryāṇāmeva satyam? satyam / na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam, kiṃ tarhi pañcāpyupādānaskandhāḥ, ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate / yathoktam / ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi(ve?)dyate puṃbhiḥ / akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca / karatalasadṛśo bālo na vetti saṃskāraduḥkhatāpakṣma
# brjod par bya ste / / kye ma gang zhig dam pa gzhan gyi don 'byung ba la ci la yang rag ma las par ches pa rnams thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa'i dug gi ljon shing chen po bdag nyid thams cad du sdug bsngal shin tu stobs pa ma lus pa drungs 'byin par mdzad pa la / / stobs 'debs par mi gnas pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'on kyang de drungs 'byin par mdzad pa rnams dang shin tu 'gal bar gnas shing gzu lums kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug gi ljon shing chen po de 'dzugs pa la ches shin tu gus pa ni / / pha rol po don ma yin pa la mkhas pa shin tu chen po nyid yin no / / gzhan yang gal te nyon mongs pa ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams spong ba yod na ni / / de spong ba'i thabs tshol bar 'gyur na / / de dag spong ba ni yod pa ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di na gal te yod na ni / / de'i tshe rang gi ngo bos yod pa rnams la 'am / / yod pa ma yin pa rnams la yod par 'gyur ba zhig go / / de las cir 'gyur zhe na / / gal te nyon mongs pa rang bzhin ngo bos yod par gyur ba rnams spong bar 'dod na ni / / de mi 'thad do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar / / gal te la la'i nyon mongs pa / / gang dag rang bzhin gyis yod na / / ji lta bur na spang bar 'gyur / / yod pa su zhig spong bar byed / / dngos po rang gi ngo bos yod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni bzlog par mi nus te / / sa la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin sra ba la sogs pa rnams ni ldog pa ma yin no / / de bzhin du gal te la la ste gang zag gi gang dag ste ma rig pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa 'di dag kyang rang bzhin gyis yod na ni ji lta bur na spong bar 'gyur te / / gang gis kyang spong bar mi 'gyur ba nyid do; ;yang ci'i phyir de dag ni spong zhe na / / yod pa su zhig spong bar byed / / ces gsungs te / / rang bzhin bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir / / nam mkha'i mi sgrib pa nyid bzlog tu med pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / ci ste rang bzhin gyis med pa zhig yin na zhes bya bar rtog na / / de ltar na yang spong ba yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsungs pa / / gal te la la'i nyon mongs pa / / gang dag rang bzhin gyis med pa / / ji lta bur na spong bar 'gyur / / med pa su zhig spong bar byed / / nyon mongs pa rang bzhin gyis med pa ste mi bdog pa rnams kyang spang bar mi nus pa nyid do / / me'i grang ba yod pa ma yin pa ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin no / / de bzhin du nyon mongs pa 'di dag kyang su la yang gang dag kyang rang bzhin gyis med pas / / de dag sus spong bar byed de sus kyang spong bar byed pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar phyogs gnyi ga ltar yang spong ba yod pa ma yin pas nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba med do / / spong ba med pa'i phyir na nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs tshol ba lta yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir ji skad du / / ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams ni yod pa nyid de / / de spong ba'i thabs tshol ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de mi 'thad do / / ji skad du / / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang / / gzugs kyis kyang ni byang chub bstan / / byang chub kyis kyang gzugs bstan te / / mi mtshungs pa yi sgra rnams kyis / / chos kyi bla ma rab tu bstan / / sgra yis gzugs kyi bla ma ste / / ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dag / / gzugs dang byang chub mnyam pa ste / / tha dad bya ba de mi rnyed / / mya ngan 'das pa zab par yang / / sgra yis rab tu bstan pa ltar / / mya ngan 'das pa de mi rnyed / / de yi sgra yang mi rnyed do / / sgra dang mya ngan 'das pa ni / / gnyi ga'ang rnyed par mi 'gyur te / / de bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams la / / mya ngan 'das pa rab tu bstan / / mya ngan 'das dang 'da' ba ni / / mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed de / / 'di ni chos rnams 'jug pa med / / phyis ni ci 'dra de bzhin sngon / / chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis / / mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs mnyam par / / sangs rgyas bstan la brtson pa yi / / 'byung ba de dag rnams kyis rig / / ces gsungs pa dang de bzhin du / / ye shes kyis ni phung po stong nyid mkhyen / / mkhyen nas nyon mongs rnams dang mi 'grogs te; ;brjod pa tsam gyi sgo nas brjod bya zhing / / mya ngan 'das bzhin 'jig rten 'dir dpyad bya / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / phyin ci log brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o / / 'dir / / gal te 'di dag kun stong na / / 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams / / khyed la med par thal bar 'gyur / / gal te rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i phyir phyi dang nang gi dngos po'i rnam pa 'di dag thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes sgrub na / / de lta na khyod la nyes pa chen po dang mang por 'gyur ba ma yin nam / / ji ltar zhe na / / gal te 'di dag thams cad stong pa nyid yin na de'i tshe gang stong pa de ni med pa yin la / / gang med pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pas dngos po gang yang 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med par 'gyur ro / / de med pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams stong par smra ba khyod la med par thal bar 'gyur ro / / ji ltar zhe na / / 'di ltar / / 'di na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po sngar gyi rgyus bskyed cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni / / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir gnod pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis na sdug bsngal zhes bya'o / / sdug bsngal de yang phyin ci log spangs pas 'phags pa rnams kho nas sdug bsngal lo snyam du shes kyi / / phyin ci log dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir dang ji ltar mthong ba bzhin dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir 'phags pa ma yin pa dag gis ni ma yin no / / de ltar dngos po de dag gis dngos po de dag nyid der dmigs pa'i phyir rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pas dbang po phyin ci log tu gyur pa bu ram mngar ba'i rang bzhin yang kha ba nyid du dmigs pa rnams la de dag gi shes pa la ltos nas kha ba nyid du bden gyi / / mngar ba nyid du ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin mod kyi / / de lta na yang gang dag gis 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid du mthong ba de dag nyid la de dag sdug bsngal yin par bzhag gi / / phyin ci log dang rjes su 'brel bas rnam pa gzhan du dmigs pa rnams la ni ma yin no / / de'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kho na la de sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid du bden pa de'i phyir sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o / / gal te 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar yongs su gcod pa nyid ma yin nam; de'i phyir ji ltar sdug bsngal 'phags pa rnams kho na la bden pa yin zhe na / / tshor ba sdug bsngal nyid 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga char yin no / / de'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kho na la de bden pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes rnam par gzhag ste / / ji skad du / / lag mthil spu nyag gcig 'dug pa / / mi rnams kyis ni mi rtogs la / / de nyid mig tu song na yang / / mi bde ba dang gnod bskyed ltar / / byis pa lag mthil 'dra ba yis / / 'du byed sdug bsngal spu mi rtogs /
akṣisadṛśastu vidvān tenaivodvejate gāḍham
# 'phags pa mig dang 'dra bas ni / / de yis shin tu yid kyang 'byung /
iti / tasmādāryāṇāmeva tadduḥkhasatyamiti duḥkhamāryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate / kadā ca tadduḥkhamāryasatyaṃ yujyate? yadā saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau saṃbhavataḥ
# zhes bshad do / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal de ni 'phags pa rnams kho na la bden pas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes rnam par gzhag go / / nam zhig gi tshe na 'di sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden par rigs she na / / gang gi tshe 'dus byas rnams la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod pa yin na /
yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate, tadā nāsti duḥkham
# gang gi tshe stong pa'i phyir cung zad kyang skye ba med cing cung zad kyang 'gag pa med pa de'i tshe ni sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin no /
asati ca duḥkhe kutaḥ samudayasatyam? yato hi hetorduḥkham, samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate
# sdug bsngal med pa na yang kun 'byung gi bden pa yod par ga la 'gyur / / 'di ltar rgyu gang las sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing skye ba sred pa dang las dang nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rgyu de la ni kun 'byung zhes bya na /
yadā tu phalabhūtaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ nāsti, tadā phalarahitasya hetukatvānupapatteḥ samudayo 'pi nāsti
# gang gi tshe 'bras bur gyur pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe 'bras bu dang bral ba rgyu nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir kun 'byung yang med do /
duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate
# sdug bsngal dang bral zhing yid mi skye ba la ni 'gog pa zhes bya na /
yadā tu duḥkhameva nāsti, tadā kasya nirodhaḥ syāditi? ato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na saṃbhavati
# gang gi tshe sdug bsngal nyid med pa de'i tshe gang gang gis 'gog par 'gyur / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal 'gog pa yang med do /
asati hi duḥkhe nirodhasatyasyāpyabhāvaḥ
# de'i phyir sdug bsngal med na 'gog pa'i bden pa yang med do /
asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti
# sdug bsngal 'gog pa med na yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyang yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir lam gyi bden pa yang med do /
tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate
# de'i phyir de ltar dngos po rnams stong par smra bar khyod la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
tataśca ko doṣa iti? ucyate / parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca / caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvānnopapadyate / caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaprasaṅge sati yadetadanityādibhirākārairduḥkhasatyaparijñānaṃ duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya ca sākṣikarma sākṣātkaraṇam, tannopapadyate / yadi duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati parijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā ko doṣa iti? ucyate
# de las nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi med pas / / yongs su shes dang spang ba dang / / sgom dang mngon du bya ba dag / / 'thad par 'gyur ba ma yin no / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams med par thal ba yin dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa dag gis sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa de dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa spang ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sgom pa dang / / sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon du bya ba ste mngon sum du bya ba mi 'thad do / / gal te sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pas yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe / / nyes pa ci yod ce na / / brjod par bya ste /
tadabhāvānna vidyante catvāryāryaphalāni ca
# de dag yod pa ma yin pas / / 'bras bu bzhi yang yod ma yin /
phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ
# 'bras bu med na 'bras gnas med / / zhugs pa dag kyang yod ma yin /
saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ / abhāvāccāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate / dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati
# gal te skyes bu gang zag brgyad / / de dag med na dge 'dun med / / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med phyir / / dam pa'i chos kyang yod ma yin / / chos dang dge 'dun yod min na; ;sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
yadā caivaṃ duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā, asminnasati srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatphalākhyaṃ phalacatuṣṭayaṃ nopapadyate
# gang gi tshe de ltar sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe / / de med pas rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang bzhi yang 'thad pa ma yin no / / ji ltar zhe na /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate
# 'dir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi spangs pa bsdoms pas ni / / 'bras bu'i ming 'thob ste /
tadyathā / saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tat srotaāpattiphalam
# 'di lta ste / / kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i spangs pa gang yod pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o /
kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i rnam pa rnams la yang re re zhing chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i dbye bas phye ba na rnam pa dgur 'gyur ro /
tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭhakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam
# de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam pa drug pa zad pas rnam par grol pa'i lam la spangs pa gang yod pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag gi nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa zad pas rnam par grol ba'i lam la spangs ba gang zhig yod pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanabhūmikanavamakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tadarhatphalam
# gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa bsgom pas spang par bya ba / / sa dang sa la rnam pa dgu'i dbye bas phye ba rnams las 'du shes med 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu zad par zad pas rnam par grol ba'i lam la spangs pa gang zhig yod pa de ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ste /
ityetāni catvāri phalāni
# 'di dag ni 'bras bu bzhi'o /
tānyetāni kathaṃ yujyante? yadi duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ saṃbhavati, samudayasya prahāṇam, nirodhasya sākṣātkaraṇam, āryamārgasya ca bhāvanā bhavati
# 'di dag ji ltar rigs she na / / gal te sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yod cing kun 'byung spang ba dang 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang lam sgom pa yod par 'gyur ba yin na /
yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni
# gang gi tshe sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pas sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe ni 'bras bu bzhi po de dag yod pa ma yin no /
caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi
# 'bras bu bzhi po de dag med na de dag la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang yod pa ma yin no /
ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante / iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge 'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ, tadyathā
# de nyid kyi phyir na 'phags pa'i gang zag zhugs pa bzhi po dag kyang yod pa ma yin no / / 'dir skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa'i snga rol gyi shes pa dang bzod pa'i skad cig ma bcva lnga gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
traidhātukaduḥkhābhisamaye duḥkhasatyālambanāścatvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ
# khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhir 'gyur ro /
tatra katame traidhātukaduḥkhābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ? tadyathā
# de la khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa'i dus kyi bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi gang zhe na / / 'di lta ste /
kāmāvacaraduḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasatkāyāntagrāhamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśaśīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyadaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ / tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa dang log par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bcu'i gnyen por gyur cing / / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam par skyes pa / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go /
evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktāṣṭādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ duḥkhādyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ
# dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o / / de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa / / khong khro ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bco brgyad kyi gnyen por gyur cing / / sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam par skyes pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ / yathā caite traidhātukāvacaraduḥkhasatyābhisamaye kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāścatvāraḥ, evaṃ kāmāvacarasamudayadarśanaprahātavyamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ / tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ
# sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o / / dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa'o / / khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung mthong bas spang par bya ba log par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang 'dod chags dang khong khro dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur cing / / rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skyes ba dang rkyen gyis rnam par skyes pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go / / dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o /
evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ samudayasatyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ
# de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa khong khro ba ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bcu gnyis kyi gnyen por gyur cing / / kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam par skyes pa / / bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ / ityete traidhātukāvacaraduḥkhasamudayasatyābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ
# dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa ste / / de dag ni khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi yin no / / khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po 'di dag /
yathā caite catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ traidhātukaduḥkhasamudayasatyābhisamaye, evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhadarśanaprahātavyasamudayoktasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ nirodhaśāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ / tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ
# ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun 'byung la bshad pa phra rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur zhing 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par skyes pa / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go / / dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / / sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o /
etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ
# rnam pa de dang de dag nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa khong khro ma gtogs pa phra rgyas bcu gnyis kyi gnyen por gyur ba bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ
# dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa / / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa'o /
ityete traidhātukāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ
# de dag ni khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi'o /
evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgadarśanaprahātavyanirodhoktānuśayeṣu śīlavrataparāmarśamaṣṭamaṃ prakṣipya aṣṭānuśayapratipakṣaḥ mārganyāyapratiopannairyāṇikākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ
# khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po 'di dag ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mthong pas spang bar bya ba 'gog pa la bshad pa dag la / / brgyad pa tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bsnan te / / phra rgyas brgyad kyi gnyen por gyur cing lam dang rigs pa dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa'i rnam par skyes pa / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam la dmigs pa / / bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ / etairevākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgālambanaḥ pratighavarjitacaturdaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇo mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
# lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go / / dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa / / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / / lam la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o / / rnam pa de dag nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam la dmigs pa / / khong khro ma gtogs pa phra rgyas bcu bzhi'i gnyen por gyur pa / / bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
ityete pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ darśanamārgābhidhānāḥ / evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate
# lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa ste / / skad cig ma bco lnga po de dag ni / / mthong ba'i lam zhes bya bar gyur to / / de dag la rnam par gnas pa'i 'phags pa ni rgyun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir /
ṣoḍaśe tu mārge 'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate / ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante / yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ / te ca daśānuśayā bhavanti
# zhugs par zhes bya ba la / / bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa la gnas pa de dag rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o / / phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad po de dag ni / / sgom pa la ltos pa med par bden pa rnams mthong ba tsam gyis spong ba'i phyir / / mthong bas spang ba zhes bya bar brjod do / / gang dag bden pa'i rnam pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin / / phyis bsgom pas spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste /
kāmāvacarā rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ / rūpāvacarā eva pratighavarjitāsrayaḥ / ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti
# de dag ni phra rgyas bcur 'gyur te / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dag dang gzugs na spyod pa khong khro spangs pa gsum po de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum po de dag nyid de bcur 'gyur ro /
ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante, kāmadhātau caturṣu dhyāneṣu, caturṣvārūpyeṣu
# de dag ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis sa dang sa las rnam pa dgur phye ba yin te / / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi de dag tu'o /
ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārthamānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa
# nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa re re spang bar bya ba'i phyir / / bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i dbye bas shes pa'i skad cig ma gnyis gnyis nyon mongs pa'i skad cig las bzlog nas rnam par gzhag go /
adhimātrādhimātro hi kleśaprakāraḥ mṛdumṛdubhyāmānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ prahīyate / yāvanmṛdumṛdukleśaprakāro 'dhimātrādhimātrābhyāṃ jñānakṣaṇābhyāṃ prahīyate
# 'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po ni / / bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu dag gis spong ba nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu ni shes pa'i skad cig ma chen po'i chen po'i bar dag gis spong ste / / dri ma rags pa ni 'bad pa chung dus bsgrub par bya la /
sthūlaṃ hi malamalpaprayatnasādhyam, sūkṣmaṃ tu mahāyatnasādhyaṃ rajakavastradhāvanasādharmyeṇeti vijñeyam
# phra mo ni 'bad pa chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin te / / khrus mkhan gos 'khru ba dang chos mtshungs par shes par bya'o / / de la mthong ba'i lam gyi 'og rol du /
tatra darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaṣaṣṭhakleśaprakārapratipakṣavimuktimārgākhyajñānakṣaṇādarvāg jñānakṣaṇāvasthitaḥ āryaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate
# 'phags pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnam pa drug po'i gnyen po / / rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi skad cig ma'i snga rol gyi shes pa'i skad cig la gnas pa ni / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / / 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na /
sakṛdimaṃ lokamāgatya parinirvāṇāt sakṛdāgāmītyucyate, tatphalārthaṃpratipannakaḥ prayogasthaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate / ṣaṣṭhe tu kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmītyucyate / ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate / anāgatya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāṇādanāgāmītyucyate / tatphalārthaṃ pratipannakaḥ prayogasthaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate
# lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes brjod la / / de'i 'bras bu'i don du zhugs shing sbyor ba la gnas pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o / / skad cig ma drug pa la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o / / skad cig ma drug pa'i 'og rol du 'phags pa nyon mongs pa dgu pa spong ba rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi skad cig gi snga rol gyi ye shes kyi skad cig la gnas pa ni / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / / 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas phyir mi 'ong ba zhes brjod la de'i 'bras bu'i don du zhugs shing sbyor ba la gnas pa ni / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
navame tu kṣaṇe anāgāmītyucyate
# skad cig ma dgu pa la ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o /
kāmāvacaranavamavimuktimārgakṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñātayanabhūmikanavamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ arhatphalapratipannakaḥ ityucyate / sadevamānuṣāsurāllokāt pūjārhatvādarhannityucyate
# skad cig ma dgu pa'i 'og rol tu 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snga rol gyi skad cig srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa dgu'i gnyen po la gnas pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par 'os pas dgra bcom pa zhes brjod la /
tatphalārthaṃ pratipannakaḥ prayogasthaḥ arhatphalapratipannakaḥ ityucyate
# de'i 'bras bu'i don du zhugs shing sbyor ba la gnas pa ni / / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
bhavāgrikanavamakleśaprakāraprahāṇāttu navamavimuktimārge vyavasthitaḥ arhan bhavati
# srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa spangs pa las rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la gnas pa ni / / dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o /
ta ete catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ pudgalāḥ, catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti
# zhugs pa'i gang zag bzhi dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang zag skyes bu chen po brgyad po yon gnas su 'os pa dam pa de dag ni /
paramadakṣiṇārhā uktā bhagavatā / yathoktaṃ sūtre / pṛṣṭaḥ sa devarājena śakreṇa vaśavartinā
# bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun yin no zhes gsungs te / / ji skad du / / de la brgya byin lha yi rgyal / / dbang bsgyur gyis ni zhus pa dang /
kṛṣatāṃ yajamānānāṃ prāṇināṃ puṇyakāṅkṣiṇām / kurvatāṃ śraddhaddadhānānāṃ puṇyamaupadhikaṃ sadā
# srog chags zhing pa rgyal 'gyur zhing / / dad ldan bsod nams dag 'dod pa / / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams ni /
sukṣetraṃ te pravakṣyāmi yatra dattaṃ mahatphalam
# rtag tu byed pa rnams kyis zhing / / gang la phul na 'bras che ba /
pratipannakāścatvāraścatvāraśca phalasthitāḥ / eṣa saṃgho dakṣiṇīyo vidyācaraṇasaṃpadā
# bzang po rab tu bshad bya ste / / rig dang zhabs su ldan pa yis / / sbyin gnas gyur zhing dge 'dun che; ;zhugs pa rnam pa bzhi dang ni / / 'bras la gnas pa bzhi rnams so /
iti / yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni, tadā satyadarśanabhāvanālabhyānāṃ phalānāmabhāvāt pratipannakaphalasthapudgalānāmabhāva eva
# zhes gsungs so / / de'i phyir gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang de dag yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med na de'i tshe bden pa mthong ba med pas 'bras bu rnams mthong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang 'bras bu la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams med pas na /
ataśca saṃgho nāsti
# dge 'dun yod pa ma yin no /
tatra  adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt
# de la rtogs pa'i chos kyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa nyid kyis bdud thams cad kyis kyang / / bcom ldan 'das las mi phyed pas dge 'dun yin te / / de yod par mi 'gyur ro / / gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa'i phyir /
na cet santi te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ
# skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag nyid med na /
āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo 'pi na saṃbhavati
# 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi chos su gyur pa dam pa'i chos kyang yod pa ma yin no /
satāmāryāṇāṃ dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ / tatra nirodhasatyaṃ phaladharmaḥ, mārgasatyaṃ tu phalāvatāradharmaḥ
# de la 'gog pa'i bden pa ni 'bras bu'i chos so / / lam gyi bden pa ni 'bras bu la 'jug pa'i chos te 'di ni re zhig rtogs pa'i chos yin no /
eṣa tāvadadhigamadharmaḥ / tatsaṃprakāśikā deśanā āgamadharmaḥ
# de la gsal bar byed pa bstan pa ni / / lung gi chos yin na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med na ni /
sarva eṣa āryasatyānāmabhāve sati nāstīti / abhāvāccāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate
# 'di dag thams cad yod pa ma yin no / / 'phags pa'i bden rnams med pa'i phyir / / dam pa'i chos kyang yod ma yin / / chos dang dge 'dun yod min na /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati / yadi hi yathokto dharmaḥ syāt, tadā taddharmapratipattyā sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhād buddho bhavatīti yuktaṃ syāt / yadi ca saṃghaḥ syāt, tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamānaśaraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet
# sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur / / gal te ji skad bshad pa'i chos yod na ni / / chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan gyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir / / sangs rgyas yod do zhes bya bar rigs par 'gyur zhing / / gal te dge 'dun yod na ni de'i tshe de'i nye bar bstan pa de dag gis ye shes kyi tshogs bsags shing de la dbul ba dang rim gro dang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa dag gis bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa na /
athavā / asati saṃghe srotaāpattiphalapratipannakādīnāmabhāvaḥ syāt
# rim gyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro / / yang na dge 'dun med na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa la sogs pa rnams med do /
na ca pratipannakāditvamaprāpya buddhatvamāpyate
# zhugs pa la sogs pa rnams ma thob par ni sangs rgyas nyid thob pa ma yin te /
avaśyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhagavatā kasmiṃścit phale vyavasthātavyam
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sngon gdon mi za bar 'bras bu 'ga' zhig la zhugs par 'gyur ro /
tatra ca phale vyavasthitaḥ saṃghāntaḥpātyeva bhagavān bhavati
# 'bras bu de la zhugs pas / / bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun gyi khongs su gtogs pa yin no /
saṃghe cāsati niyataṃ nāsti bhagavān buddhaḥ
# dge 'dun med na ni nges par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa ma yin no /
atha bhagavānapi aśaikṣāntarbhāvāt saṃghāntargata eva / tathā ca buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ ityabhidhānāt saṃghāntargata eva bhagavān iti kecidvarṇayanti
# yang na bcom ldan 'das kyang mi slob pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i dge 'dun gyi khongs su 'du ba nyid yin na / / de lta yin dang kha cig na re / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes brjod pa'i phyir / / bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun gyi khongs su 'du ba nyid do zhes smras te /
teṣāṃ matena spaṣṭamevaitat
# de dag gi lugs ltar na / / chos dang dge 'dun yod min na /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati / iti
# sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba de chos gsal ba yin no / / bar ma 'don par byed pa dag ni /
madhyoddeśikāśca mahāvastūpadiṣṭabhūmivyavasthayā prathamabhūmisthitaṃ bodhisattvamutpannadarśanamārgaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ saṃghāntaḥpātinaṃ vyācakṣate
# gzhi chen po las sa'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa las / / byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pa mthong ba'i lam skyes pa yin par smras pa na / / dge 'dun gyi khongs su gtogs par rjod par byed do zhes bya'o / / de lta na ni / / dge 'dun yod pa ma yin na / / byang chub sems dpa' yang med pas /
tadā saṃghe cāsati bodhisattvo 'pi nāstīti kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyatīti spaṣṭamevaitat / tad / evaṃ trīṇyapi ratnāni bruvāṇaḥ pratibādhase / śūnyatāmityevaṃ vadan buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇyapi durlabhatvāt kadācideva utpattitaḥ alpapuṇyānāṃ ca tadaprāpteḥ mahārghamūlyatvād ratnāni pratibādhase
# sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba 'di gsal ba kho na yin no / / de'i phyir / / de skad stong pa nyid smra na / / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa ni / / byed cing ste / / stong pa nyid kyi don de skad smra na / / rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir dang res 'ga' zhig na 'byung ba'i phyir dang bsod nams chung ba rnams kyis de dang mi phrad pa'i phyir dang rin thang che ba'i phyir na / / dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba dag la yang gnod pa byed pa yin no /
kiṃ cānyat / śūnyatāṃ phalasadbhāvamadharmaṃ dharmameva ca / sarvasaṃvyavahārāṃśca laukikān pratibādhase / śūnyatāṃ bruvāṇa ityanena saṃbandhaḥ / yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyam, yadā sarvameva nāsti, tadā sarvāntaḥ pātitvāt dharmādharmau saha taddhetukena iṣṭāniṣṭaphalena na saṃbhavataḥ / sarva eva cāmī laukikā vyavahārāḥ / kuru, paca, khāda, tiṣṭha, gaccha, āgaccha ityevamādayo 'pi sarvāntargatatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatvānnaiva yujyante iti / ato nāyaṃ yathopavarṇito nyāyo jyāyāniti / atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam / śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase
# gzhan yang 'bras bu yod pa dang / / chos ma yin pa chos nyid dang / / 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad ni / / kun la gnod pa byed pa yin / / stong pa nyid smra na zhes bya ba de dang sbyar ro / / gal te 'di dag thams cad stong zhing gang gi tshe 'di dag thams cad med na / / de'i tshe thams cad kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir / / chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis po de dag gi rgyu can 'bras bu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dang bcas pa med par 'gyur la / / 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis shig / / 'chos shig / / zo shig / / 'dug shig / / song shig / / shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dang chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rigs pa nyid do / / de'i phyir de skad bstan pa'i tshul 'di ni mi legs so zhes 'dzer to / / de la bshad pa khyod kyis ni / / stong nyid dgongs dang stong nyid dang / / stong nyid don ni ma rtogs pas / / de phyir de ltar gnod pa yin /
sa bhavān svavikalpanayaiva nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārtha ityevaṃ viparītamadhyāropya "yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ" ityādinopālambhaṃ bruvāṇo 'smāsu mahāntaṃ khedamāpanno 'tīva vihanyate vividhairbhūtaiḥ parikalpairhanyate ityarthaḥ / na tvayamasmābhiratra śāstre śūnyatārthaṃ upavarṇito yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ, śūnyatārthaṃ cājānānaḥ śūnyatāmapi na jānāsi
# khyod ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa kho nas med pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi don yin no zhes de ltar don phyin ci log tu sgro btags nas / / gal te 'di dag kun stong na / / 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med / / ces bya ba la sogs pas klan ka smra zhing / / kho bo cag la cher yid byung bar gyur pa ni / / shin tu gnod pa yin te / / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis nyams pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / khyod kyis yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa 'di ni kho bo cag gis bstan bcos 'dir stong pa nyid kyi don du ma smras la / / khyod kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi don ma shes pas stong pa nyid kyang mi shes shing /
na cāpi śūnyatāyā yatprayojanaṃ tadvijānāsi
# stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa gang yin pa de yang mi shes pa yin no /
tataśca yathāvasthitavastusvarūpāparijñānena etat tvayā bahucāyuktamasmadvayākhyānāsaṃbaddhamevopavarṇitam
# de'i phyir dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ji ltar gnas pa'i don ma shes pas khyod kyis kho bo cag gis bshad pa dang ma 'brel zhing mi rigs pa rnam pa mang po 'di smras pa yin no /
atha kiṃ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanam? uktameva tadātmaparīkṣāyām
# de nas stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ci zhe na / / 'di ni / / las dang nyon mongs zad pas thar /
karmakleśakṣayānmokṣaḥ karmakleśā vikalpataḥ / te prapañcātprapañcastu śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate
# las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog las / / de dag spros las spros pa ni / / stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur / / zhes bdag brtag par bshad zin to /
iti / ato niravaśeṣaprapañcopaśamārthaṃ śūnyatopadiśyate, tasmātsarvaprapañcopaśamaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanam
# de'i phyir spros pa ma lus pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid nye bar ston pa yin te / / de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ni spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin na /
bhavāṃstu nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ parikalpayan prapañcajālameva saṃvardhayamāno na śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanaṃ vetti
# khyod kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi don med pa yin par rtog cing spros pa'i dra ba kho na spel bar byed pa na / / stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ma rtogs pa yin no /
atha kā punaḥ śūnyatā? sāpi tatraivoktā / aparapratyayaṃ śāntaṃ prapañcairaprapañcitam
# de nas stong pa nyid gang yin zhe na / / de yang / / gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang / / spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa /
nirvikalpamanānārthametattatvasya lakṣaṇam / iti / ataḥ prapañcanivṛttisvabhāvāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ kuto nāstitvamiti śūnyatāmapina jānāti bhavān / yaṃ cārthamupādāya śūnyatāśabdaḥ pravartate, tamapīhaiva pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ
# rnam rtog med don tha dad min / / de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do / / zhes de nyid du bshad zin to / / de'i phyir stong pa nyid spros pa thams cad log pa'i rang bzhin la med pa nyid du ga la yod / / de'i phyir khyod kyis stong pa nyid kyang mi shes pa yin no / / don gang nye bar bzung nas stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'jug pa de yang /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe / sā prajñaptirupādāya pratipatsaiva madhyamā / iti / yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti / yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnyu ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ / iti bhagavato gāthāvacanāt
# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang / / de nyid stong pa nyid du bshad / / de ni brten nas gdags pa ste / / de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no / / zhes 'di nyid du ston par 'gyur te / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes / / de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin / / rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad / / gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod min /
evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ, sa eva śūnyatāśabdasyārthaḥ, na punarabhāvaśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ sa śūnyatāśabdasyārthaḥ
# zhes tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra'i don gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don yin gyi dngos po med pa'i sgra'i don gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don ma yin no /
abhāvaśabdārthaṃ ca śūnyatārthamityadhyāropya bhavānasmānupālabhate
# khyod ni dngos po med pa'i sgra'i don stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don du sgro btags nas / / kho bo cag la klan ka tshol ba yin no /
tasmācchūnyatāśabdārthamapi na jānāti
# de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don yang mi shes pa yin no /
ajānānaśca tvamevamupālambhaṃ kurvan niyataṃ vihanyase / kaścāsmākaṃ yathoktamupālambhaṃ karoti? yo bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavibhāgaṃ na jānāti, kevalaṃ granthamātrādhyayanapara eveti / ata ācāryaḥ karuṇayā parasya mithyāpravacanārthāvabodhanirāsārthaṃ bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavyavasthāmeva tāvadadhikṛtyāha
# mi shes bzhin du klan ka tshol ba ni nges par khyod nyid la gnod pa yin no / / kho bo cag la ji skad smras pa'i klan ka tshol ba de su zhig ce na / / gang zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab las / / bstan pa bden pa gnyis kyis rnam par dbye ba phyin ci ma log par ma shes par gzhung tsam 'ba' zhig 'don pa lhur len pa'o / / de'i phyir slob dpon gyis gzhan gyi gsung rab kyi don log par rtog pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir / / re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab las bstan pa'i bden pa gnyis kyis phyin ci ma log par rnam par gzhag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
dve satye samupāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā / lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ
# sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa / / bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten / / 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang / / dam pa'i don gyi bden pa'o / / zhes gsungs so /
iha hi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ satyadvayamāśritya dharmadeśanā pravartate
# 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni / / bden pa gnyis la brten nas 'jug go /
katamatsatyadvayam? lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca paramārthasatyaṃ ca / tatra
# bden pa gnyis gang zhe na / / 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / / don dam pa'i bden pa'o / / de la /
skandhātmā loka ākhyātastatra loko hi niśritaḥ
# 'jig rten phung por rab grags pa / / de la 'jig rten nges par brten /
iti vacanātpañca skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalo loka ityucyate
# zhes 'byung ba las na phung po la brten nas brtags pa'i gang zag la 'jig rten zhes brjod do /
samantādvaraṇaṃ saṃvṛtiḥ / ajñānaṃ hi samantātsarvapadārthatattvāvacchādanātsaṃvṛtirityucyate / parasparasaṃbhavanaṃ vā saṃvṛtiranyonyasamāśrayeṇetyarthaḥ
# kun nas sgrib pas na kun rdzob ste / / mi shes pa ni dngos po'i de kho na nyid la kun nas 'gegs par byed pa'i phyir kun rdzob ces bya'o / / yang na phan tshun brten pas na kun rdzob ste / / phan tshun brten pa nyid kyis na zhes bya ba'i don to /
athavā saṃvṛtiḥ saṃketo lokavyavahāra ityarthaḥ
# yang na kun rdzob ni brda ste / / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
sa cābhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādilakṣaṇaḥ
# de yang brjod pa dang brjod bya dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no /
loke saṃvṛtirlokasaṃvṛtiḥ / kiṃ punaralokasaṃvṛtirapyasti yata evaṃ viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti? yathāvasthitapadārthānuvāda eṣaḥ, nātraiṣā cintāvatarati
# 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bo zhes 'jig rten kun rdzob ces gang las de ltar khyad par du byed pa 'jig rten ma yin pa'i kun rdzob kyang yod dam zhe na / / 'di ni dngos po ji ltar gnas pa rjes su brjod pa yin gyi / / 'dir dpyad pa de mi 'jug go /
athavā / timirakāmalādyupahatendriyaviparītadarśanāvasthānāste 'lokāḥ, teṣāṃ yā saṃvṛtirasāvalokasaṃvṛtiḥ
# rnam pa gcig tu na / / rab rib dang ling tog sngon po dang mig ser la sogs pas dbang po nyams pas mthong ba phyin ci log la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten ma yin te / / de dag gi kun rdzob gang yin pa de ni /
ato viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti
# 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa ma yin pas /
etacca madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇoktaṃ tato veditavyam / lokasaṃvṛtyā satyaṃ lokasaṃvṛtisatyam
# 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang / / zhes de las khyad par du byas so / / 'di yang dbu ma la 'jug pa las rgyas par bshad pas de las khong du chud par bya'o / / 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu bden pa ni /
sarva evāyamabhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādivyavahāro 'śeṣo lokasaṃvṛtisatyamityucyate
# 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa ste / / brjod bya dang rjod byed dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa'i tha snyad ma lus pa 'di dag thams cad ni /
na hi paramārthata ete vyavahārāḥ saṃbhavanti / tatra hi / nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare / anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇamiva dharmatā / iti kṛtvā kutastatra paramārthe vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ kuto vā jñānasya? sa hi paramārtho 'parapratyayaḥ śāntaḥ pratyātmavedya āryāṇāṃ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ / sa nopadiśyate na cāpi jñāyate / uktaṃ hi pūrvam / aparapratyayaṃ śāntaṃ prapañcairaprapañcitam
# 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o / / don dam pa la ni 'di dag yod pa ma yin te / / der ni brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste / / sems kyi spyod yul bzlog pas so / / ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa / / chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs pa yin pa de'i phyir don dam pa de la tshig gam shes pa 'jug pa ga la yod / / don dam pa de ni gzhan las shes pa ma yin zhing zhi ba dang 'phags pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba dang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa yin gyi / / de ni bstan par bya ba ma yin zhing / / shes pa yang ma yin te / / gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang / / spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa /
nirvikalpamanānārthametattattvasya lakṣaṇam
# rnam rtog med don tha dad min / / de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do /
iti / paramaścāsāvarthaśceti paramārthaḥ / tadeva satyaṃ paramārthasatyam / anayośca satyayorvibhāgo vistareṇa madhyamakāvatārādavaseyaḥ
# zhes sngar bshad zin to / / don yang de yin la dam pa yang de yin pas na don dam pa'o / / de nyid bden pa yin pas don dam pa'i bden pa'o / / bden pa 'di gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba ni / / rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las shes par bya'o /
tadetatsatyadvayamāśritya buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravartate
# sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni / / bden pa gnyis po 'di la brten nas 'jug pa yin no /
evaṃ vyavasthite deśanākrame / ye 'nayorna vijānanti vibhāgaṃ satyayordvayoḥ
# bstan pa'i tshul de ltar rnam par gnas pa yin dang gang dag bden pa gnyis kyis ni / / rnam dbye rnam par mi shes pa / / de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa ni /
te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane / atrāha / yadi tarhi paramārtho niṣprapañcasvabhāvaḥ sa evāstu, tatkimanayā aparayā skandhadhātvāyatanāryasatyapratītyasamutpādādideśanayā prayojanamaparamārthayā? atatvaṃ hi parityājyam / yacca parityājyaṃ kiṃ tenopadiṣṭena? ucyate
# zab mo'i 'di nyid rnam mi shes / / zhes bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te don dam pa spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin yin na / / 'o na de nyid yin la rag mod / / phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa ston pa don dam pa ma yin pa gzhan 'dis ci zhig dgos / / de nyid ma yin pa ni yongs su spang bar bya ba yin na / / gang yongs su spang bar bya ba yin pa bstan pa des ci zhig bya / / brjod par bya ste /
satyametadevam / kiṃ tu laukikaṃ vyavahāramanabhyupagamya abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādilakṣaṇam, aśakya eva paramārtho deśayitum, adeśitaśca na śakyo 'dhigantum, anadhigamya ca paramārthaṃ na śakyaṃ nirvāṇamadhigantumiti pratipādayannāha / vyavahāramanāśritya paramārtho na deśyate
# de ni de ltar bden mod kyi / / 'on kyang brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'jig rten pa'i don dam pa khas ma blangs par don dam pa bstan par mi nus la / / ma bstan na yang rtogs par mi nus shing / / don dam pa ma rtogs par yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du phyin par mi nus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / tha snyad la ni ma brten par / / dam pa'i don ni bstan mi nus / / dam pa'i don ni ma rtogs par /
paramārthamanāgamya nirvāṇaṃ nādhigamyate / tasmānnirvāṇādhigamopāyatvādavaśyameva yathāvasthitā saṃvṛtirādāvevābhyupeyā bhājanamiva salilārthineti
# mya ngan 'das pa 'thob mi 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir / / chu 'dod pas snod ltar thog mar gdon mi za bar kun rdzob ji ltar gnas pa khas blang bar bya'o /
tadevaṃ yaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthalakṣaṇasatyadvayasya vyavasthāmapākṛtya śūnyatāṃ varṇayati, taṃ tathāvidhaṃ pudgalam
# de'i phyir de ltar / / gang zhig kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid can bden pa gnyis kyis rnam par gzhag pa ma byas par stong pa nyid smra bar byed pa'i gang zag rnam pa de lta bu ni /
vināśayati durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā mandamedhasam
# stong pa nyid la lta nyes na / / shes rab chung rnams phung bar byed /
sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā
# ji ltar sbrul la bzung nyes dang / / rig sngags nyes par bsgrub pa bzhin /
saṃvṛtisatyaṃ hi ajñānamātrasamutthāpitaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ buddhā tasya paramārthalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyamāno yogī nāntadvaye patati
# rnal 'byor pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa mi shes pa tsam gyis bskyed pa rang bzhin med par rtogs nas de'i stong pa nyid do / / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni mtha' gnyis su lhung bar mi 'gyur te /
kiṃ tadāsīdyadidānīṃ nāstītyevaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt paścādapi nāstitāṃ na pratipadyate
# gang zhig da lta med par gyur pa de'i tshe na / / ci zhig yod par 'gyur zhes de ltar sngar dngos po'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pas phyis kyang med pa nyid du mi rtogs la /
pratibimbākārāyāśca lokasaṃvṛterabādhanāt karmakarmaphaladharmādharmādikamapi na bādhate
# 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba la gnod pa ma byas pas / / las dang las kyi 'bras bu dang chos dang chos ma yin pa la yang gnod pa la ma yin no / / don dam pa dngos po nyid du sgro 'dogs par byed pa yang ma yin te /
na cāpi paramārthaṃ bhāvasvabhāvatvena samāropayati / niḥsvabhāvānāmeva padārthānāṃ karmaphalādidarśanāt sasvabhāvanāṃ cādarśanāt
# dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams kho na la las kyi 'bras bu la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba rnams kyi ltar yang /
yastu evaṃ satyadvayavibhāgamapaśyan śūnyatāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ paśyati, sa śūnyatāṃ paśyan mumukṣurnāstitāṃ vā saṃskārāṇāṃ parikalpayed, yadi vā śūnyatāṃ kāṃcidbhāvataḥ satīm, tasyāścāśrayārthaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamapi parikalpayet / ubhayathā cāsya durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā niyataṃ vināśayet / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi tāvatsarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti parikalpayet, tadāsya mithyādṛṣṭirāpadyate / yathoktam
# las dang las kyi 'bras bu ma mthong ba dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa thams cad ma mthong ba'i phyir ro / / gang gis de ltar bden pa gnyis kyi rnam bar dbye ba ma mthong bar 'du byed rnams stong pa nyid du mthong ba des ni stong pa nyid mthong bas 'du byed rnams yod pa ma yin pa nyid du rtog par byed la / / yang na stong pa nyid 'ga' zhig dngos por brtags nas / / de'i rten gyi ched du dngos po'i rang bzhin yang rtog par byed de / / de ni gnyi ga ltar yang stong pa nyid la lta nyes pas nges par phung bar byed pa yin no / / ji ltar zhe na / / re zhig / / gal te thams cad stong pa ste / / thams cad yod pa ma yin no / / zhes rtog na ni de'i tshe / / 'di log par lta bar 'gyur te / / ji skad du /
vināśayati durdṛṣṭo dharmo 'yamavipaścitam
# chos 'di log par bzung gyur na / / mi mkhas rnams ni chud kyang za /
nāstitādṛṣṭisamale yasmādasminnimajjati
# 'di ltar med par lta ba yi / / mi gtsang der ni bying bar 'gyur / / zhes bshad do /
atha sarvāpavādaṃ kartuṃ necchati, tadā niyatamasya śūnyatāyāḥ pratikṣepa āpadyate
# ci ste yang thams cad la skur pa 'debs par mi 'dod na ni de'i tshe / / ji ltar dngos po 'di ngag dmigs su zin kyang stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur te /
kathaṃ hi nāma amī bhāvāḥ sakalasurāsuranaralokairupalabhyamānā api śūnyā bhaviṣyanti? tasmānna niḥsvabhāvārthaḥ śūnyatārthaḥ, ityevaṃ pratikṣipya saddharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena pāpakena karmaṇā niyatamapāyānvayāt / yathoktamāryaratnāvalyām / aparo 'pyasya durjñānānmūrkhaḥ paṇḍitamānikaḥ / pratikṣepavinaṣṭātmā yātyavīcimadhomukhaḥ / iti / evaṃ tāvadabhāvena gṛhyamāṇā śūnyatā grahītāraṃ vināśayati
# de'i phyir rang bzhin med pa'i don ni stong pa nyid kyi don ma yin no zhes 'di nges par stong pa nyid spong bar 'gyur te / / de ltar spangs nas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyis nges par ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro / / ji skad du rin po che'i phreng ba las / / gzhan yang 'di ni log bzung na / / blun po mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can / / spong bas ma rung bdag nyid can / / mnar med par ni spyi tshugs 'gro / / zhes bshad do / / de ltar na re zhig stong pa nyid la dngos po med par bzung bas na /
athāyaṃ bhāvena śūnyatāṃ parikalpayet, tadāśrayāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāmastitvam, evamapi nirvāṇagāmini mārge vipratipannatvācchūnyatopadeśavihvalo jāyeta / tadevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇāpi śūnyatā gṛhyamāṇā grahītāraṃ vināśayati / nanu ca yadupakārakaṃ tadanyathā [kriyamāṇamakāloptamiva bījaṃ na phalāya kalpate, kāloptaṃ ca mahate phalalābhāya jāyate, evameva maṇimantrauṣadhādibhi] rgṛhyamāṇaḥ [sarpaḥ] mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhamāvahati śiromaṇigrahaṇāt, tena ca vyālagrāhakāṇāṃ jīvikākalpanāt / yathoddeśatiraskāreṇa  tu gṛhyamāṇo grahītārameva vināśayati
# 'dzin pa po phung bar byed pa yin no; ;ci ste bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang de'i rten 'du byed rnams yod pa nyid du rtog par byed pa de lta na yang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam la log par zhugs pa'i phyir / / stong pa nyid bstan pa 'bras bu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro; ;de'i phyir de ltar na stong pa nyid dngos po'i ngo bor gzung ba na yang 'dzin pa po phung bar byed do / / gal te phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa gzhan du gzung na / / phan 'dogs par ma gyur mod / / gnod par byed par ni ji ltar 'gyur te / / 'bru dag go rims las nyams par btab pa na / / 'debs pa po brlag par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na / / de'i phyir slob dpon gyis brjod par bzhed pa'i don ston pa'i dpe gsungs pa ni / / ji ltar sbrul la bzung nyes dang / / rig sngags nyes par bsgrubs pa bzhin / / zhes bya ba ste /
yathā ca yathopadeśaṃ prasādhitā vidyā sādhakamanugṛhṇāti, upadeśaparibhraṣṭā tu sādhyamānā sādhakameva vināśayati, evamihāpi yathopadeśaṃ śūnyatā mahatī vidyā sādhyamānā gṛhyamāṇā bhāvābhāvādigrāhatiraskāreṇa madhyamayā pratipadā grahītāraṃ parameṇa jātijarāmaraṇādiduḥkhahutāśanaśamanaikarasena nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇajaladharadhārāvarṣamukhena yojayati / yathopadeśaviśeṣavigamena tu gṛhyamāṇā niyataṃ yathoditena nyāyena grahītārameva vināśayati
# ji ltar sbrul sman dang sngags kyi stobs kyis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin bzung na nor gyi phung po chen po 'gugs par byed la / / ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bor nas 'dzin na ni 'dzin pa po nyid phung bar byed pa yin no / / yang ji ltar man ngag ji lta ba bzhin rab tu bsgrubs ba'i rig sngags kyis ni sgrub pa po la phan 'dogs par byed la / / man ngag las nyams par bsgrubs na ni sgrub pa po nyid brlag par byed pa yin no / / de bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du stong pa nyid bzung na ni / / 'dzin pa po mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mchog la sbyor bar byed la / / ji ltar nye bar bstan par spangs nas bzung na ni / / nges par ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa po nyid phung bar byed pa yin no /
yataścaivaṃ śūnyatā durgṛhītā grahītāraṃ vināśayati, mandaprajñaiśca aśakyā samyaggrahītum
# gang gi phyir de ltar stong pa nyid la bzung nyes pas 'dzin pa po phung bar byed la / / shes rab zhan pa dag gis kyang yang dag par 'dzin par mi nus pa / / de phyir zhan pas chos 'di yi /
ataśca pratyudāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ deśayituṃ muneḥ / dharmaṃ matvāsya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatām / yasmādayaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇo dharmo mandamedhasamalpaprajñaṃ sattvaṃ viparyāsagrahaṇādvināśayati, ata eva asya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatāṃ matvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvadhātuṃ cāvalokya dharmasya cātigāmbhīryam, saddharmaṃ deśayituṃ cittaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato mahopāyajñānaviśeṣaśālinaḥ / yathoktaṃ sūtre / atha bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhasyaitadabhavat / adhigato mayā dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ / sacettamahaṃ pareṣāmārocayeyam, pare ca me na vibhāvayeyuḥ, sa mama vighātaḥ syāt, klamathaḥ syāt, cetaso 'nudayaḥ syāt / yannvahamekākyaraṇye pravivikte dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramanuprāpto vihareyam / iti vistaraḥ / tadevaṃ satyadvayāviparītavyavasthāmavijñāya / śūnyatāyāmadhilayaṃ yaṃ punaḥ kurute bhavān / doṣaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ sa śūnye nopapadyate / yo 'yaṃ bhavatā mahān doṣaprasaṅgo 'smāsu prakṣiptaḥ / yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ / ityādinā, sa yasmāt satyadvayavyavasthānabhijñena satā śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ śūnyatāprayojanaṃ ca yathāvadabuddhā upakṣiptaḥ, so 'smākaṃ śūnye śūnyatāvāde nopapadyate / yataśca nopapadyate, ato yaṃ bhavān doṣaprasaṅgaṃ śūnyatāyāmudbhāvayan śūnyatāyāmadhilayamadhikṣepaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṃ karoti, so 'dhilayo 'smākaṃ nopapadyate / abhāvārthaṃ hi śūnyatārthamadhyāropya prasaṅga udbhāvito bhavatā / na ca vayamabhāvārthaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ vyācakṣmahe, kiṃ tarhi pratītyasamutpādārtham / ityato na yuktametat śūnyatādarśanadūṣaṇam / na ca kevalaṃ yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgo 'smatpakṣe nāvatarati, api khalu sarvameva satyādi vyavasthānaṃ sutarāmupapadyate iti pratipādayannāha / sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate / sarvaṃna yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate / yasya hi sarvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyaṃ yujyate, tasya sarvametad yathopavarṇitaṃ yujyate / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmāt pratītyasamutpādaṃ hi vayaṃ śūnyateti vyācakṣmahe / yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti / yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ / iti gāthāvacanāt / "śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena" iti prajñāpāramitābhidhānāt / tasmādyasyeyaṃ śūnyatā yujyate rocate kṣamate, tasya pratītyasamutpādo yujyate
# gting rtogs dka' bar mkhyen gyur nas / / thub pa'i thugs ni chos bstan las / / rab tu log par gyur pa yin / / gang gi phyir phyin ci log tu bzung bas / / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos 'dis shes rab chung ba ste / / sems can spobs pa chung ba phung bar byed pa de nyid kyi phyir / / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas / / sems can thams cad kyi khams dang chos shin tu zab pa la gzigs te / / zhan pa dag gis chos 'di'i don rtogs par dka' bar mkhyen par gyur nas thub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs chos ston pa las log par gyur pa yin no / / ji skad du / / mdo las / / de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par 'di snyam du dgongs te / / ngas chos zab mo zab par snang ba brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing / / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa / / zhib mo mkhas shing mdzangs par rig par bya ba thugs su chud de / / de gal te ngas gzhan dag la bstan na / / gzhan gyis nga'i de rtogs par mi 'gyur / / des nga la gnod par 'gyur zhing zhum par 'gyur / / thugs mi spro bar 'gyur bas gang bdag nyid gcig pu dgon pa rab tu dben pa mthong ba'i chos la / / bde ba la reg par gnas par rab tu thob pas gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o / / de'i phyir de ltar bden pa gnyis phyin ci ma log par rnam par gnas pa ma shes par / / skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba ni / / stong la 'thad pa ma yin pas / / khyed ni stong nyid spong byed pa / / gang de nga la mi 'thad do / / gang gi phyir khyod kyis kho bo cag la gal te 'di dag kun stong la / / 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med / / ces bya ba la sogs pas skyon chen por thal bar nye bar bkod pa gang yin pa de ni / / bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par gzhag pa mngon par ma shes pas / / stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid kyi don dang stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du ma chud pas bkod pa yin pas / / kho bo cag gi stong pa la ste / / stong pa nyid du smra ba la de'i 'thad pa ma yin no / / gang gi phyir mi 'thad pa de'i phyir khyod stong pa nyid la nye bar thal bar brjod cing / / stong pa nyid spong bar byed pa ste / / 'dor zhing sel la zlog par byed pa gang yin pa'i spong ba de nged cag la mi 'thad do / / 'di ltar khyed kyis ni dngos po med pa'i don stong pa nyid kyi don du sgro btags nas thal ba brjod pa yin na / / kho bo cag ni stong pa nyid kyi don dngos po med pa'i don du mi 'chad cing / / 'o na ci zhe na / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to / / de'i phyir stong pa nyid du lta ba la sun 'byin pa 'di mi rigs so / / kho bo cag gi phyogs la ji skad smras pa'i skyon du thal ba mi 'jug pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / 'on kyang bden pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa thams cad ches shin tu 'thad pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / / gang la stong pa nyid rung ba / / de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur / / gang la stong nyid mi rung ba / / de la thams cad mi rung 'gyur / / gang la dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di rung ba de la ji skad smras pa de dag thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro / / ji ltar zhe na / / gang gi phyir kho bo cag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la stong pa nyid ces smra ste / / de'i phyir / / gang la stong pa nyid 'di rung ba de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rung la /
yasya pratītyasamutpādo yujyate, tasya catvāryāryasatyāni yujyante
# gang la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rung ba de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams rung bar 'gyur ro /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmāt pratītyasamutpannaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati nāpratītyasamutpannam / tacca niḥsvabhāvatvācchūnyam / sati ca duḥkhe duḥkha samudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī ca pratipad yujyate
# ji ltar zhe na / / gang gi phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid sdug bsngal du 'gyur gyi / / rten cing 'brel par mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no / / de ni rang bzhin med pas stong par 'gyur ro; ;sdug bsngal yod na ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam rung bar 'gyur ro /
tataśca duḥkhaparijñānaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ nirodhasākṣātkaraṇaṃ mārgabhāvanā ca yujyate
# de'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang kun 'byung spang ba dang 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang lam bsgom par yang rung ngo /
sati ca duḥkhādisatyaparijñānādike phalāni yujyante
# sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa yongs su shes pa la sogs pa yod na ni 'bras bu rnams rung bar 'gyur ro /
satsu ca phaleṣu phalasthā yujyante / satsu ca phalastheṣu pratipannakā yujyante / satsu ca pratipannakaphalastheṣu saṃgho yujyate
# 'bras bu rnams yod na 'bras bu la gnas pa dag rung ngo / / 'bras bu la gnas pa dag yod na ni zhugs pa dag kyang rung bar 'gyur ro / / 'bras bu la gnas pa dang zhugs pa dag yod na ni dge 'dun rung ngo /
āryasatyānāṃ ca sadbhāve sati saddharmo 'pi yujyate / sati ca saddharme saṃghe ca buddho 'pi yujyate
# 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod na / / dam pa'i chos kyang rung bar 'gyur ro / / dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun yod na ni sangs rgyas kyang rung bar 'gyur ro /
tataśca trīṇyapi ratnāni yujyante / laukikalokottarāśca padārthāḥ sarve viśeṣādhigamā yujyante
# de'i phyir dkon mchog gsum yang rung bar 'gyur ro / / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad khyad par du rtogs pa thams cad kyang rung la /
dharmādharmaṃ tatphalaṃ sugatidurgatiḥ laukikāśca sarvasaṃvyavahārā yujyante / tadevam
# chos dang chos ma yin pa dag dang de'i 'bras bu dang 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad dag kyang rung bar 'gyur ro; ;de'i phyir de ltar na /
sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate / yasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yujyate, tasya sarvametad yathoditaṃ yujyate, saṃpadyate ityarthaḥ / yasya tu śūnyatā yathoditā na yujyate, tasya pratītyasamutpādābhāvāt sarvaṃ na yujyate / yathā ca na yujyate, tathā vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyati / tadevamāsmākīne supariśuddhatare sarvavyavasthāsu aviruddhe vyavasthite, atisthūle atyāsanne tadviruddhe ca svakīye pakṣe doṣavati atimogho yathāvadavasthitau guṇadoṣāvapaśyan / sa tvaṃ doṣānātmanīnānasmāsu paripātayan / aśvamevābhiruḍhaḥ sannaśvamevāsi vismṛtaḥ / yathā hi kaścid yamevāśvamārūḍhaḥ, tameva vismṛtaḥ san, tadapahāradoṣeṇa parānupālabhate, evameva bhavān pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaśūnyatādarśanāśvamārūḍha eva atyantavikṣepāttamanupalambhamāno 'smān parivadati / ke punaste parasya doṣāḥ, yānanupalabhamānaḥ śūnyatāvādinameva upālabhate iti, tān pratipādayannāha / svabhāvādyadi bhāvānāṃ sadbhāvamanupaśyasi / ahetupratyayān bhāvāṃstvamevaṃ sati paśyasi / yadi tvaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānān bhāvān paśyasi, tadā svabhāvasya hetupratyayanirapekṣatvāt ahetupratyayān avidyamānahetupratyayān padārthān bāhyādhyātmikabhedabhinnān nirhetukān tvamevaṃ sati paśyasi / sati ca ahetukatvābhyupagame / kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām / utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadīha ghaṭaḥ svabhāvato 'stīti parikalpayasi, tadā asya svabhāvato vidyamānasya kiṃ mṛdādibhirhetupratyayaiḥ prayojanamiti teṣāmabhāvaḥ syāt / nirhetukaṃ ca kāryaṃ ghaṭākhyaṃ nopapadyate
# gang la stong pa nyid rung ba de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro / / gang la stong pa nyid mi rung ba de la ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid med pas / / thams cad mi rung bar 'gyur ro / / ji ltar mi rung ba de ltar ni rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro; ;de'i phyir de ltar kho bo cag gi phyogs chos yongs su dag cing / / rnam par gzhag pa thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam par gnas pa yin pa dang rang gi phyogs rags pa shin tu nyes pa'i skyon dang bral bar de dag dang 'gal ba la shin tu blun pas / / yon tan dang skyon ji ltar gnas pa dag ma mthong ba / / khyod ni rang gi skyon rnams ni / / nga la yongs su sgyur byed pa / / rta la mngon par zhon bzhin du / / rta nyid brjed par gyur pa bzhin / / ji ltar 'ga' zhig rta gang la zhon pa de nyid brjed nas de phrogs pa'i nyes pas gzhan la klan ka tshol ba de bzhin du / / khyod kyang stong pa nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rta la zhon pa kho na yin bzhin du / / shin tu rnam par gyengs pas de ma dmigs pas kho bo cag la yongs su rtsod pa yin no / / gang dag mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid du smras pa kho na la klan ka tshol ba / / gzhan gyi skyon de dag kyang gang zhe na / / de dag rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te dngos rnams rang bzhin la / / yod par rjes su lta byed na / / de lta yod na dngos po rnams / / rgyu rkyen med par khyod lta'o / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te khyod dngos po rnams rang bzhin gyis yod par lta bar byed na / / de'i tshe rang bzhin ni rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos pa'i phyir / / dngos po rnams rgyu rkyen med pa ste / / rgyu dang rkyen yod pa ma yin zhing / / rgyu med par khyod lta ba ma yin no / / rgyu med par lta ba khas len pa ma yin na yang / / 'bras bu dang ni rgyu nyid dang / / byed pa po dang byed dang bya / / skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang / / 'bras bu la yang gnod pa byed pa yin no / / ji ltar zhe na / / gal te bum pa rang bzhin gyis yod do zhes rtogs na ni / / de'i tshe rang bzhin gyis yod pa de la 'jim pa la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen dag gis ci dgos te / / de'i phyir de dag med la / / bum pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu rgyu med pa yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
asati cāsmiṃścakrādikasya karaṇasya, kartuḥ kumbhakārasya ghaṭakaraṇakriyāyāścābhāvā dutpādanirodhayorabhāvaḥ
# de med na ni byed pa po rdza mkhan dang byed pa po 'khor lo la sogs pa dang bum pa byed pa'i bya ba yang med do / / de dag med pas skye ba dang 'gag pa dag kyang med la / / skye ba dang 'gag pa dag yod pa ma yin na / / 'bras bu yang yod par ga la 'gyur /
asatoścotpādanirodhayoḥ kutaḥ phalam? iti sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvametat kāryādikaṃ pratibādhase / tadevaṃ bhavataḥ sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvameva na yujyate / asmākaṃ tu bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāvādināṃ sarvametadupapadyate
# de'i phyir dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len na / / 'bras bu la sogs pa de dag thams cad la gnod pa byed pa yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len na / / khyod la thams cad mi rung ba yin no / / kho bo cag stong pa nyid du smras pa rnams la 'di dag thams cad 'thad pa ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmādvayam / yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe / sā prajñaptirupādāya pratipatsaiva madhyamā / yo 'yaṃ pratītyasamutpādo hetupratyayānapekṣya aṅkuravijñānādīnāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ, sa svabhāve nānutpādaḥ / yaśca svabhāvenānutpādo bhāvānāṃ sā śūnyatā
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar kho bo cag gis ni / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang / / de ni stong pa nyid du bshad / / de ni brten nas gdags pa ste / / de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste / / rgyu dang rkyen dag la ltos nas / / myu gu dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni / / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na; gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa de ni stong pa nyid yin te /
yathā bhagavatoktam
# ji skad du / / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
yaḥ pratyatyairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti
# gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes / / de las skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin /
yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ
# rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad / / gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod yin /
iti / tathā āryalaṅkāvatāre
# zhes gsungs pa dang ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
"svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti mayā deśitāḥ" / iti vistareṇoktam
# blo gros chen po rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la dgongs nas / / ngas chos thams cad skye ba med par gsungs so zhes rgyas par gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa brgya lnga bcu pa las kyang /
dvayardhaśatikāyām / "śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena" / iti / yā ceyaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatā sā prajñaptirupādāya, saiva śūnyatā upādāya prajñaptiriti vyavasthāpyate / cakrādīnyupādāya rathāṅgāni rathaḥ prajñapyate / tasya yā svāṅgānyupādāya prajñaptiḥ, sā  svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, yā ca svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, sā śūnyatā
# chos thams cad stong pa ste rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brten nas gdags pa ste / / stong pa nyid de nyid ni brten nas gdags pa zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag go / / 'khor lo la sogs pa shing rta'i yan lag la brten nas shing rtar 'dogs la / / de'i rang gi yan lag la brten nas btags pa gang yin pa de ni / / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin la / / gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa de ni stong pa nyid yin zhing /
saiva svabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipaditi vyavasthāpyate / yasya hi svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, tasya astitvābhāvaḥ, svabhāvena cānutpannasya vigamābhāvānnāstitvābhāva iti
# rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa nyid de nyid ni dbu ma'i lam yin zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag ste / / 'di ltar gang zhig rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa de la ni / / yod pa nyid med la / / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la 'jig pa med pas med pa nyid med pa de'i phyir / / yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba de'i phyir /
ato bhāvābhāvāntadvayarahitatvāt sarvasvabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipat, madhyamo mārga ityucyate / tadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādasyaivaitā viśeṣa saṃjñāḥ / śūnyatā, upādāya prajñaptiḥ, madhyamā pratipad iti / vicāryamāṇaśca sarvathā / apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate / yasmāttasmādaśūnyo hi dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate
# rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa nyid de nyid ni dbu ma'i lam ste / / dbu ma'i shul zhes bya'o / / de'i phyir de ltar na stong pa nyid dang brten nas gdags pa dang dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi ming gi bye brag yin no / / rnam par dpyad na ni rnam pa thams cad du / / gang phyir rten 'byung ma yin pa'i / / chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin la / / de phyir stong pa ma yin pa'i / / chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no /
yo hi apratītyasamutpanno dharmaḥ, sa na saṃvidyate / yathoktaṃ śatake
# gang zhig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i chos de ni yod pa ma yin te / / ji skad du brgya pa las /
apratītyāstitā nāsti kadācitkasyacitkvacit / na kadācitkvacitkaścidvidyate tena śāśvataḥ
# gang zhig gang na nam gyi tshe 'ang / / ma brten par ni yod nyid med / / des na nam yang 'ga' zhig tu / / rtag pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin /
ākāśādīni kalpyante nityānīti pṛthagjanaiḥ
# nam mkha' la sogs rtag go zhes / / so so'i skye bo dag gis rtogs /
laukikenāpi teṣvarthānna paśyanti vicakṣaṇāḥ
# mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag la / / 'jig rten pas kyang don ma mthong /
iti / uktaṃ ca bhagavatā / pratītya dharmānadhigacchate vidū na cāntadṛṣṭīya karoti niśrayam
# zhes bshad do / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / mkhas pas rten 'byung chos rnams rtogs 'gyur te / / mthar lta ba la brten par yod mi byed /
sahetu sapratyaya dharma jānati ahetu apratyaya nāsti dharmatā
# rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen bcas chos shes kyi / / rgyu med rkyen med chos nyid yod ma yin /
evam / apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate / apratīsamutpannaśca śūnyaḥ / tasmādaśūnyo dharmo nāsti / yata etadevam, ato 'smākaṃ sarvadharmāścaśūnyāḥ, na ca paroktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ
# zhes gsungs so / / de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa yin pa de'i phyir stong ba ma yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no / / gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir / / kho bo cag gi ltar na chos thams cad stong pa yin zhing / / gzhan gyis smras pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no /
bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ
# dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba khyod kyi ltar na ni /
yadyaśūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ
# gal te 'di kun mi stong na / / 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med pa yin no /
tadā niyatamudayavyayayorabhāve sati / caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaste prasajyate
# 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med na de'i tshe nges par / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams / / khyod la med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt / apratītya samutpannaṃ kuto duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / rten cing 'brel 'byung ma yin na / / sdug bsngal yod par ga la 'gyur /
anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate
# mi rtag sdug bsngal gsungs pa de / / rang bzhin nyid la yod ma yin /
yaddhi sasvabhāvam, na tatpratītyotpadyate / yacca apratītya samutpannam, na tadanityaṃ bhavati / na hi gaganakusumamavidyamānamanityam
# gang zhig rang bzhin dang bcas pa de ni brten nas 'byung ba ma yin zhing / / gang zhig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa de ni mi rtag pa ma yin te nam mkha'i me tog ni mi rtag pa ma yin no /
anityaṃ ca duḥkhamuktaṃ bhavagatā / yadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti / tathā ca śatakaśāstre
# sdug bsngal yang mi rtag pa yin par ni / / gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so / / de bzhin du brgya pa las kyang /
anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham / tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate
# mi rtag pa la nges par gnod / / gang la gnod yod de bde min / / de phyir gang zhig mi rtag pa / / de ni thams cad sdug bsngal 'gyur /
iti / yacca anityaṃ svābhāvye sasvabhāvatve 'bhyupagamyamāne bhāvānām, tanna vidyata iti / evaṃ tāvat sasvabhāvatve sati bhāvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ na yujyate
# zhes bshad do / / mi rtag pa de yang rang bzhin nyid la ste / / rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du khas len na dngos po rnams la yod pa ma yin no / / de ltar na re zhig dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid yin na / / sdug bsngal mi rung ba yin no /
na ca kevalaṃ duḥkhameva na yujyate, sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha
# sdug bsngal nyid mi rung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / rang bzhin dang bcas par khas blangs na / / kun 'byung ba yang mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / rang bzhin las ni yod yin na /
svabhāvato vidyamānaṃ kiṃ punaḥ samudeṣyate / tasmātsamudayo nāsti śūnyatāṃ pratibādhataḥ / iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate / tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt taddhetukalpanāvaiyarthyameva, ityevaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya samudayo 'pi bhavato na yujyate / svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha
# ci zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur / / de phyir stong nyid gnod byed la / / kun 'byung yod pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te / / 'dir 'di las sdug bsngal kun 'byung bas na / / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las kun 'byung zhes bya'o / / de'i phyir sdug bsngal stong pa nyid la gnod pa byed cing / / sdug bsngal rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len pa de'i ltar na / / de yang skye ba don med pa'i phyir / / de'i rgyu rtog pa don med pa nyid do / / de ltar na stong pa nyid la gnod pa byed pa khyod la kun 'byung yang mi rung ngo / / sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid du khas len pa la / / sdug bsngal 'gog pa yang mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yod la / / 'gog pa yod pa ma yin no / / rang bzhin nyid ni yongs gnas phyir / / 'gog la gnod pa byed pa yin /
na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate / svabhāvaparyavasthānānnirodhaṃ pratibādhase / yadi hi svabhāvato duḥkhaṃ syāt, tadā svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto 'sya nirodhatvamiti? evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase / idānīmāryamārgo 'pi sasvabhāvavādino yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha / svābhāvye sati mārgasya bhāvanā nopapadyate / athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate / yadi hi sasvabhāvā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ, tadā mārgo 'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā abhāvita evāsāvasti / tasya kiṃ punarbhāvanayeti? evam / svābhāvye sati mārgasya bhāvanā nopapadyate / atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā, evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā āryamārgasya na syāt, kāryatvādityabhiprāyaḥ / api ca / duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā mārgasyeṣyate
