# zhes gsungs te / / gal te sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yod na / / de'i tshe rang bzhin la ldog pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa ga la yod / / de ltar na rang bzhin yongs su gnas pa'i phyir / / rang bzhin yongs su bzung nas phyir ldog par byed pa ni / / sdug bsngal 'gog pa la yang gnod par byed pa yin no / / da ni dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la / / 'phags pa'i lam yang ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / lam la rang bzhin yod na ni / / sgom pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro / / ci ste lam de bsgom bya na / / khyed kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin / / gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod par gyur na ni / / de'i tshe lam yang rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma bsgoms pa nyid du de yod pas / / de la yang bsgoms pas ci zhig bya / / de ltar na rang bzhin yod na lam sgom pa mi 'thad do / / ci ste khyod lam de sgom par khas len na / / de ltar na 'o na khyod kyi 'phags pa'i lam rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'gyur te / / bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / gzhan yang sdug bsngal 'gog pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir lam sgom par 'dod pa zhig na /
pūrvoktena tu nyāyena sasvabhāvavādino bhavataḥ
# dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba ltar na ni / / sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate
# gang tshe sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang / / 'gog pa yod pa ma yin na /
mārgo duḥkhanirodhatvāt katamaḥ prāpayiṣyati
# lam gyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni / / gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur bar 'dod /
nāstyeva asau duḥkhanirodhaḥ, yannirodhānmārgo bhāvitaḥ san prāpayiṣyati / tasmādāryamārgo 'pyevaṃ nopapadyata iti / evaṃ sasvabhāvavādinaḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prāpnoti
# lam bsgoms pas 'gog pa gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur ba sdug bsngal 'gog pa de ni yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar na / / 'phags pa'i lam yang mi 'thad do / / de ltar na dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams med par 'gyur ro /
idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha
# da ni gzhan la sdug bsngal la sogs pa shes pa la sogs pa yang ji skad mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te rang bzhin nyid kyis ni /
svabhāvenāparijñānaṃ yadi tasya punaḥ katham / parijñānaṃ nanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ
# yongs su shes pa ma yin na / / de ni ji ltar yongs shes 'gyur / / rang bzhin gnas pa ma yin nam / / zhes gsungs te /
yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti kalpyate, tadayuktam
# gal te sdug bsngal sngar yongs su ma shes pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa las / / de phyis yongs su shes pa yin no zhes rtogs na / / de ni mi rigs so /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānnanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar rang bzhin gnas pa ma yin nam ste / / rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
yo hi svabhāvaḥ, sa kila loke samavasthitaḥ, naivānyathātvamāpadyate, vahnerauṣṇyavat / yadā ca svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nāsti, tadā pūrvamaparijñātasvabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti
# 'jig rten na yang dag par gnas shing me'i tsha ba ltar gzhan du mi 'gyur ba yin no; ;gang gi tshe rang bzhin la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / / sdug bsngal sngar yongs su shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni phyis kyang yongs su shes par mi 'thad do /
ato duḥkhaparijñānamapi na saṃbhavati
# de'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yang mi srid do /
yadā caitadduḥkhaparijñānamapi na saṃbhavati, tadā
# gang gi tshe sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe bhāvanā caivameva te / parijñāvanna yujyante catvāryapi phalāni ca
# de bzhin du ni khyod nyid kyi / / spang dang mngon du bya ba dang / / sgom dang 'bras bu bzhi dag kyang / / yongs shes bzhin du mi rung ngo /
yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam, te ete dve prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi / evameva te duḥkhaparijñānāsaṃbhavānna yujyante / samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate
# sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa mi srid pa de bzhin du gang kun 'byung ba spang ba dang 'gog pa mngon du bya ste spang ba dang mngon du bya ba ste gnyis dang gang yang lam sgom pa 'di dang de rnams mi rung ngo / / kun 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma spangs pa'i rang bzhin ni / / phyis kyang spang bar mi 'thad do / / ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
evaṃ bhāvanāsākṣātkaraṇe 'pi yojyam
# de bzhin du mngon du bya ba dang sgom pa gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca
# dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra na / / yongs su shes pa la sogs pa mi rung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
parijñāvanna yujyante catvāryapi phalāni ca
# 'on kyang 'bras bu bzhi dag kyang / / yongs su shes pa bzhin du mi rung ngo /
yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam, evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na saṃbhavati
# ji ltar sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yongs su shes pa ma yin pa yongs su shes par mi rung ba de bzhin du / / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sngar rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa yang phyis yod par mi srid do /
yathā srotaāpattiphalasya, evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatphalānāmabhāvo veditavyaḥ / na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante, kiṃ tarhi adhigamo 'pyeṣāṃ na yujyata iti pratipādayannāha / svabhāvenānadhigataṃ yatphalaṃ tatpunaḥ katham / śakyaṃ samadhigantuṃ syātsvabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ / svabhāvasyāvijahanaprakṛtikatvādbhāvasvabhāvavādamabhyupagacchataḥ pūrvamanadhigatasvabhāvānāṃ paścādapyadhigamo nopapadyate / tataśca / phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ / saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ / abhāvāccāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate
# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba de bzhin du / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rnams mi srid pa yang khong du chud par bya'o / / yongs su shes pa bzhin du 'bras bu de dag mi rung ba / / 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de'o na ci zhe na / / de dag 'thob pa yang mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / rang bzhin yongs su 'dzin pa yis / / 'bras bu rang bzhin nyid kyi ni / / thob pa yin pa gang yin des / / ji ltar thob par nus par 'gyur / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / rang bzhin du smra ba khas len pas / / sngar thob pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa rnams phyis kyang thob pa mi 'thad de / / rang bzhin ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir / / 'bras bu med na 'bras gnas med / / zhugs pa dag kyang yod ma yin / / gal te skyes bu gang zag brgyad / / de dag med na dge 'dun med / / 'phags pa'i bden rnams med pa'i phyir / / dam pa'i chos kyang yod ma yin /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati
# chos dang dge 'dun yod min na / / sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
anayośca ślokayoḥ pūrvavadevārtho veditavyaḥ / api ca
# zhes bya ste / / tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyi don ni gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o /
sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati / apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate / apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate / yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt, sa bodhiṃ sarvajñajñānamapratītyāpi anapekṣyāpi syāt
# gzhan yang rang bzhin du smra ba khas len na / / khyed kyis sangs rgyas byang chub la / / ma brten par yang thal bar 'gyur / / khyed kyis byang chub sangs rgyas la / / ma brten par yang thal bar 'gyur / / gal te sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dngos po 'ga' zhig rang bzhin gyis yod par gyur na ni byang chub ste / / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ma brten par te /
akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca / iti vacanāt / tathā vināpi buddhena bodhiḥ syāt, anapekṣyāpi buddhaṃ nirāśrayā bodhiḥ syāt
# ma ltos par yang 'gyur te; rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang / / gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin / / zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du byang chub kyang sangs rgyas med par 'gyur te / / sangs rgyas la ma ltos par yang rten med pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur te / / rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ cānyat / yaścābuddhaḥ svabhāvena sa bodhāya ghaṭannapi
# gzhan yang / / khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis ni / / sangs rgyas min pa gang yin des /
na bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhiṃ te 'dhigamiṣyati
# byang chub spyod la byang chub phyir / / btsal kyang byang chub 'thob mi 'gyur /
iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt, abuddhasvabhāvasya vyāvartayitumaśakyatvāt
# 'dir sangs rgyas nyid kyang snga rol du sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad cing byang chub kyi don du btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur pa nyid de / / sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i rang bzhin bzlog par mi rung ba'i phyir ro /
kiṃ cānyat / na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati / kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi
# gzhan yang / / 'ga' yang chos dang chos min pa / / nam yang byed par mi 'gyur te / / mi stong pa la ci zhes bya / / rang bzhin la ni bya ba med /
sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate
# rang bzhin du smra ba khas len na / / chos dang chos ma yin pa dag byed par mi 'thad do /
kiṃ hi aśūnyasya kartavyam? na hi svabhāvasyāśūnyasya kāraṇamupapadyate vidyamānatvāt / kiṃ cānyat / vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate
# stong pa ma yin pa la bya ba ci zhig yod de / / yod pa'i phyir stong pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la ni bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang / / chos dang chos min med par yang / / 'bras bu khyed la yod par 'gyur /
dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate / yadetaddharmādharmanimittakamiṣṭāniṣṭaphalam, yadi tat svabhāvato 'sti, tad vināpi dharmādharmābhyāṃ syāt / yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti, tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati
# chos dang chos min rgyus byung ba'i / / 'bras bu khyod la yod ma yin / / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyu can gang yin pa de / / gal te rang bzhin gyis yod na ni / / chos dang chos ma yin pa dag med par yang de khyod la yod par 'gyur ro / / gang gi tshe chos dang chos ma yin pa dag med par khyod la 'bras bu yod na de'i tshe / / chos dang chos ma yin pa dag las skyes pa'i 'bras bu khyod la yod pa ma yin te /
dharmādharmopārjanavaiyarthyaṃ syāt, / dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate / iti
# chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs pa don med par 'gyur bas / / chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyus 'byung ba'i 'bras bu khyod la yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no /
atha dharmādharmanimittakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti parikalpyate, na tarhi tatphalamaśūnyamiti pratipādayannāha
# ci ste chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyus 'byung ba'i 'bras bu yod pa ma yin no zhes rtog na / / 'o na 'bras bu de mi stong pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam
# chos dang chos min rgyus 'byung ba'i / / 'bras bu gal te khyod la yod /
dharmādharmasamutpannamaśūnyaṃ te kathaṃ phalam
# chos dang chos min las byung ba'i / / 'bras bu ci phyir stong ma yin / / zhes gsungs pa dang 'di ni stong pa yin te /
śūnyamevaitat, pratītyasamutpannatvāt, pratibimbavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ
# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / gzhan yang song shig /
api ca / sarva eva hyete 'gaccha, kuru, paca, paṭha, tiṣṭha'; ityevamādayo laukikā vyavahārāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ
# byos shig tshos shig / / ltos shig 'dug shig / / ces bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag gal te khyod rang bzhin dang bcas par 'dod na /
tān yadi sasvabhāvānicchati bhavān, tadā bhavatā pratītyasamutpādo bādhito bhavati / tadbādhanācca sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha / sarvasaṃvyavahārāṃśca laukikān pratibādhase
# de'i tshe khyod kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gnod pa byas pa yin la / / de la gnod pa byas pas 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad do cog la gnod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yi / / stong pa nyid la gnod byed gang / / 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad ni /
yatpratītyasamutpādaśūnyatāṃ pratibādhase / yacchabdaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇam
# kun la'ang gnod pa byed pa yin / / zhes gsungs pa la / / gang gi sgra ni bya ba'i khyad par te /
yadbādhase ityanena saṃbadhyate / kiṃ cānyat / na kartavyaṃ bhavetkiṃcidanārabdhā bhavetkriyā
# gnod byed ces bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro / / gzhan yang / / stong pa nyid la gnod byed na / / bya ba ci yang med 'gyur zhing /
kārakaḥ syādakurvāṇaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhataḥ / yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ, sasvabhāvā eva bhaveyuḥ, tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt
# rtsom pa med pa'i bya bar 'gyur / / mi byed pa yang byed par 'gyur / / gal te dngos po rnams stong pa nyid ma yin zhing rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du gyur na / / de'i tshe rang bzhin ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir / / sus kyang bya ba ci yang med par 'gyur te /
na hi nabhaso 'nāvaraṇatvaṃ kenacit kriyate
# nam mkha'i mi sgrib pa ni sus kyang byed pa ma yin pa bzhin no /
akriyamāṇā ca kriyā syāt / kriyāṃ cākurvāṇasya kārakatvaṃ syāt
# byed bzhin pa ma yin pa yang bya bar 'gyur la / / bya ba mi byed pa yang byed pa por 'gyur na /
na caitadevamiti / tasmānnāśūnyāḥ padārthāḥ / kiṃ cānyat / ajātamaniruddhaṃ ca kūṭasthaṃ ca bhaviṣyati / vicitrābhiravasthābhiḥ svabhāve rahitaṃ jagat / [vicitrābhiravasthāmiḥ svabhāvaracitaṃ svabhāvenaiva racitamapratītyasamutpannaṃ jagat svabhāvaśūnyavādinām / ] svabhāvenaiva yadi bhāvāḥ [sasvabhāvāḥ] syuḥ, tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt
# de dag ni de ltar yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams mi stong pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang / / rang bzhin yod na 'gro ba rnams / / ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags dang / / ther zug tu ni gnas 'gyur zhing / / gnas skabs sna tshogs bral bar 'gyur / / gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas par gyur na / / de'i tshe / / rang bzhin bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par 'gyur ro / / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir na /
ajātāniruddhatvājjagat kūṭasthaṃ syāt
# 'gro ba ther zug tu gnas par 'gyur ro / / rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos pas na /
hetupratyayānapekṣaṃ vicitrābhiravasthābhī rahitamapratītyasamutpannaṃ jagadaśūnyavādināṃ syāt
# stong pa ma yin par smra ba rnams la / / 'gro ba rten cing 'brel par mi 'byung zhing gnas skabs sna tshogs pa dang bral par 'gyur ro /
yathoktaṃ pitāputrasamāgame / syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam
# ji skad du / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / mi stong cung zhig yod na rgyal ba yis / / 'ga' yang lung ston mi gsung 'gyur med par /
tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve / kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ / iti / tathā āryahastikakṣyasūtre
# rang rang dngos la ther zug gnas de la / / 'phel ba med cing yongs su nyams pa med / / ces gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa glang po rtsal las kyang /
yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ
# gal te chos rnams rang bzhin 'ga' yod na / / rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pas de mkhyen 'gyur /
kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ / iti / na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante, api ca lokottarā eva [api?] nopapadyante iti pratipādayannāha / asaṃprāptasya ca prāptirduḥkhaparyantakarma ca
# ther zug chos rnams mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur / / mkhas rnams nam yang spros pa med mi 'gyur / / zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len na 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad dag mi 'thad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / 'o na ci zhe na / / 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te stong pa yod min na / / ma thob thob par bya ba dang / / sdug bsngal mthar byed las dang ni /
sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ ca yadyaśūnyaṃ na vidyate
# nyon mongs thams cad spong ba'ang med / / ces gsungs te / / gal te stong pa yod pa ma yin zhing /
yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt, tadā yadasaṃprāptaṃ tadasaṃprāptameva, iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt / tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt / sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt / tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ
# 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin dang bcas par 'gyur na / / de'i tshe gang ma thob pa de ni mi thob pa kho na yin pas / / 'bras bu ma thob pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro / / de bzhin du sngar sdug bsngal mthar byad par ma gyur pas de ltar yang ma 'gyur ro / / sngar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs par ma gyur pas phyis kyang spong par mi 'gyur ro / / de ltar na gang ge phyir dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra bar khas blangs par gyur na / / thams cad mi rung ba de'i phyir /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyatīdaṃ sa paśyati / duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca / yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati, sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ / yathoktamāryamañjuśrīparipṛcchāyām / yena mañjuśrīranutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam
# gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung / / mthong ba de ni sdug bsngal dang / / kun 'byung dang ni 'gog pa dang / / lam nyid de dag mthong ba yin / / gang gis stong pa nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can yang dag par 'byung ba des ni / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams de kho na nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba yin no / / ji skad du 'phags pa chos thams cad 'jug pa med par bstan pa'i mdo las / / 'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad skye ba med par mthong ba des ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yin no /
yena nāstitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭā, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ
# gang gis chos thams cad med pa nyid du mthong ba des ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa yin no /
yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ
# gang gis chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das bar mthong ba des ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa yin no /
yena mañjuśrīrabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ / iti vistaraḥ
# 'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba des ni lam bsgoms pa yin no zhes bya ba rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
uktaṃ ca āryadhyāyitamuṣṭisūtre
# 'phags pa bsam gtan pa'i dpe mkhyud kyi mdo las kyang /
atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat
# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ sattvā evabhimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti
# 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas / / sems can phyin ci log pa zhes sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams 'khor ba yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro /
evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat
# de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to /
deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti? bhagavānāha
# bcom ldan 'das gang la nye bar dmigs pas sems can rnams 'khor ba las 'das par mi 'gyur ba bstan du gsol /
ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'jam dpal bdag dang bdag gi bar dmigs pas sems can rnams 'khor ba las mi 'da'o /
tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'jam dpal bdag dang gzhan du yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro /
bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate, upalabhya abhiniviśate, abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate / sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā / saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati / ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ duṣṭaḥ, ahaṃ mūḍhaḥ iti / tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ śīlavān, ahaṃ brahmacārī, saṃsāraṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi, ahaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmi, ahaṃ duḥkhebhyo mokṣyāmi / sa kalpayati / ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ, ime dharmā akuśalā iti, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ / sa kalpayati anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ādīptāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ / yannvahaṃ sarvasaṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam / tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / eṣā sā duḥkhaparijñā, yeyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / yannvahaṃ samudayaṃ prajaheyam / sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / iyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyā, idaṃ samudayaprahāṇam, yadidamebhyo dharmebhyo 'rtīyanā / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ / samudayaṃ kalpayitvā nirodhaṃ saṃjānāti / tasyaivaṃ  bhavati / eṣā sā nirodhasākṣātkriyā / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / yannūnamahaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayeyam / sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate / tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate
# 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das par mi shes pas bdag dang gzhan du dmigs par byed do / / dmigs nas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro / / mngon par zhen pas chags par 'gyur ro / / sdang bar 'gyur ro / / rmongs par 'gyur ro / / de chags pa dang sdang ba dang rmongs par gyur pas / / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed do / / de yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pas bdag ni chags so / / bdag ni sdang ngo / / bdag ni rmongs so snyam du rnam par rtog par byed do / / de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas 'di snyam du sems te / / bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o / / bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa'o / / bdag ni 'khor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro / / bdag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro / / bdag ni sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro snyam du rtog par byed cing / / de chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o / / chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o / / chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba'o / / chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya ba'o / / sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o / / kun 'byung spang bar bya'o / / 'gog pa mngon du bya'o / / lam bsgom par bya'o snyam du rtog go / / de nas de gang zhig 'du byed thams cad las 'byol par 'gyur ro / / 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o / / 'du byed thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba'o snyam du rtog par byed do / / de ltar rtog pa de la skyo ba dang lhan cig tu gyur pa yid la byed pa mtshan ma med pa sngon du 'gro ba skye bar 'gyur ro / / de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'o snyam du sems so / / de 'di snyam du gang bdag gis kun 'byung spang bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur zhing / / chos 'di dag gis nyen par 'gyur / / ches ngo tsha bar 'gyur / / mi dga' bar 'gyur / / smod par 'gyur / / skrag cing dngang la kun tu dngang bar 'gyur ro / / de 'di snyam du gang chos 'di dag gis nyen po de ni chos 'di dag mngon du byas pa yin zhing / / 'di ni kun 'byung spang ba'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro / / de 'di snyam du 'gog pa mngon du bya'o snyam du sems te / / de gnyis su brtags nas 'gog pa mngon du shes pa yin no / / de 'di snyam du 'gog pa mngon du byas pa de ni 'di yin no snyam du sems so / / de 'di snyam du gang bdag gis lam sgom mo snyam du sems shing / / de gcig pu dben par song nas chos de dag yid la byed pa na zhi gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro /
tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate
# skyo ba dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i yid la byed pa de de la zhi gnas skye bar 'gyur ro /
tebhyaścārtīyate jehrīyate, anabhinandanācittaṃ samutpadyate
# de chos thams cad la sems phyir 'byung bar 'gyur te / / phyir 'dren zhing phyir ldog par 'gyur ro / / de dag gis nyen par 'gyur /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati / mukto 'smi sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ, na mama bhūyaḥ uttariṃ kiṃcitkaraṇīyam, arhannasmītyātmānaṃ saṃjānāti / sa maraṇakālasamaye utpattimātmano deveṣu paśyati / tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau / sa vicikitsāmāpatitaḥ kālagato mahānirayeṣu prapatati / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati / atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat / kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni? bhagavānāha / yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam / yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ / yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ
# ches ngo tsha bar 'gyur / / mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro / / de 'di snyam du bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te / / yang phyis bya ba ci yang med cing bdag ni dgra bcom par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag nyid shes so / / de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe bdag nyid skye bar mthong bas / / de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom dang som nyi za bar 'gyur ro / / de som nyir lhung ste 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po dag tu lhung bar 'gyur ro / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / ji ltar skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la brtags nas / / de bzhin gshegs pa la som nyi dang yid gnyis skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to / / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams la ji ltar 'khums par bgyi / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / 'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba des ni / / sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yin no /
yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ
# gang gis chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong ba des ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa yin no /
yena mañjuśrīrevaṃ catvāri āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, sa na kalpayati / ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ, ime dharmā akuśalāḥ, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ iti / tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet / bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca / sa na kaṃciddharmamāvyūhati nirvyūhati / tasyaivamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhatastraidhātuke cittaṃ na sajjati
# gang gis chos thams cad gtan mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba des ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa yin no / / gang gis chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes par mthong ba des ni lam bsgoms pa yin no / / 'jam dpal gang gis de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po mthong ba des ni chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o / / chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o / / chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya'o / / chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya'o / / sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya / / kun 'byung spang bar bya / / 'gog pa mngon du bya / / lam bsgom par bya'o zhes mi rtog rnam par rtog par mi byed de / / 'di ltar gang brtag par bya ba'i chos de des ma mthong ba'i phyir ro / / byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni chos de dag la rtog pa na chags par 'gyur ro / / sdang bar 'gyur ro / / rmongs par 'gyur ro / / de chos 'ga' yang mi len mi 'dor de ltar mi len mi 'dor ba de ni / / khams gsum la sems chags par mi 'gyur ro /
ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam
# khams gsum thams cad ma skyes pa dang sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu dang brag ca lta bur mthong ngo /
evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu / tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā / sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati, dharmamapi na samanupaśyati, saṃdhamapi na samanupaśyati
# chos thams cad de lta bu'i rang bzhin can du mthong bas sems can thams cad la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar des gang la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / des sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pas sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / / chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati / avicikitsan nirupādāno bhavati
# dge 'dun yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar mthong bas chos gang la yang som nyi skyed par mi byed do /
nirupādāno 'nupādāya parinirvātīti vistaraḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / nirvāṇaparīkṣā pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam
# som nyi med pas nye bar len pa med par 'gyur ro / / nye bar len pa med pas nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshigs gsal ba las / / 'phags pa'i bden pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha / yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ
# 'dir smras pa / / gal te 'di dag kun stong na / / 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
prahāṇādvā nirodhādvā kasya nirvāṇamiṣyate
# gang zhig spang dang 'gog pa las / / mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod /
iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca
# 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag changs par spyod pa bsten zhing / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa chos rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la / / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te / / phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang phung po lhag ma med pa'o /
tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate
# de la ma rig pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs ma lus par spangs pa las phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'dod do /
tatra upadhīyate 'sminnātmasnehaḥ iti upadhiḥ / upadhiśabdena ātmaprajñaptinimittāḥ pañcopādānaskandhā ucyante
# de la 'di la bdag la chags pa bsten pas na phung po ste / / bdag tu gdags pa'i rgyu nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la phung po'i sgras brjod do / / lhag ma lus pas na lhag ma'o /
śiṣyata iti śeṣaḥ, upadhireva śeṣaḥ upadhiśeṣaḥ, saha upadhiśeṣeṇa vartate iti sopadhiśeṣam / kiṃ tat? nirvāṇam
# phung po nyid lhag ma yin pas na phung po lhag ma'o / / phung po lhag ma dang lhan cig gnas pas na phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'o / / de ci yin zhe na /
tacca skandhamātrakameva kevalaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayādikleśataskararahitamavaśiṣyate nihatāśeṣacauragaṇagrāmamātrāvasthānasādharmyeṇa / tat sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇam
# mya ngan las 'das pa'o / / de yang chom rkun gyi tshogs ma lus par bsad de grang tsam 'dug pa dang chos mthun par 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang bral ba phung po tsam 'ba' zhig lus pa ste /
yatra tu nirvāṇe skandhapañcakamapi nāsti, tannirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇam / nirgataḥ upadhiśeṣo 'sminniti kṛtvā / nihatāśeṣacauragaṇasya grāmamātrasyāpi vināśasādharmyeṇa / tadeva ca adhikṛtya ucyate / abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā
# de ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o / / chom rkun gyi tshogs ma lus par bsad de grong tsam po yang zhig pa dang chos mtshungs par mya ngan las 'das pa gang la phung po tsam yang yod pa ma yin pa de ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste / / 'di phung po'i lhag ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas / / gang na lus zhig 'du shes 'gags / / tshor ba thams cad bral gyur zhing /
vūpasamiṃsu saṃkhārā viññāṇamatthamagamā ti / tathā / asaṃlīnena kāyena vedanāmadhyavāsayat / pradyotasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasaḥ / iti / tadevaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇaṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhāllabhyate / etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati? yadā tu sarvamidaṃ śūnyam, naiva kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate, tadā kutaḥ kleśāḥ, kuto vā skandhāḥ, yeṣāṃ nirodhe nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmādvidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti / atrocyate / nanu evamapi sasvabhāvābhyupagame
# 'du byed nye bar zhi ba dang / / rnam par shes pa nub gyur pa / / zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du / / ma zhum ba yi lus kyis ni / / tshor ba dang du len pa na / / de yi sems ni rnam par grol / / mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin / / zhes bshad do / / de'i phyir phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa de ni phung po 'gags pa las 'thob bo / / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis po de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur zhe na / / gal te nyon mongs pa rnams dang phung po rnams 'gags par gyur pa yin na / / gang gi tshe 'di dag thams cad stong pa yin zhing / / cung zad kyang skye ba med la cung zad kyang 'gag pa yang med pa de'i tshe / / gang dag 'gags pa las mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa'ang phung po rnams yod par gal 'gyur / / de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa nyid do zhes 'dzer to / / brjod par bya ste / / de ltar rang bzhin khas len na yang /
yadyaśūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ
# gal te 'di kun mi stong na / / 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
prahāṇādvā nirodhādvā kasya nirvāṇamiṣyate
# gang zhig spong dang 'gags pa las / / mya ngan 'das par 'gyur bar 'dod /
svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ, yatastannivṛttyā nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmāt svabhāvavādināṃ naiva nirvāṇamupapadyate / na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi
# gang las de dag log pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba / / nyon mongs pa rnams dang phung po rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas pa ldog par ga la 'gyur te / / rang bzhin la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la mya ngan las 'das pa mi 'thad pa nyid do / / gang las de dag la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur ba / / stong pa nyid du smra ba rnams kyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa nyon mongs pa ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can nam phung po ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can 'dod pa ma yin no /
ataḥ anupālambha evāyaṃ śūnyavādinām
# de'i phyir stong pa nyid du smra ba rnams la klan ka 'dir mi 'gyur ba nyid do /
yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti, kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ tarhi icchanti? ucyate
# gal te stong pa nyid du smra ba rnams mya ngan las 'das pa phung po rnams sam / / nyon mongs pa rnams log pa'i mtshan nyid can mi 'dod na / / mtshan nyid gang dang ldan pa zhig 'dod ce na / / brjod pa /
aprahīṇamasaṃprāptamanucchinnamaśāśvatam / aniruddhamanutpannametannirvāṇamucyate / yaddhi naiva prahīyate rāgādivat, nāpi prāpyate śrāmaṇyaphalavat, nāpyucchidyate skandhādivat, yaccāpi na nityamaśūnyavat, tat svabhāvato 'niruddhamanutpannaṃ ca sarvaprapañcopaśamalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇamuktam / tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet? kuto vā skandhakalpanā tatra, yeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhāt tadbhavet? yāvaddhi etāḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante, tāvannāsti nirvāṇādhigamaḥ, sarvaprapañcaparikṣayādeva tadadhigamāt / atha syāt / yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ, na cāpi skandhāḥ, tathāpi nirvāṇādarvāgvidyante / tatasteṣāṃ parikṣayānnirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti / ucyate / tyajyatāmayaṃ grāhaḥ, yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum
# spangs pa med pa 'thob med pa / / chad pa med pa rtag med pa / / 'gag pa med pa skye med pa; / / de ni mya ngan 'das par brjod / / gang zhig 'dod chags la sogs pa ltar spangs pa med cing / / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu ltar 'thob pa med pa / / phung po la sogs pa ltar chad pa yang med la / / gang yang mi stong pa ltar rtag pa ma yin pa / / rang bzhin gyi 'gag pa med pa skye ba med pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can de ni mya ngan las 'das par bshad do / / de'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu de la nyon mongs pa gang dag spangs pas de mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba / / nyon mongs par rtog pa ga la yod cing / / phung po gang dag 'gags pas de 'thob bar 'gyur ba phung por rtog pa yang ga la yod / / ji srid du rtog pa 'di dag 'byung ba de srid du mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yod pa ma yin te / / spros pa thams cad zad pa nyid las de 'thob pa'i phyir ro / / ci ste mya ngan las 'das pa la nyon mongs pa rnams med cing phung po rnams kyang med mod kyi / / de lta na yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i snga rol na yod pa yin no / / de'i phyir de dag 'gags pa ni spros pa zad pa las mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'gyur ro snyam na / / brjod pa / / 'dzin pa 'di ni dor bar bya'o / / gang gi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i snga rol na rang bzhin gyis yod pa rnams ni yang dngos po med par bya bar mi nus te /
tasmānnirvāṇābhilāṣiṇā tyājyaiṣā kalpanā / vakṣyati hi
# de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pas rtog pa 'di dor bar bya'o /
nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca / na tayorantaraṃ kiṃcitsusūkṣmamapi vidyate / iti / tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam / tataśca niravaśeṣakalpanākṣayarūpameva nirvāṇam / uktaṃ ca bhagavatā / nirvṛtti dharmāṇa ca asti dharmā ye neha astī na te jātu asti / astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati / iti / asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ / nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti, evaṃ ca sarvavādināmabhimatam / ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi, pradīpodayādandhakāropalabdharajjusarpabhayādivat, na te jātu asti, na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato  vidyante
# mya ngan 'das mtha' gang yin pa / / de ni 'khor ba'i mtha' yin te / / de gnyis khyad par cung zad ni / / shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin / / zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / mya ngan 'das la chos rnams yod nyid med / / chos gang der med de dag gzhar yang med / / yod dang med ces rtog pa dang ldan zhing / / de ltar spyod rnams sdug bsngal nyer mi zhi / / zhes gsungs pa yin pas so / / tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin te / / mya ngan las 'das pa ste phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na'o / / chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams sam phung po rnams te / / rnam pa thams cad du bral pa'i phyir yod pa nyid med do / / 'di ni rgol ba thams cad kyi 'dod pa yin no / / mar me gtang bas mun par thag pa la sbrul du dmigs pa ltar chos gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa 'di la yod pa ma yin pa de dag ni gzhar yang med do / / nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos de dag ni 'khor ba'i gnas skabs kyi dus 'ga' zhig na yang de kho na nyid du yod pa ma yin no /
na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo 'sti, sadbhūtasarpavat andhakāre 'pi āloke 'pi kāyacakṣurbhyāmagrahaṇāt
# 'di ltar mun pa'i gnas skabs na thag pa la sbrul rang gi ngo bos yod pa ni ma yin te / / yod par gyur pa'i sbrul ltar mun pa dang snang bar yang 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate / ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti / āha / astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati / iti / astīti bhāvasadbhāvakalpanāvatāṃ jaiminīyakāṇādakāpilādīnāṃ vaibhāṣikaparyantānām / nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāṃ nāstikānāmapāyagatiniṣṭhānām / tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām, parikalpitasvabhāvasya nāstivādinām, paratantrapariniṣpannasvabhāvayorastivādinām, evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti / tathā / yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjña abhyupeti no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate
# 'o na ji ltar 'khor ba yin zhe na / / brjod pa / / rab rib can rnams la skra shad dang sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa snang ba ltar dngos po yod pa mi yin pa'i rang bzhin can dag kyang byis pa bdag dang bdag gi bar yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ci log gi gdon gyis bzung ba rnams bden bar snang ba yin no zhes gsungs pa ni / / yod dang med ces rtog pa dang ldan zhing / / de ltar spyod rnams sdug bsngal nyer mi zhi / / zhes bya'o / / yod do zhes dngos po yod par rtog pa dang ldan pa rgyal dpog pa dang gzegs zan dang ser skya la sogs pa bye brag tu smra ba rnams la thug pa rnams dang med ces rtog pa dang ldan pa med pa pa rnams dang de dag las gzhan 'du byed 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed med par smra zhing de las gzhan yod par smra ba rnams dang kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med par smra zhing / / gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yod par smra ba rnams te / / de ltar yod pa dang med par smra ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal te 'khor ba zhi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya'o / / de bzhin du / / ji ltar dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug langs pa / / dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur / / de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa /
evameva bālu 'pagato ..... jāyi mriyate sadā abhūto / iti
# bdag der 'du shes yang dag min rtag skye zhing 'chi / / zhes kyang gsungs so / / de'i phyir de lta bas na /
tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam / tataśca sarvakalpanākṣayarūpameva nirvāṇam
# mya ngan las 'das pa la 'ga' yang spangs pa med la / / 'ga' yang 'gag pa med do zhes shes par bya'o / / de'i phyir rtog pa thams cad zad pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin no /
yathoktamāryaratnāvalyām
# ji skad du 'phags pa rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang /
na cābhāvo 'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā
# mya ngan 'das pa dngos med pa'ang / / min na de dngos gal yin /
bhāvābhāvaparāmarśakṣayo nirvāṇamucyate
# dngos dang dngos po med 'dzin pa / / zad pa mya ngan 'das zhes bya /
iti / ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti, tān prati ucyate
# zhes bshad do / / gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa kun du rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo ma rtogs shing / / mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang de gnyi ga dang gnyi gam yin pa'i ngo bor yongs su rtog par byed pa / / de dag la brjod pa /
bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇaṃ jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇam
# re zhig mya ngan 'das dngos min / / rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur /
prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā / tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate
# rga dang 'chi ba med pa yi / / dngos po yod pa ma yin no / / de la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por mngon par zhen pa kha cig ni 'di skad du /
iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyatarodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ padārthaḥ, tannirvāṇam
# 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i rgyun 'jug pa nges par 'gog par 'gyur ba / / chu'i rgyun 'gog pa'i chu lon dang 'dra ba'i don dngos po'i bdag nyid can yin te /
na ca avidyamānasvabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate
# yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos ni de ltar 'bras bu byed par yang ma mthong ngo /
nanu ca yo 'syā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam, na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati
# gal te 'di dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang lhan cig tu 'gyur pa'i srid pa zad cing 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam / / zad pa tsam ni dngos po yin par 'os pa yang ma yin no /
tathā / pradyotasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasaḥ
# de bzhin du / / mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar / / de yi sems ni rnam par thar /
ityuktam / na ca pradyotasya nivṛttirbhāva ityupapadyate / ucyate / naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti / kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo 'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati, sa tṛṣṇākṣaya iti vaktavyam
# zhes gsungs te / / mar me shi ba ni dngos po yin no zhes bya bar yang mi 'thad do zhe na / / smras pa / / sred pa zad pa ni sred pa zad pa'o zhes de ltar ni shes par mi bya'o / / 'o na ci zhe na / / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i chos de yod na sred pa zad par 'gyur ba de ni sred pa zad pa'o zhes bya bar rig par bya'o /
pradīpaśca dṛṣṭāntamātram
# mar me ni dpe tsam du zad do /
tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti
# der yang gang yod na sems thar par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes smra'o /
evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati / bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjarāmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta, bhāvasya jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇāvyabhicāritvāt
# de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po rnam par gnas pa yin dang re zhig mya ngan 'das dngos min / / zhes slob dpon nges par rtog par mdzad do / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur te / / dngos po ni rga shi'i mtshan nyid la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir de mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
tataśca nirvāṇameva tanna syāt, jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇatvādvijñānavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ
# rga shi'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir / / rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no /
tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha / asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti / yo hi jarāmaraṇarahitaḥ, sa bhāva eva na saṃbhavati, khapuṣpavat, jarāmaraṇarahitatvāt
# rga shi'i mtshan nyid la mi 'khrul ba de nyid bsal bar bya ba'i phyir / / rga dang 'chi ba med pa yi / / dngos po yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bshad de / / rga shi dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po nyid ma yin te / / rga shi dang bral ba'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
kiṃ cānyat / bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet
# gzhan yang / / gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na / / mya ngan 'das pa 'dus byas 'gyur /
nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana / yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tannirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet, vijñānādivat bhāvatvāt
# dngos po 'dus byas ma yin pa / / 'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin / / gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin na ni de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa de 'dus byas su 'gyur te / / dngos po yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bzhin no /
yastu asaṃskṛtaḥ, nāsau bhāvaḥ, tadyathā kharaviṣāṇavaditi vyatirekamupadarśayannāha / nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana / kvacanetyadhikaraṇe deśe kāle siddhānte vā / kaścanetyādheye / ādhyātmiko bāhyātmiko vetyarthaḥ / kiṃ cānyat / bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇamanupādāya tatkatham / nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate / yadi bhavanmatena nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadupādāya bhavet, svakāraṇasāmagrīmāśritya bhavedityarthaḥ
# gang 'dus byas ma yin pa de ni dngos por mi 'gyur te / / dper na bong bu'i rva bzhin no / / ldog pa bshad pa'i phyir / / dngos po 'dus byas ma yin pa / / 'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin / / zhes bya ba gsungs te / / 'ga' yang zhes bya ba ni brten pa ste / / nang ngam phyi'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to / / gang na'ang zhes bya ba ni rten te / / yul lam dus sam grub pa'i mthar ro / / gzhan yang / / gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na / / ji ltar myang 'das de brten min / / dngos po brten nas ma yin pa / / 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no / / gal te khyod kyi lugs kyis mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin na ni / / de brten nas yin par 'gyur te / / rang gi rgyu'i tshogs pa la brten nas yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
na caivamupādāya nirvāṇamiṣyate, kiṃ tarhi anupādāya / tadyadi bhāvo nirvāṇamanupādāya, tat kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt? naiva anupādāya syāt, bhāvatvāt, vijñānādivat / vyatirekakāraṇamāha / nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti
# de ltar brten nas mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa yang ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na de ni ma brten par ro / / gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin na / / ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa de brten nas ma yin par 'gyur te / / mi brten pa yin par mi 'gyur ba nyid de / / dngos po yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin no / / ldog pa bshad pa ni / / dngos po brten nas ma yin pa / / 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bya ba'o /
atrāha / yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam, yathoditadoṣaprasaṅgāt, kiṃ tarhi abhāva eva nirvāṇam, kleśajanmanivṛttimātratvāditi? ucyate
# 'dir smras pa / / ji skad bshad ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir / / mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa de ni bden te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / nyon mongs pa dang skye ba log pa'i phyir / / mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa kho na yin no / / brjod pa /
etadapyayuktam, yasmāt / yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati
# 'di yang mi rigs te / / gang gi phyir / / gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min / / dngos med ji ltar rung bar 'gyur /
nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate / yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ neṣyate, yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāva iti neṣyate, tadā kimabhāvo bhaviṣyati nirvāṇam? abhāvo 'pi na bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ / kleśajanmanorabhāvo nirvāṇamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi  kleśajanmanoranityatā nirvāṇamiti syāt / anityataiva hi kleśajanmanorabhāvo nānyat, ityataḥ anityataiva nirvāṇaṃ syāt / na caitadiṣṭam, ayatnenaiva mokṣaprasaṅgādityuktamevaitat / kiṃ cānyat / yadyabhāvaśca nirvāṇamanupādāya tatkatham / nirvāṇaṃ na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate / tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate, kharaviṣāṇādīnāmanityatānupalambhāt / lakṣaṇamāśritya lakṣyaṃ prajñapyate, lakṣyamāśritya ca lakṣaṇam / ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇapravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati? tasmādabhāvo 'pyupādāya prajñapyate / tato yadi abhāvaśca nirvāṇam, tat kathamanupādāya nirvāṇaṃ bhavet? upādāyaiva tadbhavet, abhāvatvādvināśavat
# gang la mya ngan 'das dngos min / / de la dngos med yod ma yin / / gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por mi 'dod cing mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po'o snyam du mi 'dod na / / de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med par ji ltar rung bar 'gyur te / / dngos po med par yang rung bar mi 'gyur ba nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / gang la mya ngan 'das dngos min / / de la dngos med yod ma yin / / zhes gsungs te / / 'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin btang nas gzhan du gyur pa la dngos po med pa zhes bsnyad na / / bstan zin pa'i nyes pas phyogs gang la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa'i phyogs de la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa'i phyogs de la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa yang ma yin te / / dngos po'i rang bzhin du ma grub pa'i ngo bo la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / gal te mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa dang skye ba med pa yin no zhe na / / de lta na 'o na nyon mongs pa dang skye ba'i mi rtag pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'gyur te / / gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa dang skye ba med pa ni mi rtag pa nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te / / de'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'gyur na / / de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te / / sgrib pa med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so / / gzhan yang / / gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min / / ji ltar myang 'das de brten min / / gang zhig brten nas ma yin pa'i / / dngos med yod pa ma yin no / / de la mi rtag pa nyid dngos po med pa nyid yin zhing dngos po la brten nas 'dogs pa ma yin te / / bong bu'i rva la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa nyid ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / mtshan nyid la brten nas mtshan gzhi 'jug la / / mtshan gzhi la brten nas mtshan nyid 'jug pa de'i phyir mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi 'jug pa phan tshun ltos pas mtshan gzhi'i dngos po la ma ltos par mi rtag pa nyid yod pa rag la 'gyur / / de'i phyir dngos po med pa yang brten nas 'dogs pa yin no / / de'i phyir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa 'ga' zhig yin na ni / / ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa de brten nas ma yin par 'gyur /
etadeva spaṣṭayannāha / na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti / yadi tarhi abhāvaḥ anupādāya nāsti, kimidānīmupādāya bandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā bhaviṣyanti? kenaitaduktaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā iti? uktaṃ hi pūrvam / bhāvasya cedaprasiddhirabhāvo naiva sidhyati / bhāvasya hyanyathābhāvamabhāvaṃ bruvate janāḥ
# de ni brten nas kho na yin te / / dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa bzhin no / / de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir / / gang zhig brten nas ma yin pa'i / / dngos med yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bshad do / / gal te ma brten par dngos po med pa yod pa ma yin na / / 'o na da ci la brten nas mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa dag dngos po med par 'gyur zhe na / / mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa dngos po med pa yin no zhes de skad sus smras / / 'di ltar / / gal te dngos po ma grub na / / dngos med 'grub par mi 'gyur ro / / dngos po gzhan du gyur pa ni / / dngos med yin par skye bo smra /
iti / tasmānna bandhyāputrādīnāmabhāvatvam / yaccāpyucyate / ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca
# zhes sngar bshad zin to / / de'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa rnams dngos po med pa nyid ma yin no / / yang gang du / / nam mkha'i ri bong ra dag dang / / mo gsham gyi ni bu dag kyang /
asantaścābhilapyante tathā bhāveṣu kalpanā
# med bzhin tshig tu brjod pa ltar / / dngos la rtog pa'ang de bzhin no /
iti, / tatrāpi bhāvakalpanāpratiṣedhamātram, na abhāvakalpanā, bhāvatvāsiddhereveti vijñeyam
# zhes gsungs pa der yang / / dngos por rtog pa bkag pa tsam zhig yin gyi / / dngos po med par rtog pa ni ma yin te /
vandhyāputra iti śabdamātramevaitat, na asya arthaḥ upalabhyate, yasyārthasya bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ vā syāditi / kutaḥ anupalabhyamānasvabhāvasya bhāvābhāvakalpanā yokṣyate? tasmāt na bandhyāputro 'bhāva iti vijñeyam / tataśca sthitameva na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti / atrāha / yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati, abhāvo 'pi, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇamiti? ucyate / iha hi bhagavadbhistathāgataiḥ / ya ājavaṃjavībhāva upādāya pratītya vā / so 'pratītyānupādāya nirvāṇamupadiśyate / tatra ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ āgamanagamanabhāvajanmamaraṇaparaṃparetyarthaḥ
# dngos po nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes shes par bya'o / / mo gsham gyi bu zhes bya ba 'di ni sgra tsam zhig tu zad kyi / / don gang zhig dngos po 'am dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di'i don ma dmigs so / / de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin la dngos po dang dngos po med par brtags par ga la rigs / / de'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / de'i phyir / / gang zhig brten nas ma yin pa'i / / dngos med yod pa ma yin no / / zhes bya ba 'di ni gnas so / / 'dir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin no / / 'o na mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin zhes zer na / / brjod pa / / 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis / / 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba'i dngos / / brten tam rgyur byas gang yin pa / / de ni brten min rgyur byas min / / mya ngan 'das pa yin par bstan / / de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po ni 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po ste / / skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat
# 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po de yang res 'ga' rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa la brten nas yod do zhes bya bar 'dogs te ring po dang thung ngu bzhin no /
kadācidutpadyata iti prajñapyate pradīpaprabhāvad bījāṅkuravat / sarvathā yadyayamupādāya prajñapyate, yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate, sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā apravṛttistannirvāṇamiti  vyavasthāpyate / na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti / evaṃ na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇam / athavā
# res 'ga' ni rgyur byas nas 'dogs te mar me'i 'od bzhin no / / gal te 'dir rgyur byas nas 'dogs sam / / brten nas skye'o zhes rnam par 'jog kyang rung ste / / rnam pa thams cad du skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgyun de ma brten pa'am rgyur byas pa ma yin par mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa yin par rnam par gzhag go / / mi 'jug pa tsam ni dngos po 'am dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya bar brtag par yang mi nus te / / de ltar na mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa yang ma yin no /
yeṣāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti pakṣaḥ, teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca, so 'pratītyāpravartamāno nirvāṇamiti kathyate
# yang na 'du byed 'khor ba yin no zhes bya ba gang dag gi phyogs yin pa de dag gi ltar na rten cing brten nas skye ba dang 'jig pa gang yin pa de brten pa ma yin par mi 'jug pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar brjod pa 'am /
yeṣāṃ tu pudgalaḥ saṃsarati, teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenāvācyasya tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate, sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate / na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum
# gang dag gi ltar na gang zag 'khor ba yin pa de dag gi rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du brjod du med pa de'i 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med par nye bar len pa de dang de la brten nas gang yin pa de ni rgyur byas nas 'jug pa yin la / / rgyur byas shing rgyur byas nas 'jug pa de nyid da ltar rgyur byas pa ma yin par mi 'jug pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar bsnyad do / / 'du byed rnams dang gang zag gi mi 'jug pa tsam ni dngos po 'am dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya bar brtag par nus pa yang ma yin no /
ityato 'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate / kiṃ cānyat / prahāṇaṃ cābravīcchāstā bhavasya vibhavasya ca / tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate / tatra sūtra uktam / ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante vibhavena vā, aparijñānaṃ [taṃ?] tatteṣāmiti
# de'i phyir yang mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'o / / gzhan yang / / 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / / slang bar ston pas bka' stsal to / / de phyir mya ngan 'das pa ni / / dngos min dngos med min par rigs / / de la mdo las dge slong dag gang dag 'byung ba'am 'jig pas srid pa las nges par 'byung ba tshol ba de ni de dag gi yongs su mi shes pa chen po yin no zhes gsungs so /
ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca / na caitannirvāṇaṃ prahātavyamuktaṃ bhagavatā, kiṃ tarhi aprahātavyam
# 'byung ba'i sred pa dang 'jig pa'i sred pa de ni gnyi ga yang yongs su spang bar bya ba yin na / / mya ngan las 'das pa ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis spang bar bya ba ma gsungs te / / 'o na ci zhe na /
tadyadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ syādabhāvarūpaṃ vā, tadapi prahātavyaṃ bhavet / na ca prahātavyam
# spang bar bya ba ma yin par ro / / de'i phyir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po'i rang bzhin can nam / / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur na ni / / de yang spang bar bya ba kho nar 'gyur na / / spang bar bya ba yang ma yin te /
tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate / yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam, teṣāmubhayarūpamiti nirvāṇaṃ nopapadyate, iti pratipādayannāha / bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ yadi
# de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin par mi rigs so / / gang dag gi ltar na nyon mongs pa dang skye ba gnyis de la med pas / / mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin la / / rang nyid dngos po'i ngo bo yin pas dngos po'i rang bzhin yin no zhes gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi / / gnyi ga'i rang bzhin can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / / gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni / / dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin na /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca mokṣastacca na yujyate / yadi bhāvābhāvobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt
# dngos dang dngos po med pa dag / / thar par 'gyur na de mi rigs / / gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du gyur na ni / / de'i tshe dngos po dang dngos po med par thar par 'gyur ro /
tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ, sa eva mokṣaḥ syāt
# de'i phyir 'du byed rnams kyi bdag nyid 'thob pa dang de dang bral ba gang yin pa de nyid thar par 'gyur na /
na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate
# 'du byed dag ni thar ba zhes bya bar rigs pa yang ma yin no /
ata evāha / tacca na yujyate iti / kiṃ cānyat / bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ yadi / nānupādāya nirvāṇamupādāyobhayaṃ hi tat
# de nyid kyi phyir / / de mi rigs so zhes bshad do / / gzhan yang / / gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni / / dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin na / / mya ngan 'das pa ma brten min / / de gnyis brten nas yin phyir ro /
yadi bhāvābhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā hetupratyayasāmagrīmupādāya āśritya bhavet, na anupādāya
# gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni / / de'i tshe rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa la brten cing ltos nas yin gyi / / ma brten par ni ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmādupādāyobhayaṃ hi tat / bhāvamupādāya abhāvaḥ, abhāvaṃ copādāya bhāvaḥ, iti kṛtvā ubhayametad bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati, na anupādāya
# gang gi phyir / / de gnyis brten nas yin phyir ro ste / / dngos po la brten nas dngos po med pa yin zhing / / dngos po med pa la brten nas dngos po yod pa'i phyir / / dngos po dang dngos po med pa de gnyi ga brten nas yin gyi ma brten par ni ma yin no / / mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ bhaved bhāvābhāvarūpam / na caitadevam, iti na yuktametat / kiṃ cānyat / bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ katham / asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau / bhāvo hi svahetupratyayasāmagrīsaṃbhūtatvāt saṃskṛtaḥ
# de ni de ltar yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so / / gzhan yang / / ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa ni / / dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin te / / mya ngan 'das pa 'dus ma byas / / dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas yin / / dngos po ni rang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las byung ba'i phyir 'dus byas yin la /
abhāvo 'pi [bhāvaṃ] pratītya saṃbhūtatvāt, jātipratyayajarāmaraṇavacanācca saṃskṛtaḥ
# dngos po med pa yang dngos po la brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir dang skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes 'byung ba'i phyir 'dus byas yin no /
tadyadi bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā na asaṃskṛtam, [kiṃ tu] saṃskṛtameva
# de'i phyir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni / / de'i tshe de 'dus ma byas yin gyi / / 'dus byas nyid du 'gyur na /
yasmānna ca saṃskṛtamiṣyate, tasmānna bhāvābhāvasvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ yujyate / athāpi syāt / naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇe bhāvābhāvāviti / evamapi na yuktam / kutaḥ? yasmāt / bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇe ubhayaṃ katham / [tayorekatra nāstitvamālokatamasoryathā] / bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti, ataḥ, / bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇe ubhayaṃ katham / naiva bhavedityabhiprāyaḥ / idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate, tathā pratipādayannāha / naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti yāñjanā / abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati / yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā, yadi kaścidabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhena naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ syāt / yadā ca bhāvābhāvāveva na staḥ, tadā tatpratiṣedho 'pi nāstīti / tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā, sāpi nopapadyata eva / iti na yuktametat / kiṃ cānyat / naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate / naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate / yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate, kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā? kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha nāsti? yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pi tavātmā syāt
# 'dus byas su ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med par mi rigs so / / ci ste yang mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na / / mya ngan las 'das pa la dngos po dang dngos po med pa de dag yod pa ma yin no snyam na / / de yang mi rigs so; / / gang las she na / / gang gi phyir / / ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa la / / dngos dang dngos med gnyis yod de / / dngos dang dngos po med pa phan tshun 'gal ba dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa gcig la yod pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir / / ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa la / / dngos dang dngos med gnyis yod de / / yod pa ma yin pa nyid de snyam du dgongs pa yin no / / ji lta bur zhe na / / de gnyis gcig la yod min te / / snang ba dang ni mun pa bzhin / / ji ltar khyim gcig tu dus gcig gi tshe / / phan tshun 'gal bas / / snang ba dang mun pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du de gnyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la yod pa ma yin no / / da ni mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa yang ji ltar mi rigs pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / dngos min dngos po med min pa / / mya ngan 'das par gang ston pa / / dngos po med dang dngos po dag / / grub na de ni 'grub par 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig yod na ni / / de'i tshe de bkag pa'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'dir 'gyur la / / gal te dngos po med pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de'i tshe de bkag pas mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi tshe dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de dag bkag pa yang yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing / / dngos po med pa yang ma yin no snyam du rtog pa gang yin pa de yang mi 'thad pas 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no / / gzhan yang / / gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni / / dngos min dngos po med min na / / dngos min dngos po med min zhes / / gang zhig gis ni de mngon byed / / gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du yod do zhes rtog na / / da ni gang zhig gis rnam pa de lta bur gyur pa mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi ga'i ngo bo ma yin pa de yod do zhes bya bar mngon par byed de / / 'dzin pa'am gsal bar byed / / ci mya ngan las 'das pa de la rnam pa de lta bu'i rtogs pa po 'ga' zhig yod dam 'on te med / / gal te yod na ni de ltar na mya ngan las 'das par yang bdag yod par 'gyur na /
na ceṣṭam, nirupādānasyātmano 'stitvābhāvāt / atha nāsti, kenaitaditthaṃvidhaṃ nirvāṇamastīti paricchidyate? saṃsārāvasthitaḥ paricchinattīti cet, yadi saṃsārāvasthitaḥ paricchinatti, sa kiṃ vijñānena paricchinatti, utta jñānena? yadi vijñāneneti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate
# 'dod pa ni ma yin te / / nye bar len pa med par bdag yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / ci ste med na ni de'i tshe rnam pa de lta bu'i mya ngan las 'das pa de yod par gang gis gcod par byed / / gal te 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su gcod par byed do zhe na / / 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su gcod par byed na de ci rnam par shes pas gcod par byed dam / / 'on te ye shes kyis yin grang na / / gal te rnam par shes pas yin par rtog na / / de ni mi rigs so / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa 'di ni mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam?  yasmānnimittālambanaṃ vijñānam, na ca nirvāṇe kiṃcinnimittamasti, tasmānna tattāvadvijñānenālambyate / jñānenāpi na jñāyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād jñānena hi śūnyatālambanena bhavitavyam, tacca anutpādarūpameveti, kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate, sarvaprapañcātītarūpatvād jñānasyeti
# mya ngan las 'das pa la ni mtshan ma cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir re zhig de ni rnam par shes pas dmigs par byed pa ma yin no / / ye shes kyis kyang spyod par byed pa ma yin te / / ye shes kyis ni stong pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur dgos la de yang ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas / / ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin des mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing / / dngos po med pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar 'dzin par byed / / ye shes ni spros pa thams cad las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro /
tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate / anajyamānamaprakāśyamānamagṛhyamāṇaṃ tadevamastīti na yujyate / sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti, evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti pratipādayannāha
# de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni gang gis kyang dngos po ma yin zhing / / dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mngon par mi byed la / / mngon par ma byas shing gsal bar ma byas la / / ma bzung ba de ni de ltar yod do zhes bya bar mi rigs so / / ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la rtog pa bzhi po 'di dag rnam pa thams cad du mi srid pa de bzhin du / / mya ngan las 'das pa thugs su chud pa po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rtog pa 'di dag srid pa ma yin zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
paraṃ nirodhādbhagavān bhavatītyeva nohyate / na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate / uktaṃ hi pūrvam / ghanagrāhagṛhītastu yenāstīti tathāgataḥ / nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet
# bcom ldan mya ngan 'das gyur nas / / yod par mi mngon de bzhin du / / med do zhe 'am gnyi ga 'am / / gnyis min zhes kyang mi mngon no / / zhes gsungs te / / 'di ltar / / gang gis 'dzin stug bzung gyur pa / / de ni mya ngan 'das pa la / / de bzhin gshegs pa yod ce 'am / / med ces rnam rtog rtog par byed /
evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate / etaddvayasyābhāvādubhayamityapi nohyate
# ces gong du bshad zin to / / de ltar na re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das phan chad yod pa'am med do zhes bya bar mi mngon no / / 'di gnyis med pas gnyi ga'o zhes bya bar yang mi mngon no /
ubhayasyābhāvādeva nobhayamiti nohyate na gṛhyate
# gnyi ga med pa nyid kyis na gnyi ga ma yin pa zhes bya bar yang mi mngon zhing mi 'dzin pa yin no /
na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca / tiṣṭhamāno 'pi bhagavān bhavatītyeva nohyate / na bhavatyubhayaṃceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate / yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam
# bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas / / rnam pa bzhir mi mngon pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / gzhan yang / / bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur na yang / / yod par mi mngon de bzhin du / / med do zhe 'am gnyi ga dang / / gnyis min zhes kyang mi mngon no / / ji ltar mi mngon pa de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa brtag par bstan zin pa nyid do /
ata eva / na saṃsārasya nirvāṇātkiṃcidasti viśeṣaṇam
# de nyid kyi phyir / / 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa las / / khyad par cung zad yod ma yin /
na nirvāṇasya saṃsārātkiṃcidasti viśeṣaṇam
# mya ngan 'das pa'ang 'khor ba las / / khyad par cung zad yod ma yin /
yasmāttiṣṭhannapi bhagavān bhavatītyevamādinā nohyate, parinirvṛto 'pi nohyate bhavatītyevamādinā, ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ, vicāryamāṇayostulyarūpatvāt / yaccāpīdamuktaṃ bhagavatā / anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti, tadapi ata evopapannam, saṃsāranirvāṇayorviśeṣasyābhāvāt
# gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das zhugs pa na yang yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi mngon la / / mya ngan las 'das pa na yang yod do zhes bya ba la sogs par mi mngon pa de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la phan tshun khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te / / rnam par dpyad na rang bzhin mtshungs pa'i phyir ro / / gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du / / dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do zhes gsungs pa de yang 'di nyid kyi phyir 'thad pa yin to / / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
tathāhi / nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca / na tayorantaraṃ kiṃcitsusūkṣmamapi vidyate
# 'di ltar / / myang 'das mtha' dag gang yin pa / / de ni 'khor ba'i mtha' yin te / / de gnyis khyad par cung zad ni / / shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin /
na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na saṃbhavati, yā apyetāḥ / paraṃ nirodhādantādyāḥ śāśvatādyāśca dṛṣṭayaḥ / nirvāṇamaparāntaṃ ca pūrvāntaṃ ca samāśritāḥ
# mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'khor ba la khyad par med pa'i phyir / / sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar rtog pa yod pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / / gang 'das phan chad mtha' sogs dang / / rtag la sogs par lta ba dag / / mya ngan 'das dang phyi mtha' dang / / sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin /
tā api ata eva nopapadyante, saṃsāranirvāṇayorubhayorapi prakṛtiśāntatvenaikarasatvāt
# de dag kyang de nyid kyi phyir mi 'thad pa yin te / / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de gnyis ka yang rang bzhin gyis zhi ba nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir ro /
tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante
# de la 'das phan chad ces bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pa 'dis ni lta ba bzhin bzung ngo /
tadyathā / bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāta, bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi / etāścatasro dṛṣṭayo nirvāṇaparāmarśena pravṛttāḥ
# 'di lta ste / / de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad pa yod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad med pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod kyang yod la med kyang med pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ste / / lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mchog tu 'dzin par zhugs so /
antādyā api dṛṣṭayaḥ
# mtha' la sogs pa yang lta ba bzhi'o /
tadyathā / antavān lokaḥ, anantavāṃśca, antavāṃścānantavāṃśca, naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti / etāścatasro dṛṣṭayo 'parāntaṃ samāśritya pravṛttāḥ
# 'di lta ste / / 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan no / / 'jig rten mtha' dang mi ldan no / / 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang yin no / / mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ste / / lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' la brten te 'jug pa yin no /
tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya pravartate
# de la bdag dang 'jig rten la ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba ma mthong bas 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan no zhes de ltar na rtog pa na / / phyi ma'i mtha' la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur ro /
evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate
# de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba mthong bas 'jig rten mtha' dang mi ldan no zhes 'jug cing /
paśyaṃśca apaśyaṃśca ubhayathā prātipadyate / dvayapratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavāniti pratipadyate / śāśvato lokaḥ, aśāśvato lokaḥ, śāśvataścāśāśvataśca, naivaśāśvato naivāśāśvāto lokaḥ, ityetāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritya pravartante / tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate, apaśyannaśāśvata iti pratipadyate, paśyaṃśca apaśyaṃśca śāśvataścāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate, naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya / tāścaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ kathaṃ yujyante? yadi kasyacitpadārthasya kaścit svabhāvo bhavet, tasya bhāvābhāvakalpanāt syuretā dṛṣṭayaḥ / yadā tu saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ, tadā
# mthong ba dang ma mthong bas ni gnyi gar rtogs par 'gyur la / / gnyi ga bkag pas ni mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ro / / 'jig rten rtag go / / 'jig rten mi rtag go / / 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go / / rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni sngon gyi mtha' la brten nas 'byung ba yin no / / de la bdag dang 'jig rten las 'das par skyes pa mthong bas 'jig rten rtag go snyam du rtogs par 'gyur la / / ma mthong bas ni mi rtag go snyam du rtogs par 'gyur ro / / mthong ba dang ma mthong bas ni rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyam du rtogs par 'gyur la / / mthong ba yang ma yin ma mthong ba yang ma yin pas ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam du rtogs par 'gyur ro / / lta ba 'di dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur zhe na / / gal te dngos po gang zhig la rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod na ni / / de la dngos po dang dngos po med par brtags pas lta ba 'di dag yod par 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la khyad par med par bstan pa de'i tshe /
śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kimanantaṃ kimantavat
# dngos po thams cad stong pa la / / mtha' yod ci zhig mtha' med ci /
kimanantamantavacca nānantaṃ nāntavacca kim / kiṃ tadeva kimanyatkiṃ śāśvataṃ kimaśāśvatam
# mtha' dang mtha' med ci zhig yin / / mtha' dang mtha' med min pa ci / / de nyid ci zhig gzhan ci yin / / rtag pa ci zhig mi rtag ci /
aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ
# rtag dang mi rtag gnyi ga ci / / gnyi ga yin pa'ang ci zhig yin /
caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante / yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate, tasyāyamabhiniveśo nirvāṇapuragāminaṃ panthānaṃ niruṇaddhi, sāṃsārikeṣu ca duḥkheṣu niyojayatīti vijñeyam / atrāha / yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham, nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena mahākarūṇāparatantreṇa priyaikaputra kapremānugatāśeṣatribhuvanajanena caritapratipakṣānurūpo dharmo deśito lokasya nirvāṇādhigamārtham,  sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate / ucyate / yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt, kecicca sattvāstasya dharmasya śrotāraḥ syuḥ, kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt, syādetadevam
# lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi po 'di dag kyang dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo med na mi rigs pa nyid do / / gang zhig dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo sgro btags te / / de dang bral ba dang ma bral ba las lta ba 'di dag bskyed nas / / mngon par zhen pa de'i mngon par zhen pa 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam 'gog cing / / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag la sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te de ltar khyod kyis mya ngan las 'das pa yang bkag na / / de ltar yin na / / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa / / 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par thugs su chud pa / / thugs rje chen po'i gzhan dbang du gyur pas / / 'jig rten gyi mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mdzad pa'i slad du / / spyod pa'i gnyen por rjes su mthun pa'i chos bstan pa gang yin pa de don med par 'gyur ro / / brjod par bya ste / / gal te chos zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig gam / / chos de'i nyan pa po'i sems can 'ga' zhig gam / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ston pa po 'ga' zhig yod na ni de'i tshe 'di de ltar 'gyur na /
yadā tu / sarvopalambhopaśamaḥ prapañcopaśamaḥ śivaḥ / na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ / tadā kuto 'smākaṃ yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ? iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo 'pravṛttistannirvāṇam
# gang gi tshe / / dmigs pa thams cad nyer zhi zhing / / spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba ste / / sangs rgyas kyis ni gang du yang / / su la'ang chos 'ga' ma bstan to / / ma gsungs pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la ji skad smras pa'i nyes par thal bar gal 'gyur / / 'dir spros pa ste mtshan ma rnams gang nye bar zhi ba ste / / mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa yin la /
sa eva copaśamaḥ prakṛtyaivopaśāntatvācchivaḥ / vācāmapravṛttervā prapañcopaśamaścittasyāpravṛtteḥ śivaḥ
# nye bar zhi ba de nyid ni nye bar zhi ba ste rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro / / yang na tshig mi 'jug pas spros pa nyer zhi yin la / / sems mi 'jug pas zhi ba'o /
kleśānāmapravṛttyā vā janmano 'pravṛttyā śivaḥ
# yang na nyon mongs pa rnams mi 'byung bas spros pa nyer zhi yin la skye ba mi 'byung pas zhi ba'o /
kleśaprahāṇena vā prapañcopaśamo niravaśeṣavāsanāprahāṇe śivaḥ
# yang na nyon mongs pa spangs pas spros pa nyer zhi yin la / / bag chags ma lus par spangs pas zhi ba'o /
jñeyānupalabdhyā vā prapañcopaśamo jñānānupalabdhyā śivaḥ
# yang na shes bya ma dmigs pas spros pa nyer zhi yin la / / shes pa ma dmigs pas zhi ba'o /
yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive 'sthānayogena nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt, tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kvaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam / yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre / "yāṃ ca rātriṃ śāntamate tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ, yāṃ ca rātrimanupādāya parinirvāsyati, atrāntare tathāgatenaikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati / atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti / teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati / ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, vayaṃ ca tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇumaḥ / tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati / sarvakalpavikalpajālavāsanāprapañcavigato hi śāntamate tathāgataḥ" / iti vistaraḥ / tathā / avāca 'nakṣarāḥ sarvaśūnyāḥ śāntādinirmalāḥ / ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate / yadi tarhyevaṃ na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ, tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate / avidyānidrānugatānāṃ dehināṃ svapnāyamānānāmiva svavikalpābhyudaya eṣaḥ / ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya / naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke / iti / etacca tathāgatavāgguhyaparivarte vistareṇa vyākhyātam / tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmānnirvāṇamapi nāstīti siddham
# gang gi tshe de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nam mkha' la dang pa'i rgyal po dag rang gi gshog pa brdabs pa'i rlung la gnas pa'am / / nam mkha' ci yang ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rlung nam
