mkha' la gnas pa ltar / / mya ngan las 'das pa spros pa thams cad nye par zhi zhing / / zhi ba'i ngo bo la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa / / de'i tshe mtshan ma thams cad nye bar ma dmigs pa'i phyir / / gang du yang rung ste lha yul lam mi yul dag tu / / lha'am mi su la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma bstan to zhes bya bar shes par bya'o / / ji skad du / / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las / / zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de'i bar du / / de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge 'brug gcig kyang ma gsungs so / / gsung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / / de bzhin du / / thams cad tshig med yi ge med / / gdod nas zhi zhing dri med stong / / chos rnams de ltar sus shes pa / / de ni gzhon nu sangs rgyas brjod / / ces gsungs so / / gal te de ltar sangs rgyas kyis gang du yang su la yang chos 'ga' ma bstan na / / 'o na ji ltar gsung rab kyi tha snyad shin tu sna tshogs pa de dag mngon par 'gyur zhe na / / brjod par bya ste / / bcom ldan 'das 'dis kho bo cag la chos 'di dag bstan to zhes bya ba 'di ni / / lus can ma rig pa'i gnyid dang ldan zhing rmi lam rmi bzhin pa rnams kyi rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yin no / / ji skad du / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa med pa yin / / dge ba'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yin / / de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa med / / 'jig rten thams cad kyi ni gzugs brnyan mthong / / zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / de bzhin du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u las rgya cher bstan pa yin te / / de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du chos bstan pa med pas chos bstan pa yod pa'i phyir / / mya ngan las 'das pa yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yang med do zhes bya ba grub po /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā / anirvāṇaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ lokanāthena deśitam
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / mya ngan 'das med myang 'das su / / 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste /
ākāśena kṛto granthirākāśenaiva mocitaḥ
# nam mkha' mdud pa bor ba ni / / nam mkha' nyid kyis bkrol ba yin /
iti / tathā / na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante / tatkasya hetoḥ? nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām / tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ / atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi / na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya prāptimicchati nābhisamayamiti vistaraḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / atrāha / yaduktam / yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe / sā prajñaptirupādāya pratipatsaiva madhyamā / iti, / kaḥ punarasau pratītyasamutpādaḥ, yaḥ śūnyatetyucyate? / athavā / yadetaduktam / yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyatīdaṃ sa paśyati
# zhes gsungs pa yin no / / de bzhin du / / bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos 'ga' zhig skye ba'am 'gag par 'tshal ba de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma lags so / / bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'khor ba dngos por 'tshal ba de dag ni / / 'khor ba las 'da' ba ma lags so / / de ci'i slad du zhe na / / bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba ni / / gang mtshan ma thams cad rab tu zhi ba / / rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa lags na / / bcom ldan 'das skyes bu blun po legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas / / mu stegs kyi lta bar lhung ba de dag ni / / 'di lta ste / / til las til mar dang 'o ma las mar gsar ltar mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po las tshol bar bgyid do / / bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la / / mya ngan las 'das pa 'tshol ba mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de dag ni / / mu stegs can yin no zhes kho bo gleng ste / / bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag par zhugs pa ni / / chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag par mi bgyid la / / chos gang yang 'thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par mi 'tshal lo zhes rgya cher gsungs so / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / mya ngan las 'das pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel ba'o / / 'dir / / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang / / de ni stong pa nyid du bshad / / de ni brten nas gdags pa ste / / de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no / / zhes gang bshad na gang zhig stong pa nyid ces bya bar brjod pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de gang yin zhes smra'o / / rnam pa gcig tu na / / gang 'di skad du / / gang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung / / mthong ba des ni sdug bsngal dang /
duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca / iti, / tatkatamo 'sau pratītyasamutpādaḥ iti? atastadaṅgaprabhedavivakṣayedamucyate
# kun 'byung dang ni 'gog pa dang / / lam nyid de dag mthong ba yin / / zhes bshad pa / / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de go gang yin zhe'o / / de'i phyir de'i yan lag gi rab tu dbye ba brjod par bzhed nas 'di skad du /
punarbhavāya saṃskārānavidyānivṛtastridhā
# ma rig bsgribs pas yang srid phyir / / 'du byed rnam pa gsum po dag /
abhisaṃskurute yāṃstairgatiṃ gacchati karmabhiḥ / tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā
# mngon par 'du byed gang yin pa'i / / las de dag gis 'gro bar 'gro / / zhes gsungs so / / de la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa ste / / mun pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba la sgrib par byed pa'o /
avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste punarbhavābhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ
# ma rig pa des bsgribs shing bkab pa'i gang zag gis yang srid pa'i phyir te yang srid pa'i don dang yang srid pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gang dge ba la sogs pa'i sems pa dag mngon par 'du byed cing skyed par byed do / / 'du byed de dag ni yang srid pa mngon par 'du byed pas 'du byed do /
te ca trividhāḥ
# de dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca, yadi vā / kāyikā vācikā mānasāśceti
# dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi gyo ba'o / / yang na lus kyi dang ngag gi dang yid kyi'o /
tāṃstrividhān karmalakṣaṇān saṃskārānavidyānivṛtaḥ pudgalaḥ karoti / taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati
# gang zag ma rig pas bsgribs pas las kyi mtshan nyid can 'du byed rnam pa gsum byed la / / mngon par 'du byed pas 'du byed las te las kyi ming can de dag gis ni de'i rgyus byung ba 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro /
tato 'sya / vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate saṃskārapratyayaṃ gatau
# de nas de'i / / 'du byed rkyen can rnam par shes / / 'gro ba rnams su 'jug par 'gyur /
kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam
# gang zag 'du byed byas shing bsags pa de'i rnam par shes pa 'du byed kyi rgyu can 'khor ba don ma yin pa'i sa bon du gyur pa ni 'gro ba 'du byed dang mthun par lha la sogs pa rnams su 'jug pa ste rab tu 'jug cing skye bar 'gyur ro /
tata uttarakālam / saṃniviṣṭe 'tha vijñāne nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate
# de nas dus phyis / / rnam par shes pa zhugs gyur na / / ming dang gzugs ni chags par 'gyur /
tatra karmakleśāviddhaṃ tasmiṃstasminnupapattyāyatane nāmayatīti nāma, saṃjñāvaśena vā artheṣu nāmayatīti nāma
# de las dang nyon mongs pas bsgos pas skye ba'i gnas de dang der bkri bas na ming yin pa'am / / yang na don dag la ming gi dbang gis rgyug pas na ming ste /
catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā nāmeti vyapadiśyate
# gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi la ming zhes bsnyad do /
rūpyata iti rūpam / bādhyata ityarthaḥ
# gzhig tu rung pas na gzugs te gnod par byar rung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma, ubhayametadabhisaṃkṣipya nāmarūpamiti vyavasthāpyate
# gzugs 'di dang sngar gyi ming gnyis po 'di dag bsdoms te ming dang gzugs zhes rnam par gzhag go /
tatra bimbapratibimbanyāyena svādhyāyadīpamudrāpratimudrādinyāyena vā māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ  skandhā yathākarmākṣepata upajāyante / evaṃ ca bimbapratibimbamudrāpratimudrānyāyena pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati / tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyena tu yadvijñānaṃ saṃniviśate ityuktam, tad bālalokabodhānurodhena, samānakāla eva bhavapratisaṃdhiriti / tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca / hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ / iti / na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti / janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam / iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā / ityādivacanāt / yathā bimbapratibimbamudrāpratimudrādinyāyena kṣaṇikatvaṃ neṣyate bhavadbhiḥ, tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam / yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ / tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ / kṣaṇike sarvathābhāvātkutaḥ kācitpurāṇatā / sthairyādakṣaṇike cāpi kutaḥ kācitpurāṇatā / yathānto 'sti kṣaṇasyaivamādimadhyaṃ ca kalpyatām / antakatvātkṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇasthitiḥ / ādimadhyāvasānāni cintyāni kṣaṇavatpunaḥ / ādimadhyāvasānatvaṃ na svataḥ parato 'pi vā / iti madhyamakasiddhāntapāṭhāt kṣaṇikapadārthāsiddherasiddhiravaseyā / na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet, saṃśayaniścayajñānayorālokāndhakārayorjñānājñānayorbījāṅkurayormaraṇabhavopapattibhavayorbhinnalakṣaṇayorityādivat / parasparanirapekṣayoreva svahetupratyayasiddhayoḥ sahabhāvo yujyate savyetaragoviṣāṇayoryuvatistanayornarakarṇayorityādivat, na tu punaḥ kadācidapi parasparaviruddhayorvināśotpādayoḥ / yathoktaṃ rāgaraktaparīkṣāyām / sahaiva punarudbhūtirna yuktā rāgaraktayoḥ / bhavetāṃ rāgaraktau hi nirapekṣau parasparam / naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha / pṛthaktve sahabhāvo 'tha kuta eva bhaviṣyati / evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha / rāgavatsarvadharmāṇāṃ siddhirna saha nāsaha / iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti? ataḥ sahabhāvo vineyajanabodhānurodhapravṛtta eveti lakṣyate / tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt / balavatpuruṣācchaṭāmātreṇa pañcaṣaṣṭiḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmantīti pāṭhāt, utpalapatraśatasahasravedhavat sūcyagreṇeti / tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānāmatisūkṣmatvāt / ekakṣaṇena ślokākṣarapadodāharaṇavat / kiṃ ca / anirodhamanutpādamanucchedamaśāśvatam / anekārthamanānārthamanāgamamanirgamam / yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śivam / iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake / āgamasūtreṣu / avināśamanutpannaṃ dharmadhātusamaṃ jagat / sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā / trīṣu adhvasu sattvānāṃ prakṛtiṃ nopalambhati / sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā / ityādi / tathā / phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā budbudopamā / marīcisadṛśī saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kadalīnibhāḥ / māyopamaṃ ca vijñānamuktamādityabandhunā / evaṃ dharmān vīkṣamāṇo bhikṣurārabdhavīryavān / divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ / pratividhyetpadaṃ śāntaṃ saṃskāropaśamaṃ śivam / iti / etāśca gāthāḥ sarvanikāyaśāstrasūtreṣu paṭhayante / ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti? mahāyānasūtreṣu ca / supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate / na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato / na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ / na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate / yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati / jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān / yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ / na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān / mudrātpratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate / na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ / bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro / na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā / yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā / ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā / tatha sarvabhavāṅgavartinī anyamanyopacayena niśritā / ekaikeṣu teṣu vartanī pūrvamaparāntatu nopalabhyate / ata evoktamācāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ / svādhyāyadīpamudrādarpaṇaghoṣārkakāntabījāmlaiḥ / skandhapratisaṃdhirasaṃkramaśca vidvadbhirupadhāryau / iti / śatakaśāstre ca āryadevapādairmahābodhicaryāsthiraprasthānasthitaiḥ / alātacakranirmāṇasvapnamāyāmbucandrakaiḥ / dhūmikāntaḥ pratiśrutkāmarīcyabhraiḥ samo bhavaḥ / iti / tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate, kṣarati prādurbhavatītyarthaḥ / yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt, tadā nāmarūpaprādurbhāvo na syāt / sacedānanda vijñānaṃ mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmeta, na tat kalalaṃ kalalatvāya saṃvarteta / iti vacanāt / tadevam / niṣikte nāmarūpe tu ṣaḍāyatanasaṃbhavaḥ / duḥkhotpattyā āyadvārabhāvena darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasasparśamanaākhyaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nāmarūpahetukamupajāyate / sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate, abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām / tadevaṃ saṃbhūte ṣaḍāyatane uttarakālam / ṣaḍāyatanamāgamya saṃsparśaḥ saṃpravartate / kaḥ punarayaṃ saṃsparśaḥ, kathaṃ vā saṃpravartate iti pratipādayannāha / cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca / nāmarūpaṃ pratītyaivaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃpravartate / saṃnipātasrayāṇāṃ yo rūpavijñānacakṣuṣām / sparśaḥ saḥ / cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate / tatra cakṣuśca rūpāyatanaṃ ca rūpam / samanvāhāraścatuḥskandhalakṣaṇaṃ nāma / tadetattrayaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate / tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ, sa spṛṣṭilakṣaṇaḥ sparśaḥ / tata uttarakālam / tasmātsparśācca vedanā saṃpravartate / iṣṭāniṣṭobhayaviparītaviṣayānubhūtirviṣayānubhavo vedanaṃ vittirvedanetyucyate / duḥkhā sukhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca trividhā / yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya  vedanā uktā, evaṃ śeṣendriyaviṣayavijñānatrayasaṃnipātalakṣaṇasparśahetukā vedanā vyākhyeyā / tata uttarakālam / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / saṃpravartate iti vartate / vedanā pratyayo yasyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ sā vedanāpratyayā / kiṃviṣayā punaḥ sā tṛṣṇā? vedanāviṣayaiva / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmādasau tṛṣṇāluḥ / vedanārthaṃ hi tṛṣyate / vedanānimittameva abhilāṣaṃ karotītyarthaḥ / kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi tāvat sukhā vedanā asyopajāyate, sa tasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate / atha duḥkhā, tadā tasyā visaṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate / atha aduḥkhāsukhā, tasyā api nityamaparibhraṃśārthaṃ paritṛṣyate / sa evam / tṛṣyamāṇa upādānamupādatte caturvidham / sa evaṃ vedanāsvabhiniviṣṭaḥ saktaḥ tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānākhyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣepakāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti / tadevamasya tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānaṃ bhavati / tata uttarakālam / upādāne sati bhava upādātuḥ pravartate / syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta na bhavedbhavaḥ / pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ / caturvidhasya yathoktasya upādānasya upādātā grahītā utpādayitā / tasya upādātuḥ upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ upajāyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi anutpāditavedanātṛṣṇaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena tṛṣṇāmasvīkurvan, caturvidhamupādānaṃ pravihāya upādātā amalādvayajñānasaṃmukhībhāvāt syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta saḥ / tadānīṃ tasya na bhavedbhavaḥ / kaḥ punarayaṃ bhavaḥ? pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ / yaḥ upādānāt pravartate, sa pañcaskandha svabhāvo veditavyaḥ / trividhamapi kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasikaṃ ca karma bhavatyasmādanāgataṃ skandha pañcakaṃ bhavaḥ iti vyapadiśyate / tatra kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma rūpaskandhasvabhāvaṃ karmavijñaptitvāt / mānasaṃ tu catuḥskandhasvabhāvamiti / evaṃ sa bhavaḥ pañca skandhā iti vijñeyam / tasmāt / bhavājjātiḥ pravartate / anāgataskandhotpādo jātiḥ / sā ca bhavāt pravartate / tata uttarakālam / jarāmaraṇaduḥkhādi śokāḥ saparidevanāḥ / daurmanasyamupāyāsā jāteretatpravartate / jātihetukā ete jarāmaraṇādayaḥ pravartante / eṣāṃ ca yathāsūtrameva vyākhyānaṃ veditavyam / tatra skandhaparipāko jarā / jīrṇasya skandhabhedo maraṇam / mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sāmiṣaṅgo hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ / śokasamutthito vākpralāpaḥ paridevaḥ / pañcendriyāsātanipāto  duḥkham / manoniṣṭanipāto daurmanasyam / duḥkhadaurmanasyabahutvasaṃbhūtā upāyāsāḥ / iti / tadevaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena / kevalasyaivametasya duḥkhaskandhasya saṃbhavaḥ / kevalasyeti ātmātmīyasvabhāvavigatasya bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitamātrasya / duḥkhātmakasya sukhāvyāmiśrasyaivetyarthaḥ / evamiti hetupratyayamātrabalenaivetyarthaḥ / duḥkhaskandhasyeti duḥkhasamudāyasya duḥkhasamūhasya duḥkharāśerityarthaḥ / yataścaivaṃ yathopavarṇitādavidyādikādeva bhavāṅgānāṃ pravṛttiḥ, ataḥ / saṃsāramūlānsaṃskārānavidvān saṃskarotyataḥ / avidvān kārakastasmānna vidvāṃstattvadarśanāt / tatra saṃsārasya vijñānādipravṛttilakṣaṇasya mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃskārāḥ / tataśca saṃsāramūlān saṃskārānavidvān saṃskaroti / avidyānugato yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣavaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti, apuṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti, āneñjyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti / iti bhagavadvacanāt / yataścaivamavidvān kārakaḥ, tasmādavidvāneva pudgalaḥ kārako bhavati saṃskārāṇām, na vidvāṃstattvadarśī prahīṇāvidyaḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam? tattvadarśanāt tattvadarśane hi sarvapadārthanāmevānupalambhāt nāsti kiṃcid yadālambya karma kuryāditi / yataścaivamavidyāyāmeva satyāṃ saṃskārāḥ pravartante, asatyāṃ na pravartante, ataḥ / avidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmasaṃbhavaḥ / hetuvaiyarthyāt / tasyāḥ punaravidyāyāḥ kuto nirodhaḥ ityāha / avidyāyā nirodhastu jñānenāsyaiva bhāvanāt / asyaiva pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadaviparītabhāvanātaḥ avidyā prahīyate / yo hi pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyak paśyati, sa sūkṣmasyāpi bhāvasya na svarūpamupalabhate / pratibimbasvaprālātacakramudgādivattu svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatarati / sa eva svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatīrṇo na kiṃcidvastu upalabhate bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ vā / so 'nupalabhamāno na kvaciddharme muhyati, amūḍhaśca karma na karotīti / evaṃ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanayā tattvamavatarati / tattvadarśinoyogino niyatameva avidyā prahīyate / prahīṇāvidyasya saṃskārā nirudhyante / yathā caivamavidyānirodhāt saṃskārā nirudhyante, evam / tasya tasya nirodhena tattannābhipravartate / duḥkhaskandhaḥ kevalo 'yamevaṃ samyaṅ nirudhyate / pūrvasya pūrvasya aṅgasya nirodhena utarasyottarasya aṅgasya nirodho bhavatīti vijñeyam / anayā cānupūrvyā ayaṃ yogī ātmātmīyādyadarśanāyāsanirastaḥ kārakavedakavirahitaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyaṃ duḥkharāśiṃ punaranutpattyā samyaṅnirodhayati / yathoktamāryaśālistambasūtre / evamādhyātmiko 'pi pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate / katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca / tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam, nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam, ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ, jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti / evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati / avidyā cennābhaviṣyannaiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante / evaṃ yāvajjātiścennābhaviṣyajjarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate / athavā, satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavati / evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati / atrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti / saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayābhinirvartitā iti / evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti / jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jātyābhinirvartitamiti / atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ / evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ / evamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ / kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya iti? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt / katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ / tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yaḥ kāyasya saṃśleṣātkaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ / yaḥ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate 'bdhātuḥ / yaḥ kāyasyāśitabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati, ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ / yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ / yaḥ kāyasyāntaḥ śauṣīryamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate ākāśadhātuḥ / yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam, ayamucyate bhikṣavo vijñānadhātuḥ / tatra asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāyasyotpattirna bhavati / yadā tvādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati, evamaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpattirbhavati / tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti / abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti / tejodhātornaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyāśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmīti / vāyudhātornaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyāśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti / ākāśadhātornaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasyāntaḥśauṣīryamabhinirvartayāmīti / vijñānadhātornaivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ kāyasya nāmarūpamabhinirvartayāmīti / kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti / atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati / tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit / evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturnātmā  na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit / tatra avidyā katamā? yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvapudgalamanujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkārasaṃjñā mamakārasaṃjñā evamādi vividhamajñānam / iyamucyate 'vidyeti / evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante / tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī saṃskārā ityucyante / vastuprativijñaptirvijñānam / vijñānasahabhuvaścatvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇaḥ upādānākhyāḥ, tannāmarūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni, tāni copādāya rūpam / tacca nāma rūpam / aikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya tannāmarūpam / nāmarūpasaṃniśritānīndriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam / trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ / sparśānubhavo vedanā / vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāvaipulyamuipādānam / upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ / bhavahetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥ / jātasya skandhasya paripāko jarā / jīrṇasya skandhasya vināśo maraṇam / mriyamāṇasya saṃmūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasyāntardāhaḥ śokaḥ / śokotthamālapanaṃ paridevaḥ / pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktamasātamanubhavanaṃ duḥkham / manasā saṃyuktaṃ mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ dārmanasyam / ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti / tatra mohāndhakārārthenāvidyā / abhisaṃskārārthena saṃskārāḥ / vijñāpanārthena vijñānam / anyonyopastambhanārthena nāmarūpam / āyadvārārthena ṣaḍāyatanam / sparśanārthena sparśaḥ / anubhavanārthena vedanā / paritarṣaṇārthena tṛṣṇā / upādānārthenopādānam / punarbhavārthena bhavaḥ / janmārthena jātiḥ / paripākārthena jarā / vināśārthena maraṇam / śocanārthena śokaḥ / paridevanārthena paridevaḥ kāyaparipīḍanārthena duḥkham / cittasaṃpīḍanārthena daurmanasyam / upakleśārthenopāyāsāḥ / athavā tattve 'pratipattirmithyāpratipattirajñānamavidyā / evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ / tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati / apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmapuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati / āneñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāneñjyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati / idamucyate vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma / saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate / nāmarūpavivṛddhayā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante prajñāyante, tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate / ṣaḍbhyaścāyataṃebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante, ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate / yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate / iyamucyate bhikṣavaḥ sparśapratyayā vedaneti / yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati, sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate / āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam / yatra vastuni satṛṣṇastasya vastuno 'rjanāya viṭhapanāyopādānamupādatte, tatra tatra prārthayate, evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca, sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate / tatkarmanirjātānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛtiryā sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate / jātyābhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayanaparipākādvināśo bhavati / tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate / evamayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nyonyahetuko 'nyonyapratyayo naivānityo naiva nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo nānirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat / yadyapyayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat, atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante / katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca / tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ / karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ / avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ / karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ janayanti / tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti / tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati / avidyā vijñānabījamavakirati / asatāṃ teṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vijñānabījasyabhinirvṛttirna bhavati / tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti / tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti / avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti / vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati / ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti / atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati / tatratatropapattyāṃyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati / sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ / atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād, ṛtusamavāyād, anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣvamameṣvākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / tadyathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānamutpadyate / katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam / tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣurāśrayakṛtyaṃ karoti / rūpamālambanakṛtyaṃ karoti / āloko 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti / ākāśamanāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti / tajjamanasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karoti / asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpadyate / yadā tu cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati, evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate / tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti / ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti / ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti / tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati / ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti / cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati / ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti / atha ca satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati / evaṃ śeṣāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ karaṇīyam / tatra na kaściddharmo 'smāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati / asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate, na ca tatrādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati, asti ca mukhaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt, evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nāpyanyatropapannaḥ, asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / tadyathā bhikṣavaścandramaṇḍalaṃ catvāriṃśadyojanaśatamūrdhvaṃ vrajati, atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate, na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nānyatropapannaḥ, asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / tadyathā / agnirupādānapratyaye sati jvalati, upādānavaikalyānna jvalati, evameva bhikṣavaḥ karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu amameṣu kṛtrimeṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / tatrādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ / katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuvipulaphalābhinirvṛttitastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti / kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ / na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ / api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti / ato na śāśvatataḥ / kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu / api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat / ato nocchedataḥ / kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti / ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ / kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ / parīttaṃ karma kriyate, vipulaḥ phalavipāko 'nubhūyate / ataḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ / kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate / atastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśca / iti vistaraḥ / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / dṛṣṭiparīkṣā saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam / yaścaivaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak paśyati, sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati, nāparāntaṃ pratisarati, / ityādi sūtre paṭhayate, tatra katamaḥ pūrvāntaḥ, katamo 'parāntaḥ, kathaṃ na pratisaratīti? tadvayutpatyarthamidamārabhyate / tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate / pūrvo hi janmaparaṃparāṃśaḥ pūrvāntaḥ / taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate / pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate / tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ
# de la gzugs dang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams 'gags pa na skad cig ma gcig kho na la srang ma ba'i mthon dman gyi tshul du skye ba'i cha'i phung po rnams las kyis ji ltar 'phangs ba ltar skye bar 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir de ltar ma'i mngal du rnam par shes pa brgyal bar gyur na / / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen can gyi ming dang gzugs chags par 'gyur te / / red cing 'bru bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to / / gal te 'gro bar rnam par shes pa brgyal bar mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe ming dang gzugs 'byung bar mi 'gyur te / / dga' bo rnam par shes pa de gal te ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur na ni / / de'i tshe nur nur po de nur nur po nyid du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir de ltar na / / ming dang gzugs ni chags gyur na / / skye mched drug ni 'byung bar 'gyur / / sdug bsngal 'byung ba la skyed par byed pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir / / skye ba'i sgo'i dngos po nyid kyis na mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ces bya ba skye mched drug po ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu can skye bar 'gyur ro / / des mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas su mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas na / / skye mched drug ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i skye ba'i sgo nyid yin no de'i phyir de ltar skye mched drug 'byung ba yin dang dus phyis / / skye mched drug la brten nas ni / / reg pa yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur / / reg pa 'di yang gang zhig yin zhing / / ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhe na / / bstan pa'i phyir / / mig dang gzugs dang dran byed la / / brten nas skye ba kho na ste / / de ltar mig gzugs brten nas ni / / rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur / / mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes / / gsum po 'dus pa gang yin pa / / de ni reg pa'o / / zhes gsungs so / / de la mig dang gzugs dag dang dran byed de / / yid la byed pa yul la sogs pa dang mi mthun pa rnam par shes pa'i sa bon du gyur pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no / / de la mig dang gzugs kyi skye mched ni gzugs so / / dran byed phung po bzhi'i mtshan nyid can ni ming ste / / de'i phyir gsum po 'di la brten nas skye ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa de ni ming dang gzugs la brten nas skye ba yin no / / de'i phyir dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag 'dus pa gang yin pa ste / / lhan cig skye zhing phan tshun phan 'dogs pas 'dra bar zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i mtshan nyid kyi reg pa'o / / de nas dus phyis / / reg de las / / tshor ba kun du 'byung bar 'gyur / / yul yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang gnyi ga las bzlog pa nyams su myong ba yul gyi myong ba rig pas na / / tshor ba yin pa ni tshor ba zhes bya ste / / bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o / / gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dang mig dang gsum po 'di dag 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid can reg pa la brten nas tshor ba yin par ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du / / dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa lhag ma dag gsum 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyi reg pa'i rgyu can gyi tshor ba yang bshad par rig par bya'o / / de nas dus phyis / / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa ste / / kun du 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bsnyegs so / / sred pa gang la tshor ba'i rkyen yod pa de ni tsho ba'i rkyen gyis so / / sred pa de yang ci'i yul can zhig yin zhe na / / tshor ba'i yul can nyid do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir sred pa can de / / tshor ba'i don du sred par 'gyur / / tshor ba'i ched du mngon par 'dod pa skyed do zhes bya ba'i don to / / ji ltar zhe na / / re zhig gal te de la tshor ba bde ba skyes na ni de yang dang yang du de dang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir sred par 'gyur ro / / ci ste sdug bsngal skyes na ni de'i tshe de dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sred par 'gyur ro / / 'on te bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skyes na ni / / de mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir srid par 'gyur te / / de ltar na tshor ba'i don du sred par 'gyur ro / / de de ltar / / sred par 'gyur na nye bar len / / rnam pa bzhi bo nyer len 'gyur / / de ltar tshor ba dag la mngon par zhe na zhing chags pa de ni sred pa'i rkyen can las 'phel ba'i rgyu 'dod pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang bdag tu smra ba zhes bya ba rnam pa bzhi po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te / / de ni de'i srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa yin no / / de nas dus phyis / / nyer len yod na len pa po'i / / srid pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur / / gal te nye bar len med na / / grol bar 'gyur te srid mi 'gyur / / srid pa de yang phung po lnga / / nye bar len pa ji skad du bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i len pa po ste / / 'dzin pa po skyed par byed pa'o / / nye bar len pa po de'i nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa skyes par 'gyur ro / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir gal te nye bar len pa po gang gis tshor ba la sred pa ma skyed cing / / so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis sred pa bdag gir ma byas par len pa rnam pa bzhi po spangs nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa mngon du byas pa las nye bar len pa med par gyur na ni / / de grol bar 'gyur zhing de'i tshe de'i srid pa yod par mi 'gyur ro / / sred pa de yang gang zhig ce na / / srid pa de yang phung po lnga ste / / gang zhig nye bar len pa las rab tu 'byung ba de ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o / / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum char yang 'di las ma 'ongs pa'i phung po lnga 'byung bas na srid pa zhes bya bar bsnyad do / / de la lus dang ngag gi las ni gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin yin la / / yid kyi las ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin te / / de ltar na srid pa de phung po lnga yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / srid pa de las skye ba 'byung ste / / ma 'ongs pa'i phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba yin la / / de yang srid pa las rab tu 'byung ngo / / de nas dus phyis / / rga shi dang ni mya ngan dang / / smre sngags 'don bcas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde dang 'khrug pa rnams / / de dag skye las rab tu 'byung / / skye ba'i rgyu can rga shi la sogs pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / de dag gi bshad pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin rig par bya ste / / de la rga ba ni phung po yongs su smin pa'o / / 'chi ba ni rgas pa'i phung po 'jig pa'o / / mya ngan ni 'gro zhing 'chi bzhin pa'i kun du rmongs pa'i mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i snying gi gdung ba'o / / smre sngags 'don pa ni mya ngan gyis kun nas bslang pa'i ngag gi brjod pa'o / / sdug bsngal ni dbang po lnga la gnod ba'o / / yid mi bde ba ni yid du mi 'ong ba 'bab pa'o / / 'khrug pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung ba'o zhes bya'o / / de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis / / da ltar sdug bsngal phung po ni / / 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur / / de ltar zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen tsam gyi stobs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to / / sdug bsngal phung po ni zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs dang khyu ste / / sdug bsngal spungs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / 'ba' zhig pa zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don dang byis pa'i skye bos brtags pa tsam sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid bde ba dang ma 'dres bzhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / gang gi phyir de ltar ma rig pa la sogs pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams 'byung ba de'i phyir / / 'khor ba'i rtsa ba 'du byed de / / de phyir mkhas rnams 'du mi byed / / de phyir mi mkhas byed po yin / / mkhas pas de nyid mthong phyir ro / / de la 'khor ba rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtsa ba ste / / rgyu'i gtso bo ni 'du byed rnams yin te / / de'i phyir mi mkhas pa ni 'khor ba'i rtsa ba 'du byed rnams 'du byed de / / dge slong dag ma rig pa dang rjes su 'brel bar skyes bu gang zag ni bsod rnams mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do / / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do / / mi gyo ba mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi phyir de ltar na; mi mkhas pa byed pa po yin pa de'i phyir / / ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag kho na 'du byed rnams kyi byed pa por 'gyur gyi / / mkhas pa de nyid mthong ba ma rig pa spangs pa de ni ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / de nyid mthong phyir ro ste de nyid mthong na ni dngos po thams cad mi dmigs pas gang la dmigs nas las byed par 'gyur ba de / / cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir de nyid mthong ba'i phyir mkhas pa byed pa po ma yin no / / gang gi phyir de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams 'byung la med na mi 'byung ba de'i phyir / / ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni / / 'du byed rnams kun 'byung mi 'gyur te / / rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir ro / / ma rig pa de gang las 'gag par 'gyur zhe na / / ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni / / shes pas de nyid bsgoms pas so / / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de nyid phyin ci ma log pa ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms pas ma rig pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro / / 'di ltar gang gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang dag par mthong ba des ni dngos po phra mo'i yang rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa ma yin te / / gzugs brnyan ltar dngos po rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro / / de de ltar dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du zhugs pas chos cung zad kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro / / de ma dmigs pas 'gar yang mi rmongs so / / ma rmongs pas las mi byed do / / de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgoms pas de kho na nyid la 'jug par 'gyur la / / de nyid mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i ma rig pa nges par spong bar 'gyur ro / / ma rig pa spangs pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur ro / / de ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams ji ltar 'gag pa de bzhin du / / de dang de ni 'gags gyur pas / / de dang de ni mngon mi 'byung / / sdug bsngal phung po 'ba' zhig po / / de ni de ltar yang dag 'gag / / yan lag snga ma snga ma 'gags pas yan lag phyi ma phyi ma 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes shes par bya'o / / rim pa 'dis ni rnal 'byor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po sdug bsngal gyi tshogs bdag dang bdag gi ba la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba dang bral ba / / byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa slar mi 'byung bas yang dag par 'gag par 'gyur ro / / ji skad du 'phags pa s'a lu ljang pa'i mdo las / / de bzhin du nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gnyis kyi phyir 'byung ste / / gnyis gang zhe na / / 'di lta ste / / rgyu dang 'brel ba dang rkyen dang 'brel pa'o / / de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na / / gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams / / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa / / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug / / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa / / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba / / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa / / sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa / / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa / / srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba / / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste / / de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / gal te ma rig pa ma byung na 'du byed rnams kyang mi mngon pa zhig go / / de bzhin du skye ba ma byung du zin na rga shi'i bar du mi mngon pa zhig na / / 'on kyang ma rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba nas / / de bzhin du skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro / / de la yang ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'du byed rnams mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems so / / 'du byed rnams kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni ma rig pas mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems pa nas de bzhin du skye ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis rga shi mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems shing / / rga shi yang 'di snyam du bdag ni skye bas mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems pa'i bar du ste / / 'on kyang ma rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par sgrub pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas / / de bzhin du skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par sgrub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te / / de ltar na nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel bar blta'o / / nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar ji ltar ba lta zhe na / / khams drug 'dus pa'i phyir te / / khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa yin zhe na / / 'di lta ste / / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus pa las nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar blta'o / / de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sa'i khams gang zhe na / / gang 'di 'dus nas lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par grub par byed pa 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o / / gang lus sdud pa'i bya ba byed pa 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o / / gang lus kyi zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams 'ju bar byed pa 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o / / gang lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba byed pa de ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o / / gang lus kyi nang sbubs yod par byed pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o / / gang mdung khyim gyi tshul du ming dang gzugs mngon par 'grub par byed pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga 'dus pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o / / rkyen de dag med par lus skye bar mi 'gyur gyi / / nang gi sa'i khams tshang zhing / / de bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams kyang tshang bar gyur la / / thams cad 'dus pa de las lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro / / de la sa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dus nas lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems so / / chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi sdud pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi dmigs so / / me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs ba rnams 'ju bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / rlung gi khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi nang sbubs yod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi ming dang gzugs mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems so / / lus kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems mod kyi / / 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod na lus skye bar 'gyur ro / / de la sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin sems can ma yin srog ma yin skye ba po ma yin shed las skyes pa ma yin / / shed bu ma yin / / bud med ma yin / / skyes pa ma yin / / ma ning ma yin / / nga'i ma yin / / bdag gi ma yin te / / gzhan su'i yang ma yin no / / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bdag ma yin / / sems can ma yin / / srog ma yin / / skye ba po ma yin / / shed las skyes ma yin / / shed bu ma yin / / bud med ma yin / / skyes pa ma yin / / ma ning ma yin / / nga ma yin / / bdag gi ma yin / / gzhan su'i yang ma yin no / / de la ma rig pa gang zhe na / / khams drug po 'di dag nyid la gang gcig pur 'du shes pa dang ril por 'du shes pa dang rtag par 'du shes pa dang brtan par 'du shes pa dang ther zug tu 'du shes pa dang bde bar 'du shes pa dang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang sems can du 'du shes pa dang srog tu 'du shes pa dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang shed las skyes pa dang shed bur 'du shes pa dang nga zhes bya ba dang bdag go zhes bya bar 'du shes pa ste / / 'di lta bu la sogs pa mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o / / de ltar ma rig pa yod pas yul rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug 'jug ste / / de la yul rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gang yin pa 'di ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o / / dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o / / rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po de dag ni ming yin la / / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang de dag rgyur byas pa ni gzugs te / / ming de dang gzugs de gcig tu bsdus pa de ni ming dang gzugs so / / ming dang gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go / / gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o / / reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o / / tshor ba la zhen pa ni sred pa'o / / sred pa'i 'phel ba ni len pa'o / / len pa las skyes pa yang srid pa skyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o / / rgyu de las phung po byung ba ni skye ba'o / / skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o / / rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o / / 'chi zhing myos te mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan no / / mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o / / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo / / yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o / / gzhan yang 'di lta bu la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrug pa zhes bya'o / / de la mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o / / mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so / / rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o / / phan tshun brten pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs so / / skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go / / reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o / / myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o / / skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o / / nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'o / / yang srid pa skyed pa'i phyir srid pa'o / / phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba'o / / phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o / / 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o / / mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan no / / tshig gis smra ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o / / lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo / / sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o / / nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrug pa'o / / yang na de kho na nyid mi rtogs shing log par shes te mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o / / de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ste / / bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba dang mi gyo bar nye bar 'gro ba'o / / de la bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang mi gyo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las mi gyo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o / / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la / / tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ni srid pa de dang de ra gzhol bas na ming yin no / / gzugs kyi phung po dang lhan cig tu ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba yin pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba yin no / / ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel bas skye mched drug gi sgo nas bya ba byed pa rnams 'byung ste / / de ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya'o / / skye mched drug po dag las reg pa'i tshogs drug 'byung ste / / de ni skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa'i zhes bya'o / / ji lta bur reg pa 'byung ba de lta bur tshor ba 'byung ste / / de ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o / / tshor ba'i bye brag de dag myang ba dang mngon par dga' ba dang lhag par zhen pa dang lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa de ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya'o / / myong ba dang mngon par dga' ba dang lhag par zhen pa dang lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa las bdag sdug pa'i ngo bo dang bde ba'i ngo bo dang bral bar ma gyur cig snyam du mi gtong bar phyir zhing smon pa 'di ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ste / / dngos po gang la sred pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po de bsag cing sgrub pa'i phyir nye bar len pa len zhing / / de dang de la smon pa'o / / de ltar smon zhing yang srid pa bskyed pa'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun nas slong ba de ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya'o / / las de las skyes pa'i phung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o / / skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i phung po rnams kyi 'phel ba yongs su smin pa dang 'jig par 'gyur ba de ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya'o / / de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni / / rgyu gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba / / rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba / / rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin / / 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas ma yin / / rgyu med pa ma yin rkyen med pa ma yin / / myong ba po yod pa ma yin / / zad pa'i chos ma yin / / 'jig pa'i chos ma yin / / 'gog pa'i chos ma yin te / / thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa rgyun ma chad par klung gi rgyun bzhin du rjes su zhugs pa'o / / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag ni rgyu gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba / / rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba / / rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin / / 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas ma yin / / rgyu med pa ma yin rkyen med pa ma yin / / myong ba yod pa ma yin zad pa'i chos ma yin / / 'jig pa'i chos ma yin / / 'gog pa'i chos ma yin te / / thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa / / rgyun ma chad par klung gi rgyun bzhin du rjes su zhugs mod kyi / / 'on kyang yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir rgyur 'gyur ro / / bzhi po gang zhe na / / 'di lta ste / / ma rig pa dang sred pa dang / / las dang rnam par shes pa'o / / de la rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi rgyu byed do / / las ni zhing gi rang bzhin gyi rgyu byed do / / ma rig pa dang sred pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu byed do / / las dang nyon mongs pa dag gis ni sa bon rnam par shes pa bskyed do / / de la las ni sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba byed do / / srid pas ni sa bon rnam par shes pa brlan pa'i bya ba byed do / / ma rig pas ni sa bon rnam par shes pa 'debs te / / rkyen 'di dag med na sa bon rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro / / de la las kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / sred pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa gdab po snyam du mi sems so / / sa bon rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems so / / 'on kyang sa bon rnam par shes pa las kyi zhing la brten pa / / sred ba'i rlan gyis brlan pa ma rig pas legs par btab pa las skye ba na / / skye ba'i gnas de dang der nying mtshams sbyor ba ni ma'i mngal du ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste / / ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu de yang bdag gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas / / gnyi gas ma byas / / dbang phyug gis ma byas / / dus kyis ma bsgyur / / rang bzhin las ma byung / / rgyu gcig la rag las pa ma yin / / rgyu med pa las kyang ma skyes te / / 'on kyang pha dang ma phrad pa dang zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang rkyen gzhan yang 'tshogs na bdag po med pa'i chos bdag gi med pa 'dzin pa med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa / / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir / / skye ba'i gnas de dang der nying mtshams sbyor ba na ma'i mngal du ro myang ba dang ldan pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par sgrub po / / 'di lta ste / / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu lnga las 'byung ste / / lnga gang zhe na / / 'di lta ste / / mig la brten pa dang gzugs dang snang ba dang nam mkha' dang de bskyed pa'i yid la byed pa la yang brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo / / de la mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba byed do / / gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba byed do / / snang ba ni mngon pa'i bya ba byed do / / nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do / / de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa ni bsam pa'i bya ba byed do / / rkyen de dag med na mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi / / gang gi tshe mig gi nang gi skye mched mig ma tshang bar ma gyur la / / de bzhin du gzugs dang snang ba dang nam mkha' dang de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te / / thams cad 'dus pa de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / de la mig ni 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / gzugs kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / snang ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mngon pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sems pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so / / mig gi rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du / / bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis skyed do snyam du mi sems te / / 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod pa las mig gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro / / de bzhin du dbang po lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams la yang ci rigs su sbyar ro / / de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mi 'pho mod kyi rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod do / / 'di lta ste / / dper na rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang bzhin me long gi dkyil 'khor du ma 'phos mod kyi / / rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir bzhin du mngon pa yang yod do / / de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos pa med la / / gzhan du yang ma skyes te / / rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang med do / / 'di lta ste / / dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad bzhi khri'i steng nas 'gro ste / / 'on kyang snod chung ngu chus gang bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang / / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gnas de nas ma 'phos te / / snod chung ngu chus gang ba'i nang du son pa yang med mod kyi / / rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir / / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mngon pa yang yod do / / de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos pa med la / / gzhan du ma skyes mod kyi / / rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon par yang yod do / / 'di lta ste / / dper na me de rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'bar gyi / / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'bar ro / / de bzhin du chos rnams ni bdag po med pa'i chos bdag gi med pa 'dzin pa med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa / / sgyu ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir ro / / skye ba'i gnas de dang der nyid mtshams sbyor ba na ma'i mngal du sa bon rnam par shes pa las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par grub ste / / de la nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lngar blta bar bya ste / / lnga gang zhe na / / rtag par ma yin pa dang chad par ma yin pa dang 'pho bar ma yin pa dang rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung ba dang de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o / / ji ltar rtag par ma yin zhe na / / gang gi phyir tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan la / / skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan te / / tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po gang yin pa de nyid skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams ma yin gyis / / tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung bas de'i phyir rtag par ma yin no / / ji ltar chad par ma yin zhe na / / tha ma 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po rnams sngon 'gags pa las skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung ba ma yin la / / ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi / / tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la / / de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams srang mda'i mthon dman bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te / / de'i phyir chad par yang ma yin no / / ji ltar 'pho ba ma yin zhe na / / sems can rigs mi 'dra ba rnams skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bar skye ba mngon par 'grub par mi byed pa'o / / de'i phyir 'pho bar yang ma yin no / / ji ltar rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhe na / / las chung ngu byas pa las 'bras bu chen po rnam par smin pa myong ste / / de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen por 'byung ba yin no / / ji ltar myong bar 'gyur pa'i las byas pa de ltar myong par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa myong ba de'i phyir / / de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o zhes bya bar rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las / / srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu drug pa'i 'grel pa'o / / gang gis de lta bu'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta bur gyur pa yang dag par mthong ba de ni sngon gyi mtha' la rten par mi byed / / phyi ma'i mtha' la rten par mi byed do zhes mdo las 'don pa yin na / / de la sngon gyi mtha' la rten pa ni gang zhig yin zhing / / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gang zhig yin la / / ji ltar na rten par mi byed pa yin zhe na / / de dag bstan pa'i phyir 'di brjod do / / de la da ltar gyi bdag gi dngos po la ltos te 'das pa'i dus dag la sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya ste / / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i cha snga ma ni sngon gyi mtha'o / / de la rten par mi byed pa ni lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis dmigs par mi byed pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de nyid ji ltar gnas pa bzhin mthong ba'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos po la rnam pa gzhan du mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'o / / de la lta ba brgyad ni sngon gyi mtha' la dmigs nas rnam pa gzhan du 'jug ste /
tadyathā / abhūmatītamadhvānaṃ nābhūmiti ca dṛṣṭayaḥ
# 'di lta ste / / 'das dus byung ma byung zhes dang / / 'jig rten rtag pa la sogs par /
yāstāḥ śāśvatalokādyāḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ / tatra itiśabdaḥ ādyarthaḥ
# lta ba gang yin de dag ni / / sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin / / de la zhes kyi sgra ni sogs pa'i don la'o /
athavā dṛṣṭidvayopādānamupalakṣaṇārtham
# yang na lta ba gnyis nye bar bkod pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du yin no /
catastrastvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ / tadyathā / kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatītamadhvānam, nābhūvamatītamadhvānam, abhūvaṃ ca nābhūvaṃ ca, naivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvam, iti / etāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritāḥ / aparā api catasra ityāha
# lta ba 'di dag ni bzhi ste / / 'di lta ste / / ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam / / ma byung ba zhig gam / / byung yang byung la ma byung yang ma byung ba zhig gam / / byung ba yang ma yin la ma byung ba yang ma yin pa zhig ces bya ba lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin no / / gzhan yang bzhi ste zhes sngar zhar la bshad la /
yāstāḥ śāśvatalokādyāḥ
# 'jig rten rtag pa la sogs par /
pūrvaṃ prasaṅgena upavarṇitāḥ, tā api / pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ / tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate, tathāpi tāvanmātraviśeṣamāśritya pṛthagupādīyate / tacca uttaratra vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / tatra śāśvato lokaḥ ityetat, abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityetasmānnātibhidyate / athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ
# lta ba gang yin de dag kyang / / sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa ma yin no / / de la lta ba bzhi tshan gong ma la mjug thogs kyi lta ba bzhi tshan la tha dad pa cher med mod kyi / / de lta na yang khyad par cung zad tsam la brten nas logs shig tu nye bar bkod de / / de yang phyi nas bshad par bya'o / / de la 'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba 'di ni 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di las tha dad pa cher med do / / rnam pa gcig tu na khyad par ni 'di yin te /
yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā
# 'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba'i lta ba bzhi po gang yin pa de ni spyir sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin la /
abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā, na sāmānyeneti / evamanyāsvapi dṛṣṭiṣu viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ
# 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag kho na la sngon gyi mtha' bzung nas zhugs pa yin gyi / / phyir ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o / / de bzhin du lta ba gzhan dag la yang khyad par brjod par bya'o /
ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ
# de ltar na re zhig lta ba brgyad po de dag ni sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin no /
uktaḥ pūrvāntastadālambikābhirdṛṣṭibhiḥ sārdham
# sngon gyi mtha' de ni de la dmigs par byed pa'i lta ba dag dang lhan cig bshad zin to /
idānīmaparānta ucyate
# da ni phyi ma'i mtha' brjod par bya ste /
tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate
# de la da ltar ba'i bdag gi dngos po la ltos nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lus la phyi ma'i mtha' zhes bya ste /
aparo hi janmaparaṃparāṃśo 'parāntaḥ, taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate
# skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i cha phyi ma ni phyi ma'i mtha'o / / de la rten par mi byed pa ni lta ba'i rnam pa dag gi dmigs par mi byed pa ste /
pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt, nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathābhiniviśate
# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de nyid ji ltar gnas pa ltar mthong ba'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos po la rnam pa gzhan du mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'o /
tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ
# de la lta ba brgyad ni phyi ma'i mtha' la dmigs pa nas rnam pa gzhan du 'jug ste /
tadyathā / dṛṣṭayo na bhaviṣyāmi kimanyo 'nāgate 'dhvani / bhaviṣyāmīti cāntādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ / ihāpi dṛṣṭidvayopādānamupalakṣaṇārtham
# 'di lta ste / / ma 'ongs dus gzhan 'byung 'gyur dang / / mi 'byung 'jig rten mtha' sogs par / / lta ba gang yin de dag ni / / phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa yin / / 'dir yang lta ba gnyis nye bar bkod pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du yin no /
catastrastvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ / tadyathā / kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam, na bhaviṣyāmi, bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca, naiva  bhaviṣyāmi na ca na bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam, ityetāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ / kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha
# lta ba 'di dag ni bzhi ste / / 'di lta ste / / ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam / / 'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam / / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin pa zhig ces bya ba lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa yin no / / ci lta ba bzhi po de dag kho na zhig phyi ma'i mtha' la brten tam zhe na / / bshad pa / / ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ
# 'o na ci zhe na / / 'jig rten mtha' la sogs par lta ba phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa gzhan bzhi yang yod pa yin no /
tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ, kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ, ityevaṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya viśeṣa iti boddhavyam
# de la mtha' yod pa la sogs pa lta ba bzhi ni spyir phyi ma'i mtha' la brten nas 'jug pa yin la / / ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de dag ni bdag kho na la phyi ma'i mtha' la brten nas zhugs pa yin te / / de ni lnga ba bzhi tshan gnyis kyi khyad par yin par khong du chud par bya'o /
tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha
# de la re zhig sngon gyi mtha' la dmigs pa'i lta ba bzhi tshan dang po ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / 'das pa'i dus na byung gyur zhe /
abhūmatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate / yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam / tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva, yadi sa evāyamadhunā syāt, tadā yuktamasya grahītum / abhūvamahamatītamadhvānamiti / na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati nityatvaprasaṅgāt, nityasya ca saṃsaraṇānupapatteḥ, ekagatisthasyāpi nānāgatisaṃgṛhītatvaprasaṅgāt / iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet / ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti, tadasya na yuktam
# bya ba de ni mi 'thad do / / sngon tshe rnams su gang byung ba / / de nyid 'di ni ma yin no / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / de la gal te 'das pa'i tshe rabs rnams su gang byung ba de nyid da ltar yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe 'di 'das pa'i dus na bdag byung ba zhig gam zhes bya bar bzung bar rigs pa zhig na / / de ni de ltar srid pa yang ma yin te / / rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / rtag pa ni 'khor bar mi rigs pa'i phyir te / / 'gro ba gcig la gnas pa yang 'gro ba sna tshogs kyis bzung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / 'dir gal te sngar dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro bar gyur nas da lta mi dag tu skyes pas bdag kho na dmyal ba la sogs par gyur to zhes de ltar rtog par byed na de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
# ji ltar na / / mi yin bzhin du dmyal ba la sogs pa yang yin par 'gyur /
yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre / ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti, tat kathaṃ veditavyamiti? anyatvapratiṣedhaparaṃ tadvacanaṃ naikatvapratipādakamiti vijñeyam / ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate / yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktastāvadatra doṣaḥ / nityatvaṃ syāditi
# 'o na gang mdo las 'di skad du nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes bya bar gyur to zhes 'don pa de ji ltar rig par bya zhe na / / bka' 'di ni gzhan nyid yin pa 'gog pa lhur byed pa yin gyi gcig nyid du ston par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o / / de nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe de'i dus na de gzhan na ma yin no zhes 'don pa yin no / / gal te de nyid 'di yin no / / zhes sngar gyi dang da ltar ba gcig nyid du 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na / / rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de la nyes pa bshad zin to /
tathāpi bhūya ucyate / sa evātmeti tu bhavedupādānaṃ viśiṣyate
# de lta mod kyi gzhan yang brjod par bya ste / / de nyid bdag tu 'gyur snyam na / / nye bar len pa tha dad 'gyur /
yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt, tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva
# gal te sngon gyi de nyid da ltar gyi bdag 'dir 'byung na ni de'i tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs ltar nye bar len pa po tha dad pa med pa'i phyir phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid kyi nye bar len pa tha dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na / / bdag gi nye bar len pa ni de ltar tha dad pa med pa ma yin te / / 'o na ci zhe na /
na caivamupādānāviśeṣo 'syātmanaḥ, kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca / tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate / atha manyase / viśiṣyatāmupādānam, ātmā tu eka eveti / ataḥ ātmano 'viśiṣṭatvādabhūmatītamadhvānamityetad bhaviṣyatyeva / ucyate / upādānavinirmukta ātmā te katamaḥ punaḥ
# nye bar len pa ni tha dad pa kho na ste / / nye bar len pa'i rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyir nye bar len pa tha dad pa'i phyir de nyid bdag 'di yin no zhes mi rigs so / / ci ste nye bar len pa la tha dad pa yod mod bdag ni gcig nyid yin te / / de'i phyir bdag la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba der yang 'byung ba nyid do snyam na / / brjod pa / / nye bar len pa ma gtogs par / / khyod kyi bdag ni gang zhig yin /
yadi hi anyadupādānam, anyaścātmā syāt, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmano 'viśeṣāt syādetadevam
# gal te nye bar len pa gzhan la bdag kyang gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe nye bar len pa tha dad kyang bdag la tha dad pa med pas de de ltar 'gyur na / / 'di ni bdag go /
na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam / ayamasāvātmā, idamasyopādānamiti,  upādānaviśiṣṭasvabhāvatvādātmano 'hetukatvaprasaṅgāt, pṛthaggrahaṇaprasaṅgācca
# 'di ni bdag gi nye bar len pa'o zhes de dag ni tha dad par bstan par mi nus te / / nye bar len pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyis bdag rgyu med par thal pa'i phyir dang so sor gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum
# gang gi tshe de ltar nye bar len pa ma gtogs par bdag bstan par mi nus pa de'i tshe / / nye bar len pa tha dad kyang bdag la tha dad med do zhes brtag par mi nus so /
athāpi kaścit parikalpayet / satyam, upādānavinirmukta iti evaṃ na saṃbhavati, kimupādānameva ātmatvena parikalpyate iti? etadapi na yuktamiti pratipādayannāha / upādānavinirmukto nāstyātmeti kṛte sati
# ci ste yang nye bar len pa ma gtogs par bdag yod pa ma yin pa bden mod kyi; 'on kyang nye bar len pa nyid bdag tu brtag go zhes kha cig rtog par byed na / / de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / nye bar len pa ma gtogs pa'i / / bdag yod ma yin byas pa'i tshe /
syādupādānamevātmā nāsti cātmeti vaḥ punaḥ / yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha
# nye bar len nyid bdag yin na / / khyod kyi bdag ni med pa yin / / zhes gsungs so / / re zhig nye bar len pa nyid bdag ji ltar ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
na copādānamevātmā vyeti tatsamudeti ca / kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati / tatra yadetat pañcopādānaskandhākhyamupādānam, tat pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca / na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca
# nye bar len nyid bdag ma yin / / de 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yin / / nye bar blang ba ji lta bur / / nye bar len po yin par 'gyur / / de la nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga zhes bya ba nye bar len pa gang yin pa de ni skad cig re re la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yin la / / bdag ni de ltar skad cig re re la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa ma yin no /
ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum, anekadoṣaprasaṅgāt
# bdag ni phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid la sogs pa dang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod par mi nus te / / nyes pa du mar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
nityatve hi ātmanaḥ śāśvatavādaḥ syāt, anityatve ca ucchedavādaprasaṅgaḥ
# bdag rtag pa nyid yin pas ni rtag par smra bar 'gyur la / / mi rtag pa nyid yin pas ni chad par smra bar thal bar 'gyur te /
tataśca tadubhayaṃ śāśvatocchedākhyaṃ mahānarthakaramiti nopagantavyam
# rtag pa dang chad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyi ga yang don ma yi pa chen po byed pa yin pas khas blang bar mi bya'o /
ataḥ upādānamevātmeti tāvanna yujyate / api ca / kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati / iha upādīyate ityupādānaṃ karma
# de'i phyir re zhig nye bar len pa de nyid bdag yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs so / / gzhan yang nye bar blang ba ji lta bur / / nye bar len pa yin par 'gyur te / / 'dir nye bar blang bar bya ba yin pas ni nye bar blang ba ste las yin la /
tasya ca avaśyamupādātrā upārjakena bhavitavyam / tasya copādānasya yadi ātmatvamiṣyate, tatra upādānameva upādātā ityapi vidyate
# de la ni gdon mi za bar nye bar len pa po nye bar sogs pa po yod par 'gyur dgos so / / nye bar len pa de gal te bdag nyid yin par 'dod na ni / / de'i tshe nye bar blang ba nyid nye bar len pa po yin par 'gyur ro /
tataśca kartṛkarmaṇoraikye sati chetṛcchettavyaghaṭakumbhakārāgnīndhanādīnāmapi aikyaṃ syāt
# de'i phyir las dang byed pa po dag gcig yin pas gcod pa po dang gcad par bya ba dang bum pa dang rdza mkhan dang me dang bud shing la sogs pa rnams kyang gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha / kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati / iti / api tu atyantāsaṃbhava evāsya pakṣasyetyabhiprāyaḥ
# de ni mthong ba'am rigs pa'ang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / nye bar blang ba ji lta bur / / nye bar len po yin par 'gyur / / zhes bshad de / / phyogs de ni gtan mi srid pa nyid do / / zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no /
atrāha / satyamupādānamātramātmā na yujyate, kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati
# 'dir nye bar len pa tsam yang bdag yin par mi rigs pa ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang nye bar len pa po nye bar len pa las tha dad pa nyid yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
etadapi na yuktam / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt / anyaḥ punarupādānādātmā naivopapadyate / gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate / yadi upādānādātmā vyatiriktaḥ syāt, gṛhyeta sa upādānavyatiriktaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ
# 'di yang mi rung ste / / gang gi phyir / / bdag ni nye bar len pa las / / gzhan du 'thad pa nyid ma yin / / gal te gzhan na len med par / / gzung yod rigs na gzung du med / / gal te nye bar len pa las bdag tha dad pa yin na ni bum pa las snam bu ltar de nye bar len pa las tha dad par gzung du yod par 'gyur na /
na caivaṃ gṛhyate
# de ltar gzung du ni med do /
tasmādupādānavyatirikto 'pi nāsti / anupādānaḥ upādānavyatirekeṇa agṛhyamāṇatvāt khapuṣpavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ
# de'i phyir nye bar len pa las tha dad par nye bar len pa po yang yod pa ma yin te / / nam mkha'i me tog ltar nye bar len pa las tha dad par gzung du med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
idānīṃ yathopapāditamarthaṃ nigamayannāha / evaṃ nānya upādānānna copādānameva saḥ / ātmā nāstyanupādānaḥ / atha syāt / yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati, upādānopādātrorekatvaprasaṅgāt / udayavyayaprasaṅgācca / sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt / na cāpyanupādānaḥ, upādānanirapekṣasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt / evaṃ tarhi nāsti ātmetyastu / ucyate / nāpi nāstyeṣa niścayaḥ / yo hi nāma skandhānupādāya prajñapyate, sa kathaṃ nāstīti syāt? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate
# da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir / / de ltar len las gzhan ma yin / / de ni nyer len nyid kyang min / / bdag ni nye bar len med min / / zhes bya ba gsungs so / / ci ste nye bar blang ba dang nye bar len pa po gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bdag nye bar len pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin la / / nye bar len pa la ma ltos par tha dad par gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan pa yang ma yin zhing / / nye bar len pa la ma ltos par gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir nye bar len pa med pa yang ma yin na / / de lta na 'o na bdag med do zhes bya ba yin la rag go snyam na / / brjod pa / / med pa nyid du 'ang de ma nges / / gang zhig phung po la brten nas gdags pa med do zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur / / yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu ni phung po dag la brten nas 'dogs pa ma yin no /
kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate
# nye bar len pa yod pa bzhin du nye bar len pa po med do zhes bya bar ji ltar rigs par 'gyur te /
tasmānnāstitvamapyasya na yujyate / tasmānnāsti ātmeti niścayo 'pyeṣa nopapadyate
# de'i phyir de ni med pa nyid du yang mi rigs so / / de'i phyir bdag med do snyam pa'i nges pa 'di yang mi 'thad do /
asya tvātmano vyavasthānaṃ vistareṇa madhyamakāvatārādavaseyam
# bdag de'i rnam par gzhag pa ni rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate / evaṃ tāvadabhūvamatītamadhvānamityeṣā kalpanā nopapadyate
# 'dir yang sngar skabs skabs dag tu rnam par gzhag pa byas zin pa'i phyir yang 'dir de rnam par gzhag pa'i 'bad pa mi bya'o / / de ltar na re zhig 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do /
idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha / nābhūmatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate / yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam / yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt, tadānīṃ nābhūmatītamadhvānamiti syāt / na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati / tasmānnābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate / yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣa iti? ucyate
# da ni 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de yang ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / / 'das pa'i dus na ma byung zhes / / bya ba de yang mi 'thad do / / sngon tshe rnams su gang byung la / / de las 'di gzhan ma yin no / / gal te da ltar gyi 'di sngon gyi bdag las gzhan nyid yin na ni de'i tshe 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya bar 'gyur ba zhig na / / de ni de ltar srid pa yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na ma byung zhes bya ba de yang mi 'thad do / / gal te 'di sngon gyi bdag las gzhan nyid du gyur na nyes pa ci yod ce na / / brjod pa /
yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet / tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ
# gal te 'di ni gzhan 'gyur na / / de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur / / de bzhin de ni gnas 'gyur zhing / / der ma shi bar skye bar 'gyur /
yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt, tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt
# gal te da ltar gyi bdag 'di sngar gyi bdag las gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe sngar gyi bdag de med par de spangs nas kyang de la ltos pa med cing de'i rgyu can ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ cānyat / tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt / aniruddhatvācca yatra pūrvaṃ devamanuṣyādijanmasu upapannaḥ, yena varṇasaṃsthānādinā pūrvamupalabhyamānaḥ, tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti
# gzhan yang / / de bzhin de ni gnas 'gyur zhing ste / / de la gal te 'di sngar gyi bdag las gzhan nyid yin na ni / / de'i tshe gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir bum pa byas pa'i tshe snam bu mi 'jig pa ltar bdag phyi ma skyes pa na yang sngar gyi bdag mi 'gag par 'gyur ro / / ma 'gags pa nyid kyi phyir na sngar lha dang mi la sogs par skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de sngar gyi kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa gang du dmigs pa'i rnam pa de nyid kyis de bzhin du de der gnas par 'gyur zhing / / sngar ma shi ba kho nar 'dir skye bar 'gyur na / / mir 'gyur ba 'di'i sngar gyi lha la sogs pa'i bdag de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni yod pa ma yin no /
