tasmānnābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate / atrāha / tatra yaduktam / yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet / iti, / yadi puna pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya [ayamiha bhavet, ko doṣaḥ syāt? tatra doṣā bahavaḥ syuḥ
# de'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / gal te 'di ni gzhan 'gyur na / / de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur / / zhes brjod na / / gal te sngar gyi bdag med pa 'di 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur / / de la nyes pa mang por 'gyur ro /
kathamiti cet, yasmādevaṃ sati / ucchedaḥ karmaṇāṃ nāśastathānyakṛtakarmaṇām / anyena paribhogaḥ syādevamādi prasajyate
# ji ltar zhe na / / gang gi phyir de ltar yin na; / / chad dang las rnams chud za dang / / gzhan gyis byas pa'i las rnams kyi / / gzhan gyis so sor myong ba dang / / de la sogs par thal bar 'gyur /
yadi pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya ayamātmā bhavet, tadā] pūrvakasya ātmanaḥ tatra naṣṭatvād, iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt
# gal te bdag 'di sngar gyi bdag med par 'byung bar 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe sngar gyi bdag de der zhig pa'i phyir dang 'dir gzhan zhig kho na skyes pa'i phyir sngar gyi bdag chad par 'gyur ro /
tasmiṃśca ātmani ucchinne karmaṇāmadattaphalānāmevāśrayavicchedena vicchedāt, bhoktaścābhāvānnāśa eva syāt
# bdag de chad na ni las kyi 'bras bu mjug thogs pa rnams rten chad pas rnam par chad pa'i phyir dang zab po yang med pa'i phyir 'bras bu chud za ba kho nar 'gyur ro /
atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate, tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt
# ci ste sngar gyi bdag gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bdag phyi mas yongs su longs spyod par rtog na / / de lta na yang gzhan gyis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu gzhan gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ro /
tataśca / akṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syātkarmākṛtakaṃ yadi
# de'i phyir / / ci ste las ni ma byas na / / ma byas pa dang phrad 'jigs 'gyur /
ityevamādi aniṣṭamāpadyate / api ca / yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt, tadā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpanna iti syāt
# zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i mi 'dod par 'gyur ro / / gzhan yang gal te bdag 'di ni sngar gyi bdag las gzhan du gyur pa 'dir skyes pa yin na ni / / de'i tshe sngar ma byung ba las phyis 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
na caitadyuktamiti pratipādayannāha / nāpyabhūtvā samudbhūto doṣo hyatra prasajyate
# de ni rigs pa yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / ma byung ba las byung min te / / 'di la skyon du thal bar 'gyur /
kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ
# bdag ni byas par 'gyur ba dang / / 'byung ba'ang rgyu med can du 'gyur /
iti / yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt, tadā kṛtaka eva ātmā syāt
# zhes gsungs te / / gal te bdag sngar ma byung ba las phyis 'byung bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe bdag ni byas par 'gyur na /
na ca kṛtaka ātmeṣyate, anityatvaprasaṅgāt / vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta? kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva, apūrvasattvasya prādurbhāvaśca / na caitadevam / tasmānna kṛtaka ātmā / api ca / saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ / abhūtvā prāgātmā samutpadyamāno nirhetuka evopapadyate
# bdag ni byas par 'dod pa yang ma yin te / / mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / de sgrub par byed pa de las tha dad pa'i byed pa po med pa'i phyir bdag gi byas pa nyid du rigs par ga la 'gyur / / bdag byas par rtog na ni 'khor ba thog ma dang ldan pa dang snga na med pa'i sems can 'byung bar yang 'gyur na / / de ni de ltar yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir bdag byas pa yang ma yin no / / gzhan yang / / 'byung ba'ang rgyu med can du 'gyur / / bdag ma byung ba las byung na rgyu med can kho nar 'gyur te /
pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt
# sngar bdag med pas byed pa po med pa ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro /
vāśabdo vikalpe
# 'ang gi sgra ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam / saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ, yadi vā
# bdag ni byas par 'gyur ba'am / / yang na 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di ni khas mi blang ngo zhes bya ba dang bdag 'byung ba rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ba'am /
nābhūmatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate / ityabhyupagamyatām / idānīṃ yathopavarṇitamevārthaṃ nigamayannāha / evaṃ dṛṣṭiratīte yā nābhūmahamabhūmaham / ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti naiṣā samupapadyate / evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ, eṣāpi naivopapadyate / etaddvayasyābhāvācca ubhayamapi nopapadyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād dvayaṃ hyetatsamāhatamubhayamiti kalpyate / ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati / ubhayasyābhāvāt kutastatpratiṣedhena nobhayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? tasmānnaivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvamityetadapi nopapadyate / tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha
# yang na 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do zhes bya ba 'di khas blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o / / da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don de nyid mjug bsdu ba'i phyir / / de ltar bdag byung bdag ma byung / / gnyi ga gnyi ga ma yin par / / 'das la lta ba gang yin pa / / de ni 'thad pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te / / de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i tshul du 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya bar lta ba gang yin pa dang 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba lta ba gang yin pa de 'thad pa ma yin pa nyid do / / de gnyis med pa'i phyir na gnyi ga yang mi 'thad do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar / / de gnyis 'dus pa la gnyi ga zhes bya bar brtag par bya na / / re re so so so sor med pas de dag 'dus pa ga la yod de / / de'i phyir gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin no / / gnyi ga med pa'i phyir na de dag bkag pa'i sgo nas gnyis ka ma yin pa yang yod par ga la 'gyur / / de'i phyir byung ba yang ma yin ma byung ba yang ma yin pa zhig gam zhes bya ba de yang 'thad pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir de ltar sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa'i lta ba bzhi mi srid par bstan nas / / da ni phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa dgag pa gsungs pa /
adhvanyanāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmīti darśanam
# ma 'ongs dus gzhan 'byung 'gyur dang / / 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya bar /
na bhaviṣyāmi cetyetadatītenādhvanā samam / yathaiva hi atīte 'dhvani dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ niṣiddham, evamanāgate 'pyadhvani dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ niṣedhanīyamuktapāṭhaparivartanena / tadyathā / adhvanyanāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmītyasaṃgatam
# lta ba gang yin de dag ni / / 'das pa'i dus dang mtshungs pa yin / / ji ltar 'das pa'i dus la lta ba bzhi bkag pa de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bkag pa bzhi yang bshad zin pa'i 'don pa go bsnor bas dgag par bya'o / / 'di lta ste / / ma 'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur zhes / / bya ba de ni mi 'thad do /
aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam / ityevamādinā sarvaṃ samaṃ yojyamekatvapratiṣedhe
# ma 'ongs tshe la gang 'byung la / / de nyid 'di ni ma yin no / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas gcig nyid dgag pa'i sgo nas thams cad mtshungs par sbyar bar bya'o /
evamanyatvapratiṣedhe 'pi samaṃ yojyam / na syāmanāgate kāle ityetannopapadyate / aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam / ityevamādinā pūrvaślokapāṭhaparivartanena / idānīṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya pratiṣedhārthamāha / sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam
# de bzhin du; ma 'ongs dus na mi 'byung zhes / / bya ba de yang mi 'thad do / / ma 'ongs tshe la gang 'byung ba / / de las 'di gzhan ma yin no / / zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pa snga ma'i 'don pa bsnor te gzhan nyid dgag pa la yang mtshungs par sbyar bar bya'o / / da ni rtag pa la sogs par lta ba sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa bzhi yang dgag pa'i phyir / / gal te lha de mi de na / / de lta na ni rtag par 'gyur /
anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam
# lha ni ma skyes nyid 'gyur te / / rtag la skye ba med phyir ro /
iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati
# zhes gsungs te / / 'di na mi'i 'gro bar gnas pa kha cig dge ba'i las byas nas lha'i 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro /
tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt, tadā śāśvataṃ syāt
# de la gal te lha de nyid mi de nyid yin no zhes de ltar gnyi ga gcig nyid du 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe rtag par 'gyur na /
na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti / ato nāsti kiṃcicchāśvatam / api ca / śāśvatavāde sati asamutpannaśca devaḥ syāt / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjāyate na hi śāśvatam
# gang lha nyid mi yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar yang ma yin no / / de'i phyir rtag pa med do / / gzhan yang rtag par smra ba yin na / / lha ni ma skyes nyid 'gyur te / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / rtag pa skye ba med phyir ro /
yaddhi vastu śāśvatam, tadvidyamānatvānnaiva jāyate / tataśca anutpanno devaḥ syāt, anutpanno devo na yujyate iti
# zhes gsungs te / / rtag pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba med pa nyid do / / de'i phyir lha ni ma skyes pa nyid du 'gyur na / / lha ma skyes par ni rigs pa yang ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvacchāśvataṃ na yujyate
# de ltar re zhig rtag pa mi rigs so /
idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha / devādanyo manuṣyaścedaśāśvatamato bhavet
# da ni mi rtag pa yang ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / / gal te lha las mi gzhan na / / de ltar na ni mi rtag 'gyur /
devādanyo manuṣyaścetsaṃtatirnopapadyate
# gal te lha mi gzhan yin na / / rgyud ni 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt, tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt / tatsaṃtānānuvṛttyā nāśāśvatamiti cet, ucyate / devādanyo manuṣyaścetsaṃtatirnopapadyate / yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati, evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt / tataśca pūrvakasya vināśādaśāśvatameva bhavet / athavā / yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā saṃtānānuvṛttirna syāt / asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti / tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati / yataścaivam, ato 'śāśvatamapi nāsti / idānīṃ śāśvatāśāśvatapratiṣedhārthamāha / divyo yadyekadeśaḥ syādekadeśaśca mānuṣaḥ / aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate / yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt, aṃśena vihāya manuṣyatāṃ devātmabhāvamupādadyāt, tadā ekadeśasya nāśādaśāśvataṃ syāt, ekadeśasya ca avasthānācchāśvataṃ syāt / etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt, ekadeśaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt / tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate / idānīṃ naśāśvatanaivāśāśvatadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamāha / aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca prasiddhamubhayaṃ yadi / siddhe na śāśvataṃ kāmaṃ naivāśāśvatamityapi / yadi śāśvataṃ kiṃcidvastu syāt, tadā paścādaśāśvatadarśanānnaiva śāśvatamiti syāt / evaṃ yadi kiṃcidaśāśvataṃ syāt, tadā tasya paścācchāśvatopapattito nāśāśvatamiti syāt / yadā tu śāśvatāśāśvatamevāprasiddham, tadā kutastatpratiṣedhena naivaśāśvataṃ nāśāśvatam syāditi? tasmādetadapyayuktam / atha syāt / anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ / astyasau śāśvataḥ kaścit padārthaḥ, yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti / ucyate / etadapi nopapadyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? yo hi nāma / kutaścidāgataḥ kaścitkiṃcidgacchetpunaḥ kvacit / yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ / yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt, tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt, tadānīmanādiḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt
# gal te lha las mi gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe aa mra'i shing nim pa'i rgyur ma yin pa de bzhin du lha yang mi'i rgyud gcig tu gtogs par mi 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir sngar gyi 'jig pas mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba zhig go / / ci ste lha las mi gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe rgyud rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na / / lha ni mi dang rgyud gcig tu gtogs pa yin no zhes rgyud rjes su 'jug pa 'di ni yod pa yin no / / de'i phyir rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na / / lha las mi gzhan ma yin no / / gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa yang yod pa ma yin no / / da ni rtag pa yang yin la mi rtag pa yang yin pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir / / gal te phyogs gcig lha yin la / / phyogs gcig mi ni yin gyur na / / rtag dang mi rtag 'gyur ba yin / / de yang rigs pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te mi 'di cha shas kyis mi nyid btang la / / mi btang nas cha shas kyis lha'i lus len na ni / / de'i tshe phyogs gcig zhig pas mi rtag par 'gyur la / / phyogs gcig gnas pas rtag par 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi phyir / / phyogs gcig lha'i 'gro bas yang dag par bsdus shing / / phyogs gcig mi yin par 'gyur ba de ni rigs pa ma yin no / / de'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa gnyi ga yin pa 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no / / da ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin par lta ba dgag pa gsungs pa / / gal te rtag dang mi rtag pa / / gnyi ga grub par 'gyur na ni / / rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min / / grub par 'gyur bar 'dod la rag / / gal te rtag pa cung zad cig yod na ni de phyis mi rtag par mthong ba las rtag pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur la / / de bzhin du gal te mi rtag pa cung zad cig yod na ni de'i tshe de phyis rtag par 'gyur ba las mi rtag pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi tshe rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid ma grub pa de'i tshe / / de dag bkag pa'i sgo nas rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa ga la yod / / de'i phyir de yang mi rigs so / / ci ste 'khor ba'i rgyun thog ma med pa nas skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'jug pa'i rim pa rnam par chad pa med par dmigs nas / / gang zhig de ltar thog ma dang mi ldan pa'i 'khor bar yongs su 'khyams shing da rung du yang dmigs pa dngos po rtag pa de ni 'ga' zhig yod pa yin no zhes bdag rtag pa gzhan brtag par bya'o snyam na / / de yang mi 'thad do / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di ltar / / gal te gang zhig gang nas gar / / 'ongs shing gang du'ang 'gro 'gyur na / / de phyir 'khor ba thog med pa / / 'gyur na de ni yod ma yin / / gal te bdag gam 'du byed rnams 'gyur ba gzhan gang nas gar 'gro ste 'gro ba gzhan du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / / 'gro ba gzhan de nas slar yang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'khor ba thog ma med par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na ca kutaścit kasyacidāgamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya vā āgamanānupapatteḥ
# gang zhig gang nas gar 'ong ba ni yod pa ma yin te / / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa 'ong bar 'ang mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro /
na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya gamanānupapatteḥ
# gang zhig 'di nas yang gang zhig tu 'gro ba yang yod pa ma yin te / / rtag pa'am mi rtag pa 'gro bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe de yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
yadā caivaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt? saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet? yadā ca na saṃbhavati, tadā yaduktam / astyasau śāśvataḥ kaścitpadārthaḥ, yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti, tanna yuktam / ataśca, evaṃ yathoditanyāyena
# skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas yun shin tu ring ba nyid kyis thog ma ma dmigs pa las 'khor ba thog ma med par ga la 'gyur / / 'khor ba po med pa'i phyir na 'khor ba thog ma dang mi ldan pa'am / / thog ma dang ldan par ga la 'gyur / / gang gi tshe mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe gang zhig de ltar thog ma dang mi ldan pa'i 'khor bar yongs su 'khyams zhing da dung du yang dmigs pa'i dngos po rtag pa de ni 'ga' zhig yod pa yin no zhes gang smras pa de rigs pa ma yin no / / gang gi phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
nāsti cecchāśvataḥ kaścit ko bhaviṣyatyaśāśvataḥ
# gal te rtag pa 'ga' med na / / mi rtag gang zhig yin par 'gyur /
śāśvato 'śāśvataścāpi dvābhyāmābhyāṃ tiraskṛtaḥ / yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati, tadā kasya vigamanādaśāśvataḥ syāt
# rtag pa dang ni mi rtag dang / / de gnyis bsal bar 'gyur ba'o / / gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po rtag pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe gang zhig rtag pas mi rtag par 'gyur /
śāśvatāśāśvatānupalambhācca kutaḥ ubhayaṃ kuto nobhayamiti? tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati
# rtag pa dang mi rtag pa ma dmigs pas na gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma yin pa de yang ga la yod / / de'i phyir de ltar na rtag pa la sogs par lta ba bzhi sngon gyi mtha' la srid pa ma yin no /
idānīmantānantādicatuṣṭayamaparānte yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha
# da ni mtha' dang ldan pa dang mtha' dang mi ldan pa la sogs pa bzhi yang phyi ma'i mtha' la ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
# gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod na / / 'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur /
athāpyanantavāṃllokaḥ paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
# gal te 'jig rten mtha' med na / / 'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur /
yadi hi antavān, vināśādūrdhvaṃ pūrvaloko na syāt, tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate / athāpi anantavāṃllokaḥ syāt, tadānīmapi paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet? naiva paralokaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ
# gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod pa ste zhig nas phyis med par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'jig rten pha rol med par 'gyur na / / 'jig rten pha rol ni yod pa yang yin te / / de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod ces bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no / / ci ste yang 'jig rten mtha' med par 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe yang 'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur te; 'jig rten pha rol med par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so /
na ca paraloko nāsti / ataḥ paralokasadbhāvādantavānapi loko na bhavati
# 'jig rten pha rol ni med pa yang ma yin te / / de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol yod pas 'jig rten mtha' med par yang mi 'gyur ro /
idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha
# da ni 'jig rten mtha' yod pa nyid dang mtha' med pa nyid 'di gnyi ga yang ji ltar 'jig rten la mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
skandhānāmeṣa saṃtāno yasmāddīpārciṣāmiva
# gang phyir phung po rnams kyi rgyun / / 'di ni mar me'i 'od dang mtshungs /
pravartate tasmānnāntānantavattvaṃ ca yujyate
# de phyir mtha' yod nyid dang ni / / mtha' med nyid kyang mi rigs so / / zhes gsungs te /
pūrvottarahetuphalabhāvasaṃbandhanairantaryāvicchinnakamavartī yasmādayaṃ pradīpavat pratikṣaṇavināśī skandhasaṃtānaḥ pravartate, tasmāddhetuphalapravṛttidarśanānnāntavattvaṃ nānantavattvaṃ ca yujyate / kathaṃ kṛtvā? / pūrve yadi ca bhajyerannutpadyeranna cāpyamī
# gang gi phyir phung po rnams kyi rgyun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po snga phyi 'brel zhing bar mtshams med pas / / rim pa rnam par chad pa med par 'jug pa skad cig re re la 'jig pa 'di ni mar me dang 'dra bar 'jug pa yin te / / de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'jug pa mthong bas mtha' yod pa nyid dang mtha' med pa nyid kyang mi rigs so / / ji ltar zhe na / / gal te snga ma 'jig 'gyur zhing / / phung po 'di la brten byas nas / / phung po de ni mi 'byung na /
skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemānatha loko 'ntavān bhavet / yadi pūrve manuṣyaskandhā naśyeyuḥ, tāṃśca pratītya uttare devagatyupapattisaṃgṛhītā nopapadyeran, tadā antavān loko bhavet tailavartikṣayaniruddhapradīpavat / uttarātmabhāvotpādānnāsti antavattvam / pūrve yadi na bhajyerannutpadyeranna cāpyamī / skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemāṃlloko 'nanto bhavedatha
# des na 'jig rten mtha' yod 'gyur / / gal te snga ma mi'i phung po 'jig cing / / de la brten nas lta'i 'gro bar skye bas bsdus pa phyi ma mi 'byung na / / de'i tshe til mar dang snying po zad pas 'gags pa'i mar me ltar 'jig rten mtha' yod par 'gyur na / / lus phyi ma mi 'byung ba'i phyir na mtha' yod pa nyid ma yin no / / gal te snga ma mi 'jig cing / / phung po 'di la brten byas nas / / phung po de ni mi 'byung na / / des na 'jig rten mtha' med 'gyur / / ci ste phung po snga ma 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing /
atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ, tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt / yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante, tadā pūrvakānāmanavasthānāt kuto 'nantavattvaṃ saṃsārasya syāt? / idānīṃ tṛtīyamubhayapakṣabhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha / antavānekadeśaścedekadeśastvanantavān / syādantavānanantaśca lokastacca na yujyate / yadi hi kasyacidekadeśasya vināśaḥ syāt, ekadeśasya ca gatyantaragamanaṃ syāt, yāttadānīmantavāṃśca loko 'nantavāṃśca
# de la brten nas phung po 'bras bur 'gyur ba phyi ma mi 'byung na / / de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo las ma nyams pa'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' med pa ste / / mi 'jig par 'gyur bzhig na / / gang gi tshe phung po snga ma rnams 'gag cing de'i rgyu can phung po phyi ma rnams skyes pa de'i tshe snga ma rnams mi gnas pas 'khor ba mtha' med pa nyid du ga la 'gyur / / da ni gsum pa gnyis ka'i phyogs med par bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te phyogs gcig mtha' yod la / / phyogs gcig mtha' ni med gyur na / / 'jig rten mtha' yod mtha' med 'gyur / / de yang rigs pa ma yin no / / zhes gsungs te / / gal te 'ga' zhig gi phyogs gcig 'jig par 'gyur la / / phyogs gcig 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur na ni / / de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di'i mtha' yod pa yang yin la /
na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati yadekadeśo naśyati, ekadeśo na naśyatīti
# mtha' med pa yang yin par 'gyur na / / gang zhig phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar yod pa yang ma yin no /
ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate / kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha / kathaṃ tāvadupādāturekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate / na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate / iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta, yadi vā upādānasya? tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate, tanna yujyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt
# de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang yin la / / mtha' med pa yang yin zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so / / yang ci'i phyir phyogs gcig 'jig la phyogs gcig gnas par ma rigs she na / / de bstan pa'i phyir / / ji lta bur na nyer len po / / phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la / / phyogs gcig rnam par mi 'jig 'gyur / / de ltar de ni mi rigs so / / zhes gsungs te / / 'dir phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig gnas par rtog pa na / / gal te nye bar len pa po la phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig gnas par rtog gam / / yang na nye bar len pa la yin grang / / de la re zhig nye bar len pa po la phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig gnas par rtog na ni de ni mi rigs so / / de ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir de /
kathaṃ tāvadupādāturekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate
# ji lta bur na nyer len po / / phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la /
na naṅkṣyate caikadeśaḥ / naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ / ata eva upapattimapaśyannācārya āha / evaṃ caitanna yujyate / iti / athavā / upādātā hi nāma ātmā
# phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig mi 'gyur / / 'dir gang gi phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig la / / phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur bar rtog par 'gyur ba 'thad pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no / / de nyid kyi phyir na 'thad pa 'ga' yang ma gzigs shing / / slob dpon gyis de ltar de ni mi rigs so zhes gsungs so / / yang na nye bar len pa po zhes bya ba ni bdag yin la /
sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati / yaśca na saṃbhavati, tasya kathamekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate, ekadeśaśca na naṅkṣyate? ata evāha / evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti / athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet, tadā ekasyaiva upādāturdevatvamaṃśenānyena manuṣyatvaṃ syāt
# de la phung po dag la rnam pa lngas btsal ba ni yod pa ma yin la / / gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa de ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jig cing / / phyogs gcig mi 'jig par 'gyur / / de nyid kyi phyir / / de ltar de ni mi rigs so zhes gsungs so / / rnam pa gcig tu na / / gal te nye bar len pa po phyogs gcig 'jig la / / phyogs gcig mi 'jig na de'i tshe nye bar len pa po gcig / / cha gcig gis lha nyid du 'gyur zhing /
na caitadiṣyate ityāha / evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti / evaṃ tāvadupādāturantavattvamanantavattvaṃ ca na yuktamiti
# cha gcig gis mir 'gyur na / / de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa / / de ltar de ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'o / / de ltar na re zhig nye bar len pa po mtha' yod pa yang yin la / / mtha' med pa yang yin pa ni mi rigs so /
idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha / upādānaikadeśaśca kathaṃ nāma vinaṅkṣyate / na naṅkṣyate caikadeśo naitadapyupapadyate / upādātṛvadetadapi vyākhyeyam
# da ni nye bar blang ba la yang ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / ji lta bur na nyer blang ba / / phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la / / phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig mi 'gyur / / de ltar de yang mi rigs so / / zhes gsungs te / / 'di yang nye bar len pa po ltar rnam par bshad par bya'o /
tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha / antavaccāpyanantaṃ ca prasiddhamubhayaṃ yadi
# de'i phyir de ltar gnyis ka ltar yod pa ma yin par bstan nas / / da ni gnyis ka ma yin pa yang ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir / / gal te mtha' yod mtha' med pa / / gnyi ga grub par gyur na ni /
siddhe naivāntavatkāmaṃ naivānantavadityapi / pratiṣedhyasya vastuno 'saṃbhavāt pratiṣedhasyāpyasaṃbhava iti / ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi
# mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min / / grub par 'gyur bar 'dod la rag / / ces gsungs te / / dgag par bya bar yod pa ma yin pas bkag pa yang med de / / de'i phyir mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa gnyis ka yang ma grub par / / gang zhig bkag nas 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang ma yin / / mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar lta yod par ga la 'gyur / / de ltar na re zhig nye bar len pa po dang nye bar len pa kun rdzob pa gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam pa can zhal gyis bzhes nas kyang /
evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ sarvathā bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhena bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat śāśvatādidṛṣṭīnāmasaṃbhavaṃ pratipipādayiṣurāha / athavā sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvācchāśvatādayaḥ / kva kasya katamāḥ kasmātsaṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ / iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam / tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti, yāḥ kaścid grahīṣyati yatastannirākaraṇamārapsyāmahe? tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ? katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ? kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ? sarveṣāmeva hi padārthānāṃ sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyatvam, śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti,
# rtag pa la sogs par lta ba mi srid par bstan nas / / da ni rnam pa thams cad du dngos po'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pas mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo bsangs dang dkar sham nyid ltar rtag pa la sogs par lta ba rnams mi srid par bstan par bzhed nas / / yang na dngos po thams cad dag / / stong phyir rtag la sogs lta ba / / gang dag gang du gang las ni / / ci las kun du 'byung bar 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te / / 'dir dngos po thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir / / stong pa nyid yin par bstan bcos mtha' dag gis bstan to / / de'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa gang dag su zhig gis 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / / gang las kho bo cag de dag dgag pa rtsom par 'gyur ba / / rtag pa la sogs par lta ba / / dngos po thams cad las phyi rol du gyur pa de dag gang zhig yod par 'gyur / / de bzhin du gang du lta ba de dag 'byung zhing lta ba de dag gang du bzlog par bya ba gang zhig dmigs pa rtag pa la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su ma chud pa de dag gang zhig yod / / gang la lta ba de dag skye bar 'gyur zhing / / gang zhig kho bo cag gis lta ba de dag las bzlog par bya ba dngos po 'am gang zag gi dngos po thams cad la phyi rol du gyur pa de yang gang zhig yod / / rgyu mtshan gang las rtag pa la sogs par lta ba skyes pas na / / bzlog par bya ba lta ba rnams skye pa'i rgyu dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan dngos po thams cad las phyi rol du gyur pa / / de yang gang zhig yod de / / don thams cad dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir / / stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don de dag thams cad mi dmigs pas / / lta ba / / gang dag gang du gang la ni / / ci las kun du 'byung bar 'gyur te / / gang dag kyang ma yin la / / gang du yang ma yin zhing / / gang la yang ma yin la / / rgyu gang las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / de dag yod pa ma yin na ni rtag pa nyid 'thad pa ma yin te / / de'i phyir lta ba de dag ni mi rigs pa nyid do / / ji skad du mdo las gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis / / de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du srog med pa dang ji lta bu nyid dang ma nor ba nyid dang ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang ma byas pa dang 'dus ma byas pa dang thogs pa med pa dang sgrib pa med pa dang zhi ba dang 'jig pa med pa dang mi 'phrogs pa dang zad pa med pa dang rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang med pa dang gsog dang gsog dang snying po med pa dang nad dang 'bras dang zug rngu dang sdig pa dang mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
kva kasya katamāḥ kasmātsaṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ / naiva kāścit, naiva kvacit, naiva kasyacit, nāpi kenacidākāreṇa saṃbhaviṣyantītyabhiprāyaḥ / asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ / tadevam / sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇāya yaḥ saddharmamadeśayat / anukampāmupādāya taṃ namasyāmi gautamam / tatra saṃsāranirvāṇaprahāṇādhigamopalambhaprapātapatanasaṃdhāraṇāt dharmaḥ / satāmāryāṇāṃ kṛtakāryāṇāṃ dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ / yadi vā śobhano dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ, sakalasaṃsāraduḥkhakṣayakaratvena praśaṃsanīyatvāt / yaḥ saddharmam / anirodhamanutpādamanucchedamaśāśvatam / anekārthamanānārthamanāgamamanirgamam / prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ jagatāmanukampāmupādāya mahākaruṇāmevāśritya priyaikaputrādhikatarapremapātrasakalatribhuvanajanaḥ na lābhasatkārapratyupakārādilipsayā, taṃ namasyāmi niruttaramadvitīyaṃ śāstāram / kiṃnāmadheyam? gautamam / paramarṣigotrasaṃbhūtamityarthaḥ / yathoktamāryaśālistambasūtre āryamaitreyeṇa mahābodhisattvena / ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanāvaraṇaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ, na sa pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati / kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani, āhosvinnābhūvamatīte 'dhvani, ko nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani, kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani / aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani,  āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, ko nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani / pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ, sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti tadyathā / ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalapratisaṃyuktāni, tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi / atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ, prakrāntāste ca bhikṣava iti / ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam
# 'on te 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam / / bdag 'das pa'i dus na cir gyur pa zhig / / bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji lta bur gyur pa zhig snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la rten par mi byed do / / ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram / / 'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur / / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir 'gyur / / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam du phyi ma'i mtha' la rten par mi byed do / / 'di ci zhig / / 'di ji lta bu zhig / / ci zhig / / cir 'gyur / / sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs / / de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes de ltar byung ba la yang rten par mi byed do / / 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gi lta bar song ba gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste / / bdag tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am / / sems can du smra ba dang ldan pa'am / / srog tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am / / gang zag tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am / / dge mtshan dang bkra shis su smra ba dang ldan pa dag kyang rung ste / / lhag par gyo ba dang bral bar gyo ba de dag / / de'i tshe na des spang bar 'gyur te / / yongs su shes nas / / rtsa ba nas bcad de ta la'i mgo bzhin mi snang ba'i rang bzhin du / / phyis mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bshad pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang ste / / stan las langs te dong ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / de'i phyir de ltar / / gang gis thugs brtse nyer bzung nas / / lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir / / dam pa'i chos ni bstan mdzad pa / / goo ta ma de la phyag 'tshal lo / / de la 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa spang ba dang 'thab pa'i dmigs pa'i gyang sa las 'dzin pas na chos so / / 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos te / / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' dag zad par byed pa nyid kyis bsngags par 'os pa'i phyir ro / / yang na chos bzang po ni dam pa'i chos te / / dam pa'i chos rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'gag pa med pa / / skye ba med pa / / rtag pa med pa / / chad pa med pa / / 'ong ba med pa / / 'gro ba med pa don tha dad pa ma yin pa / / don gcig pa ma yin pa / / spros pa nye bar zhi zhing zhi ba / / gang gis 'gro ba rnams la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas te / / rnyed pa dang bkur sti bzhed pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa bzhed pas ma yin gyi / / thugs rje chen po kho na la brten nas / / lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir bstan par 'gyur ba / / ston pa bla na med pa zla med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo / / mtshan ci zhig ce na / / goo ta ma ste / / drang srong goo ta ma'i rigs su 'khrungs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba tshig gsal ba las / / lta ba brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa'i nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdo sde la sogs bden pa gnyis brten bstan pa rnam pa dgu / / 'jig rten rnams kyi spyod ngor rgya cher gang zhig 'dir ni yang dag bsgrags gyur pa / / der ni 'dod chags bsal bar bya phyir gsungs pas zhe sdang zad par byed mi 'gyur / / zhe sdang bsal bar bya phyir gsungs pas kyang ni 'dod chags zad par byed 'gyur min / / gang phyir nga rgyal sogs zad bya phyir gsungs pa des kyang dri ma gzhan mi 'joms / / de phyir de ni chos khyab ma yin gsung de dag dang de dag don chen min / / gti mug zad par bya phyir gsungs pa gang yin des ni nyon mongs ma lus 'joms / / nyon mongs mtha' dag gti mug la ni yang dag brten par rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad / / gang phyir rten 'byung gti mug de zad byed par mthong ste de ni de nyid yin / / de nyid bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis dbu ma'i lam du yang dag bsgrags par gyur / / de ni thub pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin skur 'dod de ni stong pa nyid du brjod / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs yin de ni rigs pa chen po yin no zhes kyang bsgrags / / gang phyir yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan gyur pa / / de phyir de'i gtam shin tu rgyas par thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' zhing / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras po blo bzang klu sgrub de yi gsung rab ji lta bar / / gnas pa bzhin du mkhyen nas gus pas bstan bcos dbu mar gtso bo'i ngo bor bstan / / skye bo gang gis rgyal pa'i bstan pa zab mo ma rtogs pa des rtogs phyir dang / / gang dag thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung las gzhan du de nyid bstan par 'dod pa dang / / blo gros ngan pa gzhan gang gsung rab rnam pa gzhan du 'chad par byed gyur pa / / de dag kyang ni bzlog par bya phyir mtha' gnyis sel ba'i bstan bcos 'di mdzad do / / klu sgrub sgra gcan 'dzin ni bzang po'i zhal snga nas bcos lhas kyang gsung rjes su / / 'brangs pa sa de yi tshul lugs dus ni yun ring zhig tu gsal bar bstan par mdzad / / de yi slob ma bstan bcos de la rnam par 'byed pas rnam nges blo ldan pa / / rnams kyis kyang ni mu stegs ma lus pham byas thub mchog bstan pa yun ring bshad / / dbu ni don du gnyer ba 'ongs la thugs rjes dbu ni bcad de stsal mdzad nas / / bde ba can du rgyal ba'i sras po klu sgrub gshegs par gyur pa des mdzad pa'i / / gzhung rnams dang ni de yi slob ma'i tshogs de dag kyang dus mang zhig na nyams par gyur / / de nyid nyi ma nub pas deng sang gzhung lugs gsal po de ni gang na'ang med / / de ltar 'jig rten phal cher rtog pas sbyar ba'i don tsam la ni mkhas gyur la / / dam pa'i lam las ring zhing rtog ge'i chang 'thungs pa yis myos pa dang / / sangs rgyas gzhung lugs thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i de nyid bral zhing 'khrugs pa'i tshe / / gang zhig skad cig tsam yang yid gnyis bsal nas stong nyid rtogs de skal bar ldan / / dngos po'i 'ching bas nyer sbyar bstan bcos zhags pas dkris shing 'jigs pas bcad byas nas / / dngos po'i ra bar mchongs te 'gro ba'i ri dags mkhas gang de ni chen po ste / / de ltos brtsams pas bdag la yon tan 'di med deng sang mi mkhas gang yin pa / / de ched kho nar de las gzhan pa'i bstan bcos 'joms pa'i 'grel 'di bdag gis byas / / mdo sde kun las btus dang gtam bya rin chen phreng dang yang dag bstod pa dang / / 'bad pas shin tu yun ring 'phags pa'i bstan bcos las bstan tshig ler byas de dang / / rigs pa drug cu zhes bya rnam par 'thag bcas stong nyid bdun cu pa de dang / / gang yang rtsod pa rnam par bzlog pa bkod pa de dag kyang ni mthong gyur zhing / / brgya pa la sogs de dag dang ni de bzhin mdo sde zab mo rnam mang dang / / sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa mthong nas legs ldan byed kyis legs bshad gang / / gcig nas gcig tu brgyud las 'ongs dang bdag gis rnam par phye las rnyed pa gang / / de dag bsdams te blo chen ldan rnams mgu bar bya phyir yang dag bstan pa yin / / dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan rtog ge 'joms byed blo gsal rnams la tshig gi ni / / 'od zer dag gis 'di na gnas don yang dag ma dkrugs dngos su gsal byed cing / / 'grel pa cha gsal 'di yang byed pa'i zla ba grags ldan 'di deng shar ba yis / / 'jig rten rnams kyi yid gnyis mun pa stug po dag dang lhan cig sel ba yin / / lung dang rigs pa la brten 'grel pa bsdebs legs ma dkrugs tshig dang ldan pa 'di / / blo bzang dad ldan rnams la nges par bsgrub par bya phyir gus par byas nas na / / bdag gis bsod nams stong pa nyid ltar yangs par gyur pa gang zhig bsags pa des / / 'jig rten ma lus lha tshogs spangs nas spros kun chad pa'i go 'phang bgrod par shog / / ston pa goo ta ma dang ni de'i chos la zhugs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag dang rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs dang de dag gis gsungs chos la phyag 'tshal nas / / sangs rgyas gsung mtha' yas la blta phyir lus can rnams kyi mig gyur dbu ma ni / / gang gi thugs rje'i sgo nas mdzad pa'i klu sgrub de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo / / bstan bcos dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba / / slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba / / mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba / / ri mor bris pa'i ba drus las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so / / gsung rab rgya mtsho bsrubs byung de nyid bdud rtsi'i snod / / shes rab ces bya snang byed tshig gsal rin chen sgron / / bsgyur las dge ba gang bsags de yis nyi ma grags / / lta thibs spangs te spros bral mkha' la 'gro bar shog / / kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus / / rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'debs su / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge ba chen po / / ma h'a su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur / / phyis ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka ba ra ma dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o / / khungs rnams ji ltar grags bzhin phris / / phyin chang skad gnyis 'byung srid na / / 'grel pa sgra don bzhin bsgyur la / / gzu bor byos la dpyad par rigs /
